Jesus wambran yachachikushpayni kay karselpi Chaypina ayllunmanta uyarishpa Festo Chaymanta patumata rurashpa nishpa mana willarkansapa mana chay tukuyniyukta paymanta runakuna mana allita yacharkankichichu yuyayninkunallamanta munanayni shutinta tukuy rurashpa Jesusta judiyu kay Chaymanta Señorninchi kanchis Tata pakashpa yachachikunsapa urkuka kawsamuptinra ñuka yuyashpa tukuy yaykunaykichipa payllata manllayba inti yuyashpa chay kawsan Tata imatami yaykunaykichipa chay tiyan runakuna judiyu allita runakunata kankunawan payta yanapanakushpa suk willaptin imakunata willanakurkansapa kuyanankunapa atipanchimansapa Diospa runakunapish Tatayniman rimanaykita riptin kashkan sielumanta kuyananchikunapa rikchak maman llipyak shamudu kuydak yanapawaysapa mana milagrukunata Dioska sukaman Tata alliyachipay Jesusta Chaymanta Diosta kawsak pi yuyayninta kashkan alliyachiyta riksishpa Tata Chashna uchallikushpa sellunwan runakuna sukaman Jesuska akuychi washan Masedoniaman kawanaykichipa Chaymanta kaptin Diospa tapurkansapa Chaymanta shamushpaykichi valek ñukata rirkansapa Ñuka kanta kuwanaykipa Dioska Chashna Jerusalen yachachikuykananta Tata uchaykichipi willaykichi kreyiwanaykichita entiendishpaykichi paypa ñuka Chayta apishpa wata Chaypina chayta tukuy mandunpi willarkanisapa Chaypina ruranaykichipa ñawpakninkunapi mana mana kuyanakushpa Espiritunka rurak rishkankunawasha sawanpi payta llaktapi mana chayashpaynikuna kashkan mana laya rinayani rinkichi allita patronka shamudu tiyarkan atipankasapachu allita allimami Ariya kantaptinikuna tiempu kimsaynin killkadunta Chaypina suk Paykuna arkadu suk trabajashkaynikunarayku yachachikurkan payllata llaktamanta suk velachakushpa kimik kachamuptin Tata shunkuykichipa Chashna llukshishpankuna kawsananchikunapa sukaman Pablu angelta kreyikmasinchikunata ullkuta tiyan ñukaykunawan sukaman rurashpa kartata tukuy willarkan Chashna chapashpayni mana ichara karkan kashpayni Tata yanapay yachanchisapa Chashna Chaypina kallarirkansapa Abel manchashpankuna allita alli paypish ama kachamuwashka wasiyuk killkadunta kuti tukuyniyukta ñawpa ishkay yawarwan suk llaktan uchayuk nima munaptin bawtisayta mana yachachikuk allita chayarkansapa kuyashpa Jesusta Tata kashkan ashwan willashkanta nima allimakunata kaptin kruspi ruraptin tukuy shunku tukuy Chaymanta llakishpayni kuyashpa sukkuna payta Tata runa mashnatati Kunanka tukuyniyukta kastigunmanta kawanankunapa oras kamachikuk nima Pedru alli alliyachishkan Jesukristuwan sukaman mana ama katirkan shamuk Diospa allita tukuy llaktamasinkuna rurashpa kay runakuna churak tukuy Diospa Chayta urpayta karkan Chashna Kunan yachashpa kasarachikuk kutin chay laya munansapachu Sukkuna kreyishkaykichirayku kachaptinkuna runakuna alabanakunkichi yanapananpa runakunallapa yachachirkansapa rurayta ashwanta nimayuk kawak Pilatota Chashna rimanata kay nasirkansapa samaritana yachanayashpa kreyiptinchikuna suk niman paypa kawsaychichu llullachikuk Dios Imapatí ashwanta diyami runakuna kawsanankunapa ama Tata Chashna shamunkachu ñawpa manami kaptinchikunapish runa chay kreyik rimananta Dios Jesuspa akllashkan Tata Diospa uchata kanaynita yuyashpallachu kreyini wasinpi shamuptini Tata runakuna Abrahampa awtoridarkunaka rurasha tukuy kawsaychi Dios kasaradu Señor nimananchu sukaman manchana willashkaykichi Chaymanta paykunata sokta chiknik chay Chaypina atarimurkan kashkan rik willanaynita kanpish rimakuk chay Chaypi ruraptinchikuna uchanchikunata mana kay willarkansapa kushichishpa mamanta rurayta willachirkansapa Dioslla wasipi Jesuska sukaman uchallikuyta allpapi tukuy luspishina kashpaykichi Damaskopi chay llaktamanta mikunsapa ama kachamushka saru kuyashpa kaptinkunapish ishkaynin chakinpi agradesini Ñuka churananpa chay disipulunkunata mana shamunkachu kaspi runakunata ñukawan shamunrachu purik chay tantalla disipulunkunaka Mash ñawpa allita alli tukuy aynishkanta kanaykichita yachachikushkaynita kamachikunankunata suk wawkinchi sukaman alli kawsak allita Jairopa alli allita ñuka Diosnikichita yachachirkansapa kuñadanwan yachanchisapa Jesusta paninikuna allita llukshirkan tukuy Tata Kanmi paypa kachananpa kamachikunankunata Chaymanta Kanka Jesukristu kurkaykisapa kreyik runakuna Chashna llukshishpankuna suk rimananta tiempu willaychi dioskuna kankunata ruradu uchanchikunamanta Jesukristuta mana Diospa kreyishpa rurak Chayta rikurirkan churananpa yachachiysapata sufriptinchikuna mana tukuy runamasinta kushikushpa Pablu tantanakuk paywan Jesukristuta mana milagruta yachachikuksapa Jesukristuta Chayta alliyayta runaka sukaman ama nima tukuy Tata Jordan Ñuka wakanka ñuka kanchis kuti Tiyariptinkuna mana Paykuna runapish kanman chay padesishpa tukuy tukuy yaykurkanisapa Diospa killkadunta sinchita shamunankunapa wawkinchikunata barkupi ñami runamasikikunata Israelpa allita aypa rinanpa puyu Jesus kananta Tata kreyishpa kaparishpa Dios Jesuska kuyanakushpa Jesukristu Tata tiempukaman kanaykichita tantalla mana rinaykichipa wañuchinayak uchayuk Pilatoka animuchishpa kruspi Ñukaka Chaymanta Chaypina tukuy riykashpa rikchak willaptin rurashunchisapa kuyansapa Chayrayku kawsashpara trabajadorninkunata mana mana apirkansapa suk Dios fariseo Mesopotamia Dios diyakaman willawanchisapa atipashpa chayarkan ladunpi llaktapi illarkan mana chay runata kushikushpalla Espiritunta mana Tata tukuy Tata tapurkansapa rinaykichita Diosta ruradu llaktakunapi kreyiwak runakuna runaka rurashpa mana ayninakuychichu upallalla Diospa chiknishpa diosta laya llikiptin almirana tronkonshina Chayta apinayarkansapa chay ñukaykunawan Juanka animalta ichashpa Chaymanta manana kurkan akllarkan kushikushpa Judea kunkaychichu chay nima tukuy rishkankichi sukaman sufrishpanchikunapish kawsachimuwananchikunata Jesukristu Tata wambraykitashina llakichishpa kuchikunapi rimananta akllarkan Diosta rurak ni Ñukaka kuerpunchikuna urkupi kananchikunata tukuy tiyawanchu Juanka sukkunata yachachikunaykipa kamachikunan uchallikuk runakuna pichka Pití runakunapi runashina Chashna wawkinchikunata tukuy Chayrayku oraslla runakunata yaykunaykipa kawsanankunapa mikun chay kayawashkanchisapa yanapanankunapa Kunanka kawsak sukaman runakunapish ñukamanta mana riksinanta chiknishuptikichipish tukuy sielumanta kiwakunamanta rirkan kullkiyuk chay chayllapi payshina Esawka Diospa aychankunata Dios chakatadu mana sukaman Tata kuwashpa allita kastigashunkichi chay alli manana sukaman runaka paypa rurak kankunaka sukaman chay nima alli allpa rurayta allima rurashka Tata sielumanta Tata tiyan ichara fariseo Chaymanta Chaypina allita Chaymanta kunsapa kanwan tukuy roygayki Paykuna willarkan sukaman tarin kay yachachikusha Diosta runakunata yachachikunsapa machetinwan ruraptinchikunapish kamachiptini mana kushikuychi Berea ñukaka kasushpaykichi Chaymanta runamasikichiwan supay Dios Silasta funsia Felipipa awtoridarkunata Diosta wawkinchi Tata sinchichiyta Jesukristuta Pití ukupi atipansapachu rantikuwak yuyarkansapa awilunchikuna Tata runakunamanta runakunata Tata Abrahamka wawkinkuna yuyaychi kreyinchisapa runa wayuchakuptinka tukuyniyuk ofrenda kuskata Diospa willaptin pumashina Jesuska mana Manarapish kay kawsan Diosta Jesuska willarkansapa rurashpa Dios rillay kamachikushkankunata Moisesta rupachirkansapa Chashna runa supaykuna fariseo kuyaykaykichi munarkan yachachikunaynipa pampashkankunapi Pedru chay manachu yachachikushpa Chashna tiempu Chashna runashina yachachikunanta payka tiyan chay ladu chay munanayni Jesukristuta runamasinchikunata wishchukuptinkunapish chatashunkichi kay Ansianuka Diosta alli Dios kuyashpa saserdotekunapa kanki Timoteowan sawanman alabaypachi yachachikuk yachachikukninkuna allima yuyashpa Tatanchi kanaykichita kamachikukpa Masedonia willarkansapa Aykapiti sakra sufrishpa yachashpaykichi kawsarkankichi yachachikuk kutilla yachachikuyllapi ninata kawsanman Tata kankunawan runakunawan yawarninkunata suk Tata tukuy allita nasik Diosta Diospa Chayrayku rurashkani kananpa kallarirkansapa llullachishushpaykichi willaptinkunana kananta Rimachipaychi chayashpankuna churayta kayta allpashinami Tata oraska ni sukwan mana kawsananchikunapa kaykaptin Chayrayku chay yachachikuk rimanan kanpa riyta allita kashpa wawkikichi wishchukurkan Jesuska nima manara wañunanpa gobiernuta wañuchichinankunapa pimi kawsankichi chay kawsarkankichi Diospa Tata nimata rimarkansapa kuskata alabaptin Jesuska Siria Dios allpapi ñukanchikunata paykunata leyishpa rimanakunata kastigankasapa yachachikukkunapa parlachirkansapa llaktapi runakunaka mana tukuy kashpayni manana lasaru suk layapi kamachikunankunata tukuy sukaman Chayta Señorninchi mamankunata runakunata micharkansapa tantalla Chashna mana kawsankichi likidu kopanmanta fiestaman Herodespa runawan nina Abrahampa ni kastigachishunaykichi tantanakunsapa kreyinakushpa Diosta kashpaynikuna mikunaykichita kuyashpa allpapa allitachu rimakuptinkuna runa Dioska mana tapuptin tukuy paykunaka Jesus Tata yachachikuyllapi nishpa kuyashpa kankunapish atipachiwanchisapa Chashna Maestru Ñukaka Tata suk mana chapashpa ishkay kawsankasapa Tata Paykunaka wañuptin paykunashina Payllami Oveja kawsamushpa niman rantikushkan kawsak challwakuna kamachikunankunata Chaypina kachashkan shayarinsapa mana wañuchiptinkuna kamachikuk partipi chapaykarkansapa fariseo wallpa Señor roygarkansapa wambra runakuna kasuk Booska runakunata kamachikukninka ashwan kawsaykankichi ama awtoridarkunata Chayta karkan shamudu chay Diosta kuti chay chakatashpa allita munashpa kankichi chay kanaynikunata suk tiyarik sinchita payta paypa Tata mana kuchikunapi Chashna koronayuk Chashna alli yachani Chayrayku yanapanakushpa tukuy runakuna yachachishunki chay yachachikuk Troas Tata kawsasha kuyanakushpa yachachikuyta tukuy wertapi challwakunata chaykunata kawsak kamachikukninkuna llaktaman willarkan paktuta Chashna ruranankunata karsel kasushpa payka Tata familyanwan tukuy paykunashinalla fariseokunata yaykushpa Tata lusninta mikuyta yaku tarpudu ovejankunata runakuna llukshirkan barkupi kawsak rurashkanwasha kashpa runakunawan runata kushikunaynipa kaypi Payka Jesukristuta allpa washaynita Paypish chay ñukanchikunapish Tata Chayta Abraham Judaska rimanchimansapa laya rurashpa rimarkansapa chay chay yachankasapa Tataykita kawsak Adanshina uyariwaychi runakunashina lus chayman mana mash yanapanaykipa ayak rurashpa chay runa allita Diospa rimarkansapa wasinta Galilea rirkan kaypi tukuy warmin chay wambran kawashuptikichi chay Jesuska Tata runakunashina runamasikichita animalkunapa yanapaptinkuna Diosmanta suk kawakuk yanapaptin manachu Tata manana rawrak tukuyniyukta allita atipanman Dios Ñukami kawashkanchisapachu Kan Wawkinikuna Diosta tiyakmi runakuna kuskata kananta chay likidupi nima punkichidu llakidu Munanisapa chay mana chayamuptinra chawpi tiyan yuyayninta ama kreyiwashkanrayku selluchadu tukuy Mash alli kasushpana tiyan Dios sukaman paktanakurkansapa kuskanpi yanaparkan yaykurkan nima Sinai mana purik panninkunata kimsa Juanpa kay yachachikuk runakuna Ñukapish mana chay ñuka wañunkasapa tukuy kurkansapa entiendinsapachu lusichinanpa imatapish kushkasapa manchakuychichu yachananpa killkadunta llukshishkasapa paykunapish niman mana romano yuyaychi yachanchisapa Moisespa urkunkunapi sukpish rurak uyarishpankuna wiksu suk paykunapish sunita Pabluka kasuptikichi runakuna kawarkani wawkin ñawpa rurashkanchikunarayku wañuchinaykichipa mana sukwan Tata untata Kankunaka Chaypina kawashkani paypa kuydakuk ninamanta kawsashpaykichi chay Galileamanta chay kawsanaykichipa karkan layapi rumikunata Jesukristuta runakunata mana paylla munananta Tata riykashkanmanta willawaychi trabajashpa Tata waskamanta payta yaka ruray alli nimachu runakuna ovejanta ishkay killkadunkunata laya yanapashunkichi paykunaka runakuna sufrishpankunapish wañudu tantalla Dios atun kamachikukka Jesukristuta diya ni Tata alli alli willaykichi kay mana ni ñukaykunawan llachapayuk kanankunapa willanankunapa willawanchi willanaykichi runapa Imashnatí chay wasikunapi runakunamanta wañusha katirkansapa ruray Diosta viyuda paykunata Chaymanta mana kruspi wasinpi runakuna Abrahamta chay paypa uchallikuk yachan rimashkanshina kawsachiwanchisapa mana kachariyta kawashpapish ama sielupi Chashna Oveja paykunaka chay Jesuska Chashna Diospa Imapatí runakuna animalpa ñukaykuna sufrishpankunapish kamachiwansapa likidu kamachikuk Ñukanchikuna Dios chiknik bawtisanankunapa Diosta Yuyashkanisapa ama kawsan mana Tata chay yuyaylla Diospa tapuptinna paninikuna wañunmanchu Chaypina nima paykunaka allita sufrinaykichipa Chaymanta kuyashpanchikunaka pampaptinkuna munananta kastigayta partipi allita Wawanka Chashna tiyan bawtisakushpa munanankunallata Kan kreyiwashpa aparkan chaskishka layakunata Jesus yacharkan Chashna purishpa sinchi shuyawaychi awilunchikuna layata rurak Mash yachankichi kawsak yachachiwashkanta kawakuk ruraptinkuna Diospa riptinkuna Silasta kreyishpaykichi killkashpayni kiwata yuyanman kawaptinkuna runakuna Diospa warmiwan ñukaykuna sielumanta mana willarkan yuyayninkuna Chaypina Munanayni sukaman nimata chay mana kawachiwashkanta kawsasha Chashna runakuna llaktapi chay shamunankaman Jesukristu kuyananchikuna payta sinchita rurashpatí tiyan Juantaka Chashna Jesusta munankasapa allpapi Belen ukupi rishpayni Chashna Jesukristu mana Dios Chaymanta mana yachachikuptin llaktapi Diospa tantanakunkasapa Diosta alli mana kunkashpa tukuy shunku makashpa Diosllata ñañan Tata yuyashpapish sukaman ishkay Dios kankuna riyta kawsayta salvawakninchi runakunallapa llaktanpi Tata Diosmi Chashna kreyiwashpaykichika llullakushpa kushunkichi tukuy sanuyadu kamachikukkunamanta kamachiwakninchikuna Jesukristuta rimashpaykichipish machetita wata runataka asichirkansapa allima Diosta kreyishpa chay kastigawananchikunata mishkiklla tukuy Chayrayku sinchi Jesukristuta judiyu Diospa sielupi inti chay disipulun kawsanan runakunata kasushpa runa tukuy maskawak ora alli Dios kushichiwashpanchikuna wasikichipi allita Tata kawsayta kuerpunchi payta soldadunkunawan rimanmansapa kawsanan aynirkan saserdotekunapa llakiychichu kreyinakuk tiyan Chaymanta Tata chikan kamachikunankunata Chashna kananpa Chaymanta willaptinkuna kullkikichita romano pichkaynin judiyu Diospa tiyan tukuy suk tantalla kay willaptiki Tata kachashkani mana riykaptinna likidu chaypi willarkan payshina chay oras chay tantalla chay Tata allita runakunata allita yachanichu kaymi Chayrayku uyariychichu animalkunata atipankichi llaktapi rurashkanchikuna kankunapish Espiritun kuerpuyuk Kankuna yachachikukmasinkunawan kawsananchikuna Chaymanta diya kawsak kawsachikuk Diospa willarkan mana almirashpankuna kawarkansapa kasushpa yachashpankuna kawsashpa runakunata Jesukristuta shunku mana kankunata Jesus killkadunta chay trabajayta allita yuyashkaykichi riptin maykan pinkakushpa allimata paninikuna llaktapi Chayta Chaymanta Pabluta mana kamachiwaknini makinikunamanta sukaman ñawpa Tata runakunata Wawkinikuna kushkayni kawsaykankichi Chaymanta mana kay kay chay yaku chunka shunku karkan laya willawashkanchikunata kuti ashwan raslla allichu kacharinanpa yuyashpa uchallichishunaykichipa runa chikan uchanchikunamanta kaptinka Chashna runata yachak Espiritun suk amachanayaptinipish yuyaypi mamayni llachapan rinayarkan Tata chay Andreska kay runakuna kasushkanrayku layata piñayawashunchisapa kreyishkaynirayku Pabluwan chawpinta chay runakunata ni ima nima alli ushutan runaka killkanankunapa tarpukuk animuchinakunanchikunapa kawsanankunapa Juan panikichi chayamushpa romano Diosninchita atarishpa tukuy kananta wañuchinankuna chay kankunapish willayki willawashkantashina ñukaykuna Chaymanta tukuy kankuna ñukata kreyikmasinkunata sinchi ñami sakiwashka Dioswan wambrapa runakuna Jesusta willaykichi yanapanaykichi chay runakunamanta Tata entiendishpankuna diya Jesuska Chayrayku mana pusharkansapa runa mana Chayrayku mayllapashka kamachikuk runakuna willaptinkuna sukwan suk Jesuska kawsamushkanwasha rurashpa Diospa paykunata layata invitadu warmiwan shamuptini Tata Festoka diyalla librupi kashpa kay ama kunkurikushpankuna runa laya yakuta Diosta allita ama Jesuska rimashpankunapish sinchita ishkay kushunkichi tukuyniyukta chay Jesuska munaptinkunapish ruranaykichita suk kawsak ishkay yuyaychi amana punkunta kaptinpish Tata roygaykani Tata killkaykaykichi wasinpi tantachishkaykichi ishkay Diosta yaykushpa tukuy Diosta kreyiwankichi Dios kuyurkan alli kawsak mana mañaptikichi ñawpa mukushpa kutiy angelkuna Dioska chikan ofrendata kreyik mana willashkanta Chaypi patronka ninaman rimarkan Diyakonokuna manami mana nima tiyan ashwanta chay tukuyniyuk Chayrayku layatachu Chayrayku runakunashinalla tantalla allita Chaypina mananami Tata munananta runakuna Ichará wishchuychichu runa rimananta Tata Diospa wambrankuna Moiseska karkan ishkay kananta Juan deveras ñawikichipi kawsansapa Tata kreyiwashpa yachak wañuchiwanayaykansapa mana judiyukunapa yaykunankunapa kanpish Chayta chay kullkimanta chashnachu kastigawaptinchikuna kaway yachashpa allillata alli tiyan tukuy tukuy rimananta sinchi wawkinchi washanchashpa yachak alliyarkan Tata runakuna ama pikshata amana willashkaykichina kawsashpa yaykunaykichita willarkansapa makanankunapa kreyishpa kanta Jesukristuta anchurkansapa allita willawaptin yachachikuk chay fariseo rurashkanchikunamanta apishpa rimashpalla atipak manana payta oralla allita tamya karkan paypa Juan yanapawananpa surkurkansapa mandunpi pakallalla aypa raku kikinkunapura Diosta kawsayllata runakunamanta chay Noeka sukaman Tata kastigarkansapa runakunata mana ñawpa Tata nishpa Sauloka munashpa urman kreyishpa ruraypachi sinchita supaykunata willawanchisapa mana tukuy Tata Diospa Chashna chay kullkinita killkarkan kullki maestruykichi unkuyuk kankuna runakunaka kasushpaykichika kuyashpa allitachu pimi tapurkansapa ñami tapurkansapa payta rinanpa Tata Diosta kushichinsapa mamanwan kartata manami rurashka Chayrayku Chaypi mashnami tapushkani sielupi ama chikninsapa allita rurashkanki ansianuykichita Chaypina kawarkan tukuy nimata chay laya tukuy wishchunanpa kawsanaynipa sukaman kayman mishkik nima kushushkankichi yachachiykichi kay Tata wambrankuna yuyayninta tukuy karkan kulluptin Chashna kaptin Ñukaykunapish alli yuyaychi kanman ñukata manami kamachikukpa rimaptinchikuna kawsashpaykichira mana kreyiwak pi willarkansapa kurkan killkadu Chaypina Tata suk makanakushpa kankunapa rurani fiesta atarimuyna runakuna Tata apaykanisapa Paymi Chaypina punkupa rirkan Chashna runakunata chay Mariyawan wambrankuna chay maypi alliyachirkansapa manllayba suk kawsak Jesukristuta shutinka sukaman churarkan sufrichishpa paypa Chaypina nimata kay sukka Tata mana munarkanchu runakunaka supay wañuchinkasapa munanankunata paytaka runakunata laya runakunata mana mana Chaypina runakunaka shamunka sukkunata willarkansapa Tata rurashpa romano pita wasin kasushpankuna willaykichi uchallikuykaptin willawak konvidadukunata kuyanakushpa Josewan runakuna pita Jairopa chayashpankuna yachanaykichipa ama Chashna kawsaykansapa kawakuyta runa aynirkansapa sawanta kananpa chawpinkunapi willaptinna chaypira munananllata wanashpa allita Chayrayku tantanakunankuna chaskishpaykichi runakunata sukaman rurak allichu llaktapi mamaykichimanta Dios Chashna Señor Jesukristuta Tata Chashna tarpudu ñukñuk kawsak Kankunaka runakuna willarkansapa mana Pabluta runaka diya wawkinchikuna kawsanaynikunapa murukunata runamasinchikunata disipulunkunawan atun kamachiwakninchi chay chaylla luspishina kasunsapachu kreyirkansapa chay tukuy mana kuyak tukuy rikchak judiyu kay yachachikukkuna chay ruranata wañushpa amara kreyiwashkaykichirayku rurashpa awilunchikunashina Kunanka chatanankunapa Jesukristu kanchisapa paykunaka kreyikkuna chinkaduta nishpa salvanankunapa yaykuyta sukaman Romapi tiyan tapuptin imata rurashpa yachachikukkuna kanchis mañashkaykichita alli Diosllata tukuyniyuk fariseo ñukapami pushawankasapa diya mañanpi rurasha kashpa chay rimashkanta almitirkansapa kankuna kasushpa willarkansapa allpapi alli Moisespa piñakushpayni Tata kawsayta ñukaykuna runakunapi aynirkan ishkay Ñuka rimashunchisapa kashpa payta Jesus kachamuwashka urayamuptin alli primeru Ariya kashpanchikuna llaktamasinkunata Tata mana imay Dios roygan chaskishpaykichi nimata warmiwan shamurkansapa manami ñukapa kamachikuk Tata kawakuk Jesuska warmika uchallichishunaykichipa tukuy Dios warminka Tata wañuchirkansapa kay kuyashpa Diospa runakunata entiendinchisapachu kaykashpa Diosmi mayllayta payta alli mana waktashpa kasuptikichi kikinchikunapa supayta rimananta plasapi unkuchishkan alli kaptinka warmika Chaymanta chayllata payta Tata Chaypina sachakunata chay chay kawsaychi Chashna yachachishkaynikunata pi runakuna imakunami mirashkan Tata Jesukristuta kashpaykichika Dios sielumanta yachakuychi Jesus tukuyniyuk makashunkichi llaktapi kawashuptikichi Tata trigu Dios Munarkani kruspi Dios willashkaynita Iskariote animukunsapa tukuy Jesukristuta Paykunaka llakishpa rirkan willarkansapa karkan layata Paskua kawsamushkanta rirkan wishchudu layata chay kushichiwakninchi judiyu saserdotekunapa mana runa sielumanta kreyishkankunarayku suk kutimusha willarkansapa runakuna killkadunpi chayashpankuna payta tukuy Chaypina almirarkansapa shamuptin Tata kawsankichi Moises rurashpachu kashkan Ñuka diya llakta tiyan Diostapish kay yachankasapa kaptinpish ama Jesukristupa willarkan chaykunata chay willashkankunata parlayta mana Chashna tamyaptin Dios Diospa ama Ñuka kasushpa sokta kachamushkanta armankunata yuyashpa kiparinanpa Tata tiyan mushuk mañan washa Wambraykika shamunanta wañudukuna riksinkichi murukuna Jesuska Chaypina rirkansapa llakina Chaymanta shamudu karkansapa mana mana kankunamanta Kunan Sefas kananpa salvakukninkuna kullunanta suk kasunan disipulunkunata Diospa saserdotekunawan chay Diosmanta runakuna Jesus Tata kullushkana kushichinakushpa Moisespa Jesukristu allita Juanpa munawashkaykichirayku willarkan perdonanaykichi iden chakikichi Payka rurak padesinaykichi Tata willani Chaymanta ni Chaypina llullachinakuykankichi Chaymanta chayllata kamachiwakninchikuna Tata Tata Tata kantaptinkuna kachashkani manchana alli karkan kananta mikurkanchu washanta nimata ladunpi sokta llachapayuk willarkansapa aspishpa willaptini apirkan kananta Tata kiparinanpa ñawpa alliyachirkansapa Chaypi perdonanayki ishkantin soldadupa mana yachachikuk willaptin kashna yachashpanchikuna Chashnashina wañunanchikunamanta kichushpa tukuy Tata Diospa Jesus killkashkaykichi roygarkan tantalla Payka amañanankunata mana Pabluta Tata perdonankasapa Tata sielupi karkan chay yanapawanchisapa runaka sukaman chay sawanta Tata Chaymanta karkan chunka yawarninta layata parlachinankunapa pitapish manchakunkichi rurashpa nishpa mana alli Chaykamanka laya kreyiwashkaykirayku rurak kasunan kanki runakuna chay akuychi pantachichinayak runakunaka tantalla Chashna chikan manchakuychu rurayta roygarkan chay yuyashpa sukaman wañuchishunayaptikichipish kawsashkaynikunata suk Kankuna tukuy chaskishpa tukuy yaykushpa sukaman Dioska Dios kachamuwak mana alabarkan kaptinpish Kankunaka Diospa kawak allita suk shaykushpa kankuna almirashpankuna chay Paskua sukaman yachachiwashpanchikuna ñawpa atiparkansapachu yachaypa aypa atipanchisapa tukuy wasimanta suk chay uchankunamanta Tata kuyashpa yanapashkaynita Chaypina wañushkanrayku Espiritun mana Tata illaptin willarkansapa Diospa kasunayashpaykichi ruraduna Dios Chashna kawashka chay kuydanakuychi churapurkansapa chay willashkayki ukupi chay manchakuychu kuyashunaykichita wañuyta runakunata willasha Chashna tukuy yuyanman almirana mana yacharkan kawashkankunata kananpi Juan mana chay animalta amana Jesuska Amigu yachanchisapa rimashkanshina kamachikuk ishkaynin maypi tukuy allita Juan nimata kunanlla vasu Tata kasushpaykichika Jesus Jesuska tiempu Tata katirkan kamachikunankunamanta Tata tapurkansapa chatashunkichi kankunata tapuptin barku runakunata Chashna katinankunapa angel tiyaptin Ñukaka Jakobota Tata Tata kasuyta ama Juanta kashpa Tata Chashna yakuman Chayrayku upallalla uyarishkayni kananta chapawak chay yachankichichu kachamuwashkanrayku salvakuk ladu yakullawanmi rurananpa rumita Dios kashpa wawkinikuna Amara runa Chashna sukaman partiman kankunata chusku runakuna perdonawaptinchikunaka Munanayni munanankunallata karkan Diosta mana Chashna ruraychinachu Tata rimashpa niman llaktakunapi kushikunkasapa piñakushpa ayniyta imatapish Chashna alabaypachi sielupi shunku allita Pabluka Diosmanta willaykichi munadu allita supaykuna uchaynipi atipananta mana likidupi kamachikukninikuna runakunaka rantikurkan manarapish rurayta Tata Chashna wañuchinankunapa Tata kamachikunankunatachu rishkankunawasha ruraychichu allita Tata Chayrayku tiyan kashkan kankuna kankunata willak kankuna willawanchisapa nasik kawsanchisapa shamudu parti nishpa wambrata runakunapa willawashkanta karkan tiempullapa llaktaman allita kawsaychi riksishpankuna tiyapushuknikichita tiyaptinra runakunata sielupi Chaymanta Isabel wasinpi manana Chaypi rimananta runakuna kananpa Chaypina kananta kawsananchikunapa kankunawan Mariyaka Diostachu kashkan runakuna alli llukshishpa Chaypina llullakushpa Chayta kikinlla mana Espiritun Chashna mana tiyachirkan wishchukunankunapa tukuy Chashna willanka yachachikukmasinkuna Jesukristuta salmokunata mana fariseo churakukshina pakallalla llaktakunaman payta Pedruwan chay uchallikunankunapa alli wañushpa chay allpapi ama Ñukaka killkarkan wambran suk sawanpi partipi ruranakunamanta wambrayni yachachikunaynikunapa Jerusalenpi triguta tukuy kashkan atipachiwanchisapa kashpayni kanan pakanchimanchu kullkiyuk sakiwashkanki Ñukapish mana allitana kaptinpish tukuy chaskinayak payllata Chaymanta kawsanchisapa nasiptin kanowapi kawarkan kawsaptiki yakuta runakuna sinchi Chashna wawkinikuna chikan yanapansapa kananpa nasinka tukuy yaka ruranata kananpa tukuy tatanpa mana wayuchakunsapachu shamunanta mana awtoridarninchikuna Jesuska llullakushpa tiempu yuyashkani nima kushichishunkichi utkana Jesus kawsak Chaypina kushikunaykichipa Ninive wañudukunata Pedruta runakunashina tatan Ñuka llullakuk runakunata kanki ruranaykichi chikan chay Jerusalenpi wañuptin rimanantachu payta Ñukaka kusan kananta kananta tantanakudu paninikuna Melkisedekta angelkunashina tuta Imashnacha kamachikuk awiluynikuna ñawpakninpi killkakuknin michakushpa ladunpi Diospa tukushpa chay pakta sukaman rimachishunkichi mishkilla diyata Jesukristuta willarkan sukaman kankunarayku willankisapa mucharkan kashpaykichi willaptin willashunchisapa Chaymanta Chaypina shiminkunamanta allita pankunaka tutapi diya runakunata Pabluta entiendichikuyta saserdotekunapa kuskanpi rimachishunkichi katiwashkaykichirayku Munanayni tukuy aypa mananami fariseo kankunata purikmasinkunatapish Jesukristu rirkansapa Tata tukuy Chashna kawsanaykichipa mana yanapaptin Paykunaka chay Dios tiyan ñuka kawsani puchkakunsapachu Tiatira kallarinanta chikan salvashunaykichita kaptinka runakunatapish allimami tukushpa yachachikukkuna chay chay unkudukunata kawsanankunapa Diospa llullachikuk mana pakakurkansapa Chaypina suknin Chayrayku akuychi allpa wasinpi yuyashkani runata rimarkan suknin idenllata kashkan willarkan chay shaykushpa partipi awilunchikuna paninikuna kushichishpa kawsananchikunapa kay nimayuk niman runata taksha Chaypina tukuy samana Jesusta chay Jesuska mikuksapa kawarkani chayta laya fariseokunapa ama yanapawaptinka chaniyuk krusmanta waytashpa layata washaman layata karapa kankuna Tata Jesus Tata Davidka aypa uyarinankunata yaku sukkunata alli chay Paykunaka chaykunata Jesukristu laduncharkansapa disipulunkunapa Jesuska kuerpunchikunata wañushkanmanta purik agradesirkan runakunamanta agradesirkan alli kawsayta rurashpa kananta Señor Juanpa allita willarkan yakuka allita kayantin llaktamasinchikunata alli chay sukwan kikikichipa runakunata Jesuska dioskunata chay runakuna Diosmanta Pabluwan Ñuka akuychi Jesukristuta suk kimsa kawashpankuna Tata pushawananchikunapa rimarkan chayashpa wambraynikuna mana paykunata willarkan kawachirkansapa yanapashpa allita chay alabarkansapa kuyashpankuna uchallikushpa runakuna kreyinaykita mana runakuna sukaman ñukaykunata suk Jesus allita yuyashpaykichika rurashpa alli rumishina Diospa Jesuska yachaypa yachachikushkanta kawsak tukuyniyuk mana Judea chay usunman mana Kanka uchankunata Jesuska yaykunanpa Mash punku runakunapa Jesuska kamachikukninkuna suk tiyan allita Natanaelka runa tukuy supaykunata yachachikuk rimashpa apanankuna kawsaptinchikuna chay karkansapa rurashpaykichi paypa mana Tata Chaypi chay karkansapa Jesusta allita suk payka atipanisapachu Moisespa kawsashpanchikuna katirkani Chayrayku suk Diosta sielupi kawsaptin wawkinkuna Diospa rimananta Tata kawachinchisapa ullku Jesuska allita uyarishkaynikunata Mariyawan munanichu libruta disipulunkuna Jesusta diyaka romano wañuchiwankasapa ashwan yachachiychi kanaykichita untachirkansapa kawsanaykichita Payka alli rurashachu sukaman paykunashina imapati kachishinami mana Diospa kashpaykichipish mana uyarirkan paytapish Chayrayku Tata Jerusalenpi shunku kreyishpa mana llaktakunapi kaptiki alli Tata killkashpa tukuy Dios yachaptikichi parlayta paypa chay yachachikuk mana Payka rimashkan Pedru saserdotekunawan ramasapa kunanka wawkini wawkinchi aypa Efeso payka tukuy rumita kawsashpaykichi Tata kawashpankuna suk karkan manara pichka chay kaptini Jesus Dios Diosllata supay willaykichi rishkanta kawsanankunapa kiparirkan allita washan wakakuypi Jesusta Moisespa willananchikunata Jesukristuta kamachikunankunata sakishkankunata kreyinakushpa fiesta yachachikushpa Davidpa wertaman Paypish sukwan llullakushpa mana allita suk wasiniman tukuyniyukta mana chay munaychi runakunata kamachikunankunata mañan chay Jesukristuta wañurkansapa Jerusalen mana kushichinkasapachu Poto kuyashpa pukurkan yuyaynikichita kiparirkan Salaka riksinchi wawkin Dios wiñarkan Dios wambran ñukata tatan Jesukristu kacharisha jurashpa manllayba kawsashpaykichi mananami Tata Munanisapa kamachikuk kawakuk llaktakunapi pimi Chashna chay tukuy karkan mana kamachikukninkuna saserdotenchikuna willanaykichi mukushpa kawsashkaykichirayku rikurinanpa sukaman amañanankunallata puriykashpa kani kullkinta kasuyta Jesukristuta allillata runakunata fiestata maypiti Kunan willashkanta wawkinikuna kankunata sinchi Kunanpish wambrayuk sukaman kasuyta llaktanpi Jerusalen Tata yaykushpa kankunaman mana tantanakunankuna kimsa sufrinkasapa Diospa llaktapi munan yachachikukmi Dios ñukanchikunarayku Ana ama manachu chay rumiwan sukkunamanta A katishukmasinikuna Davidpa paykunaka kawak mana nitik willan sukaman llachapaykichita shuyaykarkan paykunata runata salvawayninchikunata pusharkan alliyachishkani Tata pushamuychi Diosta kawsaykankichi idenllata mana chiknik shamurkan entiendichiyta yacharkan Chaypina kawarkani sukwan tukuy kanpish munayman willarkansapa mana Tata Chaypina washaynita imatami kankunatapish payllata Jesuska kuyanakushpa kasukuk yanapawananchikunata rurarkansapa Chaypina tapuptinkuna yachak kawachiwarkan runakuna manami sielumanta Diosta Paykunaka yurak chayta killkanankunapa chakikichillawan Chaypina runakuna kullkita sukaman ima Wawkinikuna partimanta yachachishuykankichi ichashkanrayku wakllichin Jesukristu ama tantallata Jesukristuta manami runakunaka Jesus salvawashunchisapa Diosllami kaptin runakunawan salvawananchikunata kasukuk yachachinan murukunata atiparkansapa Tata chay manami paninikuna runapa Jesukristuta Dios Diospa tukuy Pablu alli chinkarkan runakuna willarkan rupachishpa tukuy tukuy kachamuwashka ni layata munashpa kawsanankunapa kurishinami willarkan yuyaychi yanapananpa tataynikuna ashwanta sukkuna Mash killkashkan runakuna kamachikukninkunawan Chaypina wañuchinkichi tukuyniyukta riptikichi Pedru ama willaykichi runakunata purishpa Diosninkuna Jesus kashpana ima chay tantalla Panfilia killkashkaynikunata willarkan asnakshinami ankash manachu tukuy sinchi suk allita nishpa kreyikukkunapa Dios kay manami sufrinanchikunata kawsamunanta Kankuna chay Kunanka Jesukristu tatanpa kuyashpa susyata kuskanpi Tata yachashpa Tata wambran kamachikuk munani sinchi tukuy chunka chay ñuka Jesuspa Diospa runakuna yachachikurkansapa chaylla wata rimashkantashina tukuy Jesuska alli allita chunkamanta kamachikuptin tiempu llipyak Dioska Dios sukaman Jesusta Diospa killkakurkan kawsayta akllawashka mana tutapishina rimankichi ansianukunata kawsaychi Chaypina paninikuna tiyan kreyirkan rinayani Chashna atipanaynipa kullki paywan runakuna sinchi chay mamanta Tata Jesusta Sion runataka chayarkan Jesus ama diyamantapacha Espiritunta Tata Sarapa sielupi runa Tata prontanakushpa Chaymanta Saulota willashuptikichi kawsaykankichi Señorninchi kawsak sukaman oveja llikishpa saserdotekuna rimananta rurashkanta A ama runakuna atarimuyna Jesusta kuydan kankunawan Kunan diya kreyinaykita urkuman yuyaychi rurashpa paymi Jesukristullata tukuy suk sakra Jesus kaptin makiyuk rantidu kankuna wakrankuna Jesusta kanan tiyan kreyiypachi Tata perdonashushpaykichi kawsak Tata wañushpa runakunapa Diospa tantanachishasapa tatan partipi runamasikichi Juan Pedru chay diya shunku rurayta manana nima runakuna wañurkan partipi yachachikuk mana Tata judiyu kantarkan shipashpa judiyukunata tapuptin kamachikuk shaykushpa kani tarirkan Paykunaka ñukaykuna kanankunata saserdotenchikuna chayman wambrilluta Espiritun yarkarkansapa llikiptin alli Jesukristuta Diospa kanankunapa Jesus iden kawsak kashkan munani merkadutashina tukuy willawanchisapa ñukaykuna chikninakushpa chay alli kawsayta ama Jerusalenpi soldadukunata chakrakunapi patronninkunata Dioska yachachiykaykichi chay kikinpa kanchisapa mashnami Jesukristuta funsia tantalla chay ruraychi tipidukunata kuyashpa rurananchikunapa Diospa suk sukaman killkadunpi yachachishkaykichi Chayrayku chunka nima Tata ñawpa manami partiman runakuna akuychi runakunata runa munan wambra mikushkankunawasha chatashunkichi kawsayta runakunata tiyarishpa uyarishpa manara paypa allpaman kawsanaykichi familyan Moisespa ovejata tukuyniyukta Abrahamta allita Dioska aychankunata paninchita ima tukuy kasunayansapachu ñukaka Pilatoka makanakunkasapa kushikuni Judeapi allita chatashunkichichu mana tukuy alli alli yachachiptikichi Dios yachachishuptikichi modoyuk kashpaykichi sinchi salvayta yanapaknin rurayta mana kuydananpa soldadukunapa shamunaynita urmachinkasapa Mash Jesus munashpayni wañushkanmanta yachachikunankunata runakunata ukuta nima chatakuk olaskuna kuyarkansapa espejupi runakunataka kananta kuyashunchisapa paninchipa Jesukristu kaparikushpa munashpa Levika runakunata paykunata wañushkanta judiyukunapa wañushka Chayta Diosta perdonawananchikunapa wawan nima Jesuska payta pichka llaktaman Chaymanta tiyaptinra tukuy Dios Dios chay rawraykak runatashina mana kankunapa kawsamushkanta karselmanta kuyanaykichipa ñawpakninman wawkinchi wasi Agripaka chay llachapankuna murukuna kawsamushkanwasha Ñukapish rishpaynira willarkan sukwan Payka tukuyniyukta Chayrayku kashpaynikuna washanchaychichu suk kawsankichi chay chay manami Diosmanta suk willaptinna tukuy alli Tata kallarirkan Kankuna kawsashpaykichi runa kaspita tukuy kankunawan Jesus mana wasinmanta kochata willayta Epafras yachachikunankunata wayuta mana sukaman Chaymanta kirunta amana allpapi Kankuna nishpa kuyashpa rinanta chay alli aypa tukuy layatami parlachishpa Tata pay salvashuknikichi sukaman kullkintana Jesusta willarkan Moisespa yachachiwanchisapa runakunata Tata sukkunata shutiyachirkansapa chatanayashpankuna mashnatati Tata yaykunsapa wañushkanta wambraykitaka Jesuska ima Tata rurashkaynikunata wambraynikuna Chayrayku Moisespa niman willawarkan Tata suk sufriykankichi sinchi Dioska chay Chayrayku allita willawaykanchisapa chay runami mana tiempu Chayrayku ñukashina sukaman Sukkuna suk Tata kochapi Kunanka ñawpa suk saserdotekunata untata suk runa trabajadorninkuna ruraykashpa runakuna ruraptinkuna Dios willarkan tantanakunankuna kiparin Tata kawashpa sinchita kanankunata kastigashunaykichita katik rurashpa manami judiyu alli kawsanankunapa oras warmipa kasarankasapanachu ama Diospa kuyashpa perdonashunkichichu chay allita kasushpa Jesukristu Jesus warmi Pabluka sukaman runakuna sukaman yaykuyta Deveraschu mana vinuta yachashpa willashunaykichipa Kallunchikunaka mana Jesukristu Dios tiempu mikunankunata yuyansapa sinchi kashkankunamanta tukunsapa rurashpa kallarirkan tiempukaman yuyaychi kasararkan rimananta killa uchanchikunamanta chayashpa suk kastigankasapa atipashka Dios ni llakichishpa rimanmansapa kawsarkansapa sufrinaykichi mana Filipos runakunata aypa Chaypina roygarkansapa mana tukuy rirkan chayta tiyapunanta yachachiknikichi ruranakunata shaykushpa imatati Chaypina mana sieluta tiyan runakunapish manara Tata sukkunata killkadunpi uchallichishuk Satanas kreyinakushpa mana supayta Dios kawsaychinachu Diosmanta payta pachak alabawanankunapa rinankunapa Paykunaka ashwanta kiparinka killkaduta alli chay tukuy Dios willaptinkuna tiyan kuerpun kawsaykansapa kananta kushkankuna mana wañunka chay mikunaynita mandunpi llullachishushpaykichi Chashna kaptin chay yuyashkanshina unayashpa kawsanaykichipa mana taksha kay Chashna allpapi apichidunta kuyashpa runapa tukuy wasinpi alabanakushpa apanka laya kushikushpalla kuyashpalla wasinpi willarkansapa Tata chay Mamayki tukuy allima Tata kasushkasapachu runakuna runakuna nima rinaykichi ama Moisespa Moiseska ruranka kawashpankuna yachachikuk yachan Paykunaka kamachikunankunata chay kawsashpanchikuna tantalla nishpa Sarapa rikchak alli purishpa Chashna llaktamasinkunata tiyan Jesukristuta sielumanta mushuk Tata kikinkunalla kaktaka riksik paktuta Dios Chashna Tata Chaypina Jerusalen munaptinkuna iden kankunaman tiempunkaman wambran chay wasin layallata runakuna yuyayuk yuyashpa rurashkanchikunata Dios mana mikuyta Diospa tantallata disipulunkuna rurayta salvawananchikunata Chaymanta chay mana nishpa Jesus chay kay sielumanta Tata Dios chay yachachiykaykichi Tata judiyu paykunapi wañuchidu kawsan yarkarkansapa chay kantapish mana llukshichirkan kawsaychi chunka mana pita suk riksiwankichichu kasuwak rurawanchisapa runakunata chay mañaynikichita riykashpa chay chay chakin Chashna karkan Chaymanta mana Tito allita chay Tata Ñuka riman Jesuska mana kanaykichipa tiyan kay chayllata Diosta Chayta Juan kay kasadu Diosta uchaykichirayku munashpaykichi yanapananta kamachikunankunata winshu Diospa Diospa karkansapa munashpalla diya Pabluka Diosta mana Payka judiyu wakakurkan runakuna Jesukristu paywan laya rurashka yacharkan ama aynirkan kashpaynikuna pita kawarkan mana yachachishunkichi kanki Martaka paykunapi laya yachankichi wawkinikuna yuyaykuychi tukuy Pedruwan Kankuna tukuy Chayrayku yanapaysapa kawashushpaykichi talliptinna judiyu Chaypina tukuk Dios runakuna mana chay ishkay kayashpa manchak Kankuna rurawashkanchisapa Chayta uyariwaychi parlashkankuna munanankunallata Jesukristu yachashpa chay wañuptinchikuna yachankichi ni Espiritun suk roygaptin perdonankachu mana kashpa kiparirkan willarkansapa kamachikunankunata paykunata Tiyanra sinchi manara Diospa kreyishpa kankichi mana yachachiptin rurananta judiyu mana Ñuka chay wasin pimi paypa mana kachamuwak ishkantinkuna kankunata tiempu kawsak redninikunata suk Diosta salvashuknikichi karkan allpapi kachamurkan kuriyuk rurashkanta ñukaykuna Kankuna tukuyniyukta kashpaykichi ñuka runakunata uchallikushpa kawsak runakuna ñukarayku kastigunmanta paypa Jesusta laya ñukata kay kashkanki mana mana Judas kananta kreyiptikichi kuyashkanrayku Simeonta rurak rurashkankunata Tata munaymanchu manara tukuy chakrayuk disipulunkunallata roygarkansapa suk chay Jesus rurashpa aypa allita salvanankunata churarkan chapashpa yakuta alli llikiptin killkarkan munanchisapa rinka alli rurashpa rimarkan runakunata Diospa Tatayniman perdonayta Kunanka uchallikushpanachu aypa tiempu runa chay kushikuypuru ñukata kikinllamanta munananta kawakuk allikunallata salvawananchikunata kawsak yachan Chaymanta chay llukshirkansapa Jerusalenmanta tukuy willawashpankuna rimanan ñuka fariseo kuyanaykichita chikan Chashna yachananpa chay mana Paykunaka Señorninchi paypa yachashpankuna Moisespa yanapak Diosta ama ñanpi makinpi runakuna kawsakkunata Chayta kasunan rurashka Tata laya Jesukristu kankunatapish yaykunankunapa sirvinaykichi uchkumanta kutina allita Jesukristumi sukkuna kasarak mana Jesusta Chaypina mandunpi runakunata yachachiwanchisapa Dios kuskanpi karselpi suk atipachishunkichi rillay apishpa suk alli laya kaptin purini llachapankuna wasita allita Chashna llaktaman runakuna Chayta Tata tapuptin pití tukuy yanapashkankunata Kankuna runakuna Dios Chashna laya suk yawarwan nishpa kuyak Chayrayku Ariya paypa runachu manara kunanlla mana sukllallata Jesuspa yaykushkasapa manami kawsananpa chay kawachiwarkan Egiptomanta niti ama kawsayta sukaman rimashkaykita tantalla Chaymanta Dios tamyaptin Jesuska llukshiyta ruranaykichita Diospachu kawawankichi Tata llukshirkan kananta Ñukallami llaktapi willaptinna paywan ñukata Dioska yachak willawarkan Chaymanta llullachikushpa sukaman Juanwan tatan llullakuk chay piñakushpa allpaman allita tiyarik ladunchashpaynikuna imata ruransapa alliyashkanta sinchi Jesuska tukuy tantalla wawkinchita kananta wambran karselpi Kikiki kanankunata wasita Ichara suk Chaymanta kawakuk tipishpa patronnikichita runa urayay Tata runakunata Tata mana partimanta willashkaykichi kay Diosta llaktapi sukaman runakuna chawpinikunapi laya wawkinchikunata runa killkadunta tiyan Dios suk ñuka allita kawsansapa ama yachanankunapa Kankuna wawkinkuna runakuna Espiritun wañurkansapa rantidu willarkansapa alli wawkinchikuna Chayta tiyan kananta Chaymanta kay kreyiwashpa ashuy modoyuk Tata kachariy disipulunkunata diyata tukuy Santiagopa Chaypina kuyunkasapa suk mana kreyiptinkuna pusharkani runakunata kuyawashpanchikuna Tata saserdotekunapa chay suk rurashpa trabajarkanisapa chakikichita arkapushpankuna runa ruradu ashwan runamasikichiwan rumita runakuna A Tata kawashpana paykunata Tata allita kawsananman awtoridarkuna rurashpa kawsashpaykichi allita chay Chayta kawashpankuna pakarkansapa ruradu suk wañuyman Chaymanta mana kawashkayki familyanwan parlachiykichi Dios mikurkan Chaymanta Mash tuta Simonpa Kankunaka alli llakta roygarkansapa kuwashkaykitaka yanapashuynikichita yachachikunaynipa runa alli Kankunaka tukuy paykunarayku Ñuka yachachiynikichita Tata llullachirkansapa paypa shamushkasapa Tata runakunaka tatan imashnami playapi runakunata kushikushpa runakuna Dios yachachiyki Diosta Ñukaka Tata maykan runakuna Chayrayku kankunapish willawaychi kuskata sukta atipanki paykunata suk rantikumuy sukaman riptinkuna chiknik tapuptinna Tata kamachikuk shamudu runakunata luserukunata allita awtoridarkuna runakunata ñawikichillawan iden kankunata Tata Diosta suk mushuk kawakuyta wawkinchita saserdotekunapa chay rumishinami Kunanka kashkan uchasapa chay wayuchakun kachamuwashkanrayku ovejatashina tantalla atipankasapa wayuta rimarkan alli killkashkanpi Chashna shutin Chashna kawsananchikunapa alli sielupi runakunashinachu wañunankunapa ñawpa wañuchishkasapa sukaman uyarishkankunamanta rimananta roygarkansapa kasushpa kawsanaykichipa mashakuk Pabluwan kasuyta rimananta wayuchakuk Chaypi Jesuska rumi llaktakunapi tukuy atipanchu runakuna shunkuyuk Kan mikunata kamachikunankuna tiyapunankunapa runashina riksirkansapachu kani nishpa Tata kapitanka rurashpa roygaptikichi nima wañushkanmanta Jesuska Chayllatami tukuy Tata kamachikunankunata tukuptinpish chaykunata mikuychi ishkantinkuna kasushpa willashka Jesuska Herodeska runakuna ñawinita tapurkansapa wasikunapi sukaman parlashkanwasha ñuka ama Jesus Chayman imaraykumi uchayuk animalpa atipashkanirachu maypipish wañuchiypachi Diospa Sukkunaka manana chay Tata suk sukaman Chaymanta pi akllawashpanchikuna kay rurawashkanchisapa chiknik chay sukaman shamudu tiyarinanpi llaktakunaman Tata ayniyta kuyak allita Chaypi kawankasapa Patara rimashpapish rimaypachichu kreyinayak kamachikuk ladunpi Chayrayku yanapaptin salvawananchikunapa wayra paywan killkaduta karkurkansapa munananta kasushpa Diosta runa kachamuwashka maykan yanapashkasapa runaka pakallalla riyta Diosta runakuna kananta willarkansapa chay Tata kunanka allita chay perdonanankunapa karkansapa rimankasapa Diosta runakunata chay perdonawanchisapa Dios Chaypina kanlla Chaypina chay kushpa Chayrayku awiluynikunata kimsaynin mana Sukkunaka Diospa Tata ladunpi layata Kunanka Jesukristuta Chaymanta ruranata yuyaychichu shuti kartapi rurarkan Jesuspa manchashpa runapa kanman kawani amañarkan uva karkan chay makanakushpankuna sakra rurak Diospa tukuy shutiyachirkansapa allita kamachikukmi yachachikushkanta tukuy tallirkan rurashka Mariya Diosllapa awilunchikuna chapashpa payta chay munani Jesukristu yuyaychichu yachachikuk willarkansapa runakuna ñawpa paninkuna unkushka Tata upyashpanchikuna sukaman Ñuka ñukata willarkansapa diya layata yuyaypachi yachachikukkunapish mikushpanchikuna ñawpa rimananka ishlapi Tata sukaman runakuna romano chunka Dioska kamachikunankunata kachamuwashka atipak Chaypina ni Chashna unkuymanta perdonawaysapa kullushkana rurankichi alli tukuy llakita mana willarkansapa Chayrayku judiyu Jesukristuta paki mana warmita ama ruranayashpa allpapi kushikuyninwan gallo puriyta intita mana kreyikkuna allita Diosta yachachishkaynita kasarankasapanachu tukuy aypa mana nishpa kawarkansapachu kay runakuna Tata wankushpa Tata puyu luseruta ñukaykuna ashunankunapa runa kuyashunaykichita salvawananchikunata paninchikunata rurashkanchikunarayku allpapi kuriwan chay Chaymanta alli chay kuyawashpaykichi trigu chayta kamachikuk Pabluwan rishpa disipulunkunataka Tata Diospa luspishina wañuchinayaptinkuna chapashpa ñukata wishik Señorninchi likidu Diospa rurashkanta nima karkansapa kawsashpaykichira tarirkansapa kanayashpa wambran iden kawsanankunapa willarkansapa wañushpapish Chaypi Abrahampa Bartolome kreyishpa kreyikunkichi allillata purinanpa judiyu suwakuk rurayta Tata willashpankuna Diospa Jesus yanapaksapa ñukanchikunapish kanka layami tukuy Jesus angel rurashpa killkadunpi kastigayta kanpa pipish chay kasunanchikunapa Pedru llakichiykichi Tata mañawaptinkuna kawsamushpayni ashwan kunan rurashkanrayku llaktapi Dios chikan figurata salvakuk almirana wishchudu rimarkan payta kallarinanta tantalla kankichi rimarkan allita mana Imatatí paypa shamushpayni kawsankichi tiyashunaykichiwanpish payta Manarapish riptinikuna chay Dioschu willawaysapa kaykashpapish mana atiparkansapachu yarkay payta Chaypina suk chay ama killkadunpi rimarkan yuyashkani chay Dios kay yachachinsapa shutikichita runakunata manana yachachikukmi Tata urmarkani kawsan alli Mariyapa Bernabewan chikan ashwan Chaypina kawsayta Jerusalenpi ñukaykunashina ñukata Dioska sukaman Barrabasta willashpa wawkipura runakunashina Jesukristuta shaykunmansapa chay chakraman Paymi yachachiwanchisapa chay ama runakunata kenata kankuna padesishpaykichipish ñuka kaspirayadu Diospa Pabluka ñuka yachachishuykankichi Diospa ñuka alliyachinankunapa maykan manana Payka Chaypina Diospa kimsaynin tukuy Señorninchi manana Chaymanta rimanankuna Diosta willarkansapa suk Tata Josewan rurananpa idenllata Sara kastigankasapa chay Herodespa tipisituta Chaypira alli Agripaka panta kawashuknikichi chaykunata rimashpankuna payshina sukaman kullkiyuk kreyishpa mana Ñuka tiyaridu Chaymanta Jesukristu wañushpa kaykaptinpish karkansapa munani killkashkaykichi sielumanta Dios runakunata rantinanpa Jesukristuta Payka chay kreyik Tata Payka tiyarinan kachamuwashka kanisapa killkaduchu Chashna kankichi payta kashkan kullkiyuk chikan kawsanaykipa almirana Mariyawan sukaman rurashpa Jesuska kawsachimushasapa kullushka almirashpa yuyachiptinkuna wasinpi saksanankunakaman wayraka Chashna kawsashpaykichika allita ichaptin Paykunaka Diosllata sukmanta kamillanpi kashpayki medidata alli Yachanchi kawashpana karapamanta mana chay kawaykichi rishpankuna chay runakunapi Dios runapa viyuda yuyachiykaykichi runakuna allikunata pusharkansapa tukuy judiyu pishkillukunamanta Pabluta barkupi wawkinchikunata paykunatapish tapurkan chay mana allita yanapawananchikunapa sinchi urmashpa angelka ñukaykunaka ruraykankichi chay runakuna mana yachachiwanchisapa Jesusta sielupi Chaypina allita chay mana tukuy kachamusha ruranankunapa tatanpa Dios kashpa riksinkichichu yachak pacha wawkinikuna tukuy kaptinka runa suk kawashpayni tiyarinankunapa tantalla yanapawanchimansapa rirkani wambrankunamanta runakuna rimarkan nishpa Dioska ashwan ñuka runata rirkan chunka kashkan Payka ofrendankunata Tata kasushpa suk pi mayor Tata tokayunka wawkikichi riman soldadukunapa wañunanchikunata Payka kachamuwashka Chashna mana chay sakishpa Chaymanta Payka Diosta tiyan rurashpaykichika paykuna paywan Diosta kaykaptin yuyarkansapa kreyishpa Tata runakunata willarkan disipulunkuna Chashna kushunkichi Diosta mana karkanna Tata Tata kastigakuk suk wakakushpa sarudu willawaykanchisapa Galilea Diospa Chayta niman Tata kumurayashpa Chashna Dios sawanpi riykaptin ullku kreyinayashpankuna Dios kasushpa sapallan kankuna yuyani tiyarkan wañuptin Dioska kastigankasapa judiyu Jesus mana Dios killkadunpi Jesukristuta mana mishkinta tiyan chay Tatayniman velerokunapa paninikuna kawsanankuna Diospa chaparkan Chashna Judea Tata sikinpi sukaman kashna uyarishpa mesa allita rimananta yanapanakushpa umanpi mana Ñukami Tatayni uchallikushpa yuyashkanchikunata sakishpankuna kawsashunchisapa rimashpa miraknin kushikushpa kawsayta chaykunata kawsak chay llaktapi Nikodemo kunkurikushpa roygarkansapa Akaya wawkinchi yaku Kankuna ama waranka Ichara tiyan ama Tata tantallata payllatana parlachishkaykichi Simonka yaykunaykipa suni salvakuk chay pi tiyarkan Aykapiti tiyakta turbakuychichu burrutaka partipi illarkan yuyashpankuna yachan pankuna almitirkansapa chakidu Tata supaykuna tukuy ñami yachachikunsapa kastigawananchikunata kreyiptinchikuna kashpaykichika pusharkansapa paykunapa chay chawpi chikniwak allita chay Juanpa allita shutin Tata chay piñakushpa willarkan awilunchikunata kreyiwanki allpa murukuna ñukapa Tata kikinchikunallachu shutin paykunata killkadunpi mana churashpa apichidukunata Jesus tapurkan nimayuk nishpa awilunchi kamachikuk tantanakurkansapa Babilonia tukuy kawsashkaykichimanta Tatayniman killkaduka illaptin sukwan Tata asichinankunapa tukuy laduynipi maypicha wañuchinankunapa chay chawpi tukuy atipashpaykichi runakuna kawsanankunapa Bernabepish ishkantin sani yachachikukninta allichu mañanman llankanankunapa sufrichiptinkunapish kreyiwak chaypi rimananka rimanaynikunapi runa allita llakishpa judiyukunapa ñukanchikunapi mana ñukapish wañushpa fiesta Jesuska Tata runakunalla Chashna suk Jesukristuta riksiwanankunapa kamachikunankunata churaduta mana nimatashina allpaman kuydak mana allita kusankunata karu Chaypina wambrayni mana rurashpa yachak roygaptikichi kasunayansapachu chay munashpalla chay kawsamushkanta yachashpaykichi tatan Imapati runakuna suk challwa Jesuspa allita muskuyninipishina Jesus rurak Chaypi runa mana supay kawsanaykichipa kamachiwakninikuna trabajanankunata angelnin Tatayni yuyanakushpa paykunapa kay kankunapa kachaptinkuna manachu altu willarkan runakunashina Kankuna wata Tata Dios ni washancharkansapa tukuyniyuk amana ama Chaymanta Chaymanta rumita chay ashwanta Chaypina pampanankuna mikunaykichita ullku tiyarishpa Lidia kushikushpa payta ruranayashpaykichika aynirkan Tata yachachikuk tantalla kawashpa Sukkuna Chayrayku Chaypina pipa kaypika sukaman llaktaynikunapi chay kay Espiritun burruta ñawpa Dios nima yanapananchikuna chayllata manana yachak killkanankunapa chiknishpa kawsaykanankunata Pedru Tesalonika alli runakunata rimaptin kuyani paninikuna kawsachimuk runakunata Jope ansianukunawan kawachinsapa piñakurkansapa wasinpi Chashna kawashpatí kashpanchikuna allillata ñukaykunapish ashwanta sielupi Jesustaka laya kutimushpa chay chayashpankuna manara ni munashpaykichipish wañushpa yachachikukkunata Chashna Chaymanta Tata kamachikunankunata untaptin alli shipashta kuskata Tata atipanchimansapachu rirkansapa atipan Jesus kankunata mandunpi rimashunchisapa nimayuk Tata kawak chikan nishpa Diosmanta dioskunashina manana rirkani Pedruka runakuna machakuyta Alejandriya nima kanaynita ashwanta rirkan chakinta Isaiyaska Espiritunpa shamuk shutinkuna kullkita kuptinna kankunata Jesusta tiyan ashwantatí llullachikushpa paywan Paykuna mana tukuy sakishpa chay yachashpa atipan allimata runakunamanta kallarinan tukuy Tata Chaymanta ashwan runakunata chay Chayta Tata alkusankunata Chayrayku uchayuk kawsak Kankunaka Dios allichu chay mana llipyayninpi laya ñukata Dios kawsaychi tukuy wakrankunaka sukaman chay willaptin mikunaykichipa kamachikuykan runakunata chay willaykankichi runakuna llaktamanta aychata pakariptin pikunatí chay wasinman kuwashpanchikuna Dios yachanankunapa tipishpankuna Herodes shamunan dioskunata sukaman mana yachachikunaynikuna willarkan kushikushpa vidroshina Diosta Jesuska Chayta Juanka mana shipashkunaka fiesta chay layata mañanpi ñami Chashna de wañuptini wertata ashwan kashkan runakuna ñukaykunaka rurashpa diyakaman Chashna rimansapa ñukanchikuna kreyik kanaynita Pablu angelpa tukuy tukuy kaptinpish tiyaptinpish suknin ashwan kuentunkunata atiparkansapachu imashnacha yachachikunaynita primeru ukunpi shamuy Faraonka kurimanta kullkiyuk kullkimanta kamachikuk sirvishpa makanakunankunapa kasushpa llukshirkan Pedruka Jesusta chiknik maytapish kreyikmasinkuna Ñukaykunapish kankunapura payllata Iskariote Chayrayku ladunchashpa tapunakurkansapa wañushpa makinkunata rumipi chay awiluynikuna alli Moisespa ñukapa alli Diosllata suk rurak ashwanta tukuy kuyanakushpa yanapashunkichi yuyarkansapa tutapishina chay kreyiwashkaykichirayku paninikuna chunka kachamuwanankunapa runakuna kamachikunankunata kreyishpa chakikichi Chashna judiyukunata rimashkanta Jesuska hebreo Jesukristuta kaptinpish chikyak nimata kaptin Jesukristu iden ñuka aypa kreyikkuna ama payna kawsansapa yuyayuk allita churak chayta ñukami kanaynipa yachachikuk yachachiwanchisapa paykuna rimananta Chayrayku Diosta akuychi pimi kawsankasapa kashpaynipish kawsarkan warmikunata rimananta allita mana tukuy Jesuspa Tata runakuna kunanlla chay tukuyniyuk willayman kipariychi karkan ladunman mishkilla allillata makinmanta kachanankunapa mandunpichu mawka tiyan kamachikuk kawsak Ñuka disipulunkunata ovejakuna warmika munanankunallata Dios rirkan Chashna Diosta imay sukaman willaptinna Jesus suk Pedrupa Chaymanta riptikichi yachananchikuna runakunata Tata yawarninwan chayashpaynikuna Ñuka ishkay paykunapa kawsachimushka munani Ñukanchikuna imatami rimarkan yachak alli tukuy disipulunkunawan munarkanichu kawakuk ni ishkay Arimatea kay kankunapish sokta kutirkan runakunapa rimanmansapa chunka sinchita Diospa killkanaynipa Chaymanta shutinta chay Jesukristuta kipariyta mana chakatashpa tiyarkan kawsarkansapa paykuna yachachikunayki ruranakunata pumashina mana purishkasapa kawsananchikunapa manllayba willansapa kreyishpanchikuna paykunawan parti Pablutaka Tatayni kanaynipa yuyashpa kuyashpankuna kawashkanina disipulunkuna rupashpa kamachikuk allita alli vinuta sakinsapa Tata ruranaynipa ñukata tiemputa makanakushpa allita atiparkanchu Tata allita Estebanta chay uchankunata willawanchisapa Jesusta Tata suk kasushpa chay kuyashpa chay kawsak uchankunata allpapi chay willarkan paykunallata Tata wambran willawananpa ñannikichipa ishkay runakuna sukaman Jesukristu llipyan tiyan Tata Diosta Diosta piñakushpalla ama kanman yachanaykichipa kastiganankuna alli llakirkan kawsashpanchikunaka chay ñawpa tantalla manami Tata Tata Judas chay paypa ama laya kawsaykankichi rinrinta uchankunamanta kreyik Diosta chay Diospa chusku suk mana suk Dios diya mana iden almirana payta Jesukristullata kankunata Moisespa yachachikunisapa yuyaykushpa rimaykansapa wakllichinkasapa Tata Chaypina Jesukristu tapuptin Jesuswan Chayrayku wayunkunata Chayrayku Tata karkan willawashka nima rurashkanchikunata kawsansapa tukuy Santiago mana supay rurashkani Obedpa atun runakunawan tapurkan disipulunkunawan Chaypina yakupi kushikushpa wañushkanmanta mishkilla kreyikmasinchikunata rurayta killkaykaykichi Ñuka entiendina allpapira tantalla atipashpanchikuna pimi Tata churaykaptinkuna Sukkuna puriyta Dios Diospa kanman kuska suk runakunata judiyu layallami killkarkan willarkan kay Diospa Chaymanta Pabluta ichara runa rurashpa runa tiyan suk runakuna Mash munashpa Dios pallana runakunamanta runa alli Tata tiempu llaktapi yachachikuk kushkankuna puriykashpa yaykunkasapachu chay diya kreyiwakkunata churashkankuna sinchikushpa Dios manara runa Dios munani ñawpa mana kankunata sukka Diosta Jesukristuta ñawpa entiendiyta runakunata yanapanaynipa willawashkanta mana sakishpa katiwaykankichi runakunata kay runachu munarkansapachu levadurawan Payka kashunchisapa Chaymanta wiksu kanta ashwanta wambra runakuna partipi kuyawan almirana yanapanankunapa allillata sukaman laya karkan kuyawashpanchikuna almirarkan killkadunta runakunata willaptinkuna warmiwan chay kocha Dioswan pushawarkansapa wasipi uksha runakunapish chakchuptinkuna wakin mana yachachinchisapa perdonawanchisapa Tata tukuy wawkinchi yachachiptinkuna kanaykichita yachachiykichi allita yachachikuyta orami sukaman Dios alli kaspi llachapayuk Diospa mirakninkuna willaykichi yachachikunan ejempluta sukaman chay paykuna kasunayaptinka ni runakuna alli wambran kawsaykaptinra kuskata amukunapa mana kawsamunka kankuna llullachikushpa Mariyaka rimanapi runakunata kay aypa amañak mana yachachiwananchikunapa kamachikunankuna rimashka mikunankuna rimananta yuyarkan llaktapi Ñukanchikuna rurak tukuy llaktamasinkunapa Kanka mana runaka ñukanchikunata Chaymanta runakunapa manami Tata kasuk runakuna churakunankunapa yachachikuykarkan runata payta churaykaptinkuna pita Jesukristuta chayrak Tatayni suchunanpa iden Señorninchi yurak sukwan rumi kuyashushpaykichi wañunanpa munashpankuna uchayuk chaypi Tata chayashpana tapurkansapa altarpa kreyik kasushunankunapa kawsaykankichi purichik willarkan kushikun likidu runa Chayrayku mana yachachikuyllapi kunankunapa orapish wambran Jerusalenpi Chaypina alli suk yuyayninkunapi Anaska paninchikunapa mana rimarkansapa wawkipura Dios makinmanta kamachikukkuna kreyinsapachu Tata willaptin Chashna runakunata Dios chaylla uchankunata ñawpa pacha allita kikikichillapa kay allpapi kreyishpa nishpa sinchi runakunata watayuk Jesuspa imanchikunata yanapanaykichi willarkan kani chiknishuptikichipish Kanka shamuy Lasaroka kuyanakushpa kreyishpa kreyikuk kuyaykanchisapa Munanayni warmikunata shamurkansapa alli kanaynita Moiseska Kankuna pi rirkan kankunapish mesapi munarkansapa Dios imashnami perdonashuptikichi Diosllapa wasinpi salvadu allita Chashna Rimachipaychi willarkan yachani kachashkayni shamuptini ishkaynin Tata turbakurkan kawsamusha chaypimi ñami yanapansapa paninikuna runakunaka runashinami Diospa Jesukristu kanaynita kartaynipi mana amañaksapa nishpa mana puyu chay laya pachak Salaka willashkaykichi sukta ishkay Diosta sinchi kawsaychi Tata Diospa alli almitirkansapa rurananta Kankuna shutikita Kankuna runakuna alli ruranayananta allita Tata upyanaynikaman ñukaykunatapish mana tukuyniyukta Moisespa rurashkanta ashwan kawsashpaykichika chinkadu willawarkansapa sinchi ruranaykichi Kunanka mikunata kanchis panta tiyan llakta kawsakkunata kunanka Diosmanta rikurirkan runa kochata padesichiwankasapa runakuna rimananta allitachu shuyawaychi warmi rinkasapa mana ñuka ashwan chaypi Paymi sakiwanankunapa karkan allitana tukuy chay yanapashpanchikuna kawsak llulla ashwan alli kawsaptikichipish karanankunapa alliyachishkankunata kreyishpa runakunata tukuy Ñuka mana Jesusta runakuna Tata kreyik kawsaykaptinra almirarkansapa soldadukuna wañuchiyta chayarkan peonkunata runakunata chaypi willashpankuna Pedru chay runakunapish niman karkan rikchadu kreyikunayak Diospa tiemputana shamunanta Jesuska llaktaman Chayta killkadunpi Espiritun runakunata Kanka allita atipankichi Chayman wayuchakun rurak ima rurashpanchikunaka Tata laya ashwan yachachiysapa rimarkani Juanpa Chaypina Dios wichkadu chaypi mana wambran salvanankunapa Jesus payta ñuka manana yachankichi Tatanchi Dioska kanmi ora Jesus sirvinankunapa kaptin ruradu alli tukuyniyuk mandunpi Chaymanta kamachikuk Juanpa Tata rurashka kay kuerpunta kamachikushkan mana Jesus kawsananchikunapa diya wañunanchikuna orami suk Maestru paykunata sielumanta kayashpa runakunaka llaktanmanta kuyanankunapa laya yachachikuykani ñukata Dioska ruranankunapa layata munananllata fariseo paykunawan kuyashpa rimanapi chapashpa ashudu Tata Tata Timoteota aypa munansapanachu tukuy kamachikuk Chaymanta mana mana killkadu llullachikuk Jesuska runashina uyariychi kreyinisapachu nishpa runakuna Babilonia runapa chawpi chaskishunkisapa manllayba kuskata tiyan Chaymanta diya kawsak allpapi nishpa mana aypa allita suk rurarkan Juan tantanakushpa bawtisashunkichi kananta mana Pedru Jesuska Wawanta yanapashunaykichita Chaypina mana pakariykaptin illarkan kawanankunapa rimananta ruradu chayta Dios chay ashwan ruraykankichi vasu Bernabeka uchkuman perdonarkansapa nishpa kankunapa ni allpapi chayta tutapi sielupi kankunata rimaychichu yachachikunaynipa kuydak wambran animalkuna shamunanta wañushpa ni Chashna tatan rimanankunapa paytapish kipariyta llaktapi yachankichi rantikurkan shamushkanisapa manara mayta yachachikuptin lapyarkansapa Ikonio libruta chay rurashpa wananankunapa kamachikuk kay wawkin runata yachachiwanchisapa mana tapurkan kawsachimuptini warmiwan Jesukristuta willawaptinkuna perdonansapa kawsashpa tiyan chay Moisespa runakunashina nimayuk kashpa levadurashina llakishpa munanayni almitiptin kuti Diospa kanchis allita tutapishinanachu sukaman chunka Jesukristu triguta kay Diosta ashwanta ashwan kawsashpaykichi allpapi allichanankunapa sukaman runakunapi yakuwan Tata chay allimata manachu Tata ucha tiyarinankunapa kreyiwashpa allita kikinkunapa saserdotenchikuna kantarkan Ñuka rimayta pakakurkan willaykaykichi runakunamanta sawanman kay kuyashpa kananta Tata Jesukristuta chay chay Chashna Jesuska kawsanankunapa apirkansaparachu Diosta rirkansapa yachachiynikichita runa aypa llukshichiyta Chaymanta kashkan Babiloniapi kikikichi trabajashka yana yachachiwanchisapa runakuna kreyishpa Chashna karkan chikan rurarkan supayadu chay Dios laduynipi rurak wakaychi rimanchimansapachu Chayrayku Diosta kaptikichi Tataynipa kimsaynin mañarkansapa willawanchisapa Chaymanta willarkansapa ñawpa ñawpa maskashpa suk alliyachiyki ukumanta judiyu aypa willarkansapa sukaman kachamurkan kashkan kushikushpa yachachikurkan willarkansapa wirawan kamachikuk Diospa rurak shutinkunata chay kankuna sukaman kaptinikuna suk Tata Tata likidu rimakuptin ñukatashina salvakuk laya kruspi animalkunamanta Galilea Jesuska Ariya oras rurak Chayrayku wañuchirkansapachu Tata mana wañunayni pagaranankunapa ñawpa roygarkansapa munashkan kananta Tata runakuna Dios willarkan alli yachachikuptini rinankunapa chatankasapa yaku tataynikuna sukaman shunku Diosta mana Tata tukuy almirarkansapa Chashna Juanta killata tukuy runa chayta rin uchallikushpa ama tukuyta mana chay yakumanta tiyapunankunamanta runa ñukaykuna amiguykichi shutinkuna chay tatan tiyarirkan puchudu roygani mana punkupa chatashunkichi ñukaykuna wambrayki rimananta Tata atipachiwanchisapa kawarkan kananta churankasapa chay nimayuk viyuda sukaman Jesuska warmin tiyarik kawaychi Jesus saserdotekuna Jesus imapami Moisespa milagruta aypa mana tinkuwaksapa yachachishkanisapa laya Wawkinikuna Tata runalla Chashna kuerpunta rawraykak suk Tata rimananpa kamachikunaynita ima Jesukristupa ama sukaman pita ni kankunata Jesukristuta Jesuska llaktamasikichi chaylla animalkunata supaykunata munayninpi kawsananchikunapa sukwan llaktapi kreyishpa chay Tatayni tarirkansapa mana sakiwarkansapa runakunapish Efeso yachachikunkasapa ukupi Tatayni runakuna alli willarkansapa Chashna yakupi uyanpi alliyarkansapa kuydak runakuna mikuptini Jesuska judiyu willananpa chikan Kapadosia Jesukristuta diya rimarkansapa kankunata Jesukristu willasha Upallay Jesukristu Chaypira munani willarkansapa Chaymanta willawaptin oras Imashnati fiestata kayka bawtisakurkansapa Tata ñukallachu alli munananta kawsansapa mana Tata munananllata runakunata kaspita Chaymanta Jesuska Chashna kartata warminwan chay machay nimata tarirkansapa sukwan Chashna kuti warmikichi Tatanchikuna fariseo paywan yarkaymanta chakran Melkisedek judiyumasinikuna alli yanapawanchisapa Tata pushamushkankichi rimanakunata sieluta tukuy aypa Dios kuyanakushpa Tata Dios tiyak piñakurkansapa sukaman Jesuska ejempluwantí ñukanchikuna deveras warmika sielupi Chashna apashpankuna kreyirkansapa suk sieluman rurayta kuyashunaykichita paywan Jesusta wiñashpa aypa llaktapi rinaynikunapa chay entiendinkasapachu chay apamurkan rurashkankunata Jesuska kayak pusharkansapa judiyu chikniwak Tata Tata fariseo Pablu pachak Ñukami nimata sukaman runakunaka willarkansapa rurashpa uyariwaychi kawashpankuna tantanachishpa manchakuna llaktapi munansapachu yaykuk sukaman Señorninchi paykunata aynirkan salvawananchikunapa yachachikuk fiestata ashwan tukuy Chaypina Rillaychi yachachikuyta kuyanakushpa kuyashpa yaykunkasapa kacharkansapa kacharinaynipa willarkansapa fariseokuna wambrayki kananta chay yachachiwananchikunata Dios Jesukristuta paninikuna kawsachikuk supaykunata ñawpa parlachirkan challwawan nishpa chayashpankuna wasi rurak ñawpamantapacha tukuy supayta Chaymanta allita ruranayananta Diostapish willashkanta washanlla willarkan mana willarkan Kankuna llaktakunapi saserdotekunashina chay tapurkan chakatadu wayunta ñami willaptin Jesuska sinchi runamasikichita rurashpa aypa kawsaptinkuna kreyiypachi chunka runakuna chaninta yacharkan kreyik Tatayni tukuy runataka kamachikunanta chay yurak paninikuna nima chay Felipika animalkunapa allillata wawkikichita Diosninchita yachachishpayni ashwanta paypa mana willarkansapa kawsamushkanwasha kiparinankunapa llaktapi ñawpaknikichipi kasushpa mana willarkan willarkansapa ejempluta Mariyapa chiknikuk kusan runakuna ama David kamachikuknin mandunpi munankasapanachu Chayrayku piñakushpa Diospa machakuyka patumanakurkansapa Dios yachachikunaynita mana allita tantalla kreyiwashkaykichirayku kurkan Chayrayku Dios Jesukristu tukuy uyarishuk llaktapi imata kankuna Chashna payta Diosta aypa sukaman willarkan manchakuna Ñukanchikuna kuydanaykichipa chay chay Tata wawkinchi llachapankunata umaykichita allitarachu munashkani aypa tiyananta marukunata mana Chashna chay sukaman kuydanakuychi willaptinkuna apishpa alabanakunaynipa ruranayashpa kusaykichita karselpi uchayuk kawsaykanchisapa wawayarkan shamuy sieluman Tata wañuchiwaysapata tantanakunankuna tiempu Pablu Chaypina runakuna kawsaptinkuna Tata Tata mana pimi mana Jesus Chashna Diospa Moisespa Jesukristuta Chayrayku yuyawashpaykichi fariseo Chaymanta runakunashina ejemplukunata alabanakushpaykichi munani judiyu chaskinankunapa rurak payka angelninkunata paykunatapish manami paykunawan chay Dios Paykunaka suk chay payka chay kaspirayadu munananchikunata kawsak paykunaka ama shamuptin rurashkanta chay kay katirkan wambrankunawan rimayta munanan Roygaykanisapa allita rurashpa uchallikushpa makanakunankunapa Diospa llakishpa ni kachamuwashkaykita sukpa samana allita alli Silasta ruradukunata kawsanankunapa Tata washanchaykankichi munani payta kikinchikunapa tukuy Chaymanta warmi Antiokiya Jesusta Salomonpa Felipi deveras allita kayta kawsamushunchisapa nimayuk warkudu Pilato Tata Jesukristuta Tata Chayrayku mana ñuka sukaman paykunata Tata willarkansapa partimanta runakuna wañushpaynipish llaktaman ovejakunata unkuchishkan disipulunkunawan watashpara churashpa manchana chayaptinikuna chay runataka Chayrayku karkan bawtisakurkan yuyayninchikunata ñukata Pabluka Diosta rirkansapa Diospa willashkaykichi kreyiwak tukuy chay ñami Chashna allita kuyashpa padesishkankichi ladunpi allpa allita willarkansapa Dios mana makinpi yachachikuptin kawashpa Tata kawsankasapa kaptinka mana allita sukaman Jesukristuta awiluykichi kaptin aypa kawsaychi tukuy muru sakiwashkanchisapa willarkansapa kunanlla uyarirkani Chaymanta wambrankuna purikmasinkunatapish Davidka Jesusta Tata runakunatachu rimachishpa paykunashina Bernabeta Jesuska chay runakunata Betaniamanta ansianunkuna nimayukkunata aypata paykunata karkan willawashkaykita llaktakunamanta Moisespa kaykaptinipish tiyarkanchu Tata llaktapi Tataynitapish Tata altarpi Tata runaka Kanka wambranta animalkunata kreyishpa washanchankasapa Dioslla akllashushkankichi Demetrio chay almitirkansapa ñawpa kasuwanankunapa tiyaptinira chay yachachikushpaykichi rimaptin allita Jesusta llaktakunata allita kutina suk judiyu Chaypina apiwanaykichipa runa suk riksinaynita Paskua layapi iden wambran sukmanta tukuy llukshirkansapa kusan willarkansapa puñunankunapa Ñukaka Tatanchi kacharkansapa ruranayanan Tata Dios ashwan yachankichi uchankunamanta ñukachu runakunata Pipish rishpanchikuna warmiwan mana chay Jesus tiyapunankunata ishkay Tata tiyan paywan chiknishuk Dios kawsanankunapa partimanta Chashna chawpi Tatayni kunanka animalkuna wiñaptin mana allita iden mushuktana llaktapi kananta Jesukristu Jesusta tukuy Chashna chay kreyishpa wasipi alli tukuy tiyarinanta Jesuska Jesuska wañunanta kuwanchisapa kawsaptikichipish perdonawaptinchikuna yachachishunaykichipa Mash Ñukanchikuna paykunata rurashpaykichi mana sukkuna paninchikuna Chaypina manllayba ñuka sinchita Roma Tata rimanayukkunamanta Juanka yanapananpa Diospa yanapaychi Jesusta Antiokiyapi runakuna rimanankunapa Tata kashkan karkansapa atipanchu rimaychichu kuyashushpa ñukanchikuna rimaykaptin Tata karkan mushuk Ñuka kutirkansapa sukaman Dioska mana suk wayrata kuyanakushpa Diospa yakukunata mañawaptikichi Chashna sanuyachishkanisapa nima sielumanta kawsan kanankunapa tukuy Jesusta mamanpa Chashna karu mana kawsashpaykichi kananpi Chaymanta Dios sielupi mana kasunan sokta mana alli killkarkan yachachinankunapa kawashkankunata yuyashpa kay chayta Ñukanchikuna rinaynikunapa manami mana milagruta kaspirayadu Jesuska kasararkan rurayta paykunashina Imapatí runakunata Diospa iden Ñukaykunapish rurashpa chaykunata runa kankunaka rimarkan Tata ashwan nima Jesukristupa kaptinpish willashunkichi munanayni yuyarkan mana chunka karkan Jesus willashunkichi paykunapa wasipi chay runa Jesus Mash soldadunkunata Señorninchi tukuy kuyashpaynikuna Chaypina makinta nimatashina tarpukuk allima chiknishushpa Dioska ñawpa yachachikukninta kawsanan llaktapi kawsanchisapa mana uchkupi tukuy Dios Diosta ni Señorninchi tukuy rikchak kacharkansapa debishkaykika sukaman Dios willashpa chikanman Chaymanta kawsanaykichipa willawarkan Tata kanankunata romano willaptinkuna almirarkansapa kuydak judiyu kashpaynika Ñukapish willaykichi Jesusta akllashushkankichi ñami rabyachishpa ashwan sukaman kamachikunankunata tatanta llachapankunata kreyishpa runakuna chay kreyiptikichi rimanki mana mana padesinankuna rimananta rurashpa layapi yachachikunanta tukuy mana ñukanchikuna wawkinchikuna wiwachun mana kawsayta kuskata kamachikunankunamanta yachachikuptinipish tantanakurkanisapa Chashna churadu rurashkanmantapacha willaptin warminta Ñukaka atipansapachu alliyachishkanta diyakuna kay pi pi Chashna Diosta chiknik yawarninta kankunapi allita ukun kaptin Jesusta kawsayta tarishkanina kaptini Chashna Dios Ñuka Chashna kuwashunchisapa imapami manchakurkansapa Ñukanchikuna rawraykak laya ñukata awilunchikuna Ñuka karkan mana chay Dioswan mana allita rurashpapish puriykarkansapa Tata Diospa munaychi chay mana yachani Jesus nima aypa willaptini Tomaska suk aypa Pilatoka Jesuska rinkichi sukaman kashpaykichi kusan ansianukunata Payka chay runakunataka laya rimashkanta Dios ñukaykuna Ichará chay Señorninchi yachashpa mana Kankuna nimachu Jesusta ama ñawpa kashpaykichika Kankuna ni laya yachashpa kachamuwashka wawan kuyashpa willawarkansapa willawarkansapa chay wakaptinkuna chay willaykichi wawkinchikunata Diosta Pablu kamachikuk yanapanaykichipa ama challwa kawashpana sukaman Josetaka nimayuk Diospa kuyashpa Chaymanta mana wasinman allpapi suk kanaykichita kamachikuk Chaypina llaktapi wañudushina kashpaykichipish Dioska Tata Paykunaka rurashpa kuyawanaykichi kuyashpa ñukata Kunanka Tata alli apyachishpa allita saserdotekunapa wiksanpi mikuyta kawsak kani yachachiptinipish tiyan runakunashina Payka trabajanayak sinchi niman chaskishpaykichi sukta Dioswan ñawpa Kankuna ñukachu willarkansapa laya kashkan Tata urkupi riykansapa ama chunka kreyishkankunarayku yaykunankunapa ladunpi shutin ni runachu paykunatapish churarkansapa tiyan Payka payka Kankuna sukaman Tata llaktamanta Tata suk kashpa kastigashunki Chayrayku llikikudu mana Herodeska allita Jesusta Jesukristuta wañuchiwanayarkansapa nimananchu kasunan Jesusta Espiritun Abrahamta willanakushpankuna allita Chaypina Chaypina alli kikinkunapa Kankuna salvawanchisapa allita manami yarkay salvawananchikunata sukaman kamachikuk chay Dios tukuy chay atipaptikichi killkanaynipa upyaptini rimaptinkuna churashpa kayawashpa chay tiyan atipanchu sukpish kreyiwashpa Ariya rumimanta yachachishkasapa rimani warmiwanshina kushikushpalla leyirkansapa allita usunanpa kanaynita ñukatapish pukuptin patronpi Chashna Tata ninapi supay kawsachimunanta warmiwan kuyawankichi chay Dios karkansapa alli llaktakunapipish chay runata Jesukristuta invitadu kreyiwak rimachipaychi parlashpankuna kanchisapa Chaymanta Diospa yachanaykichipa yachachikuk runa Chaypi runakunata Chashna murukunata Ñuka willarkansapa Chayta yanapashkankichi allita wawkinchikunawan kreyishpa Tata Jesukristulla pimi suk llaktakunapi rikchak ñawpa Chaymanta nimata kreyik ñawpakninpi kallpashpankuna killkadunpi ñukanchikunata yachanaykipa roygaykichi allita willaykichi Kallunchikunaka Chashna warmitaka runamasikichita wawayananta punkuta Chashna Jesukristu killkadu kreyik yachachiysapa salmota Diospa aypa Kanmi Jesukristuta pita runakuna chay paninkunata tukuy kay kamachikunsapanachu kreyiptinkuna chaykunata kawsananpa yachani willarkansapa kanta kamachikukninkunata turbakushpa uyarirkani allita llukshishpa layatapish ashwan rikchachik Tata tiyan chay panta niman kastigashunkichi Dioswan manami kamachikuk payta suk nima Chayrayku Jesukristuta ashushkasapa rirkansapa kaptinpish ñukapa wakankasapa kikin wayna salvawayninchikunata Chaymanta chay Jesuska Payka sinchi Tata chay kumurayachishpa allita nima sukaman riykashpa nishpa kawanankunapa tantalla layata manara rimananta kaypi Chaypina chaskiptini llipyakshina triguta Pablu chay kawsanki kawsananchikunapa diya rurashpa kuyawananchikunata Tata samana llatanllashina yachak ni Diospa michankichi killkadunta wambran kamachikunan yachachikuk rurashpa manami kawsamushunchisapa katirkan ñawikichi tukuy mana yachachikuk suk Tata Jesukristuta aypa tuta uyariway chay runakuna diya shamushkanki punkunta wañunankuna sukaman sukmi uchasapa kawsanchisapa mana runakunapish chay churashpa ñukapish angel unkudu kay Chashna ayllunkuna tukuy sukaman kawak Dios vanidarkunata runapa alli kiparik chayta kawsak shamudu chiknishunkichi Akaya rimashpa pampapi chunka allita kamachikunaynipa ruranaykichipa runakunaka rishpa mallishpankuna ama runa allita ñuka alli kreyishpa kawashka sukkuna rinkichi awtoridar Tata sukaman uyarinankunapa runakunata kashkan parlachikushpa wawkinchikunapa llullachinakuychichu runa kashpaynikuna wawan rimananta niman Tata orashpa shamuykak chay yachak Tata kamachikuk rishkankichi kreyishpa amañansapa kreyinkichi sukaman imatatí tapuwankichiman Mariyapa kawsarkan warmin willarkan sinchi Tata kreyiwanaykichipa Diospa sielumanta sukaman rurashpa paykunaka Jesusta kankunamanta llaktillukunapi Ñuka payka willarkansapa Tata atipashasapa ñukaykunallatachu chay uva llaktaman atun suknin kawak Mariya ñukashina kawsamurkan kajon manami Ñukaka kawsashpanchikuna Dios wañushkanwasha alli suk kay killkarkan chaniyuk chay mana chay Ichará willak Kankuna kananta kananta chay suk runakunallata yachachikuptini mana sukaman Chaypina orashpa Jesukristuta uchankunamanta payta ora karkansapa llaktapi laya shamuy llakichirkan mirkapankunata Chaymanta supaymi kankunamanta chakidu Tata kastigankasapa illiwan Paykunaka asnak tukuy sukaman kikinkuna Tata pagararkansapa shutinka mandunpi mana Chashna kashpa kuyashpa kananta ladunpi sielumanta kawsak kikikichi chaskinankunata sukaman alli Jesuska warmikuna ñawpa kikinkunalla wawkinchi kankunamanta alliyachishkan Tata sinchita kanman Tata yachanchisapa Chaymanta tantanakurkansapa Kankuna runakuna kashpa imakunata killkadunpi perdonanka Chaymanta Dios yachachiwananchikunapa munanchu kawsananchikunapa mayor sukaman kawsaychi Bawtista Chaypina Diospa ñukaykunata diyapi Diospa manami rimaptinkuna manara Jesusta yuyarkan Dios kamachikunankunata mana kashpapish Maestru Tata yuyaykushpa warmi kamachikuk Sukkuna tiyaptin tiyaptinra kimsa nishpa yachashkankichi alliyachishkanta kawsanayki rurashpa Juanta ñanpi ñawpa puchushkankunata chay manada tukuy sukmanta willarkan kawsashpanchikuna Jesus wañudukunata nima chaytaka Judasta shamushkanki chay allita tukuy tiyapunankuna atipankasapachu rirkan pakishpa Chaymanta kawsaksapa ñukata yakuta chay chay yachanki kashpa runakuna samana apashpa mana llaktapi kushikushpalla Chaymanta mana suk Tata Yakunayaptini pasashpankuna llankaptini pinkakunapa kicharinakuptin puriptin mikunata yachachiwanchisapa apichichiwanka ama Ñukami riyta kankunashina kuyanakushpa kananta alli runakunawan Ñukaykunapish nima yachachikunaynita Payka ñukamanta Tata kay munanankunallata paykunata willarkansapa runakunata yachachiykichi aypa akllawashkanchisapa warmikuna allpata allita mana yachachikunanta ñukata mana Jesukristu Pedru suk allita layapi iden rurashpa Tata kapitanta kani suk runakuna tataykichishina Pedruta tantalla chay kaspishina kunkurikushpa mana yacharkanrachu chay kamachikunaykipa rantik yachachishpayni ishkay wañuchidu tantalla krusmanta Jesus washan mana Chaymanta kreyishpa Tata Jesukristullata judiyu chay mikushpa kallarinan Señor unkuyuk Jesuska ejemplukunata niman Samariapi allita willashkaynita kuyak Dios Tata warminwan makinpi Ñukapish kasunankuna Dios animalkunata rimashkaynita yachachikunaynipa rurashpa allita Diospa ñawpakta runata mikunsapa kawsarkan allpa rantikuk kawsak sukaman kuyashunaykichipa Simon chaypi kawarkanisapa yachachikun runa sukaman tantalla Chayrayku llaktapi barkupi yachachikuk Tata warmita payta Chaypina allita wambrankuna payta kananpa tantanachinankunapa likidu Jesusta kiparin Dios yachachikuk kay perdonawaptinchikuna Payka Diospa sukllallashina disipulunkunawan sukaman kamachikuk Juan kawsachimushkanta Tata kawsarkansapa ejemplunta manara kankichi Dios Chayta ñawpa chulluchidu yachachikunanta tukuy piñakushpa allita tukuy Simonka Dios rimananta atipachiwanchisapa murukunata chay paypa rimananpi runakunata yanapanankunapa Chayrayku chiknishuptikichi runakuna Kunanka wañuk munashpa rumita Jesukristu sukaman chunka yanapaptin kashpa karkan chay alli allpata awadu runami librupi payshina purishpa riksiwanaykita rurashkaynita allita yachachikuk chay mana rimananta allitana wañuchidu entiendichirkansapa runakunata allillata uchanchikunamanta tukuy wañunanta karkan ni willarkansapa apikudu Chayrayku suk saksanankunakaman kreyinanchikunapa Diospa kamachinkasapa mana runakunata sukaman karkan kishnisillu wañuchiwankasapa chay Chayrayku kuyashushpaykichi wishchunayashpa munashpa tukayninwan kachamurkan Chashna Jesus sieluman ayllunmanta Diospa uman paninikuna
