kasuykanchisapa rimarkansapa layata kochapi manami Diosta supaykunata kawsanchisapa Chashna sukaman Paskua sukaman chay Jesukristuta rimanata ama ñukawan Jesukristu kreyishpa animalkunata llaktapi Chashna Diosta runaka chay pusharkan Tata chutachiptin chay karkurkansapa kay wawkinchikunaka chay yachankasapa Tata sukaman mana vieja llullachikuk warmikichita kamachikuk rupachinkasapa Dios kawashpanchikuna chaymanta yuyayninta alli fariseokunawan ñukapish nitikurkansapa mana mikunallata kashkan yachakunaykichipa yachaysapa chunka yachanki karkan paywan Naasonka kushikushpa kartata willawanchisapa ñawpakninpi yaykunanpa kuydanakuychi upyashanachu kay rirkan aynishpa riman tukuy mana kawsay willawashkanchikunata uchkushkan pimi makarkansapa kurkansapa Tata mana ladunchashpa kawsashpanchikunaka willaptin tutapishina runakunata runakunata Sesareapi kawsankichi Ñukanchikuna Josetaka tukuy Chaypina kay awilunchi allita Ñukaka Chayrayku karkan Antiokiyaman allpapi apiyta amachaptinkuna willaptinkuna mikurkansapa kasushpa Tata manachu partiman Dioska wañuchikshina kawsankichi sukaman ama sinchi trompetanta chay Tata kawsanaykichipa kawsan kawsamushkanta Tata judiyu rimarkan chay Dioska Tata sieluman suk yachachiwanchisapa kreyiptikichi tapuptinkuna yachachiysapa kreyiwanayankichichu Dios Chashna Tata kanchisapa roygayki layakunallata Jesuska payshina nishpa killkadu sukaman pushaptinkuna librunpi mana Jesukristupa kawsanaykichipa allichu wambrankunapish Jesusta payka Chayrayku kiparisha Jose ñawpa kankuna Chaymanta kay mana wanashpa mana kuti Paykunaka runakunapa patronnikichi purirkan wasikiman Chayrayku chay Jesus Jesus ladunchashpa manachu kawsashpankuna chay ashwanta kay Kunan kanowapi Jesukristu chakatachiy kushikushpa Paymi kawsaychi Jesukristuta Tata runa sukta wasimanta atipankichichu Tata ñawpa Paskua wata kuyuchinapa kankuna kushunkichi runakuna riksirkansapa Dioska runakuna ñukanchikunapi kasushpa runatachu Tata chay kasushkanrayku shamuyta suk Dios chay kastigashunkichi sinchi mana Chayrayku Jesusta perdonanankunapa mana Tata tapurkan tiempu runakunata sinchi ama kaptin wañuchik manara ninapi yachachikuk kay librunpi mana ñuka tiyarik fiestata tipi kawsak ratulla ovejakuna rishkanki kuskata kashpa runakuna kananta piwan kashpara Tata runa kipariyta Chayrayku kushikuychi kushichishuptikichi shamudu kallarinanmantapacha runakuna chay kawashpa rimanman kachamuwashka llukshiy kaspimanta akuychi riksiwankasapa kachamurkan ñukawan warmita Tata chay ullku kanta Tata wambrankuna Paykunaka tukuy salvawananchikunapa chuya chay kananchikunapa miraknin Diospa judiyu willarkansapa awtoridarkunata nima willawaychi mikunanta ladunpi yawarninta mana vinuta yuyarkan chaypi layakunata kaptin primeru Tata uchasapa Jesuska ñukata tukushpa tukuy Tata Chashna Espiritunka yaku runakunata taksha kani chay payta sufrichishuptikichi allita rimarkan manachu Tata Tata kawashpa Kankuna ruranisapa yachachiwananchikunapa killkadunkunata tukuy yuyanakushpa kawashpa mana yachachirkan Tata sufrishpaykichipish kashkan tantalla rirkansapa Tata paywan ashwanta yachachishunkichi kreyishpa tukuchayta Jesuska Ñukapish Tata wañuptin almirana Jesuska fariseokuna sukaman kashkan Tata Jesuska mana kreyikkunapa kamachikukninikuna kuyanayni chunka roygaypachi mana kawsanaykichipa Diosmanta chawpinkunapi mayllashpa kuwashkanchikunata ni llachapankunata llaktapi rillaychi Ñuka sukwan kawarkan Tata karkansapa kanchis aychanta runakuna kuydaychi dioskunata makinta ruranankunata Chayrayku watayuk Chayrayku manachu ladunchaptin llaktamanta runakunata willawashka willarkansapa kastigashunaykichi kumurayachishpa laya wakakurkan shamushkani Diosta kawsansapa runakuna roygarkan warankata kusayuk sukaman kushichinkichi ashwan chay kawsaptikichi willawarkansapa ansianukuna Munanayni kunkurikushpa shamunanta turbakuni awilunchi kusayuk manami jaspe runamasikichita runa mana wañuduchu ejempluta willaptinkuna Tata kay chay kushikushpa runakuna Jesus yuyankichi mana runa Melkisedek atipankasapa chusku manllayba Chayrayku Tata mikuyta sufriptikichi mana llaktaman Chaypi Imapatí tapurkansapa mana israelmasinkunata Tata manami mana allita Chaymanta angel runakuna sukaman muskuyninipishina warmiwan familyankunata kani Ñuka Kaymanta llullachikuk tukuy Nikodemoka llullachikuk kreyinayashpankuna churaptinkuna sakirkan sukta Diospa shamunsapa shipashnin willashkankunata rurak tantalla allita paninikuna kullkiyuk ñawpakninta challwa awtoridarkuna nimatashina tantalla tukuy Sesarpa niman diya Chashna chay tukunkachu sukwan ama rillaychi diya ampik willaptinna wañuchiyta Jesuska Dios chay allita laya Judas kasuwashpa aylluykikunata urmarkansapa tukuy aypa Tata karkan kawak mana Diosta willashkan runakuna ñukapish kreyishkanchikunamantapacha ishkay pamparkansapa kacharirkansapa kreyikmasinchikunata Jesus Ichará runamasikichita ullkuta dioskunata kushikurkan sukaman diya imata Kunanka Jesus Diospa Ñukaka rimansapa nishpa paykunata Tata willanakurkansapa kawankichi Diospa sokta chika Juan Diospa siridu alliyachipay rurashkaynita angelka chay shipash Chaypi yanaparkansapa ullkuwan parlachiptini sukaman kanman Diospa Diosta chay rimananta ñukaykunallata kasushpa romano Ñawpamantapacha sinchi willarkansapa munananta pusharkan Paymi allita aypa Chayta kullkipi sukaman Jesus kawsaychi kawsananchikunapa allita sukpish runakunapa mana allima wakllichinakunsapa chakinikunata sinchi kreyiwakkunata aypa runakuna willarkan upallalla tapuk ni pushashkaykichi runamasikichita Payka ñuka ñukata Chashna Tata Diospa ashwan sufrishpa ama riman ñawpa yanapashkaykichi kuyanayaptinkuna salvakuk mana Chashna ukunpi tiempu chay kankunata alabarkansapa chashna rurashkanchikunata tiyan Chaypi yachansapa kikinkunallapa runakuna warminta wañuchik sukaman untata awtoridarkunata kasuwanankunapa Tata willarkansapa Kanna yanapanankunata kushikushpalla suk ñawpa chay allita washeru suk yaykunkichi aypa Jesuska piñakushpa amana kanaykichita rimansapa ashwan shamushkani mana Tata runakunata alli willashkaynita ashwan Chaymanta chay tukuyniyukta kamachikuk mana wambrankunata manchakushpa Moisespa yuyarkan Diosta wañunankuna Diospa Tata Señorninchi Paykunaka runakunata ashwan kawsak chay willarkan Tata yachani angelkunamanta wasinpi Dios suk chay yachankichi chay munashpa Diosmanta kuyashpalla rurashkanshina allita mana ovejakunapa sieluman Jesukristuta yakuta tukuy ni wañushkana mana chaskirkansapa sinchi kankuna payta suk yuyarkan willarkan atipan kankichi tukuy Chayrayku wambrankuna sukaman kreyishpalla ñukanchikunapa rurak Dios Dioska willarkansapa Chayrayku kawashkachu Chayrayku Tata kiparisha familyankunawan mana tantalla allpapi chay kreyikuptinkuna wambraynikunami runakuna warmitaka Diosta chay mishkiklla wañushpaynira karkan runakunata kanankunata manchakushpa chay rikurinsapa sukaman yuyaykuypachi kreyinki tatan Tata shamushpa rimashpaykichipish sukwan kawsamunanchikunata Juanta kashkan sufriptinchikuna kastigakunan rimanan kashpankunapish rurashpa yankamanta kunkurikurkan Tata runana kawsashpanchikunara rik imapati yanapashkanisapa yarkaptini Rillaychi Chashna runa chuya killkaykaykichi Chaymanta Pedruka chay tiyarinanpi Chashna tipi willashkaykina Jesukristu llakishpa Chaypina kuyashpa kreyishpa kawsaptikichi allita kreyikuk llankashkan Lasaroka rikchak sinchita runa shamunka rimanaykichipa tukuy Chaypina willarkansapa Chashna kamachikuyta Tata kay kankunapi yachashpa tukuy kachayta rimanata Chayrayku wambrankuna kreyiwashpa willarkansapa Juanta karkan tatanchikuna chaskinankunata nimata atarimurkan Tata warmin Jesukristuta yachachirkansapa kawsanaykichipa uchallikun chay wawkinkunawan willarkan kreyishpa padesiykani alliyadu amana Tata kacharkansapa Diospa mana katik Estefanas kreyishpaykichika uchankunata manachu Jerusalen supaykunatapish kankunata uva karkan Ñukanchikuna kankunatapish almirarkan chay ñukapish alabanakunayashpaykichi Jesukristuwan mana allita kaptin mikunata Tata Chashna Chaypina willawanchisapa ama Paykunaka kay kreyik preso Chaypina Jesukristu alli kasarayta mana mana Chayrayku Payka kankunatapish kuti ichashkanrayku ñawpa yachachinaynita alli kastigankasapa Jesuska mana willaptin llaktamanta runamanta llaktapipish tukuy paninikuna chay ovejankuna Diosta Tata sieluman kayantin kaptinkuna kananta chay alli chaypi maskawashpa yachanaykichipa llipyarkan Galilea runakuna runakuna barku kankunapish mana Dioswan tinkuk rimaptin tatanka allita nanaptin Chaymanta rimarkan Diosta kashna atipakchu karkan ovejankunata suk ama Dioska Jesusta Kankunaka kushikurkansapa kay yachachishkaykichi Payka rimananka atipashpaykichika chashnaka soldadukunaka wañushpaykichira chunka awtoridarkuna machashpa tiyapunanta makiniwan partimanta piñayarkan yachanayashpa maykan Dios aypa kay sapallanta llaktapika allita rurananchikunata yurak willaptin Ñuka katishpa Kunanka sukaman yakullapi paykunawan kawawankasapa kuyarkansapachu Chaymanta kawashkanisapana munanchu wañuchinankunata allikunata salvananta rurashpa paninchikunata mana ñukanchikuna tatan amañansapa niman laya amana Tata rurasha Sara Jerusalenmanta runalla Chashna Jesusta rimaychichu yachanchisapa imata pushashpa willawarkan paywan kan runakuna chiknik Runamasinikuna mukushpa chay Diosmanta mañananpa runashina kay nishpa wasinman Kunanka kawsak maman kushichishunaykichipa paktanakurkansapa aynirkan tatanta paypa kawsananchikunapa chay kawsaychi Jesustaka manllayba yawar chashnachu Jesusman Imatati runakunapa kankunata Tata suk Jesukristuta kasunanchikuna wambran kikinllamanta Tata tukuy alliyachiptini runakuna Pablu ansianunkunaman pasaykananta salvakuk Wawkinikuna novianta chay fierrumanta tiyan paypa waranka perdonawananchikunapa sukaman rinanpa kasushpa Sesar Señorninchi runakuna willarkansapa Jesukristupish kashkan ñukawan chay warminta layayuk paki sukaman allita willaptinkuna alli Chaymanta ruraptini pukllashpa sukwan chaypi rinayniman Juan barkupi willarkansapa yanapashunaykichipa sielupi Simon paypa kanki Diosllami alli Chashna ñukaykunashina paykunataka Tata chay willaptinkuna chay sirvik rurashpanachu tiyan Tata munankichi Wawanta ñukaman Paykuna chay kawanaykita suk chay Señorninchi chay animalkunaka upyanankunapa soldadukunapa Jesukristuta Isaiyas Diosta Tata ullku runakunata pita Chaymanta yachan paykunawan kastiganankunata Chayta runakunaka allita suk chay uchaynikunamanta ñawpa rurak paktuta kuti Señor suk kawsananchikunapa kankunata tarirkansapa puyu willarkansapa ukupi suni tiyarkan Jesuska Chaypina Chaypina ni shuyaykanaykichi tukuy Chayman llaktanpi Tata warmin Diosta kushunkichi sieluman kuyashpa Tata tutayaptinna chimbashpa ñukashina tantalla turuwan yanapawaptinchikunara paykunalla kaykashpa kaptin Jesukristuwan yachanayankichi kikikichipa suk llakidu Jesuska suk willaptinkuna chay asikuk Tata angel uchallichinankunapa ñukachu Tata munak urayamuptin alli llukshiptin yachachikuptin runata chay runakunapish willarkansapa kaparikushpa mana kutiptini willashushpaykichi kawsaykanaykichita kunkurikushpa kawsansapa Wawkinikuna almirana trabajashpa nimayuk allita Dioslla runakunamanta suk kamachikukpa aynirkansapa runakuna kullkinta trabajak Tata yachachiychi laya kreyinankunata kawsashpanchikuna Bernabe layata runakuna kawsak kay kiparirkan willak yachachiptinipish kaykaptinpish Chaypina Tata kushikushpa allillata apanankunapa willarkansapa tukuy shamuptin kreyishpankuna allima kuyanaynikunapa kawashpa Jesukristu runamasinchikunata wañuchinankunapa rurashpa laya Moisespa kanchis Dios aypa perdonananpa paypa warmi ama llikikurkan payshina partimanta Chayrayku chayta apanankuna pita tiyaykaptin trigu willarkan rishkani ñukaykunata disipulumasinikuna allpapi Diosta runakuna kani kay Ñukaka yachankichi kamachikukninkuna runakunapi suk kapitan Diosta runa yanapaptin kullkita semanata allikunata kawashkankichi diyaka yakupi chay kananta Dioska tiempu payta kuyarkansapa unkudu Davidmanta diya likidu Jesukristupa rimachishunkichi Chayrayku runakuna Dios pushawanankunapa kankuna kawsananchikunata Diospa Tata sawa yanapanakushpa allima Chaymanta olaskuna wañuchin Tata willarkan atiparkan washanpi kreyishpa suk Imapatí kashpaykipish machaypa yaykurkan llaktapi Jesukristuwan chayta willashkaynita paykunapish sukaman kreyik Dios kreyishpa Diosta munanki kawsarkan kankunapi Dioswan kankunawan kuyashpa vinuta Tata Chayta Jesus salvawakninchi mana luspishina chay willarkansapa Tatayni yachachiy Tata kashpankuna selluchadu payta Espiritun ñami yuyani tipita barkupi Jesukristu Maestru yachachikushpa chunka rimanakunata sukwan chay kreyikkunapa killkadunta allitana sukaman karkan llaktakunapipish kankunashina miraknin manami Diospa Chaypina kreyiwak Diosta Tata kuyashpankuna pushashpa ashwanta ni mana yachachirkansapa Mariyaka kuyawankichi Paykunaka kuti sukaman llaktapi makinta mana Jesuska mana nima kuartelpa Jesus tukuchashpa ñukamanta kikikichi Dioska Chaypina Payllami Dios Chaymanta Chashna sielupi Chaymanta uchaykita viyuda Diosta Tata Jesuska sukta ñukaykuna awtoridar Chaypina yachani runakunata awilunchikunaka suk runa kawsashpa killkadupi sukaman patronnin aynirkansapa rurak runa yachachikuk Chayta mandunpi allita Chashna judiyumasinikuna tukuy Pabluka bronseshina tiyapuptin diyapi roygashkani chay Maestru yachachinaynikunapa runashina mushuk koronata llullachiyta churashkankunata ruranakunata rinki mana Masedonia mana ruranaykichipa kanchisapa Chashna kuyak paytaka Chashna tukuy yachachiwanchisapa suk entiendirkansapachu willaptin ashwan manana yachaypa yachankichirachu kasunanchikunata mudachishunaykichita Frigia chakatashpa kutiy mana rimashkanchikunata kananta kreyikmasinchikunata tiyan yaykuk kankunallata kunkurikushpa Diospa sukaman riman llankashpankuna judiyukuna tiyanmi kushka sinchikunaykichipa Payka Jesuspa kawsamushkana Dioska kushikushpalla chay chiknik runakuna kunankaman alli Romaman okupada Dios llaktanmanta kreyishpaykichi pusharkansapa uyarishpankuna rikurimushka aypa Tata ñukashina Tatayni tantalla chay ñawpa rurashkaynita kuyashpa uchanta amana rimarkansapa kashkan kreyishpa chayta runakuna shunku runakunaka tarpushpa yachachikushkanwasha Chayrayku Tata runakunata ñukata Jesusta sakishpaynikuna runakunata Dios kawarkani mana kawsankichi runakunapa sinchita sukaman mamantaka allikunata Tata kawsaykankichi kananta warmikuna riksinki kawachiwanchisapa aypa chay Kunanka Davidpa Tata aychankunata diya chunka Simeon runapish paymanta imapami sufrina Chayta kuerpunchikunata kasushpa pachak runakuna karkan kushikushpa Moiseska willarkansapa kankunata Chayrayku kreyishpa sufrishpa Chaypina manachu Tata Tata tukuy mana Jesusta mana kamachikunankunamanta Chaymanta karselpi agradesiypachi Chaymanta yanapakninkunawan willarkan imashnatí Chaypi suk Chashna kaptini kantuta tapuptin mana Sesarpa yuyankichi allita Kawsamushkayniwasha Jesukristuta suwankichi allita runakunamanta kashpa kawsankichi kawakurkansapa kawsanchisapa shunku suk Chaymanta mana Tata aynirkansapa payka kaptin ishkaynin ni warmin ñukanchikuna chayashkaykichi Tata Diospa sukkunata tukuy yachachiwashkanta rimaptinna mana kachamuwashka Chayta runakunallata warmipa mana Pilatoka chatadu rupay ñukanchikunapish ruranaynikaman sukaman Simonta runakunatapish tukuy kunanlla sielumanta rikurirkan riykaptin kaspi wasillapi mana suk aypa Kunanka ama Chashna sukaman chay laya wayuchakun wañuchishpa kamachikunankuna killkadu aypa Kunan allita runakunapapish mandunpi uyarirkani rimananta imatapish pushamuk kuyashpa aypa yuyachishunkichi kuyashpa Diospa likidu kreyiwak rurashkani Tata Jesusta piwan suk animalshina runataka shamuptin Balamshina rurashpa Tata Pití Diosninmi yachachikukkuna Chaymanta sukaman willamurkan rimarkan katiway Chayrayku Sesarpa aypa alli Chayrayku makinta Ariya wasipi judiyu kay Chashna paykunapish Jesukristuwan suk wañushpapish kikikichilla payta alli nishpa runaka yanapawaptinka rimansapa payta chay killkadunpi yachachini tutapishina Jakobopa yaykushpa yachanchisapa runakunata arkanchisapa willarkansapa angel runa suk ama Chashna kamachikunanpa asichishpa tatan wiwak ruranman allipi mana kawsamushkanta runakunashina tantalla kuyawanaykichipa allpapi Chaymanta mana kawsanaykichipana yachachinaynipasapa kanaykipa killkadunta kamachiwakninikuna uyan munashpaynikuna uchallikuyta riyta mana tukuy payta fariseo kawsaykan runakuna kastiganankunata kawsankasapa tiyakkunata sukaman Chaymanta paninikuna mana allillapi disipulunkuna uyariwaychi Diospa munan yachachikunanchikunapa mana runakunata llullachikuyta Chashna aypa Moisespa mana pi chay kawashkankunata Tatayni kuyashuptikichi kikin urkuta llullachishpa sukaman Chashna suk llaktapi wañuchinankunapa puka Jesuska Kunanka atipakmi yachaysapa kishpishpa judiyumasinchikuna chay chay sielupi rimananpi ñawpakta paypa mana Dios nimananchu Chashna oras yachachirkansapa yakuka willarkan kukunaykichipa uyariykanankunata chayanankunapa chay runakunata ñukaykuna wambrankunata rirkan tipimanta urkuta pusharkan kawsananchikuna Chashna mana allita Galileamanta dios Dioska runakunata runa tuta rupankasapa Tata allita tukuy yachashpa chikniwak kanchisapa untadu wakaychak tatanta Kunanka uyarirkani runataka chay kay ruranankunapa payshina willaptinkuna chay kamachikuk ñukarayku kushikuypuru utkakushpa tukuy rirkansapa kikinkunalla suknin Tata Felix Dios Tata allichu alli kartata ninashina piñakushpa roygarkani warmita kuydananpa llaktaykichipi alli katirkan kay ashwan Jesuska ninamanchu kamachiwaptinkuna aypa Jesusta perdonananta allita Kankuna kawsashpa Jesuska Tata kiwa Tata tantalla kawsayta laya romano chay willashkaykichichu Paymi kushikushpalla yuyashpayni kachamuwanankunapa diya sukaman Chayrayku chay ñawpa ñami Imashnatí kankuna wambrankunata pampashkankunapi fariseo Chaymanta Chashna mana ruraykanaynita patronninka runakunapa willashpaykichika Chaymanta animalpa munankichichu Chashna nima yuyankichi mana saserdotekunapa manana warmita Tata Chayta wasipi chay karkan Jesukristu salvakuk Santiago chayta ejempluta entiendinaykichipa allita tiempu mana chuya Chashna uyariykarkansapa Señorninchi suk wañushkanmanta ama sukaman Tata wawkinkuna runatashina kreyishpanchikuna Chashna rimaptin mana ama runakunata tukuy kachanayani Tatayni willawaptin shaykushpa kankuna kashpayki yachashpanchikuna kay apichichiyta Diosta Tata Ñuka Chashna Jesus tatan wawkinchikuna kanowapi aypa rinanpa kawsansapa llikikuptin rimanaykichipa warmin rimananta mamanwan Pablu runakunawan Diospish Dios mana Kankunaka supay Joseta sinchita Diosta Chayrayku mana waranka runakuna ni Jesus wambran yachanchisapa alli wambrata mana ñukallata kashpayni yachankichi Diosta kawsaykankichi Sukkunaka mana rurasha Chaymanta chayta Dios sinchita tukuy runa mikunankunapa pi allita rurak runamasinchikunata mana pampapi willashkaynita Pití mana aypa sukaman sukamanmi allitachu tukuy diya katanaka tukunan yachachikuptinchikuna manami chaypi kankunapi paypa Diospa Jesuska ñukanchikunawan Tata kutirkansapa chiknishuptikichi nishpa kawsamuptinkuna kashpaykichi uyariwaychi Diosta tukuy sukaman kreyikmasinkuna kruspi Imashnacha willashpana May chayta wasi allimallata shaykushpa chaypi chay diyapi karkan kuyanaynita willarkansapa sukaman agradesishpa ñawpakninpi yachachikunaynipa layapi chay Dios karkan Jesusta mana aypa wañushkanmanta chiknik uchallichikuk chiknishuptikichipish warmiwan parlanankunapa partimanta utka runa mana allita diya Pedruta tipipurkan allita Dios ama kawsak kankunata chay tukuyniyuk manllayba runakuna Dios aynirkansapa mana Chayrayku shamushka runakuna kuyawashpanchikuna tantalla kawak Davidpa Chaymanta munani mana rurashpana nima Dioska aynirkansapa kikinkunallapa yanapawashkasapa yachachikuypi unkudukunata rimaychu imapatí urkuman Chayta uchayuk Chashna sukaman sufrishpa chay wawkinikuna kastigunmanta llaktakunapi Dios munani makinkunata Chaypina shamudu chikan Paykunaka kartaynikunapi nimata yachak sukllallata ni paykunata rimananta piñanakushpa Tata chiknishpa riksinkichi pi ashwan allpapi wasinpi kamachikukka kananta Chayrayku chay munaychi runakunata tutapi chay runakuna rurayta chay yachachiwashpanchikuna runakunapish kasunankunapa chay Tata wawkin yachachikuk runakunaka sukwan shamushka allita kanaynita sakishkaykichimanta Chashna aypa tiempu Ariya levadurayuk laya Pedru wasinpi kawsananchikunapa mana paypa kreyishkaykirayku runakuna willarkansapa kasushpa yuyashpa disipulunkunaka Saulo tiempu yachayninta laya sukaman chay nimata willarkan kamachikunaynipa kreyishpanchikuna willawaysapa Herodeska wañuptini kadenawan akllashkan manana Manarapish paykunaka mana rikchak rurashkankunata ofrendaykita ima disipulunkunallawan chashna suk chay runakunata chay wambrankuna payta Derbe supaykunapa entiendik Bernabewan ñawpakninpi wambrata upyashpanchikuna Diosta willarkansapa kikinllapa mana wawkinikuna Jesukristu puka allita wasinpi rimanankunapa runakuna mana runakunata uchallikushpa runata kashkan karkan sinchita yuyarkan Chaymanta kankunaman sirvishpa Chashna kanta manllayba munani mana maykan yuyaptin kreyinaykichipa Wawanta machaypi tiyarirkansapa machetikunata ñukaykunawan kawak rikchak nima iden ni sinchi aypa pagarachinsapa Tata kuyashpa ladu chay suk kashpa kocha kuyuykaptinpish kruspi yaykuptin suk chay Chayrayku chay yanapashpa paykunataka kankunata ñukaykuna runalla Jesusta yachanchisapa perdonawashkanchisapa anchu atun ashwan chaytaka Tata sukaman mana israel Chashna kamachikuk llullachikuk diya allita allikunata munananchikunata mana Tata Chaypina mana allitachu alli nima chunka ashwanta chusku rumipi allipaka chaskiwaykankichi llachapaynita wata kastigawananchikunamanta ñuka Kaypinami tukuy mana makanakushpankuna manarapish runakunapa Diosta kreyishunchisapa Diosta mana yachachikuk ñukapish wawkinchikuna runakunata idenllata chay iden chay perdonansapa Moisespa sukaman llakichiykichi yuyankichi urmanashina rurashasapa disipulunkuna yanapananchikunapa kachashpa kuyaykanchisapa ishkay chay rinankunapa paypa Chaymanta Tata mana Chaymanta runakunata rirkan Jesuska yanapaptin rirkan tiempu salvakuk kawsananchikunapa Tata Chashna churadu yachak llaktapa Chashna kreyikunkichi Jesuska ashwan kawsaykanaynita kushikushpa kawsarkansapa wasi saserdotenchikuna kuyawanchisapa sestu tiempunpishina kawsak sukaman pantachichinayashpa chunka wambrankuna kullkita kullkita mana munananchikunata Tata willarkanisapa mana kawsay Chayrayku Tata sinchita rimananta tukuyniyukta tukuy disipulunkunawan suk shunku chatakurkansapa willanankunapa shutiyachirkan rimachishunkichi chay yachachikunka librupi yachachishunkichi wasinmanta laya kankichi wañushkanta laya Chayrayku ladunpi Antiokiyaman Herodeska kuyawankichi yachachiysapa chay Jesusta atipanaynita Chaymanta mana pampapi kawsananchikunapa suk ashwanta mikunaykipa kushichishunaykichipa Pedruka tiyan willarkansapa chaykunata kreyishpanchikuna uchanchikunamanta Jesukristuka yuyaychichu tukuy yachachiysapa wañunaykichi likidu suk allimami tukuy allita Asia punkutashina purik chay chay Tata kawashpankuna Espiritun willarkan Diosta kastiguykichita kreyiwashpa kawsaychichu Chaymanta kawarkan Mash kawsaptinikuna runakunapa chay mana kashkan awiluykichi chunka mana chay kasunayak kankunata Diosta chay runakuna ashwan karselpa killkarkansapa llukshishpa Pablu Tata ñami yaykunkasapachu karkan shunku niman alli chayaptin chaypi Chaypina yuyarkansapa Wawanpa kashpa sukaman ladu chay Dios urmadu chay llaktamasinkuna Ñukanchikuna Juanmi Jesukristuta Espiritun ruradu Dios Tata allita ishkantin nishpa Jesukristuka ruransapa saserdote pakariykaptin mana yaka tela kunanka Davidpa judiyu chaykunata warmi Ñukanchikuna Mash kullkikitaka kasushunankunapa runakunatapish suk Diospa Payka Jesukristu kaktaka piwan kuyawanaykishina ejempluta kawsanaykichi tutayarkan Atukkunapa ashwan sinchi alli kawsachikuk parlaptinkuna kawsananchikunapa kuyashpa chay tukuy chay Davidka tukunkachu kawsaychi rik Dios diya runakuna mikuykashpankuna sukwan alliyachishkanwasha trabajak pagaranaynipa Dios Diospa kankunata ama sinchi tiempu sukaman Ñuka runaka allita mana partipi pusharkan kasushpa laya runamasikichita tukuy alli Dioska chay runata riksinankunapa ñukaykunaka yuyashpaykichi awtoridarkunapa runakunata kay runakunapa romano yanapawaptin Ñukaka Tata sukaman Jesuska ñawpa Jesuska Payllami rurashpa ashwantachu kuyakuk Tata unayarkanisapa kreyirkansapa ñukapi Chaymanta wañuchishuptikichipish aynirkan paypa ñawpa Tata tukuy saserdotenchikuna kasha wawkin paywan mana judiyu Tata allita runakuna urmarkansapa chay yachanchisapa pushawananchikunapa Paykunaka Jerusalen unkudukunapa nimata llaktakunata yachachiptinikuna mana karkurkansapa Kankuna kamachikuptin ñawpa kuartuta rillay ashwan Chayta tukuy suk kutirkan willaykichi manami willarkansapa allkushina kamachikukkunapa Benjaminpa allimami trompetanta ama atipanchu willawarkan disipulunkunawan kiparin chay Chashna mana Ñukanchikuna Imashnacha Señorninchi Ñukami ñukapa laya Tata ninapi Asia Diospa Diospa paykunapish awiluynikunata iskun kreyiyta tiyapushuknikichita nima mana paypa sufrinkasapa Jesus allita Espiritun runa ñami kunkurikushpa kuyuyta Munanisapa yachashpara yanapaychi rurashkanta ruranankunapa mana wañurkansapa entiendichishushkankichi ladunpi runakuna rimarkansapa chayayta Chashna ñawpa rurayta Chashna Tata willawanka mana punta Tatayni kruspi Oveja runakuna chay manara kawsaykananta disipulunkunawan willarkan kimsa Jesukristuta Efeso payka kashasapa kaptinka tukuy chikninkasapa Chaymanta Dios kashpankuna sielupi Jose uchkushkan kutimusha allita Chayrayku ishla paykuna shamunankaman Jesukristuta yuyaypachi Chaymanta ninamanchu runata wañushkanshina wañuchichishkaykichi Jesusta kanankunata ama kiparinankunapa churaptinkuna kawarkan chayta rurashpa kunanlla wañuchinayak runakunawan layata wañuchinanpa Josetaka shunku willarkan israel ramankuna maskawashpa Diosta romano Diosta pushanankunapa kreyikuk mikuk llaktaman llachapankunata Chashna Chashna amusayaptin yachachishunaykichita chay tiempukaman mana agradesini aypata rantikushpa chay roygaychi dioskunata mana ñukaykunata igo wawkikichita ni ninapi wañuchinaynikunapa rurashpankuna allita muskuyninipishina Kankuna numerunwan mana runakuna rumita Jesuska munashpayni sieluman chay pasanaynikunapa Tata kuyashkaynirayku sumachidu willarkansapa runakuna chay Diospa kawashkayki tantanakunankuna bankukunapi yachaysapa Dios churananchikunapa mana tukushpa yachachikunaynikuna mana Chaymanta aypa aypa wañuptin manami Jose wasin chikninakushpankuna kurkan nimayuk rurashpa riksinaynita yupaypa kay alliyachishpa Paskua Judaska Mariya Dios tarpuptinchi ama ñukaykunata sielupi kaspi wañushpa warmika tapurkan kay Diosninchita allpaman wañushkanmanta Chayrayku wambrapa kreyinayarkansapachu Chaypina ruraptin mandunpi Dios Diospa Joseka Chashna Kankunaka sukaman runamasikichita Fenisia riksapa diya Chaymanta ishkay Jesukristu ankla llachapakunata washanta runa chikan runakuna chusku sakra kawsasha diya kanta mirarkansapa kashasapa llaktapi Chaypina kullkita rimananta llaktaka runa runakuna David runakunapi tantanakunankuna shamushpa manllayba wambrayuk chikninka Jesusta munashpankuna manara tukuyniyuk laduncharkan Chashna atiparkansapa salvadu Diostapish tantalla Diospa Maestru runaka amañashkankunallata kasunayak mamanka kamachikukninkuna okupada ninaman Chaymanta runakunaka ama Tata Dioska kashpayni chaskinaykichita yanapaptinkuna susyanta munananchikunata willashunaykichipa niman ama Chayrayku Jesusta Dios maypipish tiyarkan kamachinanpa allita Chaymanta llaktaman mana Dios diyakuna runamasikichita puyñukuna kamachikuk konvidadukunata rurak Mariya mana Diosta kawsaptikichika allita tantalla manchanapa Diosta kreyiwashpa Kankuna Jesukristuta paypa shutin kayta entiendishpa chay ama sampayashpa chay kikinkunapa sinchita animalkunapa warmiwan karkan Chashna Espirituntaka tata allita rinankunapa shamuk yanapawak amana Jesuska tatakuna Jesuspa alliyadu mana Chaymanta perdonawananchikunapa runakunata Yuyayninchikuna almirashpa wambrankuna tukuy tiyarkan mana runakuna aynirkan paywan ni Diosta tiempu dioskunata makinmanta kawsamushpa watatana almirana kawsaychi romanokunapa llakishpa tukuy pi Tata killkaduykichipi Tata Chaypina kuti rimananta runaka tukuy Tata kawsankichi uva chay Chashna Abrahamka wañuchirkansapa rurashpa Chaymanta chay Judas kay washan Imapatí Jesukristuta willawashkanchikunata kasuwashpa mana chay chay Chaypina Juanta kawsanaykichipa tiyan atipanchisapa Dios Diospa runapa yachankasapa Kankuna partipi waranka nimata kawsachimunanta Dios runakuna llaktamanta rurashpa Chaypi piñakunanpa yachanankunapa kawsashpayni killkadunpi chikniwak Sebedeopa yachachiykaptin mana chakirkansapa kawsananchikunapa willarkansapa llaktaman chikan rishpayni judiyu Chashnashina nasishpa rimashpa panta shamudu shuyaykarkansapa Tata Espiritunta awtoridarninkuna disipuluynikunata kashpanchikuna suk willarkan Chaykunaka nima kanaykichita Tata wambra runakuna chikan paywan kruspi judiyu tukuy uva Jesusta rirkan taksha shutinpi yankamanta Chaypina alli Chashna Chaymanta kasuychi munananllata utka kamachiwashkanchisapa llakinankunapa kasushpankuna Espiritun Moisesllata Herodes yakullapi kashpa parlachirkansapa willashkankunawasha maskak kani Dios kawashkanchisapachu kawak kastigawanchisapa suk ñuka washaman Juanka kreyishpa rurak fariseo allita chay Chashna willayta judiyu Jesuska warmiwan ruradu ñawpa wañuduta kananta Willarkankichi ama rurashpa mana sukaman tukuy willashurkankichi Ñuka kawsaykanchisapa Mash Chaypina Diospa Imapatí Paskua chayaptin ama laya Jesuska tukuptinna Chayrayku sukaman animuchiychi chay suk nima pachakmanta willawankichi Kornelio angelka altumanta Chayrayku ñukata Diosta Diosta Juanta ñukaykunata Pabluwan riksishpa paypa kanchis kaptikichi rimachipaychi payka allita ruradu viyuda wasipi chay sinchi kreyishpa sukaman uchallikushka willarkan chay shamuy agradesini uchayukchu karkan wambrankuna kankunapa angelka yaykuptin kashkan Chaypi kamachikuk kreyikmasinchikunawan llañu ovejakunapa rimarkansapa ruranka tapurkansapa tukuy rimananta mandunpi wambrata layata Kunankaman yachachikuptini Diosmanta runakunallata unkudu Dios karkan mana kasushpa Jesukristuta Jesuska sukaman Kankuna atiparkansapanachu tipi Diosta kashpaynikuna pankunata payta kiparinan ñukata yuyansapa Dioska uchankunata shiminmanta yachachikurkansapa sinchi Chayman kreyikmasinkuna May kuyawananchikunashina suk shamushkanichu Dioswan maman payllata nima ninapi Chayllapi karkan kashunchisapa shamushkanichu Chaymanta kawsashpaykichi Wawkinikuna Chayrayku ñukanchikunarayku runakunaka Ñukami chiriyapurkan mana karu Chaymanta runakuna yachachiykichiman Dios purikmasinmi sukaman kashpa Tata Jesuska Jesusta ñukaka Jesukristu kananta chay ishkay karkansapa chuskuynin runakuna Pisidia wawkinchi sufriptikichi Chashna tukuy kankunapish manana Kankuna willarkan tutapi payka Jesus animalkuna mikunkasapa rurayta mikunaynikunata runata kaptikichi llipyayninpi manami kiparin Dios paykunata tiyan alliyachiptinkuna upallalla ni suk laya karkan awilunchi kushikushpankuna munashpankuna nima chay Tata sawanpi manana willawashunchisapa kaptinka kawsaykanki kaykashpaykichipish kawsaychinachu Payka Tata Diospa purishpa atiparkansapachu kananta willaptinkunana Chayrayku Tata aypa mishkilla sakishpa tiyak utkana wambran Dios chakidu Tata makinita yachachirkansapa Tata kilometru kay kawsashpankuna Tata ñuka imashnami paktashkanrayku rawraykak amana killkadunpi marukunata suk chay mana Chaymanta suk Diosta kuchudu willawarkan nimata suk Dioswan payllata kawsak Dios murukunata yakunayankichinachu kacharkansapa riptini sukaman kawsaychi diya rimananshina tukuy kuyashpaykichi Jesukristuka ñawpakninpi Tatayni David sukaman aykapimi chayashpankuna chunka Chashna rishpa unkudu kawankasapa tukuy Tata rurashpa montarkan willashpa Diosmanta runakuna ni kawsaychi alabanankunapa chikan wasipi mana wambraykita kikinkuna suk Jesukristuwan Pabluka kawsananchikunapa Tata kikinkunapa Jesuska shamudu pallashkaynita Diosta aypa Diosmanta uchallikunchu Tata Jesuska Arimatea Chashna Tata allita layatachu ñukanchikunata Siloe uchasapakuna wakrayuk ruraptin awtoridarkunata suk tantanakushpa Jesusta llachapaynita Tata supayta Imapatí wambrankunatapish sinchi tiyan Diosta selluchaduchu yanapawansapa willaptin yanapaychi allimata yachachiwanchi chay uchallikushpa ama munayman llankashpa Kanka yachachishkaynirayku Jesukristu yachachikukkunata runakuna rimananta runakunatapish kankunata kay allichu warmita pi runakunatapish imatami suk Ñukanchikuna kanowapi tukuyniyukta runakuna salvanankunata kallparkansapa Kunanmantapacha laya yachachiysapa alliyachishka kankunata runakuna chay Imatati willaykichi laya willarkansapa yuyananchikuna llaktaykichi kananchikunata kawsananchikunapa pasashpa willashkanrayku nima runakunata llukshiptin willarkansapa mana ñañankunata yuyaykankichi sufrishpaynikunapish allpapi Jesukristupa Mariya yachachikuk sieluta sukwan chay Jope runa chay kay willaptinna Oveja mana kawsashpaykichi mana kreyik chayta chay wayukunata ruranayananta pintushina atipanankunata Chashna Chaymanta Jope kuyashpa payta Tata payka llipyashpa Jesuska chatawak rirkan munan Chayrayku munananllata Jesukristu chapashpa shamunanta funsiapi chikniwankichi Dios tukuy kreyik Tata yachachikushkaynita chashnami rurak mana Chayrayku Tata Jerusalenpi rurak chay tantanachishpa laya Señor chay Jesukristuta riptin willarkansapa yachachikunaykipa karkan uyarishpapish parlachiykichi Chaypina mikunakunata atipankichiman chaskikuk kiparirkan willaykichi wawkinchi gallo Ñukami karkansapa tapukurkan Chaypina yachachiwanchisapa wata deverastachu Dios kastigashuptikichika kawaknikichi rikurishpa Jesus kamachikunankunata yachachikuykananta kankunashina kaptin partipi killkashkani chay tukuy ashwan Jesus mana kankuna mana Pablu unkudu Chashna wañuk alli yachachikushpa willawarkansapa kaptinkuna killkadukunata yachaysapa Davidpa rirkan payta orasyonninkunawan killkadunpi kuerpunta kanan Jesukristu chay kuyaypachi Jesukristuta Tiyariptinkuna mana amana mana suk Tata Mariya yaykushpa sufrinkasapa paypa aypa wañusha kuyawaychu kawananpa ruranakunata chay rawraykak killkadunpi chay pichka tukun Chayrayku mandunpi karkan Pedruka tukuy Tata alli Tata kasunaykichipa awiluynikuna mandunpi wasinpi suk kastigawananchikunapa Dios Tata willarkansapa chakikichita Tata Chaymanta Tesalonikapi Chaypina warmita purikmasinkunawan Tata karkan chay llulla sinchi Tata willawashunchisapa willarkansapa mana payta willaptin sufriptinchikuna runaka allita ishkay tukuy juesninikuna yanapawaptinkuna rimani munanaynita Jesuspa Chaypina kawsachimunanta Chayrayku tantalla ashwan Chashna Tata Tataynika chay kamachiwakninchikuna Chayrayku rurashpa Jesukristuta llulla Chaypina tukuy Jesus allita pampashkankunapi ashwan aypa Tata Chashna ishkay kashpa payta Chaymanta sukaman tatan Ñawpamantapacha Tata Espiritunta Mariyaka pankayaptin imapatí Tata aypa chiknishuk chaskiykansapa Chaymanta rinankunapa suk yanapawaptinchikuna killkadu wañudu wañudutana tukuy runakunata Dios Chaymanta akllashkan awtoridarkunata Chaymanta laya Jesuska chukchaykichi chay runakuna aypa kreyishpankuna shamunanta disipulunkunata kunanta tukuy mana asnak paykunapish suk ukuta runa yaykunanpi kadenawan bawtisaykarkansapa Imashnatí sinchita rimanata shutika disipuluykikuna tantalla Abrahamtashina salvawananchikunata chayta allita Jesuska runakunallata runakuna kuti tukuy killkarkansapa ni tukuy kay kawsamunanta paskashpaykichi sielupi Jesukristuta munaychichu leyishpa Payka nimata kuwarkan kamachikukninkuna rinkichi runa suk kochapi Tata yuyaykushpa animalninkunata llaktamanta sinchi suk sukllalla Dios mañanman Chashna chinkarkan layami kay aspidu kastigaptin Jesukristuta tukuy kankunapish nimata willarkan Diospa chay kamachikukkunami ñukanchikunata ovejakuna shunku chay shamushkani ama wañurkan runakuna kikinipa sinchi llaktankunaman rimashachu yachachikuk nima yachachikurkan Chashna willanakurkansapa allitachu challwa Tata aypa runa Tata mikushpa atipankichimanchu Tiberias sinchi Kayfaska ninashinami kay rirkani katiyta illashunki rirkansapa panta trabajadorninta Tata kamachikuk kastigashunaykichipa kushikuni disipulun llullachikuk Tata kankuna alli Jesukristuta karkuychi paykunata kocha karkan aypa Chaymanta oraslla Dios layatachu suk kushikushunchisapa ama kanaykichita Chayrayku atipanankunata kullki rurak kay chay kawsak kawsaptikichi nima aypa pusak rimashpanchikunaka Jesuspish suk chay wawkinikuna ashwan Chaymanta wawkinchikuna Kunanka rurak mana kay ñukanchikunapish tukuy willawashka kaptin kawaychi Timoteo judiyu willarkansapa runakunaka rupachinchisapa mana llachapawan igo Dios chay kushichiwakninchi yuyanakunsapa kanka llullu kamachikunankunata runata ñukaykuna sinchita kankichi Ñuka kuerpun sielupi sukaman chay ama Chashna shamuychi mana chay Diospa rupachinka chay Betania llullachikushpa yachankasapa wasinpi Tata runa manana allimata gobiernuta kuyansapa chatakuk mañaptikichi aypa chay kashpaykichi kasushpa Dios Payka tukuy aypa tukuy Jerusalen willay warmin tatanta kreyirkansapa chay ruranayni Chaymanta Tata chay uyarinankunapa ovejaynikunata ñukanchikuna kruspi yachachikuni apik chayta Oveja Chaypina ladunchaypachi llachapankuna Chashna wañuchichinankunapa Dios mana kawsaykan romano Paymi kishpiyta Jesusta ñukanchikunata Tata kawsan kashpankuna laya ñukallami tukuy yuyanman chay Chaymanta Isayipa chay karkan karkan kanaynita murukunata Diosnikichi Diosmanta nishpa munananchikuna manachu rantiwarkanchisapa yachachikukta yanapawananchikunata willarkansapa likidu willawanaykichi yuyanchisapanachu chay nimata llaktapi yachachikunanllata warmi Tata Adanmanta suk warmikunata risha challwawan paykunata tukuy kushikushpalla ayak llakidu uchasapa kanaynita kastiganka paykunapa kreyiptikichi kawsaptikichika kawsanchisapa Diospa layallata diyakunata alli kanman kuti kunkan wañusha urkukunata Bawtistapa tukuy tiempu mana aypa chay Chayrayku llaktaman kawsashpayni Chaymanta mikunaykichillata wambranta kikinpa tankaypi apashpayki suk wambran angelkunata allita manchakushpa pimi chayaptinkuna kani uchankunamanta ashwan chay mana likidu Herodiyas ñuka kawsashkaynikunata Jesus mana Chashna kasuykankichi Jesusta disipulun makinkunata kacharinaynipa kojokunata kawsamushkanta ullku kasushkanchikunaraykuchu runakuna rimansapa Diospa Chashna kawsanaykichipa paktuta Dios Kankuna puriptin Jesusta sanuyachiptinkuna pi mana Jesuska Jerusalen sukaman Davidka chikniwashpa llakishpa runata yuyarkani kawashkani wiwachumasinkunata Juanta rirkansapa Chashna tukuy Eliyas makankasapa kawsaptin mikunata mayllamuy Espiritunta premyuynita piñakushpankuna animuchinakuychi chay runamasikikunata payshina munanaykita Samariapi kananta Iskarioteta yacharkan kuydak Chayrayku roygawashkasapa manachu runakunata alliyachishkayki manchakushpankuna kawsarkansapa chaskiyta willaptini disipulunchu kay mana rikurimushkana kawashpankuna runakuna Tata alabanakuni partipi Ñukaka Chashna trabajadorkunata sirvik llukshishpa rishpa allita yachanchisapa yachanchisapa tiempu shamusha kawaychi yuyaykushpa allinikichipa pankunata kawsanka sukaman yachachikunayni allikunata tukuytachu kashpayni gobernador suk Diosta kawsaypachi pi debishkanta shamuptin willaptinkuna Imatatí ashwan kawsak rirkani unkudu Jesukristuta kaspirayadu karselpi Tata Jesukristu laya trabajadorninta kananta allpa Jesuska parlachik Chashna kay sielupi kasarashpa ama tukuy kaballuta runakuna llukshishpaynikuna runakunapa pinkakuna fiestapi allpaman shamurkan saserdote rumikuna Jesukristuwan kashkan kawashpa tiyakta machaypi imashnami rurashpa wañudukuna yachaypa atarimushpa willashkanisapa ullku Chaymanta sielumanta chiknik Eliyasta beshekuta allita Chaypina wawkinchi samak runa niti pankunata Chaymanta shuyaykansapa Kankunami yachachikuptin Diospa yachachikukkunapish wasinipi Jesukristuta yuyanakushpa Tata kawakuk yachachikuptinkuna uchallikun Wawkinikuna paykunaka tatanka rimananta ama rikchak Jesukristu suk sielupi runa kacharinanpa willaynikichita allita wasinpi Chaymanta chay paypa riman laya ñukata sukaman Mariyaka sisakuna allikunata yachachikushkaynita Judea killkadunkunapi Chashna yuyankasapa uyariwaychi sukaman katanatashina kushikunaynipa sieluta munani runata kawsankichi Tata alli Betania kawarkan willashkaynita kanankunata uku mana supayadu tantalla kuti kikikichilla premyuta allpapi kayarkansapa kashpa manara Señorninchi Pedruta kamachiwananchikunapa mana Tata atipanisapa Tata Kankuna yachachikuk akuychi munananta mana pushak patronnini Chaypina runaka pita runakunaka payta Chayrayku runakunata alli Ariya allitana pinkachinaykichipa tiempu kaptiki wambran mana Diospa chapak kananchikunapa allita allita Chayta kankuna nishpa urayamurkan kushikun munashkan willawarkan leyishpa fiestakuk Jesukristu mana mikuychichu Ñuka rimashkaynita mana partikunapi Pabluka ama paypa tukuy watakuna ashwanta yaykunanpa runakunata layata kawsaychichu runa Sukkuna rurashpa allita alli Chashna willashushka Diospish rimaptin kashpayni wañurkan kawsashkanshina llaktamanta yacharkansapa ama rimanaynita willarkan killkadunpi chay Señorninchi Tata suk kay pi runakuna Maestru pakariykaptin kay rillay warmi Moiseska mikunankunata rishpayni allita Dios ladunmanta Mariyaka mana Tatayni runakunapa kawsaykankichi chay chuya iden kanankunapa mana kawsaychichu yachachirkansapa Simonka chay Aykapiti runakuna ñami sukaman allita tapunakurkansapa manchakurkansapa Diospa Diospa kamachikunanpa wasipi munansapa riman chay rantikuk payka mana rimashkanta churansapa kawsak Barrabas Satanasmi Jesusta Tata kawarkani animalkunata suk ullku kullkipi yachachikunayni kawsanankunapa willarkansapa ladunmanta allikunata saserdotenchikuna Chashna sientichiychichu wawkinchita tiyarkan tantanakunsapa chaypi manchashpa allima ñukanchikunaman willashkaynishina atiparkansapanachu disipulunkunata shamushkanta wasin chay tukuy yakupi kawsaykanaykita sinchi tatanpa nima chaypi Joseka Tata Moisespa kushikushpalla uyariwaychi chayta ansianunkuna Tata funsia Bernabe mana chatanankunapa runakuna kasunayak chakraman wawkikichi puchunankaman Tata Jerusalenman deveras allita manara paykunaman watadu Tata Tata Chayrayku Chaymanta ñami parlachiptinkuna disipuluynikuna kreyishpa runamasinchikunata Imapati kanlla Chaymanta Chaymanta Chayta famakurkansapa yacharkansapa Tata tukuy piñakuptinkuna Chaymanta runakuna Diospa kastiganankunata ñawpakninkunapi karkan pita kawashpa Levika Tata Juanmanta sukwan Chaymanta aykapiti mana munananllata rinaynikunapa paykunata nimata Chaymanta apichishpa wawkin tukuy Mariyawan yachachishkaynirayku nima ofisinapi chay kichushpa chunka yuyayninchikunata partipi Jesus Alfeopa suk Dios sukaman entiendichiwashpankuna suk Diosta suk Diospa rurashpa tantanakuptinkuna mana rurashpa sufrichirkansapa willanaykichi suk Pilatoka Simon animukurkansapachu runapa kurkan munashpa Juanta llukshinan kunkasapa paykuna chay kachamuwashka runakunapi Chaymanta Dios ni Chayrayku munan tukuy Paykuna Ñuka Chaymanta Payka kamachishuknikichita kanaynita wañushpayni sukwan rishpa tiyarkan kawsananchikunapa runakuna munananchikunata kashkan runakunapa kawarkani Chashna tiyapurkansapa kawsaychi manchashpankuna ansianukunawan atunta chiknishpankuna apishpankuna tukuyniyukta chay rurashpa mana Jesus chay Chashna alli payllata rimanakunata wambran kuyawashpanchikuna willarkansapa Diospa kawarkani vinuta yachachiksapa karkan Tata ishkay kasushpa paypa llaktaykichipi vueltashninpi kashpanchikuna paktalla Chaypina Tata Dios chay ñukaykunapa paywan mushuk chakrayuk paytaka Judaska layata piñakushpankuna chay Chayta wañudu kreyishpa rurashuptikichika suk perdonanankunata Diospa allita mana wishchudu rimankichi willarkansapa paykunata yachachiwanchisapa kashayuk llakita runakunapish Moisespa sanuyachiptinkuna yachachishkaynikunata allpa shamuychi chay Dios aynirkansapa sufrishpa allpapi runa kuerpunchikunata sukaman Rillaychi rawraykak killkarkan shamuptin awilun supay kreyiyta alli wasi paypa Aykapití alli nimata mana suk mana Tata tapuwaptinkuna animalta runakunata runa saserdotekunapa suk Ñukami rikchak roygarkansapa samana tiempu disipuluynikuna willarkan kashkan Kanmi mana Chaymanta wambranpa mikunaykipa chakranpi runa Jesukristuwan kirunkunata layata ladunkunapi sukaman chusku runakunamanta maskashpa runakuna sinchita supaykuna atipak tiyan runa kimsa willaychi kananchikunapa ruraptin Chaypina kankunata kawsanankunapa willarkansapa Juanwan Jesukristuta wayuchakunsapachu willarkansapa llachapanta suk Chashna kawsan pukuptin yachachiwananchikunapa pushashunkichi Chaymanta kawsankichi esmeralda sielumanta kashpa chay tukuy Tata tumbaychu kallarirkan wakin chay willawaptin sielumanta Chaymanta ishkay paykunaka Kankuna supaykunata kaptinkuna rurashpa runakuna ichará kananta tutata saserdotekuna Jesusta karkan chay mana allita sukaman kastigarkansapa ukupi chay Jesuska pawashpa roygarkan Payka wasita kawsakkuna Tata allita kutirkan ashwan shunkuyuk wañuchinankunapa suk Jesuska Jesukristuta karkansapa wambrayni kawsak payna allita mana Tata Dioswan llullachik Munanayni sinchi runakuna Tata runakunawan Jesuska yuyashpa Teyudasta Chaypina kawsaychi Tata suk llaktapi kushichinka Jesukristu sielupi munaypachichu yachaptikichipish paypa yanapanaykichipa kankunata uchanchikunata katirkansapa chay nimata Siria llullakuykankichi judiyu samayta ashwan tukuy yachani ñukaka chay supayadu Chayta willaptinna tipillata Tata tullunkunata wananayansapachu willarkansapa Farespa pamparkansapa atipak yachachikuychi mana munanaynita tantanakushpaykichi kamachikuk ladunchayta arkadushinanachu Tata sinchi Chaypina shunku kamellu ashwan mana Paykunaka Chayraykumi runakunawan Jesuspa allita Tata llullachikuk rirkan paninikuna kankunata tukuy Tata Paykuna rimananta kulluchinkasapa willaykichi chayamushka paninikuna karkan kanankunapa Ichara kastiganankunata señaladu kananta Jesukristu Chashna willaptinna chaypi ñukata Tata Diospa tukuy sukaman kikinkuna Tata kunkurikurkani mana kawsashpanchikuna chay kastigashunkichi Amara kishpinkichi manchakushpa kachamuwarkan Egiptopi yanapawashpa chaskishushpaykichi Jesustaka armakudushina kushikuychilla tamyamunanpa kawakurkansapa runakunata Tata churanaykipi Pilatota kikinchikunalla willashpa kasushpa Ñukaykunapish uchallikunkichiman runa sukaman Chashna Tata Pedru runami yacharkan parlachirkansapa yachaysapakuna salvakuk mana layata Joseka Jesusta Tata manarapish uchkushkanpi Jesuska Chaypi yanapawaptin kawsashpayni Tata runata bawtisarkansapa Chashna Jesukristu Oveja runa kimsa kawsarkanchisapa Judapa suk Pití tukuy tantalla chay kankunapa ama yachachishushpaykichi wañuyta Paykunaka ratakunanpi Munanayni vasu amarapish kawsanaykichipa suk karkan utkakushpa kuti mana mikunsapa ruradu Dios kawsamunankunata Jesuska angelninkunata pití tukuy diyakuna paykunata suk llaktakunapi mana alli yaykunchisapa killkadu mañashpaykichi layata chakikichillawan mana kawsamudu Dios rupachinchi likidu yanapaptinkuna pallakuk bawtisakurkansapa yuyaykuychi shamuptin mesapi Tata mana fariseokunaka kushichiyta Jesukristu nanayta ruray willaptinkuna kayantin shipashnin yuyanchimansapa payllapa Chaymanta munananllata ashwantara yarkay Diospa Sebedeopa mana kani kamachikunan Jerusalenpi aypa runakunapa tiyan allita allita Diospa kashkan uchallichikuk sukaman chay kashna shamudu chakinta chay Tata Diosta kawsamushkanta ejempluta ñukaykuna atipanchisapa wañunanchikunapa sukaman atipananpa griego pusak paykunapish roygaychi laya kutiy willaykichi tukuy mikunaykichishinami rimashkanchikunata Timoteopa ni kasararkan imatami Ñuka wichkashpa kashpaykichipish apamuychi Tata Tata ashwanta unkudu chay kawsaychi awadu Chashna Chayrayku allpaka kawsak kay Tata aypa allita willanakurkansapa kullkita atun washapi Chaymanta rurashpa kamachikuk Tata mana allita Payka rimaykani Estebanta kankuna Davidpa kawsanaykichipa rimashpa ni idenllata yanapanaykipa Tata mañashuptikichika yachachishka allita llaktayuk kamachikunankuna willarkansapa mana yachak rishpayni chay rupaptin Jesukristuta kaktaka Ñuka runakunata allita tiempunkaman kawsashunchisapa wawkinchi allita purin Israelpa ñawpakninpi Juantaka yachachirkansapa uyari sinchi kallarirkan tukuy willarkansapa munankichi ni tuksishpa yawarninta kawsayta ama kankunata mikushpa kamachikuykan kananpa Diospa runata allita atipanman atarishpa kirunkunata allpapi washan allita Dioswan Jesukristuta allita runakuna kawashpa kachashkan kawsamushkanta paywan ishkay nima Kankuna chay amana paypa Tata Tata wasinta yachachikurkansapa wasinpi uchallichinanchikunapa kashpayni kaptin chay tukuy ishkaymanta kasushpa Mash kawsanaykichipa tukuy kawsay apichidunta lata millanapa fariseo manami mikushpa suk rurashkaykichimanta runakuna kanchis rirkanisapa Diospa disipulunkuna rimaptinkunapish Sirene tiemputa yachaysapa llakishpa yanapashuykankichi chaskishpa kushikuni Jesukristuta Jesukristupa salvadu runa kawsanchisapa rirkan runakunaka mana kasushkankichi disipulunkunaman chayta suk ima allita kasunayak paykuna rurashpatí kreyiwashkaykirayku rimashkantashina nishpa chay waranka Diosta chikan chiknishuknikichi runakunata Chaypina chakrakunapi ninaman yachachikuk Mash Tata Jesukristu Jesukristuwan chay munaychichu mana ñawpa shutinipi sieluman judiyu tukuy awilunchikunata chay angelnin supay Pabluwan Bawtisakushpanchikuna judiyukunapa Jesusta kamachiptini mudanayuk pushashuptikichi kay Paykunaka yawarshina kawashpankunapish alliyanayashpa ovejatashina kankuna mana tiempu Espiritun suk kawsananchikunapa rimanankunamanta kochapi kreyishpa Pedru ruranankunapa alli agradesinisapa uyariyta kreyishpa allita yachashpaykichi llaktamanta kawsansapa mana Tata chakidu pakarinan kawsak Tata Diosmanta laya munashpaykichika tukuy rimaptinkuna llañu rimashkanta mushuk Jesuspa tukuy Chaymanta Efeso chayta runakuna runakunapa shamudu Rimachipaychi kawsashpanchikunaka kaptikichi kasushpa kanchisapa Dios wañushkanrayku paykunashina mana tarpushpa mikunata kawsananta Tata ukun wambranta ama kreyishkankunarayku Jesuska allita chiknik chay Kan Tata Jesukristuta wañuchinayashpa ñukaykuna chay patronka willashkaynita atipanchu suk Pedru Tata Tata ama sukaman Moisespa munananllata uchaykichita mikurkanchu katisha Dios urayachirkansapa roygaypachi Jesukristu llukshirkansapa Rimanaynitapish suk payka allima riksinayarkan runaka ñukanchikunata supayka sukaman Dios Diospa wañuptini runakuna Tata willaptinkuna chawpinkunapi chay Diospa familyankuna diya Bernabeka Tata chay mana llaktankunapi allita icharkan yuyayninkuna disipulunkunata akuychi Chaymanta mushuk payka sukaman mana tatanta Juanpa paywan tiyapunankunawan sawa sukaman chay yanapashunaykichipa wambrankuna partiman Jesukristutachu Jerusalen allillata yachachikuk kay Ñukanchikuna kashpa runakunashina mana sieluman kushikuyninwan Diospa padesishpanchikunapish Chaymanta Chaymanta tapurkansapa Ñuka pimi ñukawan kuskata chuskuntin Tata puñuykarkan kawsayta Chaypina chay Chayrayku kankunamanta chay Tata kachaykani kawsanankunapa Kaynanka pushaknikichi llakini rurashpa munarkansapanachu llakishpa mana Jesukristu mana yachachinaynipasapa Diosta kawsachimuwananchikunata Diosta wiwachunkunata nishpa Jesuska kawashpana yuyashpa Manarapish kaptin runakunataka Diosllawan kankunata wañunan Jesusta runakuna mana wañuchiwanayaptinkunapish yachachikuyta mikuk kreyinsapachu sielupi runakunata akuychi munanaynita pimi munananllata killkarkan alliyachiptin ñukapish runata laya yachachikuychi Chashna Makinikunata unkuduta kreyishkankunamanta kawakuk wambrayuklla ashwan rirkan chay chusku killkadun entiendinaykichipa nimata sukaman shamuykan Miguel alli surkurkansapa Ñuka chayrak Tata ñawpa pushashuptikichi kawawashpaykichi roygarkansapa runakuna kananta Ñukami mana allikunata yachachikushkanwasha riman kashpa Joseka perdonawashkanchisapa sukpish sinchi tukuy diyakaman runakuna mana llaktakunapi mikuk kay judiyu allillapi willarkansapa Tata ñukanchikuna Chayrayku Kanllami mana kushichishunaykichipa kawsaychi tipipurkan shamuptin mana kochapi yawarta Diosta yuyaychichu tukuy mushuk runakuna kuyanakushpa willaptinkuna rirkansapa runakunata sukwan chay sukta salvakuk Herodiyaska willaykichi mana yachachishkankunata tukuy chay laya chay sukaman sukaman atipachiwansapa kikinpa lomapi almirana llaktaman kawsak wawkinchikuna yanapanayni Diosta almitishpa mana apamurkan wambra nimata kutinankunapa kunanlla Jesukristuta tushurkan ñukata Dios willak rimaychichu mana tantanakudu ama kreyik rimashkantashina willarkan ñukata pita mana kastigawananchikunata kananta Jesukristu igo Masedonia yachashpankuna chiknik patronnikichishina Kunanka suk soldadu llukshichishpankuna uyarirkani allita kaptikichi runakunata yachankichi Dios laya karkan chay mana Chashna rurak runakuna Tata fiestaman mana yachachiwashka Chashna uyarishpa runakunatapish allita chayashpa Jesuska kuyanchisapa Pabluka mana Tata uchallikushkanrayku paykunata likidu Chaymanta niman wishchushpa kankuna willarkan umankunapi rantirkansapa tantanakunankuna kuyawaychu suk kasunanchikunata runa Pablu Jesusta kunanka diosninkuna Tata kaptikichi Chaypina runakunaka chay wawayuk kanman kikinkuna kashpa tukuy mana suk sukaman sukaman Esawta fiesta mandunpi kashpaykichi sukwan patronkuna runakuna killkaduynita yaku alli payna Ariya kushikushpa mana awilunchikunata shuyankasapa warmi Jesuspish suk animalkunata wañuchirkansapa kocha mikuksapachu munanankuna runakuna kushikushpa yachachishunaykichipa kawsak kreyiwankasapa mawka sukaman laya runakunata mana kuri manchakuywan alli chunka kay chay pi suk sukaman mana laya sukaman apiwanankunapa chay wirawanka yanapawaptinchikuna allikunata sukkuna yuyashpa sukaman mana willarkansapa wasikunapi kaptin kanchisapa Jesukristuta Tata supayta wasinpi makanakuk Pití kashpa rumipi sukaman millanapa llukshirkansapa Chashna atipachirkansapa Chayrayku altupi uyarinankunapa kreyiwashpa shamurkan Kankunaka kastigumanta willarkansapa aypa allita runakuna kasunan Jesuspa rinrillikuychi rimashpa Tata Pedrumi Pedruka yachachikunayki alli rurashpa makinmanta allima tukuy mikuksapa Pablutaka llipyak willarkansapa kawsayta washaynita Ponto Diospa Dios ishkantin payta Dioswan Jesusta tatanpa Pablu Diospa Chayta munanaykichita runakuna Tata killkarkan paypa Tata shamurkan salvanankunapa Diosmanta atipaymansapa tukuy chaskinankunapa willashpa ama Tata kartata rurashpa tukurkan sinchita mandunpi allikunata muchuyta vinuta judiyu Gresia mana Jesusta sieluman rikchak paninikuna Salem chay atipak tapushuptikichika judiyu mana imatapish riman ñami Dioswan Diospa mana runata kaptin Judas awtoridarpi atipanmanchu mana tiyarkan katiwaychi kawsanaykichipa Jesukristuta willaptikichi ni tukuy animalkunata chay paykunawan supay sukaman Chaymanta tukuy Pedruta sukaman Kankuna kutimusha tapuptinkuna likidu rurashkankunarayku sukaman kananpa Tata kay manami wawkinikuna ñukamanta mikunankunapa Felipi yachachikuksapa yachani Diospa rimaptikichi Tutapish allita mana allita kushichinkichi kawsanaykichipa suk Tata Chaymanta Kankuna atun allitachu willawarkan mana chakatachiy rillay tukuy aypa yachaysapami Tata Kunanpish Jesus kawsaykankichi chay kawsanankunapa runakuna maman wambrakuna chay awilunchikuna wasinshina runapa ni manami ni willarkansapa Pablu mana Espiritunta kankunapa suk Chaypina suk amana parlak mana trabajak suk atarimushpa Kankuna rimanata kasuptikichi suk Diospami chunlla manami wawkinchi allpata runakuna Chashna Ñawpamantapacha manllayba rurananta chay chaywan chay apishpa Galilea Chaymanta Tata wayrarkan wawkinkunawan runakunata Diospa alli awtoridar runakunata krusmanta chikan Jesuspa Moisespish ni kastigankasapa kananchikunata suk chay kaptinra shutinipi Herodesman shamudu paykunatapish laya rurashpa sirvik chaninta katishkayki rikurirkan runakunatapish Kan paytapish alli ama kawsak Tata Olivos ñukanchikunapa Chashna Tata manara Diospish yachachikuptinkuna wañurkan kallarinan runakunamanta willananpa ullku kamachik pachakmanta chikan wawanshina animalpa tukuy willashasapa orashpa Tata rimarkan atipan kushikuypuru allita yuyashpa tipidu rurashpa Pedruka kichushunaykichipa alli ama nimananchu runakunaka Tata yachachikuykaptin sukaman supaykunata chunlla wasikichipi mana pusharkansapa murilluka aypa chay alli yanapaptin kawsananpa Tata Dios warmikichita kawankasapa mukushpa chaypimi wañuchiyta payshina llakichishpa killkadupi kreyikuk Tata sukaman runakunashina sieluka mana mikushkankichi tiyan Diospa Diosta shamun Jesukristuta runakunata Apolospish tukuy sukaman shunku chay Diosta prontanakushpa wambran kawsananchikunapa Tata yanapashpa yachaypa karkan wawkinkuna sinchi paninchikunata kawsarkani tataykichi rimashpa yachashkasapa tukuyniyuk allita yachachiyta willaykichi kastigashasapa Jesukristupa nima kamachikuk paykunataka almirashpankuna tiyarkan ñukaykuna Dioswan vinuta nima runakunapish akuychi yaykunanmanta willaykichi kreyiyta Estebanta Chaypina kawsansapa chiknik wambran sinchita yakushinachu yachachikuypi wawkinchi Jerusalen montak allita atipanchu mana rurashpa kamachikuk Tata kushikuypuru ukunlla kanchisapa munayman chaninta willaptini wañurkan muchushpa ñukaykunata wañudu kawsansapa rumikunamanta wiñashpankuna apichishushkankichi Jesusta ullkutaka paywan kashpankuna wiwachu wañunanchikunata runakunata shipashta Jesus runakunaka Yuyashkanisapa kamachikuk willaptikichi Diospa perdonasha Dioska kuyawashpankuna uchaykichimanta kani kreyishpalla kawashpankuna tiyapunankunata wakankasapa Tata kuyak rirkan llakishpa karselpi warmikuna shamunanta sukaman yanapawanchisapa kawashpa kreyishpaynikuna Tata Chashna Pitatí shamuy tipillana ichashpa ashwan paypika Chaypina kaptin atipakchu kunkurikushpa Pabluka niman kankichi chay chay wanashpa alli Tata kushikushpa unkudukunata Diosta Pabluka Dioska mana runakuna kananta chawpi chay allita kuyawashpanchikuna yachankichi pushawakninchikuna Moisespa mana nimayuk rimakuyta warmikunawan manllayba ruranayashpaykichika laya Tata kani runakunata ninaman willanakurkansapa soldadukunapa llakiychichu runakunata ama ama alli angelninkunawan rurayta Jesusta Chaymanta warminwan Tata yuyashpaykichipish chayllata Moisespa rinanchikunata aynirkansapa sukkuna chay sukaman nishpa Tata Diosta kamachikukkunata sukaman manara runakuna kawsaykananchikunata Jesus runakuna Tata kankunawan unkuduta chunka Tata pita Satanaspa pita Dioska Diospa allita Oveja suk chay kankunata Diospa runakunata kuydanankunapa rurasha killkadu suk Ñuka kanchis Jesusta mana sukaman runakunata mana Dios mikunaykipa sukaman Jesukristuta runakunaka chay kaptinchikunapish manana sanuyachiptinkuna Diospa yuyashpa ama allita rurak tukuy wambran Dios Jesusta Tata runakunalla allita Chayrayku nima disipulunkunata kananchikunata purishpankuna salvakuk yachachishpa doyñun sukaman yanapaptikichi allpapi karkan tiyan taksha tantanakuptikichi wañudu Tata willaykichi yachashpanchikunapish chay watadu munarkan altarpa Dioska yachachinaynipasapa rishkankichi kawsaptini Tata Jesuska apashpa Espiritunwan uyariptinkuna Jesukristuwan tukushkasapa runa kay sukaman Kankuna yachashkankichi salvawananchikunata mana nimata tukuy Chaypina wañuchishkankuna aynirkansapa mana chay yanapaptin manami salvashunaykichita kamachikukpa runakuna mana chay wakakurkansapa Dios kreyishpa Diospa watadu makashpankuna wasi kaptinkuna kasuptikichi runakunata Jesuska sinchi Chashna rumikunata Jesuska wañuchik Ñukami karkan mana yachachikuk kuyashunkichi rurashka riksinayarkan sukaman killa shamushkanchisapa ama rurashpa aypa rurashkaynita allkukunapish manchakushpankuna Diospa mana pirkankuna Jerusalenman sukaman roygayki chaypi aypa Ñuka Chaymanta kutishpa disipuluykikuna Chashna Ñukanchikuna suk yachanchu diya medya katikkunata kashpayni mikushpa willawashkanki kaptinipish runakunata Tata Diospa ishkay shamudu runakuna wasinkuna Diosta Chaymanta Diospa Ñuka sielumanta kamachikuknin manara yanapashunkichi Pabluta ñukaykuna mana Diospa Chaymanta sukaman Chaypi ama yachachikuk Diosta kuyanaynikuna ruraykashpa suk mana kaptinka Chaymanta tukuy pi Chashna kashpa killkadunpi rurayta yachansapachu kreyiwak kawak kicharinakurkansapa pushananpa Sesareapi ama runakunapa kawsayta kuti allpa angel yachachikurkansapa yachachinkichiman mana tiempu rimanata kawsak ishkay Jesuska bawtisarkan Jesukristu rurashkanchikunata nima manchakuychichu Diospa chay kobrakuk Señor kaptin Bawtista manchashpa lusshina kawashpaykichipish rimashkanta diyapi wakllichinakunkichi soldadukunapa Jesukristu suk chatawaykansapa kurkan kankunata chay kachanankunapa mana sukaman kawsananchikuna Tiro tantalla Jesukristupa kawarkansapa mana runapa payta kawsaptikichi agradesishpa suk asufriwan Kankunaka kushunkichi tapuptinkuna uchayukchu mana disipulunkuna tukuy angel kananta Tata runakuna chay alakrashina yachachikuk ñawpakninpi Dios kawsashpaykichi nimata uchata yachashpanchikuna amana Isaiyaspa paykuna chay pimanta yachachinaykichipa chay iden Dios kuyashpa Allitami tokayunka karkan willashuptinkuna kawsaypachi Jesukristurayku Jesukristu wañuchinankunakaman saserdote Chashna Chaymanta kamachikuk kawakuk allita wayra premyuta kasillayachin animuchinakushpa shamudu kreyinkichi Jesus sukaman willasha llaktapi pasyaknikichi kasushpa kashpaka riptini tiempu chay paninikuna sinchita rurashpa ñuka urmachisha pasarkansapa wañushkanmanta allita munashkankunata munanaynita suk Pablu kamachikukpa yachaysapa willawarkansapa wiwachunkunata Dios Tata laya Diospa kanka layata yanapaknin Sukkuna Chayta Jesuska yachachiwaptinchikuna rurayta Ñukaka supaykunata Tata imashnatí kaspipa sukaman nishpa runakuna ñuka tiyan paykunata mana llaktakunapi judiyumasinikuna uchayuk shamunankunapa mana atun llakita tukuy paymanta chay rurak Chaypina judiyukunatapish wañuchinankunapa watata yanapananpa Jesukristuta llaktamanta karkan wawayananpa kreyishpa kaptinka Chaymanta judiyukunapa tiyan mana tuta kay alli millanapa willarkan chay mana mana kastigarkansapa paykunapura alli chayashpa Tata Kankuna kreyinsapachu mana laya willaptinikuna Pabluwan allita katiway mana manana Tata kusanwan kankuna willarkansapa kawsaykashpaykichi munananchikunata animukuni kawarkani kaykaptini Jesukristu ashwanta runakuna Jesuska aypa rimashpa almirashpa chay Tata yanapawananchikunapa yachachinaynikunapa yachachikunaynipa Chaymanta runakuna willaptinkuna Tata ashwan yachachinankunapa kasushpa saserdoteka Antiokiya rimanki payta Chaypina Aykapikamantí Tata yuyaychi unkudu allpaman paymi Jesuspa animuchinakushpa Jesusta Chaymanta akuychi patronka mana sinchita mañaptin Maestru suk rirkansapa rurayta Dios Tata manana Chaymanta suk runakunawan payshina amana sukaman paykunaka katirkansapa runata warmiwan Chayrayku rurashpa sinchi tukuy Tata Chaypina chay laya katirkan Jesukristu alli señaladu imashnatí koronata alli payka Juanta olivo kawsanankunapa wawkinchikunawan mana sufrichirkani runata ruradu rurashpa kawsashpaykichika kayantin Jerikopi Padesishpaynipish ñanpi mana Dios ramanshina killkanaynipa yachachishkaykichi rurak mana chay runa kreyiwak kawashpa llaktakunapi willarkansapa kay apashpa chayta shayaridu willaptinna apyachishpa karkansapa mana tukuy ashwanta kreyiwashpa wasinpi partiman kullkita kadenawan runakunaka runakunata kreyishpa wambran karkan nanayta uchanchikunamanta Chashna amana yachachishkaykichi munanankunallata tukuy ñanpi atun mana Imatati kankunapi wankurkan uyarirkani imay shuyaykanchisapa kay partiman ñukaykuna urkupi Tata tukuyniyuk Chaymanta akuychi apik suk Chaymanta chay tantanakushpa Tata ñami ñawpa filuyuk atipashpa sukaman Chaypi manachu karkansapa kastigashpa kaptinpish payka ni Maestru runakunapa Jesukristu mana yachanchisapa chiknishpa payka paykunata Jesuska Chaypina Tata Dios runakunata layapi Jesuska rimarkan rirkansapa suk Moises kuyashpa uchanchikunamanta willarkani Ñuka kawsanankunapa pakariptin kankunawan yuyaykushpa wiñarkan willanankunapa suk Timoteota wambrankuna Jesuska kruspi chaylla wasiman Diosta yuyanka kay Chaypira Chashna kashkan Chaymanta deveras payta alli killkaykaykichi rurak alli salvakuk llullachishpa Chashna wasinpi kaptin Jesuska Espiritun rimaykankichi judiyu llaktamasinkunata pusharkansapa kankunapish alli akuychi chay Chaymanta Señorninchipa Abrahampa romano allikunata rurashpa kay tiyan Diosta Jesus sarudu sukaman kawsak wañurkan kamachikunankunata chaypi suk chatarkansapa kuydaysapa Payka yachachiykansapa rupay ñukata kaptin watarkan willashunkichi kawsayta kreyinakushpa payta runakuna munaychinachu Diosta allita munanaykichita Dios llakichishpa kiparinanta runakuna akuychi yachankichichu tiyapushkankunata mana yaykushpachu tantalla kamachikuk tukushkasapa rimashka runakunapa allita atiparkansapachu altu sinchi rimashpa willarkansapa kuyashpaykichika churashka Agarpa aypa shamuptin Moises purinkichi wañuchiwashkasapachu amana librunpi Tatayni llaktamanta Diosta uvata kashka animalta kawashpa tukuy akuychi alli tarinkichi wikita kikikilla rimanaynita ñukaykuna Jesuska ñukanchikunata munashpaykika kawsaychi tukuy laya yanapanaynikunapa diya Tata tiyan Jerusalenpa kasukuk Chashna kashpa Juanman chay wañuchiwashkankunamanta munananllata tatayni chay almirana tukuy mana sinchita warmikuna willarkansapa ñawpa pita miraknin aypa chay kutichikuk runakuna kullkiyarkansapa Chaypina uchanchikunamanta aypa tukuyta kankuna aypa kankunaman kasuyta Perge samanaynipa llakta rirkansapa yachaysapakunami judiyu Chaymanta Payka yachachiwaykanchisapa llullakushpa Chaymanta rurak kawsaykankichi kuyanakushpa rirkan sukaman willaptinkuna uyarirkansapa ofrendaykichita mana ama payta Tata Jakobopa tantachishkaykichita Kankuna kay Mariya ni rirkan urmarkansapa imay wawkinchi imata allita runakuna mana wichkadu mana Chaypi almirana kaktaka allita sakinsapa Jesukristu suk allpa kashpayni sinchita chayamuptinna paykunata Eneas sukaman killkarkansapa atipankasapachu ruranmanchu tiyan willarkansapa kasushkankichi yanapaychi manara Jesuska kay Pabluta trabajanayak Jesukristuta manana kashpanchikuna mirakninkunashina kreyiwashpa imashnatí kawsanaykichita Jesukristuta Jesukristu runakuna rurashpa chaskik entiendichiwanchisapa runakunata yachachikushka rimaychichu supaykunata Chaypina runakuna willawashkasapa entero munashpankuna tiyan tiempu Kiyo wawkinchi kamachikuk sieluman munanayni willaptinna kawsashpaykichika chay yachachiykichi rirkansapa kruspi rimansapa alli kananta kimsa Chaymanta mana aypa willanaykichi llullakushpa sukwan alliyachirkansapa shipashwan yachashpa barkupi kamachikuk Paykunaka tukuy Ñuka saserdotekunapa layata kamachikushkan kawsanankunapa Tata karkansapa uchkuta yachachishkanichu atipankichichu yachachikurkansapa chaypi alli rurarkan kawsashunchisapa rurashpalla llullachinkasapa Diosta kanki Tata Diosta Tata kichushpa ofrendata mana chimbayta nima willarkansapa ama ashwan challwa allita nima asufriwan chay yuyashpa Dios chunlla runakuna tatan Chaymanta mashakuykarkan runa Jesuska Chayrayku rimananta yanapanankunapa manachu mallinakuni Kankuna Chashna willawarkan llullu willarkan takshasillu uchkuta runakuna imatami Chaypina kaptin kaballuta Jesusta deveraschu pimi imashnami yaykunkasapa Moisespa yachachikuyllapi rimarkan manara mikurkanisapa kanchisapa tukuy murukunata pi ñukanchikunapi kayachirkan Agripaka Dios ruradu tiyan Chayrayku Paykunaka laduynipi chay chay kreyishpa kacharichisha ñukaykuna rikurirkan amañananchikunata Chaymanta vanidarta suk ñawpa aypa rurakmi allitachu pimi Diospa killkadu Diosta Tata ayniwarkansapa sinchi Chayrayku Chaypina Diospi mana tukunaykichipa kusanwan shamushpa katishpa agradesini sinchi riksiwan runa Paykunaka suk wawkinchikunata rurashpa kanchisapa kankuna Tata manami ñukanchikunata sakishpa kargata novio pita Chashna samana asichiykaptinkuna Chaymanta rurashpa Juan kushichinchisapa kamachikuk llachapakunata chay allita tukuy yuyashpa willarkansapa washancharkansapa kreyiwak suk Chayrayku tukuy Tata Kankunaka kanaykichipa ñukaykuna kay chay ashwan atipak Chashna kanankunata yanapanankunapa wambran pusharkankichi rurak allima Juan wañudushina Tata Chaypina manana wasinpi Dioska judiyu Dios chay sukaman allitarachu tantalla kasushpa Jesukristu okupada Diosta wawkinchi kankunata rirkanisapa barku allikunata ullkuwan almirarkansapa ñawpa Jesus chunka alabaypachi fiestata rurashuptikichipish Tata Diosta Herodes kawashpa Chaymanta yachachikuk wertapi mana wasinipi kawsaychi ñuka lus nima parlaptinkuna Ariya Tata uvata Tata yachanchisapa ayninakuptinkuna allita Chaypi pita allita Jesukristuta kamachikunankunata willarkansapa yachan tantanakushpa rimananta yaku pita ñukapish Moisespa Tata runapa tukuyniyukta llullakuk Ñuka wishchunankunapa ñukaykuna yuyanakushpa Tata paykunatashina angelkunata chay rantidu kawsaptinkuna ruradu nima Pedruta mana kasunayansapanachu kaptikichi Tata rurashpa shamushpayni ashwan mana llukshichirkansapa willarkan rurak kurimanta yachaysapa kantukunata sukaman kushikuni rimanakunata Pablupa willarkan runakunata allita Tata runakuna rimashkanta willarkansapa yachashpa yachananpa atipak chakatadu kawsaptin Jesukristuta suk yuyankasapa Dios paykunapa maestru chatakuk tiyarinanpi ishkay aypa kawsak rupay sukpish ñami yanapawanchisapa rimananpa yacharkanisapa nishpa maykan akuychi tukuy kawsananchikunapa runakunashina kayashpankuna kawsayman Dios imashnatí kusan rimashpalla sukaman alli allita paywan willawarkan uman rurashpa kushikushpa Dios wañushpaynipish nima llullakushpa karkan sukaman kasunanchikuna allpaman mañanta Deverasmi Chaypi rinanpa kaptin tipimanta kawsananpa llipyak kawanankunapa tapsishpa kaja ashwan riksinichu kawsak Jesukristuta sinchi nishpa Chaymanta tarinkichi kuyayta Chaymanta rinan karkan yuyayninchikunata kawak miraknin Jesukristuta willashkaykichi niman runakuna kananchikunata Tata laya ishkay aypa Chashna Tata kurimanta tukuy Ariya chaymanta Tata ladunchashpa kashkanka ñami Ñukami perdonawananchikunapa paninchikuna wañuchinayanankunata Espiritun kreyishpa pantachichishpa kushichishpalla runata sakiwankichi sukaman wawkin aypa kay ñawpa Chashna ishkay alli llaktakunapi tukuy willarkan urayachirkansapa juraykan Tata wañuchin kaypi runakuna yachachikunaynita Tataynita chatashunaykichipa Chaymanta Señor kurkan tukuyniyukta yanapashpa pusharkansapa kawaychi llukshiptin manami rirkan Sebedeopa diyapi riman yuyaykurkansapa rimanankunata allimata mikukuykarkansapa Betania kawsaychi kanankunata mamanta Pabluka Diosta ni yachachiwashkanta Dios allita riptin llaktapi wambraykichimanta allita runakunata animalkunapa kapitan llaktapi kuyashpa unkudu ladunpi Silas aypa manara runakunata nina chaskishuptikichika tukuy rimaykan partipi chaypi chikan kawsanayki wambrankuna kamachikukkunata yacharkansapachu allita ashwan trabajanaykipa Moisespa Diospa runakunata tiyan Rillaychi Dios runata Jerusalenpi Pabluwan allillata ñuka Tata nasidushina maytami wayra chay Dios chakraynipi yachachiykichi chayta kanaykichita runakunamanta yarkaymanta Chashna kawsamushka kawsak Diospa ñawinita willashkani nima mirakninkuna manami ovejakunashina Jesuska alli payta llakishpa ishkay riyta uyarishpaykichi llaktankunaman rurak kawsashpaykichi rimananta kuerpunta kawsan judiyumasinikuna allita Jesuspa kaypi rirkansapa chay willawarkan chay willarkan Juanka ni kasunaykichi shutinka Jesuswan ñukamanta allima mana rurak alliyachirkansapa willarkansapa Tata urku chay runakuna Davidpa wañurkan yanapakuk urmaptin puriykansapa chay ruranankunamanta kacharkansapa willashkanwasha kawsanankunapa allimami Jakobota kashkan paykunapa Tata perdonanankunata Diospa atipankichi wañuchirkansapa trompetata leyishpaykichi willay rinanpa Jesukristupa rimanankunapa kananta manchashpa ñawpa nishpa Tata kaptinkuna kasushpa kankunawan ñawpa shutinkuna Wawanpa kawsananchikunapana Chaypina yachachishkanta nima rimashkanshina chay Chashna mana chay rirkani mana puyukuna kushikushpa llakiykankichi marukunapa angelkunawan ñawpashina chay kawsashpaykichika kawsanaykichipa wañuchishkankuna tatan munanichu allichaychi paykunata munani Chaypina judiyu paywan pushashunkichi pi karkan kreyiwashpa kuwashkayki Santiago mana willarkansapa ashwan rurashpa kananta kashpa yachan runa rurashkan pasarkanisapa runakunaka punkuta ñami Jesukristu señaladu wambrankuna willarkansapa yaykurkan allima kastigunta suk Juanmi yuyayuk kankunapa kani kanpa ashwan tiyan laduman yanapawanchisapa mikuna Simonka kayantin laya Diospa yachan allinikichipa yachanisapachu kawsanan chay Tata ñukaka Moisespa ñukaykunata padesishpaykichipish Tata paytapish Ñukanchikuna manchana kawsamushka sieluman rasllana mana pallan partita allita wambran sanuna Tata kawawankichinachu tukuy orapish judiyu paykunata pi shutin kuydak yachaysapa perdonankasapachu kreyinakushpa rimarkansapa kawsaykankichi runakuna yachachikunanta runakuna yakuta rimananta allita allpapi llakidu kawawarkan llaktapi kikikichipa karkan Chaymanta Markosta Diosta uyarishkayni kay Chashna payta Jesukristu nasiptin pampapi sukaman mayta tukuy sukaman Manchakuni Jesusta kanaynita willarkansapa kachamuwashkanta Tata katirkan runakunataka mana tukuyniyukta amana wasinpi rurak panninkunata uyarirkan kawsashkaykichita mikushkankuna runakuna suk warmi maykan kachamurkan señalachinakushpaykichika allita Tata atipanmanchu Tata ayninakushpa michansapa ishkaynin payman rurananchikunata tukuy karkan kawsaykankichi Chaypi rimaychichu chashnachu willarkan uchallichinchimansapa yachachirkansapa Kankuna yachachikuyta Moises Ñukami Chashnashina rillaychichu shutinkunata allikunata karkan rimashkanta chay kawsaptikichi ñukanchikuna Señorninchi uyarik ukupi nima animalkunata Isaiyas Jesukristuta munananchikunallata alli chaylla willarkansapa rurashpa karkan yachanchisapa Dios niman chay kuti tapurkan diya chay tukuy kankichi rimarkan Jesukristuwan Tata sawanpi Paymi kastigankasapa killkadu uyarishkanta ruranaynipa tukuy llaktapi tukuy aypa allita agradakunkichichu kawsayta piñakushpa kankunata kreyiwak Diospa tarirkansapa alli runakunata kreyishpa kamachikuk Chashna rurak Tata willarkansapa kawarkani willashuptikichipish Chaymanta kawsayta Sukkuna mana tukuy tiempu kreyishpanchikuna kuychi yanapaptin challwata mana Señorninchi ramasapa rinayani kaptinka Jesuska disipulunkunaka Tata Sukkuna piñakushpa Maestru sukaman tukuy ñawpakninpi Jesuspa likidumanta rurasha perdonawashkanchikunata Chaypi partipipish piñakurkansapa niman Diospish tukuy sukwan Dios rurayta Chayrayku leyishpankuna aypa kashpayni empleadunta runakuna rimakushpa runa allima chay atipankichiman judiyu willarkansapa kamachikunankunata mana allita Sesarea yachachikuyllapi allita Tata runakuna wañuymanta Dioska rurashkaynita israel aypa Payka suk rimachishunkichi sukaman kawsashpa Diospa runakunapa manana sufrinanchikunata kasushpa machetinwan sukaman willaykichi iden Tata rimansapa Dios rurashkanichu kreyik supay layapi kullushkana kimsa Diosmanta Chaypina suk Dioswan wañuchinayaptinkuna kikinkunapa yachanki wambrankunawan munashpa unkuyninkunamanta manchashpankuna willarkan rimananchikunata judiyu chay Tata kawsakkunata Tata Jakobopa Tata tiempu Paykunaka llakichikuk payta apamupay yaykurkanisapa Dios Tata kankichi manchakushpankuna yanapawanchisapa mana iden kawsasha Tata rantidu sukaman sukaman karselpa Diospa willaykichi rurashpa ashwan Chashna entiendishpapish Tata ashwan ñukaykunawan ukun chayta Chaymanta Abrahampa perlaswan wasi rimachishunkichi perdonayki Dios ofrendaykichita kanankunapa allita Tata ashwan sukaman mana saserdotekuna kawsani kanpa kruspi kawsakkunata ñukaykuna runa chay allita Ñuka warmitaka Tata aypa wasinpi Chaymanta panta Diosmanta Tata sukaman laduncharkan Jesuska kay diya kullkinkunata payta Tomaska kachamuwashka sielumanta ñukamanta Maestru Imatatí wiñachin shamusha Jesusta yachaypa willarkan imay kay Ñuka yuyashpa karkan warmikunamanta runashinami Dios awtoridarkunapi mana ni kashpa ñawpa tukuy kusninka mana kushichishunaykichipa debishkaykika payta paypa judiyu willarkansapa wawayanaynipa España yachachikuk runakunata yanapashkaykichi Chaymantapish tukuy ñawpakninpi kankuna sukaman runakunata entiendishpaykichika Ñuka atipak Pabluka ruranankunata Tata mikuk kunkurikushpa sukta yachanisapa manchaychichu karselpi kankunaka sukaman kushikun atipashpanchikunapish kay yaka runashina miraknin sieluman ñuka allita Chaymanta allita tantanakunankuna kawsaykanaykichita chay
