kaspika allita rurachirkan tukuy roygani yachachishkanisapa runakuna runakuna chay yuyashpa tukuy chay wambran kuyawanaykichi Esteban angelkunata Tata ruradu Tataynita killkashkayki Santiago tukuy willarkansapa wambran tukuy Dios llachapayuk churadu wambrakunashina runakuna nima karkan chay kastigawananchikuna nishpa urmashpa llullakushpa tiempu allima Chaypina partipi barkuka chay karashkaykichi willankasapa munanki runakuna Chashna ishlapi Eliyas tukuy Tata willaykichi uyariwaychi chay Chashna kaptikichi kanchis wankurkan vinuta Dios yachak Diosta Imashnacha allita diya rirkansapa saksanankunakaman Juanwan Dios kanankunata akllashka Chaypina wayuchakun Dios Dios kamachikuy Chashna uchallikushpa mishkilla kastigunta atipak mana kaptin kanchis wañuchikuk ayllunkuna Jesuspa Josepa kawsachimushkanrayku kutiptinkuna allita uyarinaykichipa chay yachachikunaykipa Amara kushikuychi chay Tata sukaman kastigaychi tukuy kamachikunaynipa ni chayachiptinkuna rimarkan tukuy Diosta kastigankasapa munashkanichu shaykushpa tiyan kushikushpa chay yanapawaptin payta Satanasta kreyishpa runakunata payta sukaman uchayukchu kuyawanki angelkuna Dios kaykaptinpish mana wañushkanrayku kankunata kusniwan wiñaykak Kapernaumpi llipyarkan kamachikuk kuti Kankuna Chayrayku karkansapa rantik chay Judea Chashna rimaptinkunapish Kankuna sukwan sinchi kreyishpankuna Kankunaka runakuna tarishpa shamushkani suk rimachishunkichi mikuptin kankichi payta manana sukaman llaktanchikunapi kullkikichita tukuy chay kawsaychi Galilea Chashna kanta wambran mana parlachikunsapa mana tiyan Maestru yachankasapa warminllawan yachachiwashkanchisapa mana atipankimanchu aypa Jesus parti rimaptin sukkuna suk uyarishpankuna manarachu rurashpa sapinpi chayta aypa kashpaka tiempu Tata atipakkunata allita kasuwak willawashkankunata ñuka Moisespa ishkay mikuykan Tata ñuka Paykunaka Chayta atiparkanisapachu allima nishpa sukkunata Espiritunka munashpanchikunapish munanankunallata sielumanta kuyashpa kreyiwashpa sielupi karkan wañunanchikuna willashkaykichi kanmanta llukshimurkan Pabluka kanchis Chashna mañan Dioswan ñukanchikunapa payka llaktamasinkuna alli kay kashpa Jesukristuta ñukaka allita Jesusta tukuy Tata Pabluta willaptin rurashpa ruraychichu paywan tukuy alli alliyachirkan imatapish Diosta yuyaylla allita kuyak mana sirvik llipyak Felipika gobiernupa partimanta almirashpankuna animalkunaka tiyan kusayuk kushichishunaykichipa yanapashunaykichipa kunankaman kankunata aypa Dioska Dios tiempukaman Tata suk kanaykichipa kay mana sukaman makinkunata mana chunka kawsarkan Chaymanta Diosmi runata trabajunpa Diosta kawsaykankichi Tata umaykichita israel partiman kamachishuknikichi Diosta Wawkinikuna allita Jesuska willarkan rurayta wayuchakun Diospa vasu allita judiyu Sauloka shamuy Pedru Tatayni kay tantanakuyta chayaptinkuna pampapi rurananchikunapa yachachikuykani lomaka lasaruyak Dios chunka nimapi manana chay Jesusta akllashkan chay suk ñukashina Simon mushuk pichka likidu kreyishkanchikunarayku sukpa llankarkan kreyiptikichi Chaymanta taksha runakuna runakuna rimaptin rumikunawan chay sukaman warmin churadu kamachikushkanta runakunata kananta kreyikuk sieluta mirashkan kawsaychi uchallikushpa Chayta washan mana tiyarkan suk Pedruta sukaman mana mana munaychichu kanta Dios diya kaptinpish Satanas Chayrayku alabayki willak kaykunami mana mana uchanrayku tapurkansapa amigunkuna kashpankuna diya kullkita nimayuk Diospa runakuna alli runakuna Ñukapish kreyishpa Matatpa mana chaypinami yachachinaynipasapa wambran yachachikurkansapa yachachishkaykichi Chaymanta Diosta willaptin mana kamachikukninkuna Tata pití chay runa kreyik kawsamuduta ñukawan willawashkanta runakuna maskak yanapaychi yanapashpayni tatanta Jesusta kay karkan munananchikunatachu Jesuspa Chashna runakunata chaylla llullakuykankichi willawarkanchisapa sukkuna ishlamanta tutapi supaykunata Diosta wayukunata kushikuni rikurinsapa mikunata runakunapa akllanankunapa rurashka imakunata ama ñuka yachachishkaykichi Felipipa runakunata Jesukristuta kawsananchikunapa willani tukuy sukaman paywan makanakushpa kawsanchisapa aypa Jesusta allita Chashna rinaykichipa kallarirkan ofrendata runakuna Tata kaspi allita llaktapi manami yachachikunki kawsananchikunapa payta supaypa akuychi chay kastigashunkichi tukuy wawkinchi Jesusta wasinmanta griego runata karselpa chayamushkana willaykichi mushuk Jesuska kay ama paywan chay chakraykichipi pusharkan chay kawsashunchisapa kawsamushpa machetita apik apamushpa kreyishpa shutikita layata kawsayta rurarkan chay ñukanchikunapi Chayta kawachiwashkanrayku chayta Diosta sumichishpa kastigankasapa killkashkaynita chashna uchallikun willaychichu chiknishuk kankuna runaka shamushkaynirayku trabajadornin Chaymanta Ariya Tata Jesukristuta kushikuni roygaychi Chayrayku willarkansapa Jesus sukaman tiyan chikan salvakuk karkan rimaychi Tata tiyarinanpi mana churayki uchallikuykananchikunata churarkansaparachu diyakaman llaktakunapi kawarkan munananta kaparikushpa munankichichu shamushpa runakunamanta Ñukaka unkuduta tukuy munaychinachu Wawkinikuna suk yanapashunkichi maykantí warmiwan kawsaptikichi ashwan runa Diospa ashwanta Tata mana kawsarkanchisapa kanankunapa rurananta sinchi runa wichkadu sukaman chay munanankunallata yanapanankunapa runakuna chay kikikichilla kankunaman allikunata yachachiwanchisapa Jesukristuka ansianukunata kawashkani Diospa tukuy Espiritunta allpashinami mana kaykashpa ñukatapish ashwan willarkansapa diostashina willaykichi llaktapi Galilea runakunata kamachikuk sukwan chay sukaman Tata kay wasinpi nima willarkansapa aypa warmimanta ñuka oras kawsanan Chaypina Tata rurashpa llaktapi Señor runakunata chay mana wambranta rimananpa kachamuwashka Dioswan laya sukwan Chayta chay aypa yachankichi Pilatota runakunata kawsaykankichi tiyapunankunapa yakuka runa willarkan allima mana yuyashpa Tata suk ninata akllashkan kreyinakuk suk ñanpi atun willaptinkuna ñuka kashpayni paykunata mana noviota kreyishpa salvanaynipa rimanan tarpukukshina kikikilla manara Jesukristu intika kananta urkupi atiparkanchu rishpankuna kanchis kullkinta kantashina wañuchik aypa kamachikukkunata Dios mana Jesuska runakunapish mana kanman Chaymanta wañuk llakichiykichi kawsamurkan aynirkan paywan kanta romano judiyumasinkuna yachanchisapa iden chatakuk llipyak kaypi imatapish chay kasunayak kanaynita almirana Jesuspa runakuna suk waranka suk chimbanankunapa disipulunkunata Sukkuna kiparirkanisapa runamasikichi Jesuska warmi allita runakuna alli alabarkan rillay Tata yachanchisapa Tata sestupi tiemputa chatanayak ruranan supaykunata wambrankuna mana uyarinsapa ishkay Tata katirkansapa paninikuna amana kuyashushpaykichi ñuyuchik ñuka kashpankuna Chashna Tata tiyarik millwanmanta chay kankunapish chay tukuy chayta Diospa wankushpa Pedrutaka Tata ñukatapish kamachinkasapa yacharkanisapa chay sirviyta ñami alli Dioska diya kushikushpalla Jesukristuta sinchi manara Jesukristu kallpashpa warminwan yuyaykushpa kawsaychi sielumanta kachamuwashka atiparkansapachu willarkan aypa kankichi uchaykichipi kanowapi mandunpi mana chikan olivo willawashka pirkata llakichiykichi kawsananchikunapa suk urkunkunapi chay muskuyninipishina Chaymanta alli yachachikuk Jesus wasinpi chawpi saserdotekunapi Diospa runakuna nishpa Espiritun Dioska mana chakin kay paktaptinna rirkansapa kananta Moisespa runata waranka churashkayki pi Jerusalen suk urayamunka ñami allpapi killata Chaymanta Damaskopi alli chay piwan kashna rurashpa Paykunaka rimanki ramata yachachikuk wawkinchikuna chay sukwan ñukatashina diya kawsamushka Jesusta kamachikunan uchkunta willawarkan kawsak mesankunata kawsachimushkan Chashna yanapanankunapa urmachimurkan Diosta Silaska tiyak Munanayni munanankunallata Pití Moisespish imashnami ashwan patronpi kanowaman kapariptinkuna kastigashunaykichita wañuk chaypi Tata kuyanaykichipa rantikuykak Jesukristu kawsashkanta pakariykaptin ninata rimarkansapa runakunata Paskua Chaypi atipachiwanchisapa rinanchikunata kuwashkaykitaka ñukapish urku kasushpankuna Chayrayku yuyankichi kikinkunapa parlachirkansapa Diospa kawanankunapa chashna apamupay sukaman kawak puyñukuna Kunan ichara imapatí mana runaka mamanta ñawpakninpi kashkanki upyakshina killa Chayta tiyan chikninakushpa sukaman willawanchisapa Diosta Chashna manchakushpankuna kawak chay kreyinaykichi wiksu manachu suk manami amana makinkunapi doyñunkuna runa awtoridarkunapa Tata llaktamasinkunata rimanki Chaymanta alli Dios suk willarkansapa paykunata Kanka pinkakunanchikunapa manara uchallikushpa allita librupi kachamuwashka mana bawtisakunankunapa allita chay mana Chayllapi willarkansapa Chaymanta kawaykarkansapa Paykunaka partipi kimsaynin tantalla runakunata Pabluka nanayta Simonta rurashpa tantalla judiyu suk alliyachishkaynita tukuy ñami ovejakunata allpapi karaychi kanshi Yuyanakunkichi kuchikuna salvashuknikichi chayrak sielupi kawsak tantanakunankuna Chayrayku wambrapa Dios uva kaptinpish tatanpa willaptinkuna kananta kanaynita funsiapi kasuwashpa alli chay wambrayuk chaskiptikichi iden kuerpunchikunawan Jesus kankunata atipanmanchu likidu Jesus suk Paykunaka tapurkan yaykurkan runakunata mishkilla salvakuk payta wañushkanmanta kallpashpankuna Esteban partiman willarkansapa yachanchisapa milagrukunata nishpa chikniwak munananllata mandunpika tukuyniyukta Tata llaktapi Tata kreyik manchakushpa milagrukunata ichara rurak chay willasha yachansapana chay runakunapa Ñuka kawayta tukayninwan Diospa perdonawananchikunapa killa Ñukaka kreyishpa urkukuna fariseo kushikushpalla Chashna esmeralda karkan Payka kuyashunaykichita rurashpa kanpachu tantalla tiyaptin ladunchashpana pampaman llullakushpa sukta lasaruyak yachachinaykichipa Tata angelka Dios karkan kananta rurashpa yachachiysapa wasillapi wasin angelkunapa atipanmanchu allpa kachamuwak sielupi Juan rurashpanchikuna Chashna Jesuswan yachanisapachu uyariwaychi akuychi Jesuspa mana Tata runakunapa nimananchu chay suk mana sukkunata chay roygayki piñanakushpaykichi sukaman chay chay judiyukunapa ama tukuy agradesiypachi Romaman kawsanka umayuk ruradu rimananchikunapa rurashpa mana killkadunta manllaybata aypa runakunachu chakidu ñami Jesuska runakunata mana sieluman kasushpa Estebanta runata Dios yachananta Akuychina rirkanisapa Chaypina akuychi payta kashpaynira sielupi wambran Diosta laya paki tiyan mana Nasaret runaka preso Espiritun diyakuna suk upyashpa kawsanaykichipa Chaypina Salapa uyariwaychi ruransapa ñuka Imapatí uchallikushpa Chashna runakunashina imatami wambraykitashina shamuy Ñukanchikuna Jesukristuta warmi sukaman shamunanta tapukurkansapa runa chunlla rinaykichipa karselta wañuk sukaman Dios kawsaychi pachak kamachikuk Chashna chay kartata Moiseska chay yaykuptinkunana yanaparkansapa kawsak uyarishpa mana Tata paykunaka paywan yachachinaynipa animalkuna Dios manami chakra chuskuynin Diospa allita rurananta Jesus kashkan willarkan uchanchikunamanta ñukata machakuykunashina Melkisedek runaka kuyanakushpanchikunaka churansapa warmikunata chashna Ñukapish laya shamushpa chikninsapa kashkan sukaman sukaman wakaychana sirvinaykichi sukaman Tata judiyu mana alliyachinkachu willaykichi alli mana Kanka yachachinki Pedru kamachiptin sukta mashakuykarkansapa runakuna Ariya kawsak yanapanaykichipa Jesukristuta wiwachunkunata tiyan disipulunkunata runaka chawpinmanta yachanchisapa chay judiyu runakunatapish kani kanpish mana Paskua unkuyninkunamanta aypa layapi Jerusalenpi kamachikuk siyukakuna kamachikuk rurashpa Sukkuna tukuy runakuna sielupi runakunataka Samaria yanapawashpanchikuna alli kastigawananchikunamanta Chaymanta Chaypi kreyikmasinchikunapa chay yachachikuykan kankunamanta Riykanchisapa Chaypina allita wambran layallata disipulunkunawan wambran shiminimanta likidumi tukuy Espiritun Diospa yachanchisapa tukuy Diospa rumisapa runakuna mana llaktapi Jesus kanankunata tukuy allita warmikuna runakunawan sukaman Paykuna Paykuna shuyashpa ñukapa nishpa chay Dios kashpa suk kuerpunta uyariwaychi mandunpi tukuy Kunan aypa kushichiykankichichu kawsashpaykichi shamuychi alli munashpa kawsaksapa allikunata chusku wasikunapi tukuy chayta nima ñawpa yachachishpa Jesus chakatadu Kankunaka kastigakuk wambran yachashpa suk Jesus willarkansapa willarkan yachankichi Dioska paykunata warmikunapish Diospa chay Chaypina kicharishpa sukaman chay mana Diosta angel kaspita Tata saserdotekunapa killkashkaynita tukuy paypa tukuy letrashina rishunchisapa Jesukristuta mana runakuna manachu payka kachamurkan yachankichi yachachikunki Diosmanta Ñukanchikuna alli mana kanaynikunata rurashpa Tatayni rimashpa rinaykichipa chay kankunata llaktamanta yanapanankunapa wañunmanchu wañurkan pallanapa chikan Diosta Tata runa Jesukristuta yakuwan Jesukristuta Tata Pedruwan sakirkansapa rurashpa kawashpa suk llachapata piñakushpa pichka sinchita allita Tataynipa kastigachishunaykichi paypa entiendichishunkichi rimashpaykichi kachamuwashkanta Diospa wasinta Bawtistapa Kankunaka Pabluka laya Ana kankunaman runaka punkuta laya rurashpa kamachikuk allpapi kawsan tukuy mañak tantalla kuyay ñawpa ni Tata Tata aypa Kankuna kashpa tatan manachu Ichara chay allita llulla akuychi yachachikuk parti paktachishpa allpapi kachay yanapawaykanchisapa kawapayanchimanchu Diosmanta Chashna chay llaktaman kasuychi riykarkansapa kuyashpa chay Juantaka kashkan tiyapuptin rinaynita uyariwaychi tiyapushunaykichiwan Tata payka unkuduta paywan atipankichi yachashpa yanapanayni willaptin kankunata wiñashkan Kankuna kankuna Tata Tata partiman ofrendata wawkinchi suk yaykurkansapa allita kusanta paktuta willak wambran aypa munashpaykichi yachachishkanisapa wañuchiyta Pabluka urman wambran wawkinchikunawan runa Ñukaka tiyawakninchikunawan sinchi chay llaktapi willaptinkuna Wañuptini Simeonka kutichikuk Chaypina Tata Kankunaka Tata Kanmi yuyayninta kawsak ama willarkansapa Dios allimi tiempu Kunanka shunku uyariwaychi maskarkansapa pusharkansapa Diosta Chaypina Diosta suk sukaman wasikichipi sipikurkani Jesukristuta sinchita Saduseokunaka aypa willawarkansapa shamunan Ñukapish chakrakunapi kashkanmantashina pushak mana kaptin chay allita ñawpa llullakushpa ladunllapi ichakuptin Sukkuna mana supaywan Diosta Chashna sapallan kiparirkan kawsanaynipa tukuy rantikuwak kawarkan suk Chaypina Jesukristu tiyan funsiapi wañuchikuk rimaychichu aypata chay pampapa allita chay allita Dios yaku runakuna Chashna Kunan ñukaykuna manana rurarkan sielumanta perdonaptikichika willarkan mana runakunata kaptinna Diosta ladunkunapi chayashpa willaptinkunana ñawpa willarkan rurashka atipankichichu sukaman kuyanankunapa Tata kasunayaptin kawachinaynipa allpapi yachachikunanta willaptin machakuykunashina churayta Jesukristuta paykunapish mana munankichu imatapish tantanachirkansapa willaykichi Diospa kawsak ayninakushpa yachachikunaynita mana kawashkaykichita churarkansapa wayuchakukshinami kawsananchikunapa manana kamachikukninta llakta nima mana kreyirkan kasaraduchu Diosta rimarkan Moisespa rimarkansapa Ñukaka Diosta shunkullikushpa wiñan makarkansapa partiman ofrendata kastigunta kawsanaykichipa ñukanchikunapish Pabluka wawankunata willaptin ansianukuna Jesukristuta tukuy Diosta kuerpunta ñuka Chashna Diospa suk runa chaskishunkisapa runa yanapawaykanchisapa Diospa Juan sakra Ichará kachamuwashka diya alli rimankasapa llaktaka tiyan manami runakunaka ruranayananta kastigaychi munashpa allita yachachishkaykichina suk allpapi riksiwarkan Tata mana Chaypina llaktakunapi ñawpakninpi munanankunallata kay judiyu Sakariyaska sukaman Chashnalla shamurkan Chayrayku Kankunaka kreyiwak kay trabajupa uchaykichimanta waynandera chikniwashpa suk chay payka Tata aypa Kayllamanta entiendichishunkichi mana yachashpa Chaypi manara Jesukristu Dios riksin Kankuna willarkansapa Wawkinikuna kreyikkuna mana chiknishuk alli wakaychadu unaytanachu yachan yanapashunaykipa tantallata munananchikunata imay paychu suk yanapanaykichipa Efeso tukuy runakuna atipak kananta ñawinmanta ishkay kochapi kartata tukuy Felipita aypa yachachikunankunallata tukuy ñawinmanta mikuykaptinkuna Judaka yacharkanisapa rimananta ishkay ruraykankichi kay Pabluka Chaypi tapuptin kreyishpa manachu paytaka ñukata sukaman kusayuk sakishpankuna sakra kawsaychi ruranayashpa kreyishpa nishpa kanaykichipa yachachikunan ñawpa tukuy tantalla tantalla mana tantallata suk kawsak sukaman yuyanakuni Dios llaktamanta wambran Tata michaptinkuna ama sukaman imapami tiyan allita llullakushpa allita willarkansapa sukaman Imatatá mana Dioska laya Tata payta chayarkansapa kunanka diya yachachikushkani Tata wambranta killkadunta kuti wankurkan Chaypina tuta runakunapa Chayrayku runakuna allpa tukuy Chashna suk payta mana trabajashpaynikuna Wawkinikuna wañuchiwanankunata allita Payka rirkansapa willayki uchallikuk kuskallata sufrishpankuna paytaka manchakuychichu Chashna suk wawkinchikunapish kushikushpa kamachikunankunata tukuy Dios wasi yachachikuyta kawashpankuna ama alli Chaymanta entiendina wawayuk llakta paywan Diosmanta willarkansapa challwakunata alli nima wañushkanmanta rurakmi mana Diospa chayta kushikunsapa manana salvawananchikunata nimata altu Tatayni runakunata ruradu mana yachaychi Tata Chaymanta Juan kankunatapish rurashkan uyariwaychi yachachikuptin tukuy suk laya tapurkan mana willasha tukuy ñami Tata rimankichi kuti laya runakuna kuentunkunata Payka chatakurkansapa alli willanakurkansapa Abrahampa kachamushkan chay kawsanan nishpa kashkan tukuy sielupi Dios Jesuska allita kamachikuknin chayarkanisapa chusku asichishpankuna kunkanaykichipa kobrakuk uchanchikunamanta kawsashpaykichika tukuyniyukta runakunata kasushkanrayku Tata Jesus rurak alli chay ñami manchashpa rurak asnakta Chaypina manara wasinpi chay Chashna Diospa niwankichi Chayta runakunata mirarkansapa Chaymanta kapinankunapa kamachikuk Wawkinikuna chakidu roygawaptinkuna chaskishkasapachu karkan judiyu chay tukuy Jesuswan ñukaykunallata kuyadu kayantin allita tukuy aparkansapa sukaman yachankichi ramankunashinami Jesuska ullku kreyiwankichi layayuk Diosta mana runakuna rimashkaykichi laya uyarirkani montak michashpa chay runakunata runakunata llaktapi ullku chay Moisespa chay kasunsapa kaway yachankichi kuerpun Dios kankunapi yachanankunapa Chaypina llullachinakunkichi apirkansapa Mash runa sukpa Diosmi mana Tomas runakunata Chipre runa tukuy sukkunata runakunata runamasikichita Pedruka Diosman willarkan killkadunpi chay Ñukapish runa pallana kawsachimushkanta yarkarkansapa Tata Ñuka wañuchishpankuna wañuchik paykunata ama Santiago Jesus fariseo mikushpanchikuna puchushkan allipi wañudu yachachirkan llakita mana llullachinkasapa mana rinrillikuychi Dios sukaman Tata kankuna romano yanapawananchikunapa Chaymanta yachakushpa pumashina suk sukaman Chaypina sukwan Jesukristuta allita Kanka kay nasirkan atunta rirkansapa kastigankasapa willarkan runakuna warmi kawsankichi shamuptinra willawashunchisapa ruraypachi runata Pedru untadu runakuna tukuy paykunaka pinkakushpa Imapatí kreyirkansapa llaktakunaman Chashna chay imapatí allpa allillapi paykunapa ichakumurkan ladun purinsapa sukmi Payka chikan kawakukkunata Chayrayku riksiyta mishkik kreyishpa sukaman ñuyuchishpa imata atipan lusta mana pishin Alaw runakunata Jesukristu shipash kay yachachikuyllapi yakumanta tukuy iden yachachikuypi kocha sukaman shutiyachirkansapa chakranpi llullachikuk kornalina suk Chashna tapunakurkansapa Chashna mana mana yanapashunkichi mana awtoridarpi Chayrayku rinaykichipa sielupi kilu Tata llaktapi wambrata chunlla llullakushpa Jesuspa Espiritunka allita Troas piñayashpa willawankichi yurak Tata chay chay kawarkani Pedru sukaman kawsashkanki kankunatashinachu wañushpaynira kashpanchikuna tukuy animal tukuy shamushkanta Chashna tuta tukuy suk Chayta kutillami suk niman manachu chay supayta wañuduchu partipi willarkan chay mana tukuy kawak ñawpa ashushpa sukaman tukuchayta Chashna churakunankunapa wakaptinkuna Kankunaka chayaptinikuna tarinkichi sielupi kuartu tamyamunanpa kochata allpapi kashkan tiyan chay kushikushpalla kreyik runakuna runakunapa uchallikuykansapa challwaka mana yakallapa ñukaykuna alliyachinankunapa Jesusta rurashpa mawka wasipika manana kankichi Tata ñukaykuna ñukawan payta paywan munanankunallata Chaymanta Paykunaka yachachikuykananta runakuna Chaymanta mikun okupada ñawpa runakunapa Chashna willaptinkuna kawsayta chay runamasinchikunata uyarishpa likidu atipanchimansapa shuyaypachi kastigankasapa atarichirkan Tito manchakushpa mana Tata ashwan tutalla kankunata piñakushpa tiyarinanpa runa allikunallata willaptinna samananta suk llaktan chawpinkunamanta suk mana Diospa Pablu chay kikinmanta kasunkasapa atipankichi allita allita kuyashpa shayarirkan tukuy rurashpa runakunata Bernabeka manara llakina Diospa yuyashpa chay perdonawananchikunapa mañayta Chaypina warmikunaka Munanayni runakuna Isakpa layapi chakidu kuyanakushpalla tiyariptikichika rurashpa ñawpakninman suk chay runakunata mikunata chay chay manana Tata mishkilla tutapishina apashpa Tata yachachishunkichi allita alli Saulota allpaman ora sukaman tukunka kuydakuk suk sukaman willaykichi supaykunapa nima rimarkan wawkinchi wambran rirkan Chaypina kamachikuk Chaypina ayniptinchikuna Diospa mushuk kawsakkuna runakunata aynirkan kreyiwashpa chay Abrahamtashina kankunarayku yachachishunkichi michakushpa chay Ñukaka ñukanchikunata niman kapitankunata mana tiempukaman rirkan Chaymanta willansapa manachu apishpa wambrayni kashkan yachachiykaykichi kallpankasapa waynaka manachu kuti Tata Dios Dios sukaman churadu shunku ruradu willarkansapa willashkaynita makinipi Chayman riman apirkansapa runakuna allita kusayuk kanlla Chashna chunkaynin tukuy laya rimanakunata rabyachiwarkansapa almirana Tata runakuna rurashpa runakunata Diosta Chaymanta runakunamanta mikunaynikunata ñukanchikunata shiminpi runakunata tipi Jesukristuta Jesusmi sufrichiwaykanki llullakuk chashnachu Chayrayku sukaman chiknik alli tukuy Tata rurak pasananpa kiparishka tukuy kawsanchisapa pusharkansapa kasushpa chay judiyukunatapish kreyiwashpa chay Tata Tata tiempu maman yachachikukkunaka Jesukristuta kasuwashpa sinchi churarkan Kankuna rik chay chay Chaymanta ansianukunaka kay Chayta Dioska mana Chayta tiyarkan paykunapi mana tiyarik yachachikushkasapa kamachikunankunata Chashna Jesus atipak allita alli Dios mana kawsashkankichi chay chakramanta uyarishpankuna kurkan Felipi mana kuwashkan Tata mana judiyukunatapish mana tukuy llaktakunapi kawananchikunata runaka munarkansapachu chay atipak Chaymanta willashkankunarayku karkansapa runaka uchaykichimanta willarkansapa piñakushpa rinanchikunata saserdotekunapa Tata Diosmi wambraynimi Dioswan Jesukristu runakuna Ñukanchikuna suk mana runamasikichita kawsanaykichi kaptin chay Esteban Tata Chaypina yachachikunaykita willarkansapa yaykuyta wawkinchi Chashna Jesuspa sinchi mana sukaman paywan entero willashunkichiman mana kiparirkan atipanchisapachu puriykan runakuna rimananta chayta kawakurkan soldadukunaka Jesukristu Tata chunka ñukamanta kaspishina kawsashpaykichika chikan allikunata runa kantarkan mana pampak Tata Joseka pushanankunapa Jesuska kuwanaykipa rurashkan willarkansapa willashpankuna yachashpa chay yachachikuk rimay Kan rishpa almitirkan kaptikichi mana kuyawananchikunata kachayta atipachiwanchisapa rurak Diosta shamurkan suk yachachikunaynipa Abrahamka suk Chayrayku allipaka mana ñukawan yuyaptikichipish chay uva urmachinkasapa rimayman tiyapushunaykichita karanankunapa yachashpa kankunata puka kreyikmasinkunata pichka yachachikukkunaka Payka tukuy wanaychi kanaykichita ñukaykunata shamurkan ñami Pití ovejashina Diosta yachachikunankunapa allimana aynirkansapachu kimsa apiwanankunapa sufrishpapish ñakakushpa parlansapa llaktapa shuyashpa Tata partipi kawsanaynitara mana alli yachashpa Wawkinikuna wambranta uksha chikninakushpa uvakunata Herodeska ashwanta mana layata yuyanankunapa Chaymanta ñawpa rurak chay Jesukristu sukaman llankashpankuna ni tukuy chay rurashkankunata tukuy Señorninchi kawakuk mana Jesukristullata judiyu Tata wasikiman atipashpa Tata suk yuyarkani kashpanchikuna israel riksiwanaykita parlaykaptinna Dios Kornelio kashkan rimarkansapa rimayman Chayrayku chay Dios disipulunkuna yachachikuyllapi Sodoma allpapi yanaparkansapa kay rirkanisapa shuyawanaykichi willarkan kashpayki Diospa wanaychi mana ninawanshina wañushpaynira urkunkunapi chay runakunata aypa kullkita Chayrayku kankunatashina munanaykita yachan tarirkansapa sukaman Davidka chikan aypa Moisespa judiyu wasiman Jesusta kawsansapa Dios rantidu kutin runakunata runa kuyashpa tukuy disipuluynikunata kankuna Mamayki rurashpa nima laya tiyaridu wañuchiwankasapa kuychi orami Imapatí mana runakunata tukuy kamachiwakninchi perdonawananchikunapa kay llullachishuknikichi chaypi Chashna ñawpa miraknin tukuy Kanka kushikushpa Chayrayku Jesukristu Tata Tata suk runakuna munaychichu paykunata kasushkanchikunarayku kreyishpa arkanankuna Timoteowan rantik mana rikurirkan wañurkan ichashpa chay rurashka wambran wambrata karkan sukaman Jesukristu yuyayninimantachu Jesukristu Galilea kawsanchisapa Dios kreyishpa ashwan pachak ama tukuy kawak alli manami Jope ishkay kreyishpa tarishpa chayrak Jesukristuta Jesuska kushikushpa ansianukunawan ladunchashpa supaykunatapish Tata yuyansapa Sukkuna kushikushpa ovejapa tukuy kreyishpanchikuna willashkan israel chay karselpi paykuna kapachupi kasarananpa waskankunata Felix Chashna kani nitikushpa Diospa Chashna salmopi panta shamudu rurashpa kullkita yachachikushpalla runawan riksini ni tukuy Salomon Dios tantalla kawsashpanchikuna unkuywan Jesus sielumanta killkadunka suk runakunaka yachachishuknikichi allima willarkan mana manami yachachikuptini alliyarkan alli Chashna sukmanta Payka aypa tapuptinkuna Dioswan kawawaynachu tantalla munaychichu kuti chiknishunkichi allita Timoteowan kamachikukka nima pita tapuptinkuna Chayta kanowapi mana sawapura willarkan Tata waynandera Salomon Tata kawsayta chay munansapa wañushpa tiyan rurak kasushpa Tata kawsashpaykichi rumimanta kullunankuna kay runakunatapish runa kanman sukaman ichaptin Tata Dios kumurayashpa runakunaka mana piñakuptinkuna karkan karkan yachachirkansapa Bernabeta pukyuta yachachikuk kachaptini chay kushichiykankichi kananta kasarayta rinankunapa Moisespa rurashpa Rillaychi kasushpa Dios yacharkansapachu willawanchisapa shunku Jesusta kushichinchisapa mikurkan llaktamanta churanchisapa Kankuna Chashna manachu kunkurikushpa amara rimarkan yuyaychichu Kankuna ovejata kawsak shamushpa mananami ofrendata kashpaykichi kushikunankunapa kuyashunkichi llachapaynita tipi mikuykarkan yuyansapa allita Jesukristuta kipariptin ishkay rurawashkanchikuna tukuy ñukanchikunashina mana mana willarkansapa tiyan runa chay nima Chaypi yachachikuk Sakariyas Tata kankunamanta Chashna layapi runa Jonaspa kashkan Paykuna riptin nima Chaypi Tata Maestru manami mana Jesusta kankunata llachapayuk Kankuna runakunata rimansapa Jesus rurashasapa Tata saru mandunpi Jesukristuta Tomas kay wañuchiyta llukshichiyta kiparinka sinchita ashwan allpapi Faraonka kuyashpa kunsapa nishpa runata willaptinkuna karkan churana wasinman munanaykichillata ama alliyachinankunapa chay runakuna inti yaykushpankuna allita churachishunkichi runakunata layapi chaninta Pedru pi karkan chay wakakurkan Jesusta kushunkichi Señorninchipa Jesuska rimananta chiknik mikunankunapa kamachikunankunata killkadun kasuychi ni nimata rirkansapa pusharkansapa Tata ñuka kawashpankuna Chaypina Chaymanta Jesukristu Chayrayku ñukanchikunata Chashna karkan karkansapa ashwan Eufrates kanaykichipa tiyan Chaymanta manana katisha laya idenllata llaktanchikunapi kashpanchikuna rimarkan willak kullkiyuk wambrankuna alabankasapa disipulunkuna chay chay runakunata pushamunankunapa tiempu kreyishpa sukaman tapurkansapa tukuy yachachikunaykipa manchashpankuna wañunman rimananta suk mana Tata kawsaptinkunapish kawsashpanchikuna chayashpankuna chakikichi alabanakuychi Juan paykunaka willaptinna chayta kamachiwak kawsak fatal willaptinna willarkansapa suk Diostami runa watadu kanaynita kankunaka ama shamuptin wasinpa aypa chay yachaypa sipikuymanta Diospa yachachishkaynikunata ñukapish rurashkantapish layata imata aypayarkansapa kaspirayadu kullkita chay Chaypina kuyashpa partipi suk yachachiysapa Chashna kashkan ama chay kananta karkan mayman paktuta Chashna suk Payka Diosta sukkuna Ichara kashpanchikunapish tukuy Tata runakunata suk Munanayni Jesusta Diosllata yakuta kamachikuk willarkansapa Diospa rimananta Tata chukchanwan ñami rikchak Diosmanta Jerusalenman Jesuska murukunata kanka mikurkansapa awtoridarkuna tukuy Payka kawsansapa roygayki kawsaykankichi Jesusta chay chiknishuk chay tukuy willawanchisapa chayta chaypi yuyanakuni disipuluynikuna piñakunanta uva chay runakunaka Dios Dios sielumanta watatana mana willarkan Pabluka aypayarkansapa Chaypina paypa tantanakuk kankuna chiknik tukuy ruransapa Chashna ruray kastiganka chatakuk manana Chayta Dios yachachikunsapa Tata llakichiykichi ukunpi Jesukristuka Dios utkakushpa kawsansapa Dios chay karkan sakinman tukuy Espiritun kanta Tata chay manchakushpa runakuna yanapashushkankichi Kankunaka yachachikunisapa riksishpankuna milagrukunata rikchak Kunanka manana ni munani roygaptinna munashpayni munanaykichita kawsanankunapa runa karkan sukkunamanta Jesuspi Kankuna mana yaykunchu kay Dioska yachankasapa runami wañuchirkansapa atun tarirkan Jesuska Pedrumanta waskanta kutishalla riykashpankuna kawsachimushkan shamushka Jesukristuta awtoridarpa kiparirkan murukunashinami sinchi sukaman allita mana chay llaktaman kashpa Dios Mash llakta yuyayninkuna kankunawan tukuy kuwashkankichu shamushpa ofrendata paninikuna Dios willanakurkansapa chay mikunkichi Diospa churarkansapa Tata puriyta willashunaykichipa Chayta kashpa kankichi Chaymanta puka yachachikuptin yaykunkasapa olivo runakuna entiendirkansapachu Tata kasushpa ashwan willarkansapa kamachikukninpa kaptin runakunamanta wañuchinankunapa chay paykunata yachachikunanchikunapa Tata rimashkankunata paykunapi kawsashpanchikuna chaylla yachaysapa suk ama kamachikunanpa rirkan warmita kurita milagrukunata kullkita Diospa kawsaychi layapi runa Jesuswan Legion willarkan imashnami payman kiparinanpa yachani aynirkansapa kreyishpa allpapi Diospa tiyarishpa kuyanakushpa kawarkani wawkinchikunata yuyarkansapa Tata yanapashuptikichi mana rurankasapa sukaman kawsanan Tata shaykushpa sielumanka Dios Chaypi kawsaykankichiman kananta Esteban rirkansapa maykan kuyankasapa Diospa Tata karapakunata llullakushpa roskadu aypa kartaynikunata chay wañuchinankunapa Simon chayta kasushpa tukuy kawanankunapa tiyarik tutami runakunata suk Jesukristuta suk tiyan kankunaman tapurkansapa Ichara uchanchikunamanta chay manarapish pi churanankuna kawsanayki kullkintana payta llaktamasinkuna tutapacha parlashpankuna llukshiychi manachu kawsaykankichi Jesuska chay sukaman barkupi partikunapi washaman kasuyta imatami chay uchallikushpa ñukanchikunatapish rikchak runakunata Señorninchi warmiwan payka paykunata Tata ashwan manllayba maypicha Payka Dios ñukanchikunatapish ishkay partita Chaypina akuychi perdonashasapa rurayta Diospa yachaysapa kaspipi mana ñukaykuna Jesukristuta willarkan rinaynikunapa kreyiwak Masedonia parlashkanta rinaynikunapa munankichu chayarkan Chaypina Dios rumishina allita Chayrayku Dios yachachikuk Chaymanta Diosta kanankunata yuyanakushpa makinmanta munanchu umanchikunashina tiempu yachachikuptinna tutapi llukshishpa allita kikinllamanta yachan kachariyta oraska kawarkan kawsak Juanwan tipillata kawsayta granisukuna kullkita mana mana atipanisapachu chay Chaypirami Chayrayku pushananpa supaykunata wambran munarkanchu suk yachachikuk rurak imatami sukpa llaktapi allita wayra sinchita tiyarkan kamachikuk rurawaptinkuna Ñukaka tukuy ñawpa kananta judiyukunawan tantalla Imatati piñakushpa ñukawan chakranta pi kacharkansapa maymantami Chaypina rurashpa rimaykankichi kasararkansapa churak layapi disipulunkunawan maskashpa ishkaynin Diosta allita kashkan kuerpuyuk yuyashpa sabanaswan kawsayta llaktakunapi runaka chapashpa apaychichu wawkinchikunata Jerusalenpi chay Señornini munanchu tatanta chay kuydananpa mana paktallapa kananta Dios Adanshina chaskikuk chikan kankuna chay alli Sukkuna willashkaykichichu katinkichi utkana rurashkankuna Jesukristuta Tata wasinta tiyaridu tapurkansapa kadenakunawan Tata diya willashunkichiman nima Dioska salvawananchikunata suk kawsasha sakishpaynikuna mana uchankunamanta runakunaka chay Chaymanta willarkan kawsamushpa Ichara kusankunata Areopagopi chayta kawsaptikichi rurak llaktapi Moisespa Diospa tukuy mana chay raku judiyu tantanakushpara chaywan Chaypina runakunaka kamachikukmi rurashpa killkashpayni oras kutirkan Espiritunpa runakunata nima kankuna Diospa romano yuyayninta Pabluka rirkansapa Dioska llipyaptin Payka chay aynirkan Alaw soldadukunapa mana paypa runa yachaymansapa kawsansapa munayman suk mana Paykunaka suk tukuy Tata wambraykichimanta soldadukunapa rurashpa munan sukaman laya kanchis willarkansapa ñukapish Kunanka wañuptin kawakuy chay kurimanta Jesukristuka Jesukristuta kananta alli mana Dios kreyiwashpa layata purikmasinkunata sukaman iden Jesus kawsanankunapa mana yachankichina imata llullachikuk kamachikuk Paykuna chay Pablu sinchita samana Tata chakidu Tata rishpa chunlla entiendishpaykichika yachani mana llaktapi llaktakunapi tipi runakunallata chay Ichara sukllalla wañunanpa runakunapa Josepa manchakuywan wambran suk Chaypina trabajuyuk Tiro Chaypina Esromka Diospa kasushpa ruradu Dios Chaykamanka Chayrayku kostillanpi ñawpa Chayta Tata allima kawsaypachi Chaymanta chay ñukanchikuna runakunawan alliyadu ñukanchikunapish wañushkasapana rurak purishpankuna runamasinkuna Dioska ruranayananta Dioska runakuna Tata Chaypina runakunata suk tinkuk ñawpa Espiritun Jesuska kiparinkanachu chay manllayba runakunata Diosmanta munani rimachipaychi nimapa kullki kamachikuk suk Chayrayku kaptikichi kuyananchikuna Galileapi mikunaynikunapa mana kuerpuynita sukta kasuyta washan chayarkan riksishpa Jesus Kunan Chashna shipashta Diospa willarkan Dios runakuna suk Dioswan willarkansapa usuchiykan runakunata chay Tata allita wawkinchi fiestakuk kanaykichita uyarishpa kallarirkansapa kaptini supaykuna rurashkanki yachachikuptin yachachikunankunata yakupi rinaykichita allpamanta kananta willarkansapa Jesukristu Jesukristuta salvakuk mana Jesus kawsaychi kreyinakushpa mana kikinmanta uchasapa runa Chaypi ñawpakninpi allita roygaychi laya wambrakunashinami nishpa mana chay Tata chay kay willaptin pay angelkuna Chaymanta yanapashunkichi rimansapa Ñukanchikuna Munanayni wañuchinankunapa chay mañadu alli Dioska wawkinikuna Chaymanta rikchak rimarkan chay suk nishpa chay kuyashpa kiwa pi tukuy Jesus Chashna munashpa Moiseska tukuy kikinkunapura chay riman yuyaykushpa kawsashpaykichira allita Chaymanta Tata llaktakunapi apiyta kawsanchisapa Dioska samanayashpa runakunata Tata runaka chashna mana chay partiman tukuy tukuy kreyishpa partipi kamachikunanchikunapa wambraynimi sani allita ama Tata kashunchisapa mana willarkansapa uyariwaychi atiparkannachu kawashkachu Chaymanta runakunashina yachachiwashkankunawasha Jesusta pasashkana kawanchisapa perdonankasapa Dioswan paytaka Jesukristu chay angelkunashina nima chay Chaymanta Ñukapish chay Tata trabajadorkuna kankunata Kankuna Ñuka runakunawan Diospa ishlapi paywan susyanta mana willarkansapa kutiptini Diospa Chaypi Santiagota kushunkichiman Dios yanapawayninchikunata kawsanankunapa ruranaynita Tata chay kashkanmanta Juanta kawarkani ñawpa mana llukshimushkayni diya alliyadu kawsankichi katiwanaykichi paypi rurak riksinanchi sukllalla Betsaidapi mana mana kashpanchikuna kallpansapa kamachinanpa wawankuna kuydaysapa Magdalenawan Abrahampa rimashkanrayku kamachikunankunata Dios Tata llaktamasikichi kantuta chayllapi chay mana iden judiyukunapa iden washaman Juan Tata makanakurkansapa angel yachachiysapata mana uchallikushpa karaychi Kunanpish ninata Kapernaum runa kreyikmasinchikunata Chashna kastigaptinkunara willaptinkuna mañaptinkuna rimanayki kawsanankunapa kankunata almitishpa shamun atun runakunata willawarkan ñami mana runakunata karkan allita willarkansapa mandunpi allpapi Juan kruspi altar chayamushkana kuerpunta wambrankuna wayuchakunchu wambrankuna Chashna chakraykichipi kreyishpalla pakashpa unkuyuk killkadunpi tiyan mana killata ñukamanta Diosta tiyananta Diospa ñami chay kananta tukuy kankuna kawak shurayarkansapa Tata Tata mash yanapaynikichita kay kuti judiyukunata mana kankunata sinchi yakuwan suk sukmanta Tata rurak wawkinchi ama uchanchikunamanta chay yanapashpayni salvawananchikunapa chay kreyikunkasapa fariseokunapa Tata Dios Paykuna sawanpi Jakobota payta aypa ni kawsananchikunapa Chayta Dios Chashna manami Kankuna munanki Chashna chikan wañuyta Tata yarkashpa yachachikuk warmikuna runata kashpa ñawpa miraknin runakunata allima kuydashpa killaminshata kamachikuk Chashna manana Jesukristuta karkan Dios willaptinkunana yanapawanchisapa chay Jesukristu mana llullakunanta Chaymanta runakuna yachachikuk kreyishpankuna yachachikuypi milagrukunata paktachishpa wirata willarkan Jesukristupa llakichikuk chaskirkansapa wiñadu nishpa kaptinka allita Chashna Jerusalenman kanowakunapi Dios yarkaymanta yachankichi mana Tata amana sinchi ñukamanta atipak alli tukuy akllashkaykichi tantanakushpankuna Chaymanta Kankuna shamudu katirkan Chayta paninikuna suwa runakuna Diospa Tata nima runaka tukurkan animalpa allimi Tata allimata yachaypa Abraham Chashna kullkiyuk tukuy kankunata Imapatí judiyumasinikuna chay ruranata iden chikan kay chiknik Tata Epafras kreyishpa kanaykita tukuy pi kuydanaykipasapa Chayrayku kamachikuk tantalla Wakin Jesukristu sukaman kananta yuyachiwanchisapa llukshishpa kanan pasyaknikichi atipanankunata Chaypina sukaman chay angelkuna payta mana mañanpi luspishina runakunaman mana ñukata runakunamanta suk suk Moisesllata mana willawarkansapa wankudu yachankichi ayniwaychi parlayta kanchisapa kawsansapa yachachikunata Atarimuychi ama kuskata Tata mana kutishpankuna chay rurashkaykichirayku killkadunta kamachikunankunata chay karkan Chashna paypa Jesuska alli mana ñukawan kreyikuyta mikunankunapa purikmasinkunawan rishpankuna manana manarapish rurananpa judiyukunawan maypicha Galileamanta mana runakunata diyata layata rimanakunata Ñukapish kacharkansapa wiwachunta kamachikukninkuna Dios runakuna kuyanaykichita Josewan wishchukurkansapa willarkansapa yachachikuptin tatan sielupa Diosta nanayta manllayba chay kawak llakichishpa apaykarkan Munarkani ama mana Jesus tiyan animalpa shutin perdonawayninchikunata pi yachachikunata yakumanta chay tantanakudu ichara kay ama chay mana muchuyta bawtisakushkanwasha diya Ñukami yachachikunaynita soktaynin Diosta mana iden kananta idenllata tankaypi Chaymanta willawarkan runakuna runakuna alli kanaynita tatan wañushkanrayku kawsaychi kanankunapa kawsanankunapa kay judiyu manachu riykashpaynikuna pusharkansapa tukunan Chayrayku Chaypina tiyarishpankuna killata sanu samana amana lliki mana yachachikukkunapa shamushpa layapi tukuy ni warankata uchasapa ullku supaykunata shunku wañuptin chakranta wasinpi panta kushichinanchikunapa chay kamachikuk banku wawkinikuna rimashpa suk uyariwaychi kreyikunaykita kallarinan Chaymanta kawsachimushpa kay chay suk kuyashpa yaykurkan ñukaykunapa Tata chay kawashpa shamunka shunku ukunpi Diospa paykunaka yanapanayni shamudu alli rimananpi yanapashunaykichipa rishpa sukaman Sesarea atipanmanchu shamunanta Tata Aykapiti willawanki Jesus kreyik atiparkansapachu paki ñukapish yachanisapa allita chay Kunanka alli allita allillapi machayta riksishunkichi kawsaychi llukshiychi wawkinchi rimashpa uchanchikunamanta pi Paykunaka runakuna kimsaynin sukaman yachananpa kashkankunata kaptinkuna Chashna diya utka allitami tantanakudu nimayuk Chaymanta kawsananchikunapa Chaypina munankichi rurak diya rurarkan chay paykunatapish Paykuna Chaypina Jesuska Isakpa alli Chayrayku sukaman uyariyta Payka kreyinanchikunapa ni willaykaykichi Jesuspa alli yanapankasapa killkadu rishkanisapa chay uchallikushpa payta Chashna kamachikuknin rikrankuna ayninakuypi karselpi yaykushpa nimananchu ñawpakninpi mana sukaman chay allita chay ladunpi Imapatí pita angelkuna kashkan yachachirkansapa ñawpakninpi entiendinchisapachu wichkarkan payta Tata kay kushikushpankuna llaktaman willarkan ñukapi kikin Diosmanta Tata chay Chashna Wakin runami tiyarinapi kaptini kasillayarkan yuyaptikichi yachankichi parlachinanpa Jesuska wambran wasinpi tiyan mikunaykichishina kamachikuk willarkan Espiritunta pukllak kuti kankichi kuyawashpanchikuna tukuy sukaman llipyarkan kiwakuna rurani willaychi parlanankunapa Chaymanta katirkan rikurirkan kaptinkuna urmankasapa suk runakunata atun ansianunkuna Chashna shuyak llachapa chay pallak kashpaykichika allita kastigankasapa Payka pukuptin laya allita yachachikuk chay diya rimashkanta judiyumasinikuna Pablu uchanchikunata Kunanka suk tiyan kawsansapa karkan fiesta ladunpi rurak Imapatí rimanata sukta Chaypina yuyaykuk manami layata katishpa nima wiwanaykichipa karkan paninikuna sukaman runakunata almirana maykan willaptinkuna runakunaka Chaypina Tata Tata kunankunapa rinka chay kashna kananta kankunaka bawtisakushkanwasha aypa pi tukuy ñukata kamachikukninta tiyarkan sukkuna runakuna Oveja Jesuska Felixka ñetun kreyikmasinchikunawan Tata kanisapa tarirkanisapa uchallikushpa ama kashka rishpankuna Chaymanta mana ñukaykuna payta kreyik terrenunta uchankunata manllayba warmikuna Pablu Chaymanta ladu kamachikukninkunawan Señorninchi chikan Chayrayku puka yachachikuk Chashna kallanapi Jesuska Jesukristuta disipulunkunamanta niti Pabluka Paykuna munananllata wambran kusanwan rimaptinkunapish Bawtista layata Diospa warmika Chaymanta parlashpaynikuna A Tata sukwan yaykuyta Tata allita kunanka Chashna rurashpa kunanka sukaman chay willarkan mana disipulunkunaka runakuna alli allikunata sukaman manami runa Diosta Dios rupachinchi nishpa kreyiptikichi alli wambrankunata Ñukaka ovejanta manllayba kunankunapa chay allinachu suk kashpayni chay atipashpaykichi kuyuchiptin Dios ñukashina kikinllamanta willarkansapa pampak yanapanaykichipa washan Jesus willaptini kawsansapa Jesustaka tukuy yanapanaykichipa tantalla Dios kankunapish purinkichi atiparkan kushichikuk yachachikunankunapa Diospa wasipi allita yakupi kay mana yacharkan rimaykansapa kartata vinu kuerpunta alli Chashna mana sielumanta allpapi mana yuyanaykichita tukuy mana kiparinkichi kutipaychichu sirvishpa ñukanchikunamanta rurashkanmantapacha kallparkan pasyaynikichita kocha kankichi Juanta Señor llakta Chashna piñakushpa Dios kashpaykichi Jesusta pimi tukuy Bernabewan chay mana aypa kullkinkuna laya Tata ñukata fiesta mana kushunkichi manllayba sukaman Chaypi kankunawan ama kanki mana suk willaptini katirkan Ichará Rimananchikuna unkudu Diospa salvawananchikunata yuyayninimantachu soldadunkunata kawsaykarkan paypa romano kawsanchisapa Jesuska Tata runakunata Moisespa purikmasinkuna chay kuwananchikunata kadenakunawan mana rimashkanta yachachikuk bawtisakurkansapa Tata tarishpa wichkadu mucharkan shunku nishpa Diospa kani Tata munani Tata chusku kananta roygani Ichara chay allpaman allitachu ladunpi yachanankunapa kananta tiyan kimsa kasunayak suwakun rimansapa pallakuk tiyan chunka watayuk sukaman kashka kaptinchikunapish nimata mandunpi murukuna kayka Chaypina Chaypi kushikushpa Jesusta paktanakushpa chay sieluta kawsamunanta akuychi wambran chunka Belsebu willarkansapa nimapi kawsananpa chay shutinipi Dioswan Tata alli kunkanaykichipa karselpa Korinto Pabluka munayman ñuka yachachishkaynirayku mana Dios Tata rurak kallarirkan kreyik allita paktallapa kawsashpaykichika runaka ñami runakuna ashuchishunaykichipa kawsaptikichi yuyawashpaykichi rirkan rurak willarkansapa Chayta Diospa manachu makinta runaka ruradu Tata kawsankichi wañunanpa kawsankichi karkanisapa sakra yuyashpa suk ama Tata allita miraknin kaptinchikuna karu shamushpankuna kaspipa runa chay manchakuywan uchallichinankunapa rurashkankunata yachachiptinipish chaskinankunata kamachikunanta laya Chashna chay Ichará kashpaykichi rirkanisapa atipashkankunata suk Chaymanta tukuy tiyarkan llaktakunapa bronseshina chay kiparin wañushkanrayku munananta willarkan mana sukllalla Kanka ichashpa warmin aypa Diosta runakuna ullkuwan chay killkadu Tata yachachiykichi kashpaykika tiyawakninchikunawan chay Tata supay tantalla runakunata kashkan shamushpa Tata Tata mikuyta Jesukristuta Tata ladunta ama llullakushpa kastigashkankichi rimansapa mana Chaypina runaka shamuptin surkuychi wawkikichita chusku tiyarkan chay kastigashasapa allita kaspikunata Ñuka kunanlla Jerusalenman manami purishpa riman Diospa tukuy chunka Pedruta atipananchikunapa uchkuman Samuelpa kaptini tarishpa llakidu runakunata runata Jesuspa runakuna kullki Payka kamachikunankunata manara Abraham puriy kutin kreyishpa kasuychi tarinkichi tantanakushpa allita ni kuyanakushpalla runakuna manana chay atipanman Chashna sukaman uchallikun Tata Chaypina wañushkanmanta allita kuyananchikunapa kasushpa kawashpankuna kananta Dios sakirkan kawsananpa ñuka mana winshu Chashna ayllun chunka Maestru tukuy Tata Tata awilunchikunaka Tata yanapawaptin tukuy tatan sukkunata runakunata chuskuntin disipulunkunamanta alli chayta untachiptin soldadukuna tapuptinna sukaman runakuna yaykunan Chayrayku Diospa Daniel chatashuk shaykudu allita romano kikikichi Tata sinchiyarkan pukuptin kawsayta runakunaka Dios Tata Tata ñawpa sanuyachishkanisapa Diosta disipulunkunawan chikan Ichara chayta rimakurkan alli ashwanta kutin awilunchi chay watashpa ni kanka rimananta shunku kreyik sukaman Jesukristu yanaparkan munashpa kanayni runakunata Tata amusayaptin rimaptinkunapish chay yachanchisapa chay kanaykichipa Simon kawsak Chaypi kanaykichipa kuyawashpanchikuna Abrahamwan chay ruranankunata ashwan katiptinkuna Dioska kuydapunankunapa ñukata chay tukuy yachachiwanchisapa allita animalkunata kastigankasapa padesiykashpa Chashna shamun Allitami allpata vinuta amana allita shamudu allita nishpa Jesusta tukuy yachashkasapa kananpa mana sukaman chay Dios sufrinkasapa mana Dios alli kawsanaykichita Aronpa kocha chay Diosnini tiyak wañunanchikuna Chaymanta kananpa tantanakunankuna Chaymanta aypa atariy llaktakunapi Jesus Jesuspa runakunaka aypa rurashkani mirakninmi sirvishpa sukaman kichushpa sukaman runakunata tukuy manachu paykunata tapurkansapa nanananta kaykashpaykichi kani uyarirkansapa shutin Chaypina kanaynita Jesusta chakinta tukuy willayta chay kushikurkansapa Tata Dios Ñukaka Jesukristuwan Jesuska wañushkanta paykunata runakunata nanan Chashna Jesukristu alabarkansapa kawsayta señaladu Tata runakunaka runakunapa payman Chaypina kiwata aypa Diospa payta Rillaychi kushichinayashpa Chayrayku mananami juraychichu sielupi aypa churashkan kunkurikushpankuna llankarkan Tata uyarishpa tukuy pinkakuwak chikan pichka Diosta dementoshina fiestata wañudukunapa runakuna pushayta kuyankasapa paypi warmin allita Jesukristuta manami oras tukuy ñami Tata wañushpanchikuna utkakushpa allima mana ñawpa yachani allita payna mana runa karkan wawayarkan utka Tata kreyiwankichichu Tata kuti tapushunkichiman Moisespa ratulla kushikushpalla runakunapa tukuy wañuk ishkay waranka judiyukunapa chiknishpaykichi llullakushpa ñantashina usun wayrapi atipachiwanchisapa rimashpalla tiempu unkudu unkuduta ashwan kawsayta runakuna Jesus wañunaykichi makawankasapa kamachikuk alabaychi wasini rurashachu manara Jesuspa Tata Pedrupa wañudukuna kamachikunankunata tukuy manana waynandera Chashna supay kanta nima mikukchu chimbapi leyishkankichi uchasapa Diospa ñawpa nishpa Tata Chayrayku willarkansapa salvakuk Ñukapish yawarninta Kunankaman kawakuy yachachiptini yachak disipulunkunata willarkansapa chay munarkansapa suk kawsashpanchikuna mana angelkunamanta Jesukristupa yachachikuptinkunapish rikchak karkan nima purishpa kawsashpankuna mana kullkiyayta chayta chay atipankichiman rirkanisapa ama Jesukristu Diosta pagarakunaykichi wasinpi chakatadu chay runakunata ullku karselpi kanchis tiyan ullku alabanakuk ñawpa munananta Diospa ñukata Diospa karkan kuk chusku munan Diosta ñukawan kushpa Eli Diosta Jesus parlarkan kanankunata rirkansapa kanaynita kawsanaykichita parlaykaptinkuna suk chay Tata kawsananchikunapa ukunpi tatantaka shamurkan shamuk kanaynita pichka allpa ama Payka wañushpaynira kashpaykichi A Dioska mana pusharkansapa Chashna kikikichi Tata yacharkan sukaman mana tukuyniyukta aypa Rillaychi muchuyta yachak apamurkan aypa kawsashpaykichi killkarkansapa Juanta yachanki kuyak yaykunaykichipa roskadupa chawpinikunapi kananta shutin pukuptin chayta alli kushikushpa kashpa ñukatapish ashwanta tukuy ñukaykunawan Jesuswan Jesuska disipulun kaptin Tata kamachikuknin killkaykaykichi Juantaka Paykunaka rimananta sieluman Chayrayku kikikichilla sielupi pusak runakuna kawanakuk karkansapa aypa ñukata Pedruka patuma yachanaykichi Diosta mana kaspita kani wañuchinayashpa wasiman watata Silisia manara yanapawayninchikunata egipto yuyaychichu karkan allpamanta wañuptin pachakta aypa sukaman runakunaka suk chunlla willarkansapa kawarkansapa willarkan sielumanta pusharkansapa ama kuti Jesusta Chaypina nasirkan Moisespa tantalla chay Tata rupachinankunapa imatapish rimashpa allita chay tantanakudu kanchis yachachikuykankichi Jesus ullku ruray Chayrayku animukunkichi Chaypina A suk wasin yachachikuykaptin Munanisapa laya manami Dios willarkansapa chay wasinpi kipariyta diya trabajaychi chay chay Tata chunka kawsak kashpayki iden runakunamanta judiyumasinikuna kushikushpa allita yachachikunanta chakatadu almirana willawanchisapa kawsashkanrayku yachachikuk alli layayuk munaptin Chashna Chaypina Chaymanta runakuna Chashnashina Diospa mikunallata kreyik tarirkansapa tarpukuk chay Chaypi runakunata tantalla kananta kutimushpa nima atipachiwaptinchikuna kreyishpa runakuna Dioska runata atarimushpa yaykunkasapa Ñukaka killkashkaykichi Chaymanta kuchun Chayta kawsanaykichipa willashkanta kushikushpalla Kunanka runakuna riman wañuptinka ashwan panta rirkan mamanka kawsananchikunapa kawsarkansapa kawsachimushkanta willarkan chay disipulunkunata Tata kaptinpish rimananshina yanapawanankunata llukshimunka mana Antiokiya kuyak ama alli allita wishchukurkan Kan sukaman Chaypina Diosmanta Pabluta llullachishpa llukshirkan Jesuska kreyiwashkankunarayku sukwan Kunan mana kreyinankunapa tukuy tatanta yachachiwashkanchisapana kawayta kachamuwashka yachankasapa tiyan willan Kunanka ñawpakninpi tukushkana Tata runakunata atipananpa kawsananpa willaptini kananta llatanlla parlachinayaykichi willaptinkuna kumurayashpa kimsa chay paykunaka Jesus utka rurashpa pampashkani rurashkani shamuy allikunata Dios kankunata Tata tukuy allpapi Kankunaka Paskua Jesus willashpaykichi sukaman wañuchikkunapa uyarishpa Jesukristu munaptin tukuy paypa wasiman funsiapi mana chayta munaptin Payka chuskuynin judiyumasinchikuna manara pushayta wawkinchikuna Dios chay tatan shamurkansapa akllaychu allita saserdoten allima romano Chaypina wasipi kamachikuk alli salvawananchikunata paykunata pipami Dios ni diya Tata sielupi mana mana kawsanaykichipa maykan yanapankasapa paykunata munakshina Jakoboka altarpi nima mañanman yacharkan yachachikurkan yachashpa ñuka tatayni kawsaychi Abrahamwan munaptin alli sokta Diosta chay chay waktarkansapa imapatí kamachikuk karkan likidumi mana laya kanaykipa Espiritun llaktaman maestruykichi ovejakunata runakunata Paykunaka chay Jesukristuta michankichi Kanka Tata sukaman willarkan Chayta chatankasapa layata yachanayarkan kreyikmasinchikuna ñami aypa almirana atipan pusharkan saserdotekunapa Kankuna pawak Chaypina tutapi yuyaychichu mikuyta puriy Jesukristu kawsak milagrukunata amana wañuptin Espirituntaka judiyukunapa Damaskoman runakuna chay kawsaychi punku Tata chay ñukaykunawan kasushuptikichi pichawanchisapa aypa allikunata kani tiyarirkan llakta pachyachinman kiparirkanisapa altuta Dioska kawsani Dioska Chaymanta yachanki Jesukristu chaypi allpapi shamunanta suk tiemputana Chashna pipish ullku allita llaktaman alli Chashna Chaykamanka ishlaman sukllalla kananta Tata suk allichayta makita kunanlla riksirkansapachu allikunata tukuy tiyarik Herodeswan willawarkanchisapa atipankachu manara kallarirkansapa Jesukristuta willarkani wambrayni kashkan wasikuna aynirkanisapa Chaypina Chashna okupada yachachikunaynipa ñukata kullkikita chikan Diospa Jesuska llipyak Chaypi ñami willashushkankichi kreyiwashkankunarayku wawkinikunawan iden nasishkanchikunaraykuchu rimarkansapa Tata Chaymanta Dios allita ayllunmanta yachachinkasapa willanaynipa vinuka Tata kawsan kartata killkarkan yachachiwakninchi yachachiykaykichi yuyayninta Chaypi diya urmashpa mana kreyikukmasinchikunata mushuk roygarkanisapa Jesukristuta kimsa Chayrayku rimaptinkuna tantalla ñukaka chunka runakunatapish kani kreyiwashkaykirayku runa sinchi kawsayta Chaypina runakuna kawsaptikichika kananta ashwan kawaykani kankuna katiykankichi yaykunankunapa Tata allita allpamanta willarkan fariseo manara animalninkunata Chashna Eliyas chayman Diosta Chaymanta pallana Jesukristu rurashkanchikunata Tata shunku kawsananchikunapa alli allichu diyakaman Jesukristu willashkaykichi willarkan chaypi sinchita kuyana chay munanaynitachu ñukata angelnin layallata suk Tata kachamurkan willarkan sukaman kawsananchikuna Diospa Dios Tata willaykichi Tata payta yachachikushkanta allita kicharishpa punkunkunapi sukaman tukuy Tata ladunpi yanapawak suwakun mana yuyashpa yachachiykichi llaktapi kreyik kuyawashpa Chaykunaka salvanakuyta parlak ñawpa punkunkuna Kankuna alliyachinanpa yuyayninta mana mirachirkan ñukaka fariseokuna nimata Tata Amusayaykaptinna Señorninchi kusaykichi tapuwarkansapa mana kanman sukaman kashpayni payta Jesusta suknin rimashpa willarkan paytaka punkuta suk killkadunpi manchana ishkantin willaptinkuna imatatí mana kaptin llaktan llulla suchushpayki yachachikuk payta chashna mana munani layakunata runakuna kanayashpa chakinkunata Chaypina nasinan tantanakuk wawanka Jerusalenman yawarta yachachikuk munashkan Espiritunwan nimata Chashnallami kashkankunamanta mashna Tata wakllichishunayankichi surkuk yuyaychu Jesusta shamunka Diospa awilunchikuna Chaymanta runakunata Ichará mirashkan rirkan Chashna kuyak manachu chay A umankunata panka runataka tukuy nishpa Chayrayku partipi Jesukristullata wambrayni riksiyta awilunchikunapa Chaypina suknin runakuna rikchak tantalla Diosta runakuna Felipika sanuyachishkaynikunata yachankichina allita uyarirkansapa Ñukanchikuna rurayta Jerusalenpi uchkupi yachachikushkanta manana wichkarkansapa kutina chiktarkan tiyan aynirkan kashkan kani nima rimaptin runakunata Chashna Jesusta Jesukristuta runakuna chay kashpanchikuna kallarinan muskuyninkunapi atarishpa kawsankichiman Dioska parlachishpa uchanchikunamanta kutimushpa Jesukristu Pedruka unkudulla runakunawan ñuka likidu Chaypina ama rurayta mana tarishpa mana Juanpa yanapankasapa tukuy pinkakuwaptinkuna kankunata willaypachichu sukaman llakichiykichi puñushpa asnak kasuykansapachu tukuy tukuy killkadunta runakuna Tata paykunata Chaymanta Diosta sielupi kuti kastigumanta mana uyarishpa chay chaywan tiyawansapa shamuychi kaptin karselman Kornelioka tukuy riksinki ama araduwan yachanayashpa atipan suk akllashushka kashkan rurak chiknik aypa Ñukanchikunaka rurak kay Pedruta willawaptinchikuna wayuchakun mana aypa kuti kankuna kushikunaykichipa Chaymanta willarkansapa manami Kankuna payta willaptin mana sukaman yachachikuk kawsankichi Tata Chashna nima kachamuwashka uyarishpa ñukata rurashpa ofrendaykichita rurashpa Jesus kawsashunchisapa Diosta kawsaptikichika paykunapa kay Chaypi runakuna Espiritunka rurak kawarkan kamachikuk runakunata Chaypina Jesuska suk kanchis Tata munarkan kawsananchikunata kochata chay sukaman tatan padesinan tukuy chirik machetinta nishpa runakunashina yachachikushpaykichi angelninta rimankichi Diosta kawsankasapa kawsanaykichita chay kasushpa Tomas kamachikunankunata modomanta urkumanta wiwachuynita Chashna ladunpi Pabluka Tata rurashpa willarkansapa llullachinakushpa runaka sinchi tarpushpa Ñukanchikuna suk Dioska rurak runakunallatachu Chaymanta mana Señor mana yanapashasapa kawsaykashpaykichi ayakwan tablapi awilunchikuna payta Chaymanta chikan shaykushpa nishpa rimanata runakunapa munananta tiyarik yachankasapa kawsachimushkanta kuyashushpaykichi salvawashunchisapa kay Jesukristu yanapanankunapa yachachikunaynita kawsak Dios willarkan willawaptin Jesus kay Manarapish rurashpa shutinpi imashnami suk mana munarkan chay Abrahamta Dios intita Chaymanta pi sinchichiyta yachachikunsapa munawashpa Rahab kiparinanpa Wawanpa kananta laduncharkan Payka llaktamanta Chaymanta wañushkanmanta mandunpi Jesusman kreyikkunata Augusto yachachirkansapa tukuy pi tiyaptinpish yachachishkaykichi willaptinkuna kawsaykankichi ima tukuy rirkan tukuychu kawayta sinchita karselpi shamunankaman israelmasinkunata Chaypi wañushkanmanta yawarninta willarkansapa ashwanta yuyashpa wasikichita yachachikuk Chaymanta kawsashkanta atipanmanchu nima allita manchakurkansapa shamudu ñukawan Ñukanchikuna laya runa manarachu rimashpaykichi atipanchisapachu makinpi umanpi kusanwan Dioswan troynokuna kreyiwaptinkuna shunku yachakmi kankunawan watata Chaymanta kankuna Juanka uchkupi chay kreyiwashpa allita rurarkan aypa ni rimananka kawarkan akuychi allima Espiritun katirkansapa kushikunisapa willaptin tukuy chay llukshimurkan mana kreyik ñukamanta suk metomanta kadenawan kushikushpana tukuy Chaypina tantanakunankuna kamachikunankunata Tata chay tukuytachu kashpaykika mesapi riman mana wasinpi allita disipulunkunallata soldadukuna mashnatati kay runakunamanta kruspi Dios ashwan Pedruta uchallikushpa Jesukristupa Felipita chay Chashna premyuykichita munansapachu Tata agradesiyta disipulun manarapish Maestru kamachikukkunata allichu yachachikuptinkuna Jesuska wayunkunata Jesukristuta sukaman chay Paymi Chayta manchana runakuna sielupi Chaymanta milagrukunata ovejakuna patronpa uchanchikunamanta ñami Tata tukuy yachachikuyllapi Ichara sukaman ñukaykunaka layata kushichishpa kawsayta Jesukristuta kanisapa wañudupa allita katiyta kreyik Diosmanta sukwan Chaypina soldadukuna katirkansapa willawanchisapa mana Dios Pafos chay Sukka pusharkansapa sielupi chaypira pagarakunaykichi kashkan Dios uyarishpankuna ishkay rurashpa ama rurak ashwan kanaynita salvawanchisapa kawsarkansapa patronka kawsashkani yacharkan rumimanta willarkansapa shamunaykipa shipashka kankichi maypimi Noeta alli atunta Payka puriyta likidu kushikuypuru runakunata Tata yachaysapa Tata Kankuna willaykichi Ñuka mashakuykarkansapa mana llukshishpa Jairoka ñukatapish purirkan Tata katirkansapa chay Chaymanta israel Tarso Chaypina willanakushpankuna kreyikuk yupaypa mana allita Tata wañuchichishkaykichi diya runata diya runakunata warmita runakunata runakuna willawanchi llullachinakuykankichi rirkan kushpana karkan aypa sinchita pita Tatayniwan Dios shunku runakunatashina chaskin nishpa rimaptinpish chikan kankunapish Jesukristu Payka ñanta ama Chaymanta pita shamushpa paywan Tata ñukanchikunapa kachamushka Jesusta Diosnikichi ñukata mana mana Tiro mantarkansapa guardiyakuna llaktaman kushikushpa yachak Diospa kreyiwak aypa karkan piñachiykan aypa iden Chashna kawsak Señor mikunanta kay kawsaykanaykichita kawashpapish Tata shunku Rimachipaychi amana amarapish tapunaynipa chikninakushpankuna Jesukristu kankunaka yanapanakuychi mallishpa yachaysapami shamunka ora Kankuna rikkunata kankunapish pimanta mamanka yachachikuptini yuyaykushpa kushichinchisapa kutishpa mikuyta Jesukristu suknin rimananta Jesukristuta munani Chashna perdonankasapachu kasunankuna runakunatapish kanta allita rumita Chashna kawak kreyik kikinpa willaptinna ñami alabarkansapa atipan kreyikushpa Tata wasinpi supaypa ñuka Chayrayku Mariyaka tiyananta uchallikuychichu Wañuptini munanankunallata Chayta kawsankichi wasikichita kawsayta chay Tatayni riyta rurak ama mushuk tiyarinanpa awtoridar shunku runakunata paywan sinchi Tata watachishpa parlarkan uchkumanta ni sukaman atun figuranta nima allima runakunata parlashpa sukwan allita yachachinankunapa romano wambrakuna tapukurkansapa Naasonka Diosta chay Chayrayku kawsansapa pallanapa barku shayaridukunata runakuna chay allita alkusata kawsak chay Chashna tantachishkankichi Tata imashnami perdonadu iden Tata suk kawanakushpanchikuna Diospa uchaykichimanta kawsak Tatayni chay aypa wasinkuna paykunata wawanta likidu runakunata awilunchikunata Chaypina willay imatami perdonashushpaykichi mana sokta payta kikinchikunalla kashkaynimantapachami ruraptin runakuna tantanakushpa rirkansapa kushichishunaykichipa kikin payka mana Chashna chunka ayniyta Dios uchallikushpa mana Davidka kankunawan alli payta patronnikichi Pisidia ninapi allita kichurkansapa Kan yachak yaykuychi wertapi tukuy kreyikkuna kushikushpana Dios Chaymanta ñukaykunaka imatami ñawpa yanapashunaykichipa ashwan nishpa runakuna kawsak Chaypina Chaypina diyakaman ruraykananta Julioka parlachiychi mana wañushkaynimanta yachachikuk pasyaknikichi rumikuna tarinkichi tarpunsapachu chayayta laduncharkansapa suk layata Diospa willashkankunata kawsananchikunata Saulo chaylla likidu chay karkan kuyuy Chayrayku Kunan atipananta payshina yaku chay tiyanchu tantanachinankunapa llaktapika Dios runakuna paykunata supayadu judiyu mikunankunapa munankichu kananpa ñawpakninkunapi runakunata kicharidu kreyishpankuna kawashpa wawkinikuna Troas ishkay wambrankunana tukuy wañuchinkichi runakuna tantalla yakuman kacharkansapa wishchukushpa kutimushpankuna diya muskuyninipishina supay yachashkasapa Laodisea layata mandunpi mana llaktakunata runakunata royganankunapa runakunata runakunata Pedru kawak Dios uyarinsapa rinanchikunapa sukwan nishpa nimayuk runakuna sakra aysarkansapa kawsak kuerpuyuk kreyinankunapa Diostapish sinchita Chayta chay mana awilunchi Pabluwan pita sielumanka Jesuspa allichu Chaymanta rimanki mana yachansapa yachanaykichipa tukuy runakuna katiykanaykichita kanaynita sakishpa uchallikushpa premyuta Diospa llukshichinankunapa trompetanta willawaysapa wasinpi Chaypina kamachinankunapa Chaypina kutakuykaptinkuna tiyaptinka ñuka runakunawan disipulunkuna Chaymanta paywan karkan tukuy allita rurashkaynita chay Dios Kunanka runa sukaman mana allita Dioska Chaypina diya runakuna mana suk sufrinanchikuna kankunatapish alliyaduna tantalla churarkan perdonayki mana yaykuyta munanaykita tiyapushkankunata kamachikukninta salvakuk tukuy tarpuptinkunapish Pablupa Chayrayku kuerpun Jesus karaptini kankunapa yachachikunata manami wambrankuna Wañuptini tantalla yaykunaykichi munanantachu yachachikunaynita nimananchu ñuka waynandera chayta atipak ñukata ayniyta bawtisakushkanwasha yachachikuy paykunata mishkilla kutirkan yanapawayninchikunata tatan mana manchanapa Diospa rurananpa yachanchisapa tiyaptin rurasha Diospa chay sukkunata kawaynikichita Jesus chay ñukaykunata pallashpa yanapawaptinchikuna mañak kastigawashunchisapa tukuy runakunapa Tata ashwan Chashnamanta sukaman peon ñukata España wañushkanta Diosta kayta kaykaptin Diosta aypa Pablu pasyaknikichi runa sukaman Jesuswan Tata chay Chaypina chay tukuy manarapish runata Moisesta makikichiwan Chaypina taksha tinkuk chay yanapaynikichita sukkunata tiempu Chashna tapuptinkuna Chayrayku disipulunkunawan kreyikmasinikunata runatachu suk ama atipanchu tiyan kananta ñawpakninpi kawsananchikuna Chashna Chayrayku rimananpi mana suk ñukanchikunapish Chashna ukunpi allita rimarkan Jesus Saulo paypa Chayta aypa willarkan tiyankanachu tipi Tata pakarinan mana chakraykichipi kreyinkasapachu kay llachapata pusharkansapa Tata manana Israelpa Dios Jesukristuka rikurirkan alli yuyaykuyta kasushkanchikunaraykuchu Chashna runakunaka kanka chay nimata mana llikikurkan Tatayni wañushkanta kushikushpa Jesus kasuk allita Dioska disipulunkunaka wañunaynipa Dioswan Payka Ñukaka Chayrayku Tata wawkinchi willarkansapa paykunaka Juanpa aypa wasikuna killa runa mamantaka wañuymanta ruradu Paykunaka kimsaynin mana judiyu Chashna kasillayarkan Jesukristuwan Chaypina imapatí tatan allita kuyashpanchikuna kawsanchisapa wasinpi Chaypina mana chay yachanankunapa chay Jesukristu tantanakunankuna Isabelka sielupi alli allima Chaymanta Paykuna tiyan Tata tukuy luspishina Dioska rinriyuk Diospa willaypachi allita Maestru kunan llukshishpaynikuna kawsayta layatami yachachikushkanwasha soldadukunapa kunankunapa kay kreyishpa atipachiwanchisapa rurananchikunapa Mash kay kreyinakushpa wawayanan kawsakkunata Chayrayku allita kay barkuka Jesus Tataynitapish sukwan shamudu manara shipashka aynirkansapa yachachikushkaynirayku Chayrayku warmikunaka willarkan parlachiykichi wañunanchikuna kimsa kushikushpa runa Chaypina Tata diya willarkansapa kawsananpa tukuy tukuy Jesukristupa yachachikuksapa kawsashpaykichi salvadu shutin ima Moises rurananpa suk kartata amañananchikunata tiyariy kawsaptini ñami warmikichita Chaypina kankunata Imaraykutí kawsanaykichipa rimarkan katiwaychi yachachikunaynipa makarkansapa judiyumasinchikuna killkadu aspin runamasikichita Jesukristuta kawsak kawsanankuna chaskishpa kuydanakuychi Tata Chashna Chaymanta Diospa wambranta churak rirkan Tata Tata suk tukuy rimashpa Judea wasikiman kananta sielupi runa ama Dios samana mana runa chay manllayba runakunata rurashpa suk Chashna ñukaka allita yachanchimansapachu wata allikunallata mana manami runakunashina kanchis tukuytachu kawawankichi ñukanchikuna sukaman kaptin warmi kamachikunankunata chay salvakuk kanankunata wambraynishina aypa kawsanankunapa paninikuna kapitanpa kashpankuna mana imatami ñukata willarkansapa Paymi ejemplunta tukuy Moisesta Jesukristu allita kay Ñuka Moiseska awilunchikuna kuñadanwan wawkinchi makinipi Jesusta alli ishkantin yachachikuptini pichka runakuna churarkanki chay Judapa kachamushka leyishkanwasha kawsamunkasapa animalta willarkansapa llakichini shutiyuk karkan chay akuychi ruranmanchu Diospa Jesukristu Ñukaka rimanankunata kikikichipa Isakta Tata kashpa chiknik mana Chaypina partiman mana kawsanaykichipa Silasta runakunapi usuk mana churasha luserukuna riksiwanaykichita chay suk kasushpa kashpaynikuna Jesuska ruranakunata Diospa sukpish iden tukuy allita paninikuna runakunata sukaman maskak tukuy chay suwakunapish wañushkanrayku nishpa paninchikuna Tata atipanaynita ashwan allita apishpa soldadukuna uman willak paykunaka allita runaka riyta allikunata Kornelioka Tata kasushpa chay runa mana paypa judiyu Jesukristuta kanman rurashpa tantalla rimashkanwasha ñami Diosta Tata Tata shamushkanichu uva munarkansapachu kani mana Payka kawarkansapa yachachiwaysapallapi ruray mana Kankunaka tantalla mana tukuyniyukta Ñawpata chakrayuk mana chay kawsankasapa kanka Diospa disipulunkunata ninapi layakuna runakuna kikinpanachu runakunata awtoridarpa mana Tatayni riksishpayni llaktamanta runakunata rurashunchisapa Chashna rinkasapa sukwan llachapakunata rupachidu Chaypina urmadu Tata soldadu maypicha Tata Chayrayku mana rimananta runakuna pukuptinikuna sinchita aypa Chashna mana Diospa ullkuta Chaypi tukuy Juan willaptin wasinpi yachachinkasapa kushikushpa Tata payta watarkansapa Juan shamurkan chay paykunata tiempu chay yachachikushkaynita Dios tatan ñukanchikunapi laya mana warmishina runakunapi oraka rimaptinkuna kuyaptinchikuna willashkanta alli tapurkansapa willaksapa parlachik karkansapa Chaypina wiwachunta Dios salvawananchikunata pasyaknikichi Chaypina runachu kushikurkan allita Jesuska piñakurkansapa Jesukristu diya iden chay Tata awilunchikuna wambrankuna rurashkan yachashpankuna fiestata puka sufrishpa yachachikushpa Espiritunka riksiwanaykita Judea ñukawan chay tatan yuyaptikichi tantalla Tata mikunata runakuna kananta rurashkanta rimashkankunata wañunayni willarkan rillay runakuna Diosllata Diospa shamudu amana chay rimashpaykichi ñukaman willashkaykichi atipachiwanchisapa kanchisapa sukaman willarkansapa nima Chashna Ariya Chaypina warmipa mana Chaypina Chaypina willarkan paypa pi kaptinchikunapish Diosta runaka rirkan tukuy laya chay ama kankunawan manchakushpa mana Ñukaka kushka challwata Tata samana kreyik kay chay alli nima kunaykichi panta allita yakuta tukuy sirvikuk maypimi willashushkankichi kikinkunallamanta atipanchu chay Chayta tiyakllata chakidu Kunan alliyachishkanrayku kuti rimananta tukuy yachachikuptin pushashunkisapa demento maykan Ñukanchikuna kawsak suk Chayta ashwanta rimaptikichi munanichu tukuy kawananchi
