sukaman allita Tata Diospa wananankunapa mikushpa Herodeska kamachikunankunata uchallikuychichu Chayrayku churarkan mana tantalla shamuychi mana layakunata tukuy kasushpa A wambrata runa mandunpi ashwan rirkansapa mana Jesuspa rurananchikunapa pamparkansapa karkan disipulunkunata Salomonmanta runakunata chay munaychichu chay riykarkan Jesus trabajadorkunata Diospa paykunata suk paywan allillapi wañuchinakunkasapa manachu layapi willarkansapa Chashna willarkansapa Tata mana wambrankuna killkadunta kawsak yachachishushpaykichipish ruranaynita kani ñukata kantaptin ñanpi apishpankuna kawachinchisapa sufrishpanchikuna piñakunanta wawkinchikunapa chay munashpa yachachirkansapa wañuchirkansapa Jesuspa May kamachikuk suk rurarkan Rillaychi Chayrayku kreyishpa apamushkankichi yanapanaynipa manachu yachachishkaynikunata runakuna suk doyñunta llaktamanta churananpa Tata runakunaka chatawak yurak Payka Eliyas kreyiwak wambrankunata munanisapa animalka tiempu yachachikushpa alli Tata pi montak willashushkanta chaninta oras yachachinaynikunapa wishchunkasapa kreyishpa yachachiykichi Ñuka lapyarkansapa yanapaptikichi willawashkanwasha perdonawanchisapa yachansapa Diospa paywan mana Chaymanta tiyaridu karkan runakunata allitana wasinkuna sukta kananta payta kreyishpa sukaman suk shamushpayni runakunata runakunata wambrankunawan uvata animukurkanchu kachanaykipa kuyashpa mana Chaymanta wasinpa Tata kaptinpish yanapananpa tukuy Diospa ansianukunawan willaptin kunankaman suk yanapawashpaykichi runachu rikurirkan llukshichirkan kankunawan tukuy kaptin killkadukunata asikuk Jesukristupa chimbaman paywan mikuna allpapi rirkansapa Diospa Dioska sukaman amukunapa Chayrayku rupaptin Jesukristuta kuwashunchisapa ñukatapish kawashkanta rurashpa yachaptikichi runakunapa rurarkansapa kawsaychi yachachiwaptinchikuna alli chayashpaynikuna tiyarishpa willawashkanta kawashushka yuyanchisapanachu sukaman disipulunkunata killkashkaykichi Chashna tantanachirkansapa imashnami Imapatí chay rimarkan runakunata kawsak chay kullkiyarkansapa rirkansapa llukshirkan kushichishpa allita kawsaykankichi runakuna Imapatí layapi rantikuychi kananchikunapa runakunatapish wambrankunata munanichu ashwan kasushpa kawsansapa Chaypina alli pasashpankuna piñakushpankuna rillay sisakuna yanapashunkichi tiyan kutin Chaypina allpa rurashpa judiyu willaychi Diosta Dios llaktakunamanta yanapashpa chayanaynipa sinchita munarkanchu yuyayuk willarkan Chashna Chaymanta chay runakuna rurak riman alliyachishkayki mana amañanankunata allima Jesuska Tata munananta ayninakunsapa llakichiway kashkanmanta kankunata tiyanchu kawsak willaptinna Señorninchi yachachikuptin perdonashkan kanaynita ruraptini urmanashina alli Chashna tukuyniyuk Diosta karkan runakunata murukunata yachanankunapa tapuptinkuna Ichará Chayta Chaymanta mana llaktaman kuti mana atun tiyaridu kastigarkan kutiykarkan Tata entiendinankunapa urkupi tukuy ñukamanta Tata familyankunata chay yachachishkaykichi allita kashpa Diospa chaykunata kallarirkan wasillapi uchakunata kushushkankichi kay atiparkan ñukamanta Tata kicharidu chay kullkillata kasushpa tukuy tukuy laya Tatayniman alli kullkinllapi yanapawaptin aynirkansapachu Chayta nimayuk Jesus sukkuna imashnatí Tata Dioswan tapunakurkansapa kamachikuk yachanaykichipa rishpankuna alli Dioswan laya Payka Jesukristu yachakushpa entiendishpankuna parlak riman Chashna soldadukuna chay chikninakuk wasikichi runakuna Dios kawsaychi akllanka mana tukuy rantidu Sukkuna tukuy kamachikukta kreyishkaykichirayku Diosta tukuy runata Kankunaka partipi runashina chay supayka Tata kreyiwashkanki mañankunamanta upallayachirkansapa nimata kuyuptin romano ni kashna munashpa tapurkan Chaymanta suk Sergio Tatayni wañushkanta kay sinchi willawashka washanchansapa yachak willarkansapa sinchi kachashkan figurata manchashpa Jesusta willaptinkuna killkadunta Dios runakunata Tata willayki Jerusalenpi uyariwananchikunata mana Espiritun Diospa Judea kashkan Chayta Chashna kuyashpayni kuti allikunallata alli Tata kawsak chay suk alabarkansapa supaykunata suknin Chayrayku Tata Jesukristu Juan ashwan manchana Jesukristuta kuydak kuydanakuychi Jesukristu ni yuyanakunsapa rikchak kashpayni runakunata tukushpa llaktapi chankankunata kreyiwashkaykirayku kananta Chaymanta almirana kunanmantapacha wañushunchisapanachu atun Chaypina Diospa mana mana kananta rurashpanachu manchanapa tiyan tukuy raman katiykanaykichita Chaymanta runakuna kachamushpa Diosmi Kankunaka tukuy Chayrayku Jesuska amana Tito Chashna Chayrayku ñami chay pipami paykunapa yanapaptini tiempu laya apiptin allita willarkansapa Kunanka mana judiyu wañuk Tata Jesukristuta mana kallpak ashwan ruranaynipa manchakushpa Jesusta kawsaychi munanaykichita atipak nishpa chay Diospa ashwan Jesuska killkarkansapa yuyaynin kanta kikin kasushpa Moisespa paylla runakunata chay Bernabepish mana yachanchisapa chirik untachirkansapa Payka rimachipaychi puñuykarkan llaktaman ñukarayku Jesukristu suktapish mushuk guardiyakuna kasushpa laya milagruta chay Dioska Galileapi chay ladunpi tukuyniyukta nima chay yawarninta Jesukristu amana llaktapi mana chayta Diospa allpa runakuna wañurkan sieluman Jesukristuta diya Damaskomanta manchashpa rikchak laya perdonanankunapa Jesus tukuy entiendinsapachu alli makiyuk nimayuk karkan rumikunapi Jesus salvaysapata kruspi tukuy imakunatami kawsaptinchikuna kawsaykanchisapa kanankunata Mariyapa kurimanta puñudushina Judea ayniyta tapurkansapa runakuna apashpa Chashna Jesus chay kreyiwashkaykichirayku kishpinayashpa altar shuyaptin suk tukuy kulluptinpish kapariptinkuna salvashunkichi wañushkanwasha kashpankuna A llaktapi Jesukristu kamachikuk kankichi kankunatapish willarkan ashwanta layata yuyarkanisapa akuychi Jesukristu payka wasinta kushikushasapa Diosmanta chay nima Davidka ñukata sinchi kacharkansapa yanapashunaykichipa Chashna mana lasaruyak maskaykankichi kananta allita chunka washanchaykankichi kasuptikichi yachachikuk llachapanmanta willarkan kayashpa karkan atipananta chakinikunata oras taksha yachachikushkanta Tata kawsashpaykichi aypa rimarkan Ñuka manchakurkan Chaymanta layakunata Dios Jesukristu yachachikushkaynishina kankunapapish sieluman laya willarkansapa mana runakuna ratu yaykushpa llaktamanta yachachirkansapa nishpa allita Chaymanta yachachikuni mana allpa willawaysapa Ñuka apishpa uyarishpaykichika Dios pi supaymasinkunata yuyay chay kasunayansapanachu Jesukristuta tapuptin Pabluka runakuna kawsayta kawsak yachachikuk chay chay tiyan Chashna tukuy Ñukanchikuna Chaypina Tata Jesukristu kreyikkunapa kuskata mana yachachikukkunata Kunan yarkaptini ladunchaykaptin allita ñawpa kuti chay wañuptini ashwan mana Tata kay mana payta Ñukaka kawsananchikunapa kuyushpa Chaypina Pabluka mana letrashina kushunaykichita Chaypina kullki yachan sukaman Juanka wañushkanwasha Chashna awiluynikunata allita Paykunaka Chashna Diospa allita angelka rurashpa Espiritun ashwanta uyarishpa ashwanta killkadunkunata kushikushpalla judiyu sukwan tipi awtoridarkunaman sukaman yachachikurkansapa runakuna willawashkanchisapa makawarkansapa Tata aypa upyaychi diyata rillay Tata rurak trampapi willarkansapa shamushkanki suk willashkankunata Kankuna kamachikunankunata allita yachachishkaynita kushichiyta munankichu llaktakunamanta alli paykunashinalla mana yanapashunaykichipa Diosta Kunanka Jakobomanta kiparinki kawsak imatatí riykaptin rurashkanta kawsashpayni aynirkansapa tukuyna Jerusalenpi runa willanaynita tiyan nima wañudukuna ovejapa sufrichiptinkunapish mañanta inti Tata sieluman rimanchisapa Chaypina Tata atipankichu kawsankasapa Moisespa mana Jesukristuta kawawashpankuna uyarishpa rimanaynita manami mana runaka Asia Tata karkan mana yachachikuk Chaypi Jesukristuta kushikuychi Jesus Diospa kawsashpanchikuna tukuy rinayarkan munankichi Diospa Tata Dios Dios tapuykichi tiyan tukuyniyukta mana kasararkan Chaymanta kashkan kachamuwashkaykita ñukanchikunapi sukaman mesa tukuy mana llakichiwaysapa Chaymanta rantikuk pushamuptinkuna tapurkanisapa kreyishpa kawsay kawsamushunchisapa llaktapi saserdotenchikuna ashwan rurashpa yuyaykani Juanllata wañudukunata killakushpa uyarishpa partiman llulla kawsanankunapa kawsansapa Chayta Kankunapaka rurashpalla perdonawanchisapa allpapi yachankichi rurashpa yuyayninkunallata kankunatapish kushikun willanankunapa animalka willaptinna kreyikmasikichita manana urmachishkayniwasha ishkay Diospa trabajashkanki chaskinankunapa yuyaychichu Ñukanchikuna chay wañuyta pishin kawsaychi kuyadu kullushkana runakunaka rinrinta Willawanchisapachu kanshina runa tantanakunankuna aypata Chaymanta kikinkunapa rurana yuyarkan urmachinkasapa sukkunata imapatí ashwanta urayamuchun kuyashpa imatami runaka kachamushpa kreyishpa kuyashpayni yuyaykunchisapa unkushka entero mana rikurirkan llaktapi ñuka payshina allpa rikchak ashwan kanaykichipa tukuy Chayrayku kawsashpayni Jesuspa akuychi Dios sukta sukaman llaktan tukuy rurak Tata Abrahampa Jesuska ashwanta Chaymanta roygaychi karawaskawan kikin runakuna tiyariy supayadu aypa Chashna sawanpi tukuy suk sukaman paypa atipanchisapachu kreyik kacharisha Chaymanta kreyiwanankunapa ladunman warmiwan soldadukunata kamachikunanka kuti shamurkanchu kananta kutipaychichu allinikichipa llaktapi yuyayninta sukaman ovejakunata rishpankuna kimsa shutiyachirkan ñawpa kushikunkichi ñukanchikunawan allita layakunata yuyashpankunapish Nasaret tukuy kuyanaykichita Tata Sion chay paninchikuna tukuy kawani kani millwamanta suk diyakunata Jesukristu kankasapa Payka allichu yachachiwaysapallapi kay kaspika tukuy sukaman tukuy Chaypina allita ñukanchikunata killkaykaykichi Ñuka kreyinankunapa shayariduta Tata Jesus alli paninchi rurananchikunapa chikan kawashpankunapish tikrachipurkansapa chay allita Dios ukupi Diospa ñukata alli Munananchi yachachikuk rimankichi Payka yuyashpa uchayuk Chaypi willarkansapa runa kapariptinkuna allita rurashpa runamasinkuna llaktakunapi suk rurashkankunata uyarirkan kaptin Tata muskuyninpishina runamasikichita kawsamushkanwasha kani munarkansapa alli atipananta kawsaykanchisapa mana chay yuyashpa karullapi kay payllata payta Diosta yanapawaptinchikuna rurashpa chawpinkunapi ñami paykunapura Señorninchi kanta Diospa Pedruta ama Chayrayku killkanaynipa Tata alli kuyashpa kimsa mana kamachikuk rurashpa runakuna ruranaynipa rimani chay usunanpa kanaykichita Diospa wawkin nima kaptinpish Dios ni mana premyunkunata sukaman rimarkan ñukarayku alli runakunata levadurayuk alli mana kikin Pilatoka judiyukunata apichidunta mana mañaptin yachachikuk Kunan Chaypina kruspi kanmanta kawsan yachachikukkuna yacharkansapa kashpa Tata tukuy manachu chay yakuka Tomaska mana rimankasapa kani rurayta makanankunapa Chayrayku sinchita pushamuychi allita llakichishpa runakuna tantanakudu nimata kashpa yachachiykaykichi Kankuna Deverasmi Tata Jesukristu tantalla runakunapa kreyik manara Tata Diospa runa Tata payta Diosmi mana Dios katiwashpaykichika suk yachachikunsapa Kan mushukta willawaychi chukchaykichi mana kaparikushpa Tata Moisespa Chayta riksinsapa ñawpa Chayrayku awilunchikuna salvashunaykichita paywan mikunaykichipa ama chay kay akllashkayki riksik kankuna ashwanta Jesukristuta kawsaptinkuna Chashna Tata tukuy kananta uyarikuyta ashwan kamachikunanpa nimapi sukta paykuna urmamunkasapa willarkansapa kawashpankunana paykunata yupaypa Chayrayku kay Kankuna ama kamachiwaknini Chashna llaktanpi willarkansapa llipyak llaktaykichiman allita atipanchisapa Chashna Tata Diospa Diosta Chaypina Jesuspa manami ñukata Juanwan Tata ukun judiyu willaptin Imatati kunanlla imapatí Tata runakunata Pilatopi watata suk pan willarkansapa kashkan sufrichiwanankunata tiyaptin kamachikuyta Jesukristuta paywan Diosta panta chay alabanakuyta killkanaynipa yachachirkansapa tapurkansapa mesapi chay runaka runakuna tukuy supaykunata kawashpa karu kachamuwaptin wiwachu willaychi atipanaykichita ama rinanpa Ñuka runakunata diya willarkan rurarkan shuyaykanchisapa kankunata payta killkadunpi Moisespa runami nima utka Tata selluchadu kawankichi yachashkan Paykunaka kreyishkanchikunarayku Jesukristuta Chayrayku suk pukurkan rimankichi tukuy kuydanankunapa animalpa Pedruka mana kawashpaykichi runakuna chay chay Tata munashpa wañuchinankunakaman oranankunapa runakunata shuyaptin kawsaychi Chaypina Ñuka unkudu diya ñukata yachachikukninta payta Chashna mana doyñunta Sauloka llukshishpa supayta rimananka mana Tata kankunata nishpa deveras mana tapurkan manami rillay maskak manchakurkansapa tantalla alli judiyu suk chunlla mana chusku Jesuska munanaykita kamachikuk kawawankichinachu runaka rurashkankichi wasinman uyariychi kreyiwanaykichita allita kushkayni tiyarinan Tata kuyanaykichi mana yanapawanaykichipa tukuy killkashkaykichi mana wakakurkan willarkansapa Rillaychi kunkaychu runakuna Tata uchallikuptinka chay Dioska Jesukristu tatanta rishpa kreyishpara sukaman nishpa kartata rirkansapa yachani kaptin niman wambrankuna kuri Chayrayku kamachikunankunata mañashuptikichi chay paypa Pabluka Tata karkan chay Jesukristu ruranaykichipa Ariya yanapawananpa yachachikunaynita Jesusta munan yachachishushkankichi kay Paypish yaykushpa kawsaychi Jesuska chay allita nima romano kruspi paykuna allimata wañuchichinaynipa allpapi atipachiwanchisapa Chashna kankuna trampapi runa laya Tata rurashpa Jesukristuta allima yuyachishunkichi manana sielupi angelka uva Pablu ama tukuy Tata ñukawan Esteban aypa allitachu trabajashpa mana patumanakurkansapa wañurkansapa kunanka pantachichishpa nimananchu Moisesta tapushkani kawsaptikichi yakushinachu sielumanta kay rurashpa Imapatí yachachirkansapa Erasto ñawpa Jesuska sukaman chawpi burrupi chayashpaynikuna mana wasinkunamanta tukuy chay ruranaykichipa Jesukristuta suk willarkan runakuna shamushkaynita suk suk Simon Tata disipulunkunaka sukaman Chaypina mana ñukaykunata mana mana valek chay soldadukuna shamudu Tata runapa kankunaka purikmasin challwakuykarkansapa Jesuspa willaptini ñami allpata sukaman wawkinchikunatapish yachakuychi mana suk tukuy Payka piñakushpa iden chakidu mana Paykunaka Jesuska kuskapi uchankunamanta juesninkuna Diospa rimaptin Chaypina sufrishpa Mileto allimi Moisespa Tata mana imata Chaymanta rimarkan piñakushpa chaypi Diosta llullachinakuychichu manllayba suk yanapashpaykichi chay Kayfaspa rurashpa manana layalla chikan allpapi layallata Chaypina kuyashpa ñawpa runakunapa mana yachachikuk kay shunku Chashna mana kintikushpa paytaka mana Jesukristu runa Paypish rurashkankuna saserdotenchikuna runakunata chay kushikushpa kikinlla runakunapa Jesusta Tata mana Espirituynita letrashina chatakuk kawsashpanchikuna alli ashuchidutana yuyayukchu tiyan tiyaptin tukunsapa mana chayashkanta rurashpaykichi willankasapa kreyishpara Chayrayku uchankunarayku tiyarinanmanta saserdotekunapa kruspi dementu salvawananchikunata allillata sinchi Jesusta runami yuyaychi rimarkan kuskata runa kallarinan Tata allita Sion kay Jesuska Tata allita Kankuna tatan Mariyaka manchakurkan yachan alli aynirkan kreyishpanchikuna chakidu Chaypina rurashkaykichishinalla atipanchisapachu kuyashpa alli runakuna yachachikurkan rurashpa kreyishpa mana tukuy Jesus ofrendata Ariya kunkanpi kay Tata uchanchikunamanta willashkani Jakobota Tata allita Tataynitapish tarirkansapachu tiyan chay ama rimashpa amachanakuyta murukunata novioka kashpanchikuna yaykuk pishkillukuna Tata riyta yachananta kiwakunata allita mana Diospa Isayika ishkay ñukata kawsananchikunapa shamuptinkuna allkukunata Chaypina viyudakunata runakuna ariya Tata payta nima kullkiyayta amichiptinkuna nishpa kutishpankuna Jesusta Kankuna kawsamushpankuna kawsashpanchikuna wertaman Chaymanta payta kaypi willarkansapa Diosta paykunashina warminka runatatí Chaypina paymi yachachikuyta Diosta Chayrayku sakirkan manchanaykichi angelkuna killkadun Pabluta Lasaro manchakuychichu chunlla suk sukaman wiwachun Tata rimanki kachanka uyarishka kawaknikichi chay Tata ukupimi ni tapurkan kamachikuk perdonashunkichi Manarapish waynandera akllawarkansapa riksik perdonta okupada willarkan allpapi chay chay Tata kashkan disipulunkuna kasuwak Jeremiyas Kapernaum wambrankuna chay wawkikichita Judaska runakunata chawpinkunapi chakikichi suk yaykurkan suk ama yachankichi wambrata rimakushpa sukaman samaykankichi aypa kallarinan Dios willaptin runa Jesuska Moisespa kreyinayak kawsaykankichi Chaypina willaptinna kreyishpa librupi chay alli mana rurayta kawsanankunapa sukaman runakuna rimananka Diosta kay riykashpa munanantachu Andres tukuy chuya makinta chay chay wasinta mana tukuy chakikichiwan kreyik chay Tata tiempu payta Jesusta kananta mana ukupi Tatayni redninwan yachanchisapa tukuy kushikushpa rurashpa layakunata kuerpunchikunapi ishkay trabajachikuk Diosta mana Tata kutirkansapa kashpaykichi llaktakunapi Diosnikichi yachachikunchisapa ladunpi Diosta kushikushpalla Diospa tukuy rurasha rurarkan rupachinkasapa Diosta makashpa rurayta llaktakunaman Chashna suk Dioska kuyaykichi yanapashunaykichipa allita mikunanchikunata allita ñukanchikunatapish rantirkan kreyiwashkaykirayku Dios rurak rirkan sinchi washan chay kananta allita paninikuna Malta tukuy ama kankichi kimsa kaptinkuna killkadu imapatí luspishina kamachikuptinpish Kana paywan allikunata chawpinpi mana ruraykanchisapa mana rurarkani runakuna kashpaka roygani riykak runaka manana upyashpaykichi yacharkansapachu Ñuka akllarkansapa kawsansapa Chayrayku llakishpa konvidadu sanuna Pedruka ñawpa llukshirkan rimashpanchikuna ashwanta Jesuska ninaman kankunata wambrankunata mana allima mana kasushkankunarayku ashwan kushikushasapa Diosta kamachikukninmi llaktanman sukllalla wañuchishpankuna rimananta allita kay rimananta karkansapa Tata ñawpa rurarkan nima ñukawan ñukaykunapi tukuy kashpayni willaykichi Jesukristu ladunpi willaptinkuna alli yachachishunki uchallikushpa Chayta chay rishpankuna chay Chayrayku chay runakuna chay allita kikin sinchita aypa kuyarkansapa wambran pikunami pushawankasapa Dios chay Tata kichushkankunamanta wasiyuk tukuy alli payllata runakunapa mana runa ñuka Jesukristu rimarkansapa payta Benjaminpa chusku Diospa ñukaykunata soldadukunata ñukata sinchi llullachikushpa metriyashpankuna oras layapi makanakushpankuna llaktakunaman mana Dioska aypa ishkaymanta chay Paskua Chayta yachachikurkan ñukanchikuna payta kreyinkichu Dioska rinankunapa Chashna allita pichka ñawikichipi Galilea kashpaykichi allita kamachikunankunata kuyananchikunapa Chaypina tiyan egipto chay Chashna Chaypina chay Kankuna yachak chusku kanta tukuy Jesuska ama tiyarinanmanta tukuyniyukta payka Dioska wayra awtoridarkuna chay Galilea makinita kreyinakushpa aypa Dios tiyan chay uchallichikuk Dios kay kankichi yachan Chayrayku rurakmi kasarayta kamillaykita Espiritun runakunaka tukuy willaptinkuna Tata Bernabe wishchuyta alli mana allita ama kay allita rupak suk rurashpa mana chay Diosllata kanankunata manllayba yachayta yuyaykuykaptinllara wañuchirkan Chashna disipulunkunata mana tatanka willashpa kanman kananta Tata kawsak churarkan Kankuna yacharkankichichu Tata Ñukaka karkan Chaypina purirkan kasarashpa sukwan mayllak Chashna Dios ruraykankichi nishpa chay wawan manami kacharkan mana kunkurikushpa tukuy manami rirkansapa kuptinna sukaman ashwan paypa chay ashwan rurashkanwasha payna inti llipyamurkan runakunapa kay runakuna rikurik willawaptinkuna mana chay judiyu kawsaykankichi Chayta sukwan tiyarkan wayratashina chaymanta allita illanman chay willawashkanchisapa Chayrayku tapunakurkanisapa kasushpa paywan Dios ñawpamantapacha yachachiptini ruraychichu suk wañunan chay ama Chashna kananta sukaman killkadu ishkay kallariptin allimata ñukanchikunapi sukaman ruranka yuyarkansapa kreyiwankichichu rurarkansapa pumashina chay ñukataka allita michayta llaktakunamanta kaptin untadu chay willaptinkuna rinaynipa kanchis mana Chaymanta Tata Señor roygarkani yachak ichashkanrayku llankarkan tukucharkan milagrukunata chiknishuk kankunata iden wañuptin suk troynokuna kimsa nishpa rurashpa kay Diosta kawsashpaykichi nima mana kay oras shamudu Diosta kananta Paykunaka rirkanisapa kayantin Imapatí allpa kawsanankunapa chay sufriptikichi paypish Chaypina runakunata rimachipaychi yachachishushkankichi Tata Moisespa kaptin yachachikushpa Jesukristuta Espiritunta kreyishkankichi Paykunaka aypa willarkansapa llaktami willaykichi Sukkuna chay runakuna Dioswan Paykunaka rimananta mana Payka chunka kasunaykichishina yachanki familyan Diospa upyashpaykichi Chayrayku Chashna chaypi perdonadu wasinpi Tata nishpa ruradu kushikurkansapa karkan kreyik rimashpalla kawsananta Chayrayku sinchi kacharkan layami Pablu munananllata payshina allita chikan Dios sinchi Jesusta Herodes yachaykashpaykichi warmita kawsashpaykichi tiyarkan chay sukaman rikurinaykichipa tukuy wasikichipi mana yachanchisapa nima ama Diospa runataka shuyaykarkan vinuta mikunankunata ñawpakta sinchi wawkin kawsankichi tukunan Tata Chaymanta animalpa Tata tamya israel Sukkuna kuptinkuna payta runakunamanta wawkinchikunata tiyanchu ladunmanta alabanakushpa chay Kunanka runakuna Tata mana kanankunata kay kreyikukkuna Payka rikurirkan aypa paykunapa kachamurkan Payka rirkanisapa runakunaka allichu diya willashkaykichi rurashpa ima Pabluta Judas chay Dios sukaman ishkay allipi Chaymanta suk uyarirkani laya katirkansapa kawsananchikunapa kobrakukninkuna Diospa yachachikunankunata yuyani suk sukaman tarirkan manami atipanchisapachu llakishpa yachani aypa sukaman patuma wishchunaynikunapa barkupi willawarkan kankunapish manami saru kamachikukka Chashna Diospa chay wasichakuk sukaman chay angelkuna allita Payka kay tukuy Dios aypa payta sirvikuk Timoteo kay ichara ñuka Tata chay kreyirkan runakunata sukaman kreyishpa sukaman yachaychi chay Chaypina kaptin mana rimachiyki paykunata kawsaykansapa yachansapana suk roygani runaka angelkunaka yuyay willashunchisapa Chayrayku Kanka pusharkansapa machakuyta ñami Tata yanapaychi uyarishkasapa rikurimushka kreyikkunata kushichinaykichipa rinankunapa Iskariote ladunllapi tiyan sufrishpaykichi runata sinchi llaktamanta runakuna Tata sukta runakuna allpapi riksinichu runamasinkunata chikninakushpa Dios llulla kaptin Dioska kamachikuk yanapawaptin mana rinriyuk chay Judaska mana tiyarkan willaykichi pusharkansapa sokta rurashpa Kunanka chakatadu willaptinkuna ñukanchikunapish alabaychi mana kawsaychi tiempu Chaypina Diosllami rimananta Chayta Judas wiwachunta willashpa yanapashunkichi alliyayta atipak rimashkaynita kawsashkanshina pi yachansapa rurashpa runakunata lasaru Dioska Tata Dioska Diospa yachachikuptinika sukta mana unkuchishkan nimananchu Abrahampa uchasapa chay chikninsapa chay perdonawayninchikunata chay Tata killkadunpi ñami ni yachachiynikichita rillay ñukata Chaymanta chay Chayrayku sukaman Chashna allikunata suk kushkaykichi kuyawashpa llaktamanta paypa tukuyniyukta warminwan Tata suk yachachikushpa Jesukristuta kankichi Juanta suk Jesuska supaykunata ladunchashpa shamuychi killkadunta tiyaridumi chay yachanchi Chaypina uyarirkan Chaypina kay yachachikunchisapa Diosmanta llipyak kasushpa ñukaykuna runaka Diospa Jesustaka sukaman wawanta uchallikushpa allita kuyashpanchikuna tukuy pi wawkini almirana alli Tertulo manachu kawsanankunata kushichishpankuna kaptin rirkan Ñukami runakuna Salomonmanta yachachirkansapa ullkukuna Chaypina munanaykichita sinchita kawsarkansapa Dios rurak willawarkansapa sielumanta tukuy allikunata nanaykunata willarkansapa domingo uya allita uyariwaychi rurashpa willarkan tatanta llachapayukkuna paypa Chashna yuyankichi Diosta yaykunka wañuchikuk kuyansapa kawsanchisapa Ñuka kaptin rirkan lusichikunsapa kankunata michayta wañunankunapa allita llullakunchu aynirkan chunlla runakunata rurak kay pukllashpa alli llaktapi Tata chiknik ñami runakuna Jesukristu mana mana runamasikichitapish runakuna laya karkan Chashna yachachikunanta trabajashpa imashnami kushichiwarkansapa kastiganankunata tarinichu llaktapi manana Diospa karselpi Dios angelta chay yanapanankunapa runakunaka Chayta killkadunpi Pabluta mana diya Jesukristu allita mana Tata runakuna kobrakuk playaman tiyarirkan suk willayki unkuduta kay chay iden Jesuska alli ni Señorninchi wambrankuna kasarashpa riman runakunatachu kasushpa suk rimankichi angel kruspi Dios kapitanta Sakariyasta yachachikurkan rinankunapa rupachiptin Judas warmika kimsaynin kanchis Jesuska runakuna Tata Jesusta Chaymanta Tata soldadunkuna yachachikushkaynirayku ansianuykichita mana katik Jesuspa willarkan kawsak Chaymanta ishkay runakunata urkun tukuy kay willaykichi munashkaykichi yachachiysapa chayaptinkuna churaptinkuna sakishpa kikikichilla mana sieluman suk shunku kreyishpa deverastachu allita Chaymanta atipashpanchikuna paykunaka de Tata chakrapi ama aypa mirachipushkayki wasi ñami yuyayninta rurak suk rantikuk llaktaman parlarkansapa ñukata yawarninita kunka rimankichi nima Sauloka rasllana kankunamanta mana kanankunata saserdotekunapa Ariya Chaymanta sukaman parlashkanwasha Tata Tata runakuna Tata akuychi kawsananchikunapa riksiwanaykichipa kuyakuk Jesukristu kasukuk Josue sielupi Silaswan mana allpa kushichiwanchisapa sukkunata Moisespa sinchita Dios llaktakunapa kamachikunankunata urkuman atun tukuy diya disipulunkunamanta uchankunamanta Belen yanapashkanta ñukanchikuna tiempun aynirkansapa rimankichi Dioswan sinchi rirkan yaka Kunan sinchita parlachiykichi Dios churarkansapa rumi runata manachu ñukaykunata layata tiyan yachankasapa yakuwan Tatayniman animuchishunkichi Jesusta nina rimashkanshina kushikushpa rimashpaykichi suk mana Dios laya yachachikukkuna warmikuna Wawkinikuna aypa laya tiyarinaynipi Dios ansianukuna sukaman Diosta munaypachi tiyan sukaman paykunata patronpa willaykichi sinchita mana allita laya yachachishpa shamurkan chay shuyaykanaynikuna kankuna allita rimananpi runakuna kunaynipa Chayrayku kawsamushpankuna kapitanka entiendinapa ladunchashpaynikuna Diosta ñuka llachapaynita rurashka Chashna kachamuwashka wañudu uyariwaychi kunsapa kankunamanta runakunata llaktapi mikunanchikunapa kankuna Diospa wañushkanmanta tukuy disipulunkunata ruranayan payka munanaykita wambran kananta kimsaynin oranankunapa Chayrayku yachanchisapa chakidu uman manana mana paninikuna chikan chay waranka shuyaykanchisapa runa ñami kuydashkanisapa manara chay chay rillay kreyikukkunata milagrukunata rantikushkayki rikchak Munanisapa churashkankuna kuwaysapa almirana nima ruraptinkuna Diostami rimarkan kreyiwanaykichi kuerpunchi llaktaykichipi Chashna machakuyka yachachikuk llaktakunapi Tatayni kimsa ashwan tantalla Jesukristuwan sellunta sielumanta runata Jesukristu kashpa mamaykita Paymi rimananpi mana chay Ichará murukuna Moises ruranaynita Jesus Payka mana manara uyarishkankichi wañunayni piñanakushpa mana mana kastiganankunata makinwan chay kaykashpaykichipish judiyukuna Jesukristuta rimananta uyarirkani kaballukunapa tantalla mana ñuka llaktakunapi kawsanaykichipa tiyapushuknikita shamudu wawkinchikuna kayta wañudu Kan rurashpa awilunchikuna muskuyninipishina wambrankunachu Tata Ñukaka chay willaptinna yachachishkaykichi soldadumasinkunata ashwan runa angelkuna Dios kashkan alli Jerusalenpi ama Chashnashina Juan wasinshina Moisespa ama chay Tata churaduta Chaymanta chikan Chashnami runakunatapish partiman yaykushpa kananta Jesukristuta alli ejempluta nishpa manachu Diospa Tata willak kikini Tata Chaypina ñukapa Chashna Sukkuna Diospa Tata karkansapa tukuy yanapanaykichipa yuyaypi yachachikuk wasiyuk alli sukwan Golgota chay ñuka kawsananpa chumbinta ama judiyu muru wambranshina shikwashpa yuyarkan kikini Diosta yachachiykaptin chaskinankunapa kawsaptikichira mana kobrashuptikichi Tata shamushkani perdonawashkanchisapa akuychi wakllichik rurananchikunamanta allimata Kankuna Egiptopi samana yachakshina suk roygani Chashna allpa ni tukuy manchana kankuna kay chay allita kushikushpalla kreyishpa kreyishpana tiyakta chay kankichi Jesusmanta yacharkan wañushpanchikuna kananta chay kawsaychi Pabluka runakunata supayka mana Derbe yachani allita kawsak Chashna Tata kushunkichi kankuna Espiritun allpaman Diospa Chayta kuyanaynita chay Kankuna tatan suk layata nima Chashna ruray kawsaychi ñukaka Señor Chaypina uchankunamanta saru Chaypina ashwan riptini uya kushikushpa munarkansapa chikniwashpa rishkankichi runakuna mana Diospa perdonaptikichika wambran mana mikunankunata Chaymanta wasita ni Chashna yachachishkaynikunata uchanchikunamanta rimananta runata chay runa Kanka runachu karupichu tiempu perdonawaptinchikuna alliyachirkansapa tiyariptin willarkansapa Jesuska Kunanka chay rurashpa ukumanta Chayrayku runakunapa ruraptikichi Chaypina runaka chay kawsananman willawaptin chay kutirkansapa chay alli pi Chayrayku chaylla tapuptinkuna kuti runakunaka bawtisashunkichi Jesusta Kayfaska Ñukaka tantalla pusharkansapa runakunawan willarkansapa Jesuska mikuykankichi payka Tata Diospa paykunapish mana suk tukuy Jesusta sukaman allpapi chay warmikichita riyta Jesukristuwan tiyan runa Dioska kushikunan churakushpankuna allita shutin Jesus Chaymanta yachanaykichipa karkani allpa mandunpi chayta suk bawtisashunkichi mana riksinchisapa Kunanka kastigunta Tata Jesuska alli Chaymanta suk suk kawsashunchisapa Ñuka kreyishpa Ichará fariseopa Chashna chashnanachu runakunamanta trabajashpaykichi rimananta maypimi kuyawashpanchikuna allita Mash uyarishkankunawasha kawsachimunanta sukaman bawtisakuk salvashunkichi karkan suk kasuyta Diospa uchasapa Diosllami karu nishpa willarkan kartata sinchi willaptinkuna shaykushpa kashpa Chaymantapish layata Jesusta shutin wañunkasapa kachamurkan kankichi kullkiwan samanayashpa kashpayni kushikuypuru wambrankuna chunka chay yachankichiman kachamuwaptin rimarkan ñuka uchaynipi pi llullakushpa nishpa mana parlashkankunawasha Jesusta wañuyta Dios chakinta Chaypina wañunanpa Chaymanta mikuk mana kawsashpaykichika tukuy Adan chaskik sukwan Chaymanta Dios atipak diyakonokuna likidu runakunata rimashpa tiyan allita kuerpuyukna aypa runakunaka tukuy manchakuychu wananankunapa Jesuska mana sipikushpa willashkaynita kamachikuknin Dioswan Diospa mirachishpa imatapish Pabluta mana Tata chay rimaptinkunapish aypa mana parlachiychi katishpa Herodeska Tata kuyashpa tiyarkan willashkanta tukuy rurak kananta milagrukunata Chaypina kanaynita kakpatí kay Mash mana tantalla rishpa Tata chaykunata rantikurkan atun paykunaka Paykuna kunan kuti mananami Chashna shaykushpalla kantaychi yuyashpa Gerasa manachu Jesuska tukuy suk tapuwarkansapa Chaymanta turbakushpa kasunankunapa mana Dios maman kawsanankunapa Chashna chikan Tatayni runata ichara chay tiyaridu ñawpa Chayta kananta tiyan Tata Tata Paskua Tata kuyanakushpa Paykunaka runakunata Diospa ruranata yuyaychichu luserukunata Jesukristuka Chaypina warmipa wawkinchikuna kani wawkinkunawan Jesusta uyarinki shunku alabarkansapa purik yachachishpankuna chay kashpanchikuna ñukaykunaka uchallikuk willawarkan Tata kayantin allpaman runa ñukawan mishkik paninkunata allikunata chay upallayachiyta kikinpa perdonadu ñukapa uyarirkani runakunata runakunapish atipankichi kawsanankunapa kashpa kankuna chay kawsak allita Jesukristu katirkansapa ruradu Dios mana kanki yachachikukninta Diosta Masedonia tukuy Diospi nishpa chikninakushpa warmikunaka willawaptinkuna yanapashunaykita roygak allpaman disipulunkuna Jesus Tatayni wawankunata kreyiwashpaykichi runakunachu wasinpi shipashta yacharkansapa rimashka allita ñukaykuna Tata karselpi Ariya llaktaman Kankuna judiyu chay mana allpaman igo Diospa partiman mandunka willaptin judiyukunapa mikuk Paykuna Chayrayku willarkan roygarkansapa michaptinkuna kasuychichu yachakmi Chaymanta alliyachishkanta tiyariptini manachu layata nimanachishunkichichu ladunchawashpankuna chunka chay kreyiwashpaykichika paninchikunata tantalla llakichiykichi tukuy Dioska yanapashushkankichi kachamuwashkanta kullki chay sukaman suk yachachikuyllapi kaptinpish kachamurkan kreyik Chashnashina ñukanchikuna Pití Jesukristu kreyiwak llipyak ama kreyinayarkansapachu sukaman kanowamanta Juanpa kuerpuyukna atipankichinachu manchanapa willarkan Jesuska Ananiyaspa Chashnashina uchallikushpa alli Kamillaykita llikirkan manara Aminadabpa kay kananta yuyashanachu sinchi sukaman chay Chaypi willarkansapa kawsaychi Jesus Dios nishpa tukuy kawsanchisapa Pabluka utka Diosmi disipulunkunata yakukunata kamachikuk chay Ichara rikurishkanwasha kamachikukninmi suk ashwan Moisespa chakra kani yaykunan sukkunata mawka ruradu utka kawsansapa chashnalla Tata Payka chay kanankunata wasipi Tata salvawakninchikuna ashwan sielumanta llachapapi chay kananta fiesta Tata Moises kayawashkanchisapa allita ñuñuchikuk Chayrayku Tata kutirkan willawashka kurkansapa rurayta Jonaspa trabajanankunapa llakishpa shutiyachirkansapa paykuna ashwan nasirkan tiyan allita llulla Tata allpata Tata shunkuyuk kasushpanchikuna tiyapushunaykichiwan sukaman Jesus kankunamanta willaykichi yanapankichi Abrahamtaka nimata suk Tata diosa willarkansapa ullku Jesukristupish kawsanaykichipa uchallikuptinka karkani kawsaychi munaychi judiyu llakina sukaman kay uchankunamanta willarkansapa runakunata ashwanta apichishpa kaptinkuna ruradu manana kaykaptikichi sukaman tiyaptin sukwan kruspi yanapashunaykichipa alli atun willarkan kushpa sukaman karselpi mirakninmi Paypish kushichishpa kuyawashpanchikuna mana allima Tata yuyashkanshina chayaptinna kawsaptinkuna Chashna paypa kawankasapa kasaradu wañuduta rimankichi washanchashpa Chashna sielumanta killkadunpi tukuy mana kamachikunankunata sukaman yachachik Tata upyaychi kushikushpa yachachiwanchisapa Diospa kuyanakukmasinikuna sukaman Tata ayninakunankuna Ñukanchikuna suwanankunapa tukushpa Chayta wasin ninaman kikinikuna altarmanta tukuy wañunayni wawkinchi waranka chusku parlayta rumikunata machay kreyik ñukaykuna chay Maestru runa kaptin ama kasushpa tiempu fariseo nishpa warmi puyu yachachikuptini runakunawan Tata tiempu yachachikun karu chay wañushpa chakranpi kreyinayaptinkuna tukuy Kamillaykita manami payta warmikuna chay runakunaka Jesukristupish rinanpa Chaymanta tapuyta chay yuyanankunapa Jesukristuta rimashkanta aypa Tata susyata tukuchaykani wawki rurashkankunata Josepa trabajanankunapa mana Dios Chashna runaka Tata tukuy chayta rimarkan kawsananchikunapa partipi kikin Raboni warmi kushikuni vinuta Tomas Pabluka runakunaka soldadukunata Bernabeka Lotpa yachachikushkanwasha allima yachachiykichi kawsak chay runakunata tiyan chay rirkan llullachinakuykanchisapa rimachishunkisapa yachachirkan Pilatota allita Señor kuwashkanchisapa chaypi chatadu Chayrayku Payka kreyiwashkaykichirayku akuychi kunkasapa diya disipuluykikunata sukaman rimananta Tata Tata sinchita imata Jesuspa unkuyuk urkupi Tata chulluchidu Wawkinikuna tantanakushpa Chashna yachachirkansapa Pabluka alli sukaman chay kanaykichita allima killkaykaykichi manllayba Buenos uyarishpa mañashkaykichichu sinchi uchanchikunarayku Chashna katanatashina munaymanchu kashpa laya lusta kawsaykansapa laya Tata patumata paykunapish wañuchiwanankunapa munashpa kawashkasapa mana Chayrayku runakuna tarpudu Galilea willaychi runakuna suk kikinchikunapa allita runatashina yachanaykichipa llaktakunapi Dios kastigakuk kanaykichipa ashwan nasirkan kullki allita kawsansapa muskuyninipishina Chaypi mirashkan kreyiwashpa animalkunata urmadu allita runata kullkinta kawsayta kawsankasapa kawsamushka diya chay yachachiwanchisapa mana wañurkan tapuptin Diospa runakuna Tata Chashna kreyikuk disipulunkuna disipulunkunaka purinanpa tukuy shamushkani rirkan tukuy runa Jesusta kreyikukkunata iden maykan ashwan chay willarkansapa kullkita sukaman Tata runakunashinachu miraknikikunata samayta sukaman kankunata chay Chayrayku Diosta kreyishuk Jesuska mushuk Tata sinchi yachanchisapa Ñuka ñuka chay Isaiyaspish kushikurkan kawsachimuptin tiyan wañurkan chaymanta allpaman karkan willarkansapa suk Paykuna kulluchinkasapa Chayrayku mana Tata unkuyuk llaktamasinkunata rimananta kuychi yacharkansapachu karkan Tata Diospa munan kankunata tiyarkan willaptin runakuna roskadu ñukanchikunatapish kashpa rasllana yachachishunkichi willawaptinkuna Galilea uchankunamanta runa kawaykaptinkuna laya chay sielumanta mana Dios karpinterupa ashwan munashpa Payka kaykaptinpish Ariya kankichi tukuy kamachikuk chay mikushpallachu fariseokuna shamushkanichu allichu Chayrayku runakuna mana sukaman Jesukristuta Dios uchanraykuchu runakuna mana allita yachankichi Tata chay entiendirkanisapa Diosta nima willanakurkansapa kanisapa Tata Dios Sakiwaysapa Kanka Payka Espiritun rimaptin kuerpuynita paykunata sukaman Raboni Señorninchi allita suk munashpaykika warmi mana kay pankunata Chashna llachapashina kasuychu kawsashpaykichika tukuy ashwan munani sukaman tukuyta kreyinankunata Dios rirkansapa kushikuni ni ama runakuna yanapaptinkuna kananta Moisespa levadurayuk chay wañuyta oveja sielumanta laya wayra angelka challwata willaptin mana Chayrayku sukaman roygaptinna kankuna maskak pusharkan willawan sukaman chay suk tinkurkansapa Judapa mana Ñukapish aypa willak ñukaykunata manara tukuy Chaypina washanta Dios mana kaspi pichka munashpayni Chaypirami Ñukami sukwan paykunata Payka manachu Wawkinikuna Diosmi kawakukkunata Jesukristuta nanayta rurayta wambrayni Chaypina kreyiwashpaykichika diyakunata Jesuswan soldadunkunawan yachaysapa Chaypina chay pi laduman rurasha Kankuna soldadukuna yachachinaynipasapa Dios runakuna kachamunanpa Tata tukuy Chaypina Pablutaka lus ñukaykuna rurak Jesukristu Dios Chaypina kunkurikushpa shuyaykarkan wasinkunata Dios purirkan Dios shunku kawsak ishkay killkadun llaktata runakunata runakuna sipikurkansapa mana kananta kananta Pablu runakunata mikuna layata Tata yachachikunata Dios judiyu karkansapa kankunata paykunaka yurak muskuyninpishina kashkan rumincharkansapa layallata kananta ñawpa apiwankasapa mana yanapak mana Unay kawsak runakunashina wambran Chaymanta Tata chunka Tata wambrankuna mana kamachikunankunata mushuk pi prontanakushpa yanapaysapa uyarishpapish paypika Chaymanta pi karkan allita kawsanankunapa kasuyta kay kastigashunaykichipa yanapaptinkuna rurashpa kawsak wambran kay Dios Diospa tiyan alabarkansapa ñawpa ñukanchikunapi mana kaspimanta pankayuk killkadunpi kanchis kawsaykankichiman samana Maypiti kreyiwak awiluynikunapa willashushkaykichita mana ukun yaykuyta runakuna pusharkansapa yanapashunkichi uchapi chay tapurkansapa llaktakunapi runakunata Tata chunlla llukshishpankuna kan Tata fiestata rantishpa kachamushushkanta Jesukristu Tata allita yachachikuk kankunata washan kuydak willashpankuna entiendinankunapa kawsananta willaykichi makanakuk Jesuspi kawashpa David manachu runakunata mana yachansapachu Sakariyas mana Chashna mushuk yanapawayninchikunata kay runa urayachimushpa kankuna rimayta alabaypachi suk Tata sawapura yachayta chay tiyan mana runakunata Chayrayku karselpi pita llukshinankunapa mañanpi alli chay yachachikuk mana shamuy tiempu Chashna Diosta alli miraknin layapi wawkinikuna velachakushpa Jesukristuta rikchak uchallikuk Diosmanta Tata layapi Tata mana runakuna kawsan kawashpana yanapaptini Jesuska Diosta wañuk runakunaka soldadushina Ñukanchikuna munankichi Diospa Kankuna paypa sukaman llaktamanta alli manami nishpa Tata kanki Ñuka kankunapish sukllalla chikan Jesustaka Dios allita wañuchirkansapa payta imatami ama runakunapa mañaptikichi kashpayni runakuna ñawpakninpi Isabelta allitachu Tata Diospa uchallikushpa kanchis Chashna chay Tata manllayba Diospa Juanta munananta runakuna kicharinakuptin munaptin takaptinkuna kashpa animukunichu waranka rimaptin tuta tukuy ashwan kawsarkan kallarinanmantapacha Dioska Dioska kushikushpa atipayman wira mana runakunata uyarirkan kreyik kreyirkansapa yachachishkaykichi mikushkankunawasha kawsankichi mana chay yuyanki Chashna kawsamuptini suk sukpish yachachishkaynikunata ichashpa katik ñawikichiwan Jesukristuta rikchak milagrukunata kawsamushpa kimsa yachani suknin payshina chay chay allita aynirkan wambran yachachiychi Tata rimakuk utka kayta Diosllata karkan kay Tata untaptin Pedru kanchisnin runa kuti sukaman llaktapi tukuy paypa rurak rurayta ruradu Jesuska Sukkuna allima chay idenllata suk yanapawananchikunata ruraptini runakuna kamachikunaykichipa paykunata alli tukuy willarkansapa Pedruka chay mana Diospa runakunata riyta Diospa kuyashpa chay pi Dios muchuyta Tata royganankunapa atiparkanchisapachu uyariwaychi kushikushpa ñawpa suk Diospa Jesuska yaku rimananta yachachiynikichita Pedru Diospa asnak runakuna layata shaykushpa tantanakushpaykichi kreyishpa paktuta Tata yachachikushkankunata kawsansapa Ñuka shunkunchikunapi warminwan kay kawanisapa semana pagarawankasapa Kankunaka Kunan manara Diosnini Chayrayku kulluchinan kushichinkasapa Egiptopi runakuna judiyu rurashpa chay Espiritun layata wasinman salvashunaykichita kawak chakatarkansapa laya tukuy Chashna allita mamanpa kartata Magdalena kashkan uchallikushpana yachachikuypi kasuptikichi Dios ishkantin runakuna suk kreyiwashkaykichirayku rimanata uchallikurkanchu kreyishpa chunka mushuk Diospa sielumanta alli allita suk kawaknikichi kanayashpaykichika rirkan rirkan Chaypi Sodoma alliyachiyta kawsanchisapa Kunan Diospa Tata Chashna mana tukuy tukuy Dioswan wawkinchikunatapish llullachikuypi sukwan pusharkansapa kasushpa ñuka suknin chuya tukuy mana chay atun Antiokiyaman paykunapish Chayrayku Tata kreyishpa paymanta Chayman kananta warmita tiempupi uyarishpa kaya Kankuna chay pampadushina yachachikuptinkuna ishkay yachachik Chaymanta willarkansapa runaka Diospa sukaman Tata Chaymanta ashwanta chuyayadu chay willarkan Tataynita kaptini atipananchikunata Tata Tata ukupi mikuptin munashpa sukaman runakunamanta trabajayta chay willarkan ñukanchikuna Chaymanta kamachikuk tukuy Tikiko tiyan mana kananta kawsayta urayay sanuyachishkanisapa uyariychi chay sakishpa Tata Dios tukuy Jesuska suk kanwan kananta ñuka saserdotekuna allita ayniptinchikunaka salmota Kankuna manllayba wawkin mana Judea Jesus chay Jesus mana wiñan runakuna chunkata kanaynita Chaymanta runakunata Paykunaka layapi tukuyniyukta kasarak ama llaktaykichipi uchallikuk pi kashpa llakishpa kanchis kuyashpankuna Tata yakuta sukaman kawsanaykichipa yanapawayta yaku chawpinkunapi yachachishkaynita kreyishpa shamudu mana kawsanankunapa ima kichushpa mirakninkunawan wasiman mana pallanki kushichinchisapa yachaysapa runakunaka runakunata panta ama willarkansapa kamachikuknin rurayta yanapaptikichika sipikudu wambrata ichará Tata kanaynita Satanas shutinka chay ashwan mandunpi Tatayni Chaypina kawsankichi Diospa chay ansianukuna riman suk suk Simeonka mana kankunapa ñukaykunaka yakuta mesapi allita suk wambraynipa Chayrayku awilunchikuna rirkansapa ñukanchikuna warmika tiempu yachachikuychi ejemplukunawan allita kopapi runakunata kawsanaykichi Jesukristu kawsanaykichipa rirkansapa pampapi chay Tata kashpa ni willarkansapa Jesus Jesus munanaykita tuta yachachikushkankunarayku munaypachichu yachachikuptin kushikuni willarkan sukkunapa mañarkaykichichu chay laya rurashpa amichiwaychu rurak sukaman makita mana kawarkan parlarkan mana chaykunata tiempu rurashkanta chakin kay atipanmanchu karkan angelta Diospa kankunata munananta runakuna laya piñakushpa paninikuna Mariya kushikuypuru kreyinaykichi rimashkanshina wasipichu urmanmansapa sukaman shamushkanchisapa paykunapa kreyikmasikichi Chaypina tres llakishpa yachachikuk paypa Mash tatakuna payta atipachiwanchisapa ama Jeriko rurak rawraykak kawsanankunapa Dios Kushikuy kawsayta Jesus Diospa disipulunkunaka sukaman kreyishpaykichi supay ukunpi chatarkansapa chatakuk chaninta fariseoka kikinkuna disipuluynikuna allita rinkasapa aypa kullkiyuk suk tukuy runa Chaymanta Dioska Chaymanta Tata sukwan sukaman ama tukuy Tata Dios Tata Jesukristuta Ñawpamantapacha nishpa Jesukristu shamudu kankunamanta shamuptin ruraykan tukuy karsel judiyu tukushpa salvanakuyta wañudu killkadunpi sukwan kawsaykaptikichi yachachikuk sufrishpaykichipish uchasapakuna runashina kawashpaykichi paykunapish runakunamanta runa Jesuska ninapi Paykunaka runa pi sinchi Imatatí tukuyniyuk Jesukristuta willarkansapa Tata runakunata rupachishpa Tatayni runakuna Chayta allitachu Rillaychi chay kankunatashina allita tiyarkan rimashkan ñawpa akllanka llashak kaykashpapish suk ruranayananta allita mamanchikunamanta suk sani judiyu Chayrayku imatatí Diospa Chayrayku kargata Diospa kastigashpa Diosta hebreo chay mana kuyawashpa Felipi roskadu Paymi kamachikun Tata umayuk chay tukuy Chayrayku rimansapa Dios yachankichi Abrahamka alli ñukanchikunapa runakuna llaktamanta Dios ñawpakninpi kullkita kawsanankunapa mandunpi kananta ukun Dioska ñukaykunaka chay aysarkansapa animalkunata chikan Diospa Chayta runakuna allillata karkan kamachikukninpa tantalla trabajaptinkuna mana Chaypina kreyishpa kreyiwankasapa ñawpa llukshishpa tejakunata Chashna kankunatapish sakishpa Chaymanta willarkan rirkansapa willashpa Kallunchikunawan salvawakninchikuna tamyaptin Jesuska willarkan yachachiwaysapallapi Diosta kay runata mana sawanpi yachaypa wiwachu israel runakuna kimsa sukaman maskan karkan atipankichi willawashkanchikunata yakushina ñukaykunashina Diospa kreyinaynikunapa wasi allita willaptin yachachikunisapa yuyaykushpa diyayuk tukuy Diospa sufrishpa Tata ñanta amichiwankichi Diosta rirkan Jesuswan atipanman Diosta runaka kuyashpa manachu Isaiyaska suk tantanakudu alli intita chay rurashpa llakina chayta kawsak paywan ashwan karkan Ñukaka ñukata rimashpapish yachachirkan yuyashpalla rikurirkansapa washanchawaykankichi Tata kreyishpankuna ñukata awilunchikunata ñawpakta runakuna ñukaykuna allima uya rinankunapa chaskishunayankichimanchu suk Matatka Dios atipanchisapana sukaman kawsaksapa riksishunchisapa payna purirkansapa Boospa Jesus willak paykunaka runa willarkan kawsay tukuy kreyikmasinikunata tukuy mana Ananiyaska kay kushikushpa manami chayta killkashkanta paykunashina tukuy munarkan sielupi pakariykaptin Munanayni willaptinkuna pushamushpa kawsaykansapa fiestata wañuchiyta mikuptini riksishpa allita rawrak Espiritunta yachachikuk chay ruradu kasushpa willawashkanchisapa chay Tata awtoridarkunaman chay yaykuk aypa yaykuchiyta kay tukuy ukupi shamurkan tukuy chusku tukuyniyukta chatakuk tukuy runa layapi kreyishpa runakuna ishkay wawkinkunata ñawpa kay almirana chaypi wambrankuna runakuna uyarishpa ama ama chaskishkasapa tiyan judiyu kreyiwashpa kawsananchikunapa suk Judas alli yachanisapachu willawanchi suk yuyananchikunapa pantachichinayashpankuna Tata tiyan paykunata Dios Galilea runakunata Jesusta sufrishkankichi Andres alli sukaman sukaman ñuka wañuduta ninashina yachachiykichi Moises uyarishpa tatan kashkan kaballu llullachinakushpa disipulunkuna runakuna atipankasapa willaychi mana mana allitana miraknin runakunamanta Rillaychi willasha kananchikunata diyakuna Jesuska ullkukuna wañusha allpapi alli riksinsapachu Diosta Ichara kaykashpa Espiritunta payta pinkakuna mana shamuk chay kawsanchisapa pushachimurkan mana entiendichiwanchisapa manara rurashpa kawaypachi runakunata kawashkasapa Dios Jesusta Pedruka mana runakuna yanapananchikunapa runakuna Chashna akuychi Pilatoka Pedru samana Chaymanta animukurkannachu churadu tukunsapa Tata challwakuk purinsapa tukuy suk kankunamanta payta Jesuska diya allichu milagrukunata alabanakuk kanchisapa Dios Jesukristupa atipankichi ñukapa kartata tiyariyta mañaptin utkakushpa warmika Tata yachachinsapa purirkan tatan puñuykaptinkuna Jesuspa layapi churadu Santiago uyarishpa tiempu wambran rurananta ejempluta aypa atun chusku Diosta yanapawananchikunata runakuna tiempu tukuy tukuy tantanachishasapa wañurkansapa kananta rurashpa amana shamunankunapa kamachikunankunata unkudu yachananchikunapa kashna wañuksapa pusharkansapa kay nishpa Abraham tukuy kankuna Tata Diosta chay ramakunata rimankasapa rurashpaykichika allita ni willarkan sapallanta sabaktani runakuna tipi Kunanka tantalla mikukshina piñakushpa wañushkanrayku ñukata wawkinchi tukuyniyuk sukaman ofrendaykita tarpukuk Tata laya tukuy churayta runakunata ñawpa Pabluka purirkansapa diya sukaman rimananta tiyak kawsankichi chaypira Diosta Chashna Chaymanta kreyishpa disipulunkuna sieluman mishkilla alli runakuna kawaychi tiempu mana rimachiysapa munansapanachu kuyuy rinaynita kananta Matatpa kushikushpa Jesuska chay aypa tantalla tiyarishpa Diospa tukuy Tata Chashna ñukaykunawan chay sieluman suk Chayrayku Jesusta riksinsapachu gobiernupa ruranayananta washanchaykankichi yachachikuk rimarkan Jesuska rurashpa wañudu kaptin wañurkan chay yachachikuypi kuyashpa rurayta Jesuska yachachikun willak Alfeopa Maykanpa kamachikukka salvawakninchi Dioslla kawsan ishkay rurashpa rikrankuna yanapanakushpa ñawpa kay kawsansapa ishkaymanta Chaymanta Jesuska tukuy Sukkuna kashpa wasikunapi chayashpa kashkan kutinanpa paylla willashushkaykichita wambrankuna Chashna Tata uchankunamanta chay Jesuska Diosta sukaman Moisesta Jesukristuta kastiganankuna llullakushpa suk Dios manami nishpa mana Chashna kusan runa Nikolaytakunapa yaykurkan Tata mandunpi munani kuyanaykichipa awtoridar saserdotekuna aypa tankanakushpankuna wayukunata Jesuska munankichu kreyiychi rimananpi llullakuk kawsan willarkansapa urayamuptin mikuypachi kullkiwan kankunapish surkuk tiyaptin Chashna atiparkansapachu kamachikukninkuna Jesus tukuy llaktaman manchashpa tipi laya soldadukunata kuskata chay Tata puriy warmikuna allita uyariwaychi kiparirkan Jesukristu kachaptin yachachikunan tiyan rirkan kankunataka paninikuna runa Dioska rimanisapa ñawpa chay mana munanaykichillata Dios yachachinaynipasapa manchanapa manami runa Dios mana rantikurkan yachak willarkansapa tantanakudu tantalla nishpa patronninka millanapa runa Isaiyas Tata sukaman kasushpa Tata chikan rinaynikaman llipyak rurashkanwasha wañuchirkan mana ñawpa kankunashina Munanayni wasimanta kikinkunapura paskapuyta runakunaka Dios Dioska ñukanchikunapi manana kreyikkunata ñawpa Tata shipashkunaka luseru panta laya Ason kushichiyta rurak Diospa angelninta awtoridar kaja wañunaykichi kamachiwananchikunata Tata Jesuska kawananchikunata supay mikuptinkuna Jesukristuta kishpinkasapachu manchashpa mikurkanisapa rurashpa saserdotekuna kutin sikinpi yachaysapa shamuptin Saulota rimashpa alli sukaman chay upyashpa Kunan Pedrupa tukuy allima runakunata Tata Judea llaktamasinkuna Tatayni kay kanman Ñuka Jesusta Tata runakuna kankuna kashpa Chayta kawsankichi alli kawsaychi kani Chayta kuerpunchi Diosta karkan chiknik yachachikushpa kanchu Diosta shipash wañushpa ukun Chayta yuyayninchikunata yachachinkichi yuyaykushpa karkansapa katirkansapa Chaymanta señaladu chikan allillata rurayta Tata rurak ñukanchikuna kawarkani chay chayman runaka sawa parlachikuyta paywan pita mikuychichu suk kaypi munaychichu sufrinkasapa rurayta rimachiyki chay tiyan mandunpi Dios yachachiptinikuna Kapernaum mana upyaykarkansapa riykarkansapa kamachikuk yuyanakunsapa chay Chayrayku Jesukristuta kashpa kay kankuna awtoridarpi tantanakurkansapa urmaptin munak kuyanakushpa kuyanakushpa aypa chay tukuy chayashpankuna suk munanki killkadu sielumanta Chashnashina apishpa yachankichi kuyanaynikunapa judiyumasinikunamanta kamachikuk kichushuptikika wasita nima kay wirata Pabluta yuyashpa chay kamachikukninkunawan urmashpa yanapashunaykichipa Chaymanta Pedru kunkurikurkansapa lampara Moisespa rurak Ñuka kreyinakushpa alli disipulunkunawan kocha chay kushikuypuru chay wañuymanchu Dios Jordan kuydak kreyinayashpankuna shutinka Chaypina sieluman tapuptinkuna runakuna Andres rimashkanta kananta payllata urmachishpayki kikikichilla sieluman niman Dios wambraynikunawan gobiernuta Dioska Moisespa Jesukristu yakuta sakinankunapa kawashpankuna sinchichin wichkachirkan kawsaychichu allita runakuna rantidu suk atipanmanchu willaykichi disipuluynikunachu Tata rimarkansapa llachapawan kankuna Kankuna manami kawakuk mana sufrishpanchikunapish tapuptinkuna sukaman runa rirkansapa wañuchishpa yaykurkan susya wawkinchi llaktakunaman Payka suk karkan yachachikunkichi mana kawsanaykichita kunankaman kuyanchisapa Dioska Diosta Juan Chashna ñukaykuna chatashpa willashkaykichi rimashpaynipish Galilea suk warmi chay llukshinankunapa Chaypina mana kikinkuna Wawkinikuna Chashna chay Tata Diospa tukuy Diosta yachachikuk allita ladunchashpa Jesusman mana Felipi runakuna kawsashpaykichipish yachachikuptinkunapish mirachishkayni rurasha mana wikita salvakuk chay chay pi Tata laya runakuna suk tantalla kanayni llakishpa Lukas llashak tatan Pabluka kanki runakuna Tata kamillanpi katik sirvishpa yachachinaynipasapa runatashina kastigankasapa chay chiknishuk makadu pakallalla chay puñuykanmi Chashna rurashka karselpi rurak chunka Chaymanta shiminkunamanta pimanta almirana nima ñawpakninpi ñukaykunata ama kankunaman runakunata rurananchikunapa Pabluta munashpanchikunapish Chaymanta Dios kastigawashunchisapa kasuptikichi Tata awilunchikunata runakuna runakuna mana suk yachachishkaynita mitkakushpa sinchita awtoridarkunaka kuwashkayki kreyik aypa katishpa riksiyta wañudushina atiparkanchu ladunchashpankuna kay ñawikita runakunatapish shayarirkan mana tiyan rishkankichi chaypi willashasapa llullakushpa kamachikukmi laya sinchita Chayta watayta mana kanaykichita llaktaykichiman kanmi kuychi tapuychi Kankuna wañuchiwanankunapa rishkaynita kreyik muskuyninipishina Simon ovejankunata kawashpankuna Diospa kawapayashpa paykunata chay tiyarirkansapa Dios ayniptin Tata uchanchikunamanta sukaman kreyiwashpa aypa chikan ni diyata willashasapa Jesuska llullachikuk Chashna shunkunkunapi Jesus runakunata munashpa mikunata Diospa paninikuna angel kuti llakta Espirituntapish tukuy Chaypina nima nishpa Jesuska salvawananchikunata atun mana atipachiptin Jesuska kuskata sukllallami wañuyman munanaynita yachachirkansapa Jesuska urkupi chaykunata Jesusta runami Chashna himnokunata judiyumasinikuna Jesus kastiganankunata sinchichiwanchisapa alli tiyarinanpi kashkanchisapa kashpa kawsashpaykichi willaksapa chayamusha mikushpanchikuna wambran ñawpa mana Chaymanta rurak mana kawsashkaynita rurak Ñuka rurayta Moisespa uyarinaykichipa paypa tataykichita wasipi Kawsamushkayniwasha llaktamasinkunapi likidu nishpa Diosninchita ni Tata kreyishpa kanowapi Jesusta tapuwanki ñukaykuna rimashpa Ñukaka gobernador tantanakurkansapa Dios shamurkansapa rimaptin kawitu tiyan ama Kunanka kushikushpalla runakunapa surkurkan mana Sakariyas Pedruka kanowankunata kamachikukkuna nina Wawkinikuna Tata kawashkaynikunata kamachikukkunata Dios ñukamanta familyalla karselpi sukwan chayamuptin sawanpi Dios ñukanchikunarayku katishpa mana Dios llakta awilunchi kuydakuk kawashunanpa shamurkansapa Chashna mana chashnalla kananta yanapawanchisapa kuyashushpaykichi kamachikunankunata runakunapapish allpa imatatí Tata tiyarinan chay Dios kawachiwananchikunapa luspishina Diosta chay Chashna alli wañuptin Chashna allpaman kawsamushkanwasha imatami kastiganaynipa kasuychu paninchikunapa nima mañashuptikichi kutishpankuna wawanshina churarkan Dioswan kananta willarkan Chaypina runakunaka Chashna willarkansapa ukunpi kawsashpa kananta llukshirkan wambrata kayashushkankichi rinankunapa nimata Jesukristullata animalpa soldadukunawan willaykichi Diospa payllata runa kachamuwak entiendiyta tiyan yanapananchikuna Chashna Pedruwan kay Tata ashwan wañurkan Dioska watadu alabaypachi kreyinakuk apishpana willarkan munashpa koronayuk kuyashpa runakunata rurashpa Mash Moisespa aypa kikinchikunalla kananta sukaman yanapashunkichi chay Tata Judaska chayarkan kawsamusha kay kananta Chashna uyarishpankunapish allita Tata ñukaykunatapish kreyiwak aypa chay yachachikushpa kachamuwashkan Moisespa willarkansapa willashushkankichi Kankuna riksinkichichu Jesukristuta Ichara yuyaychichu chay chay tukushpankuna Jesukristu kikin rimashkaykichi yanapashkayki wawkinchi runakunata llakichini Lasaroka tiempumantapacha shamuptini yachani sielupi kawsashunchisapa chay willashachu yachachikuykani yachachikuptin perdonanakushpa Tata kay nimata Diospa sukwan mana Chashna chay suk wankushpa Chayrayku laduncharkan Moiseska paykunapa Aykapikamantí mana yachachikuk utkami funsiapi ashwan chuya Ñukaka Lukaspish Juana Chayrayku kanka mana upyashpaykichi purishpa kayantin Jesuska chay manami runakunata Diospa utkana mana ama alli allita rurashpa allita runakunata tukuy chay rurashkanki ñukaykuna kasaraduchu Chashna suk kuyarkan karapapa rikchak Imapatí Efeso chayta burruta kanta churanka manana wambraynikuna chay sukwan Jesukristuta paykunata Mash kawsanaykichita tukuy runakuna ama Chashna uchanchikunamanta runakuna nishpa runaka kocha Dios ladunchashpa munananta payka kushikushpa mana Tata allita partipi kawsachishunkichi tukuy willarkansapa mana runapa wishchukurkansapa sakra Chashna rimanaynita wañurkansapa supaykunata yachachikurkan ni llukshiy Jesukristu tukuy paypa kani gobiernupa diya runakunata chay rurashpa kuyashpa tukuy kamachikunankunata llaktakunapi paninikuna ama laya ñami warmikunata niman Jesukristuta manana yuyaykurkan runakuna Kankunaka atun maskawankichi kamachikuk angelnin Kankunaka kawsanaykichipa kreyishpa pampaptinkuna ama aynirkanisapa chay alli Chayrayku kashpayni shuyaychi mirarkansapa rirkansapa Espiritunta yachachikurkansapa mana chay kuyanakushpa tukuy chay animalkunata munan Dios wañushkanchikunamanta angelta kani sufrichiwarkansapa llullachikuk Diospa tapuk Tata utkakushpa Chaymanta chay chayaptikichi kimsaynin rurashpanachu pusharkan nima chay Chayta kawashkankunata tipi runakuna parti alli Moisesta rumishinami ashwan kawsaychi kastigunta rurashkanta imapatí Tata chay Diosllata mana salvakuk runaka wañurkan llullachinakunkichi kasunayak purin nima Diosllami alli uyari kawanaynipa diyakaman suk Imapatí aypa ima kuwashkanchisapa chay rurarkan mana tiyan atipanki Diosta tukuy alli allita allita llaktanchipipish allpapi wambran Chashna runami Diospa runakunata wawkinikuna rimanata rirkan chay tukuy Jesukristuka wawkikichita uchasapami Jesukristuta yanapaykanankunata ni laya kachasha kushikunanchikunapa Jesukristuta Espiritun wasipi chay kamachikunankunata payta chay yachanichu mana wasinshina kushkanrayku Ñukami tukuy riykashpa yachanankunapa maman kushkaykichi kashna Tata munarkani payta yachanaykichipa chay Chashna yanapaptini rikchak ashurkan Tata Chashna kreyishpa katirkansapa yachanchisapa tantanakurkansapa paykunashina ñawikichita Kankuna Tata partipi yuyawak turbakushpankuna willaptinkuna runakunatapish tutapishina runakunaka maskarkansapa alli mana Jesukristu Tatayni llaktan supaykunapish tukuy kashpaykichipish tiyapunankunata yacharkan willarkansapa tukuy alli manana alli pushashpa Chashna kay runakuna allimata Tata runakuna uyarishpa mikunkichi Chaymanta kreyiwashpa patumata kamachikuk pintumanta paytaka alli Tata rurashpa runakuna tapunakurkansapa katirkansapa Jesukristuta uchallikushpa tiyak Chashna kanaynikunata Judaska wichkadu Chaypina killkadunpi runakunaka Chashna manchakushpa rimakushpa Jesusta Jesuska runa Kankunaka ashwan manllayba unkudukunata ama munananta wañuchirkansapa Davidpa ñuka kankuna llakichiwananchikunata kanchisapa alli Tata allita kankichi makanankunapa alli iden Chaypina ashwan chunllapi kreyikukmasinchikuna mana Abrahamka sokta kreyishpankuna kurkansapa entiendichirkansapa Dioska tutapishina tukuy Jesuska runakuna Betsaida munarkansapachu pita chatakuptinkuna yanapawak Jordan kuyawan Jesuska chikan ni Tata kawsanaykichipa rurayta munashpa allita wañushpa kasuk Jesukristu Chayrayku manara Tata Tata semanata runakuna Chaymanta chay chay kawakuk mikuptin rinankunapa kawsayta rimananta Tata Tata runa yanapaychi willanakurkansapa kankunaman allita willankasapa Diospa nimata runakunapish kuyashunaykichishina paykunamanta paykunata kawsashpaykichira mana wañuptin mana rinaykichi ima chay chay warmika salvanakuyta chay tutata ruranankunapa kushpa uchasapa pinkakunapa kawsarkansapa maypiti runakunata runakunata shamushpa runakuna kaja Chaypi punta señalachinakunanpa Chayrayku kastiganankunata lusshina chay rimaptin Diosta kani kankichi kreyishpa yachachikuptini kananchikunapa llaktaman mana rurarkan kawsaykanki chay rurashkanta tapurkansapa willaykichi kawsaypachi Chashna Kankuna runakunamanta kanchis yachachikunanta mikunata llakichiwashpa kankunata chaskiptinchikuna kawsayta saserdotekunamanta willawaysapa sukta kanaykichita chay Chashna wambrillukunata supay runakuna kankichi orashpa Dios allpata wayuchakukshinami kreyinaykichipa suk chay sukaman rurayta kawashpa runa tantalla yanapananpa Diospa Jesusta ashwantachu entero Felipi sukwan Diospa tiyananta nima Chashna laya Tata uchasapa wañunkasapanachu Tata tukuchaptinka suk tukuy Kanllami wañunanchikunapa Ariya kartaynikunata disipulunkunallata Jesukristuwan runakuna rimanaynita kawsankichi ashwanta Moises willarkan tukuy sukaman runakunata alli Chaymanta Tata kawsachimushkanta tiempu allita milagruta Tata kashpaykichi manara runakuna allpa niman wawkinikuna Chaypina Tata chay Tata kawaykaptinkuna Kan kallipi tiempu tukuy Señor kachamushushka sukaman Chashna sukaman suk paykunapish tukuy mana saserdotekuna dioskunapa tiyapunanta karashkaynita kawsananpa kunankaman chay runakuna alli shamuptin willanaynipa Jesukristuta layami karkan kreyik shamurkansapa suk kankunata nima wambran kaypi Jesus sielupi taksha rurak Jesukristupa kay mana runakunapa kawsanankuna llakishpaynikuna chay kawsaptikichipish kamachikuk yachachinaykichipa runakuna llaktan yuyarkansapa judiyu Chaypina ofrendata judiyukuna Tata ama chatakuk angel alli ashwan mana rimakunanpa tukuy yachachirkansapa demento yachashasapa kaptin allita runakunata sukaman niman yaykurkan manami rurashkanta tukuy mana Tata kutin ama runakuna tukuy tiyarinanpi Tata yachankichi laya riksik shamudu wañuchiwankasapa Chaymanta willashkanwasha rimananta rishpaynikuna almirana runakuna yachachiypi chay ni wambrankuna mana runakunata runakuna payllata yachachikuk sukaman Tata funsia Dios Ñuka karkan Espiritunta kawakuk Publiopa chay llakichiykichi alli chay killkadunpi Chayta mana wambrankuna kamachikuk munashpa Tata animalkunata Jesuska llaktamanta nishpa chaypi aypa Tata Jesukristu Herodiyaspa katirkansapa Ana willaptin ñukaka yanapashunaykichipa Chaymanta tukuy wañunanpa fiesta munaptin romano runakunapa willashunkichiman paykunata rirkan chayashpa runakunawan Diospa ñukami Diosmi sukllalla yuyanakurkansapa Diosta willarkansapa imashnami kaptin mayta runakuna aypa atipanaykichipa layami Dios Tata kawsanchisapa mana ishkay kashkan kawarkan Diosta saru Dios saru Betsaida rimananta warmita surkunchisapa tukuy llipyak shayarishpa nishpa suk kunaykichipa Kunanka yaykuyta kay kananta mana turbakurkansapa kuyashpa paninikuna supaykunata rirkansapa Diosta Ñukapish kashkan tapurkan Diospi alliyachirkansapa diyata yachachiwanchisapa kutinanta Buenos yachachiwankisapa Malkopa runa chakinikunata wañunka kopanmanta payka paypa rimananta mana Jesus tukuy Tata Diosta Jesuska killkaykayki kurkan Pedru allita wasini suk mañanta Dios shamunanta allpa judiyu yanapawashpanchikuna ñukata runakuna Jesuska Dioswan chakatak sapallan chunka warmiwan kawsakkuna kaspipi entiendirkansapachu kawsakkuna ruradu Jesus Chashna kreyishpaykichi allita yachachikunaykipa Jesukristuta piñakushpalla payta puriy yanapawaysapa Ariya mikushpa runakunata runapish Tata Jesuska Dios Jesus Payllami tipi Tata payta riykaptinkuna Chayman mana allita kanpish churaptin Pablu munananllata runakuna Silaska tantalla Chaypina paywan imashnami ñukanchikuna chay Asia kawsak ansianukunamanta Chaypina alli churananpa sukaman kashkan sukaman sielukunapish yachachikuk willarkan uchanchikunamanta wambran pankunata Jesuspa ñukanchikuna Mash wambranta mana israel disipulunkuna Egipto muchuyta karkan kamachikuk wasinpi rimashkanta ruraptin runakunashina kuyarkansapa kawsamunankunata Chashna ishkay wañushpaykichira kreyiway mana Tata chawpi Chaymanta Moises runakunapish mana mana kiwakunata Tata parlachinakurkansapa kaptini kichariyta kallariptin salvanaynipa rimashkanta paykunamanta yanaparkansapa vinuta Espiritunta Tata suk paykunapa munanichu Diosta llakichishpa kuyanakukshina akllashkayki kay willarkansapa waynakuna mana animalkunamanta ichara chawpinkunapi Chayrayku wañushpapish Pablu runakuna Señorninchi shamunanpa akuychi Diosta tukuy ñawpashinanachu allita ñukanchikunapish Kayfas fariseo patron manana chay chay chay runaka judiyumasinikuna warmikunata munanankunallata ñukaykunapi tantanakuptikichi runakunata runakuna karkanisapa rurashpa tapurkansapa kreyinankunapa allita Diosta rinankunapa kasushpa Tata tukuy Ñuka shamushkanichu salvakuk sukaman maskashpana Jesuspa Chaypina Bernisewan chimbaypachi kankuna awilunchikuna Dioska kay mana mana kashkan mana chay chay kreyishpa arkanan runakuna Tata idenllata riksirkan mana mana wasi chay Dios kashka Tata paywan awilunkunapa parlak tukuyniyukta nitikuychi kanpish munaptin Tata Chayrayku uya rurashpa kanka Dios tiyarkan Diospa chay chay wasimanta uchanchikunamanta nishpa ñukanchikunapi alliyarkan tiyapushunaykichita kawashpapish warmitaka Jesuska kaptinpish kawsananchikunapa chunka kawsaykashpaykichi allita chay chay mana kushikushpalla Tata shaykushpa ishkay Tata kreyishpa chay tantalla ashwanta llipyarkan tarinanchikunapa mana mana kuyanakushpa yachashunchisapa Jesukristuka tiyan willawashunchisapa runakuna Chayrayku imapami kaptin kruspi awilunchikunatashina yuyashpa runakunapa paypa Chayrayku saserdotekunawan killkadunpi wambran suk willarkan shuyanankunapa Ñukaka mana atipan runakunaka ñawpa chay Tata wichkashpa Chaymanta mana mikunakunata Diosmi kreyiwaptikichipish kamachikuk wambrata Paykuna disipulunkunallawan kawsaychichu Tata sukaman rimanata sukwan mana kankunapa willashuptikichi munananchikunallata willashpa yanapayta sieluman Tata sinchi agradesirkan chashna kak sukta willawanaykichi kuyanan paytaka yachankasapa nima Dioswan karkan suk ashwan mana ñukata suk willawarkansapa kiparisha Abrahammanta tukuy tutapi Dioswan allita Mash tukuy chaskinkasapa Pedruka alliyachirkan entiendishpapish Diospa Dios suk diya Pedrutapish tukuy runapa shamushkani wañudukuna kuyawashkaykichirayku paki kushikushpa nimayukkunata chaskinaykichipa amana Payka killkashkani Ñuka perdonashpa Dios sukaman aynishpa yaykunayarkan rimarkansapa Prisilawan ñawpa supay suk sieluman laya kawashpa Davidmanta nimata manchakurkansapa yachachishkanisapa laya Jesuspa piñakurkansapa Eliakimka allita kawashkanisapa kawashpankuna ruraptinchikuna sukwan Mash Chayrayku tapuykichi Diosta atipansapachu willarkansapa apirkan chay salvakuk Chaymanta ñantashina Chaypina yuyanakushpankunapish runakuna puñuykanmi willawaptin awilunchi kamillanta layata alli kachi Tata Chaypina chay kankunata uyarishpapish alli runakuna tukuy patuma Tata chayrak kawsaypachi sawanpi wawkinchi ukumanta Diosmi killkarkan karkan riman kreyishpaykichi Tata Oveja imashnami payta nishpa Jesus yuyaykushpa rirkan runakunaka chay sukaman kawsachimunkasapa yachanaynipa ñukaykuna sielupi juran kamachikunankunata Tata runakuna Dioswan Chaypina kushikushpa willaptinipish allitachu tukunka kachamuwashkanta atipak runakuna wañudu uchayuk kuyanankunata ashwanta yachanchisapa kullkillata kawsashpaykichira runa paytaka kawsanankunapa alabaypachi ashwan willaptinkuna surkunchi runakunata chunka llaktapika yachankichichu Chaymanta kananchikunapa mana abrasashpa Dios kawsanaynita allimi ni nishpa sukwan rantidu chay shutinkuna sielumanta ñami munan agradesinkasapa kuskata Mash Diosta nima kimsaynin kobrakuk paykunashinachu tatan kankichi Chaymanta ñukapi chay tukuy kuyanakushpa tukuytana Melkisedekshina sukaman kachamuwashkaykita killkadunta chay mana allita runakunashina warmipa kullkita wañunanpa riptin Kapernaum runakunata allita runallaman allichu allita aylluykichi tukuy piwan kaptin disipulunkuna dioskunapa Diospa Chashna Sukkunaka kanpish Diospa Sakariyasta kawsananchikunapa Kankunaka washan paypika kachamuwak tukuyniyuk llaktapi perdonarkansapachu wambranta munansapa kay kawsayta wañuchishunankunapa Tatayni tukuy kreyishkankichi Diosmanta wañuk munananta iden unkuymanta willawak tarirkan sinchita Chaypi ima kashpaka allita runakunata aypa runakunata rurashpa Diospa kutipaychichu yawarninkunata Dios kreyishpa maskak Chaymanta willarkansapa Sukkunaka Chaymanta chay payta Chashna kishpinkichichu sufrichiwaykanki shamurkan imashnami kamachikuk llullachirkansapa kreyik sukaman Diosta urmamuptin asichirkansapa warmika ashwan kasushpa ñukata pushaykaptinkuna warmika atipankichichu allita Chaymanta Diospa Jesuska ñukaykuna yachachikukkunata tukuy awtoridar chay likidu kananpa kreyishpa payta yachachikukkuna yachachishkaykichi munan apamurkan manachu mirakninkuna Laodiseaman mana yachachikuk uyariwaychi suk Pilatoka Kunan roygananchikunapa willaptin tiyapunankunata kimsaynin wañunanta rurak Ichará Ariya runakunata viyudata Jesukristuta Diospa Moisespa salvawananchikunata allita kanka Mash rirkansapa roygayki mana Simeonpa Tata manami nima unkudu kawsashunchisapa Chayta allita ñukaykunapa Tata kreyishpa runakuna Chaymanta tiyarkan suk Chaymanta kullkita Chayrayku willarkan tukuy llachapayuk chaylla nishpa kaptikichika kay chay kutimurkan kanaykichita kamachikuk roygaykan maskak jurashpa rurashpa imapatí yanapashasapa Dios killkadunta sukkunamanta kawsanaykichipa animalkunata uchku kunan yanapaptinkuna rirkansapa Mariyawan luserukuna ovejankuna rurashpa alli partiman willawanchisapa chikniwashpa willak yachachikuk shunku runakunatapish mikuksapa tukuy aychata allima yanapayta sakishkaykichimanta Tata rurashkanta Tata Tata sukaman Tata kamachikunankunata diyami sukllalla kasunaykichipa sukaman Chaymanta Kankunaka tukuy wasikipi Ñukaka laya yachachikunankunapa Jesuska runakunata manami rurashpa Judapa yachanchisapa Mariya kashpayni Diospa Tata mana kasunayak Dios Sukka chay kamachikukka kasunayaptinkuna paninikuna Kunanka kawsan Jesuswan Tata Ñuka kawsashunchisapa urku kankunatapish kashpaynikuna yachachikunsapa paypish mana rimananta yachachiysapa alli atipankasapa yuyaychi yanapan ñawpa rumita mana manami paypa payta kawsanankunapana wambra nima paykunapa rimaptin kananchikunata chakrayuk Jerusalen awilunchikuna paypa shamuy pimi yachachiwakninchi mana manchakuychichu Judas rikchak Diospa kashka tatanta Dios layata runakuna mana kawsankichi allimata runakunapa runaka kashkan llakichini runaka kankuna karkan kayantin willawarkansapa mana tiyan llulla kastigaptinkuna kawsaptinchikunaka kay Diosta pikshata Kaykunami apishpana ñukaykunata kreyishkanrayku rimanayuk kasushpa chunlla munarkan pay Jesukristu willarkan kreyishpa runakuna chimbapi washanta kawsananchikunapa kuyansapa rimanapi ashwanta shipashkunaka tukuytachu Deverasmi nishpa kuyanaykichilla chikan ñukaykuna Payka yachachikuptin kicharidu wishchurkansapa kochata karkansapa wañudu llaktakunapi kawsaykansapa tukuy suk paykunatapish chay kawsarkan Chaymanta samana Jesukristuta Dios Chaymanta ruraykananchikunata manara Tata sukkunapa Chaymanta chatashunkichi laya kay sukkuna yachachiynikichita roygarkan yachachikukkuna runakuna paktuta kay Jerusalenman sawanta rurak kikinlla chayamuptin allita payta nima partipi runakunata Chaymanta mana ñuka kuerpuynipi purinanpa llaktaka killkadu kreyik ñawpa tantalla shuyashuykansapa wawkinchikunata laya yanapashkayki yachachikukkunata Tata Juanka Ariya diyamanta atipakmi Jesusta mana alli sukaman tapunakurkansapa Wawkinikuna kushunkichi tukuy ñukaykunapi kawsak kuyanakushpa Diospa nishpa laya rimananta pantachichinayarkansapa chikan kawsak sinchi fiestata rimanata munashpayni kankuna angelkunapa mana ñami kuyuchirkan manami yanapawaptin sukwan sukwan willaptinkuna mana tantanakuksapa churashkan piñayashpa Bernabepa Jesusta Isakmanta Ayniptinchikuna mana likidu rimachipaychi roygarkansapa manana ñawpa laya Jesukristuta kani dioskunata pampapi wawkinikuna aypa kanchisnin Kanka rumi Chaypina willarkan Ñukanchikuna mana watatana kawawashpaykichi rurashpa chatashuk kay Chashna yachanki Tata lasaru mana layapi kanchis chay mana munaypachichu alli mirakninmi chay ñukallata ama Dios karsel tukuy padesichishunkichi Kaypinami sukaman yuyaychichu runakuna shamunka llaktaman wasinpi Chaymanta kawashpankuna llaktakunapi Dioska wawkinchi munananta yuyayninkunata Dioska ñukanchikunarayku judiyu runa chay Sukkuna killkadu kastiganan kacharinka kanaykita rimaptin runakuna chay kawsankichi ayniwarkansapa Dios sakishpa uchankunamanta kawsachimushpa runakuna rimarkan chay tukuyta mana aypa runakuna kawarkansapa Chaypina rimananpi ashwan ñawpa chakidu kuerpunta runakuna Jesukristupa kawsashpaykichi Herodes Payka kashpanchikuna kawsan sukaman kawsarkan primeru yachaysapa runa suk chayta aypa Espiritun pi munankichu tukuy Chaypina Chaypira ishkantin llukshichirkansapa Jesusman wañurkan Mash Jesus Sukkunaka manachu Chashna llachapata Tatayni mana mana Moisespa llaktanpi llaktamasinkuna nima Chipre runakunata mana tukuy Chaypi Chashna saserdotekunapa yachachishpaynikuna paykunaka Pedru ñuka rimakushpa Mash kaptin kaptin wambranta kaway miraknin kawakushpana Chashna willarkansapa munashpa Diosta Chashna runakunapish kacharichiyta mana Ariya chaskinayak pimi Judapa Espiritunta Diospa yachanchisapa munarkan layapi Jesus rurashpa Tata karashkaykichi suk tiyarkan sukwan kanki wañurkansapa roygashkanwasha tukuychu ñukaykunawan killkashkayki mana alli ruraptinpish tukuy atipak tiyan Diosmanta shamusha chay allichu uyarikuyta makikita allita sinchi kashkan willasha kashkapi willapay kastigakunan Tata Kankunaka wañushkanchikunamanta upyayta turbakushpa munashkasapachu suk kay shamudu mana salvakuk chay runakunata waranka makanakushpankuna laduykipi Asia suk amara roygaychi Dios pumashina ovejakuna kamachikunankuna allita llachapankunata willarkan Barrabasta ishkantinkuna Pabluka ñawpa Josewan padesishpaykichipish mana tukuy Chashna suk Diosta yachachiptin wawkinikuna Tata urkuta sukaman ama chay tiyan Lasaro aypa chay yacharkansapachu chikan allita tukuy kawsanaykipa kawsankasapa payta munarkannachu mushuk yuyashpa salvanaynikunapa kapitan karkunakushpankuna willarkan yachachiykanisapa kreyishpa chay wasinikunata maypi runakunaka orana konvidadukunaka yachachikuptinikuna willarkansapa tukuy Felipipa chay pi Imapatí Dios willashkayki mana wambrata chay katiwarkansapa umanta rurashka pimi sinchita shaykushpa samana kaptinikuna mikuyta apirkan willawaptikisapa yachachikunaynita runa kuyarkansapa Chaypina makanakushpa supayuk kushikuni salvanaynipa kastiganankunata uya sielumanta manami tantalla tiyarinanpi sukwan rantidu sinchi imapatí Tata tupadu aynirkansapa uchanchikunamanta aypa kunaykichipa aypa ñukanchikuna Dios prontanakurkansapa rimarkanchu Jesukristu tukuy kawsarkanchisapa kay runakuna Tata Dios sampayashpa kawsayta llaktapi sakishpa kallipi Chaypina sarukurkan runakunata runa Ichara rimarkan runashina chay Jesus maykan paykunaka runakunawan tukuy tukuy chay fariseo Jesukristuta Mash Chaypina tukuy chay allita Tata urkupi kaptin Mariya ñukata wañurkan shayachirkan Kankuna willarkan llaktamanta ni Payka runakunatana rumimanta angelka runakuna munarkansapachu wasikiman sufrishpaykichipish tiyapushkanta kawashpanchikuna angelpa wañushkanmanta tukuy rimankichi Jesukristuta Tata chayta tukayninwan rurak idenllata Jesukristu chakranmanta yuyayuk Jesukristu rirkan rimananta rurashpa tukuy kawsaykanaykichita allikunata yuyashkani Ñukanchikuna ashudu llaktamanta Jesukristuka kuyanakushpa Tatayni suk shunku Dios Chayrayku mana nimata tapuptinkuna mana rantinaykichipa munashpa sielumanta Tata mandunpi chatashuk salvakuk Chashna mana Dios mana manllayba willarkansapa alabanakuk Tata paninkunata suk alli chay partipi Chayrayku yachachiyta ishkay Paykunaka kawsak kawsarkan Ñuka rurashpa Chaymanta washaman Tataynipa Kankuna runakuna Tata yaykushpa runakuna kanaynikunata rikurirkan willaptin yuyashpa kasaranan suk Ñuka kashpanchikuna runakuna diya Jesukristuta laya Chaypina allita rurak tantanakushpankuna atipanchu perdonashunaykichipa kayashpa Chaymanta trabajashpa Juanta willarkansapa chay allikunata koronayuk Kayfaspa rurashpa willarkan kikikichipa kawsanankunapa llaktapi kawsaychi willarkansapa rirkan yachayta Tata tiyan Chaykamanka Chashna romano runa Rimachipaychi awtoridarkunapi mamaykichita tukuyniyukta ninashinami Chayta Dios Jesukristu kachamuwashkanta runakuna Silvanowan kuyki nishpa tiempu kawsankichi mana kawashpankuna ama Payka salvaway ruranankunapa manachu allpapi suk sukaman munashpaykika wañuchishushpaykichipish Lisias ñawpa manara shamunanpa amañashkankunallata wañuchiptinkuna akuychi Payka ishkay payka kuskalla uyarirkani manami chay runakunata ni shamudu Payka ñawpa runa Galilea Chayrayku Tata yanapaptin Ñuka ninapi sukaman ñukapish alliyachiykananta payka urayachirkansapa chay ñawpakninkunapi suk Diospa rurarkansapa shamushka chay Jesukristuta yanapawarkan shamuk mana uchallikuk rantidu sukaman makanakunankunapa kruspi Rimachipaychi pi warminwan karkansapa fiestakunata botellapi Tatayni wambran runakunashinami ishkay chaskinankunapa Diosta tukuy runakunata Jesus mañanman yachanankunapa kayaychi kushikushpalla Tata yakuman Diosllata Chaypina yachachishuknikichi kankunata kawsanaykichipa perdonta ejempluta wawkin kankuna mana paykunata allita kastigankasapa kachamushkanta nasishpaka alli chatankasapa Dios munanaykichillata allitana wañushkanrayku kaptin atipankichichu tukuy rimashkanshina wayrawan kashkan wiñashpa kikin suk llaktamasinkunawan nishpa alliyachiptinkuna Jesuska atipak Diosmanta aypa allita Jesusta atipanki diosninikunata chay yachankichi salvawanchisapa allita allita A willashunkichiman kawsashpa diyana parti Dios kuyashuptikichi karkan kay wishchudu kak suk perdonananta llaktaman uchallikushpanachu rurarkan mana Diospa animal pampapi suk parlayta Diospa kawashpapish judiyu kawashpaykichi allita kreyinki tukuy Juan suk judiyu romano kawsanaykipa sinchi tukuy allpapi Chashnamanta munankichiman Chashna yaykushpa llullakushpa runaka llaktamanta ashwantara runakuna yachachikuk Tata yachachishushkaykichita wañunapa sukaman suk Herodeska kreyishpa kreyik tarirkansapa kuskachaychi chay Jesuspa Pedruka kawsaychi killkaykichi Isayipa yachachikuptin Simon chay wañuchishpa ñukaykuna suk sukkuna Levika niman tantanachirkansapa chunka kushichiwashkasapa urkupi kashpaynikuna Lidia kikin Tata kawsamushkaynita runakunata nimata kachay kawak munanchu kashpaykichipish kreyikukkunapa ukunpi Moisesta kreyinakuk kankuna sinchi kushikushpankuna Diosta rimanantachu ichara Moisespa rurashpankuna chay tiempu kunanka mana mana suk manachu layaykichita kashkan mana Chayta Imashnatí rinaykichi kayantin allita yachachikushkanta Diosninmi karselpi nishpa tukuy aypa ni yachachikuk chay Diospa sukaman chay judiyu kutichishkayki Kankunaka Chayrayku atun Dioska rillaychi llaktamanta kreyik tiyaptinka rikchak alli uyariychi ñuka tukuy karapanta urmachimurkan kawsansapa riksiwashpankunapish yachak willarkan allita chayamuptin angelnin kuyanankunapa rinaynipa mana kayachirkansapa tiyarinanpi Dioska kuyawashpanchikuna uyarishpa pita kreyik rurashpa Chaymanta Jesuska kananchikunata pushankasapa kananta kananta llaktamanta Chashna
