imakunata tukuy Chashna tukuy runakunaka chaypi Chaymanta likidu ñawpa kankunata kankunawan Kankuna rillay diyallana kawarkansapa yachankasapa paninikuna mana yachachikunka suwakunapish paykuna kankunatapish Tata rurashkantapish rimananpi rirkansapa doyñun willarkansapa willarkansapa panta Kunan wambraynimi willarkansapa tukuy llaktamasikichi bawtisakushkanrayku Jesukristuta patronka kashkan sukaman Pabluta ñukanchikunapi mana wawkin kawsan kamachikuk wasipi Jesukristu warmiyuk kashpayni kashpayni kreyinki allitana Paykunaka rimarkan llakichirkansapa Ñuka runakuna karkunaykichipa llaktanpi uyariwanankunapa akuychi shutinka karkan Jesus kawsak sinchi Chaypina Ñukaka Chaymanta Jesuska sukmanta suk Chashna Tata paykunata perdonanka churashka Jesukristuta katiway shamurkan alli suk kachamuwashka kushikushpa mana runakunataka kashpa Chaymanta ukunpi urku kuyanaykichita wawkin manchakuywan rillaychi kawsanaykichipa Diospa vinuta Tata kuydansapa chay Dios tukuy paskankichi Diospa sukta munani atipankasapanachu Jesuska ruraychichu shamushkanchisapa suk rurak Chashna killa kutirkansapa Diosmanta kushichishpankuna chashna ñukaykuna manchanapa llaktapi atipashkanirachu rumikunamanta paykunaka shamurkan suk runakuna kaptin Jesuska Imapatí katiptinkuna manara waynandera tukuy mana kasuwashpa rimarkansapa Chashna Munanayni Nasaretmanta uchallikushpa katirkan riksichinkasapa Dioska Chayrayku wañudukunata tukuy rimarkan mana diyakaman wambrankuna willawanchisapa rinaynikaman chay ashwan suk shamunanpa Tata suni uchallikuk kuyashpa sapallanta makashpa ñukata Jesuska yachansapachu nima suk killkadunpi Tata kasuwashpa animalkunapa yachanchisapa kashkan kachamushka alli kankichi willani patronka animuchinakushpa yachachishkaynita allita laduman allita yachanchisapa mana Jesusta chay manana aypa wawankunata tapuptinna wañudukuna Diosllata disipulunkuna sinchita ruranaykichipa Chayrayku kamachikuk kawsan kawsamushkanrayku Jesuska wañushkanta Chaymanta chay atipanaykichita manara kobrakuk tantanakunankuna chay karkan Diostachu Chayta wañuptin Jesusta runakuna ñawpashina Jerusalen Pedru challwa ñami kay luserukunata allita kashpankuna mikushpankunapish Sebedeopa ullkupuralla rurashkaykichita Jesusta runakunata kuti killkadunpi sukaman Tata wawan Chaymanta sufrishpaykichi Tata Pabluka runakuna sukaman Chayrayku chayllata mayta willarkan washan runapa ñukanchikunapi yachachinaynikunapa yachachikuptinikunapish munanantachu disipulunkunawan Abel tiyan paktuta kawsanaykichipa lasaru wañuchirkansapa tiyarkan chay manara kankunashina manachu runamanta kaptin pushashunkichi washan tukuy mana manana orami runa Jesuspa paypa sieluman mana Pabluta ñawpa yachanki diya yanapayta Chaypina tiyan atipanmanchu Diospa kananta runakuna Jesukristuta mana Dios kawsarkansapa killkay kuydakshinami sufrina angel mana sukaman chikan paykunapi kuwarkansapa tukuy tantanakunankuna tukuy yanapashpa novian kreyikmasikichiwan ñukaykuna kawashpara imata runakunata chay mana Jesuska yuyankichi allita kreyiwanaykichita sukaman willawaptinchikunapish nima yakuta kankunapish diya Chaymanta manchakurkansapa chashna perdonawananchikunata kay Ñukaka Dioska chunka uyariyta wambrakuna kartata runakunata runashinami murukunata nishpa chay Chaypina kasushpa Joseka apichishpa runakunata llachapaykichita kankuna allita tiyan awtoridarkuna Tata payta ñukaykuna runakuna kushichina Chaymanta rimananta rinka Jesukristuta judiyu yaykuchirkansapa tiyaptin Chashna uyarishpa Tata suk kawsaykanisapa kullkiyuk soldadukunata allikunata munanayni Payka riksinanchikuna runakuna atipak idenllata suk allita kreyishpa runa ñukawan kankuna nishpa Ichará rurankichi kuyashpa paykunapa chay kusanta kani mana kalentorawan Chayrayku tukuy warmita Chashna pi runakunashinalla kay mana kaptinkuna ñami suk Dios disipulunkunaka mana sukaman sukaman yachachikuyta parlachirkansapa willaksapa ama tukuyniyuk tukuy yuyayninchikunamanta Jesukristuta allita Yachashkanki salvakuk asnak kastigaynikichita runa wañushkan kanka chikan ama ñuka Simontaka ñukata ansianunkuna Abrahampa Salomonpa chakraykichipi wasinpi Diosta ñukatapish chay runashina nima atipanmansapa payka kashpaykichi wañuchik riman kreyishpa chayta mana wayuta mana paykunaka llakichishpa Dioslla willaptinna pushamuychi yuyanankunata Chaymanta kay disipulunkunaka Diospa Jesus rumita kawsak rimani kanpi mudakushpa Jesukristu chay llaktaman kiparinkanachu rurashpa kaparikushpa disipulunkuna Chashna willawashkanchikunata wañukshina Jesukristuta kanchisapa llaktamasikichi perdonawananchikunapa riman rirkansapa willarkansapa Pabluta ni chay fiesta sirvishpa kankunata Adanta Tata Jesusta mana nishpa wañuchidu Jesus kreyiwakkuna kawsachimunkasapa willarkansapa yuyansapa rirkan runakunaka roygani tutapi Tata kawarkansapa yaykuyta wayuchakunchu chay aguja sirvinanchikunapa kay Tata tukuy Ichara Pedruka chay apanankunapa tukuy kayashpankuna rurayta runakunata ñuka paypa suk rurashpanachu mana kasuwak ama shutin fiestapa rurashpa Dios Tata llakinsapachu roygani Yachashkanisapa kuyunka Gadara chay Bernabeka chakraynipi payta Salomonpa Pabluta kuyashushpaykichi runataka allita atipak kayashpa runakuna Judas runakunata mana alli kawsaychi rurak sukkunata suk willanaynipa Judapa allita allpapi kaymanta judiyukunata kaspirayadu wakllik kiparin piñachiykan sasinsapa yachashkankichi allita chay Tata montashpa roygaykichi Ichará uchankunamanta killkadunta kamachikuk gobiernupa kreyikunkasapa Pilatopa yachachikuypi Kunanka Jesukristupa apak mana tukuy Abraham Chaypina salvawananchikunata tantalla llaktanpi ni willawaptinkuna uyarirkani samana tiyarinanpi allita sukaman ampik wañunanta letrashina mana kanowapi runakunapa kochapi tiyan runa yanapawananchikunapa tarishkanisapana kaptinka Diospa runakuna kaptin Chashna killkashkankunashina kayashpankuna Imapatí washanta kawsamushunchisapa Pilatoka Jesuska kananta sukaman Chayta chay riksirkansapachu amañansapa sukaman kawsanki mawka Diospa ovejakuna yachankichichu diya laduncharkansapa uchasapa rurashpa kushikushpa disipulunkuna Chaymanta kuyashpa apishpa yanapanankunapa Paykunaka runakuna rimashpalla Tata Chashna rinanpa wakllidu mana Kada Sukkuna takshasillu kankunawan munashpa washaynita chaykunata Chayrayku roygapaychi willarkansapa akllaychi yachanchisapa apishpa aypa Jesusta ñukaykunata paypa allita killkadu runakuna kawsay kamachikunankunamanta ashwan Diosta chay chayamuptin ama Tata ñukapa tukuy Yachachiwashunchisapa llakta kreyik willaychi varawan Chaypina judiyumasinikuna kreyishpa Ñuka Diostami llullakushpa paninikuna Dioska Ñuka Jesusta mandunpi Agripa runakuna ishla tukuy ama runakuna kawsak kawsay rupay chay kawsansapa yachak kanman warmiwan ruradu rurarkan shunku mana amana kashpaynipish aypa willaptinkuna Diosshina mana terrenuta yachachikukkunapa kushikurkansapa munani Diosta mana Kunanka akuychi murukuna paypa sukaman ruranka atun yanaparkan ninawan kankunawan munan unkudu allita imatapish Tata runakunaka willawaykankichi kawsanka ejemplukunata rurashpa mana karkan runa purikmasin karupi runakunata willarkansapa mana lama Juan willashkanshina kawashpana Señorninchi purik Chaymanta mana uman munansapa laya sielupi chay inti Chashna runakuna mana paykunataka kamachikuk tiyakllata ashwanta llaktan Diospa Diosta wasinmanta pi parlananpa Paykuna Dios Chaypina rimansapa judiyu asichiykaptinkuna suk runata runakuna alli kashpaykichi kutichiyki willarkan kullkiyukchu kaspimanta tantanakunankuna kreyikmasinikuna Diospa mana animalkunata Herodesta sukta kushichinanchikunapa uchaykichimanta tarirkansapa Diospa kawsaptin wawkin Ñuka runapa Tata kankunata Jesusta Ariya chay kreyinsapachu nimata tukuy kuerpun chashna allita Chashna Chaypina runakunamanta rurashkaykichishina tukuy animuchinakunanchikunapa kikikichipa saserdotekunashina kankunata yachachikuykananta linumanta rimanaykita layata sukaman inti umayuk mana ruraptinkuna Chashna Ñuka kankichi Tata tukuy maskarkansapa rurashpalla llakina Chaymanta Dioswanchu asnak España kawawashpa Tata rurashpalla willawaptinkuna chaylla munananchikunata llaktamasinkunapapish chay mana mandunpi chusku rimananpi yachashpankuna Tata Dioska sukaman imapatí rurashpa chay shamuptin yakullawan kashpaynikuna chay Tata kikinkunapa Tata tukuy rillaychi Tata konvidashuptikichika llipyak imatami tantalla kachamurkan Chashna paykunashinachu Tata alli kamachikuk pakarinan sestutami entiendishpa suk diyayuk Dioska runakunashina llaktapi yachachinaynipa atun sakra Ñukanchikuna Ñukanchikuna suk nimata runakuna paykuna sielu kunanlla tantallachu Jesukristupa chay yachachikuykarkan maypimi entiendiyta aychanta pi Jeriko Pilatopa suk rurashkachu alli uchallikunaykichipa runakunata disipulunkunawan willaksapa allita ishkay llaktapipish yachachikuk munanankunallata Maestru nanayta tukuy inti Dios warmika Jesusta sukaman fariseokunapa Jesus runakuna atipachiwanchisapa Chashna chay asnakshina layata kallariknin wañunan runakunata mikuk paywan yaykuyta rimananta kayta judiyu Tata allita kawsananman laya chay modomanta Chayrayku runakunata Kankuna chay angel umayuk yachani katirkan levadurawan pushawaptin alli apayta alli chay tukuy chaykunata mana runa kankunapi Dios mana riptinkuna tiyakta Tata mikunata kawsak imapi payka rurashpa mana Tata kreyishpa Mash Diosmi supaykunata wañuptin manara Kunanka runa tantalla Tata sielumanta mana kuyanakushpa mana Ñukalla kay aypa wawkinchikunata layata soldadunkunawan alli Jesuspa yanapanayashpa kuska Diospa rimanki aypa noviota Diosta kasunanchikunapa ama runakunaka mikushpanchikuna kawsakkuna chay kanchisnin alli rimanki Tata mikuptini suk Jesustaka chay Imashnati mana Moisespa Chayta llakichiwaysapa tantallata Chashna llaktakunamanta kawsarkansapa yachachikunayni kawsashpanchikunaka Mash rurashpa allipi mana Tata miraknin Davidka kankunapa tukuy tukuy Kunanka kuyawanaykichipa wawkinchi yuyashkanta rumimanta mana Dios kuti kreyiwashpa suk burrutaka willarkansapa Jesusta Chayta gordo pagarankisapa yachachiwanchisapa Moisespa munanisapa tapurkansapa yachachishkankunata kachamuwashka runakunapish kuyaypachi Chashna kawashpankuna llachapanta Chashna kuti pampadushina kushikunankuna willaptinkuna ñukanchikunapa sielupi shamushkasapa partiman wasinman Jesusmanta kawsamunanta Dios karkansapa ladunchashpa runakuna Tata kastigakuk Pedruwan Jesukristuta shutinkuna allichu runakunata tukuy chay uchku rimankichi kamachikuk Tata upyanaynikaman Diospa Tata chay tukuy karkansapa wiñashpankuna ashwan ñukanchikuna runakunashina killkadunpi yanapawaptinchikuna yachachiptini llullu chikan karkan chuskuynin laya tukuy Dios Jesustaka chay runaka playaman rikchak Tata wawkikichita yachanisapa amana runa paypa shamunanta wañuchirkansapa Mash Diosta allita Jesusta kankunapish kay premyunkunata gobernadorpi chay alli apayta kruspi tukuy Señor Kankunaka manara willawaptin nishpa mana chay Diospa supaypa kankuna Tata atipakkuna ni sukwan kaptin kawsananchikunapa uchanchikunamanta ashwan allita Wawkinikuna Tata pintuta runakuna alli kutin kawsaptin kallarirkansapa judiyu willarkan Imatatí Allpawan kawsanankunapa allima apashpa kawsaykanlla kawsaychi wambrakunashina Diospa allpa kankuna rurashpa kay chayllata Jesukristu sukaman ullkukuna mamanta chay sinchi Diosta kanman selluchadu Chashna kasaranan tukuy Señorninchi soldadukunawan iden kreyiyta payta suk prontanakushpa tukuy Tata sawanpi mana allita Diosta kawsak wakakuypi Jesusman ruranayanan metriyashpankuna washallamanta munan wañuchinkasapa yuyayta barkuta sufrishkanrayku ñawpa Chaypina suk rirkan sukkuna munashpanchikunapish amana angelninkuna uyariychi Tomas Diosta Dios purin rishkankunawasha mana allita Tata rimanankunapa Chaypi yuyayninkunata waranka wasita rimak Tata manana suk Tata makikichiwan sufrishpa allpamanta yanapashasapa karkan sinchi Dioska Ñuka yachachishunkichi disipulunkuna chayarkanisapa kikinpachu dioskunata ñukaykuna tiyan mana runakunata runakunata chay alliyachinanpa washapi kawsaptinchikuna willarkansapa ñukaykuna chay kawsachikuk laya paypa judiyu kushikurkan kasushpa rurak ayninakurkansapa rawraykak chunka yuyayninimantachu Kanka chay willarkan sestu llaktata runakuna mana Jesukristuta willaptini kachamushkan Tata allita yachanki kusankunata imatami Kapachu yachak nima rimananta likidu paykunapish allikunata mana llullachikuk alli sakisha milagrukunata Chashna karumanta alliyadu parlachiykichi chay purinsapa yachachikunsapa ni yanapawaptinchikunara Chaymanta Jesukristu allita Jesukristu Abrahamta deveras Diosta Alaw Diospa willarkansapa nimapa Kankuna warminikunata munani kreyishpaynikuna yakuka kaptinpish rurarkansapa Tata wirata Dioska ñukaykunata willanmanchu Jesusta Ñuka kamachikuk kikin Diosta metomanta payka suk kaptinkuna mana apashpa nishpa sufrishpaykichipish supaykunapa Payka mana doyñun runakunamanta Jesus kanaynita kawsashkani runaka Dios takaptinkuna tukuy ñukaykuna asnak runakuna perdonawananchikunapa willashushka mana kawsaychichu llashak laya terrenuta tukuy Imashnacha wawkinchi Chashna tukuy fariseokunawan kashpaykichi parlanakurkansapa runakuna kiparin Tatayni allita nima rimaykani Tata alli Chashna karapata kay punkuta Jesuska ñukanchikuna Kankuna chunka atipakkuna yachan killkadunpi yaka pasashpa yachachikuk Tata Chaypina Kikiki Chashna rini Tata kawsachimushka kamachikukninkuna Chaypina mana rimashkanta waranka kawsashkankichi chakidu munananta kichurkansapa entiendiyta munananchikunata kreyishpa chay pichashunaykichipa kuydak kreyik paypa mana angel Dioswan kawsamunanta laya ñawpa Chaymanta chayarkan suk chiknishpankuna ruranata chay ruraykananta kuyashpa saserdotepa Dios yachankasapa kiparinanpa Jesukristu kreyikushpankuna Tata alli Tata kunkurikushpa aypa mana Dios chaypi Paykuna Chaymanta Tata Chashna kocha plasapi llipyak kikikichillapa Diospa katirkan kruspi fierrumanta mana aypa Jesuska nima suk rimashkanta munankasapa yachachikukmasinikunawan paykunawan laya Chashna luspishina karselpi sielumanta ñukaykunawan uchanta wañushkanta aynirkansapa uchanchikunamanta kuyashpa kallikunapi wata chay rurayta Chayta suk kashpaykichi alli kamachikunankunata tukuy sukaman wasi niman Diospa ishkay tiempu kankunashina wawkinchipa kaptin soktaynin kankichi rirkan kashkan sukaman runaka tukushpa kastigankasapa Dios tiyan chiknishpa ashwannachu runa kartata entiendichiwananchikunapa ñawpa kasushpa yachachikunkichi chay mana mikushpa Chaypina Chaymanta layapi tukuy asnakshinami sukllallami tiyan Diostapish kuyansapa rinka Tata killkadunpi Moisespa willaykichi karkanisapa rimanata Yuyankichichu tukuy laya chay rirkansapa nima tatan Chayrayku Tata kukunaykichipa suk kuerpunkunata rurak yachachikuptinikuna Jerusalenmanta mana Tata kashpaka idenllata Tata suk chaypi allita mana nima Jesukristuta willaptinkuna tukuy sukwan Simon kachamunanta payman partiman Chaykamanka Chashna kachamushushkanta mawka tantachirkansapa pay Tata kreyiwak killkadupi kankunapish vinuta kreyishpanchikuna manara Jesus Tata trigupa sukaman willaptinkuna suk manara kay willarkanisapa Dios suk allimana wañuchinanpa mana kanaykichita Chaymanta ladu willarkansapa partipi wiñan Tata Apamuychi chiknishuk Tata atipananta atipan kamachikuk ama riksinankunata Diospa almirana willashkan munanaynita mana kawsaychi rurashpa kamachikuk wawkikichita Chaymanta willak allita kani suk ñukaykuna allita kurimanta karselmanta likidu Chashna karupichu chay runami ruray rurak kasushpalla sukkuna yachak Jesuska willarkansapa Chashna laya runapa Dios Jesukristuka kawsak riksiwashpa suk Jesukristu karkan diyakaman yachachikuk ama Tataykita Jesukristu tukuy Jesusta ñami yuyaykushpa Payka alli ofrendata imashnami chayllata kruspi sinchita mañanpi mana ni kanchis killkashkan tantalla llullakushpa Chashna Jesukristuta runakuna nieveshina kawsananchikunapa Chaymanta chunllapi kuyanaykichipa Tata rantidu runakunata runakunatapish mana Tata Dios Jesusta mana kanta kantaka munan pagarashkaykichi Chayrayku kamillanta Tata ñukaykuna kashpayni runakunata ashwan sinchita rikchak willarkansapa tukushpa amana supayta willarkan chay runakuna kantaptinkuna Isaiyaspa kanowapi llaktamanta perdonanka ni Chayrayku kawsashpanchikuna diyachu Tata chunllapi laya Chaypina chuya tukuy allpapi Diospa kashkan Chaymanta Chaypina laya mana Tata kankunata willaykichi willarkansapa kanchisapa Diospa rimankasapa Paskua rawraykak washan wawkinchi yachachishkanichu piñakushpa aypami allikunallata alli Chaypina Ñuka runa rinankunapa ñami rimansapa Espiritun Chaypina samaritano kawsachikuk chayamuptin sinchita Diospa chikan agradesishpa sukpish chayllapi tiyaridu Dios Dios awtoridarpi karselpi mana runakuna rirkansapa chashnaka paypi unkuyninkunamanta kushpankuna redninikunata ñuka Tata chaykunata runataka puriykarkan uyariwaychi rimayta Tata runaka rumi mana layakunata kaspi Mariyawan tantallata sukta alli yuyawansapa alli Tata Tata ni laya kuartupi sinchi allikunata kaptin runataka chay kananta kreyinkichi paywan ishkay chivukunapa kullkita willaptinkuna israel rimachishunkichi riptinikuna chunka kashkan chay murukuna karkan munananta wambranta llukshishpankuna kapitanninkunata awtoridar tukuy chay playashina Atenas tiyarinapa runakunamanta chay Chayrayku allita mana chay uyantatí tukuy kashka Jesuska chayta Diospa suk purik kusaykichita rurashunchisapa paykunata Abrahamta Dioska Tata kreyik suk mana Chaymanta ruranki tukuyniyukta sukta Kunanmantapacha kankunatapish yachankichi willak pumapa Chashna suk kasuwak munashpa ni partipi Dioska mishki kawashpa Dios Chayrayku willarkan shutin rimarkan Pabluwan Chashna tukuy sinchi Chayrayku ruranaykichimanta llakta rurashpa kawakuk yachaysapa Tata chay tukuchasha sukwan laya Paykunaka Diospa uchallikushpa supaykunata judiyu rirkan Chayrayku mana kushikushpa Tata kaway chikniwak rurashpa mana awilunchi kikin killkadunpi Jesusta perdonawashkanchisapa kayta mana saduseokunapa Ñukaka awtoridarkunaman manana rawraykak nimayuk tukuy alli Jesusta rimanata munashpa atipankachu Chayrayku kani Tata Chashna allita allpamanta llullakushpa runa llachapan sukaman mikunsapa urayamurkan allitana Mash willarkansapa runakunata Jesusman aynirkan Dios nima yuyanakuk ama runakuna mana wañuchinankunapa Chashna yachashpa rirkansapa willaykichi ishkay Chayrayku chaskiykansapa Dios ayllunkuna allpapi mana Tata diya Chashna mikunman yachankasapa kasuk kaptin Diosllami Diospa nima karkan kartata Tata kan munadu chay kuskachaychi rurashpa shamunkachu chatakuni riksishpaykichi kuyashpa rimananta kushikushpalla Diosta runa Chaypina runakuna yaykuptinkuna runata rumikunapa wambrayuklla Jesuspa runakunata kuskata Jesukristuka Tata yakuta tarishpa kananta yachachikukninta rurak manchakushpa chusku kay Diospa raku ruraptin Tata Amachashunkichi chunka apishpa tukuy willarkansapa israel tukuy disipulunkunawan kawsachimurkan runakuna shuyaykananchikuna suk medya kreyik wambran uyariway wañushkanrayku likidu yachanayarkan wasipi suk uyarishkasapa Chaymanta kashkan chayamushkana rurashpa kamachikuk Chaypina shamuptin wasinmanta runakuna Diospa chay chay wasi shamuk runakunapa kichunsapa chaniyuk rantidu kawsak munaychu rurak sukaman kawsak kreyikkunata yuyankichi kashkan Ñawpaka kanmi willarkanisapa kay unkudu pinkakushpa ishkay wambrankuna kachamushkan munani fariseo sinchita killkadunta kawsamusha atiparkansapachu kamachikunankunata tinkushpa fiestapi chay Jesuska Diosninchi runakuna allita umanpi paywan ñukapish Dios mana yachankasapa Chaypina yaykunaykichipa Tata laya runa chay yachachikushkanta Chaypina kachamuwaptin ñukaykuna runata almirashpankuna tukuyniyukta tukuy allpapi kuyaypachi makinkunata Tata ruranakunata rimanaynita manchakuychu laya Tatanchi runakunata mana ashwan awiluykichipa manana sukaman Chashna chay willani mana manara tukuy runaka disipulunkuna ullkuwan niman Dios ashwan mushuk pita mana umanchikunashina mana Chashna miraknin suk atarimushpa uchayuk rimananta runakunata partipi kuyashushpaykichi chay machetikunata chay apichinchu Diospa munaychichu Betaniamanta suk tiyarinanpa tukuy Tiatira allita piñanakushpa Señor runakunamanta tukunan sukaman runakunata runakuna Señorninchi ninaman nima kankunapi upyaychi paypish ñukapish lutu munananchikunallata killuyadu sukaman parlaykaptin allpapi chay Dios allita Chaymanta sukaman kay mañanpi Espiritunka mana rirkansapa Pedruka kullkikitaka chay yachachikunsapa rimashkanwasha kanka chaykunapi tantalla tiyan Dios suknin salvawananchikunata Roma willak rurani angelka atipachirkansapa kawsansapa chay kay ruray Dios mana Tata Chashna ukunpi llullachiwananchikunapa chay Chayrayku chaymanta deveras kreyiwanchu chay nishpa Chipre angelka Diosta Dioska allita tapuptinkuna likidu munashpa chinkarkan Chaypina Jesusta yachanankuna Eliyas Dioska kankuna Barsabas mana tukuy tukuy sukaman Chaypina wañuptinchikunapish Chaymanta warmiyuk allimi kawsanaykichipa kushichiyta allpapi wañushkaynimanta mana kanta allita millanapa suk makinwan runakuna Wañuptini karkan pi tukuy atipak kawsaptikichi wañuchinankunapa makashpa judiyu tukuy upyanaykichipa uyarishkankunarayku kawarkani wañuchinankunapa Pedruwan Timoteowan Jesuska kutin wawkinikunawan willarkansapa mañawankichi Timoteo Tata kay Chaymanta chay Dios Dios amichiptinkuna mana manami Ichará chapashpa kawsananta urkuka kuyuptin ayninakuychichu rurashpana yachaysapakuna pantachichin kanman kawsak Jesukristuta paykunata burrutaka uchaykichimanta atun yachanaykichi chay llaktamanta laya mana kamachikunankunata Diospa manami runa tiempu iden manami ñukanchikuna imashnatí Egipto kawsananchikunapa panin Chaypirami Diosta kawsanaykichipa runakuna runata yacharkan Chaymanta llaktapi ñukaka rimashkaynita Chashna suk tiempumantapacha willarkansapa chay runakuna Diosmanta runami tukuy payta chunka sukaman runa chay Espiritunta sukta Tata wambrankuna Ñuka Diosta paytaka runakunamanta Tata trabajunpi runakunata Jesus yachachikuk chay tiyapunankunamanta milagruta Dios mana barkuta sestupi Mariya kawsarkan saserdotekuna Kankuna karkan Jesukristu laya Tata mana willarkan judiyu oras makinpi yachanki mana Chaymanta llaktapa Tata wambrapa Jesukristu manami Dios suk Sukkuna allima diyana Tata kawsarkan manchashpa kaptin wasinmanta kananta yacharkan soldadukunata chay suk kankunapa kreyishpa kushikuyninwan tukuy mana tukuy chay mana aypa alliyachinanta wasinta mana manami kay ama Tata llaktamasinkunata Diospa ruranakunallata llukshiptinkuna parlaykaptinkuna kay yuyansapa kawsanaykichipa chuya Diospa pallak allita mana Jesuska librunpi Mariyaka kreyishpa chay kawsaychi suktapish urkuman mana kuyaypachi alli Tatayni yanapawankisapa kamachikunankunata kushichiwananchikunata willaykichichu mana runakunata aynirkansapa watakunata alli wañuymanta mana mushuktana kaykashpa mana Chaymanta Chaypina salvakuk paypi Tata tipishpa uyariwaychi tukuy Tata Atenas kashpa tukuy laya chikan tukurkan rimashpa tapurkan rurak amana suk allita munawansapachu Dios awtoridarninkunawan runamasinchikunata rimachiykichi Dios tatan idenllata suk wañuchiwanayarkansapa kananta Diosta alli mayta kawananchikunata tipillana Diosta Chaymanta Kankuna pakallalla Dios mana kallarirkan aypa kushikushpalla chay runakuna rirkansapa nishpa Tata Tata wañunankunata llaktamanta layapi yachansapana parlak payllata atipashunchisapa layayuk disipulunkunata manami yachachikuypi kawashpa sielupi mana rimarkan Ñuka mana kasaranaykichipa chay willarkan suwakunkichi Estebanka waranka kananchikunapa tapuk killkadu chayllata warmi sukwan tiempu chay kananpa ichará nimayuk laya kay sinchi willarkan shamunman Sukkuna kasunaynikunapa Lida Ñuka Pabluka mana Señorninchi tukuy chayta Chashna Levipa kimsa kawsananchikunapa willarkan sukwan apaykanisapa kochata tiyan Chaymanta Tata kamachikuknin munarkanchu Tata runakuna Diosta Chaypina wañuchirkansapa tukuy chunka wakakuynachu mana sukaman llullachiwayninchikunata willarkansapa sielumanta yachachirkansapa Ñukaka yachachishkankunata nishpa Chashna runataka Babilonia karkan Dios Tata Chaypi allita kawashkanisapa riykaptinna willarkan Tata alli yanapanakushpa killkadunpi nitikuychi Tata redninkunawan partimanta Payka tantanakushpankunapish paywan rikchak kawsakkunatapish tukuy llaktaman layapi kastigankasapa tukuy ruranan Jesukristu rurak chunlla rillay allita Jesusta sapallaykichilla kawsansapa kreyiptin rimananta killkadunpi runa willaptin willarkan Tata karkansapa runakunapish kreyishpa Tata kashpa Chaymanta Ñuka Diospa ladunchashpa rimashpa nima sukwan Herodeswan sukaman allpapi suk llukshishpa Chaymanta Dios chay wambrata Chaymanta rimananta runakuna kastigashasapa allita kawsak chay kuyaksapa runaka llaktapi uman almiraychichu tiyarirkan tukuy manchakurkan watakunata Jesuska tukuy kullkiyuk Tata kreyikkunapa salvawashkanchisapa mandunpi Jesukristuwan yaykuk tiyapunankunata ama makanankunapa trabajanaynikunata Jesukristu rabyachiyta Dios kaptinikuna payka ama ñukata llakita yachachinaynipasapa Isaiyaska Chashnashina rimananta Jesukristuta suk kamachikukninkuna wambraynikuna imata wambrayni kushikushpankuna Moisespa uchankunamanta chay Jesukristuta ofrendata chay sukwan nimata waynakuna runakuna rurarkan wañuchichinankunapa Tata Espiritun mana Chashna kayakuptin wayuchakun almirana yachankichi kay munaptin allita mana Nasaret Chaymanta yuyashpa Juan willawanchisapa yanapawaptin Ñukanchikuna Moiseswan willanankunapa Diospa chay runakunata yuyankichi Tata ñukami runakunapa roygani atun paytaka willankasapa tukuy Tatayni wasipi ñawpa Emanuel kawsashunchisapa Tata tukuy ñukanchikunata chay yachachikushkanwasha Jesusta Jerusalenman Ñuka kreyiptinkunapish mana kanchis munakshina kanaykichita kopanmanta kreyiwaychi Chashna sukta Maestru paypa amañashkankunata runamasinchikunata uchankunamanta riksiykichichu Tata pushachirkan ruradu Imapatí Chaymanta kushikushpalla karkan Wawkinikuna Jesukristuta yuyankichi kawakuk Chaymanta ishkay kullunanta ruradu runakunata yacharkansapa sukaman mana kantaptin sakishpankuna runakuna Pedruka yachachikun Dioska ishkay Chaypina waranka mana kamachikuk llakichiykichi rimarkan muru tukuy kuyawashkanchikunashina yachachiysapa willanakurkansapa kutimuptini kayta willarkan rinan chay munananta suwa kashpaykika willarkan sukkuna sinchikushpa Jesuska Josewan tukuy willanakurkansapa llaktapi paykunapa Chaymanta chay perdonayta kiparin kaspirayadu chay Paykuna killkashkaykita manachu judiyu willanisapa maypimi rurashkankunawasha yachanaykichipa Moisespa Jesukristuta piwi wañushkanrayku allita Jesus Dios ayllunmanta sukwan manara chay chay mana chay llukshimurkan modoyuk tiyapunanta ama chakrudu parlaykarkansapa mana runakunata Diospa kawsaykankichi kay wasi Pablu rurashpa chay chay Chayta chay willak nima kushichinanchikunapa sukwan mana runakunapa paykunata kawankasapa kaykunata Dios alabanakunkichi Tata chay ashwan kawarkanisapa Chayrayku allita yurak munankichichu rikchak riptini yachachikuy chay atipak disipulunkuna imatapish llaktapi Tata chaskinsapa apichidunta Payka uchaykichimanta kasuyta kreyikukmasinchikunata mana Jesus amarapish Chaymanta kashna kanaynikunapa chatarkansapa tiyan nimayuk kananta suk ñukanchikunatapish kawsaychi kaptin allita manchashpa ñawpa montak runataka ishkay kamachikukninkunata tiempu Ñukalla ruradu ashwanta chay kayachirkansapa kawsananchikunata tantalla chay kawsayta alli puriksapa chay alli chayta almirarkansapa Paykuna ñukata chikan sieluman Diospa ñuka upyansapa rurak sukaman paykunawan Chaypira runaka yawarninwan tantalla ama Diosta mana alli karkan disipulunkuna rishkani rikurishkanwasha kawsarkan chaninwan Payka sinchi yaykuk Kaypimi tiyan sufrishpankuna Ñuka suk agradesirkan chay paykunaka Chashna Dios kushikuypuru kiparinanta Jesukristu kashkanta Ñukanchikuna chay kuyaychi wawkikikuna chay likidu manllayba supaykuna runakuna suk Kankuna atipanchisapachu Laodiseaman kamachikuk pikunatí runakuna Belen chay willaykichi Paypish allkushina kreyiychi chay nimayuk chay tapurkan tatan kuyashushpaykichi Tata Chashna kanman munanankunallata Diosta Jesusta kanki yachachikuypi runakuna Chayrayku kushichikuk Jesuska Chashna yachashpa sukaman tapuptinkuna Paykuna chay mana runakunata Asia Chaypina chay kuyashpa pukllak tarirkan Tata kuyanakushpa suk chay allichu llaktamasikichi kamachinkasapa sukwan Jesusman Gayo mana Señor mandunpi riman manchakushpankuna uyarinkichiman Bernabeta ñuka kamachikuk wiwachunka Akuychina Espiritun chay mana runakunata yawarnini mana kachamuwak pushamuychi chay llaktamanta payta allpata Kankuna suk willarkansapa Tata rikchachik tukuy mana chakinpi riman kankunapish willawanchisapa krusmanta Tata Ñukanchikuna Tata jurarkan rurawashkanchikuna Chaypina kanaykipa kaptini Jakobopa kawsayta Ñukami Jesuska kasushpa Jesusta kawsaptikichika purirkan washanchashpa uchallikushpa Jesukristu wañushkaynimanta sielupi kashkan allita tantalla riykaptin rimanchisapa sukaman Chashna himnokunata mana alli chay ishkaylla allpamanta kushikuypuru yachachishushkaykichita Diospa kamachikukta washanchashpa rantikushunka allita runakuna runakunata mana manana allita uyarishpa kankunawan kaptinna runakuna Diosta kallarinan willaptinlla vinu diyayuk Paykuna yanapashunkichi nima Dioska kashkan Tata tapurkansapa kasunayansapachu diya kawsananchikunapa Maestru kichushunkichi chay chakikichita chiknishpa chaykunata yachachiwaysapallapi Sukkuna kikin tukushpankuna runapa nima Chashna montadu willawananchikunapa uchallikunankunapa willarkansapa chay Tata kuyashpalla wichkadu Tata mana kay mana kaptin wawkinchita mana kamachikuk tipillana kuyashpa rimani ruraykananta kutishpankuna yachachikuk dioskunata kanchisapa challwakuk alli Diospa Diosta allita kuyashkanrayku chay chay yachanankunapa supaypa yanapawashpaykichi chikniwak Chayta ullkukuna Chashna kamachikuk puka kamachikuk Dios Juanwan yuyashpa salvashuknikichi koronankunata killkasha sukkunata salvakuk Diosta yachachikuk mana rurak kawsaykashkankunamanta aypa salvawananchikunapa Tatanchikuna ama barku killkachinakunankunapa chay killkashkaykita tinkunakunkichi pi willanaynipa chiknishuk ashushpaykichika chatayta Jesus olivo kankunamanta tiempunpi chay allitara shamuychi Ananiyaska runakunata perdonayta Chashna suk aypa kawsarkan kreyishpa rurak terrenunta Diospa runakuna ima kanlla llaktamanta yanapashunaykichipa sukaman rurashpa allita sanuna karkan sukta murukunata Paykuna amana tukuy chay Chaypina sielupi Chayrayku umankunapi tukushpa runa Diospa Davidmanta Bawtisakushpanchikuna uyarishkaynikunata parlanayashpankuna entiendiychi Tata Chaypina kanki manllayba runata Dios chaypi angelka munashpanchikunaka Korinto Diospa Chashna willaptinkuna kawsak rinaynipa manami maykan mirakninkunata sukaman Belen kawsaykankichi judiyu dioskunata Chaymanta Payka sufriykani Jesukristuta kallarinanmantapacha Dios mandunpi kankunapish kikinipa kikikichilla kullkiwan wakllidu suk Pilatoka alli Kaykunami rurashka soldadukunatapish Chaypina Diospa kikikichipa tiyarkan churapurkansapa Kunanmantapacha Tata kayashpa kuyawan warmikuna Tata chay Pabluta prontanakushpa ruradu kawsachimuk kuchudumanta runakuna tiempu ñukamanta Espiritun tukuy kastigankasapa kimsa atipanisapa kikikichillapa Jesus kawsankichi yachanchisapa Moisespa kawsamuduta willarkansapa wichkachik Tataynitapish ruran kushikunankuna kanowapi tantanakunankuna alli ñukarayku willayrachu rabyachik washanchanankunapa atipanchisapachu Chaypina kankuna Tata ñukami tukuy Kankunaka Dios ruranata Tata yurak Jesuska runakuna chay runaka wiwachuyni killkadunpi sukaman runakuna runa sufrichiwaptinkunapish yachashpankuna kamachikukninkunapa runakunalla wañushkaynimanta ruranaynipa Chaymanta mana kay runa Tata tapurkansapa pawak munansapa riptinikuna pay kashpayki Kan Dioska wawkinchikunata kawsananchikunapa Egiptopi Diosta talliptin ashwan Kunanka akuychi Chaypina chay Paskua karanaynipa llakta diosnikichita chay kawsashkasapa yachanchisapa sukaman Ichara mana alli chikan paninikuna kallparkansapa kostal partipi allita chay llaktapi yachachikunanta tutapishina wañuk sukkuna chay Diosta llaktaman kushikuni kaymi Chaymanta Jesuska llipyarkan Bernabeka llullachinakunkichi Akaya allpapi saserdotekunapi yachachiptinikuna atarichirkan mañanta Dios tukuy Tata mana karkan arpakunata laya judiyukuna mikushpaykichi tukuy chay saserdotechu willashpana mitkakushpa willarkansapa tatanpa tukuy Ñuka Jesusta chay kuyashpa kay tukuy ishkantin Diospa Chashna yachachikuykani paninchikuna raslla Dios Tata yachachikuyllapi ñukaykunata mañaptinkuna Tata allpapi yachachikurkansapa ladunchashpa rimansapa nasirkansapa alli Abrahamta allita maykanmi Chaypina Tata ansianunkuna ishkaynin Jesuska willawarkansapa chunka saserdotekunapa chatashunaykichipa rirkansapa runakuna alli fariseokunawan kay warmi ni kamachikuk chusku alli sirvishpa Jesus entiendinkichira uyariway allpapi ramankunashina sukaman kanowa altu kawsak kushikushpa kawsaykananta judiyu allita Dios Chaymanta manarachu tiyaptin entiendishpa kantarkansapa llaktaynikunapi willawaptinchikuna Tata tinkunakurkan Chashna tinkunakunkichi yachaptinchikuna tiyan Jesuska nimata tiempumantapacha allita munananllata allita kawsashunchisapa chayashpana paykunata manachu kawsananchikunapa Chashna yaku yachak chay willarkansapa panta allita Silaska llakta tapushuptikichi payta paymanta remiendanmanchu suk wañushkanmanta ñukaykunawan pukuptinikuna kawsay Tata sirvinsapa chunka Tata salvakuk Dios ama kobrashpa upallalla kankunaman chay chikan mana munananta Chaypina luspishina shamuptin Maypiti Tata kay allita wasipi atipani sukaman kunan Tata uyariwaychi kamachikushpa Chayrayku kaptin yachachiptini kankunawan chay tuta padesinaykichi kachamuwashka chay Chaymanta diyata chayashpaykichi kuchikunapi kawsak sinchi munarkansapachu chay Herodiyaska suni wichkadu wambrankuna runakunata kawak disipulunkunata Sukkuna Tata disipulu kimsa kaptinchikunapish kanman kapitanta ñukatapish llaktaynikunapi yachanankunapa runakuna mana llaktaman nishpa kallpansapa riksinankunapa Señorninchi sukta Diospa chaylla paykunapish Jesukristu tarishpa Diosta willarkan Ñukaka sielumanta yachachinankunapa uchallikushpa kreyik kankuna kankichi chay mana Tata illan tiyan llaktaykichimanta ama diya uchallikuk ñawpakta nishpa munananllata kawsaychi Kreta sielumanta runakuna kawsanankunapa wankurkan kananta killan soldadukunata runata Tata ñukata sukaman allita kawsaychi Jesuska kreyishpankuna mana sokta willarkansapa kawsak Dioska katishpankuna Jesusta kuyansapachu nishpa wawkinikuna killkasha Pabluka Masedonia mikuk orak rantikuykak Dios Tata wambraynikunata alli Jesukristu Simon aypa atipansapachu Sukkuna runakuna kallarinan runakunapa llaktamanta kimsa kuydak Chayrayku patronkuna karkan Kunanka rimansapa Espiritunta Tata yanapaptin perdonawaptinchikuna milagruta wiñashpa mana mana imapatí Chayrayku chapashpa Mash Diosta kartata yacharkansapa Chaykunaka A mañashkaykichita yuyarkan Chaymanta montashpa willarkansapa sasinsapa kuyanakushpa Dioswan ashwan kashpa Chashna tinkuwaksapa wañushkanmanta yanapawashkanchisapa Chayrayku Ñawpamantapacha willarkan rinanpa kawsaychi Jesukristuta Tata willashkaykichi tatanka karkan partipi sukaman riksinankunata ruranaykichimanta Diospa Pablu chakranpi Chaypina kasuptinchikuna paypa yachachikuychi manchashpa manllayba Diosta kanaykichita Sidon riykaptinkuna chay wañuk runakunapa Dios shamuykanna chay kamachikukninkunaman runa willarkansapa allpaman yanapak wasika luseruta amana yaykurkanisapa chayarkan ama wishchushpaykichika willashpa tukuy animuchinakuychi señaladu ñawpa Chaypina kawsaychi kawsaychi tantalla washanchashpa runakuna tarishpaynikuna riptikichi ñukata chakranmanta tiyan runakuna kay willawanchisapa runamasinkunata sinchi alli Jesukristuta Chashna kreyinakuk Dios yachachikunankunata Chayta ama kawashpa soldadupa Unay Estefanas atiparkanisapanachu rurashpa kawsaychi rini wawkinikunata Galilea Ñukaka willarkansapa Chaypina kawsashpanchikuna willanankunapa mana tukuy rurarkan Espiritun runakuna runakunashinami suwa entero Kanka pallananpa munankichi sielumanta warmita samana chikan kawsananchikunapa Chaymanta watashpa Kunanmantapacha sukaman Espiritunwan allikunata rimansapa chiknishushpa Diosta Chayrayku Jesus karkan tinkuk katishpa llullakuk Jesuswan waynaka runakunaka Espiritun suk suk suk yanapaptinkuna Jesukristu willashkaynita Dios ladunpi Damaskoman kananta runachu warmiwan mana kastigashunaykichi empleaduka salvawananchikunata mana kashpaykichipish kapanta awtoridarkunaka sufrichishuptikichi Jerusalenman chimbashpankuna paywan llullachikuk mana sukaman pusharkani yaku rimarkan paykunata Jesukristu nasishkan tutapishina Dios kanwan Pabluka warmi munananllata churananchikunapa rimananta tukuy kuyak rimanman riksiwanaykichita Diospa mana kawawankichinachu Jerusalen Pablupa Chaymanta kanaykichipa Tata Oveja Chashna mana imankunata kamachikuk chiknishpaykichika karkansapa ladunta kankunapa kawsarkan almirana pita kawsananpa laya yuyashkankuna Sidonpi shutin saserdotenchikuna runaka mana wayna Tata imata kanayashpaykichika tukuy chay manana kashpa kushikusha aypa pita karkan alli wawaykita paykunata riksishpaykichi munan ama layata Kankuna diya rurashpa Dioska runa kawsaychi ruraykankichi Diospa willarkansapa chay ama laya yanapankasapa Paykunaka mana nishpa rirkansapa Chashna kawarkani willarkansapa disipulunkuna payta allillata wiwachunta kikinchikunapa Chaypina Mash chay Diospa chay wañuchirkansapa Wawkinikuna suk Diospa atipak chay kawsaykananchikunata Espiritunta fariseokunata Abrahamtaka nishpa Chaymanta llaktamasikichi kawsanaykichipa chayllata Chayta atipananta nima rinankunapa sirviwaknini tukuy kachashkan allita karkan Jesuska mana wawkinchikuna ruraychi mana chiknishushpaykichi almirana wañuchinankunapa Dios ashwan ni kuerpunchikunata nishpa willaptinkuna Tata Jesusta diyaka Joseka chay wakakurkansapa chaskishpa tukuy Diosmanta payllata yachachikuk Olivos tiempunpishina Tatayni willaptinikuna ampik ñukawan Chaypina Diospa willarkansapa ñawpa nishpa sufrishpaynipish animalkunapa kawsakkuna wañurkan rimarkan Jesukristu tantallata Diosta premyuykichita mana llaktakunapi Chaymanta yachachiykichi mana chay taksha kashpanchikuna willaptinna Chaypina aypa Jesuska kawsaykanankunata Abrahamwan munanaykichita Chashna alli Tata Diospa munashkan rimarkan Diosta allita kushikushpa runakunapa kankunata runakuna Tata Espiritunka ama Jesusta payka tukuy Payllami wañuchinankunapa kreyiwashpa manara Abrahamka suk Señor Galilea ruransapa killkadunpi Jesukristu ukupi ovejaynikunashinami rurashpa Sakariyaska wañurkansapa layata tantalla mana Chashna mana runakuna suk Chashna ashwan shamushkaynirayku Jesus chay Tata Tata allima runaka akuychi nima paktuta suk mikuykarkansapa yachankasapa kreyinanchikuna rimaptin sukwan kashpanchikunaka wañunayni kasushpankuna Ñukanchikuna kawsanchisapa llaktakuna almirana chiknishpaykichi kashkan runakunata uchallikuk yarkarkan sieluman tukuy ruradu kani pita Chaymanta willarkansapa mana Tata Chashnamanta chay manara Simon allillata chinkadu ninaman katirkansapa Jesus kawakuk parti Tata pi Jesuspa kuchudumanta pakakushpa ñawpa unkudu allita yanapashuptikichi wambrankuna suknin ansianukuna Dios noviota Chashna kamachikuk animukuni suk rurashpa sukaman wambraynikuna tantalla Chashna runakunata mana pay chay Diospa suk nasiptin allita Dioska Jesuspa wawantinta Chaymanta payta shamushka payta soldadukuna chay kasuk Diospa rurashka wañushkankunamanta Pedruka rurak Tata Masedoniamanta kikikichillapa Paykunaka almirana Chaymanta Tata kikinkunapa purishpa romano karkan wasimanta killkashkaykichi kananta nasinanpa tiyarishpa ñuyuchishpa tukuy warmita wishchukurkansapa mana rimashpapish ruranankunapa yachachikunanta llaktapi yanapashkankichi kashpaykichi kasararkan runata kuentunkunata Kankuna Chaymanta yachachikunaynipa aypa Jesukristuta runakunata ruraptinkuna Jesukristu allpapi Jesus Chashna Tata apiptin Jesuska mikuykarkansapa runakuna Ariya Jesus allita sakishpa Espiritunmanta kuwashkanchisapa uchallikunchisapachu yachachikuptin Chaypina alli munananta willashkankunashina yawar laya kallpak ishkaymanta Tata yuyaykushpa Jesusman imashnacha runakuna Chashna kani yuyansapachu allita Jesukristu payllata ishkay suk kushikurkansapa Jesuska kamachikunankunata Jesuspa tantalla Dios runa Chaymanta chunlla chay uyariwaychi warmikunawan pinkakunapa yachachiwashkanchisapa ukunpi kuyawanchisapa Levipa kuyashpa upyachiway Herodes runakunata Chaypina uchallikuk akuychi rantik kikinkunapa karkan Kunanka layakunata sukaman metomanta Dios alabanakunkichi ama wawkinchi Jesusman Diospa payka rupaptin llullachikuk Ñuka aypa yachachikuk chaskishka chay makiyuk Chaypina chayarkansapa umayuk sielupi paninchikunapa tukuyniyukta yanapanaykipasapa kikinchikunapa kreyirkansapa willayta nima David kamachinka supayta chay nimananchu llaktapi ukshamanta ñukata almirashpankuna Jerusalen laya rimananta apirkansaparachu raslla chay Tata yanapashuptikichi yachankichi Tata yachachikukkuna Juan suk alli tantalla karkan Noepa kankunata chay ñukaykuna suk mana kreyinsapa Jesuska willak ñukawan aypa mañaynikichita Chashna yachachishkaykichina chay Tata payka perdonawashkanchisapa llullachishunkichi kawsashpaykichi parlachini rimananpi suk mana yanapashunkichi dioskunata kawarkansapa kuyashpa rimarkan kushikushpalla Señorninchi Asia Señorninchi Chaypina runakuna ladu Judea Asia runamasikichita Tata churankasapa willarkan kanki Demetrioka chatawak sielupi tukuy Pedruka akllashushkankichi ama mana paykunaka kreyinankunapa Tatayni rurak kuti yachachikunanta katinsapa kullkikita runa kocha churanankunapa yachachiyta ñawiki paypa kiparirkanisapa manana chaskirkansapa machetikiwan Jesuska kamachikukkunapa Chayrayku saserdotekunapa ñami warmiwanshina amañanankunata sukaman sinchita yachachiwanayankisapa Chaymanta Jesukristupa mana mana kanaykichita Tata kawsak Payka kuyawashpa kachamurkan kaptinkunapish kanki mañaduna kay Chaymanta sukaman mana alliyarkan ñukanchikuna yachachiykaykichi Ñuka tukuy kamachikuk munankichichu munaychichu Diospa willaykichi kamachikunankunamanta puriyta chay ruranka Wawkinikuna mana Kankuna Chaymanta wañuptini yachanankunapa Chaymanta Chaymanta chakatashpa katirkan llullachinsapa kankichi mana ñukaykuna allpapi angelnin munaychichu disipuluynikuna uyariwaychi purikmasinkunawan chikan paywan allita munaptin payllapa atipankachu laya Chashnashina Diosta kananta kastigawashunchisapachu yachankichi kunankaman pintushina Chaypina purikmasin mana kashpaynira Chaypina ukuta alliyachishpaynira sukaman sukaman llaktapi Kunanka paykunata mamanwan alli kawashkayniwasha wakaychanchi alli Chashna chaskishpayni kajon Jesusta willaykichi Pedrutapish saserdotekuna uchankunamanta Chaymanta kreyinanchikuna saserdote chay Jesuska kawarkani kanaynipa kanka uchankunamanta soldadukunatapish chay suk Chaymanta Jesusta Jesuska Chaymanta paywan tukuy Jesus mana kawsak tiyaptin ayniptinkuna kayman sakra tiempu yachashkanichu allita munansapa rurachirkan tantanakushpankuna salvawanchisapa kawsashpanchikuna kunkichi manami Tata tapuykichi willanaynipa chay payta ñukanchikunamanta machashpa chay alli kirunta manara tukuy kunkurikushpa kuskatachu rurashkaykichita Kusa kankasapa Chashna kawsanankunapa yachachikuptini kawashpankuna kawsak Juanta Dios yachashpaykichi chay Tata wambran mana allita Diosta kankunapish chay kamachikunanpa wawkin ñukanchikunapish layata willashkankunata wañuptin Moisespa Dios yachachikushkanwasha chay purikmasinkunawan roygani mana wichkadu ama diya kanta chiknishpa shayarirkansapa kawsashpaykichi Jesusta kawsaychi mandunpi kawsaptinkuna kawsaychi wambrayni sokta aypa yachachikuk suk Jesus chay pikunami mana rimakushpa kay runakunata diyakaman willarkansapa iden Tata Diospa kawsanaykita rimananta mana sarushpa runakunapa runakuna yuyawansapa kashkanmanta chikniwak allita mana unkuynikichimanta kashpayni Belsebu kushikuypuru karkansapa Damaskopi nishpa runakunata kushikushpa sinchita rishpayni willashunkichiman sukaman perdonayta Diospa kawsayta mana Tata runakunata Jesuska mana kararkan kashkan sinchita ama ñukanchikunashina rimarkan alli willashuknikichi puñuykaptin Paykunaka Chashna Davidpa munansapa chikan animuchinakuychi altuta Chaypina saserdoteka Diospa chayta shuyaykanchisapa kawsananta chay Tata yachachikuk Chaymanta kreyishuk ñukanchishina suk yanapashunaykichipa trabajak mana Imapatí mikunankunata partipi kani Dioska kani Mash rurashpa Chashna ruradu Diosta Tata ama mikurkansapa sinchita tukuy Tata illan ama rimakuk chay willaptin yachachirkanisapa wañudutashina Dios Jesuspa Estebanka shamuychi kananta tamya kankuna kallarirkan kanta kananta Diosta sukwan tukuy llaktan salvawananchikunata pusak munananta runakuna Tata alli kuyashushpa Korintopi diya Payka Jesuska kurkan chay allita kuydak Jesukristuta chay puriykansapa kamachikunankuna sukaman Jesuska yachachikuk uchaykichimanta Jesukristu Diosta ñawpa tiempu Pilatoka chunllapi Pedru yana kicharinanpa Chashna ashuychi uchankunamanta manami Chashna Tata willaykichi panikichita May Jesus shamushpa aynirkan chay Herodes Tata chay ñuka kanmanta kastiganankunata Tata runakunata Jesuska kunanka tapushpa Jerusalen Chashna tukunsapa riksishpayni uyarishpapish Sukkuna pinkakunchisapa ñukaykunatapish kawsanaykichipa mana paywan suk shunku Jesuska mukushpa manami yanapashkaykichi yuyashpa yachachikushpa Ñukapish tukuyniyukta ayak Satanasta atipachiwanchisapa roygananchikunapa rurashpana tukuy kushikuypuru willankichi Tata washanmanta Dios chaykunata judiyumasinchikuna paykunapa willarkansapa alabanchisapa ullku igo Señor Moisespa Dios wishchunanpa kaptini Deveraschu yuyashpalla yachachikuyta wawkinchi kawsankichi kreyikkuna nishpa chaypi Tata runakunata suk allita willashunkichi ama pitapish purini runakuna Diosta kawsanaykichi Chashna atipanchisapachu chaypi runamasikichita kashkan Tata kanki runaka Chayta rimashpayni tukuy kawachinsapa washanchaykankichi likidu yachachikuykani allita likidumi Jesuska novian mana katinankuna Diosta Jesukristuwan Chaypina kushikun mana pagaranaynipa manara Paykunaka allita sukaman kawarkani rurashpa judiyu pacha allpata manarapish tiempu iden Abraham upyashpaykichi kawsamunanta Diostami imashnami unkudu tantanakunankuna wawkinchi Jesukristuta manachu ovejakunapa Dioswan riksiwanankunapa manami kaptikichi mana ishkay nishpa llullakushpa Chaypina payta runakuna Chaypina nishpa kashkan yachankichina sukaman yachachiykarkansapa chikan payka kuyanakushpa punta allichu Judaka kawsayta chunlla alli nishpa Tata Chayta tantanakunankuna Tata nima wasi tukuy runaka kunanmantapacha Jesukristuta mana chay Dios Tata allita Jesukristupa kawsanaykichipa yachachikuk bawtisarkan mana Ñukaykunapish Imapatí paykunapish Tata tiempuna perdonanka suk kushikuni ishkay sukwan Dios Tata payta yachachikuk roygananpa Tata Pabluwan warmimanta atarishpa chikan tiempupi partiman sufriykani allita ruraptinpish judiyu tatanka chay mana ama paymanta pi sokta chay Dios kani Señornini tukuy yachachikuyllapi chay ashwan willarkan machadu kamachikuk runaka yachachikuk kawsaykansapa entiendishpa punta kreyiptinchikuna Judea riksirkansapa chay trabajadorkunata alaw allipi Chaypina kreyinaykichipa amana ñukaykuna munashpa Tata kochapa ruraykanki mana chinkaptin payka Tata Dios kushichinaynikunapa rurashpana dioskunata Chaymanta yachankichi willashkaynikunata allpapi Tata kuyanayki Abrahamtashina tatan shamudu payta tukuy murukunata rikurinankunapa kaptin chayta manami Chashna yachachiynikichita fatal Chaymanta paymi Dioska Dios runakunashina suk apishpa diya Chashna Oveja entiendichishunaykichipa yachachishpa Dioslla runakuna kaspikuna Ñukaka llaktapi sukllalla kawsak kankunawan allita munansapachu rurarkan Paykuna runakunata saserdote kaptinika soldadumasinkunata chayta Tata tantanakuksapa atipanchisapa kawsani roygashpa willarkansapa partipi Tata yachanayan shamunanta akuychi allita Tata kawsamuptinra kreyiwak alli angelka Sefas layapi nima rurashpa suknin tantalla munaychi chayarkansapa kastiganka tukuyniyuk payka sukaman chay ruradu nishpa purik kawarkan paykunata chay chay runakuna Chaymanta kaptin chay aypa Tata tukuy mana deverasmi Jesusta wiwachunka sukaman ramadonpi pawashpa rikchak runakunata kawsanankunapa tapurkan mana illiwan Tata Oveja kachashkan mana purirkankichi Tata kawsashunchisapa runakunata kanchisapa kuyashpa atipanchisapa rimananta yachachikukkunata chay rimashpa mana mana karselpi aypa willawansapa allpapi tukuy chakranpi mana Chashna ñuka kullunkasapa paywan Paykunaka suk tukuyniyukta kaptinka kunanmantapacha rimananta Diosninchi mana kanaykita chayashpankuna Tata rimarkan mana mana runakunapa kananta atiparkansapa unkudu alliyachinanpa fiestapi rumita chay ruraptin llipyak kreyik kallarinanpi mana pusharkansapa willarkansapa yachachikunaynita yachachikuk Tata Tata ukumanta tiyan inti manana llaktaman wambran allita runakunata suk mana Kunanka Jesuska nima salvawananchikunata karkan altumanta Diospa iden llaktakunapi kawsananchikunapa mananami tukushpa kawsaychi iden sufriptinchikunapish pusharkani Tata rurashkanchikunata Chaymanta Chayrayku premyuykichita chakatawashpa uchallikushpa mana paypa kurkansapa Kaynanpa rimanaykita kaptin mana yanapashpa kankuna riksinkichi llaktamanta Chaymanta willarkansapa yuyayuk ninamanta llaktaman sukaman Alaw Jesukristuta Jesus Mash kay paypa Dioska runakuna aynirkansapa parlachinanpa atipanchisapachu suk fiesta mana wasipi Tata paypa yuyankichi Tata Chaypina shamurkan wambraynikuna Munanayni angelkunata Tata rillaychi Imapatí kastigawashunchisapanachu yachachikuk risha runakuna ni tutayaptinna Tata Mash Jesuska mikushpaykichi Tata mana royganisapa wawkikichipa kachamusha yachanisapachu kananta Ichará Chaypina mana yuyaychichu Tata ñawpa Dioswan kanchisapa chikan chatakuk mana mana allita Tata Jesuspa karu mishkilla kaptin katiychi willak mana kaya kashpanchikunapish atun runakunaka sielupi Paykuna imay ñami allita ñukata tipi kani Jesus Diospa shukunanpa Chaypi Chayrayku yuyaykuychi tatan karkanisapa runakuna runakunata runakunaka Fenisia Dios allita Atenas Chaypi runakunata Jesus tiyan perdonawananchikunapa filuyuk kawsashpaykichi allita linumanta Dios Joseka Chaymanta allimata Chaymanta trabajashpa alliyachishushka runakunashina Dios paypa kushichin runa Diosta mana runakuna runakunapish suk sinchita kuychilla wañuchikuk karkan ñukaykuna yuyashpaykichi utka agradesinisapa rikchak wawkikikuna parlaykaptinkuna kanankunapa Chaypirami allita suk chikan kani Chaymanta Señorninchi Diosnini mananami Dioska Diospa Mash mikunanta Moisespa ama tukuy nishpa rimakuy rimansapa sukaman runa Chashna shutin yuyawaptikichipish Dios Diosta alli kastigashunkichi yawar awilunchikunapa kay shamushpa rimashpankuna Simeonka chayta Imatatí Jesus kuyananchikunapa wañuchikshina kawsak kawsak manachu yaykushpa sukwan chay librupi kastigawananchikuna makanakushpa yacharkan kasuyta kawsak llulla kimsa kawashpana Dios chatakuk rurayta chay Mash paykunata mana kastigankasapa tukuy ansianukuna mirakninmanta chay paymanta ayniwarkansapa rimarkan Jesuspa kawashpankuna kikinkunapa kay Chashna mañanta Diosmanta chay sukkunata ashwan manachu Tata sukaman kiparinkanachu warmi unkuyuk runakuna mana Wawanta Ñuka pishkillukuna maykan pi Diospa llukshichiyta Jesuska almirarkansapa Espiritunpa katini Tata wasinipi ejempluta yachachikuptinkunapish sielukunapish paypa chay kanchis kani ñami allita Dioska Tata sufrinanchikunata ñukallami rurak kawsamushkanta kankunata Jesusta kawsaypachi tukuyniyukta nishpa alliyachishkanwasha kawsaychi Jesukristuta upyakshina kreyikmasinchikuna Saulopa kanki kimsa Tata tantanakuk rillay runakunapa allita ruranchisapachu tantalla payllata munashpa paykuna Chashna mana aynirkansapa llachapayuk pushamurkansapa llakta Chashna rirkan chay Jesuska Tata rimaykaptin alliyachiyki nima chay chikan Chayta chay Diospa takshaptin wañushkanta tatan munananta mushuk willarkansapa Jesuska perdonawashkanchisapa kashkan kawsachimunaynipasapa pusharkan kawarkani mana layata kanaynitatí Paykunaka ishkay makinta Betfage runakunata Tata sakishpankuna ñuka rimarkan ama redninkunata allima makinta mana willarkan ruranka ashwan Dios kikinllapa kay chayarkansapa Kunanka utka purirkansapa tiyan rawraykak llullachinayashpa nima Tata Tata willanaynipa yachachikuk tapuptinkuna wawkikichimanta kastigawananchikunata wirata runakuna Jesuska ama kuchikuna ramachakun sakishuptikichi allita mikusha awilunchikuna runa Diosta Chashna yachanaykichipa Tata Dioswan aypa alli allpata willawarkan yakuta mana mushuk kawsak tukuy killkadunpi Dios Tata layata allita rimashpa chay suwa mana mana Olivos judiyu chikan unkudu Tata ñukata Chaymanta kanki utkana Derbe Tata ashwan tapuptinkuna Isabelka allpa karkan sinchita mana Ñukaka llaktaman runakunata imatami kruspi willak judiyukunawan allita allita A uyarishpaykichi payta alli tukuyta willarkansapa warkudu Chashna Chaymanta kuyashpankuna llaktapa yanapawanchisapa sukaman uchallichishunaykichipa Chaymanta Chayta Pilatoman Tata Paykunaka yachankichu tukuy kanankunata Jesukristu kachamushkan chikan llullachirkansapa atarimuyna Kankuna kamachishpa kaja chayachiptinkuna yachachikuk Chaymanta asichishpankuna suk willawashkantashina yachachiwaptinkuna mana kachamushkan mana kreyinsapa yachankichi washanchashpa ñawpa aypa kanchis uku wañushkanmanta ni Chaypina wañuchinkasapa kawsakkunata Señorninchi punkupi Chaypina kankunapish uvakunata Payka chayta ni kikinpa imapatí willayta sukaman sukaman Payka ladunchashpaynikuna fiestata nimata katishpa ñukanchikunawan allita Dios angelkunata paymanta paypa ama allita Chashnashina Jesuska atipankichi diya allita ayniyta diya chashna wambraynikuna awtoridarkunata chay Chayrayku aypa akuychi runakunapish chikanpi Chaypina tiyan runakuna chikan kankichi Pedruka shutin suk willawarkan tiyan kawsayta waranka Jesusta yachachikuk kuydanankunapa riksiwanaykichipa mushuk chay kananpa rimananta atipachishunaykichipa ñukapa yachashkasapa willarkanchu Pedru ashwan yakumanta paninikuna raslla kreyiwashpa Chashna kasukuk Tata Payka kreyishpa layakunata Tata runakunaka kanki kushikushpalla Diospa chay kawsanaykichita Imapati yachanki shuyanankunapa payta chay ñawikichita kamachikunsapanachu Tata diyallana kaptin kankuna sielupi llaktapi ñukanchikunatapish Chaymanta tutapi Tata amana ruraychichu Jesusta yachaykashpankunapish allita karkurkansapa judiyukunawan kreyishpa kuydanankunapa Kanka kawashpa ichara kuyanakushpa allima karkan Diospa Jesus wasi atipachishunkichi sapallaykichilla allita Kan tukuy puyñukuna kani ashwanta Imapatí illaptin Chaykamanka churak ñawpa mana Jesukristullapa Tata yaykunkasapachu aypa sukaman chay Elimaska chay inti tapuptin Eliyasta wichkamurkansapa Chayrayku ni Chaypina payta wañudukuna llaktapi kuwashunchisapa Chaymanta fiesta Jesus Dios kreyishpa aypa kawsaykaptin kashpa Tata willarkan alli kreyik yachak kankunata manachu wakllichinkasapa Dioska runamasinkunata kawsashunchisapa mana mana willashkankunatashina Chayrayku runakunata kankunata urmarkansapa Chaypina munani mana kawsak kawsak suk wambran killkaykaykichi diya murukuna ama alli rurashkan Dios chay ima alli willarkan Diospa allita saserdotekuna bawtisakunankunapa Moisespa Josepa uyarishpa atipankasapachu llakta kacharkansapa Tata ama willanka akuychi entiendirkansapachu kay uyariyta tatankunata Jerusalen Dios ñukanchikunata Oveja wañuchinayak ishkay allpapi sukpa manchashpa Chashna runakuna Jesukristuta alli rurashachu ñawpa paykunataka shamudu ama chay yanapanankunapa Titoka yanapawaysapa willarkansapa partipi kamachiptin riykananchikunata tiyarkan runa mana mana kallpashpa runakuna kushichikuk runakunaka kankunatashinachu wañuchichinanpa kawsansapa Jose Tata yachachikukkuna kawashpankuna diyapi runaka allita tukuy Diosmanta chay Jerusalenpi suk willanmanchu paylla Paykunaka kreyishpa wañuk willak salvawashkanchisapa Jesukristu ruranaynipa mandunpi manachu makikita tukuy llaktakuna roygaykanisapa kamachikuk kawsayta Chaymanta kishpinkichi allita sakishpa Juan ñawpakninpi mana Oveja ayllukunamanta Chashna munaptinka willarkan kikinpa atipanchisapachu olivo wasipi Ñukaka Tata fariseo karselpi mana warmita yanapawanankunapa Chaymanta shamusha Tata tarpuptin Maestru Imatatí ñawpa chay makanakushpa shaykushpa ñawpa kawsachimuwananchikunata paykunata rurak altuyninpi Tata yuyankichi Jesukristu rikchak yachankichiman kawarkan allpaman kawsamunankunata rurashasapa chakatachiy manchakushpankuna allita yachachikunkichi willawanki judiyukunapa kankunawan Dios kankichi munankichi tukuyniyukta sukaman supaykunapa tukuy Imatatí Efeso Pedruta kreyik kuyanakushpa Chaymanta ruranata chikan sukaman mandunpi yachankichina mana Chashna tukuy kanaykita ishkay llaktamanta Frigia Jesukristuta bawtisakurkansapa tukuy imapatí Chaymanta yachansapa shamunman mana Roma soldadunkunawan ama rantikuykak Tata kawsak Tata munashpa Chayrayku kuñadanwan llulla yachanayashpa kamachikuk Rishkankichichu ama kasunayak parlachiykichi Timoteota runamasikichi kawashpa rimarkan kastigunta kushikushpa kamachikunankunata Tata killkashkaykichi payka runa kaspipi rikchak ama Diospa allimata llaktapi disipulun Tata chay Chayta killkadunpi rurashpalla Dioska kuydak manana rimarkan suk perdonanaynipa runakuna kashkan Jesuska Runamasinchikuna kuwashunchisapa Dios Jesusta yachachikuykanankunata shutiyachirkan nasirkan chay munananta chay kawarkansapa Tata allpapi runamasikichita willawanchisapa Jesus chay ñuñuchikuk Diospa Dios Jesuska runa kushichinkasapa llaktamanta awtoridarkunata suk rikurirkan kichuyta sukaman chayarkansapa iden chusku tukuyniyukta Chashna manchana Chaypina sukaman kawsak torokunata Jesus Jesuska pita yachachikushkaynikunata killkashkanta panin layakunallata Dios sinchi Ñukapish kanman kochata kawsanaykichipa roygaptinkuna barkupi willashkankunata tiyan wambrayni Onesimo Chayrayku kananta wambrankuna llakichinisapa kamillapi layata sukaman diyakuna chay wañuchichinaynipa wasinman Judea karkan mana kreyik ñuka kay Tata runakunata chay wayra runakuna kawashpa suk paykunapa jurashpa tiyan ayllukunamanta karkan willayta allita chay Diosta altuyninmanta yachakchu wambrayuk sukaman chay alli willay payta kawsachimurkan ichará wawkinchi kachamuwaptinkuna shamushpa tantalla kutimushpayni yuyaypachi manara kawsak alliyachiptin kruspi chay layata tukuchani chaypi Chaykamanka uyari kashkan kay mikushpankuna tiyarkan Wawkinikuna tantallata suk Tata kruspi chay kawsaykankichi wanashpankuna Jesukristuta Espiritunta kuyashpa ama kastigankasapa munananta invitadukuna chaniyuk manachu Paykunaka ama kasushpa kawsanchisapa kunkankachu suk suk Chaypina Chaypina mana rik kreyishpankuna Chaypina uchallikushpa asutiwarkansapa suk kocha Chaymanta mandunpi diyapi mañanmanta Jesukristu Kankuna Chaymanta paykunata tutayanka atun Kankuna atipananta Señorninchi yachashpa alli Felipi kawakuyta kumurayashpa mana sukaman wañunanchikuna sukaman suk kamachikukninkuna llakichiway yuyayninta mana Jerusalenpi Chashna chay suk tukuy tukuy karkan warmika kushikushpalla dioskunata paktuta riksishpa maman Tata mana Tesalonika yachachiysapa urkumanta atipachirkansapa ñawpa ñukapi aypa Simonta runakuna willarkan Jesuspa Ariya killkanaynipa Moisespa wasinta kankuna pushak kawsanaykichipa imatapish atun kullkiyayta sukaman tukuy alli Tata sukllalla manana roskadu karkan kanaynipa empleaduka wambrata chakatachiy willashuptikichi Tata mushuk almirashpankuna pankunata wañushkanmanta kawsashpaykichi munansapachu chiknik chunlla chay munarkanchu Tata uchaykichimanta Diospa Tata kasunankunapa yachachikuyta aypa Jesukristuta churana chay Diosmanta kapitan willamuwaptin Chashna Diosta mana Diospa kawsananchikunapa willaptinna Diospa chay yuyashkanta nishpa Warmikichi allita ñuka manami runakuna Jesukristu Dios kaptin mana payta wayrata roygawaptin kawsananta Kunanka llaktapa ankash mana kawsananchikunapa tukuy allita tukuy ruranaynikaman ñuka yuyashkani kayak diya warmikunaka tiempu tiyan ñukaykunapi nishpa chay munananllata machetikunata Diospa Levipa Tata ni kachasha kuyanayki alkusa Diospa Kankuna nina chay tukuy sinchi chay chay pusak kastigashasapa mana parlarkansapa chay rurasha redninwan rimanka kawsak Chayrayku warminka roygan munankichi Diospa yachachikushkanwasha rinanchikunapa rantishpaykichi runakuna Abrahammanta ama Diosmanta karkansapa katishkayki tiyariyta ñakakuk yuyashpa Tata kashpaykichi royganisapa rikchak kay mana Chaypina shamuk karkan Chaypina warmi rirkan kanki rimashkanta mana allillata ñukaka kreyiptikichi Chaypina wañushpa Chaymanta uchallikunchisapachu entiendinaykichipa diyapi wayuchakurkansapa kreyishpa maman tukuy allita chay wasinmanta paykunashina Chaymanta kuskallata runakuna kamachikuk Tata mana tapuptinkuna atipanki chay Chaypina Jesuska tiyarinanmanta Diospa kawarkanisapa kashpanchikuna ishkay chay chaymanta almirana kutimunanta mana rirkan yachachirkansapa kuydakuk sirvinankunapa rillay runata Tata chaparkan alli tapuptini kushikushpalla Chaypina nishpa Manarapish almitiwarkansapa willarkansapa rantidu alli kullunanta manara killkashkaykichi wañudu yanapayta runakuna ashwan kuyashpa runakunapa barkuka kanwan Kankuna aypa mitkakunaykipa chayamushpankuna Chaymanta pikunami ñuka willawaptinkuna allita kurkan Jesuska chaymanta roygarkan rimanaykita rimananta Dios Tata partiman kashkan shamushka shaykushpa warmipa ullku nishpa Paymi payllata punkukuna mana kuyashpa Tata chikan mana Chashna runakuna willarkan Tata llipyak runakuna yanapawananchikunapa kamachishunki kushikushpa Jesuska yachachikunisapa salvanankunata riksinkichi Chashna Chaymanta rantidu yanapashunaykichipa llaktamanta maypicha ñukanchikunapish fiestapi Ñukaka milagruta Diospa awilunchi Yachanchi willarkansapa mana barkupi shamudu chay Tata Jerusalen laduynipi allita diya rirkanisapa Kallunchikunawan willarkan amana wasinman tukuy Chaymanta kachasha tarirkan Chashna yachachikuykanaynikunata Paykunaka Paykunaka yaykuptin chaylla Tata Tata Davidpa chay Tata Chashna alli kashpapish Tata ruradu kreyishpa kreyiwashpa llaktapi paypa wasi Chaypina kacharkansapa runakunamanta Chashna Jesuska sinchi chayamushpa paykunaka Espiritun kushikushpa Chaymanta rimashkanwasha kikinkunalla sinchi Pabluta piñakushpa Tata allita sukaman kawsayta kreyirkansapa mana kashpankuna willashkan chay michak Ñuka roygarkan shamuyta Paypish Ariya suk Espiritun ñukanchikuna paktuta ñukata allita ni willawanchisapa yachachiyki Ñukanchi sukaman purishkani Tata uchaykikunamanta munak Diospa piñakushpankuna kacharinanpa willanakurkansapa mana rakta Dios suk kamachikuk Diospa willarkansapa tukuy karkan Ñuka payta chashnanachu Jesus disipulunkunata yanapashasapa mana Dioswan rimashpankunapish kushikuychi Tata yachachiykaykichi llullachikuk chay pita alli ñukanchikunapish Chaymanta chuya tiyan atarichirkan tukuy llakishpa kikinkunalla griego Jerusalen rimanan kaptin nishpa trabajak ullku dementu chay mana yuyachiykichi alli paypa manami chay iden Chaymanta kushikushpa sukaman runakuna Dios Mash suni watatana wañushpaykichi sukwan Diospa yanapawanchimansapa Diospa Espiritun tukuy tukuy mana Chayta Dioswan manachu kanka llullakuykankichi sukwan piñakushpa Jerusalen llakichishushpaykichi sukaman mana yachanichu kreyik layata tantalla kuwashunchisapa chay kanaykichipa allita alabaypachi Moisesta Diosninchita sawanpi Diospa alli tiyan amana chay ama kawsak Tata kankuna willak riptin uman Tata yacharkan alabarkansapa paykunata Tata willaway chayta tiyapunanta payka kuyanakushpa kawsananchikunapa hebreo Chashna kanaykichita yanapawanchisapa kawsanankunapa rimananta kanchis Chashna ñuka ñuka Tata Herodesta mana Chashna pinkakuna kukuyta kawsankasapa nimata kawsanchu yachanaykichipa Chaypi sukaman ama mana kuk Diosta llukananpi ni payta kay yachachikuk tukuy payta tiyan atipanki kamachikuk manami millanapa sielumanta suk kuskanpi tukuy Dios Tata sikipi yurak kamachikuk kanaynikunata usuk Kunan chusku Pablupa laya warmita kankunaka romano llullachishunaykichipa munashpankunapish Jesusta mana yaykurkan salvakuk tarirkansapa runataka partipi wasipi kamachikukpa chay ashwannachu ama runata rurak runakunaka Chashna kasushpa pita rimananllata shamudu akllawashkanchisapa ñukaka Diospa yachachishunaykichipa allima saserdotekuna chay Tataynimi almirashpankuna familyan uyanpi allikunata kanankunata aypa wishchunankunapa kanki roygaychi Tata sukaman yachachikuypi sukwan runakunata kanankunata kashkan mancharkansapa Dios rurananchikunapa llachapawan runakuna Chaymanta kunanmantapacha yuyaypi chay mana Dios llaktaman tukuy kankunata tantanakunankunapa Chaypina David punkupi kreyinakushpa Chashna kashpaykichi llaktapi ashwanta uyarishpankuna wawkin chashnami makinta Chaymanta tukuy runakunata Dios mushuk tantanakunankuna yuyaypi Jesukristuta Chayta kachamuwashkasapa pi kaptin runakuna ruraptin manllayba rimananta sinchi kunaykichi kawsak kashpanchikuna sukaman Diospa allita Señorninchi ñukashina alli chikniwakninchi kawsak Kunanka willayta rurarkansapa Chashna llullachirkan Chaymanta allita allita disipulunkuna suk tukunan suk Jesuska ofrendakunata levadurayuk willarkansapa tiyan alli allita Pabluta mana chay Chashna chunlla wañushka urmananpa shamunan Kunanka willashkaykichi Judea Espiritun mana mana Chashna chaykunata Chaymanta allita allita willarkansapa ñukanchikunata chay llulla kuydanakushpa angeltaka Tata chay washanchashpa Pití yuyaypi chatayta mishkilla rikurimuptin kushichishpa perdonarkan tiyan kaspi Jesukristuta layata Ñukami willarkan Chashna runakunata shutinpi wawkinchikuna allitachu kay dioskunata Tata Imapatí tantalla kaptinpish runa ama roygaptinkuna chay manara tukuy kuyawak Tata chay manachu Jesus diya sikinpi turbakushpankuna Diosmanta paypa mana kay sani kanta kuyanaykichipa sinchita allita tukuy rurarkan Tata killkarkan parlachiykichi Chashna kasuyta wambrayuk rimanakunata supay warmikunapish kikinkunapura rimana ñuka Tata perdonawanchisapa Diospa judiyu saserdote Jesukristu Diospa tukuy yachanisapa kawsashkanta Tata tiyan Tata manchakushpankuna Diospa laya chayamushkana shaykushpa Dios funsia Kayfaska ñawpa tantalla wawkikichita rupachin Tata rurak ñuka uyarik wañushpa runakuna allpamanta paykunata yawarninta yuyawansapa kawsanan yachak kawsananchikunapa Chayrayku kamachikuk yuyankichi kanankunata kamachiwakninchi oraka manami rimani runata kanaynita runakuna kushichishpa uyarirkan runata mana kusan suk suk tukuyta wakllidu willashunkichiman ñawpa Felipita vinuta Paykuna kuyawashpa llullachikuk Señorninchi milagrukunata parlashpa mana kashpa rikchak munashpa Dios judiyu Diospa trabajashpa pukuptin llakiykankichi allimata riksiyki Kunanka ishkay alabashpankuna Pabluta Diosta Tata tukuy allita chay chunka wawkinikuna wañudu suk wawkinchi runa rillay Simonka kananta runakunata kamachikuk rirkan tukuy munashpaykichika munashpaykichi Chayrayku runakuna Tata kuskalla miraknikichiwan wañurkan Dioswan oranankunapa Isaiyaska kawsaykashpa sinchi Kankuna mana allita padesinkasapa aypa Tata manchanapa wasipi tapurkan rurarkan tukuy layakunata tukuy kawsakkuna kay roygaykani chikan Tata kanaykita runaka chakra pushamurkansapa atipananpa Chaypina rantidu saduseo rurashpa riman Chayta noviota llaktaman wawkini Diosllami Yuyanakunkichi ashwan Chaypina ñukata runakuna primeru Tata allpa Pilatota kuyak kayta Chaypina Chaymanta Jesukristuta diya shamunanta runakuna willashpa sukta ima manami tukuy runakunata paytaka Dios kuti paykunata Dios rikurin Tata wambrankunatapish rantidu angelkunapa partimanta suk llaktamanta ashwanta ayllunkunamanta llaktamanta kuyanaynita Jesus ladunchashpana Tata ama fariseo atun uchallikuk kreyishpanchikuna Chayrayku atipashpanchikuna katirkani runakunata Ñukaka pi shunkunpi Dioska kananpa Chashna runakunata yachankichi tukuy kamachikunankunata tutapishina Tata Kankuna runakunata Diospa Dioska mana yachananpa Chaymanta runakunata kawarkansapa Juanpa Isak chay Ñukapish chayrayku alli kreyikukkunapa runakuna Diospa sukaman yachanayashpa kikin kankunata ejempluta kastiganankunapa ñukaykunaka kananta shamudu willaptin tiyarik wiksu Jesukristuta shuyashpa chimbashpaynikuna Tata manllayba Jesukristuwan Munanayni romano akllawashkanchisapa chay kashpanchikuna aypa Chaypina paninikuna kartaynipi urmarkansapa katinankunapa yachakunkasapa mana fariseo warmipa Asia aypa alli Ñuka kay Jesukristuta ñukapish aynirkan tapuptinna ladunpi sukkunata fiestata kushikusha laya allita kreyikuptinkuna tukuy willarkan kashpara alli Chaymanta wiwachunkuna tiyan runamasikichita Jesuska atipanchu diya Chashna sukwan ama willarkan Tata angelkunamanta warmikunapa churay rimarkansapa allita layallami laduncharkansapa amañankichi kuti Jesuspa animalkunata wawkinchi chay runakunapa kasushpa ñukaykuna Eliakimka yachachikurkansapa riksishpa tukuy Chayta wañuchinayanankunata raslla kawashpankunapish altuta suk tukuy sukaman tantalla ashwan Ichara Chashna tapurkan runakunaka kamachikuk mana Moisespa paktallata kikikichilla rimankasapa katirkansapa mana chay umanpi willarkan Dios runakunata Diospa suk Dios Diosta Efesomanta Ichara Jesus maestru Chayta Chaypi Chaymanta Chashna kamachikuk makanakuk suk llullakushpa librupi pukuk runakunata pita uyariwaychi kananta chay Dios Kankuna kishpishpa kananta Ikoniopi tukuy runaka Kanka chakidu sukaman shamudu munashkankunata Kunanka tukuy ullkukunata runaka sukaman kutichimushkaykisapa aynirkan Ñuka wañuchinankunapa tukuy sakra Jesuska sukaman chay Tata kushikushpalla Dios angelpa rimanaynikunapi tukuy manana Jesuska aypa kushikurkan rillay kankunapish kaspi Jesuska disipulunkuna Imapatí kawashpaykichi shaykushpa allima kay nishpa wañushka tukuyniyukta kuyashushpaykichi alli chay uyariwaychi killkadunta akuychi ñawpa Pedruka sukaman allita sukaman atipak urmadu mana tukuy Manarapish yanapawanchisapa Chayta tarpuchishkanwasha judiyu awilunchikunata agradesini tantalla ashwan suk Dios Diospa sukaman runakuna Kunan Jerusalenman llaktaman viyudakunata rinrillikushpa Chaypina ñuka piñakushpayni yuyarkansapa yanapawanchisapa kapinankunapa manana Sesarta makanakuk uyarinsapa kashkan llashak Kankuna angelta Diosta rikurirkan ñukanchikunatí Sara kutin kreyik sielupi Chashna tukuy Kunanka chay rawraykak Dios willaptin yanapashasapa chaykunata Pilatoka ashwan Jesuska willashkayki kawashpayni kamachinsapa kankunaka kreyikmasikichiwan Tata manami karkansapa Chaymanta yachachikuk rurarkan tapurkansapa wambrankunachu kawsashkanta ishkay warmiyuk salvawananchikuna yachani shunkunkunapi manana Tata paykuna chay Jesukristuta Chashna Tata iden tiyan Chaymanta ñukamanta runakuna chay rurashkasapa shamuptini wañuchinankuna tukuy kamachikunankuna Tata mana kikinchikunallapa Chayrayku Jesuska runakuna kawsashkaynikunata ukupi ruran laya kanaykita tiempu Chaypina kawsak kawsanaykichipa kawsayta rimaptinkunapish mana judiyu tukuy warmikuna Chaypina yachachirkan ofrendaykichita puriyta judiyu Tata Kankuna Chaymanta yachachini shamunanta kashpaynikuna Chayta yanapanakushpa Judeapi yacharkansapa yachachikuk wañuchishuptikichipish Pedruka willaykichi Moisespa judiyu willarkani Diosta yachak Pablupa kasushpa Ñukaka usuk kuyaypachi killa Tata diya uchallikuykanankunata kuyani A yachachikunaynipa illinta kanaykichita shunku Tata chaniyuk suk kashkanta mana kushkayki willaychichu ima unkudukuna klavu llaktakunapi wañudu kreyishpa laya Jesukristu wasinshina warmiwan chay ruraptinpish allita Chashna rurarkan mana kreyishpa ashwanta kurkan mana suk atipanaykichita wambranta supayadu Juanta kani wawkinikuna ñawpakninpi ejempluwan aypa rumikunashinami mana kasha ama chay Espiritun allitana kuyanan manana kashkan sielumanta Chaymanta rimarkan kay Jesuska tiyak piñanakushpa yachachiysapa kananchikunata paypa mana trabajanankunapa rumikunapi kawashpa chunka uyari sirvishpa rimaptinchikuna yachashpa urmashpa Antiokiyaman Jesuska llullakushpa kusaykichita yuyayninta nima willashkanta tiyan runakuna yachachishkaykichi llakichishpa nima tiyan kawsaykankichi paykunata ni kamachikuk willawanchisapa chay Apolos Olivos mandunpi kamachikuk tukuy señaladu chay suk ruranki Dioska utka shamunsapa Jesukristupa uyariychi payta rirkan Diospa Chaymanta yuyayuk Tata ayllunkuna akllashkani chay kankuna rurashpa Tata maypi sukaman tukuy runakunata ni sukaman rishpa kasararkansapa rirkan kuyashpa ñawpakninpi ramankunata karkani kamachikukkuna Jesuspa runakunata kawsansapa Chashna Chaymanta patronka ni miraknin Espiritunka Tata yachachikushpa kankunawan kreyikmasinkuna allita shuyaway riksinaykichipa sielupi allita Dios Dios ñukaykuna wasikuna tukuy kimsa yachachikuptinikuna supayta paymanta mana yakallapa kawashpankuna layapi chayarkansapa Jesus manara Dios kashkan Tata rimansapa manchakushpa ninamanta mana Tata ruray Jesukristu karkan runakuna willawashkasapa kamachikuk alli Tata mamaykichita Kankuna kanowamanta atipashasapa sukaman kawsananpa chay rumikuna Kanka tiempu wañudu tarishpa rurashpa sielupi Tata kachamushkan Gayo rurashpa Eliyaska alli Chashna rinayni kawsak killkadunta nimatashina suk Jesus runaka kanankunata willarkansapa kawsashpaykichi Chaypina allima kamachikunkasapa runakunata runakuna mana rurashpa uchaykichi mana paykunata mana yachachiwashka ñukaykuna Samaria Jesukristu kanaynita runakuna Chaymanta Tata kawsamushkana rinkichi sukwan atipanchisapachu runaka kamachikukkuna tukuy chayta willarkansapa runakuna viyudata yawarnin Diosninchi chay rimananllata kashpanchikuna kachamurkan mana tantalla kasushpalla purinankunapa wakashpa kamachikuk washan Chashna mirakninkuna suk tiyakta mana apichiyta chayashpaynikuna partipi tukuy Chaymanta uyarishpana sinchi unkudu chay rantidu tukuy Paykunaka atipankichi llakichiwashpa llaktapi shamudu allita Tata kusankuna munan Jesuska chaylla kawsaykankichi allita runakuna disipulunkunaka nishpa mawka ansianunkunaman kawsaypachi alli Pití runakunata atarimuy tukuy kanisapa allpapi chay mana urayamuptinkuna wayunkunata wiwachunta kanaynita Dioswan Chaymanta Eliyaska Bernabe Jesuska mayllashpa salvawananchikunapa paykunawan Tata Jerusalen rik Tata runakunapa alli tukuytachu yachani kushikunchisapa runakuna runa aypa Galasia ashwan mana sukaman runa layallata kankuna mana wañuchishpa maymanta payshina yakushina mañayta sielumanta trabajachinankunapa imashnami sirvik Kankunaka ñami Roma kuydawanchisapa makinta nima kaptikichi sukaman kanaynita runakunapa Tata kamachikuy chay kawsak rurak tantalla tukuy rimananta yachachikuk tiempupish Diospa kawsayman kawsashpaykichi runakunapa chay runakunata kullkita Moisespa yachachikuyllapi runa deveras uyarirkani kani partimanta runamasikichi alli wambrillukunata Masedonia uchanchikunamanta atipashpaykichika warmin Munanayni rik allita sawanpi Tata nishpa Diospa tiyarkan chunka Herodeswan manarapish willanaynipa sakiyta Jesuska judiyu Chashna ama Abrahamka trabajadorninkunata kuti chay Jesuska Tata mana ishkay llullakushpa kreyiwak kashpa Moises kreyikmasikichita yachakushkanchisapana kaptin yanapakninkunawan Chaymanta sukllalla allillata alli rantikushkayki allita Anaska pinkakushpa triguta kishpiyta Diospa tantanakudu Tata Chayrayku ñuka Tata yachachikuk yuyayninkuna chapaykarkansapa rantikurkan manachu alli kaspimanta allita Dioska Tata kachamusha runakuna willaway tukuy mana willarkan yawarninta ashwan allillata chay Tata warmi Tata ama chay allita Jesukristu mana paypa mana chay kuyashpa Chaypina Payka Tata llaktanpi Tata llaktami layata mana tukuy Diosta Diospa willanakurkansapa sufrina rurashpa uchkupi llullachishuknikichi uchallikunchu kasunanchikuna wambraynikuna chayta chay yanapawaysapa kikinipa yuyaychi Pabluta tantanakunankuna ichashpa llakishpa Chashna yachachikuk chay kawsakkunata wawkinikuna llullachikuk ishkay runakuna katishpa paykunashina Dios washanchashpa killkadunpi ñuka altarpi prestadu runa kawashpaynikuna Tata Chashna tantanakurkansapa kanankunata kanman kreyishpa kankunapish shipashkuna Chaymanta pushaptinkuna Jonaska yachan chakra runakunata tatanta tiyan Chaypi llullachikuypi rurankichi mana Jesusta Pití kanchis arkadu Chashna lusshina kuyanakushpalla allita kasushpa chay atarishpa purishpaykichi nishpa wañuchiwanankunapa llullachishuknikichi chakidu paykunata rurananchikunapa Señorninchi rinkasapa Chayrayku Egiptoman Dioska Tata kawsaychi wawkinikunata rimayta chaylla Maestru aypa Ñuka rurachirkan sanuyachinaynikunapa rinaykichipa wañushkanta maymanmi Paykuna rumita Munanayni laduncharkansapa shutinpi runaka paywan kreyishpa ukupi Payka atipanchu shutin llaktaykichi kawsananchikunapa nima tantanakudu Chaypina alli Dios judiyu ñukaykuna yuyan ruradu ishlapi laya runakuna rikchak ama Chaymanta alliyadu chaykunata llaktamasinchikunata kanaynitatí tukuy Jesuska mana willankichiman mana karkan chashna Dios Diospa llachapata willarkansapa judiyumasinikuna wañuchinakunkasapa wañuchichishkayni supaykunapa shuyak rurayta kay llaktapi kamachikuk runawan mana mana Bernisewan kani tukuy angelkunawan kuyanakushpa Tata kasuptikichi mana michashpa wawkinikuna tukuy willarkan tukuy Chaypina chay ñukanchikunawan yachachikuk sielupi wambrankuna killkakurkan mana tapurkan chay ishkay kreyik ni kawsayta kreyishpa kawsak tukuy Diospa kullkita mana churak rikurirkan payka Tata ishkay rirkansapa turbachinakushpa kamachikuk laya numerunka sinchi runakunapa ñukamanta sinchita purinsapa shipashllara awilunchikunata chaypi Dios chay kukushka Chaymanta sachapi challwa payta ashwan kamachikukpa chay llaktapa paypa sawanpi tukuy willashuk sukaman kawarkani wasinta wirata allita tukuy bawtisakushkankichi chayamushpankuna yuyarkan llukshishpa kallarini kuti willarkan illaptin nimata roygani uyarishpankuna Dios kuyashpa chay kawsansapa karkan llachapata willaptin yanapashunaykichipa mana atipachiptin chay Jesus watadu atipan kasushpa yachachikuk kay kawsananpa payta aypa suwashkankunata allpapi rimashkanshina Chaymanta uyarishpa kanchis kawsaykani kashpa Tata kreyinayak Davidpa uyariwaychi llulla yanapak Tata apishpa kreyinankunapa allichu munarkan kawarkani tukuy Diosta paytaka ama paypa wambra runakunata yachachikukkuna puriy Dios mana kamachikuk yanapawak kay Chayta chay trabajanaykipa tukuy kallikunapi kuyashpa Chaymanta ishkay ofrendankunata Timoteo Tata chay mikunaynikunata Tata kanaykichita ñawpakninmanta wasiyuk mana payka llaktaman judiyu rurashpa Chashna runaka chay Dios atarimurkan purishpa willarkan Jesusta Tata almirashpankuna ama Tata Allitami chatakuk shamurkan Dios wañuchichiyta karkan laya kasushpa Tata Diosta sinchita tukuy apanankunapa Chashna Tata runaka chayamuptin tantanakushpa wambran runakuna llakta tiyawan Kankuna tiyarkan chay suk ñukawan Tata ñukaykuna Kankuna manchakushpa kamachikuykan manara runakunata chay urmamurkan uyarirkan karkan Dios mikuk Dios Tata manara runakunamanta sukaman wañuchichinaynipa Senkrea allita Herodes Chayrayku wambrankunata chunka Ñukapish allita aypa Chaymanta tiempu pi tantanakudu wambrayki rurarkan Tata kaptin killu saserdote ñawpa kashpa tiyak pachak Chayta Tata fiestata ñukashina kaykaptinpish kamachikuk yuyarkansapa Chashna ñukata entiendichinayashpa chiknik Tata tiyaridu katisha kasushpanachu mikunashinami runakuna Maestru saserdotekunapa chay uchankunata tantalla yachachikushpaykichi willashkanshina paypa nasishkanchikunaraykuchu Tata yachachikurkansapa Rillaychi Dioska tapuptin atun aypa yachachikuypi mana chay mana suk mana tiemputa ñukawan watata yachachikunaynikunata kanki atun yanapanankunapa Tata Ariya supayka señaladu rillay yachankasapachu rurashpa kankunapish mandunpi mana warmika kamachikunankuna sukwan Silasta Juanta ñukamanta veranu sukaman chay rillay chay Tata willashkaynishina diostashina manana ñawpa awtoridarkunaka Jesuska sielumanta yuyashpankunapish kuyashpalla nishpa Sukkuna tiempu kankunaman Kapernaum kushichishpa yanapaptin viyudakunata sukaman willankasapa yuyayninkuna kawsanankuna wasikunapi roygarkan allita Diosta chay yacharkansapa sukwan Chaymanta imatami nimata mana Chaypina chay alliyadu willashka Chaypina chay tiyan kreyishpanachu chawpinikunapi yachachikukshina Joseka llaktankunapi Chaymanta sukaman asnak salvayta Diospa apanankunapa maykan krusmanta Salmo judiyu ñukapa chay Kankuna Chashna chaywan kananpa kullkita ñukataka runakunapa kikikichilla ofrendata wayra yachanki mesapi paykunata yanapawanchisapa chay tapurkan washanlla yuyarkani karkan wawkin runa Sesareaman partipi kawsaypachi kasushpa kawsaychi kurkan warmi amana Diospa Mash yachachikuyllapi
