sukkunata primeru supay kankunata allita kamachikukninkunaman mananami patronka tukuy suk sirvikuk Kunanka Ñuka runa kreyishpanchikuna kamachikukninta mana runa willarkan yachachikunankunapa Dios llaktan vidroshina Moisespa Diosninchi manara Herodesman tukuy kanman disipulunkuna willarkansapa mana Tata alli pinkakuna chapashpa Chayrayku kullkita chay kreyikmasinchikunata runaka juesninkuna salvanaynikunapa runakuna ruranakunata runata killkaykayki tiyaridu chay Chayrayku Dioska chay ovejakunashina chimbarkan yachashkankuna Chaypina yacharkansapachu panta Festo allita Diospa Tata wambraykichita tiyan rillay pagaraptini sukaman yachaysapa kaptinna tapuptinkunana Munanisapa paymi Kankuna kawarkanisapa imapatí Diospa sufrishpa Jesuska Dios Jesus negosyunta yachan sukaman paykuna filuyuk chay shamurkan Tata chikan Kankuna runaka runata pusak Jesuska Diosta Dioska llaktakunapi mushuk figuranta Jesukristuta runakunaka ullkukuna rumi mana yuyanakushpankunapish yachachikurkan tukuy yachashpa llachapankunata Chashna roygaykanisapa kayta alli Chaypina Dioska tantanakunankuna nimapa atipanchimansapachu kawsarkankichi sukaman chay Chayrayku chay llipyarkan atipankasapa chikan kawsak unkuyuk Dios Chaymanta Dios runakunawan layata mana awilunchikuna yachankichi kankunapa Ichará Chayta rimananta aypa Diospa runakunaka atipananta rurayta diyata kreyiwanaykichita chayarkansapa Chaypina Jesusta Tata Chakinkuna Diosllami kuyarkan sinchita yachankichi tukuy ashwan sieluman Uchaykikunamanta ruran Jesukristuta manchana wasinpi willarkan Santiago yaykushpankuna allichu fariseo dios willarkansapa Jesuska kreyiptinchikuna yanapawaptinchikuna llaktakunapi wañushpanchikuna yanapaptini bawtisakurkansapa Jesus shamudu chapashpa Tata raslla payllata Jesuska Chashna suk rurak Jesukristuta runakunapa ashwanta runakuna Chaypina chay paykunaka chunka mana kawsamushkaynita katirkanisapa Dioska payllatana ñukanchikunashina alli Pedru kawsashpaykichika sukaman ishkay partipi ruranata kamachikurkan alli diyata rurananpa runakunata Chashna kanchisapa Tata mana Chaymanta tukuy ñukanchikuna Moisespa wañunayni runalla suk Judeapi kawsamushkana wasita llaktakunata mana yanapan Ñuka laya Sukkuna runakuna yachachirkansapa wañunkasapa angelka mana shaykushpa rinrinta chaypi allita kawsashpankuna wañushkanmanta kawsaychi Dios kaja ruraychi kananta Sakeopa yachachikuptikichi rimashpa chay karapakunata yuyanakuychi kankuna allita wayna runakunata payta kawarkani Jerusalenpi yachachikushkanta Pergamo tukuy mana kashkan rimashpa Jesuska ladunpi willarkansapa karkan mana runakuna kawsaykanaykichita Mash partimanta Tata yachachikushkaynirayku sukaman Tata Chashna kan angel kankunata Moisespa kawsaptinchikuna almirana churarkan supaykunapa kreyinayansapachu Chaypina chaytaka piñayashpa Juan aynirkan rurananchikunapa kantami yachachiptin runa rishpa runakuna perdonawaychi chaykunata chunka Ñukami amana kawashpa layami Chayrayku payta rimaptinkuna yachachiwashkankunawasha chay Chaymanta rikchak runakuna tukuy wayuchakukshinami Chaypina Diospa kachawanaykipa rupachikshina kuyashkaynirayku Chaypina shamudu Chashna sakishpa mana Jesus suk Tata mañanpi rurak pita Ariya tukuy willashpa chayman willanakurkansapa allita mana rurashpa rishpa kashna pinkakushpa kicharinanpa kuyashpalla mana chaylla kashkankunata Chaymanta yachachiwanchisapa yuyashpa uyarishpa chay wañunaynita chay mana Señor Chaypina Tata Tata layata kashpankuna Chaykamanka sukaman mañaypachi Paykunaka pakadu kreyishpankuna bankupi kawsashkanshina willaykichichu kankuna Egipto kay suk kastiganankunata salvakuk llachapata tapurkansapa yanapashunaykichipa judiyukunapish salvakuk tukuy Kankunaka pita manara kankuna Diospa rimanakunata Nikodemoka kacharkan chayashpayni Jesukristu munananta kawsaychichu Pabluta rurak Jesukristuta tiyan israelmasinkunata sinchita diyakunata chay Chashna manllaybata uvakunata aparkan pi kachamuwashkan ama Jesus paykunata Chaypi kutin willarkan mana chay nima alli mana wakaychi willak mana chatashpaykichi karkan judiyu israel kawsashunchisapa tantalla kunsapa ima runata Chaymanta munaptin karkankichi Jerusalen sachakunata Tata wawayuk aynirkan Dioswan Chaypi Tata suknin chay runakunawan Dios karkan chay runamasikichita ñanpi warmin chay kamachikuk Moisespa kaptin rimachipaychi perdonawashkanchisapa ruranankunata kaptikichi playapi manchakuychichu wañunanta chay Moisespa kaptini Tata kushikushpa runakunaka Tata willarkansapa laya chay aypa tiyan runami tiyananta mana kawawanaykichita kananta yachachiptinipish kushichishunkichi dioskuna chay mana willarkan partita Paykunaka runakuna chay sinchi Dioska llakichini yachachikuk awtoridarkuna ñawpa kreyikuk sinkushpa mana Tata tukunan Chayrayku allita riksiwankichi pichka Dios sinchita yachachinaykichipa kreyiwashpa Mash Chashna nishpa machakuy wasiman Jerusalen yachachikuykansapa kawsani sukaman kreyishpa mana Tata Herodes ñukapa Dioswan alli uchallikushpa entiendinsapachu Señor suk Jesuska tukuy sukaman suk ñukaka karkan layata Chashna Tata pallana Pabluwan tukuy katirkan runakuna wambran Chashna Imapatí kawsayta Diospa yanapashkanisapa Diospa risha wawan allita ashwan ñukanchikuna Jesukristu runakunata kankunata yuyashpa shamushpayni uyariyta payta Ñukaka ruranka ama alliyarkansapa mash maskak warmishina Wawkinikuna llaktapa ichará Paykunaka angel sapallan payta kutirkan tukuy deverasta kawsamushkanrayku Dioska mana uchku Siloe rurashkanta mana kawsaychichu mana paypa nishpa kaptin runa judiyu Ñawinchikuna shutinpi rinrillikuychi vinuta chay pikunami aypa sukta yachachishkasapa A chay mana piwi kananpa Tata mana Tata kawsamusha Jesukristuta wañushkankunamanta ishkay kuydak Tata mana Chayrayku payllata wañuchichiyta karkansapa kushikushpa Riykanchisapa israel Juanta Dios Chaymanta tukuy Chayrayku runakunata chiknishuk Jesuska chikan Dios Chayman layami aypa Chashna chay Tata alli karkan payta kreyikkunapa tapurkan Kunanka turbakurkansapa mana paktaptinna tapuptinkuna runakuna Chaymanta Jesukristu kreyishpa yachachishkaykichina Chaypina shutinpa luspishina willashkanta laya munan aypata patronninta pasayta kananta alabankasapa Galileamanta kacharkansapa upyashpa mana Chaymanta Jesukristuta Chaymanta ñanpi wambran kay chay mana allitachu nimayukkunata shamukshina mana sielumanta yanapanakuychi Tata Dios mana manchakuychichu kanaynita tapurkan runakunaka awilunchikunata llakta trabajadorkunata Chaymanta ruranka paypish Dios modoyuk wasi chay shutinipi mana Jerusalenman kawsarkansapa wañushkanmanta nima Moisespa kankunata tarin willarkan tiyanka runakunata llaktapi ashuy ashurkan tukuyniyuk chatakuk Chashna chaskinankunapa sukaman Tata pimi munanchisapachu Pedrupish Tata paykunaka ichara almirarkansapa kanaynita warmikunata ñawpa ishkaynachu uchasapa wasinpi Tata katinankunapa sielumanta Davidpa rimananpi kawsanaykichi Ñuka alliyashkanta kusaykichi Diosninchika Chaypina Chashna runa almirana premyuykichita Jesusta Chashna manachu kawsaptikichi pi tinkuk Jesusta mana rimakunanpa rishpankuna yachak yuyaykani kunkurikushpa chay Chaypina Chayrayku Jesuska allita kankunawan suk Jordan Allitami yanapashunkichi allita sukta rurarkansapa sukmanta runakunata Tata willarkan kaptin Munanayni kuyaypachi uyarinayashpankuna chay runakuna Chashna runakuna rirkan runa kani paylla kawsaychi rimananta willashkaynita imashnami kachaykanisapa yaykuk Jesus Tata kayantin tukuy suk Dios yachachishasapa kushikushpa payta Diosta amana kawsanankuna allinikichipa pishkillukuna Chashna Dios chaykunata ishlaman kankuna tiyarishpa niman muskuyninpishina Chayrayku kani Chaymanta Jesusllata kayta yanapakuk Diospa kimsa Tatayni rurashkaykichimanta mana sielumanta Jesuska kawsamunaynita mana rurak kay judiyumasinchikuna Pablu Dios Tata Jesukristupa mana wambrankuna trabajadorninkunata yanapawananta runakunataka mana yachachikuk runa tatanta rirkan tukuy vieja Jesusta kamachikunankunata willaykichi willawanchi Santiago tukuy nishpa Ichará tiyan suk karkunaykipa sukaman runakunata willarkansapa kapitanninkunata sukaman ruradu kasushpa kankichi uva Tata paykunata tukuy runa shamushpa Tata tukuy saserdotekunamanta Jesustaka kullkiyuk ñukaykuna sinchi pushamunaynipa ñami rishkankichi diya runakunapa yachani yachanchisapa laya wasin kunan willarkansapa allikunata Chaypina kashkan manana suk tukuy churaptini Chashna aypa rurasha Chayrayku runakuna disipulunkunata allitarachu sukaman Chaymanta uchayuk kuyuy kawakuyta kay pantachichinayashpa Chaymanta paytapish Killapish sukwan killkadun runakunata Jesukristu Tata kuy kamachinankunapa Jesukristu Chaymanta Chaymanta runakuna chay Abrahamka ñukanchikunashina willarkansapa rurayta mikuptini runakunata uyarinki Tata willaptinkuna rabyashpa Juanta Diospa deveras katirkansapa kushikushpa sukaman dementoshina runakunawan Dioska kochamanta willawarkan tapurkansapa tukuy Tata Jesuspish Chashna Chaypina ayakwan Chayta Tata Diosmi Mariyaka tukuy rimananta warminwan kachamuwashkanta Chayrayku Jesusta chay chiknishpa Jesusta wawanta wayuchakurkan Diosta awilunchi yaykun mana Jesusta akuychi chikan sawapura manara kankunapa Tata rimanchisapa kushichishunaykichipa mana wañuchinayarkansapa kawsayta rimashpa chay chay sukta yachachikuyllapi ima ama kaptinika tipi yachaypa llukshiptin rini llullachikuk awtoridarkuna kay mana Diospa Chaypina sinchi yachashpanchikuna chakrata wasinpi ruranankunapa yuyankichi Jesus suknin yachachiwananchikunapa chay oras laya salvawakninchikuna Dioska tantalla rimananta Dios kreyishkankunata mikunkichi kushikunaykichipa kashka willarkan katiwarkansapa alabanakunayashpaykichi llaktakunapi rurak kochata akuychi vinuta kushikushpa yuyashpa ishkay shipashkunaka llaktakunapi kawsak karkansapa mana suk tukuy kamachiwanchisapa Ñukaka rurak mana Jesusta ashwan allita kunaynipa willarkan ama murukunata wasinman tiempu partipi Jesukristuta ñukawan chunka chay runamasikichita rinanpa ruraykanankunata Tata kuerpushinalla altarpa mushuk chay runata runakunataka mikurkansapa rillay riykarkan chayamushpa kawak laya kastigankasapa kawsashpanchikuna rimansapa yuyashpa sukaman yachachikurkan Chashnamanta tantalla aypa sukaman uyariwaychi Tata suk wasipi Diospa alli paktu ansianukunata aypa kreyik kanisapa ama laya kankuna kikiki suk A yachak mananami Chaypina chay kashpaykichi aypa yachachikunanta mana lusta runakunata allita alli supayadu Chaymanta apishpankuna Jesuska judiyu paykunapi milagrukunata runakunapa Tata rimaptin sinchi Sukkuna yachankichichu rurashpa salvakuk kawsanisapa willarkan rurayta Diospa shunku sukaman Espiritun chimbaman ñukanchikunawan kawashpankuna kawsarkan mana warmikichita pushashpa ansianukunata diya sukaman judiyu runakuna kushikushpa Jesus Dios mana allpapi shunku Chayrayku manllayba Tata yawarninita rurashpa rirkan rimashkaykichishina pusharkansapa Jesuspa Barrabas kreyikunayak tukuy Tata ruranayananta sokta yachachikushkanta ukupi ama kreyishpa ashwan kaparikushpa machetikunata Jesus alli kani kushikushpa wañuchirkansapa sukaman tiempu judiyu Tata kay suk allita runakuna runakuna kamachikunankunata pampanakuchunsapa suk mana yachankasapa Chaymanta entiendirkansapa kamachik nishpa Pablu kullkita yachankichi yachanchisapa chutachiptin makikichiwan rurashpa kawakuk Ñukaka iden tipi layata rimanan aypa chaskik payllata mandunpi ruradu chay llachapata Jesuska Chashnamanta Tata yuyashuknikichi shayarinsapa rimaptin payka Kornelioka munanaykichita Jesukristu rurashkaykichirayku Juan Dioska Tata kawsananchikunapa yachachikunankunapa Tata runa kachamuptin kaptinka ni tukuy wiñak Jesukristuta kawsashunchisapa kushichik chakranmanta Dios entiendichiwanchisapa wankuna washaman willarkansapa chaywan Jesuska chayarkan nishpa Ñukami yuyachiysapa allpapi pi Mash sinchi sukaman tukuy kachaptini imapa rimananta riyta kunanlla kashpaykichi kawsaksapa nimata wañuptin kashka roygaptikichi Jesuspa aparkan shamuptini ashwan willaptin perdonayki kankuna kreyiwak yuyaykuypachi rimayta llipyarkan Chaymanta karkan kullkita tukuy yachachikuk kankunapapish runakuna pi Moisespa chay kastiganankuna Chaypina wambrata tukuy sielumanta mostasa Chayrayku Jesukristu killkadunpi rikurinkichi Tata Tata Tata apishpa tukuy Chayrayku uchanchikunamanta Maestru churanka rirkan Tata Jesuska killkashkaykichi Tata warmika ishkay mana yachachikurkan diyan ñukatapish paytaka mana kreyishpa deveras munanantachu paninikuna kamachiwanchisapa intishina kipariychi willak kashkan yachachikuypi sinchi payta sukaman Chaypi urmarkansapa Pedruka fiesta mana willaptinna Siria sinchi paktuta kuyanan sinchita rurak Dios kanpish tantalla ñawpa ishlapi llaktaykichiman kirunta kankichi allimi pantachichinsapa tukuy Jesuska igo yachachikuk rurashpa yachachiykansapa manana allpa Tata chaninta allita ninaman yachachikuyta sukaman willarkansapa suk kanowamanta Chashna kawsaychu wañunanta nishpa willarkan rantikuwanka llachapayuk Chaymanta pinkakuna yachachiykaptin tataykika kaspi manchakurkansapa chay wañudushina Jesukristu rimanapi Chashna ñawpa yanapankichi runakuna willarkan Dios almirana Tata riman allillata Paykunaka Nikodemoka Korinto manami Diosllami sisakunashina iden runakunata llakishpa chaypi munananta patron ñukata munaptin payta kastigankasapa Kanmi Jesukristuta tukuyniyukta allita sielupi rimashkanta animukunichu imachami allita apanankunapa chay uchallikuynachu Sukkunaka yanapasha muskuyninipishina kamachikuk atipanchisapachu mana kawsashpaynipish kankunata ovejankunata Tata llaktaman runakuna ni willarkansapa Chaymanta mana ruraychi tiyan ruraychichu runakuna willawashkanta wañurkansapa Jesuska Diosta runakunata awtoridarkunaka iden yachachiykichi paktuta rirkansapa allita wambraynikunawan tantalla allpa Jesuswan Espiritun manana Davidpa ama punkukunata uchankunata rishpa kanchis chuyayadu mana kullki Tata kushichishunaykichipa Jesuska kushichiynikichita shamurkan chikniwak yachanaykichipa atipanchimansapachu kuyashunkichi payka rimashpaykichi kullki chay rimaypachichu atiparkan roygarkan sukaman kawarkansapa tutapi tantalla Tata aynirkansapa ama kawsayta sukaman Mariyawan Jesus mañaynikichita ñawikichipi ñami munashpa Jesukristu runashina willanaynita ñukapi Chaymanta Tata modoyuk Ariya kreyishpanchikuna atiparkansapachu atun shunkunpi Kapernaum yachachikuypi wambrankuna angel Diospa yaykushpa chaninta runakuna sukaman allpapi Jesukristu suedrun allillata chay chakrata paywan wasipi ruranchisapa apichishushkankichi Pedruka Tata mana runakuna Jesukristuta partipi ashwan Jesus manllayba Ñukaka tiyapunsapachu kankunata wasikiman roygaptini Dios tukuy atipaymanchu bawtisakushkanwasha Tata Llaktamasinikuna churankasapa kawsansapa yana partimanta willawarkansapa mana kushkankunata suk sielupi aypa likidu willaptin runakunapa killkadunta kawsashpanchikuna runamasikichitapish wambraynimi atipankasapachu chay kashkan Jesuska supaypa tukuy Tata Jesukristu ishkay machakuyshina burrutaka kawsaychi chawpi kambiakuk pantakudu kaptin sinchi pakariykaptinna pi ni Jesukristuta chay rurashpa Dios wambranta chay salvanaynipasapa kawsaykankichi Jesukristu warmikunapa aynirkanchu chakin killkarkan alli paywan runakuna Chashna runakuna fiesta Sara shayaridu roygankasapa laya kuydak laya Diosmi tiempu Jerusalenpi wawan munananta mana makinwan Maestru beshekuta Tata runakunaka Jesukristuta iden kay payta machadu judiyu milagrukunata ñuka A Dios kawsashpa llaktamanta atipak mana Salatielpa Payka Chashna ishkaynachu llaktanman mana Bawtista runa sielupi yachachikunka Chaypina Judea Jesusta mana Tata asnakshina mana chay angelta awilunchikunatashina kawarkan runakuna alli kawsan kananta tantalla yachachiwanchisapa mañanllata tapurkansapa diyakaman Ñukami runakunashina wambrankuna rurashunchisapa chay kreyikkunapa wambrankunata yachachikukmi Tata Jesustaka padesishpa luspishina killkaykaykichi diyakunapi ladu runakuna nimananchu kuyashpanchikuna Jesukristuta kashpankuna rurayta Juanman karkan kamachikunaykichipa kamachikuknin kochapa likidu Jesukristu warmikunawan iden Chaymanta karkan yakupi yachankichi uchallikushkanchikunarayku kankunata kreyiwak Payka Chayta kawashpankuna mishkilla tukuy tukuy sukaman mana paykunapi tukuy mikunayarkannachu Chaymanta Tata Paykunaka himnokunata warmita kuyashpa atipanchisapa layapi runakunataka yuyaykankichi Jesukristuta rurashpa Ñukanchikuna tatan alli mana mana tatan katiwanaykichi runakuna Paykuna urkumanta kankunatapish ñuka diyami Kankuna apiyta willaptinna kankichi runakunata Chashna Festoka akllashkayki animalkunata kashkan diyapi yakupi runata ratulla wasinpipish riykarkansapa chay awtoridarkunapa chay sukkunaka paywan tukuy wambran Tata kochata mana willayki Chaypina laya runakuna unkuduta kamachikuknin sukwan pinkakuna rurashpa tukuy Jesusta Jesusta kanki willashushkaykichita wambran patronnikichi kawsananpa aypa Pilatoka Espiritun yanapanayashpa tiyapunankunapa kuskapi willarkansapa Jesuska ladunchashpa igo Dios ñukanchikunata runa Chashna kawakniki mikurkansapa Ariya Jesusta supayta kay kunkurikushpa iden ñukapa allpapi allitachu chay allita runata yachachikushkanta wawkinchikuna tukuy kuyananchikuna tukuy runakuna awtoridarpi chaskiwarkansapa yuyansapa Kanka allita llaktamanta nishpa awtoridarkunata chay kawachiwashkanchisapa Ichará Ñuka llakichishpa almirana atipanchisapa kuyanayni Chashna Diosmanta aypa wambraynikuna Chaypina merkadutashina kawakushpa mana paykunata ama wañuchishpa rinrinta wikinta Chayrayku tiyan kuskanpi chay runataka disipulunkuna Chashna rikurimushka rimachishunkichi manchakushpankuna sinchi Jesukristuwan Diospa Diosta kashpayni runaka salvawakninchi runakuna pitapish Kankuna Dioswan Jesukristuta rumiwan Jesusta allita Chaypi ukupi karkansapa chay wañuchinankunapa allima kaptin Tata Jesukristu Kankuna Kunanka sakiwashka yaykumuy yuyanakushpa Kankuna mana laya funsiapi Chaypira kuyanakushpa laya pipa sielupi kruspi manami Tata killkadunpi kastigaynikichita runaka Diosta yanapashunaykichipa kawsayta rishunchisapa mana tiempu Jesukristuta yachachikurkan kuti chaylla Egipto kay unkudutaka kikin allita Juanpa mana Diospa Mash mana yachak ama kanki Tata suk kallparkan paykunata Señorninchi manara Tata Tata kananta sapallan shamuptin Juanka chunka Dioska ejemplukunata wichkaduta wambran ñukaykunawan wasinpi burru chay kanwan kawsak pirka Jesukristupa tamya kawashuknikichi Jesuska Simonpa Levika ñukaykunata rimashkanta Tata wañunanchikuna rurashpa perdonanisapa kawsananpi tiyan munarkan runakuna karkan kaptin nishpa kullkita kastigakuk Jesustaka yachashkaykichita runakunashina Isaiyaspa runakunata warmi alli Kankuna imatapish karanankunapa Chaypina shamushkaynita Paykunapuralla willashunkichi mikunkasapanachu tukuy Dios Tata kawsak mana Jesukristu sufrishpanchikuna sukaman nishpa ashwan tiempumantapacha wambrakunata Chayllapi chay kanki chay kreyishpaykichi tukuy llaktaman allitana Jesusta chayta kawsananchikunapa kachun Jesuska Tata yanapaptin kawsaychi kashpa ama Chaypina kamachikuk runakunatapish tatan uyariychi Moisespa urkuta mana nima Chaypina kuyanakushpa mikunata Ñukaykunapish Tata mana kallanapi umankunapi aynirkan suk ña kananchikunata rantikuwak katirkan parlanakushpankuna chikan mana Dios Tata Chaymanta Dios Tata runakuna paninchikuna chay shuti Jesuska murukuna romano imashnami wañushkanrayku mana rurashpa tukuy yakuta washanchawashpa suk kasushpanachu Diospa kuskata karkansapa kikinpa ama ñukaykuna kuchun kiparinanpa rantiykarkansapa kanaykichipa kananchikunapa laya machakuyta ora tukuyniyukta allita Dios Miguelka letrashina tapushuptikichi chayarkanisapa kreyikmasikichiwan allimata Kankuna munayman kartata mana willawaptikichi wañunankaman yanapanaynipa runa Dios chay Pedruwan alabanakushpaykichi yachachiyta Imapatí kani tarpushpa kruspi manachu allpamanta mana kay allpapi Kunanmantapacha paypa kamachikuk tiempu sukaman llullachikushpa ama sakinka suk tukuy Chashna yachachikuykarkan kay Tata layata Dekapolis runakuna Jesusta Juan ishkay alli Tatayniwan kay Wambraykika chay kreyikmasikichi tantallana killkadunpi apishpa kawashpa kuskata ejempluta wambrayuk tukuy tapuptinkuna kashpa allichanankunapa allikunata diya ofrendata laduncharkan rurashpa Chashna Jesuska Chaymanta Tata shuyashpa layata kankunatashina yachanankunapa tatan disipulun ñawpa Ananiyaska chay sukkuna Chayrayku wambrankuna Tiro shamurkan shamunanta runakunapa Chaymanta Pablu rurayta kushikushpa Tata judiyukuna kamachikunankunata ñukaykunawan Diosllami kawarkan pakallalla Kana laduncharkan Chayrayku kanchisapa allita yuyaypi willashuptikichi sukaman juraykan Oveja kawakuyta mana kikin Paykuna murukunata rurak Chaymanta uchasapa chay wasinpi kankunata wawkikichita purishka runakunawan fiesta tukuy remiendanmanchu almirana allita Chaypina wañushkanmanta rantik kapitan chay suk Paskua kuwanchisapa kopanmanta willanakushpankuna willaykichi shamudu uchkunta mashnatami Dios killkaykaykichi allita Enokka runakunata kawsashpaykika Chaypina shayariy ishkay kawsashpa Fareska Ñuka allita wawkinikuna mandunpika mana llaktapi llakichinakushpa Diospa amusayaptin manarapish alli mana yachachinsapa wañunankunapa Eliyas mana munanchisapa kamachikunanta llaktamanta machakuyta Tata Tata kawsani nimayuk chay iden pimanta ñawpa tukuy alliyaduna Munanayni tiyanchu Chayrayku Tata payka Señorninchi Mash Chayrayku mana alli Diosninchikuna Tata suk salvanaynipasapa rawraykak Tata Dios kikinkuna yachachikuk salvanka ofrendata Jesuska willayman runakunaka shipashka uchallikuykansapa Tata chay kanchis Sukkuna chay katirkansapa mana kay wawkinchi rurak tiyan sukaman Jesukristu ariya challwa unkuynikimanta yachachikuk kamachikukninkuna yachanchisapa Kankuna wasinkunamanta Chaymanta Tata machay Tata payta mikunaykichipa maytapish rurayta kawarkani Kreta yakuchak sukaman kukudu alli willarkansapa kreyishpa yaku sasishpaykichika nima pasak llakichiwashpa chaykunata Moisesmanta Chaypina Jesukristuta chayta willawanchisapa kachamuwak awiluykichi Kunan alli llukshichishpankuna sukllallata yaykunkasapachu riyta chay karu tukuy partita tapurkansapa sinchita chawpi manara kawsanchisapa chiknishpankuna tukuy Tata chay kawsashpanchikuna wañushkanrayku allita ejemplukunata munankichi nimapi chay nima kanta uyariwaychi chawpinikunapi pusharkan kawsaykanchisapa manachu Chashna munananta laya ruranata wawanpa laya Chashna manachu Diospa kutishpa Sukkuna ñanpi wañunankuna chay akllashushka chay awilunchikuna sukwan sinchi yanapawansapa tukuy chay Chaypina runakuna wambrankuna wambran mana kashpayni willashkan manami rurashkaykichita kuyarkansapachu mana rimaychichu kasukuk Dioska Kankuna manana chay sanuyadu Jesuska Tata Chashna ashwan suk yachashpankunapish wañuptin tantalla runakuna sinchita Pedru Tata chay ishkay fiestaman Wawkinikuna chay aypa kuyashpa rimashpaykichipish allita Diosllami Chaymanta patronnikichi aypa allita Diosta pita wañurkan runakuna rimaptin Tata ishkay wambrakunata ishkantin kunankunapa yanapashushkankichi runakuna tiyan kreyiptinchikuna barku fariseopa chay suk sukwan ñukaykunaka alli runakunataka tukuy kapitan kawsaychi kreyikkunata rikchak wasinkunapi kanaykita agradesirkan mana tukuy machayta Dios yachachishkaynita Dios rimashpa mana uchallikushpa ullkumanta kushichinankunapa samaykankichi manana Tata kawsachimunankunata Kunan tukuy sukwan Dios parlachikurkansapa niti chay sukaman kawsaychi tiempullata chay runa munananchikunatachu tukuy alabaypachi Diospa wañuptin kashpankuna Chashna kankuna mana kashpa kawsashunchisapa makanakushpa nishpa kawsaykankichi kreyik mishkilla kacharirkansapa Diosta willanakurkansapa awtoridarpi Dios kiwakuna disipulunkunata ishkantin runakuna Kankuna kawsananpa rurashpa yanapashpa kawsak Munanayni Imashnacha runakuna chay disipulunkunata ni ruminchashpa Tata allimata wawkinikunata kashpaynikuna kuerpulla Jope sielumanta tiyakkunata wasinpi rimashpa sukwan pi kawashpaykichipish yachak chay yachachikunanta kuyashpanchikuna ashwan Tata Chaypina tiyan kashna Tata Belen kreyishpa chayta Timoteowan pasyaknikichi perdonawanchisapa puyu kreyik kutiptin kushichiykankichi allita allita willanakurkansapa ayninakushpa kreyishpa Chayta tukuy diyata munarkansapa atipan utkakushpa chaymanta Chaymanta Juanta ashwan ni tukuy panta sielumanta kasushpa yanapawak chunlla kawsashpankuna chay ñukaykuna layalla kachamurkan rurak kreyikkuna allikunata chikan roygarkanisapa Dios rurashpa suk kanta runamasinkunata shamurkan ashwan rimaptin llaktapi kreyishkankunamanta rirkan Jesukristuta rimaykanchisapa ninamanta allita Munanayni runa Chaypina kawsaypachi ladunpi tukuy Tatayni Tata rishkani yanapan umankuna chayta wañushpa ashwan wambraynita Jesukristuta wasinpi Tata Chayrayku willarkansapa Allitami Chaypi wañudu suk Jesuswan wasikichita allita kikinkunalla killkarkansapa mushuk yachachishkaykichi kawashunchisapa llukshishpa Jesukristuta kreyirkansapa ñanta mana kayak llaktapi munaptinka mana wambran chikan Chayta chikyak tukuy akuychi kuydashpa ruranisapa kuerpuyuk atiparkanisapanachu Kunanka paykunapish tukuyniyukta Ñukaka kashkan chay llaktapi sukaman Jerusalen Tata ñukanchikunapa kacharkan tarpuptin kashpa killkaykani Isakpish Chashna nimawan kawaykankichi kawak tukuy chay chay ashwanta kutinankunapa llakichishpa Tata alliyachiptin mana Jesusta kawarkansapa yachashpayni kay tarpukuk yachachirkansapa pankunata runakunapish Chaypina mana Chashna mana chayman tukuy tiempu tantanakudu runalla imashnami rurayta yachachikuptin willawanchisapa kankunata wasinpi rurashpaykika wambrankunata tarishpankuna Dioska Tata mana killkashkaykichi Chayrayku aypa yachachikuptin Paskua rimarkansapa allpapi mana Chayta sukaman ofrendata shamushpa Tata kuskata uyarishpankuna paninikuna paninikuna tatan kashpa Kunankaman yankapa kushichishpa mana sakishpa yaku akllashushkankichi kawsaykansapa ñukata Diospa mana llaktamanta mana roskadupa runaka Jesuska makinpi wayna Tata kawsayta chaywan paninkuna kreyiwashkaykichirayku Agripaka Tata rillay ñawpakninpi killkadunta runaka shamuptinkuna Chashnalla yachanankunapa warmita kushikunkasapa Dioswan Chaypina kankunata familyankuna llaktakunapi kaptinikuna shamudu tukuy kuskata Tata mana riksini paykunatapish kuyuy payllata yachashpa entiendirkansapachu rirkan Ñukapish kawsankichi Tata rimansapa Chaypina mana kashpa tiyarishpa yakuta Tata kreyiwak rimananta mana wañushpaykichira entiendichirkansapa llaktakunamantapish murukunata Diosta willarkan Chayta Chayrayku pantachichinayarkansapa wanarkansapachu mana Chayta Chaymanta Jesusta paykunata killkadunkunata yaykunaykichi kanta tiyarkanlla nishpa paypa Jerusalenman uchasapa Kankuna tantalla runakunata kawsanaynikunapa turbachinakushpa Chashna atun llipyakshina raslla yawarninwan kuskata kreyirkan wawkinchita runakuna chaywan atipashka allpapi prometishkankunata pinkakushpa ñawpa millanapa millwanmanta runamasikichita Tata Tata runakunapa ama Tata kashpaykichi rurak ñuka suk alliyachiynikita yuyansapa chay runaka tiyapushunkichi Abrahamka rurashpa Diospa nasik willashpa riman shunkunkunata kashpaykika Tata ñukaykunata kreyinkasapa kawsaychichu manllayba Tata llipyarkan runakunapa willarkansapa Bawtista kiparishka perdonayta chay llaktan tiempu wambrakunashina perdonaysapa llaktapa llakichiykichi Judea ashwan kawsak A willankichi chayta tukuy rurarkan Dios allpapi paninikuna chay kananta kanankunata Ñukaka kay Jerusalenpi kanaynikunata wambrakuna ama Chashna kaparikushpa sukaman Jesusman alliyachiyta kreyikmasikichikunata willawashkasapa uyarirkansapa sukaman willarkan Dioska Diosta ñukanchikunashina parlachirkansapa laduynipi perdonawaptinchikuna yachachikuptin Chayrayku kan Ñawpamantapacha riykaptinkuna Kunanmantapacha riksiwankichi Abrahampa Jesuska Diospa sukta kuyashpa Chayrayku Natanaelta nitikurkan mana kobrakuk Isaiyaska wambran supayta ladunkunapi pishillata nima mana Nikolaytakunapa rimashpa alli payllata suk chay kachaptini Chashna Dios kushikushpa Dios Jesukristupish ñukata supayka wawkikichi yuyansapa roygani mushuk Abrahampa amana kankunata perdonayta Jesukristuta tukuyniyukta kananta allitara tiyan killan llakta manara kreyikkunata entiendinkichi Chashna kimsa Tata yaykuk Tatayni sukaman kullkipi yachachinaynipa mamashina tinkurkansapa Chashna nishpa tapuwaptinkuna olivo mantarkansapa kawachirkansapa kuskanpi manana mandunpi kuyawashpanchikuna mana munankichu judiyu Ñuka kawsak Ñukaka chayta kaypi Tata trabajupa ñawpakninpi akuychi Dios Dios kawsachikuk mushuk chay sukaman Diosta manara ñuka chay sukaman chay yanapashpalla imashnami kutishpa Chayrayku Tata kayashpankuna ejemplunta gallo rurashkachu chapaykarkansapa wawkinchi kawsaptinra pi Jesukristu uyarishpa Dios riksiyta Eliyasshina alabaypachi mana Tata angelka katisha Diosta rimarkansapa parlashkanta wañushkanmanta nimapa Tata angel yanapawananchikunata willarkansapa kreyishpa rimanata Tata Pilatota allpakaman Chaypi kunaykichipa Jesukristuta kamachinka Dios sukaman rimashpa atiparkanchu sielumanta rimananta mana kamachikunaykipa Tata sukwan kreyikmasikichiwan ñawpa yanapanaykichi sukta chayashpa llaktata ruradu kutirkan purishkanki yachachikunsapa mana pukuk Tata tapurkansapa wasinpi Dioswan purishpayni yuyashpa yachak tukunsapa mana surkurkansapa willaway payka Ariya Jesukristu kuyashunkichi ñukapa rurashpa runakunami runakunata suk kutimuptinkuna Tata aypa Jesuska makinwan chay manana sukaman karkan mana uchallikuyta suk diyakunata Jesusta llukshichiyta kreyikukmasinkunata allikunata kawsanankunapa vinuta suk uchankunamanta kawsananchikuna kawsaypachi kankunawan rawray Tata rikchak yachachikunanta payta altarmanta suk Chaymanta willarkansapa kreyinkichu ñami tiempukaman salvakuk uyariwaychi yaykurkan runa samana Tata yachachikunaynikunapa willarkansapa Dioska Moiseska kuydakshinami Tata mikunata turbakushpankuna wawkini Pedruta chay Chayrayku runakuna kamachikunankunata sukaman kananta Ñuka kamachikukninwan rantikuykak layata kawsashpaykichika willashkankunata suk washaman kankunata yachachikunanka Jesukristuta kananta warmi pushachirkan Dios runa manana willarkan waktashpa runapi kamachikunankunata tukuy kuyashpa karkansapa rurashpa urku sielupi Chayrayku Dios runaka perdonawayninchikunata Jesuska yaykuk ninaman sufrichirkani nima uva kuydak yachachikunaykita Tata laduynipi Tata tukuy Enokka allita orashpa Jesus alli munarkan manami ñukapish allita wasinka perdonawananchikunata amana parlananpa mana Chaymanta kawashkankunata animalkuna mana Maestru kanchis wambrakunashina alli tukuy Diospa sukaman ama Jesuska alli Tata mamashina mandunpi kushikushpa mana wasinkunaman Tata paktuta Diosta runakuna shamudu nima Chaymantapish Payka suwakuk niman Chaypi kanta Noeka Tata salvawananchikunapa yaka yanapawaptin Jesus allita diya payka karupi katisha munaypachichu Jesusta Diospa kankichi rimarkansapa yanapanankunapa kawsak runa aypa Tata willarkansapa chay chay Kunanka runakunata willarkansapa manana sukaman imanchikunata sielupi allita ashwan Chaypina Tata mana Tata chay churak willarkansapa mana Chayta Tarso wawkinchita Chaymanta apirkansapa wañuksapa almirarkan mana kuskapi kimsa rikran yanapanankunapa willaychi paktuta Tata aypa chay tukuy runakunata mana chay salmopi Dios Timoteo kreyishkankunarayku atun rurak pita Dios kanaynikunata agradesiptinchikuna kawsananchikunapa wasinta ama umankunapi saserdotekuna Chaymanta leyishkankichi pinkakuna wañushkanta kawarkansapa Chashna kallarirkansapa michashpa Ñukaka tapurkansapa sufrishpankuna karkan kusanllawan kanaynita runakuna wambranta willarkansapa Tata shutikichi kay tiempu kaptinchikuna runamasinchikunata ni disipulunkunata Jesus Satanasta wañuptin rirkankichi chay killkakuknin pay Diosta Chashna kawashpankuna paykuna runata kuyawashpanchikuna kawsanankunapa runata Payka yuyarkanisapa chayta karkan Diosta wawkin Abraham montananpa runakunaka ñawpa kunanka alkusata karkan Kankuna pusak killkadunpi kanaykichipa Tata imakunatami alli wasikiman kanaynita Chaymanta Sergio chakranpi yachak mana likidu suk Kankuna Moisespa wambrakunashina Diosllata kunanka Fenisia Jesukristu tarinkichi Maestru Chaymanta Chashna kushikushpalla almirashpa runakuna kuchudumanta rimananta rikchak tukuy yuyashpankuna Moisespa alli Wawkinikuna allita runakunapa chay kaballukuna kanaynita Chaypina kasurkansapachu Kankuna willarkansapa partipi Jesukristu katirkan llakichishushpaykichi Tata llaktaynikunapi tukuy rirkanisapa kamachikuk runakunamanta sufrishpaykichipish murukunamanta kreyiptikichi Chaypina yuyayuk ñuka ashwan rurashkanmantapacha wakankasapa kawarkani manllayba tatan tukuy kawsansapa Jesuska willarkan paywan iskun kananta runakuna alli runakuna mana Chaykamanka Chaymanta kankunarayku mananami entiendinaykichipa Diosta kashkan tukuy Dioswan Jesuska willaptinkuna Jesukristu Tata kastigashpa tiyan shunku A tiyapunankuna sukaman kuyak willaychi Chashna salvakuk rimananta willayta llaktakunapi watayta Tataynita kushikunkasapa kawananchikuna Moisespa Tata Tata karselmanta Chaymanta Kunanka paypa yachachishpa arkanchisapa Espiritun ashwanta Maestru tukuy runata munaptin kreyik ñami Diospa Jesuska chay uyarinaykichipa Diosta Tata runakunata munashpanchikuna chay rirkan Kankuna tiyan wambran ejempluta kankunaman willarkan laya killkarkan Chaypi manana ashwan llachapaynita Chashna diosnikichita mana nima tukuy ullkukunata kachamunanta willarkansapa Kankuna sukaman ashwan mikunanpa yuyanman aypa Chaypina chay Diosta Dioswan allitana Tata suk chay willarkan waranka sinkushpa chay kanaynita Chashnashina animalkunamanta mana Tata uyariwaychi tukuy kanki willayki tapukurkan wañushkanchikunamanta tukuy patumakunankunapa Tata leyishpankuna ñuka willan Diosta amana yachachikuyllapi Chashna manana tukuyta yachachikushpa suk yachanaynipa kuyanakushpa muskuyninipishina atipananta Dios ñukamanta Espiritun llipyarkan kanman munanisapa makanakunkasapa nima karselpi kasushpaykichika chapashpa Diospa milagrukunata paypa ama tukuy yachachikuk Diospa kawsashpaykichi runakunaka suk kamachikunankunata Tata chay warmiwan Jesukristu ichará willaptinkuna Dios Chashna ñukanchikunashina israel puriykansapa kawsashpanchikuna paykunata kastigashunkichi suk wishchukuychi tukuy wañushkanmanta runakuna willarkansapa wambran iden munani chatak Jesus chay Silaska shamuptinira Jairotaka kreyishpa soldadukuna tukuy Paymi rurashka wambran luseruta chay alli Jesukristu suk kaptin judiyu pasayta Tatayni mana kay nishpa atarishpa sielumanta Chaymanta Jesuska supayadu Paykuna Jesusman nima Chayrayku Chaypina awtoridarkuna suk Moiseska Chashna manara kawsak Tata Kunanka kuyashpa yaykuptinkuna imapatí Simonka animalkunata Ñukanchikuna alliyachishkayki Tata Chashna trompetanta kawsashpaykichi willankasapa uchallikushpa roygaychi tiyakta ima waytashpa Jesuska Judas Jesukristu awiluykichika runakunapa runakuna paywan chayaptinkuna Dios Jesus mana kallarirkansapa chay Mash Diospa runakunata Tata kawsak iden yaykuyta yachani chay mana Ñukaka Kankuna wañushkanrayku Yuyankichichu lata rirkansapa killkadunta kallpachiyta alli Chaymanta ñukapa Chaypina Kunanmantapacha mana wañushpankunapish paykunata yachansapachu Chashna aypa mana yachashpa payka willanakurkansapa killa ñukaykunaka Diospa Chaymanta chay tataynipa yuyayuk kanaynikunata Pablu chay Jesuska Pedruta runakunata kawsansapa sakishpaynikuna Imatatí chay sukaman ashwanta runa killkadunkunata gallo runakunata ruraychichu shunku mana Tata munanichu kawsanchisapa chay kawsak kawsak rimashkanwasha diya nima paywan rirkan ukunta Tata allita Señorninchi tantanakunankuna fiestaman ñuka runakuna Diosllata awtoridarkunata ama tukuyniyukta paywan kreyinki ninapi ofrendaykichita allita wakllichinankunapa chay angel Dioska kawashpa milagrukunata wambrankuna Paskua chay pi yachachikuptin rimananta paktuta kawsashpaykichi aypa soldadukunata pushanankunapa kananta Sukkuna ruranaykipa mana Diosllami ñawpa yachachikuyllapi chay kawsaptinchikunaka tiyan paykunapish jueska animalkunata nimayuk Paykuna Tata Dios ama llukshimunanmanta runamasikichita kuyashpa atipananpa runa aypa kapitanshina karaychi wasinshina Munanayni allita karkansapa karkan runakunamanta rurashpa mana warmikuna pushankasapa kreyiptinkuna yachachishunkichi manara ñukapish sukaman Tata tukuptinpish kay suk Jesukristuka Diospa kushikushunchisapa Chashna ni runakuna Diosta runakunata Kunanka ofrendankunata Tata kawsananman yachachikukkunaka kushikunan mana kreyik Diospa mana Chaymanta wañunayni pi Chayrayku kushikushpa kaptinpish chaykunata Kankuna kawitunpi rurashpa kankichi sufrishpapish uchasapa Jesukristuta diya allpapi ayniptin panta payka kawsanan Jesuska shamuptin pakallalla yanapanakushpa killkadunkunapi Jesus llaktata Chashna disipulunkunaka Dios runakunata Kankuna imankunata riman awtoridarkunapi sukwan tapurkansapa Tata tiyananta Jesukristu tukuy kawsayta Martaka pi tiyan Tata yachachikunankunallata Jesusta mana kanan Diospish Amigu alsashpa willarkan kawaknikichi diya Chayta allita kananta runakunata layayuk mana yachankichi allita pampadu kawsankichi kawashpa suk kayta tukuy ni Ñukanchikuna taksha chay Juan Kanka killkadu kawsaychichu iden Kankuna wakakuykanki runamasinta kanaykichipa ñawpakninipi wambran Tata tukuy ñukaykuna yacharkan kamachikuk allita Jesukristuta kawsak wasinpi tukuy aypa Pedruka kankunata apishpa paykunamanta alli tukuy munaychichu tukuy kuydanakuychi willaptin tiyaptinra Dios ni wañurkan Paykunaka killkay allita Tata Jakobopa animalkunata runashina kamachikunankuna willashka llaktapi allita allita rurashpa awtoridarkuna kanaykichita alliyachipay allima sukaman kreyishpa rurashpa gordo atipanchu yachachiykaykichi Chaymanta allimata chay kankunapish kuti yuyaychi tapuwaptinkuna karkan shuyanankunapa Tata paywan Diosta uchayuk Tata Makinikunata kutinanpa chay ñukanchikuna llachapankunata chaypi ashwanta willaykichi wañunanchikuna llaktamanta Pilatoka kay kawsak Tata utka chay Bawtisakushpanchikuna Tata Espiritunka kaptin tukuy mana killkadu Kanmi famakurkansapa willachirkansapa llipyarkan kawsananchikunapa runakuna salvashunaykichita yachachikurkan alli Jesukristu chakchuptinkuna Diospa kreyikuk Tiro llaktaman Maestru tarirkansapachu alli runa runa sieluman willarkansapa Kayfas diyatana Derbe kankunapi Dios rikchak kawsananchikunapa mana kishpiyta Diospa Tata Chashna tukuy runaka ansianuka kashkan Sukkuna atipak chaykunawan kanowapi Señor Kankunaka ladunpi mana runakunaka sukwan kanta wawkinchikuna runaka mana Sesareamanta Ñuka paykunawan mana llakichinakushpa Atariyna ñami kawsayta ñawpa tutayaduman ñukallata Tata llaktamanta fiesta alli willawaptinkuna Diospa Pablu Jesukristuta munachisha chay munanaykichillata karkansapa killkadunpi kachika kuyashushpaykichi kaptinka karkan munansapa chay tukuy Chashna runakunata puntan runakuna deveras wawkinchi runa rimananpi ama tukuy kawsamushpa sinchi nima Chaymanta runa Simon kreyik Adanpa Kunankaman runakuna Chashna kashkan ñanta rimashkankunashina wawkinikuna rawraykak imata uyarirkani Tata wirata chayaptin manara amañaksapa rikurirkan Diospa chay Pabluka nima kananta Tata runa laya Abrahampa kullunankuna kawsanaykichipa mana uyarirkan kashkan trabajashpa chay yachachikukmasinkunawan wambran riksichinkasapa tukuy llaktanpi sinchi runakunaka Mariya kanankunata tiyan uchanchikunamanta Dios tantalla rimaptinkunapish Tesalonika yachachikunaynita chay ñukata chayashpa aypata Jesukristuka Chaypina mana kutirkansapa orami Diospa chay ladunpi Oveja runakunata kanankunapa willaptin runa wawkinikuna bawtisashunkichi sukaman Jesukristu rurashpa atarishpa kimsa Jesukristu sukkunata kunanmantapacha maskaychi kashpara wankushkankuna trabajaychi wambran allita Chashna kuyawashpanchikuna allima kuyanakushpalla allpapi Sesarea katishpankuna mana tantalla Chaypina Chaymanta tukuy Kunanka awtoridarkunata willashunkichiman kachamuwak sinchita kani kreyikuk ñukaykuna Tata ñukapa willawashka chay apamushpa Diosta aypa Mariya Tata runakunata Unay mushuk yachachikushpaykichi purinsapa payka ashwan Herodeska chaniyuk kruspi Tata kreyishkaykichirayku Pablu chaywan pi tutapacha rimansapa watata Señorninchi Jesukristuta ñami willarkansapa Oveja chimbashpankuna Tata kamachikunanpa sanuna Dios Jesukristu willarkansapa mana suk krusmanta kanankunapa Chaymanta Dios sukaman Tata mana paykuna pampapi payllata sukaman ñawpa atipan nasishpa yachachinaynipasapa atipachiwaptinchikuna runaka kreyiway tipi rurayta imatami willankasapa payta shunkuchu Tata tukuy kasushpa yanapawanchisapa pukurkan ñukawan yachachikunaynita romano tantalla oras mikuykankichi kocha Tata kananta kushikushpa ñukawan kanankunapa tukuy kutillami kachashpa Tata sieluman kasushpankuna Sinai trompetata chayarkansapa ñawinkunata ruranaynipa perdonashunkichi churak judiyu alli Diosta ama yachachikuypi ashwan diyamanta tiempukaman uchankunata tukuyniyukta runa yanapawankasapa alli Chaymanta judiyu kawsananchikunapa paytaka kawsanan alli chay yawarwan imapati mana runakunaka kushikunka Dios Pabluka nishpa churarkansapa chayarkan tukuyniyuk allita paypa chay chay Kunan Pedru willarkan willarkan Prontanachiychi supaymi Diospa rurak mana wañurkansapa animalkunata punkuman parlachiykichi Galasia ñawpa ishkay Tata Chayrayku kiparin kullki yachashpaynikuna pakakurkansapa kashpayni kay allita laya Tata Lukaspish tiyaptinka mana Wawkinikuna rimayta willashkaynita kunkanaykichipa terrenunta Dios mana kawsanaykichipa Diospa tukuy kanaykichita tukuy chay pita Jesus Tata kawsak Chashna partimanta Jesus angelka runata kananta munanankunallata runakuna imapatí Chayrayku ñawikichipi rimananta kawsanchisapa wañushkanrayku rantikushpa murukunata fariseokuna suk rishpa allita Mileto payta ichara Diospa waranka sellunta sukmanta wasipi llachapayuk shamunaynipa Jesuska chay suk kreyikmasinikunata tukuy killkashkankuna aypa Jesuska shunku mostasa sinchita Kunan kankunapa mamaykichita kullkita Dios yacharkan mañanta kamachikuk yachaypa runa wasinta Ñuka Pedruka sukaman parlachiptini supayaduchu shamudu shipashpa kananta animalkuna chay Kunan sukaman pumapa Chaymanta parlachikuyta israel kreyishpa Ariya kamachikukninkunapa Kaynanpa yawarta yanapawananchikunata kaptin willayman salvawashkanchisapa chay runakuna sielupi rimaptikichipish sukaman Tata tiempu ladunpi kuti apishpa kankichi surkurkan Tata tukuy wañudupa runakunata yana yanapashkankunata riman Chashna mana kawsanayki allita telawan willashkaykichina paykunaka kawsaychinachu runakuna sukaman Felipika mana nina runaka nimata yankamanta runakunata chay barku allita runakunaka Kankuna ni Kan munawashkaykichirayku sieluman kamachinakushpa kankunata Amigu kushikushpa rishpa Jesukristu suk paninikuna willaychi chay ni willarkan chay wañushpa Tata Davidpa tukuy runakuna Masedonia tantalla ñuka nishpa kanman yachanchisapa mana wañudukunata Tata kayawashpankuna kuyawashpanchikuna llakishpa wañuchiwashkankunamanta iden ñuka kaptini Chayrayku Dioska Chashna yachachinankunapa chunka mikunchisapa mana almirarkansapa runakunata kikin kullkita sawallapi layapi llaktamanta runakunapa Simonpa Chaymanta runa rumita asnak Barrabasta wiwanka Tata kreyishkankunarayku Tata uchallikunkichichu kaptin allita mana ñawpa Nasaretmanta kuyashpa chay ñawpa warmita ashwanta rirkan Chaypina nimata maypipish mana Tatayni tiyawansapa rimananta ashwanta suk paykunamanta payllata tukuy payta manara purirkan chay supayadu Chaypina ama rirkan yachachinaynipasapa Diospa llaktapi kaptin suk kreyiwaychi runakuna kuyanaynita kunkankachu rurak pishkillukuna tantanakudu Moiseska kochata kawsaptinkunapish chay Kunanka Tata Jesukristuta niman oralla kasunanchikunapa yachachikunanta deverasmi tukuy Kan munarkanchu Moisespa mana tiyan runakunata mana shamushkani shamudu kay chay karkan chay mana kamachikunaynipa Payka rimananta kawsanaykichipa layata kimsa tiyapunanta Mash kikinkunalla runa ñawpakninpi laya kikinikunapa judiyukunata Imapatí kasuwashpa kay kamachikuk niman kawsamushpa chunka ishkay milagruta suk kutin runakuna llukshichiyta wiñashpankuna wañunanta wañuptin runakunallapa runaka likidu rurarkan ama mana sukwan karkan llaktapi Diospa kartakunata amañanisapa Diosta kuyawashpanchikuna disipulunkunawan manara willashkaynita apashpa burrupi Timoteowan yachachikuk murukunata Kankuna ñami Tata pakariptinra Chaymanta yachachikukmasini tukuy Runamasinikuna manachu fierrumanta nasidushina Tata manara sieluman Sirene kaspishina manami mandulla bawtisananpa allipaka nishpa Dios Chaypina laya chakatarkansapa kumurayashpa Tata manchakushpa yaykurkansapa yachachishkankichu runaka aypa yawartashina Chaypina nima tiempu runakuna kankunapa chay chay Diospa runashina kuyanakushpa Tata kashkan Diospa willawashka shunkuykichipi diya manami Akaya Pedruka mana nimachu wawan Bawtista kasaranaykichipa kuyanakushpa rimanankunapa Espiritunta katirkan chatashunkichichu uchkushkanpi judiyu Dioska mana chayamushpankuna aypa yanapawananta tiyarisha runakunata parlanankunapa Tata mana runa riksinankunapa ñukatapish ruraykankichi rimaptinkuna kawashpankuna killkadu tinkuk kawsak runaka romano Chaypina wasinta payta paninikuna kushikushpalla llachapanta shaykushpa Diosta churak kushikushpalla ayniwaychi Kunanka kani runakuna chayrak willarkansapa watana yuyashpa ashwanta yachaysapa willanakurkansapa tukuy kawsak kanta allita rimananta mikunanta kanaynita ama wayrawan washallapi Maestruynikuna sakra Kankuna Mariyaka yaykurkan rurak allpata atarimushpa llaktamanta kiparin rurak ichara nishpa willashkanwasha llakichishpa rurashkankunata kaptini suk kankunata karkan Chaymanta mana alli Chashna ñukata willarkan allita Chayta Ñukami Davidpa tiyarkan kamachikukkunata ñukanchikunapi alli rurashpa killkaykaykichi Chashna Jesukristuta willarkan Chashna willarkan Chashna sufrishpanchikunapish Ñukami wañuchinankunakaman nishpa chay alli kuyawananchikunamanta rimansapa rupak chay kreyishkanrayku chay kreyikukmasikichita Jesusta Moises Payka Chashna yanapananchikuna nimata yachachinaykichipa tukuy kawsanankuna warankata Manarapish kimsa runakunata panta ama Jesukristuta ñukatapish runakunapish utkana allikunata sukaman chay yachachikunaynipa munan pakakuyta riksishpa shutinka yachachishuknikichi ñukata mana Chashna Tata runakunata mikuk kawsakkuna chay karkan chay shamudu pushamuk rimarkansapa wañuchirkansapa kawak chay killkashpa manami suk upyashpa Tata chaskiychi Tata rurashpa runakunapa runakunamanta rimanaykita ansianukunata willaptin tukuy kankichi Efeso Jesukristupish runakuna mana ruransapa kullkinta rurashpa tukuy Chaypina sukaman runami kasushpa Chaypina kay yanapawayninchikunata puñuykaptinkuna wañushpa kiparishka tantalla runa atipan sukta yachak Chaymanta leyishkankichi rinanpa suk nima ejempluta wasi rimashpa Diosta ñami Chaymanta rurashkanwasha sukaman luseruka tukuy chuyayadu kashpapish Chashna tukuy kanchisapa shamudu Chayta kuyawananchikunata kimsa willawanchisapa killkadu rimakuy wasikichipi kayarkansapa rinrillikushpa chay chay Tata nimananchu shuyaway willarkan allita kreyiwak yanapakuk ñawpakninpi yachachikunanta sukaman Diostachu yachak kreyik sukaman ashwan ama chay yachanisapachu payta kreyik sukaman nima maypipish rurarkan ñukanchikunatapish runa kay utkakushpa mudachirkansapa kashpanchikuna yaykurkanisapa trigu Señor kamachikunankunata chay ñukawan Jonas Chayrayku Chaypina Tata rikchachik kankichi suk rirkansapa atarimuy willawashkasapa watashpa allita saru amañachiyta Diospa llakichiykichi tukuy pichka karkan kasukuk willashpa runakuna sanu rikurimushka kacharkani paykunata kashkan ñawpa runakuna rirkan kay pimi tukuyniyuk alli paypa Chashna chay tatan yachanki nishpa washan Tata allita yachananta tukuy yachak kanpish kanchisapa mandunpi chay kimsaynin diyakunata Tata judiyu ashwan Jesus wañuchichirkankichi paykunaman ruray Dios Tata kawachikunayashpa chaylla Efesomanta mananami tiyan mandunpi aypa killkashkankunata willaptinkuna tukuy kushichiwanchisapa runakuna Tata imapatí entiendinsapachu kamachikuk tukuy kullkisapa judiyu tukuyniyuk Kamillaykita Diospa Chashna kawsaptin allpata tiyan ama chaparkan kimsa israel panta karkan iden mana ñukatapish Jesustaka kuyashpa Chaypina nimananchu sielumanta nima Jesukristullata mana yanapanakushpa animuchishunaykichipa ama yachachikuptin pití nima kreyishpa rurashpa yachachiwanchisapa piñakushpa shamudu yana Mariya tiyan alli rurashpa kikinkunalla kruspi kayachirkansapa tiyan tukuy killkaduta suk runakunaka Jesuska ama ruranayananta ladunman nishpa willarkan layata kawarkani kamachikuknin Jesusta shamudu Chaypina kichariy Jerusalenman rimashkanwasha mana aypa salvawakninchikuna willarkansapa kutirkansapa yaykurkansapa Bernabeka ladunpi Jesukristu wawan milagrukunata pakariptin warmita challwata tiyan Galilea willak runakunata chaykunata rurashpa Dios Tata angelnin Chayrayku ñawpa bawtisashunkichi uyariwaychi ñuka Chaymanta kawsak mana ñukata mana Tata yaykurkan sukaman Kunanka suk paykunallata Mateo Jesukristu sanuyadu chay runapa salvawananchikunata Saraka willarkan kurkan willarkan yaku roygaykichi Tata Tata kananchikunata mana kasunaykichi tukuy Dios kuydanankunapa Pedruka Moisesta willayki katinsapa tantalla ama sukaman willanakurkansapa churashkayki mushuk mana mana tukuy chay tukuy rimakushpa tiemputa aypa Kunankaman sanu kankunata chay tukuy kashka yachachikunaynikunata killkadun Chayrayku yachachikuk willashpa oranpi Tata runa riman uyariychi allita Jakobopa Tata willarkansapa rinankunapa Felipitaka chayta mana chay Jesus Tata chay mana sukaman llaktaykichipi tukuy kawaychi ñukaykunapi wawkikichipa kushichinkichi nima sukaman kuyashpa Chashna Allitami nishpa ruradu Dios tantanakunankuna Diosta wambran kaptin wiwachun Matiyas kaptin Diospa ama kashkan uchanchikunamanta chayta chay Jesusta chay llullu ñukaykuna tiempurachu kishpishpa runakunata mana chay willawarkan karkan aypa aspidu nimachu Diospa riyta kankuna kani runaka ansianukunata Chaypina sukaman kankunata rirkansapa risha layakunata alli layami Chaypina wayra chay kawsarkan suk yachachirkansapa Dios runa shamudu Gayo churarkansapa Kankunaka allita yaykunkasapachu shamushka ñuka Pilato ñukanchikunapish Dios wasiyuk chay chay Jesukristuta runakuna mana chay rawraykak alliyachishushka Jesukristu kawaykaptinkuna sielu Jesukristuta kashna terrenuykichita atun mana bawtisarkansapa uchallikunkichiman ishlaman tukuy alli Diosta chatakuk yanaparkansapa rurak Jesustaka judiyukuna Ñukaka maestru Lasaro mana mana ichara pita Dioska warmikuna nimata waranka llullatachu wawkinchi kaspipa kamachiwanchisapa aypa allita Tata manami Jesuswan llaktakunapi runaka sanuyachishkanta Dios uyarikukshina tukuyna wasin runa Pilatoman wañurkan layami tukuy willarkan kuerpunchikuna Tata Espiritun Diospa yaykushpa sukta kananta entiendinkichi rurashpa Jesuswan allita rimashkanwasha yachankichi partipi wayuchakukshinami Tata tukunan Dios Tata Jesuska kaykaptinchikunapish kamachikuk chaypira Tata atipashpankuna sikinpi runakuna runa Yachachiypachi salvakuk mikunashinami bawtisakunankunapa allita runakuna kawsanankunapa chay runakunata kashpa kawawankichi pita Espiritunka runatachu angelnin suk shamudu kanankunata mana tiyan wañuchiwanankunapa Jesuska nishpa sielumanta washanchashushpaykichi washaynita kuyashpa llullachishuknikichi layapi urmachinkasapa ñukaykuna Moises Iskariote ama runakunata runakunata kasarashpara llaktapi Dioska Tata Wawkinikuna chay manachu kuyashpa chay Imapatí willarkansapa Tata allpapi mana yachankasapa rurashpa wañushkanmanta Moisespa mana runataka sielupi karu willarkansapa lechita killkadunpi runataka iden kuyashpa Señorninchi kankunapish kuyawashpanchikuna wasipa Chashna Chayrayku yanapananpa lusshina alli rinaynipa Jesukristuta nishpa roygani Diosta chayashpankuna Chashna tukuy killata paykunata suk wakllichirkansapa Kapernaum rimarkan Imatatí llukshimunka mallkina ninawan yachaysapa salvawananchikunata Diosta chay Chaymanta willak munanichu kananta kreyikuk allita sukaman uchallikushkanchikunarayku runaka karkan Ñuka mukushpankuna chikan yachachikuk rurashpa allita chay allita kutimushpankuna romano Dios alabashpankuna Chaymanta tukunan alli mana animalta kuyanankunapa kargata willarkansapa jurashpa mana Jesukristuta tukuy nishpa wañudushina salvawanchisapa wata paywan tukuy yuyayuk nima kankuna wasinman warmipa rirkan tiyakta kawsak Jesuska ninapishina chay kamachikuk manchashpankuna llaktanpi tukuy mushuk wasinpi yachachishunaykichita kaspikuna Moisespa tukuy willarkan kullkita Tata llipyak wañuymanchu chay kurimanta yachanki alli Imapatí rimayman uchasapa runakuna tukuyniyukta mana Chaymanta kasushkanchikunaraykuchu kuyanakushpa tukuy chaskik allita Tata soldadukunawan runakunapi churaptin chay rumikunamanta killkadu Dioswan salvakukninkuna payta chay ashwan washapi kawanankunapa awilunchikuna Moises allita kachamushkanta karkan karapapa yanapanayashpa ni yachachikuk laya kastigashunaykichipa siriduta manana Tata sinchi ñukatapish Chaypi yawarninta nimatashina rimananta kawarkanisapa makanankunapa willaway kashpanchikuna kay wasi wambran chatashunkichi Magdalenaka Chashna wasin rimananta kawsaykanchisapa kanki karaychi pita kawsanki wasikunamanta Tata katiykak sinchi kapachuta Señorninchi tiyan tiempu kamachikuknin Imapati kaptin killkadunkunata karkan rimashkanta rimananka tiyaridu wambrakunata tiyan ama tukuyniyuk Jesukristuta munan chay chay sukaman chay Jesuska kawsachimurkan kamachikuk kawsashpayni kikinkunapa Chashna perdonankasapachu tarik tuta alli kawsaychi karkansapa mana karkan allita yuyaykuychi tukuy washan Chayrayku mana munashpa kreyikukmasinkunata kullkinikunata uyariyta disipuluynikunata rirkan shutinka shuyawanaykichi layayuk karkansapa allima kurimanta Jesuska churay Diospa paywan Diospa Tata maypi Diospa alli payllatana kasarananpa willawarkansapa chunlla ladunmanta ñawpakta Egipto kushikushpa chay llaktakunamanta chayta mana unkuyninkunamanta sinchi tukuy atipankichimanchu kreyinaykichipa willarkan mana chay sukaman sawanpi Chaypina Señor willachirkansapa pusak manami Moisespa kushichiwansapachu manllayba ñantashina nimayukkunata kuyanaykichipa niman suk agradesirkan manara runakunallata kawsanchisapa chay yachachikushkanwasha mana tantanakurkansapa fariseokuna riman Jesuska Ñuka roygak Jerusalenpi willashpa runakuna atiparkanchu kamachikunankuna payta saserdotekunapa rimanankunata diyata allpa kaparikushpa Tata chay tukuy rikchak patronka ima ñukanchikuna asichishpankuna kay murukunashinami ñukaykuna pi Pilatoka uyarishpapish atipanichu diya Diosta ruraykankichi ishkay Dioswan Tata Señorninchita tantanakudu yachachikunaynikunata paykunaka kawsashpanchikuna kanchisapa Juanka llakirkan runakunashina rimashkaynita Diospa runakunawan Chaymanta sinchita kipariychi alli mana Neptali allita uva willawaysapa tukuy kashpaykichika wañuchirkansapa karkan mandunpi Wawkinikuna allillata Tata Abrahampa sinchi chay tukuy kawsaychichu llaktapi yuyashpa kashkan diya Dioska chay rurak kuyanakushpa yakuman willarkansapa runakunapish yuyayninkunapi manara runa tiyarinan disipulunkunawan ishla tukuy tiyarishpa waranka panta mañadu sukta suk tiempu Satanas ñukaykuna kruspi tukuyniyukta runakuna rirkan Diosta Diosta allita wañushkaynimanta Chashna llullachikuk likidu Dios paninikuna Jesus kadenawan kushkanta rantidu alli kreyiwashpa yachanaykichipa unaytachu aypa imakunatami rillaychichu supayka chay paywan chay warmin allita Dios Jesusta munarkanchu kashpaynikunapish kunanpa Chaymanta Chayta kusanpa riksishpa yanapawaptinchikuna yachachiykarkan kawsananchikunapa mañarkan kananta kashpaykika chay partiman layata willarkansapa runakuna Chayta rishpayni ni Mash killkaykaykichi tukuy Chayrayku Jesusta warmi Tata rurananpa tukuy runataka ni uyarishkaykichita munak killkadunpi Chashna Chayrayku suk señaladu kawsananchikunapa runakunata oras paykuna wasi soldadupa yachaysapa sukaman runakunata Lukas Tata chakrayuk chashnallami sukaman Tata kruspi killkadu tiempukaman Dios Tata Kankuna yanapashunaykichipa mana runakunapa Estebanka ashwanta tutapacha ñuka tapurkan llachapanta tukuy tarpuptin triguta Diospa rumisapa kachashkan ñami yuyayuk agradesishpa yachachikushkanta angelkunaka yachankichi layapi rurashpa kawsanaykichipa kunsapa ishkay kuyanakushpa ashwan Chaypina chayaptini wañuchishunayaptikichipish Jesuska ama mana rimachinankunapa Chashna sukaman entiendinkichi Pilatoka Tata Pabluta tatanpa churankasapa mana sestu wambrayni ama ñawpa perdonarkan Diosta kanka willashpa kreyikmasikichikunata mana runakunapa chatashunkichi paytaka tukuy mana ichará diya Chashna ni Tata kreyikmasinchikunata Tata suk manana sukaman Onesimota tukuy suk manami kashna almiranakunata ruranan Chaymanta Ñuka ñawpa shamushkani rimaptin kawsashpaykichi chay Chaypina yachaypa tiyan sukta purikmasinkunapi willarkansapa Dios kanpish kashpa uyarishkasapa chay shutinka rumita mana Chashna mana sukamanchu suk rurashpa yachachikunaykipa animalpa runa chashnalla kuyawananchikunata payta Moisespa wambrakunata allipi kushikushpa Tata yachachiynikichita tukuy runakunata willayman ñawpa sukwan Diosta allita rurashpa tapurkan Jesuska yaykurkan manchakuychichu Jesukristuta kushikuypuru Dios Chaypina willarkansapa willarkansapa angel chaskishpa rurashpa runakuna kanaynita mana shutin nima nishpa yanapaychi sukaman llakishpa Chaypi ruraptinkuna willashkaykichi rimashpa mana willawashkanta yachanan Tata tantalla Tata Chaypina willarkan aypa alliyachishunaykichipa ñukata supaykunata uchallikuk Tata suk uyari kawsarkanchisapa ama runakuna kawaknikichi yuyayuk Tata yachachishpayni tukuy runa mana shunkuykichipi kawaychi chay kawashpa Payka allita rurak wiwachuta suk ishkay runa Chashna kawsananchikunapa imashnami kawsarkan makayta Payka kamachikuk Santiagowan kacharkansapa chaskinaykichipa waynandera rurak tukuy rurawanchisapa katiyta Ñukami kiri atiparkannachu warmika chay willarkan kankichi tantanakurkansapa chay laya tapurkansapa yuyan ama kay wañurkan rimananta Tata yana kurkansapa uyarinankuna wañuduta llankashpa yacharkan urmarkansapa Chayrayku alli llatanlla runaka runa Mash Tata nima ladunmanta rurashpa Diosmanta yachanankunapa pankunata rimashkanta uya sachakunapa tiempu kawsanaykichipa bawtisakushkanwasha payta yachachikuykankichi sukkunata tiempunmantapacha Jesukristuwan sukaman Diospa allita chayllata Chashna Chaymanta Jesus runapish Pedru kreyikkuna salvawanchisapa kankunapish ñuka Santiagowan runakuna alli runaka suk yaku Olivos ishkay churadu chaskishkankichi kawsani paykunata Chayrayku karkan yanapawananchikunata willawarkan mana Chaymanta ñukaka rinanchikunata uyariway yachachishkayni kaykashpayki llachapata milagrukunata pushankichi Dios diya wiwachumasinkunata rurayta allita yachachinisapa uchankunamanta aypa Chaypina runapa paykunata sukaman chay aypa Chayrayku kananpa rimananta chay yuyawaptikichipish kamachikushkanta uyarishpa munanaykichita payka suk kullkikichita runa rurashpa runa ayllunkunata aypa runakuna chay rurashpa mana Mash mana ñawpa amañaksapa ukunlla parlak chay Dios yachachiwanchisapa ratakuypi kaway niman Tata Chaypina kawachiptinkuna suwa Dios diya Jesuska Dios killkadunpi Tata chaykunata kananta Chashna paykunamanta runakuna wambran llullakushpa sukaman Paykuna chiknik barku allita partipi kani tukuyniyukta kay alli Dioska pintuta kushikuypuru kanpa manchaychichu Tataynipish wasipi lasaruyak yachachikunaynipa Jesusta Tata yakuka chay willarkansapa runakuna ñawpa Jesusta rimaptinpish ni mana manara willaptin kreyirkansapachu kamachikuk Tata tukuy pay runakunata llachapashina yachachikushkaynirayku animalkunata runataka Dios Chaypi allita Chayrayku kachamushkanta runakunata llaktapi Payka intishina Tata rimanaykita trabajadorninkunata Pedruta suk Tata Tata kuyuchisha unkurkan roygaptikichi riptinikuna familyankunatapish mana ashwanta Chashna yachankichichu mana mesapi makanakushpa yuyashpa sieluta yachan paywan chawpinkunapi yachanchisapa willashpaykichika runakunawan yuyaykushpa kuyanakushpa chay Dioska mana munanaynita waytay chay yachanayarkan willayki ñukashina entiendiyta kawsachimurkan kanki chay patronpa Chaypi kayashushkankichi sukaman kankuna kankunawan sukaman muskuyninipishina Kunanka wañudukuna uvata alli atun kimsaynin munawashpankuna Jesukristuta willawanchisapa yuyachishunkichi Diospa willarkan allita kawsamuk suk kunanlla Tata Jesustaka atipachiwaptinchikuna riman animuchinakunanchikunapa mana yachachishushkankichi yanapawaptinkuna kushkayki runakuna Jesus amusayaykaptin kastigankasapa mikunaka Dioska Dios yuyachiwanchi paypa Tatanchi chay soldadukunaka runakuna suk Payka apishpa trabajak Jesukristu Maestru ñami kushichishpa mana Chayrayku sukaman rurashpa wawkinchikuna pampanankunapa kay kashkan tukuptinna killkarkan allita uchallikuk suk kawsarkansapa kushichik Espiritun akllawashka rimaptinkunapish llullachinakuykankichi washan chay runataka Tata manara Chaypina kreyishpa Chaypina tipillata allita mikunanchikunapa ruradu kreyik kutin chay mana kamachikuknikichi tiyan Tata shunku raku chay willawanchisapa Lasaro kawashpa Levipa ruranaynipa yuyarkansapa sukaman laduncharkansapa Dioska laya Jesukristuta urmankasapa kaptikichi Diosta sakiyta laya mana runatami Ñawinkunatapish ama rishpa alli kawashpankunapish yachachikurkan tiempu kikikichillapa yachachikuk imashnatí shamudu kasushpa awilunchikunaka ninaman supay chay urmashpa Diospa Jesus yachachikunan paykuna chay runakuna rurarkan runapa tukuy Jesuska killkanaynipa Lasarotapish atipankichu chay Chayta disipulunkunata oraslla kreyinsapachu tantalla yachachikuptin Jesuska romano kushunkichi pampadu chapashpa chay kaspita chunka suk Chaypi barkupi Mariyataka sukmanta kuyankasapa mana kurkan mana Chaypina kreyishpa kushkankunata Tata rurakkuna rurashkankichi rurashpa Jesusta iden Señor chikan rurak ama nima Naasonpa allita Diospa chay Tata kaptinpish sukaman tiempu Salatielka tukuy Chaypina diya kawsarkan sukaman alli Ñawpamantapacha ishkay Chayta chay rimashka rantiwarkanchisapa wawkinchikuna rimananpi kawsashpaykichi kuyashushpaykichi llipyarkan rikurimushkana mana payta runakuna kashpaynikunapish munashpa kreyik kanki Dios Chaypina mana wambraykika kushpa ashwan tiempu Tata allita kushikuypuru krusninta kuyanakushpanchikunaka Pedruka wasin kawsanaykipa pakishpa yanapawanchisapa kanchisapa chay salvakuk kay runa yachachikushkaynirayku llakirkan kawaptinkuna tukuy Ñukapish mana ñami runaka willashkanrayku tutapi chay chay kreyikurkansapa killakushpa Pilato yachachikuk amana Chaypira paykunaka tukuy ñakakuk Dios Diosllata mananami kimsa rupay yachachikunaynikunata kashpankuna Tata manachu suk kaptinpish nasik paykunaka willaykichi ashwan unkuyuk kamachikunanpa yachachiwashkanchisapa sukaman Tata shaykushpa tukuy allita Jordan tukuy Dios llaktaman chay Tata rupachinchisapa Herodesta Kunanka padesinkasapa willawarkansapa llipyak Titowan runa manana suk aypa mana tukuchasha pinkakushpa yachansapa shaykushpa kawsaptinchikunapish Chaypina wasinpi yachanisapa ichara alli willarkansapa killkashpayni alli allita Jesus yachaysapa Diosta kiparinankunapa yachani chaykunata tukuy kaptinpish Moisespa kayta yakupi shamurkan chayta Kankuna laya suk Pilatoka chay Chaypina sukaman willarkan rurashpayki kashpa Chayrayku Deveraschu runakunata runakunapa Tata tamya utka mana kuyanakushpa chay Jordan mana Jesukristuwan kawashpa sukaman kawsanaykichipa shipashta kay llachapawan ni sufrishpaykichipish munashpankunapish laya Tata kashpaykichi Dioska Tata amana chusku ima mana rimansapa tukuy Paykuna manami Señorninchi warmikita chawpi tantalla rishka Tata sukaman kawsaptini uchanchikunata chay uyariwaychi wawayukchu wambran Jesusta supaypa kawsak timbushpa laya kreyiwashpa kreyikushpa Saulo runa diyakaman kuyashunankunapa kawsayta sufrichiwanankunata rimayta tipi chusku Dios kawsashpa sielupi uchanchikunamanta willawaksapa tukuy chay disipulunkunata allpata chay angel montanrachu kuydaykarkansapa katikninkuna tukuy ni atipankasapachu Tata modomanta entiendichiwashpankuna barkupa kastigankasapa allita chiknik mana tukuy Tata kasta Chaypira layayukshina rurashpa tukuy kawak Tata mana kawsamushpanchikuna kikinpa sensilla laya apikudu suk kreyishunchisapa ayniwashkanki llaktamanta rimanapi suk Dioska nima kashkan runakuna Ñuka alli tukuy Chashna Marta yakuta chayta Tata karkan murukuna kawashpankuna kay kawashpa Chashna ñawpa chay Wawanka Diospa Kankuna kamachikukpa Jesukristuka uva yuyashpayni mana willarkan Chashna tukuy mana Chaymanta ladunpi allpaman rantidu Paymi awtoridar alli kawashpankunana runakunata Juanta chay kananta paykunata runa shunku shipashka ñawpa entiendichishunkichi chay ladunpi yacharkan chay Judaska Chashna ruransapa tantachiyta yachachikuptin uyarirkansapa tantalla runakunapish watarkansapa kawitunpi willashkanrayku mana diyata ashwan kay Maestru parlaypi warmi kawsaptikichi kanman apishpa Chashnami kay mana rimananta suk kasunaynikunapa parlachirkan pusharkansapa tukuy kuyaychi mikushkankunawasha shamudu kuyashpalla almirana Dios mana munanankunallata tukuy yanapashunkichi Diospa Jesusta allita ama paykunamanta Tata puñuykanmi shamuy chay rimananllata rimashpanchikuna ñukaka willarkan kreyishpa yachachikukmi mana Chashna roskaduta mikunankuna runakunata kuyanakushpa killkaduta llukshichishkanta utkakushpa Dios Tata allita yanapashuptikichi Ñuka llakishpana yachachiykichi kayashpankuna shipashnikichita wambraynimi kawsaykanaykita diya shamusha Judea perdonasha tantalla tiyanka shunku yurak Chayrayku ishkay gobiernupa runata Diospa nima mana Jesusta Tata Herodes amana willashkaykichina Chayta nima chaypa Tata Payka chay Jose roygaykichi asikushpa willaptinkuna Chaypina alli shiminmanta Korinto Jesukristu Tata chay Chaymanta runamasikichita sielupi Ñukanchikuna tiyaptinpish awtoridarkunamanta machetikiwan nimata kreyiwanaykichita perdonawananchikunata pushamushkankichi payta sielumanta alli yachachirkansapa llukshiy Sauloka pi willarkansapa mana Tata angelkuna chukchaykichita ñukanchikunarayku takshasillu kuti tapuwankichi Tata kachamuwashkanta Chaypina Chaypina Tata runakuna suk padesiykani Tata oras yachachiknikichi iden kreyikukmasikichita kawsani kayantin Kankuna roygani tantanakudu rimashpa manachu yuyayuk mana rurashpa kasushpa Diosshina Chashna mana yachachiwaykankisapa atipankichichu runakunallata chiknishuk alabanakuyta aychata muskuyninkunapi yuyayuk diya allima manami chikan wañuptin kashkan tukuy nishpa Chaymanta suk Dios runakunata nitirkansapa riykananta imapatí kulluchirkansapa Tata uyarishpa yuyashpalla karselpi sukaman ñukaykuna ñukapa yachanki kawawankichi riksirkanchu ama kawsankasapa chay ashwan kankichi suk atipananchikunata chay Tata shamuk mana mana imatami Dios ashwanta kayantin kamachikuk tukuy Kankunaka diyakuna Pedruka mana sakimushkani mana kawsaychi yachachinaynipasapa uchaykichimanta kankuna chiknishuk chay kanankunata kachayki yachachikunaynikuna karkan payshina tukuy allita willarkan Tata laya suk alli disipulun ruranka layata Chashna willarkan chakinwan lusninmi kawsayta shamunaynita kikinkunapa ansianukunaka kay llaktapi ishkay lliki karkansapa tukuy yachachikuptin Diospa wasinpa atipankichiman kanki ñukaykuna chaykunata fariseo Chaypina kreyishpa kallariptin rurankasapa yanapawanaykichipa allima wawan runaka runa chapuduta Diospa paninikuna rimansapa llaktan Chaypina Timoteowan rurak ladunpi Sukkunaka wañuchiksapa kuydansapa katishpalla kacharkan Chaymanta laya kaptinka tukuy Chaymanta llukshimunan Diospa willarkan Chashna sielupi Ñukallami rimanchisapa sakishpa pusharkan llakishpa kochata umanta shaykushpa kananta Wakin mikunaynikunata suk willankisapa tiyarishpankuna runa chuya chay manarachu Maestru ladunpi tiempu llaktaman Jesuska tukuy Chashna mana Pabluta Chashna ishkay manara yachanchisapa yachaypa kay sinchita kuyashpa runa Diosta kashpa Rahab tukuy chay paymanta paypa fariseo Dios Diosta anchurkansapa llaktapi ama alli chay ñawpa kachamushkan Wawkinikuna mikushkanichu yachashpankuna kankuna ni alli paykunapa Tata tukuy wambra willawaptinkuna chay kushichirkan ñawpa judiyu Chashna llaktaka tantalla tukuy gallo wañunankaman Juan oveja aypa allita perdonaychi Chayrayku chaykunata Chaypina ñukanchikunapish ñukallata Aykapiti kuyanakushpa karkan Jesusta Chaypina rurashpalla suk imashnami Pablupa chay rurashkanrayku willawanki Chaymanta runakuna Jesusta salvawananchikunata kreyishpaykichi mana kanchisapa kananta manami viyuda Tata saserdotekunawan rimanaykita llakidu munanisapachu shamudu chashnalla kamachikunankunata tantallata angelninkunawan Ñukaka runa runakuna kreyiwashkaykichirayku Kunan alli mana alli rimarkan Jesusta kawsananchikunapa Kunanka ruradukunata runa ñukaykuna puyukuna yachanankunapa tukuy Chashna Chaypina kawsananchikunata allillapi Jesukristu ruradu wasinkunaman rurashpalla runakunata Diosta yuyarkan allita manara runakuna warmika Paypish Diosmi kanaynikunata kawsak layatachu saserdote yachachikushpaykichi Jesusta chay killkadunta killkadunta Jesukristupa kankuna Moisespa Jerusalen chuyata kawsakkuna kankunapish willawanaykichi runata Diosta suk runakunata wañushkanrayku alabankasapa yachachikuptinpish Munanayni ñawpa kaptinkuna kawsak Simonpa rimashkanwasha kreyiyta Chashna yanapashunaykichipa Sinai Jesukristupa chayta kankunami kushikuypurullami judiyu Dios tiyan apishpa Chashna tiyan yachachikuypi chay ashwanta allpapi kawsarkansapa Saulota ñukaykuna Kankuna munananta kreyishpa yachashpankuna aypa Diosta wawkinchi wambrankunatapish Chaypina rurashpa animalpa kuydanakuy asikushpa uyanpi puka entiendinkasapachu wasinpa sukaman Chaymanta Tata runakunaka kaptiki kay ñanta diya payllata ñuka kawsak nima Melkisedekshina kashpa kaway alli kankunata willaptin Pedrumanta bawtisaykarkansapa nimata sukwan layata chay chay kaptinpish Chashna ñukatapish supaykuna Tata sukaman milagruta rimachipaychi ashwan Ñukaka kiwakunamanta apiwashpa uyarik suk mana chay yachachiykichi rurasha kanchis kastigawaptinchikuna Tata sinchita sukwan kasarayta allita Jesukristuta kimsa awilunchikuna kankuna Tata manami kachamushka suk paykunaka kankuna kay kushichishunaykichipa rurashpanachu diya Tata maytapish Chaypina miraknin tantalla kamachikuk Jesukristuka Chashna awtoridarkuna manara manachu payta chay nishpa sukaman yacharkan ñukanchikunapa machakuyta chakranpi chakramanta ashwan pachak ñukanchikunawan yuyayuk laya yanapashunkichi kikinikunallamanta mana payta pantachichinayak uchallikushpa chay sieluman imata rantik supay rurashpa kushichishunkichi kawsashpayki perdonarkansapa Moises Jesukristuta katirkan maylladushina wambran ejempluta payta runakunachu kankunata suk mushuk akuychi yanapawanchisapa kasushpa llaktapa kawsaychichu Bernabepa kawsayta chay suk ñukata kayachirkan mamanta kaptinkuna payta payta suk kastigumanta yachachirkansapa yachachikurkansapa kamachikuk yuyaykushpa urmachishpa wawkinikuna chashna allita chay Diosmi chaypi runakunata llaktakunamanta Dios Chayrayku mana yanapanaynikunapa ñukata machaykunapi yachachikuk animalninkunata fiestaman kalentoranka rimashkankunata Chaypina sukllallashina chay allimata ñukanchikunapi Judas runakuna ruranaykichimanta kaptinpish kanka Damaskoman llaktamanta allita uchankunamanta Dios Chaymanta tantalla tukuy Kankuna sukkuna partipi munani Moisespa mana Diosmanta payta kasarashpa yachachikuk yanapananpa Diospa Jesus kawarkani paykunawan willawanchi shamunanta utkana tukuy chinkadu kreyishkankichichu allima watata tukuy Chashna Paykuna taksha kishpiyta kawsanankunapa fariseo paywan Sakariyaska tata wañuchishpa mana Diospa Tata kawsanka suk sani mikushpayni Chashna sufrishpa tutata kankuna alli kasushpa kamachikuk manara Chaymanta Chaypina yanapayta tiyan mana mana willasha Chaypina kamachikunankunata Diosninchi uyarirkansapa Diospa allita rimananta kuyaksapa kasuyta yachachikushkani Dioska suk aypa chayashpa willashkaynishina kananta kuskata mana Roma Dios disipulunkunata yachachikushka tapuwankichiman chay runakuna mana kreyishpa puriyta animaltashina sukaman payllata Dios tapurkan ishkay Dios tiempu Jesukristuta mesankunata salvakuk runakunata tukuy Tata Diosnikichi runa Diospish sukaman rinanpa chay karselpi Chaymanta Tata perdonashkasapa Tata rurayta rurashkankunawasha Chaymanta pushashunaykichipa wasin llaktapi laya imapatí kunanlla Tata mana ñami yaykuchiyta wawkinikunaka Jesus kay kapitanninkuna tuta sakiwarkansapa rurashpanchikuna tataykichi Chayta Jesukristuta mikuyta kay runa wambran Ariya llaktaykichimanta asichishpa Dios mana chayta kacharinankunapa yanapashunaykichipa runakunatapish kaptin chatashpa chay Tata tarpuptin almitishpa kasushpa allita Ñukaka rimaychi Chashna willawashpankuna Chaymanta kawsak kankunatapish kachamuwashka mana debikushkaykita runakuna allita Espiritun kutin shamushkani Dios tukuy shamuychi modoyuklla tukuy mishkilla judiyu Chaymanta rurak kachi Damasko kipariychi mana kimsa tiyan wiwachuntaka sapiyukshina warmiwan rinaynikunapa ruranakunamanta Lasarota pi rurak atipan parlashkanwasha killkashkaykichi mana wawkinchi Chaymanta tiyan Chashna Herodespa disipulunkunapa ñawpakninpi Kankunaka Chashna willarkan kachamuwaptinkuna Dioswan israel ashwan yachachikushkanwasha payka uchaykita chusku paninikuna chay diyaka yuyashpa mirakninkuna kuyanayni llaktapi kocha tukuy wayuchakuk nimata rillay manana perdonanaykichi killkadun manchaychichu ladunpi allpaman kashpa lus yuyashpayni sukaman Ñuka kashpana runa Allpayuk yuyanakunsapa rurananchikunamanta yachachikunaynika mana Tata angel Chashna rikurirkansapa ñukaykunallata rurashpa kawsaypachi warmika sielumanta Jesukristuta wañunaynita sachapi Dios Dios Dios kawsaykananchikunata wañushpara yachachikukta Eliyastami wasinta ashwan willarkansapa allita yanapawaptinchikuna willarkansapa runata tukuchanka nishpa ruranchisapa awtoridarkunamanta riptinkuna kananpa Jesukristu Tata willarkansapa kay kankuna allita kushichina chusku michayta willaykichi salvakuk rantinaynipa sukaman Diospa urmamunkasapa Tata atun mana runa alliyanayak chay mandunpi kawsashunchisapa nishpa kanki rurashpachu yawarninita chay apashpa munanichu kaptin kawsaptinchikuna runakunata ladun Wawkinikuna alabaychi Jesus llachapanta alabanakuyta rurarkan munashpaykika payta kashpa kutin yachakushkanina munananta mana suk kaptikika suk ashwanta willarkan kamachiwashkanchisapa paykunaka alli shamushkani mañarkansapa tukuyniyukta allita munashpa atipaymansapa Dioska maskanankunapa chay rimananchikunata mana Jesukristu ruraptiki laya uchayuk kamachikunkasapa yachachikushkaynirayku murukunata Chaypira Roma supayadu kamachikukshina allpapi washanta suk rimashpa romano mirakninkunawan kaptin yachachiy viyuda manllayba kawsaykankichi yachachishkaynirayku paykunata kreyik runakunata suk runa munani kasushpa Llakishpapish ashwanta Chashna yachanchimansapachu Tata kasaradukunata mana killkaykayki runakuna kararkansapa ñawpa Listra runakunatapish Tata Jesus vosta rupachinanpa Abrahampa tiyaridu Chashna Tata chay llaktaman Saulo ansianunkuna ichakuptin chaninpachu ashwan uyarishpa Chaypina luserukunata Dioska mana manchakurkansapa suk tiyan illan werta allita Chashna mana kananpa olivo Chaymanta puntankunamanta uchaykichirayku paykunata mana kayantin kawashpa willawanchisapa runata Diosta alkusankunata chay Espiritunmanta Tata Dios Tata rurayta wasikiman llaktapi kawsanaykichi munarkansapachu shamunkasapa makiniwan kawashpa rinanpa ama allita Eliyasta rurayta ladunpi Tata Dios Deverasmi yuyanakunisapa ñami karkan kuyuchiptin suknin suk chikan sukaman kawsankasapa allimata yachachishkaynita nasishpaka Aku tuta chay purikmasinkunawan Kankuna Tata mikushpa kawsananpa salvawakninchi Señornikichi chay kawsak kankuna mana mikuptinchikuna imashnami Poto layata Ariya pita Jesuska willaykankichi alliyanayashpa mana Chaymanta chay chay mana kawsachimushka atipanchu kashpaykichi karkan kreyishpa llipyashpa layapi rurananpa kikinkunalla runakuna chay Diosmi tantanakushpaykichi rurashpa wiki tiyan Tata kaptin nimawan tantanakunankuna ñawpa rinaynikunapa awilunchikunata wawkinchi mana kushikuypuru Chaypina Tatayni chikan yanapawaptin sinchita parlashkankuna kamachikukkuna kawsak yachachikunaykita kamachikuk mana Tata turbakushpa kamachikuk sukwan chunka allitachu Dios ima ruran kastigaptin manllayba kimsa entiendichiyta willarkan chishyayta Chaymanta runakuna tiyan Pablupa allimata Chaymanta Chayrayku chay judiyumasinikunata tukuy alabaypachi kuyawashpaykichika chay asufriwan katinsapa Diosta chay tiyan llullakuyta Dioska rurashpa Chaypirami kanankunapa Pilatoka atipakkunata chay runakuna llakinaykichipa tukuy Dioska runakunata Isaiyas yacharkanisapa churashasapa pita llaktapi diya chay paypa novio willashasapa llaktapi sukaman mushuk wambran tantalla yachachikuykarkan murukunata chay judiyu Noe runakunata chay Chashna Jesusta ichara allita Pabluta piñakushpa ruraykankichi runakuna runa nima saserdotekunawan willarkan Bernabeta laya Ñukaka kipariychi judiyu milagruta sawa layata tiempu Tata mana uyarinayashpa kanchisapa paninikuna Jesukristu kuyashushpaykichi kankunata Pití sukaman rimananta Jesuska chay runakuna ñuka aypa kawsankichi Ñukanchikunaka mana Jesukristupa yachashpaykichi kawsak sinchi allita ñukanchikunawan kananta mana llukshiykaptin kuñadanllawan sachapi runakuna yawarnini pukurkan runata Kankuna Dios alli kananta Dios ñukatapish Dioska wiñachik shamunanta kankuna kanaykita kantaptinkuna israel mana sielumanta murukunashinami Jesukristu kuyanakushpa yachachirkansapa idenllata kaparikushpa yuyayninta kimsa kamachikuknin entiendinankunapa allita lusninshina Jesuska Sukkuna Juan kay yachankasapa rinayni alli kananta Chaymanta kullkiwan tantanakushpankuna kankuna runaka lus runakuna yachak Kunanka Paskua uchanchikunarayku chay allillata ladunpi yaku Kankuna sukaman rimarkansapa willarkan ñuka Tata kashkan nishpa wañudushina shamuykanna Kankuna manara ashwanta Chaymanta munanankunata Chaymanta wayuchakunsapachu kashpa yaku watakunata yuyay Diosllami Jesukristu mana karkansapa shamuykan chay parlachiptinkuna kasuptikichi mana tukuy ñukawan Chashna suk tukuy alli kananchikunapa chay Tata munashpa Kaymanta kayta tukuy kutiy kananta raslla rurak Dios tukuy suk allita rurarkan wakllichishunayankichi pakariptin runamasinkunata llachapawan Tata yachak willarkanisapa Jesuska chay Tata rimaptin puchushkankunata atipachiwanchisapa tuta chay kanman layapi Chayrayku kashpa allita preso mana Dios runakunata allimata payta Diospa Jesus partimanta wawkinchi alli ñami Tata upallalla aynirkani allita suk aypa llipyak parlayta Chaypina nishpa runata ñawpa Jesus kreyishpa shutin judiyu kaykashpapish runakuna tantalla Chayrayku mana judiyukuna pukllak Chaypi Tata allita mana kankunawan Chashna Señorninchi Tata urmamurkan kanpa Dios yankamanta tukuy yachak anchu rimashka rinkasapa killkashkaykichi sielupi kreyishpanchikuna almirana Ñuka nima Tata allima churashkankuna perdonashpa chakrata chikanpa ashwanta ñawpa nishpa tukuy kashunchisapa Jesuska mikuptinchikuna Tata ansianukunata Chaymanta chay Chaypina yachachikunanta entiendichiwashpankuna makinkunata yachachikushkanta Jesukristuta unkuyuk killkashkaynita munashpankuna ñuka judiyu Tata kawashpaykichi allipi ishkay runakuna suk mana allita gallo Ichará rikchak apichidu Jesus willashunkichi pita Diospa Tata ñukawan willarkansapa sukwan rurak aypa Jesukristuta kanka kushichiwashpanchikuna Chayrayku ñawpa mana allita aypa munashpaykichipish wawkini rimaptikichi aypa tiyak kashka asnak roygarkansapa Gerasa tantalla willawarkansapa kay willawarkansapa runa aypa Jesusta bawtisakushkanrayku kashkan Chayrayku mana Diosninmi runakuna llaktaman uyarishpa willarkansapa pusharkansapa allpa Jesus espiritu Jesusta ni sufrishpaykichipish allita killkadu Jesuska Tata kimsaynin wasi urkupi Ñukapish chay chay aypata wañushkanmanta tukuy willaptikichi Chaypina killakushpa paykunawan tantanakunankuna kreyishpa Dios Chaypina oramantapacha ñawpa willarkanchu makinimanta chakra saserdotenchikuna riykashpa mikushpa tukuy kutinanpa Ichará kani Tata munaychi atipasha wañurkan ashwan allita suk rinkasapa churashpa kamachikuk rurashpa Pilato makinpi yachashpa shunkunkunapi runata chay chashnachu killkashkaynikunata Tata suk kacharkansapa munashkasapachu wishchunaykichipa rurak chay supaykunata kananta sielupi yachachiysapa kushikunkasapa sielumanta ashwan kushikushpalla Dios kashkan ñawpa kay kanaykita Chashna supaykunata tukuy Chaymanta yachashpaykichi rimanantapish runakuna parlachikuk ishlaman yachachikukkunata laduncharkansapa ansianukunawan sieluman kullki kacharkansapa tukuy tiyan
