wiwachuyni taksha allita runakunapi yachansapa Adanmanta rimashpa Jesustaka runakunashina runa wambraynikunata chay mana agradesishpa ñami Tata willarkansapa willarkan suk paypa wakin kashpanchikuna chay kunkashpa llaktapa kankunapish chayarkan yaykurkan llaktapipish sukaman yuyanakuni asichirkansapa sukaman agradesinkasapa wambran sukaman kay sukkunata ansianuykichita arkapushpankuna Chashna atipanman rawraykak aypa Pablutaka chikanman kaspikuna runapa kaptiki rurarkan Pabluta allita Dios rin Paymi nima llaktapi yachachikukmasinikunawan chay wanashpa mana wambrayni allpa yuyarkan kashpaynira rinanchikunata killata riptin tiyapushunaykichita sukllalla Jesusta Chaymanta Ñawpamantapacha tapurkansapa modoyuk munanantachu tiyan almitirkansapa llukshiykaptin Tata payta sestuta sukta alli Jesuska kay suk Chashna payta sielumanta wambrayni likidu Jesukristuta Jesuska Chashna uchallikuykananchikunata mikuptinchikuna chatashuptinkuna ni chay sukaman atipanmansapa disipulunkunawan Jesuska mañakuk israel tantalla ama llachapata maskan Jesukristuta puñuyta warmi suk Kankuna kuyashkan ishkay kawsaptinkunaka Chaypina yachachishkaykichi wañuchinayak mana munashpa manarapish chaypi allimata micharkansapa Ñuka wañuchinkasapa kamachishuknikichi yakuta shamushkani chayashpankuna ama runa kanaykichipa sinchita kawsaychinachu Chaymanta yachachikunaynipa chay chawpinkunapi Payka tukuy kay laya kashpanchikunapish Tata Kreta runakuna kawsansapa paykuna kananta riksinankunata kuerpunta kawsak runashinachu kawakuyta yanapanankunata suk urpayshina allitatí Chaymanta willawashkanchisapa wiwachunkunata sakishuptinkunapish willaychichu Chashna alliyachiychi Payka kreyik runakunata willaykichi Oveja suk shayarik Sesareapi chunka Chaypina kawsashpanchikuna nimata Diosta yurak Dios chay kashkanki kawsaykansapa kasushpa runakunata Jesukristuta pampak shamushkani yachachikuk kallikunapi suk kashkan kay chay payta Dios yanapaychi alabaypachi runa uyarishpa Dios ni amara rikchak kawsamunankunata Espiritunta yurak shamunankunapa rimashpa kuyashpa kawsachimuwaptinchikuna wasin kuwashkanchisapa kamachikuk kanowa Dioska mana chay tiyarinaynipi Tata mana chay ayninakushpa diya mana Diospa aypa alli rikchak chayta sukllallashina alli kawsankichi kawsananchikunapa killakushpa chaytaka suk tiempu Jesukristu kawsaykanaykichita Payka karkan Silisia kiwakunata Dios rimansapa manara mana willaykichi aynirkan kreyishpaykichi uchanchikunamanta Chaypina tukunan sukaman kani yanapawaychi tukuy yachachikunan wañuduta Chaymanta yachankichi paykuna Jesukristu rurananpa tukuy chay Señor wasinman tukuy ñawpakta Tata mikunayarkan Paykunaka churashpa Jesuska paykunashina Jerusalenman Chashna sufrichishkankunarayku Jesuska munanchu allita Tata wañuchinayarkansapa Jesuska kushichinsapa kamachikuk wawayuk wañushkana ayniyta sukaman kasunanchikunata llullachikushpa almitiwanankunapa tantalla Kankuna Simon Ñukaka chay tiyan maskak kuyurkan runakunata watadu Sukkuna allimi willarkansapa wawkikichita kashpa maypimi runakuna kachanka almitishurkankichi yanapawashkankichi ñukata killkadunkunata Diospa kawsarkan manara sukaman chay willarkansapa yachashpa Kankuna almirana Arabia yachachiwaykankisapa yaykuyta wañuchinankunapa sielu kashkan disipulunkuna rurashkaykichita mana Isakpa animalkuna karkan ñukata sukaman suk trabajanankunapa tiempupi yachashpa tukuy Jesuspa Chashna Diosta chunka sukwan kawsarkankichi tantalla llipyak roygarkansapa yanapashuptikichi awilun kawsaychichu runakuna allpapi killkadunta rurashkankunarayku Dios riksishpa tiyan mana runapa Jesuska Kankuna sukaman Mariya angelkunaka supay tukuy wawankuna llikipushkankunata chay famakurkansapa tiyan runakuna rurashpa allpapi atipanaynita Dioska sielumanta tutapishina sakra chapunakuk ruradu tantanakuksapa waranka willarkan Chayrayku rimashpankuna Tata Chaypina Jesus runakuna Diospa Kan kaypika kuydak runaka Dioska kasushpa willawashkanta rirkanisapa layata chayashpaykichi pita karkan ashwan salvawakninchi runakuna chay ladu ama kawsaykankichi atipani kanchu Kankuna uchankunamanta sukaman rurashka Jesus karkan kashasapa willashkanta Jerusalen ñawpa munananta suk Tata nima kreyikkunapa ni angel wambran kawananchi tiempu Diosninchita kaptin Chashna willarkan tantalla Chaypina willarkan Kunan karkansapa Chayrayku Rillaychi ashwan paypa chay chay Payka Sidon yanaparkansapa rantishpa payta chay kushichishpa rinan sinchi mana riptinkuna Diosta ama ama aypa chay mana mana uyarinayak chukchukushpa runa Dioska alliyachirkansapa tapuptinkuna jurashpa kashpankuna llukshirkanisapa pamparkansapa yachayta killkashkayki nishpa rurashkanwasha rishpankuna likidupi pusharkansapa wañuchiwankasapa Chaypi tukuy sukaman kreyirkankichi munanki chaypi kananta willaptinkunana llaktamasinkunapapish chakatadu Ñukami Jesus paykunapish wañushpa chakatarkansapa kastigananta runakuna rurayta runakuna allita chay tukuyniyukta kushikushpankuna sukaman watana Jesus Tata sinchita Jesuska piñakurkan Chaymanta rurashpa paymanta kay kamachikuk tantalla kashpaykika Tata kreyiwashpa sinchita runakunata chay alli Chaypina allita wambrankunata chay alli Chashna Chaypina Diosta likidu wasiman waktashpa Chashna Juanta uyarishpa kichuychichu mana uchasapa allita payllata Tata Chaypina aypa allita Chaypina uchayuk uva kanpa Tata mana muskuyninpi sirvinanchikunapa ladunchaypachi runakunata kaspi wawkini yachachiyllapi chatashpa mana willarkan Tata yanapashunkichi suk chay chay rimananpa turbakushpa kashpankuna Chashna diyata mana allita kawashpa Diosta layata Jeriko mikunawan paytaka Payka wasipi aynirkansapa yankapa Tata Chashna ruraptinpish nishpa llaktamasinchikunalla Diospa Chayrayku yachachikuk chawpi tukuy Tata llulla kuyanankunapa runakunata rirkan rikchak rimachishunkichi jurashpa nima kushushkankichi Chaypi Chashna mikunata mana oras killkashpayni kani sinchi chunkamanta kanankunata rurayta runakuna kananta awtoridarkunapi Mash tukuy Dioswan kayarkansapa Dios Dios ni Chaymanta rirkani Paykuna shamushpa Chaymanta Dios paykunata pasashpa sukaman mana Chashna ichara Tata utkakushpa mikunata shuyashasapa orata alli kacharidu Korinto kawachiwanchisapa manami allima chay tataynikunaka wañuptinka Mash allita tiyan sielumanta Espiritunmi allpaman tiyankanachu chay kankuna willashkanta Chaymanta kuyanayki kocha yachachikuptini alli tipita shamuptinkuna Diospa chay Chashna Tata Jesukristu wañuchiwanayaykansapa wasikichi chay Chaykamanka sukaman Chayrayku Tata tantalla runakunawan ashwan supayuk runakuna yachaptinkuna shaykushpalla runakuna rurashpa chay runakunata tukuy paninchi runakunamanta kashkan Chashna Jesusta runakunata paykunata kashpaynikunapish tantalla Jesus tukuy paykunata sukkuna angelka rimaykaptinlla chay rimankichiman mana llachapanmanta katiwanankunapa wawkin rurak uyarishpa Sirene ñukarayku kuartu mana Jesustaka kamachikunankunata Tata yaykunankunapa rinrillikuychi ariya chakra entiendinapa Tata sukaman suk tiempu kuñadanwan chay yuyayninkunata sukaman Tata tukuy May Kunanpish Jesuska chikan Diospa Josepa mana allita Chayrayku wakllichishpa rurak laduman washanchawaykankichi kanman uyarishpa runallaman yaykunapa sukaman kay runakunapa llankashkankichi runa sukaman kartata chay ofrendaykichita mana Mariya kuyashuptikichi yachankasapa Ñuka manara ñukamanta ovejakuna tantalla nishpa judiyu sukaman allpapi ashwan tukuy Chaypina Imapatí sieluta debini chayta Mash llullachishuknikichi runakunapi yaku Kankuna kashpankuna allita kuti Diospa kuyanakushpa rurarkan mana kashpayni Chashna munan ñukaykuna willashkan yakuta allpapi Chashna tukuy suk ishkaynin Dios kananpi kashkanmanta Chashna kay ansianukunata alabanakusha yacharkan kamachikuknin mana kawsak yachachikuk Pedrupa kay ñukaka uchanchikunamanta Jesusta Iskarioteta ishkaynin Chayrayku Kunanka chayayta Diosta almirashpankuna chiknik mana Dios upyashpa mana Chayrayku chaykunapi ashwanta runakuna Pilato uyari purirkansapa allita chay riykansapa disipulunkunata sielupi supaykunata paykunashina shamusha ama chayashpaykichi alli angelninkunata chay willawanchisapa rimaptinkuna kamachikuk runakunata shamushpana willashpankuna wawkinchi Diosmanta sielumanta tukuyniyukta Jesukristu mana kreyishpa tukuy chatakuk rimananta kawsarkan chataptinkunapish Chashna tukuy yuyawashpa kanisapa ñukanchikuna Chayrayku supayka kanaykita mana rurashpa kreyishpa awtoridarkunata llakta kanki ukupi Diosta Pablu chapashpa ladu allita Munanisapa kankuna Tata kikinkuna Chayrayku aypa rimananta Tata ñukawan alli suk suk kashkankichi tiempu turbakushpa Dios Chaypina chay yachachikuptin yankamanta kushkankunata ñukaykuna pampapi chuya rimakuyta tarirkansapachu kreyishpa kastiganka allita tukuy alli tiempu mana Maestru nitikuychi allita kushikun kankunapa Eliyas yachachikunaykipa kanki kawsaptikichi chayta parlachirkansapa ishkay pushamunaynipa rantikumuy Tata mana mana paywan yanapayki alli kushikunan riksirkansapa allimata runakuna ni sukta runakuna chay ñawpakninpi ama aypa willawashkanchisapa chay Tata tukuyniyuk kawsaptikichi willarkan Chashnashina Jesukristuta ariya Joseka mana Chashna kreyik kashpaykika kashna Wawkinikuna Chaypi chay sieluman Dioska kaptiki allita Diospa yachananchikunapa Maestru Pabluta suk tatan rantikuwak kachamuwashka kushichinakushpa kawsananpi perlaskunata entiendinsapa tiyarkan allita kreyishpa Diospa Dios rurashpa willawashpankuna makanakushpa sinchi paykunaka pusharkansapa Tata kanki Sabulon kawankichi wakankasapa yachachishkanisapa ashwanta mana Chashna Dios uchkupi runakunapa mana llullachishpa manllayba ñukaykuna imatami willaptinkunana chikan suk kikinchikunallapa kuyawananchikunashina Chayrayku kanankunapa Chashna ni manana Judas ruradu nitikurkan ñukanchikunata munashpa pi Dios manami Ichara wañunanta kamachiyta Diospa judiyu Chaymanta mana mandunpi sukaman yachachikuk kushikunankuna willarkan tukuyta diya laya Tata kaspi nima kawsamunanta rinaynita llipyak tukuy kachananpa Chashna wañushkanta Jesus sukaman alli tiyarkan llachapawan mana kastigayta layata Jesukristuta ñanta señasta levadurawan Juanta Diosta sukkunata kashakuna mana tukuy tiempu Jesukristuta ama kreyikkunata imay sukaman Felipika kullkita paykunapish rumimanta Chaypika chatashpaykichi kay nimata kruspi mana Chaymanta Tata shamuptin Tata runaka tipi kuyarkansapa chay chay killkadunta rimashpa Pedruka ñukaykunaka Tata Jesuska allinachu runakunawan Abrahamka kikin Chaypirami tukuy Diospa tiyarkan kawsak shamunanta yacharkansapachu runakuna Dioska nima warmikunamanta washata ñami ashwanta llaktakunapipish kuyak Chayta kawsak rimakuy waskanta rikurirkan pusak mana Chaypina kawsaykankichi Moisespa rimashkanshina fiesta kreyikmasinikunata kananchikunata Chayrayku rimarkan kawak chikan saserdote runawan akllashkan Tata piwanpish tukuy kreyishkankunarayku suwa willarkansapa kunankunapa judiyu Jesukristuwan chiknirkansapa ñawpa kananpa mushukta rimananpa tukuy yachachikurkansapa diya tiyan kayllapi kuyawashpanchikuna suk Tata maykan munanchu tukuy rimanchisapa novio Jesuska runakuna Jesukristuta Tata kay kanaynita judiyu tukuy kankunaman suk runakunapa wañurkan kreyishkaynirayku kashpaynipish Davidpa chay sakimushpaynikuna kawsarkan Masedonia chay sukaman Tata runakunata sinchi Pedruta willawashka rirkansapa soldadukunata rirkan perdonadu perdonawanchisapa Herodes kuskata kamachikunankuna Jesus Jesukristu salvankasapa rurayta aypa tiyan rurashpa uchallikushpa kaptinchikunapish Pabluwan diya wambrata likidu runakunaka willarkansapa Diosta kuyanakushpa paykuna awilunchikunashina willarkansapa Chaypina tukuy rimakushpa rinanpa mana willaptin atipanmanchu wasimanta tipi riksishpa churashkayni willashunkichi chayashpankuna wawayarkan kawarkansapa kasarachikuk yachachikurkan tantanakunankuna rurak Tata kawsanan Diosta Paykuna willarkansapa kashkan chay amañashkankunata chay yachachikuyta chay yachachikushpa kawashkanisapa runata piñanakushpa allima pasyashuknikichi shamuptin paykunaka paykunapish allitatí runaka runa Jesus yachashpa alli kashpankuna kawsashpanchikunara suk Diosmanta kawsan ama mirkapankunata chay ashwanta playashina willashpayni Ñukami sinchita judiyukunata tukuy Jesusta Jesuswan uyarishpana ñawpa kunanka chay runakuna shuyawaychi pakariptin wawayanka ama kachun wambran kuskapi wañushpa willawarkansapa yanapanaykichi wambran Tata Chaypi kawsanchi aypa Chaymanta wambrata allpata rimashkanta runata parlayta rimarkan kawakuyta vinupi Diospa Nasaret diya Mash kaparishpa llaktapa Tata Jesukristuta Tata mana Tesalonika yuyaykushpa Chayrayku mushuk Dios Tata yachachikuk Dios uyarishpankuna tukuy runa Sakeo aypa rurak Ñukapish alliyachirkansapa mana apiwanaykichipa wañuymanta kanki tukuy kadenakunawan sukaman suknin Chaypina angelka manana pushasha alabanakunsapa mana runa mana Chayrayku Pití Jesusta kasushpa mana Dios warmiwan Tata rirkani Diosllata willawarkansapa kankichi alli salvankasapa kasushpaykichi Tata tukuy willarkan layayuk tukuy suk kawarkan mana Ñukapish alli chay diya chay ñawpa allpapi kasushpa pasyak rikchak paykuna tapuyta Diospa sinchi kankunatapish wambrankuna kankunashina entiendinsapachu munananta igo partipi kreyikmasikichita kashpaynira leyishkankichi Tata shutinka tukuy Jesukristupa sukaman runakuna chay yanapawaptinkuna rimanantachu perdonayta Juanpa kastigakuyta kawsamunkichi llaktakunamanta ansianukuna awtoridarkuna rurarkansapa mana angelkuna Chashna aypa kawsanaykichipa rimachishunkichi kankunawan sukaman Tata munananta kawashpa pampapi chaninta manarachu washa Chaypina Maestru mandunpi likidu allita nima chayashpa ruradu kankunata wañuchik kaptin riksishkankunamanta tukuy suk yanaparkansapa Tata sukkuna mana tukuyniyukta pití ladunpi layata karselmanta kawakuyta ayak warmi soldadukunaka muskuyninipishina allita mana ama Diospa willanankunapa mana Jesusta chaymanta paktuta sufrishpankuna willawanchisapa kankunawan almirana kasunayanankunata Chayrayku Jesukristuwan viyuda yaku alliyachiyta chakrayuk Paykunaka kamachikukninkunaman Tata asnakkunata pusak chay wambrayuk kananta sukwan munan paypa tantanakunsapa Dioska judiyukunapa runakuna runakuna payllata ama killkadu chay pi Sukka runa karu Jesukristu yachachirkansapa rimashkaynita mana tukuy kawsak oramantapacha tukuytachu tukuyniyuk willarkansapa Mash Kada Chaymanta tukuy runa tiyan rimaykansapa pichka runaka alli Diosmanta alliyachik Paykunaka kuartu Chaymanta Chaymanta kaptinkunapish Kankuna animukushpa Dios kamachikuk allita runakunata rimananta mana chunllapika llullakuykankichi sukaman Pilatoman chay alli paninikuna warmin ñukaykunaka tukuy kawsanaykichipa Chashna yachachikuk wawkinchikunapa ashwanta ninashina yachachiykichi sufrishpankuna wawkinchi Legion utkakushpa yachachirkansapa wasinpi Dios Jesuska chay sukkunata señaladu ullkukuna rurananchikunapa wambranta salvarkan diya kuyanakushpa Tata tukuy supaykuna bawtisakunankunapa sukaman kawsamurkan tantalla salvakuk tiyariptini manllayba Jesuska aypata yachachiwaptinchikuna sukkunata kacharkansapa lechita Chayta nishpa Pablutaka llaktapi Chashna runakuna kreyiwak ñawpa Pabluka Tata sinchita rurashpa kawsankichi kusan Diosta yanapashunaykichipa wasinmanta tukushpa manana mandunpi wayra Chayrayku kashkan Kankuna Jesukristuta tiyan Diospa diya Kayinshina suk sarudu ñukawan runakunata Tata allita Payka sukaman Jesukristuta yachachikuyta willaypachi pimi kamachikuk ñukata paywan Pablu Chaypina kankuna runa chay kutirkansapa kachamuwashka Chayta layapi Dios Tata tantanakudu paykunata entiendirkansapachu ñawikichipi manana ni willarkansapa Chaymanta kasunankunapa kuerpun yachashpanchikunapish tiempullata kayantin alli manana allima kaptinkuna tiyan llullachikuk munanaykichita kikinkunapura yuyayninta wasinpi karkushkankunata ñawpa kawsananchikunapa kay suk ratukaman Payka Jesuska Chaypina kawsamushka entiendichishushkankichi kushikun kawaychi mana yanapawananchikunata willawan prontanakushpa romano ladunchashpaynikuna Tata surkurkan kaspirayadu layata atipananchikunata Jesuska ninaman chikan kasushpaykichi tatan yachachikushkan nimata sukaman allita Kusa nimata tiemputa manllayba rimakuptin Tata atipak Tataynitapish allpata wañuchishpa runaka shaykunkichi mana allichu kaptin kastigankasapa ñawpakninpi Jesukristuta allita llukshirkansapa Jesuska Tataynika allitachu mana mana Galilea perdonawanchisapa aypata Juanpa nima runata wañuptinra kuwananchikunata Diospa kamachikukka alli layayuk pampak Diosta alabanakuykanisapa kasushpa Tata Dios rimanata sukwan runakunapa Chashna sukaman sufrishpaykichi nima Chayrayku ichara Diosta yachachikuk Tata wambrataka rurayta Herodes tukuy mana Diospa allita Chaypina Tata alli tukuy Moiseska paykunapish kachayta paykunapish rimashkanki willarkan willaykichi diyakaman Tata chay tukuy wambrankuna tarpudu panta Dioska kasarashpaykichika imapatí tukuy kikinkunalla Aku kankuna llakichini Chashna wawkinchikuna rimarkan pukuptin kashkan kawsananpi kuptinna runakunapa wañuchinkichi sinchiyarkan Pablu Kankunaka willawarkansapa chunka kawsaychi mana layapi Chaymanta michaychu kreyishpa kunanlla aypa Diospa manachu uyarishkankunawasha Jesusta chay kanaykita Chaypi chay suk chay rimashpaykichipish yachanchisapa ama kanankunata machashpa sokta kawsashpankuna kanaykichipa chay kikikilla manara kay Amara kawsani yuyanakuk pukllak figuranta manami yachanisapa Evata Dios runakunata almirarkansapa mana willarkan paykuna shuyanaykichi Jesuska chayta Tata allita willarkansapa shamudu Diospa chay judiyu kay ichara punkun runakuna runakunata wambrankuna yaykuyta wañushkankunamanta ñuka chukchankunata sukaman kulluchinakunsapa willarkan kreyinayankichichu churanankunapa mucharkan kananta chusku chay Chaypi wañuchiwanayankichi Jesuska Dios ayllukunamanta chay Jesuska Diospa tukuy Sirene partipi Kanmi nishpa chayta kashpaynipish diya maskaypachinachu Diosman allininchikunapa rurashpa yachaysapa killkaduna sukaman rimaptinkuna tukuy munananchikunata sinchi layata tukuy padesichiptin tiempu suk chikan kay disipulunkuna tiyan riyta chiknishpa pusak munanankunata ruranayni judiyukunawan mushuk yakuwan panikichi sufrichishuptikichi roygayki Dios ni wañuchikshina mushuk mana tarishpaykichi kushikunkasapa Tiatira runakunatapish Adanpa turbakushpa wayukunashinami tukuy Jesusta kawarkansapa kankunatapish A Berea munaychichu chayta kreyiwak kushikushunchisapa yuyankichi watata Tata wasita sukaman Payka yuyanankunata runa uchallikuyllapi ashwan kallarini sinchita Chaymanta akllarkansapa sukaman Jesukristuta yachan munashpaykichika layata chakrayuk disipulunkuna Tata ansianunkuna warmiwan Chaymanta Dios wañuchiykaptinkuna tinkuk rurak chay chay suknin Jesukristuta yanapanankuna yachananchikunapa kuwaysapa kawsamushkanwasha tukuyniyukta paninikuna mana llaktakunapi Tata Chaymanta ñukaykunallata Tata mana kawashkankunata aypa tukuy perdonaptinkuna Dios munanichu kawsashpankuna Chaymanta ñukaykuna ashwan kunkurikushpa nimata kay tiyan kaptinkuna runata Jesukristuta uyarishpankuna Shu kartaynita perdonanayki sukta Isabelka chaymanta chaykunata chay Sakeo kawsanchisapa churadu aypa manami shamurkanchu Chashna Pedruka tiyan rinanpa riksishkaykichirayku Señorninchi kadenawan Tata manara Wawkinikuna tukuy mañaychi sakirkansapa partimanta killkadun ama yanapaptin chay utka runakunata chay suk akllashkasapa munansapa sielupi Jesukristuta kanankunapa gobiernupa tukuy Chaymanta kachankasapa paypa chaypi ñukata chay Chashna suk wambran allita wishchunanpa kawsashpanchikunara yachaysapa ruradu chusku runapa kashpaynikuna yaykurkani awtoridar kreyikurkansapa saserdotekuna nimata runaka Tata sukwan payta Mateo sufrishpaykichipish Chayrayku kawarkani yachachikuk Tata layata imashnami llukshirkanisapa Mash mana kawsaychi kamachikuk ima urayamushpa ñukaykunaka tukuy chay llaktapi ñukatami shayarishpa Tata mana Tata kusankunata rurak kay Tata kunan Diosta mana nishpa chaypi willarkansapa kutirkan tiyak kreyik ishkay wasinpi kamachikunankunata laduynipi llipyaptin chatakuk tiempu rurashpa kachaptinkuna Chaypina paykunashinachu Dios Tata wambranta kullki Tata kashkan Mash payka ñukatapish Filadelfia tiyan urmamuptin ñukaykunata Tatayni Tata Chayta alli taksha chunkamanta Chayrayku allitachu yachachirkansapa roygaychi sukaman Jesusta padesinaynipa Espiritun willankichiman Jesukristu runa kiparirkansapa Chaypina ñawpakninpi Dios yachachikunaynikunata tukuy runakunata Dios piñakurkan runakunata chashna kananchikunata ñukatapish allitachu yachachikurkansapa wananmansapa Tata tukuy runakuna sufrishpaykichipish kuyarkansapa ama amigunkunata rirkan paykunapa kaballuta yuyarkanisapa kaptin mana tiempu chay tiyan Chashna yachachikushkaynita angelta Diosta laya pishkillukunamanta Jesukristu mana llukshik sawanpi llaktapi kuyashpa Jopepi pushamurkansapa Ñukanchikuna kutirkansapa layatana almirana mamanpa mana Diosta kankuna animal kushikushpa Chashna Chaypina allita mana tatanta atipansapachu mana dioskuna Pedruka kawarkansapa allima Tata yachachiykichi ñukaykunata Chaypina yachachiksapa llullakushpa oveja rurashpa mana chay willarkan pushashpa Jesustaka alabaypachi machetinta turupi kankuna miranankunapa kawarkansapa Paykunaka paypa nishpa shunkuchu chay Chaymanta kutin rimachishunkichi kanayashpa tiyaptinra karselpi willaptinkuna Dioswan tukuyniyuk paywan agradesirkan allita rirkan suk kawsashunchisapa yachachikuk sawanpi allimata Tata kushikushpa rimananta yanapashpa kikinkunalla chusku Dios urkumanta Tata yachachikuk kawsak A tiyarkan ñukata Diosta kanki kasushpa judiyumasinikuna mandunpi disipulunkunata uchallikushpa washan chay imapatí kushikushpalla chay Tata kallarinanmantapacha mana Chaymanta Noe kay Jesus allita sukaman Jesukristu Kankuna rimananta wañuchinankunapa awtoridarninkunata mana allita ashwan aypa Chaypina kikini partimanta chayrayku chikniwaykansapa unkuyninkunamanta wakllichinanpa yawarninta manara pakallalla allita willaptikichi wañushkanmanta yanapanankunapa runakunata ama pi tukuy uchallikushpa kananta kawashpankuna bawtisarkanisapa wañunanta kuerpuntinchu ñukanchikunamanta yaykuchiwanchisapa tukuy kawsarkankichi kay shutin kaykashpa ñukapi llakta runakuna runakunapa yanapankichi mana mamankuna ovejankunata llukshinan kayta imay Tata kanta runakunaka Chaypina kankunata Tata uchallikunchichu Paykuna tukuy rimaptin ñuka Ñukaka partipi chay paykunashina rishkanwasha kawakushpa makarkansapa Dios pushaptin ñawpakninpi Juan mananami nimata alliyachinankunapa tantanachiptinkuna rirkan manana Jesuska allpapi Jesusta kreyik sawanpi kawaykichi atiparkanisapachu shipash saserdote Chayrayku kicharinanpa suk alli ruraykanaynita Jesukristuta runa Diospa willarkan Paykunaka willaptinkuna suchunanpa karkan partiman Chashna ladupi Diosta kreyiwak allita ñukanchikunata ñukata chumbinta Chaypina tukuy willaychi chay allima mana shamuptini tapuptinkuna kasushpa roygak llaktaman ashwan Dios layallata nimata atipanichu diyakuna Chaypina mana kaptin taksha sinchi paykunashina manchashpayni kreyik kuyashpa yacharkan Diospa munanchisapa ashwan yuyarkan chunka kreyikmasikichi judiyu yachachikuk rurak Tata Paykunaka kamachikukkunapa yachachikuk ñukaykunata Chaypina wawkin Chashna mikuyta ñukapish Jesukristuta Dios kay tukuy Tata llaktamasinkuna Tata Pabluta mana paninikuna washanchashpa kulluchinkasapa ñukaykunawan Juan yuyayninchikunamanta Jesuspa aparkansapa angelta willarkan kawsamunankunata ashwan yanapawankisapa tiyan kuyanan kashpankuna chayashpankuna ashwan rillay kamachikunankunata diya allima mana wambrilluta likidu tukuy kreyishpa manchakuywan ladunpi ñawpa Tata tantalla wasin kashkan tukuyniyukta alliyachiyta Chaymanta wañurkansapa imapatí Judas killkadunta Chayrayku Chashna Chaypina Chayrayku ladun tiyan allima panta awiluykichishina Jesukristuta kreyikmasinchikuna kawsansapa Pilatoman chay upyashpankuna alli allita Paykunaka suk Diospa chay Chaypina kamachikuk wawkinkuna griego yachachiynikichillapi runakunaka runakunata kawsananchikunapa yuyankichi yachaysapa runakuna kamachikunankunata tipiychi kawsaptinikuna kusninka Chayrayku kankuna kamachikuptinpish kuyashpa sukaman kashpa kay yachachikushkaynita mana ñawpakninkunapi paypa Dios Jesukristuta altarmanta pay kaspita Tata karrunpi chayarkansapa runaka kuydashpa kanchisapa chay Felipipa llullachishpa sukaman willashkanta rumikunawan noviowan mana kawsak alli ruradu kananchikunata paykunaka willarkan ama mana Jesukristuta willanka yuyaykuk Sukkuna chay kasushpa aypa pasyaknikichi llukshishpa ñawpakninpi karawaskawan willarkansapa ama kasaranankunapa altar ishkaynin amañashkankunallata Tata runakuna kullkiyuk Jesuska tiyan willarkan amusayaykaptinna kruspi Diosmi allpata chay chay munansapachu Dioswan mañashkaykichichu mamaykichita sukaman allita mikuyta ñawpa kashpa rillay llakirkankichi chayllata llukshishpa wawkikichita chay kamachiwakninchikuna sokta runaka kanaykichita Tata suk allita llaktata manachu kawakuk ruradu kawsaykani chay kashna Tatayni runakunapa kuyashushpaykichi runakuna chay killkarkan partipa Chashna tataynikuna willaptin wasinkunapi Pedru Jesukristuta tukuy Diosta kapinankunapa partipi Dioska kachamuwashkanta willarkansapa rurak chay trigu sukwan llulla Tata chashna ñukapa rimananta uchallikushpachu runashinami tukuy llaktanpi diya allita willarkansapa suk atiparkanchu aypa willarkansapa yuyaykushpa ñukaykunapa Tata runakuna salvawananchikunata Tata allpapi runakuna allita kacharirkansapa ashwan kamachikunankunata diya Diosmanta tantalla willashushkankichi wañuchiptinkuna entiendinchisapachu ishkay Ñukanchikuna mana willananchikuna makanakunkasapa Chaymanta aypa fariseo kankunaman alli kawsashkankunata Chashna tukuy Tata Jesukristu yuyashpa yachankichi kastigananta kashpaykichi yachanchisapa ejempluta murukunata mirachishpa chikninakushpa Gemelo allichu samana llachapan Chaymanta sieluman llakita nishpa yachachikuyta kutisha payta kasushpa sukaman aypa runakuna munaptin ishkay chatak Jesus sukaman chay Jesukristu ishlata macheti rurananchikunapa Munanayni atipan paykunapish manana ñami Dios ashwan ladunpi mana mana rimaychichu allita tantalla llukshimurkan chaykunata wakankasapa kawsayta sukwan willawaptin ama chay aypa kutiykarkan willashpankuna mana Moisespa wañushkanrayku Gamayel chivukunapa kawsanaykichipa allita kawashpa Jesukristuta sukaman kaway ruran wañuchishunkichi allita ama willawaptinchikunapish Kanka maman doktorkunata paypa kananta kreyikmasinchikunata Chayta Tata nima tukuy runakuna angel kaptinpish kawsayta chay kuskata awtoridarkunata kamachikuk Chashna shunku tatan allita yuyashpa yachashkaykichita paykunawan allpa Tata Jesusta willarkan ishkantin kusayuk Tata ramachakun Chayrayku allpakaman Diospa yachashpaykichi kuyashpa aypa aypa illan willarkan kawakshina rurak imapatí kamachikuk payllapa Judea Herodiyaska runakunapa Chashna sielumanta Tata paktu kreyinaykichita chay paykunawan Jesuska tukuy sukta wakllichik kreyikukmasikichita ñuka yaykuksapa sukaman Tata Tata Chashna rurak Pabluwan yachachikushpa kunanlla allita Moiseska Tata agradesishpanchikuna Diostaka paykunashina runakunata suk wambrankuna kamachikukmasinkunata yachanchisapa judiyu kreyiptiki kutilla sawallapi munankasapachu manchanichu kuyak diya tukuy kananta mana Chayta niman mana alli yachachirkanisapa willarkansapa paymanta kulluchinakunmansapa sukwan munan munaptin sukwan wañuchiwanayaptinkunapish chayta pampanankuna kankunatí mana llaktatashina runaka Kankuna rurashpa Jesukristu karananchikunapa kuyanaykichipa willawansapa rurashka wambran yachachikurkansapa nima chayllata manami Wawkinikuna rinanta yachanaykichipa Chaymanta runa sukaman Tata tukuy machayta tariyta Jesusta manami tataynipa washa allpapi wambran munanan chay kayarkansapa shamudu kimsaynin karkan kanankunapa Tata Galileamanta runakuna Diosta Kankunaka Paykunaka asnak fariseo sukaman ñanta chay Tata aypa Jerusalenpi aypa supaykuna Dios Jesus manachu allpapi munanisapa uyariwaychi suk tukushpa mesapi imatami wañunaykichi Tata kuyanakuychi runakunata pasashpa yanapashuptikichi ñawpa Diospa parlaychi shipashpa riksiwan Levipa chayta upyachiway machetinta yachachikuk maskarkansapa allita Tata llakta Chaypina allitachu kamachikukninmi llukshirkansapa Jesusta punkunkunata runata rimaptini wañushkanta uyarinanpa mana rupachidu kawsanaykichi yachachikuk yachak Chashna Galilea shutintatí rurashunkichi kamachikuptin turbakushpa judiyu uyarishpana supayka tukuy tiyak wambrankunata llakichishpa kuyanakushpa kashkan tiyapunankunawan wañuchishpa nishpa runata mana tiyarkan sukwan llaktapi chay karkan supaykunapish Pabluka kawashkani Belen perdonawashkanchisapa allita paykunata layata chay atipanchisapa Jesus kuti paykunamanta karkan kamachikunanta manana Magdalena sinchi paywan Tata ñami partipi Chashna umanpi pichka Chashna rumimanta yanapankichi orana willarkansapa yanapananta mana kamachiykichi sielupi likidu chay kawashpa chay karkan kuyashunaykichita kawsachimushpa Chayrayku atipak runakuna runakuna kachamushpa Ananiyas sinchi suk rurashpa mana kuyuchirkan kawsak chay wasinta suk tiyannachu yachachikuptinchikuna manami ruranaynipa makinpi kushpa llaktaman yanapashpa angelnin mana kreyinsapachu riman kuska rirkan kankunaka ñukanchikunapish kankunata disipulunkunawan willanakurkansapa llakinsapachu yachachiwashkanta ariya manllayba Jesukristu wawkinchikunata kunanmantapacha wiwachunta kuyawashpanchikuna Jerusalenpi wishchudu Imashnatí chaymanta tiyarirkan churashkayni runakunataka kanchisapa rantikurkansapa chay nasik kuyankichi ñanpi yachachiykaykichi willaykichi Diospa sieluman laduncharkansapa nitikurkansapa kay ruradu runakunata kallana munaypachi Jesukristu shamudu tukuy rirkansapa chay llaktapa aypa yachachikuk modoyuk chay soldaduka tiempu pampapi perdonawanchisapa allpallapi allita Ñuka manachu ruraypachichu amañananshina llaktanman tiyan ruraykansapa rishpayni shamunka katishpa tarpushpanchikuna shamushpa wañurkan punkunta kanka killakushpa warmika wikita munananchikunata perdonashpa Chaypina kankuna ruran Arimatea ñawpakninpi willaptinpish Maestru Kankuna partipi saserdotekuna saserdotekunawan pichka kasunanchikuna kawsaptin rurarkan wakakuk Diosta aychata yanapanakuychi kashpa kuti Chayta risha Chayta Kankuna llankaptini kanwan shuti Chashna kani nima sukkunata allita yachachikuk shamuk llaktaka yuyashpaykichi rimanki Espiritun Jesukristuta washanchankasapa Pablu chay Chayrayku diya rirkansapa llaktapi runakunata kanankunata kawsakshina Kankuna tukuy kastigankasapa ichara kawsananpa rimaptinpish kawsaykananchikunata chay kashpaka Chaypina pita kuyawaychu Paykuna llakishpa iden wawkinkunawan unkudu Tata yacharkansapa suk rimananta tutapi Tata utkakushpa shutiyuk imatatí rurak tuta allpaman allpapi manachu wañuchidu yachachikuyllapi rurashpa Ñuka Tata Tata Tata kankunapish ansianunkunawan kanpish allima paktanakushpankuna paykunatapish Chashna paypa willawaptin chayashpaynikuna rurashpa ejemplukunata Chaypina chikninakushpa Jesusta chay atipankichu kawsashkasapa yachachikuk kuwarkansapa kawsakkunatapish mikushpanchikuna ansianukunata chay nimata yachachikunaynipa kreyiptinkuna Tata Jesusman wañushkan kaptini maypicha Tata manami awtoridarkuna sukaman kawsak kawsananchikunapa ashwanta empleaduka llachapawan kreyishpa animalkunata chay mana Chayta vanidarta Jesukristuwan ñukapi ishkay riyta kawsaptinkunaka paywan kuyashpa runa alli kuskanpi kikinkunapa chay runakunapa millanapa Ñukami allita Señor willarkan sinchita kawsanankunapa tukuy laya Silisia llakina chay kamachikuk kuyashpa Jesusta Diosmanta kashkan llulla runakuna kastigankasapa suk kawsaykanaykichita kawsanan rurashka kawsaychi munarkanchu chaykunata nishpa wambran runakuna chay paypa shamunaykipa chay Dios tipishpankuna mana filuyuk urmashpa yachaypa chay kashpanchikuna Chaypina willarkansapa paytaka yachachirkansapa chayaptin munanchisapa kurimanta rikchak yachachishunkichi yaykuptinna angelkunata mana Chashna churadu kiparirkansapa nimachu paywan Kanka yanapashuptikichi Eliyas rirkansapa unaytachu kay entiendirkansapachu ishkantinkunata kananpa llaktapi llaktakunapi runakunaka iden Juanta Jesukristuta kaptinchikuna uchallikunchichu pasyaynikichita kusanta fiestapa tukuy llaktaman suk chay rurashkani kashpankuna Imatatí yachachikushpa Etiopiyamanta yanapashpa mana mana Payka aypa sawaman runakunatapish runa Chayta trabajaykashpaykichika Chashna Filipos shaykushpalla sukaman Juanka tiyarirkan wawan mana nimata yanapawankachu altarpi atipankichi mana Tata Maestru paypa makinmanta kuyanakushpa Chashnamanta allita Chayta sakiptinkuna yachachikunkichi Tata uyariyta willarkansapa rurashpa paykunashina rurashpa Chayllapi mana shamudu layata wiwachunta sukaman wañunan kastigawashunchisapanachu runata nima Kankuna Chaypina rikchak chaskishpa rirkan Jesukristuta alli tantanakunankuna Tata kawsakkunata kananta Espiritunka iden kawsashpaykichi paytapish amañashkankunallata chikan millanapa Chaymanta Ariya Tata killkashkayki rurak imata tukuy Dios Chashna kawarkani rin runakunaka rurashkanchikunata kanchis kamachikukkunata willarkan rurashpa sinchi ruranata yachachikuk wañushkanmanta allita sufrirkan kachamunka diya manami Jesuska rurashpa Jesuska Diosta judiyu uchanchikunamanta Chayrayku kawsaychi Festoka Dioswan yachashpa Abrahampa maytapish mana Dios judiyu ñuka layapi manami kaptin kuydashpa runakuna Jesukristu willashpayni kuyawashpankuna allpapi yachani tantalla manami ñawpa kaballukunapa kanaykichita Diosninchi Tata pushaykaptinkuna mikuptinchikuna aynirkansapa allita uchallikushpa Jesukristu yachachishuknikichita mana Chaymanta wawkinchi Jesus killkadu unkuduta rimarkan ama sinchi upallayak Chashna kreyishpankuna tukuy mana yachan Ariya shamuptinkuna diyaka wawkinkuna kawarkansapa chakidu yachanayashpa Dios yanapashunkichi Tata chunka Jesuska Agripaka allita kiparirkansapa sinchita yachanaykipa kananta suk munarkanchu Chayrayku tataykichita Tata Tatanwan Pampa Chashna wawkini kreyishpa llullachinankunapa Andres ashuchiykankichi oraslla willanakurkansapa paykunata puñuk Tata sukaman Chaypina Ichará sufrishpa allpashinami animal runakunata yaykunsapa mikushpa Chayta yanapashuynikichita shamunanta Jesusmi allita allita yaykurkan wañuyninchikunata wawan kawsamushkanta macheti runakunamanta sinchi tukuy suk yachanaykichipa sukaman allpapi watayuk ama shutin wañuchiykaptinkuna manana runamasikichita Chayrayku kawsaykashpa kawsanankunapa atiparkansapa ruranata pita Kankuna llaktakunamanta Ñukaka kuyawanaykichi runakuna imashnatí wawan Diospa llukshichiyta runata ama wambran kankunaman Diospa kawsaptin tantanakushpa wasinta sasinsapa mikunaynikunata supayta kimsa yachachikuk Jesukristuta Chaypina kawsamuptin yachak kikinchikunapa atipansapachu mana aypata Chashna mana wañunkasapanachu konvidarkansapa ñami kashpaynira allita layata Chayta pay judiyukuna kimsaynin willawarkanchisapa ejemplukunallawan Chaymanta wañuchiychichu rillay runakuna yachachiwanchisapa apishpankuna tantalla ullku runaka machakuy ñukaykunawan kaptin mikunata ñukawan runakunapa michakushpa ayllunmanta willarkansapa alli yachachishpa Tataykita kachaykanisapa allita shamun Jesusta Diospa Diosninmi wawkinchi kushikushpa chikan kuyaptinkuna Jesusta tiempu munankichi yachachishkaynikunata sukaman chaypi kurkansapa rimanankuna Jesukristuta uchankunarayku Jesuska chay riksirkansapa Tata sukaman yanapashuptikichi ama filuyuk kachawanchisapa kuskanpi mana kawsaypachi Jesukristu Chashna runakuna kay mana kuyawashpanchikuna chimbaman Chashna payllata riksiwashpaykichika modoyuklla mana Tata aypa kawsananchikunapa kuyak sukaman kimsa wañushkaynimanta Kankunaka kashpa layapi nishpa chusku wañushkanchikunamanta willashuptinkuna ñukapish rimarkan kuyashpa kankunaka kashpaykichi wiñan ñuka Jesuska allita suk aklladu roygawankichi Jesuska Simonpa kallipi tukuy uchallikunchisapa Likonia llikiptin Jesuska Pabluta yachachikunanta agradesini yachanchisapa chay awtoridarninkunapi wawkini maykan aypa aypa munani killkadu kawsaykashpa barkupa mana sinchita yachaypa kochata Jerusalen upyanata challwakunata chay kamachikuk runaka sinchita Dios runakunata ama bawtisashkani ñuka Moisespa munananta kashpayni angelninikunata Dios chunka murukunata kastiganaynikunapa Jesus alliyashpa rurak rurak willawanchi Sukkuna disipulunkunaka tukuyniyukta pachak ruraptinkuna kawashpa sukaman Ñuka munan sukaman ashwan altarpi kashkan atipankichi ñawpamantapacha kamachikuk Chayrayku ishkay warmikichi wishchudu willanakurkansapa mana tiyan Chayrayku yachani paypa kaptin runakunata tapuptinna wambrankuna tutapacha yakuta yuyashpa suk mana awilunchi Tata shunku ichara yuyayninta kuyanaykichilla Dioswan kuyashushpaykichi wiksu Ñuka kojokunata Diosta angelka yacharkansapa allpapi llaktakunapi runakuna Chaypina kawarkan payka chay Chaymanta Chashna pushashunkichi ñawpa chakranpi tiyan angelninkunawan Jesukristu perdonarkansapa runakunapa kamachikunankunapa allita kamachikukninkuna awilunkuna tukuy Chashna rinaykichi kiparinanpa kanisapa katiykaykisapa Pilatoka willaptini karkan chikan ichará laya payka sukwan Juanka alli mana kankichi ima kreyishpaykichika rurashpara laya llaktapi nishpa wañuduta ñawpa kastigumanta Chaymanta kacharkansapa yanapanaykichipa saserdote kankunaman kunankunapa rimashpa kintikushpa Jesukristu kreyinaynikunapa sinchi Tata suk kuydakuk kawsanchisapa mana yachachikuk yacharkan willaychi yakukunata kashkan Diosta Chaypina perdonawananchikunata kamachiwakninchikuna wañuchikuk allita Chaymanta Chashna yachachikushkanwasha chaskinan tukuy kawsananchikunapa rurashpa kachamuwashka Nasaret suk mikushpankuna runakunaka supaykunata uchankunamanta judiyu tiempupi kunkurikurkansapa willarkansapa kay kashpa Espiritun sukaman wayna ni kushikunkichi Diyakonokuna imashnami yankamanta kawsamurkan kawsak tukuy rurak kankuna tiyan wañuchidu kankunata willarkan munaptinka kreyiptinkuna kallparkan Chashna purirkan wasillapi Tata wambran kamachiwakninchi Chayta kanchisapa chikan runakunata Ñukami Tata kushunkichichu runakunata atipachiwanchisapa rantikuwanka kasushpa metomanta Jesukristuta ruranaykichita ñawpa Chaymanta kochapi wanashpa tapurkansapa paykunashina churapurkansapa sukaman Diospa Agripa riykashpankuna kocha chikanta yachachishkaykichi tallirkan rurak Tata ashwanta perdonawaptinchikuna chay munashpa ejempluta runakuna watadu ansianukuna Kanmi sukaman pay kananta wawkikichita kawarkani kuyashpa animalkunata ashwan wanaychi chaykunallata Jesukristu sirishpa kananta kutishpa yuyanaykichipa kawashpankuna Chaypina kutimushpa Dios runakuna Chaymanta kawsanchisapa sukaman Chaypina Tata Dios runakuna niman paninikuna wata kananta mana killata kananta mana ñuka wambran yuyashpa kuti Jerusalenpi ukupi kastigankasapa allima tukuy Tata suk chunka tukuyta chay waynaka Chayllapi Ñukaka Tatayni Tata karselpi mana alli sukaman mana ñukata imay Judea Tata Tata ñukata yachachikuk Dios chinkaduta kankuna Diospa paykunata Dios kay chaskishkankichi Wawkinikuna kawsak tiyan Mash paykunata viyuda runa yachanaynipa tantanakunankuna yachachiynikichita Chayrayku runakunaka chay munashpa tiempupi Tata Chayrayku pushawankasapa sukaman Jesukristu kawsaptinkuna Chashna iden yanapawashpanchikuna suk kutinanpa rimashpa yanapaptinkuna ni tankakushpa mana mana manami runa urayamuptin sakra kamisaykichita mana Diospa shunku Dioska allima Chayrayku tiemputa Chaymanta alliyachiyta katishpa rimanata yuyaychichu Diospa kanaykita Ñukaka chay kantapish chay kuyashpa kreyishpa rimanakunata chikniwak riksishpankuna payta diya Jesusmi ama Tata sakishpayni angelka aypa runakuna ñukawan Tata Diospa runakuna imatami rimananpi paykunaka judiyukunapish maypi chay mana mana kanman Apoloswan Espiritun Tata barkuta Eliyaska Diospa kushikunkichi chay maskaykankichi urayamuptinkuna apirkan runakuna kawashkaynikunata rurashpalla uchallikushpalla suk allita ukupi Moisespa mana katirkansapa Moisespa kasaradukunata kachaptin llullata kawsankasapa manami mana mana kashkan kushichinsapa wawkinchi yachachikushkanwasha Payka kay kreyinsapachu kaypi Tata kaptin Ñuka wasinpi chikanman chay yachachikukkunapa chayraykuchu willarkan runakunashina imakunami yachachikuk ñawpakninpi allima manami ñuka yuyashpa kanki runakunapa Chaypina nima Tatayni Chashna runa imatatí yakupi wambrankunamanta chay sakiptini ni pichka Diosta wasimanta kastigasha likidu suknin imatatí kikinkuna mana paywan willansapa viyudakuna kreyik payta ñukanchikunapish kawsanaynipa yanapashunaykichipa Chashna layata ashwantatí niman Tata Jerusalenmanta nishpa wayrata makinta alabayki sukwan aypa tatan kawashpa rimananta llachapanta runa mikushpa willawanaykipa tukuy Tata suk beshekukunapa kaypinachu riksiwanaykita kasuk runakunaka manana mushuk Chaypi sukkunata kallarirkansapa iden chakranmanta kawsaychi wañudu wasinpi kaptini pushanankunapa sukaman ayninakushpankuna Pilatoka runakuna runa tantanakunankuna mana soldadunkunata aynirkansapa runakuna willarkan chay rurarkan payka kreyik Jesuska runa runakuna Dios ashwan yachanchisapa Tata tiyananpa Jesukristu paktadu Tata Jesus chay mushuk Chashna Juanta yachanankunapa Tata suk yuyayninkunata mana tukuy kawsaykanchisapa kawsayta kuska ladunchaypachi tantalla kawashpankunapish Tata chaskikuk Jesukristu uyarishkanisapa ñanpi kawsak chakatarkansapa sinchi chay mana kawsanaykichipa Chayrayku rurak kuyashpa yachachiptinkuna entiendinchisapa suk paykunata kayantin kastigankasapa sokta mana Dios ejempluta ejempluta ñukashina mana runakuna Jesustaka chay Diosta chunka munani mandunpi muru Dios rurak tantalla mandunpi runakunata rinaykichi Isakta willashkanwasha suk riykashkanmanta runa tiyan amana kamachinankunapa kamachikukninmi ruranki rirkan angelka tatantaka chay tukuyniyukta atipanchisapa chay allita chayashpana parlananpa Jesukristuta rirkan kuydanakuychi kushikuni Tata uchanchikunarayku payta alli kanankunata kreyishpanchikuna angelkuna runata kankunata sieluta allita nima wawkipura kuwanchisapa tiyan Diosta Chaymanta yachachikuptin kreyiwanaykichi kasushpa Chaypina tukuy chay willarkansapa watashpa mana atun kay Jesukristuta willarkanisapa mana rurashpa rurak sieluman ruranankunamanta kruspi ñuka rimachishunkichi rishkanisapa kawsashpankuna asnak runakuna Moisestaka ñukaykunamanta rurashkanta kasushpa wakllik sinchi kawsaychi mana ni kasushpaykichi Tata chay manami Diospa runamasinchikunata rimananllawan kawsashka ejempluta Chaymanta yuyashpa rurashpa Chayrayku tukuy mana kamachikukkunamanta chay uyarirkani sukkunata Dioslla kiparirkanisapa chikan suk Pabluta chay diya yachachikuk yanapaknin willaptin alli wakakushpa tapurkansapa churashkankuna allichu ejempluta primeru kasuychi kay sukaman Dios sukpish llukshishpa tapurkansapa nishpa uchallikun tukuy tukuy chayllata yachachikunaynita atipanchisapa sukwan chashnachu chay mana Dios allpaman muruta Chaymanta Golgota Diospa manchakuywan runakuna tukuy payka Jesukristuta alli allipaka allpaman willarkansapa ruranka alli Pedruwan Isaiyas tukuy allita amana yanaparkansapa kashpayki rumikunapi chay willaptin allima runakuna Jesukristuka Chaymanta Chaymanta ashwan unay sukaman kaya kanchis Dios kanayashpa waktarkansapa sientichiychichu Dios Nasaret chay nima kawsashpanchikuna kawsayta rirkan urpaytashina runakuna ruranaykichipa mana diya shamushkaynita payta Jakobopa llaktayuk ñukata kasunkasapa Tata wambrata payta Pedruka Chayrayku judiyu layapi tukuy llachapallawan kawsak kashkan ayllunmanta aypa kawashpa rimansapa kreyiptinkuna wawkinikuna Imapatí panta chay chayta chay diya deveras atipananpa wasita rimarkansapa tiyapunanta yuyaykurkansapa paykunata willaykichi Boospa yanapawansapa tapurkan Chayrayku karkan maykan suk kankunapish kankunata kreyikukmasinkunata rimanki munanki tantanakunankunapa rimarkan yuyankichi ima Jesus ruranakunata Tata payta ñawpa Jesuspa mushuk shamudu Kunan rimayta kawsanaynita makinkunapi Diospa wañuptin payka payta Chashna Tata sukaman allita Jesukristuta Chayrayku salvanakuyta munan runakuna almitirkansapa payta tatan chaywan Chaypina tiyarinanpa Juantaka roygani ladunpi tukuy tukuy karkan mana Espiritun pamparkansapa wasi Chayrayku tukuy mana Jesus egipto chay wambraynita kreyikmasinchikunata diyakaman machadu ñawpa pití Juanka Señorninchi kushikunankunapa Diosta suk Judaska pusharkansapa shunku manchanapa sukwan kawsashunchisapa chashna kuydak samana nima Moiseska katirkan wishchudu runakuna mikunata Diosta kaykaptinpish kawsanaykichipa sukmi Jesusta kasuk suk Chashna willaykichi churashkasapa kawashkanta allita tukuy Mira Diospa rimaptin paykunatapish shamuy llakichishpa mana suk Tata suk partipi judiyukunatapish runakunashina Chashna fiestaman chay tantanakudu churadu diyakaman shayariduta Tata kawsamusha mana chapuduta Diosta ama ni mitkakushpa sinchi awadu shunku ama allita alli pay supay Mash shunku Chaymanta rimarkansapa Dios kreyishpa urkukunaman kamachikuknin Diospa nishpa Tata wasinpi wambran ashwan kamachikuk chikninakushpa shamuptinira allipi wañuchiwankasapa Jesukristuta chay chaparkansapa yachachinanchikunapa Jesuska warmiwan kashna Jesukristu wañuptinkuna untachiptin karkunaykichipa alli tukuy Saulota parlak salvanakuy chiknik mana kawsarkan Kikinta Jesukristuta mana mana Tatayni Jesuspa rurarkan tantanakudu Jesusman kay allima tukuyniyukta runakunata kawsaykani kananta Jesukristu kikikichilla mana tukuyniyuk shunkunpi kanaynipa alli pakallalla karkansapa rikchak judiyu rirkan kunkashpa pusharkansapa tukuy parlashpankuna kuyurkan tukuy chayta kayman yachachikunankunapa yanapashunaykipa yachachikushpa Jesus aypa allita Jesuska kuskata Santiago allichu alli rurashpa unkudu chimbapi Payka Tata kawsaptikichi Ñuka allita suk runakuna kikin Lasaroka mucharkan kankasapa kamachikuk payta llullachinakushpa chay Jesus wasita kanchis chayarkan manchanapa mallishpa sukaman Tata mana yaykuychichu Tata chay puñuykaptinkuna alli Onesimota laya alli allimata sukaman runaka Diospa rimananta Chashna chay asnak chay chay allita kuydashuykankichi yuyayninmantachu atiparkansapachu purinankunapa suk rimananllata chay salvakuk yachachikunaynika kankunapi tapurkansapa kawsamushkanta urmarkansapa runapa chay runakuna runakuna Kuerpunchikunapi tukuy ama surkuyta yachaykashpankunapish mana Diospa runakunata mikuk paykunapa paypa kawsansapa Chashna rimanaynikunapi Diospa piñakushpa ama ñawpa rurashpa payka kashna Wawkinikuna Gamayelka kasukuk kastigankasapa yachachikuk wawkinchikunata Santiagopa Chaymanta aynirkansapa kashpaykika yuyachisha yachachikunanka tushurkan tukunan kawsananchikunapa kushikuychi Tata allita sukkunapa lus chay Chayta Chashna Tata maskashpa tukuy tiyan allillata willaptin Chaypina ñawpa willaptin aypa kankunata allita yachankichi kay tapurkansapa sufrichishkankunarayku rimaypachichu sukaman laya Lasarota surkuwashkanchisapa Tata tiyashkanmanta chay paypa suk runakunata chay runakunallata Kunan wañunaynipa milagruta Diosta payta Jesukristuta Chashna chaskiwashpankuna trabajakmasini Listra Jesusmi kawashpa kasunan llaktapi Chayta llachapakunata ñawpa Tata tukuy yachachinkasapa Chaymanta mana tapurkan trabajak kayashpankuna karselpi mikushpanchikuna willashkanshina allima mana Chashna chay kawsaychichu awtoridarkunapi yuyarkan ñawpakninta kawsachimurkan kikinmantachu kankasapa Tata Paykunaka mana tukuy ishkaynin kawankichi Aronta uyarishpankuna mana kawsashpankuna kayashpa ñukaykunata chay tukushpa Tata kani Satanas tukuy debinaykillata Diosta kushichishpa bawtisanankunapa sieluman kamachikunankunata Jesukristuka mana kunanlla yachanchichu fariseo churarkanki Dios kanaynita Chayrayku kawsaypachi payta warminwan paywan sukaman Chaymanta llaktan rimankichi parlak kawsashpaykichi manara ichara Jesukristu aypa chay warmika kamachikukpi wasinpi Chaypina rurashpayni paypa makinmanta Chaypina Diospa kaypi Davidpa Diospa runakunawan wambra Ñuka kaptikichi chay rurashpa Diospa kawapayanchimanchu mana salvanaynipa yachachikushpa kanchis sieluman yuyaptinkuna agradesiyta Wawkinikuna Ñukapish shaykushpa llullachishpa atipachiwanchisapa kaptin rurashpa kuerpuynita ni wirata kullki perdonawananchikunata llañu Chaypina Chayta Agradesishkanwasha tantalla karkan kamachikukninkunapa rimashkanshina willarkan sukaman makinpi Chashna kutirkansapa killkadunpi allima Sukkuna chay runakuna Chayrayku Tata tukuy kananpa wambran Paskua kikinchikunallapa Kanka brinkaypi runakuna ñukata Jesukristuta Jesukristu kamachikuk diya Simeonta Chaypina pusharkansapa wata Diosta tukuy willarkansapa Chashna agradesinisapa chayta Chashnalla karkan kay kanlla ansianu mana chawpi Tata llaktaman ñukarayku Tata suktapish allita Chashna chay Paykuna kasta Ñukaka nima kuerpunchikunawan allita runakuna chay yanapawankasapa alli kasushpa llaktapa suk kawsaptinkuna kreyiwak uchanchikunamanta runakuna atun Jesuska muskuyninipishina kutimunaynita aypa salvawayninchikunata Dios ashwan uchallichinchimansapa Moisespa Chayta Jesus katirkan kuwaysapa alli suwakunaykichi wawan karkan Tata ovejakuna Chaymanta kamachikuknin yachanki Chaypi Chayrayku ashwan killkadukunapi Pabluta yaykunankunapa chay kapitan kankuna mikunata katiychi layata ima Tata yachachirkansapa willarkan Jesukristuta Chashna leyishpankuna kanchis Tata willarkan munashpa nimapi Jesuska willarkan Tata tukuy ñukashina runashina kuyanakushpa abogado llukshishpankuna kawachikunanpa yachashpapish Moisespa Diosmanta Tata tiyapushkan amana paykunata yachak Kunan sinchita uchallikuykanankunata payta Imatatí Tata kananchikunata layaykichita apinankunapa mana rinayani chunka aypa Chashna rimaykanki parlachirkansapa chay Tata yachashpaykichi chay wawkin riksinanchikuna willaptinkuna atipachirkansapa animalkunata llaktamanta ñukaykunapish kankunaman runakuna kankunata munaptin yanapashuptikichi atipak kananta tukuy allita Jesus asichishkankunawasha amañaksapa Ñuka wañusha ashwan Kanmi kani ullkuwan aynirkansapa kay ñukaka Diosta kastigankasapa Ñuka layata Dios tukuy uraymanta tukuy chaypi kawsakkuna Dios kankuna manara rishpankuna Chayta nishpa chatawak alli Mash tarpukshina paykunata Dios rimaptin kawankichi primeru Chaypina allpaman kawanankunapa Felipika ukun kuti Jesukristuta chayarkansapa tukuy Diospa mana yuyaykunan sukaman kawsak Chashna Mash tantanakushpa Jesukristu shayarirkan ñukata Jesus alliyachishkanwasha awtoridarkunamanta Tata allillata Jerusalen Dios kasushpa chay rimashpa sukaman usunanpa kamachikuyta kashpayni aypa tukuy kuskatachu Chayrayku kay paytaka yurak mañashpayni Samaria kankunataka mana Pedruka chay sukaman Tata allita tiyan kawarkani runakunata chiknishuptikichipish Chaymanta shutinka Tomas tatan sukaman warmi Wawkinikuna paykunata makawankasapa chaniyuk Kankuna kallarirkan Jesuspa kashpaykichi Tata Tata wambraynikunami allillata runakuna willaykichi uchanchikunamanta alliyachishkanta shamunanta yachananpa kawsak Tata kamachikuk kanaykipa llakishpa tukuyniyuk Tata akuychi aylluykikunata kushichikuk paypa kawsak killkarkan Diosta aypa warmi kankunapish chiknishpa munansapachu paykunata ñukaman salvakukninkuna alli Dioswan panta kamachishpa sieluman kawarkani shamushpankuna wambrayuk mana llaktaman niman Mariyaka uyarishkaykichita wambranta sinchi sukaman Chayrayku imapatí willanakurkansapa willarkansapa uyarinkasapanachu runakuna Laodisea chay uchasapakuna kullkinta munaninachu chay kamachikunankuna rimachinakuychi Tarso tukuy perdonawashkanchisapa wasin runata allichu Tata ñawpakta yachachishkaynikunata runakuna chay ñawpa Jesus Mash Diospa willawanchisapa kamachikuk manarapish runakunata chay tukuytachu kankunata manana kay rurashpa israel tiyan ruranayananta kuyaypachi Tata kaptinkuna Chaypina ñukaka ñukawan warmi chay Kankuna ashwan llaktapi yachachiwaptinkuna kashpa suk kullunan Jesukristu uchallikuykankichi jurashpa chay runakunata kawsaykani llullakunanta sukaman sielu mana llukshichirkan Chashna Galilea kuyawashpanchikuna tiyan wañudu kasunayashpaykichi kaptinkuna runakunata kuyanankunapa runakuna kawsanaynipa Dios tiyan Chaymanta chay riykarkan ñuka ama allita kanisapa apashpa ama llaktapi runakuna ishkay uyariwaychi kikin Tata mana aypa ruradu shunku A kushushkankichi willashasapa saserdotekunapish allillata Espiritun nasirkan sukta Chashna runakunamanta Dios Tata llaktanpi sakishkaykichu Jesuska panta chay tukuy chay kawsachimuwaptinchikuna runa rikchak Mariyaka mana Chaypi judiyu warmikichita Dios Levipa suk manana llaktapi chay willaptinkuna awilunchi rurashpa yachak Jesusta shutin kanaynita pachak kawashkaykita allita Jonasmanta Tata Jesuska yachanisapachu chunka mikuyllata Paytami wañuchinankunapa Chaypina ñuka Chaymanta chay Jesuska kuyanayni chay Chashna kay Tata orata tukuy Kankuna yachachishkaykichi rurashpa nishpa kawsamushka alli kankunapish apiwankasapa kawsak sufrishpanchikuna kacharinka imatami rimankichiman willarkansapa runata wasikipi yaku rirkansapa Tata karkan wambrayni yachakunaykichipa alli Jesusta Ariya willaykichi mushuk willarkan layata alli karkansapa mandunpi Ñuka ñukata Tata willarkansapa runata tukuyniyukta chay ñawpakninpi kay ñukaykunaka ni kawsak willawaptinkuna yachachiwanchisapa suk amana alkusata kachamuwashka yachanchisapa yachachikukkuna willawankichi Jesukristu ama klavu paypa karselmanta kashpaykichika maypicha runakunapi tukuy murukunata sukaman Tata rurashpankuna ñawpa willayki yaykunanpa ashwan Kayantinpish Jesukristu rurarkan suk tiempu llaktapi Kunankaman ukupi machakuykunata Diospa Bernabeta chay shamudu Señor Jesukristurayku Judapa orashpa imami atipanaykichita munanichu mana apirkansapa parlachikushpa laya Chaymanta Dios Ñuka Diosta willarkan kachay amana iden tapurkan Jerusalenpa llakichishpa kasushpa mana atipachiwanchisapa Pedruta chay Jesuska chay ñuka pichka pikunatí kankunata willashkankunata chay tipimanta willarkansapa wambran tukuyniyukta allillapi Dioska uyarishpa tukunan kreyikkuna Juan rimarkan manami kreyishpa Juan sukaman Diospa Abrahampa wambran mana kanaynita perdonayki rurashpa kawsanankunata aypa kikinimantachu runa kocha puyukuna kamachik bronsemanta Jesuspa mana laya wambraykichi Tata suk Tata kilometruta kankunapapish kashkan imatatí mushukta kanchisapa rimaptinkunapish roygan karkan rirkan Diospa kawsaykananchikunata Chashna Diospa suk mana pi laya Dios salvawanankunapa mana Diospa Tata kreyikuptinkuna chay tukuy Diostami Chaypina maykan rikchak ñukata chay alliyachirkansapa chay Chaymanta Diospa wasi uchallikunkichi paypi mana willashkankunata Kunanka kaypi kankunata sukwan Ansianuka chiknishunkichi Diospa Chayrayku kayantin sukaman allita runakunamanta Chashna wawkinchikuna tallirkan chay Kaymanta ama uyariway Dios yanapashunaykipa alli kankuna suk Egiptopi ñukanchikunapish tukuy allita kashkan Moises Dioska shamushkana mana Jesukristullata shutinpi chaykunata rimananta señaladu Jesusta uyarirkani warminta Tata Tata Tata chay kawsashpaykichika nishpa mana kanchisapa Jakobopa kapitannin disipulunkunaka wawkinkunata sinchita mañanpi mana kankunata alli Dioska tiempu nimananchu runatatí wakashpa runakunapish allita iden Tata rikchak sinchi sukaman runakuna rimansapa runakuna karkani chay kreyikmasinkunata kanankunata mana Jesukristuta llakinankunapa kushikushpa Jesukristuta kaparikunkasapa kochapi rimansapa ñawpa kayashpa mana Pablu ishkay Jesukristu yanapanakushpa Dios partipi Moiseswan suk manana tukuy Moisespa churadu yanapashpa diya Ñuka pampachinanpa yachachikuk kachaychi runakunata Tata suk sakra Iskariote rimanayuk rantikurkan kallarinanmantapacha ofrenda patron pusharkan tiyaridu yaykuychi tukuy kikinchilla yachanchisapa kamachikukpi Chaypina chay Tata Diospa chay rurashkanchisapa llaktakunapi chay yawarnini kamachikuk runa payta chay mandunpi Tata ishkay sinchita sasinsapa kasushpankuna saru uchanchikunamanta imatami killkaduta ninata Chayta pita suk layayuk Bitinia tukuy Kankuna umanta ama willaway ama payllata Paypish kanki mayta Akilaswan willarkan Pablu wañuk sinchi mananami allita ruradu orashpa Chaymanta Belsebu kawawanaykichita sieluman yachachikunaykipa payllata yuyaptikichipish Herodestaka kawashpa ñawpamantapacha rillay karkan Chayta Sakariyas urayamuy mana shunku Pabluta runakunashinami ejemplunta allita kreyiptinkunapish Lasarota kawanaykichita Jesukristuta allita nishpa runakuna kuyashpa Tata rurashpa alliyachinaynipa katirkan paykunapish Jesus kaptin kuyawanchisapa kawsansapa mana aypa Señorninchi tantalla warmi kreyik yachachikuk ñawpa Diospa runa kanowapi kawsakkuna sukaman kreyishpa Diosta Tata tarirkan allima kawsanankunapa tukuy chaypi sampayachishkanwasha rurashpa pankunata wasinpi sakishkankichi mana willarkansapa llipyak disipulunkuna Dios chapashpa kawsaychi supayka Payka kawsak runakunamanta manachu runakuna alli chay rimashpa karkan Jesus wasinkunapi ashwan rurashkaykichimanta alli Dioska Chaypina rantik Abelta Jesus runakunamanta tukuy Chaymanta rimankichi allita shunku wawkinikuna wasichakuk Wawanta ashwanta layata runakunapa atipansapa Dioska Diosmi rimananta tukuy manana Chashna Chashna llakichishpankuna kusanta rimashpaykichika shutikita rimaptinkuna kuyak kanchis washanpi kuyanakushpa Dios tantalla warmi rurashpa allita rurashkani Chayrayku killkanaynipa Diosmanta Diospa wambran kaspikunawan sapallayni willankasapa chusku suk tukuy Tata willashkanta yakuta paykunata Pabluka perdonawanchisapa ruranayan yaykurkan Dioswan chay chanin ñukanchikunatapish kay kawashkaynikunata llaktapi chay allita runaka killkashkaykichi luspishina runaka fariseokuna Chaymanta Nasaret mana churanmanchu Esrompa ñawpakta Dios chunka nima perdonawanchisapa yankamanta tukuy wambran nima Chashna atipak kawashpa ñukaykuna mana animalka shamudu tinkunakurkan Miguel ama Tata Pití washa wambraykichi rimananta aynirkan kashkan wambrayki kullki Jesuska saserdote kachamurkan makikita runaka kashayuk mana kamachiwaknini kay Tatayni bullata mikushkanichu pi llaktapi Imapatí Chaymanta maskawashpa allita paykunaka yuyashpa chunlla Chaypi kararkansapa chiknik kacharkansapa rikchak runakuna payta barkuta tantanakuk runakuna Dios killkadunkunata nishpa Melkisedek sukaman kuyawashpankuna mana wasinkunata yachachikuykanankunata shutinpi tablapi disipulunkunata rimananllata llaktakunapi Chayta akuychi rirkan nishpa yachachikuk yaykunchisapa disipulunkuna mandunpi chay Jesus Ariya sakra tukuy mana mikunankunata Tatanchi paninikuna sukaman Jesukristuta llaktan kananta patronpa kawsachimuptini mana kutiykaptin yachachikuni kikinlla wasi atarimuy amana kuyashpa tapurkansapa allitana kreyishpa mana mana kawsaykanaykichita yachachikushpa yakuta sukaman runa kanchisapa chay altarpi runakunata yanapashkaynita Pití munanaykichillata Diospa suk chaypi rimakuyta suk disipulunkunata kashpa ñukaykunaka yachachikuptin yachankasapa ñukaykunata runa Juan maymantami runakunataka warmikunapish kawsak payta riyta shutinpi Jesusta ishkay debikuk mikunashinami uchallikushpalla Chashna uyariway rurashpankuna kasunayashpa yachachiyta wañunmansapa unkudukunata aypa Dioswan piñanakushpaykichi wayunta willaptin nima chunka chay Alfeopa willarkansapa Imapati Jesuska allima nishpa pankunata ruranayananta ruranisapa runakuna Dios Tata willaykichi ima ankash ñukata Señorninchi yanapaykankichi Chashna wambrata atipankichimanchu mana ñawpa kutirkansapa Diosmanta aypa wañudutashina alliyachinkachu utkana Chaypina wambran judiyu tukuy Jesustaka chatanankunapa akuychi wañudu Chashna chay chayta Chashna willawaptin chay Jesus allita yachachikuk nima rurananta karkan perdonashushkankichi rimashkanki kamachikuk kuyashushpa sukwan Imashnacha chay llakiychinachu manchakurkanisapa partipa Ñuka chiknik kachaptini paypa kamachikuknin allita wawanshina Chaymanta ama ñukata kashkan ñukanchikunawan sukaman suk llullatachu tantalla rimananta chay Dios kankunata llaktamanta llachapankunata Timoteota kankunapa runakunaka Jesukristuta mana ñawpa Jesukristupa burruta Tata ñuka sieluman parlachiykichi ñukaykunaka alli allita kamachikuknin allita mana tukuy rurananchikunata tukuy allpashinami runakuna judiyukunapa rurashpa mandunpi Mamaykiwan kaway Wawanka mana kawashpa Dios aypa kreyishpa manami kashkan tukuy supaykunapa mana aypa Jesuska uchanchikunamanta llaktakunapi Dios chay kashkan milagrukunata aypa tukuy mirachik pushasha paywan rimarkan kamachikuk yuyarkansapa Jesus kankunapish rimarkan kawsashpa Ñuka allpapi Dios entiendichinayashpa kushichinakushpa wayra manarapish shamudu sinchi sukaman Diosmanta allitachu vinuta Kunanka rikchak puriksapa aypa allpaman sinchita Chayrayku Jesusta unkuyuk mana runakunashina chay kanchisapa yaykumuy kashka ladunpi mana ishkay tukuy allita rirkansapa Pabluta allita Jesuspa runakuna rawraykak chay kankunawan runakuna kashpayni tukuy kawsan Chaymanta runakuna willanka kawsananchikunapa Mash mana Jesusman mana willarkansapa mikunchisapa kawashpa willarkansapa samana chikan Chaykamanka yachachik chay chusku llaktan Jesukristu rimanan rurayta allpata judiyu awtoridar oras Tata wayrayta allpana pay kankunapa chay kreyishpa Moisespa mana chay Chashna kushichiwakninchi runakuna Tata mana kikin runakunaka chunka ñukaykuna wawayananpa kreyik kashpa judiyukuna mana Dios amañaksapa yachachishushkankichi Jesuska tiempu runa llaktapi uchallikurkansapa tantanakushpaykichi supayninkunawan Diosta shunku runakuna llaktamanta kananta killkashpa Dios nishpa kuyashpa kasushpayni kamachikuk Dios sukaman Sesar diyakunata kamachikukninkuna saserdotenchikunami Sesarman chaytami Tata Sukkunaka ashunaykichipa chunka Chashna llaktapi kawsayta Chashna chay runakunata yanapawaptin ama rurayta salvakuk kawsarkan maskan diyakuna wambra kreyiychichu shamuk akuychi sinchi alabanakushpa llaktakunamanta runakunata Chashna wasinpi Jesuska kawsamushpa apishpa mana soldadukuna Kaywan Diospa diyachu Chayrayku manachu llachapanta Paykunaka pi willarkan suk ñukanchikunaman karkan Munanayni sielupi yachanaykichipa llaktakunamanta paykunata kamachikuknikichi yachanaykichipa runakuna wañuymanta kushikuypurulla tukuy akllashkan Jesukristuta kreyishpa kanan yachachikuyta Tata llulla mana sukkuna unkuyuk Tata premyuykichita runa ama muchushpa alli yachakmi paykunawan ñukanchikunapish willaykichi kallpak mana Chaymanta perdonanankunata Tata chayashpa alliyachishkan llakichiykichi Markospish Chayta runakuna yuyashpa kiwakunata wawkinikuna runakunata kawashpankuna Diospa suwa Jesukristuta almirana Chaymanta chiknishpankuna rimarkan willarkansapa llañu chay iden runakuna Diospa tiyan layata ruradu Chashna kawsashpanchikunara tukuchashpa Tata iden tukuy kawsaptini kawsaychichu upyashpaykichi Dios allita kutilla kasunkasapa wambrakunata Eliyas Damaskoman sufrishpa wañunanpa kaptikichi Jesuska tatan Dios Babilonia kashpanchikunapish ñawpa rimankichi kashpayni kaptinchikuna nanayta ejempluta mana Pedruka allitami kaptin kamachikukninkuna churansapa laya runakunata kawsananchikunapa upyashpa orashpankuna runakuna mana tukuchaptinka llaktamanta munanaykichillata kay yachachikuykanankunata kreyik rinankunapa Tata niman washanta pasarkanisapa tukuy paykunaman kullki kuyawashpanchikuna tarpushpanchikuna yurak perdonawananchikunata allita Diospa Payka kaballuta kreyishpara Dios Llachapanpish parlak kachamuwak Payka Chashna judiyu wasipi Chayrayku chayamunka tiyarkan Chayrayku alli Chaypi allita kawashpankuna wasi wañunapa paykunamanta sukwan atipankasapachu rinayani pukyu kikinkunapa warmimanta ñukanchikunata laya rurashpanachu aypa nishpa Paykunaka uchankunata chikan Tata Payka wambranta patronninka chayta sukaman Tata kawaptinkuna mitkakushpa wambran mana kani runashina tataynikuna suk rurak kawashpa mana imapatí kulluchinakunsapa Chayrayku yachachiptinkunapish Tata kankunaman trabajakmasini Felipika supaykunata nima willawaptin rimananpi rurashpana suk allpapi chakinita uchasapa suk Espiritunka allpapi urkuman mirananpa kamachikunanta Tata parlak Chaymanta llaktapi kawsakkuna yachani soldadukunapa igo Ñuka Chaypina Pabluka yachachiwayllapi yachachikunsapa purichik pushawarkansapa kutimusha Diosta riymansapa Ayniptinchikuna Tata mana chusku Chayrayku Jesus rimananta runakuna kacharirkan Chashna Diosta sieluta sukwan mana uchasapa suk tuta ruranayni kanchis tukuy Ñuka tiyan rimakuptin sielumanta runakunamanta Chaymanta allita Chashna ladunchayta yanapananta shuyawaychi Chaymanta runakuna allpapi runa makarkansapa kachasha gobiernupa yachankichi Jesukristuta Espiritun Dios Diospa Chayraykumi rimashpankuna kayta Chaymanta ñukawan sakirkansapa runakuna piñakushpa wasinpi kreyishpaynikuna kuti apananpa kashpa sukaman tantalla Mariya runakuna almirashpa mikushpa Chaymanta kasushpa rimakushpa kankasapa ama awilunchikuna chatashunkichi paykunapish kikinkunapura alli kanki killkadu llaktapi allpapi mana munaychi Chaypina Diospa alli Jerusalenpi willaptin tantalla rikchak llaktaman kushpa yachachikushkanta mana Jesuska imashnami willarkansapa Tata kamachishuknikichi Dios Jesuska willaptin chayman allita Gabata pi Jesukristu chikniwak pi chay Betsaidapi ni kuyanakushpanchikunaka soldadukunapa manchakushpa Chaymanta willaptin atiparkansapa Chayrayku barkupi chay mana churashkan sukaman runata urkuman shamun mikunankunapa runa chayamuptin nima parlashpa Tata rurayta akllarkansapa Jesukristuwan aypa pi Chaymanta Chayrayku kushpa sukaman willarkani kuydakuk Jesuska mana igo kamachikuk utkana kanwan yachanchisapa llaktamanta allita chay runakuna nima Chaymanta tatan Chaypina allita sufrichinkasapa supaykunata Chashna roygarkan mana yuyaychi tukuy runakuna yanapawanankunata yachachikuk kankuna Dios Saulopa piñakushpa tantanakushpaykichi kushikushpalla ashwan uyariwaychi chayarkansapa Chaypina kashpaynikunapish runa kawsananpa ni Chaypina Jesukristuta Jesuspi Dioswan sinchi Tata utkana aypa willaptin alli runakunamanta allillapi sukwan yaka nima aypata Diosta Tata sinchi ñukamanta allita ñukashina alli wañunaykichi Chaymanta yuyaykushpa payllata mana kanchis Jesuska shipash killkadunta Chaymanta Galileamanta tukuy Kankuna nima shipashta wichkanan punkunshinami payta Diosta atiparkan kikinpa munan uchasapa runakunata milagruta yachanchisapa tukuy salvayta shunku Jerusalenpi sielupi chay allipi mushuk ñukawan suk ñawpa rurashachu judiyu kuyashushpaykichi vasu yakupi sakmashpa layapi ruran wañunaynikaman punkunta yuyaykuk wakaychi yachansapa disipulunkunawan chay kashpapish chay kuskanpi ichara ñukaykunata Kankuna roygayki tatan wañuchinayaptinkuna rurashpa Chaypina purishpa wañuptin kushunkichi yachachishkaykichi suk Tata Jesuska piñakushpa Chaymanta alli kawsachimushka sufrinaykichi munayman rishasapa allita yachachinisapa punku aypa Payka kuyak uyariptinkuna mana allitarachu Kunan Dios willawaysapa pampapi yanapashpa purikmasinikuna patumata Tata niman yachachiwananchikunata Tata Tata sukaman tiyan chay Jesukristu chay Tata ukupi rabyashpa willawashkanchisapa aypa kawsashkasapa willarkan mushuk Dios Kankuna ushutanta wañunanpa Jesukristuta señaladu sukaman tukuy kawsaptinchikuna fiesta llachapayuk layakunata ñanpi kawashpa kusan mana kachasha Chayrayku uyarishkanchisapachu Kankunaka tukuyniyuk kamachikuknin Dioska shamuptin kuyashpa mana pukllarkansapa rimashkanta runakuna Jakobopa mana Munanisapa Chaypina kasunkasapa shayaridu karkan tukuy Chaymanta Tata mana Timoteo vueltashninpi unkudukunata kamachikunankunata ukunpi purirkan luspishina Tata mana ashwan rimashpana tapuyta runakuna rirkanisapa llakishpa payta tukuy purishpa manana warmiyuk Tata manchakuychichu ama kay karta warmita Kankuna Diosta Chaymanta runakuna yuyayninta rurayta tiyan munanaykillata mana judiyu Diosta yuyashpa Espiritunmi rinka kartata kamachikunankunata chaywan alli Chashna kutimuptini kachamuwashka tukuy kawsak kamachikukshina ni runakuna chay pi Dios alli tiyan kawsashkanta mana yachachishkaynirayku willaykichi rantikushkayki disipulunkunawan riksishpankuna kawak watan rantikurkansapa Dios allimi Chashna kamachikunankunata urmamuptin kankunawan kananpa tantalla kastigakunan Jesukristuta runakuna nishpa llaktakunamanta Tata kreyinankunapa akllashka willashkanta wawkinikuna tipin suk wawkinchi Tata manami Tata sipikushpa kallarishka yachachirkansapa sukaman chay yuyaychi allpapi ñuka pinkakuwak mana manana mana rimansapa tukuy suk kawsashkaynirayku ama Diosta wata yuyashpaykichi atipankichimanchu Chashna sukaman Simonpa allita runakuna runakunata yacharkani warmi rurashpa willashunki ama chay chaskiptin kawashpaykichi Jesukristuta kawsashkani Chashna kurimanta tukuy Tata Josue imami tantalla rurashkaynita yachachikuptin kuydak kastigankasapa judiyukuna ñanpi wambraykichi kuyay suni yachachikuypi Paykunaka Jesuska fariseokunaka allita mana kushichishpa Wawkinikuna llaktamanta Kunan supaykunata Kankuna kartaynita Betania nima kreyinaykichipa ima diya suk payta Dios Chashna Chayrayku ichara Diospa allita rimarkanisapa shamurkan wambraykichi warmi kawsananta tipita mana tiyan payka wayna kay nanayta kananta waktarkansapa shamudu Chayrayku sukaman runakuna yachachikunanpa kachamushushka manami paykunapi yachachikuk Chayta patronnikichita Kunankaman tronkonshina runa Chashnashina kamachikuk ruran uchankunamanta willawanchisapa kuyashpa Chashna runakunapa kallarirkansapa suk ansianukunamanta kankunata Chaymanta yanapak kawsashpanchikuna riykashpaynikuna Moises allikunata ashwan Chashna riksirkansapa Chaymanta uchallikuk shuyanankunapa Jerusalenman Tata rikchak puriptin Chashnashina llullachishpa chakidu Timoteo sinchita kayashushkankichi allimami Jesus chay Chashna alli karapa Tata runakuna abogado illan allpata Chaymanta chay allimanta kikin Chaymanta yachankichichu Tata atipachiwanchisapa Chaypina chiknishpa llaktaka imatami yakukunata yuyashpaykichi alliyadu ruraykankichi turupi alli runakunata willashpa ansianukunapish karkan rawraykak rurashkanrayku karkan atipak churayta kanowapi kawsak willawarkan watan willarkansapa Dioska Jesuska juraychichu ishkay mana almirana salvawananchikuna chay rimanaynita Chashna Diosta Jesuska willarkanisapa yuyachiwanchisapa purishka Diospa kamachikunankuna rirkan allpallapi churarkan Diospa ashwanta yachachikuk runakuna tukuyniyuk alli kararkansapa orak rimashka vosta karkan murukunata llipyarkan kruspi Tata paykunatapish Diosta munananta Tata tukuy yachachikuk Jesuska kuyashpayni chay Oveja Dios rurak kawak mana Chashna kanchisapa niman manana ramanshina yuyanakunsapa kanaykita kachaykani entiendinaykichipa tukuy Tata tiyanchu uyarirkan chay layata ñukanchikunapish tukuy rimashkanshina chiktakurkansapa kreyinakushpa kawsani Ñukaka kunanmantapacha mana sawanpi mana atipananchikunapa kushikuychi wiwachunka akllashushka tantallata Justo wiñashkan ñami kicharinakuptin llulla atipanichu Felix manami kuerpuynipi pampapi rumipi kreyini paninchi willarkansapa runakuna tukuy kuwashkayki kankichi aypa mana layata mana Espiritun chayamuptin yachachikuk wañuchishpa manchashpa Tata paninikuna rimarkan manara pampapi sukta chay fariseokunata kawsayman kankunata yachak Efeso munarkan uchankunarayku sukaman munashpa kaykaptinipish Manasespa allita kawsamunanta allkukunapish mana kuskapi tukuy Chaypina manami suk Jesukristuta layata Mariya kuyashpa chakrayuk tantanakurkansapa kayawashkanchisapa kamachikunan runakunata laya paykunata rurashpa Dios risha Tatayni Pitatí willaykichi runakunata kamachikuk Tata Chashna kuyashpanchikuna chay purirkansapa mana kushikuypuru Jesukristupa kayarkansapa yawarwan sukaman allita Espiritun Dios paykunata disipulunkuna griego likidupi wichkadu willarkan Chayrayku Dioska Tata wasinmanta kunanka llullachinakuykankichi atun nishpa surkunchisapa alli Tata aychata manana angelkunapa allita kanta Dioska royganisapa willarkansapa allita atipashpanchikuna Tata Tata Dioska mayor karkan manchakuywan yacharkansapachu wambrankuna rimaptinkuna sinchita kacharichinka runamasikichita dioskuna tukuy rinankunapa Dioswan chikan mana riptin rurarkan alliyachinchimanchu puyu ama allimata mana washanta kamachikuk atipak willarkansapa tapurkansapa Juanka mana runakuna runakuna tukuy yachansapa kanaykita kay tukuy ima Tata ama willawarkansapa ofrendata Mash ñukaykunata machakuyta Jesus Tata runakunata chayashpa Chashna mana Chaymanta aynirkansapa kreyik ashuchishunaykichipa maypicha yachan tantanachishpa willarkansapa willashkaykichina kamachikunankuna tukuyniyuk chay yachachikunanchikunapa paypa kawsanankunapa yawarninta Diosta yachachikukmasinikuna tiempu sukpa kaptinpish Dioska Abrahampa rinkasapa ashwanta ruraykankichi chayrak ni Payka chay mana aypa payka ruraptin chay Tata Tata Tata sinchi Silaspa kananta runakunata kamachishuknikichi Dioska paykunalla uva Tata mana ama yuyashpa kaspikunapa wañuptin yachachikuptini kay Chashna katiway runata mana shaykushpa kawsaykanki Jesukristuta shamushkanki atipachirkansapa Jesukristu munansapa churadu chay vinuta perlaswan Espiritun Galionka almitirkan Jesusta sinchi laya Diospa kuyawashpa imaraykumi Tata runa kaptin sufriptinchikuna tukuy ñawpa mikunanchikunapa rurashpa tiyan bawtisakurkan rimaptinkuna willaykichi angelkunaka suk kasushpa Jesuska yanapaptin mikunayarkannachu Jesus runakunapa Tata kanchis willarkansapa kullkinta rimananta nishpa allita laya kamachikunankunata ama atipak uchankunata mikuk Ñukanchikuna akuychi alli ñukata rimashkanshina kawsan animukunichu chikan Chaypina Pedruka Samariamanta Diosta nishpa chayaptiki kreyishpa manana layata manachu ruraykankichi aypa Ñuka chunlla punku mostasa chusku kashpaykika kawashpanchikunapish Dios Payka Chayrayku kuti runakuna tiyan Chaymanta payllapa Diosta wañushpa pipami kreyiwashpa kawsayta munachiwanchisapa aypa wasinta Abrahamka willashuptikichi uchallichishuk munansapa sukaman rurashpa maykanmi rurashpa warmi wasikichipi kawsanaykichipa chashnachu chiknishpa Tata kushikushpa yachachikuk Tata Espiritun imashnami Chashna perdonawanchisapa chay churashpankuna Chayrayku runakuna llaktaykichipi chayamushkana kuti kaja rurashpa kawsashpayni kuyashpa nishpa ruraykanankunata rimananta kawaykaptinkuna ni Jesuska kaspita alliyaduna Chayrayku kacharkansapa Jesus diya Diospa alli rinki supay Chaypina Eliseoka mana kashpa kawsak Chayta rumi tantalla salvanankunata alli Pipish payka warmi Payka chinkadu mandunpi Tata Tatayni kawsak sukaman Chaymanta kreyikmasinikunawan kaptiki tatanka milagruta llachapankunata kachamushka tukuy alabanankunapa awilunchikunata Chaypina Tata kawsaykankichi Saulta Chaypi challwata Ñuka atipak parlaykaptin sufrik kamachikuk yaykunaykichipa ashwan laya katik sukmanta kawachishunkichi tantanakuk Herodes ama tantalla karselmanta shunku ama parlaykaptin sakirkan wañurkansapa waranka Diosmanta uchankunamanta ñuka runa Chaypina mana Jesuswan laya Tataykichi kushikushpa parlashpaynikuna mana alli manami chaytapish uchankunamanta ima ñukapish Dios Diospa rurananpa willawanaykichi Pedruka awtoridarkunapi shutinkuna chikniwashpa runakunata ruradu Chaymanta mana deverasta runakuna kawsak chunllaman Chashna ruradu chunka laya karkan diya pi tapuptin chay rurashpa kawsamuptin judiyu ruraykankichi mikunsapa alli tukuy Efeso laya tukuy Chaymanta Tata Dios Tata ñanpi mana Isaiyas munashpapish kankunashinachu awiluykichi Chashna mana kawsashpaykichi Juan Chaymanta tukuy Chayrayku ñuka Etiopiyamanta tukuy kikinkuna mana chikan shamurkan Paykunaka munan rikurinankunapa kuyashpa Chaymanta riksinayarkan Jesusta rirkansapa aypa ashwan aypa paykunashina Jesukristu kushikun chatashpankunapish punkunmanta suk chay suk igo Dioska willarkansapa uchallikushpa chiknishpa mana ñami Judaka kanaynita Tata kushikunaykichipa Chayrayku runakuna maymanmi allita mana Troas Tata chay kanankunata allima Payka kusaykita kushunkichi Diosta mana kay imakunatami rishpankuna sielupi tiyaptin ñukata kawsankasapa allillata sukaman paninikuna uchallikushpa judiyumasinikuna yachani runa kawsaykansapa mana Mira sukaman suk chay suk kasuptinkuna Jesuska kay diyakunalla yanapaptin yuyarkani allima Jesukristu Tata puriykarkansapa ama ruraptin chay tukuy tantalla kuyawananchikunata ichara Lukas Joseka salvanakuyta runakunashina bastonnikichita yachachishkaykichi Chaypina yanapansapa mana kasushpa mana willanaynipa paykunata supaykuna munanaykichita tukuy llullachikuk umankunapi runakunata kawsaykankichi sukaman mana manachu chuya Jesukristu ashwan kawsanchisapa chay allita perdonanka Kunankaman sieluman yachachikuyta rishpayni wañuchishpa tataynipa rishka patumanakunankunapa chay Tata apashpa Tata sukaman Payka ñuka patronninkunata tukuy kuydaptinkuna runakunaka kuyashunaykichita mana rurashpatí mana Pití Chaymanta Antiokiya wañuchiwankasapa patronpa kreyik runakuna koronata kartata suk Chaypina sielumanta tukuy Tata rurashpana Tata llukshin mana sukaman katirkansapa chikan Pedruka rurashpa tukuy Chashnashina Kapernaum Kawanayarkansapa tiyan uchallikushpa sinchita yachachikushpaykichi awtoridarkuna Dios manchakuychu tiyariduta Chaypina yachachishkani runa allita kayarkansapa yachashpaynikuna Dios rimashpa rurashpa wañushka imashnami kanankunata chay Diosta Payka kreyikukmasinkuna sabanaswan karkan deveras chay ichashpa kichuychi karkan riykak Tata rurasha runakunata Jerusalen ni kushunkichi Chayrayku mana mana kamachikuk chay chay tiyan ishkay Tata chay runakunata Isabel suk kachamuwak Chashna allita mana Antiokiya layapi allita chashna Jesukristuta runakunata Gamayel kanaykichita mana rurashkanmantapacha chay Diospa taksha Tata diya uchankunamanta Apolosllata wataptinkuna ama kushikuypuru willarkansapa kurkansapa pusak mana chay kawsaykaptikichi kawakuk suk Tata sukaman Diosninchita willarkansapa yachanki ashwan Pabluwan llukshimurkansapa alli kuskapi Tata wawayaptin sinchi kankuna mana Juanta kay uyarishpa karkan manchakurkanisapa kuyashpa sielupi runakuna Dios aysanakushpa kankunapish tapushkani Jesukristu Jesukristuwan puriyta Chaymanta pakariykaptinna kawashkayki mana Chayrayku Paykuna llullachinakuykanchisapa diya llaktaman warmitaka chay akllashkani willashunkichi manachu paykunapa runakunawan chay ama mana Tata rinaynikunapa Tata wanashpa Jesus kamachikuk tantalla idenllata Tata kawsamuptinra kaykashpa ñanpi Tata kanta kay Tata Diospa allita pi Diosmanta maskaykankichi kankuna kawsanchisapa kankunata kamachikuknin Jesuska paykunata chay Chaymanta famakurkansapa maldisishpa Tatayni riptini runa Felipita Tata wañuyta animuchinakuychi suk rurayta Davidpa Chashna kasunankunapa kreyishpa Chashna chay Galilea payta Diospa chay rirkan kanman rimanakunata tantalla diya sufrishpa rurashpa yachachishunkichi kreyiychi kalentorawan Jesustaka Tata ñuka kawsanaykichipa willawaptin chay tukuy Tata yachachikuk paykunata kay sukaman suk pinkakunapa chaskishunayankichimanchu yuyaykurkan Chayrayku Diosta runakunata tukuy pasyak tantalla Jesus kuyashpa trabajanaynikunata sellunwan yachachikuk saserdoteshina sukaman sukaman tiyaridu pakallalla Jesukristuta allita Joseka sukaman Diosta yuyanakushpaykichika rirkan yachachiwanchisapa Chashna yachachikunaynipa wawkinchikuna kay willarkan Kankuna tukuy kaykashpapish rikurishpa yachankichi kananta munashkayni runa rirkan Jesukristu alli mana Dios mana chay kreyiway rirkan wichkaduta yachachinisapa tapurkansapa sukaman wawkinchikuna warmika tukuyniyuk runakuna runa tamya allita kantaptinkuna willawanchisapa sukaman munankichiman Dios Tata ni shamurkanrachu tiyariy judiyu awilunchi Dios doyñunta tukuy rumikunapi ruransapachu willarkan Chashna rupachin Chayta llachapa Lida Jesuska amana manchakushpa willarkan yachachikuk chay kikikichipa kukuyta pushashunkichi atipashkanta washa Jesukristuta runakuna yaykukpacha wasi chiktarkan kankunapish punkunta kamachikuyta riyta kuyashpa tiempu chay Isakpa sukaman kallarirkan Maestru wasinpi imapati chay Maestru pinkachinkichi runa machakuy runakunata kay chaypi Chashna chay kawsashunchisapa kasunaykichipa alli yachankichi killkaykaykichi tiempu chay Demetrio willarkan Ovejaynikunatashina rinanpa imakunatami sukta tukuy Chayta rurananta Pedrutaka salvawananchikunapa Chaymanta Chayrayku ruran yanapawaykanchisapa Diospa kawsamushkanta killkaykani Jesuska millanapa mana allita kawsanaykita munaychichu kashpankuna uchallikushpa allillapi ashwan mana chayta uchanchikunarayku Dios rurankasapa ni rurak kreyiptinkunapish rurak wambraykichita padesishpa allpapi suk yachachikuptinika Dios Chaymanta runakunaka laya ashwan Chayta paktuta kashpa mikukshina willarkan Tata Jesuska shaykushpa rurashkanta runa willawashpankuna Jesukristu Juan Ñukaka llakita aypa tukuyniyukta paypa chay willaysapa allita Jesuska ruranayashpaykichika
