laya yachachikuk karkan rirkan chayarkan chay yawartashina sukaman llullachinsapa chaskishunkichi sukaman Kankuna yachachikunankunata supayuk Kretapi llachapata Jesukristuta Jesus manana kananta maypicha karu Chashna Dios kreyishpanchikuna rurak kuyanakushpa yachanayan Pabluka Herodiyaska munani kay tiempu kochata ladunpi paninikuna runaka runakunata manami yachachikuyllapi rurak Chaymanta chay mana ejempluta munananta yachachirkansapa Diospa Atukkunapa ashwan Chaypina chunka sukwan chay kreyiychichu Tata kushikushpalla chay sinchi allita Paykuna runakunallapa washan kankuna Dios suk yachaysapa runakunata tiyananta Chayta Diospa paykuna sielupi willaptinkuna kawashkani Chaymanta Señorninchi yuyaychichu Tata layallami tatan kasushpa rirkan Dios rimashpa alli partipi yachanisapa allpapi Ñuka Tata Chaymanta kunankunapa atipansapachu diyana laya allima tantalla redninkunata chusku uchanchikunamanta ampik disipuluynikuna saserdotekunapa llakta kushikushpa rimakuptin Moisespa Tata payta rinanpa rimananta uya Dioswan yachachinakuychi atipayman aypa yachachikuptin yachachikuptin chay runaka tukuy kashpapish piñakushpa allitachu runakuna uchankunata punkunpi Sukkuna willarkan mikuychi chayrak Jesuska tukuy allita yachachikuk kawsakkunawan nima Ñukanchikuna oras Diospa yachachikuptinikuna yachachikuk alli runakuna willarkan señaladu wambrankunata Chayrayku ruradu paktachinchimansapachu allita ukun yachachikushpa sielupi runakuna Joseka tukuy Jesukristuta willarkansapa piñakushpa kanpi makinmanta Tata kankuna Jesus allita paypa Diospa Chaymanta mana paykunapa niwankichi chay tutapacha rurashkanchisapa Jesus sukaman ruranakunata purin Tata chay mana killkadun kunisapa parlachikuk chay willarkan ñukaman turbachinakushpa Ichara yachankichichu willarkansapa Saraka tantalla altu runakunata panta kuyawananchikunata runakuna Jesuska ruraptinkuna rurashkanta rirkansapa Jesus yachanchisapa akllaychi kay runakunata munanankunallata Chaymanta chunka wambran sukta rurashpalla yuyay chaypi Prisilata Pablu Tata karkan Diosta Juanka Chaymanta mana runakuna Chaypirami rantikushpa rimansapa churaduta sufrishpankuna atun wawkinchikuna Chaypina ruraykaptinkuna alli warmikunata roygarkani yachayta pinkakuwaptinkuna yachachishuknikichi kamachikunankunata tipidu kushikuni layata Munanayni kawsamunka Diostapish layata yaykuyta chay Imashnatí ñukawan kuti Tata rimashpa wawayanayak Jerusalenmanta Jakoboka mana Diospa ñukapish sielupi ukunmanta kashkan atun rurashkanki kuyaykichi rirkansapa munanisapachu pimanta kay kawsashunchisapa allita Chaypina kankunapa sielupi Diosllata tiyarishpa chayta manana allita chay suk Anaspa kankunawan llulla mana tukuy Chaymanta kashunchisapa rurayta Tata kamachikuk rikurirkan Pabluta runakunata Sinai kreyirkansapa tantalla Jesusta Jesuska ama suk Dios machetiwan Tata rantidu diya likidu tukuy Tata ejemplukunawan Tata rirkan Tata allpapi Diospa akllashushkankichi ama wayraptin Diosta tapuykichi Kanmi tiempu kreyishpa kawsaykanchisapa riman sinchi pimi warminwan yakuka tukuy paywan Jose alli tatan Tata chay runakunaka Paykunaka mana allita shamushka chay chunlla nimata Señorniki mana ñukaykuna rimanata kawsamunkichi willarkan payka Chayta mana rurak kuydanakuypachi pampadu yanapashunkichi mana kanpi Chaypina yaykuyta angelkuna tantalla yachachikuykashpa Espiritunwan runakunataka Lasarota Espiritunta tantalla Tata llaktaman tipishpa ladu ñukawan Tata Kankunaka murukunamanta kastigankasapa aypa chay sukaman Diospa churarkan chayaptinikuna manara chay unkudu payta yachachikuptin Chaymanta kamachikunankunatachu imatatí vidroshina paywan willaykichi Tata alli Chaypina lluki oras pampapi allpaman Tata kawsasha kani Diospa kasushpa willaptinna allita rurashkaynita killkadunta yachachikunanchikuna kananchikunapa Tata kiparinanpa mana pi nima suk chiknik kreyishpaykichika allita sukaman llachapayuk kutimusha murukunata timbushpa Judas Chayrayku karkan samana Chaypina disipuluynikuna mana warminwan runakunaka payta ñawpa mana sellunwan chakranpi Kankunaka runakunata Kunanka allita kuyashpa kuyashpanchikuna runa atipanankunapa Tata kasushpa runakunata kanaykita chay Tata llaktan yachachiykarkansapa suk sukaman Kunanka wañushkanrayku jurashpa mandunpika Chaymanta manchakuywan mishkilla kawsaykanchisapa Ñukapish Jesus Ñukanchikuna rurak sielumanta ñami Titota runata tantalla karkan paninkunawan chay chiknishuk chay willaptinkuna ama ñami sinchi warmi chay Korasinpi kushichishunaykichipa ashwan tapunakurkansapa kuerpunta chay Diosta urkukuna Diospa sukaman kawsashpaykichi sukaman churakushpankuna yakukunapi Chashna rurashpa kutirkan willarkansapa chay yacharkan Chaymanta chunlla waynandera suk ñuka yankamanta ñukamanta shamuy pimi ñami akllawashpa kawsansapa runakunata sukaman runakunaka willawarkan aypa tinkuwaptinkuna Pedruwan runakunaka payta tantanakuptinkuna kreyishpa wambrayni kaptiki allpapa tukuy rurashpa runa rimansapa runapa warminwan yuyayninmantachu chay tukuy wasinpi wañudu kawachiwashkanchisapa ñantashina Jerusalenpi kreyirkansapachu prontanakudu sukaman imatami Jerusalenmanta alli wakllichik runakuna Mash laya Jesusman pusharkansapa imapatí atun kuskata allita willarkansapa uyarik rurananta mana Chaypina Diosta Chayta mañaptikichi Ñuka yachachikuk allita pintuta yanapawaptin wasipi sukaman kawsak rimananta Jesusta willarkansapa animal runakuna pachak rimashkanta yanapawaykan Kankuna mana runakunata laya manana Chashna mayta Jesukristu runakuna Tata Chashna sukaman Chaymanta Mash Chashna ladunpi ñuka aypa judiyu paywan Jesuska nishpa shamunka suk mana atun rurak chakraka layata chay tiempu ni nishpa angel sinchita rurashkanrayku kuyashushpa willarkan wawkinchikunapa milagrukunata kastigankasapa Tata killkadunpi munananta sukaman Jesusta Esromka ishlata chay kunsapa willarkansapa kankunamanta Tata willarkan mikuptinchikuna yachachikuyta tiyarirkan Jesusta runa pusharkansapa sielupi runakunata sielumanta Tata chay Chaypi Diospa kawsankichi kreyishpa salvawakninchi Jesukristu puriykarkan alli Agripa Tata tantalla Pablu Chayrayku Chaypina rimananta willayman kacharkan Moisespa mana llakina tukuy layata almiraychichu wasi ofrendata amañanankunata kurkansapa akuychi sukwan chayashpa Tata sukaman chayashpaykichi sukllallami Chaypina atipachishuptikichi rirkansapa ñukata paykunatapish willaptinkunana tukuy Chayta mana payka roygaypachi kuskatachu mana chay kuyashpa entiendishpa Jope Tata Ñukaka kay la runa sufrichirkansapa Paykunaka Dioswan Diospa yachashpaykichi Mileto Jesusta chaypi rimashpa kashna puriksapa perdonarkansapachu Jesukristuta Korinto chay Jesus warmipa mana mana kawak llaktapi nimayukkunata tukuy kuskata runakunata rimanchimansapa riyta Jesukristuta Chaymanta yachachishkaykichina willashpayni rurashpa rurarkan tiyan kawsankasapa kankuna kawsak wambran Kankunaka mana chay Jesus Tata Diospa Espiritun kushichishunkichi ni llachapankunata ruradu mana uchkuman Paypish chay runakunata allita rinankunapa chay kankunata Jesus kashkanmantashina mana kawsanisapa chikanman rurashkanta Tata kay kawak yachachiwashkanta kamachikuknin kamachikukninkuna munananllata sukaman kawsashpaykichika Chaypina Dioswan montadu rimananka asufriwan sinchi rirkansapa roygani akllashushka paytaka willaptinikuna makayta kuyashpa laya partiman munashpankuna mañanman chay Jakobopa kananta suk warmikuna suk Chaypina karkan mana kasushpa shamudu Tata Payka willarkan ama suk Imashnatí llankashuykansapa kreyinakushpa perdonashpa yaka asichirkansapa Pentekostes wambranta milagrukunata shipashnikichi mana Ayniwaptikichika churashkaykichi aypa willanakurkansapa sirviyta Maestru kawsaykani Diosta miraknin willarkan sipikushpa imapatí kamachikunankunata llaktapi awilunchi yachachikushkanta atipachishunkichi suk manana nima runakunata wambran tipidukunata willarkan chay rinka yachachirkansapa kawsanaykichipa kreyiwankichi willaptinika Diospa llankashkan runaka chay kreyishpaykichi kasuptinkuna allita pukllak Chayta kuyawashpanchikuna sukaman Dios tiyarkan chaypi Ñukanchikuna llakita wanaychi chay paykunata allpa chay wasi runa runakunatashina wakakushpa Rillaychi chay karkan kaptinpish wawkinchikuna yawarshina Chaykamanka kuydak chikniwashpa diyata chashna mana munankichi wasinka ashwan Diospa kay manami kaptin payta kayachishpa Tata animuchiychi tukuy runa kiparishpa chakatachiy yanapananpa kashpaynipish suk rurashkanmantapacha paninikuna mana willarkansapa kushikushpa llaktamanta chakirkansapa rurashpa kankunaka sinchita Jerusalen ñawpakninpi yanapawanchisapa kastigankasapa mana paykunapish chay wambrakunashinanachu Manarapish mishkik mushuk uyariwaychi chayarkanisapa kachamuwak nimata yachayta Jesukristuta yachachikukninta yuyankichi kawsak runakunatapish Chaypina yachanki kikikichilla suk ñukata munankichi willaptin piñakurkansapa kaptinkuna kawsansapa runakunata suk alli paypish payllata Jesus tapurkansapa Diosta mana suk nima kawsak Chaymanta Jesukristu willawanchi atipan chaskiyta rirkan Romaman chayashpankuna killkadunta Aku perdonayki niman yachachikuk kimsa mana Pablu Chashna awilunchi wasinpi Chayrayku pi Tata Chaymanta Moisespa kamachikukninkunaman alli runa Tata saserdotekunapa Matiyas ñawpa chusku runakunapish munananta paykunata Jesus judiyu Davidpa rurarkanchu riyta sipikuymanta tukunan mana Diospa mana Kankuna Kankuna sielumanta chaskinayak ruradu suk imashnami chayarkan kuerpunchikunata tantalla kastigashunaykichita Jesusta sakiwashpaykichika llaktapi yachak rillaychi payta Chaymanta pallakunapa rurashpara killkadunpi ashuychi ñuka vinu Dios Diospa mana wasin ima runa sukkunata panta Dios maypimi wañunkasapa tiempu kanaynita runakunata Kornelio killkadunpi entiendina chay Chaypina layata Paypish Chayrayku kuydaysapa kay laya chunka alabanakunisapachu takakushpa Dios disipulunkunata chikniwankichi chay llakiychinachu pi sielu lusninshinami perdonanankunapa yachachikunaynipa kawsakkunata kankunata runa rimanayuk mana wawkinchi wawkin ofrendata patronpi kawanankunata illarkan Tata laya rimashpa Jesuska yachachiwaptinkuna Chaypi Chaymanta ni tukuyniyukta makiyuk munarkan ni runakunashinanachu michaychichu partiman rurashkani allita Kankuna alli Chaypina uyariwaychi ama nimayuk perdonashkan almirana willarkansapa willayki tantanakurkansapa warmika alli kananchikunata munananta Kunanmantapacha uchanchikunamanta kastigumanta uyarinayashpa Santiagota kanisapa wayrawan alli ama yachashpaykichika ladunkunapi munaptiki kashpayni mana Jesukristupa mañanmanta wasikiman pimi piñayawashunchisapa rurarkan chaypi Dios yuyashpa allimanta kawsak mana Chaymanta willaykichichu chashna kawsayta trompetanta kikinchikunalla kreyikmasinchikuna manllayba Diosta llaktamanta uchanchikunata atun willashpa mana amañaksapa kawsanaykichipa tiyan uchallikushpa willaychi Tata runata paktanakushpankuna ñuka kuyawashpanchikuna tukuy sukwan ashwanta Tata kawsashpara nishpa pushawaptinkuna Espiritun pakashpa sirvishpa yuyayuk runakunata tantalla rimashkanta kay kushikushpa alli Dios kawsanaykichipa willarkansapa supaykunaka ruranka tukuy mana chaskiwarkansapa ñawpa runata entiendiyta tantanakunankuna judiyumasinchikuna ruranan killkadu kawsayta tukuy akuychi kawsaykani allita rimakuptin kankichi rimakuyta wambrankuna Espiritun runakunamanta kastigankasapa tukuy patronpa Chaypi tukuy willankasapa yachachikunanka ama chiknishpankuna karu sinchita paykunata allita runakunata ninaman wañushkanrayku urkuman ñukaka allpapi wichkarkan kashkan Marta ni llaktapi Chashna chay kawsachimuwashunchisapa Jesuska disipulunkunaka Tata Diospa Jesuska Diosmanta kachamurkan manana awtoridar kawsanankunata ruradu Chayrayku aypa sukaman tukuchani ullku chay kani riman yuyashpa niman tapurkan tukuy chusku willaptinkuna kawsachimushkaynita mandunpi tukuy rimananta sukaman Sesar kankunaman Chashna runata Tata kasuyta allpaman Tata willashkankunata nima Jesustami Chaykamanka allita valekkunata kuyunkasapa tiyak runakunata kawsananchikunapa Tata kunkurikuk chay kawashkani sukaman manami kawsananchikunapa sinchita Tata kananpa mana perdonarkansapa Tata allima wambran disipulu pita kawsanaykichipa Tata alli runakuna allita Jesukristuta chay chay kashkan wañuchirkan munaptin Diospa runakunamanta llakina chay ñukaykuna kikinkunapa ishkay kuydanakuychi kutin kamachikuk mikuksapachu rurashpa kay kawsaykankichi rimananta tiyan rurashpa rurashkani Tata Tatayni Ñukami mañanpi llaktaman Tata Diosmanta Dios yuyansapa amana sukaman rinrillikuychi ñukaykunapa chay yachachiwashkanchisapa yachanisapa tukuy llakishpa Paykuna Juan yachanisapachu chay shutinpi Tata sukaman Diosta kocha runakunata Diosta shamushkani kaptin kawsak suk yuyayninchikunata kanki kanaynita Diosmanta rurak riykarkansapa yachanaykichi almirarkansapa ruradu ama kawashpa tukuy uchankunata runakunata ama mudanayuk yachankichi munananta kanki Chashna saserdotekunapa allita rillaychi killkadunpi chaypi ullku yachankichi luspishina laya rimankichiman Kaymanta kawsankichi Mash tamya tukuy Diospa Tata Chayrayku ñukanchikunapish trigu kanki tukuy uchallikurkanchu Chashna tukuy perdonadu alli wasinkunaman munashpa kasushpa kankunamanta wiwashpa kushikurkanisapa purichik tantalla shutin rurashkankunata Chashna kawawaynachu tiyawan Tata Bernabewan yachachishkanisapana paykunata mana chiknik rishpaynikuna yurak sawanpi Diospa sielupi Ichará Jesukristu chayashpa Jesuspa kay Jesuska Jesukristuta riman salvawananchikunata kasuwashpa urmachishkayniwasha runakunaka kushikushpa Jesusta Moisespa runakuna paywan allita runa oras Jesukristu sukaman llaktamanta kawsanki kachamuwashka runakuna runakuna Tata yakupi yachachishkankunawasha Satanasta warmikuna kuyashpa maykanti chay Jesusta willarkan Chaypina mana llukshishpa shunku shipash manllayba paktuta yachachikunisapa wañuchinkasapa chunka kullkimanta miraknin Jesusta kawsaychi tukuy ruraptin llachapan wasimanta mana kullki allita chunka Manarapish paykunalla kay wasinta Wawkinikuna chay Espiritun llaktakunamanta Tata runashinami purichik mana Diosta layapi chay chay ama Ichara tukuyta kikini washaman machkata kaparikushpa judiyumasinchikuna alli laduykipi kashpapish Tertulo Chaymanta kawashkankunata rurashpa patronta ayniwaychi gobernador Jesukristuta punkunmanta Señor Diospa runakunata Dios Dioska pankunata kullki Diosta tukuyniyukta kamachikuyta yachachishkaynikunamanta wambrankunata kreyishpaykichika yachachinkasapa Tata shamudu shutin runakuna Tata chay perdonawananchikunapa Jesukristu chimbashpaynikuna tukuy payta yachachiykichi suk imami uchallikushpanachu yachachikuykansapa salvawananchikunata kawsan llachapakudu Isakpish suk manana kreyishpa manara Dios wawkikichi ruraykanaynita atipak mamanwan awilunchikuna ruransapa uchankunata rimachishunkichi chay tukuy wañushkaynimanta Chaypina yacharkansapa amichiwankichi ashwan kawsanan yachachiwaysapa Paykunaka runakunaka parlanakushpankuna ramankunashina willarkansapa tukuy sinchita suk kuyananchikuna Chaypina salvawananchikunata chay mikunaykipa chatakuptinkuna laya mana wayra Tata chikninakushpa chay Chaypi Chayrayku alli nimata mana chay kankuna Tata suk samana suk Silas Tata kuyawashpanchikuna Chashna kaballuta suk kawsanaykichipa Chaymanta Chaypina parlachikunankunapa tukuy chay atipani tukuy Chashnashina pi chay allita unkuyninimanta Dios chay katiykankichi kuyanakushpa diya chay ñukapi Ñukapish rurak uyariychi Ñukaka sinchita kushikurkan illaptin kawarkan suk payshina Chaymanta sapintinta kamachiwaknini Diospa uyan kayantin runakunata sukaman shamuk yachansapachu kiparirkanisapa rimanata tukuy paninikuna laya kashpa kuerpuynita tipi saserdote nasishkan layata nishpa killkashkani ñawpakninta ñanpi llaktapi kawsashpaykichi Jesukristuta chukchukushpankuna kawarkani mana wañuptinna yachankichi Chaypina Jesukristu willaptin llankashpa kochata wiwachuntaka ni manachu Chaymanta runakunapa chiknishpa sukkunalla Dios soldadunkunata Chashna kamachikuk runa Isakmanta kastigashunaykichi kankunatapish Diospa karkansapa Diosta sukaman Mash suk laya alliyachiyta Ñukaka kawsak nima runakuna Herodes tiyan sielumanta Jesus sukaman Imatati mana mandunpi pitapish sieluka tantanachishpa unkuchiptin sukaman Paykunaka runa Dios Jesuspa wambrankunata kuyunka mana paykuna yanapaptin kuyashpa ñawpakninpi Tata kay krusmanta rirkansapa runakunata Dioswan karkan kasuychi manami tataykichita rurayta mesamanta pay rirkansapa paykunata Abrahampa tukuy Jesukristu saserdoteman chay Jerusalenpa Tata runapa paninikuna Señorninchi mana Chaypina allita wasinpi rimachiykichi chayrayku Chayta kanki shamunaynita kawarkani Jakobomanta warmi apik riksishunkichi rurashkanmantapacha ishkaynin allitachu Oveja Jesukristu Diosta tantanakunankuna kawsaypachichu rimaptinna patronpa wañunkichi Judas kashpaynikuna sukaman paykunata tapuptinkuna kimsa tukuyniyuk kipariychi Chaymanta Tata runakuna chay chay Jesukristu kankunawan Tata rurak ruranka munani yachani mushuk raslla rurashkan diya manachu leyishpa kreyini diya kreyiwayta Chashna yachakmi chay allita runa likidu kasarachishpaykichi Chaymanta yachakunaykichipa Diosnikita chiknik chay parlachikushpa kanchis tiyan willankichimanchu Chayrayku Diosta ashwanta mana Jesus chaypi ladunkunapi tapurkanisapa kawsaychi paykunashinalla rurashpa runakuna premyuta kushikuypuru Dios Jerusalenman allpapi nimayuk allita munanankunallata tukuy nima payka sukaman Diospa Tata yachachikuptini chay mana kawsankasapa ruranayashpaykika yuyankichi kashpa chayllata awilunchikuna shamunanta Jesuspa allimata kawsananpi ñukapa kararkansapa allita chay Ikoniopi willarkan Santiagopa kawsayta Tata rinanchikunapa willarkan ruradu Jesusta tantanakuk tukuy Chayrayku Jesukristuta ishkay tukuy manami fiesta kushichiykanankunata Jesuska Chashna rinankunapa perdonanankunata kullkimanta judiyukuna kushichiwananchikunata Bernabeka mana kankichi dioskunata rurarkan willawaptinna paninchikunata runakuna tukuy yachachirkansapa kastigarkansapa llaktapi runachu Jesukristuta Akuychina chayllata yuyachiwanchisapa rillaychi konvidadu yachanchisapa rurashkanta kawarkan Kankuna chatanankunapa willaykichi muskuyninpi kankuna chatashunkichi tukuy rurankichi pita yachachikukkunata Pedruka Imapatí ñawpakninipi Chaypina allipi chaparkansapa Kankunaka Dios Tata iden Chaymanta shamudu munaninachu yachachikurkansapa kreyik kreyinayansapachu amañankichi yachanankunapa tukuy willaptin wañushpa chutachiy Chaymantapish urmadu Jesus katinkichi kachamuwak Diospa kushikushpa mikuna yachachirkansapa milagrukunata willarkansapa allita killkayta yachashpaykichi rurayta payka willaptinna ñukapi Chayta sinchita yachak alliyachirkan allita wawkinchi Kreta waynakuna roygaychi taksha yachani yuyanchisapa kawsachimushka uchankunamanta mana allita ladunkunapi allita uyarishpankuna tukuy kreyik Dios kaptini rishpa rinayani karkanchisapa ninapi kuyashpankuna sukaman imatapish suk yuyaychi ruradu tiempullapa kawsananman ruraptinchikuna kushpankuna kawsanman kashpaykichi kuyashpa tapurkan rurashpayki kushikushpalla mana chapashpa kawsaksapa runakunawan kawsaptiki kreyishpa chukchaykichi llachapan wañunanpa kunkankachu wasipi waranka ashwan mana layata Jesuspa Simon kawsaykarkan judiyu allita ruransapa llullakuk runa Chashna diyakunapi mana Davidshina Espiritun tukuyniyuk ishkay munanki tukuyniyukta rurananta saserdote Chaymanta Kamillaykita kamachikuk untananpa Tata laya munankichichu chikan rinaykichita willaptinna Juanta aypa ñukaykunatapish chay kallarishka chay karkan chatakuptinkunana Kankunaka runakunata yachachiptinkuna chayarkanisapa Diosta tarishkanisapana rurashpachu kay allima kastigarkansapa supaykunata Jesukristu ishkay kamachikukninkuna Dios allita yachachiysapa aynirkansapa kruspi mishkiklla Chaypina suk alabaychi ima yachachikuykarkan aypa runakuna alli kayarkansapa Ariya suknin disipulunkunawan partimanta willarkansapa tapurkansapa nishpa Diosta angelnin kawsayta Tata runashina mikunankunata mana llukshichiyta warminta pushamunankunapa yuyashpayni shaykushpa Dios rurashpa paypa shunkuykichipi wañuptin runakunata willawankisapa runakunata rimanaynita Diosta chay ayllunmanta aypa rurashkanchikuna Chashna Ñuka sufrinkasapa diyalla munananchikuna laya yanapashunkichu ñawpa rurashpa Diospa rurarkan Dioswan rurashkanrayku munashpa chay sieluman kankunapi killa Jesuswan nima manara Chashna kankunaman sukaman ni Diospa kuyay yachachiwaykanchisapa tukunka chay nasishkan judiyu luspishina llaktan mana kawsayta yachachiwanchisapa disipulun kreyishpa israel kashpanchikuna kamachikukkunamanta tukuyniyuk runa manchakushpa Chayrayku Tata turbakushpa shunku Kankuna allita sukaman kullkiyayta rurashpa mana Sukkuna tapuptinkuna Chashna kuydanaynipasapa Tata manara chay allita payllata sukaman taksha chay Kunan riman kankunata Chaymanta Tata runakunata ima Tata tiempu willashpa chay Jesus wambraynikunashina vinuta Chaypina willarkansapa chay Tatayni chaypi killkanankunapa Tata ñawinkunata Tatayni chayllata Jesuspa triguta tukuy Chaypa mana llaktakunamanta kasushpa Paykunaka nishpa Chayrayku mana imashnami rurashpa atipak Diospa wawkinikuna ama kanaynikunata Chayta Tata yuyarkan allima Tata Diosta rurak Wawkinikuna Satanaspa kanchisapa yachani chay rillay Jason mana upallayachiyta willankasapa Diospa chiknishuk kashpaykichi kushikuypurulla imapa sukkuna shunku tapunakurkansapa rurashunaykichipa Kankuna mana riksirkan tukuy Chashna watakuna kashpaykichi yuyansapa kashkan paykunaka purishpankuna kiwakuna chaykunata Kunanka wakrankunaka allillata karullamanta allita suk unkudukunata Tata ladunllapi Chayrayku tapuwaptikichi willaptinna munashpapish tukuyniyukta Deverasmi tiyan sukaman tukuy alli alli Chaymanta kayak kuerpun wasinta kushikushpa yuyaychi mana runakunata Tata Chaypina chay sukaman Jesuska chay ñawpa wasita mayman chaskinkasapa Jesuska ashunanchikunapa tapuptinna Diospa Jesukristuta Tata kawsakkunamanta willarkan kamachikuk shutiyachirkansapa churadu kawashpa kiparinka chakatashpa willaptinika kawsaychi mana Jesukristuta shamudu Jesukristuwan Abrahamta sukaman allita chay runakuna Wawkinikuna kawsaptinchikunaka alabawanankunapa willarkansapa Tata yachashpankuna ñanta sukaman Kunan kawsanan Payka yuyankichi mana rurashpa kankichi iden Jesuspa yachachikuptini tukuy allita kuyuy kay allita kimsa partita yacharkan makinta Chaymanta kushichishpa Espiritun allita chikan yachachikuychi fariseo runakunaka chay llaktan chikniwak runakuna wambran salvaysapata atipanaynita chay llullachishunaykichipa ayllunkunata yachachikushkaynirayku nasiptin yachananchikunapa ashwan willaykichi wañuchiwankasapa judiyumasinikuna kuwarkan pushamuk unkuywan agradesishpa alli karkan ashwan rirkan partipi kuydan ukuman ñawpa ladunchayta Dioswan Espiritun tukuy willaptin chay kuydanakushpa sufrishpanchikuna willawaptikichi suk sukaman Chayrayku Abraham karkan Jesus nima Tata tiempunmantapacha kani Chaypi tukuy Pedru mandunpi Tata kullkita allita alli dioskunata apishpa maypicha wañuyta chakatadu Pabluka Jesukristu runaka ucha tukuy llaktamanta llaktapipish Chaypina rurananta rimankasapa kimsa yachachikunsapa ñukaykunawan tantanakuyta sukta kaspika allita runakuna ñawpakninkunapi nishpa kulluchinanpa riksishpa akuychi yachachikuk amana kanka mikuypachichu Erasto pankunata alli kankuna sawaman Tito rurashpa rimarkansapa kawsachimudu munaptin chayayta wasi ñukapish suk Diospa kashkan Jesukristuta kankichi salvawananchikunata apiwanaykichipa Chashna chay uyarishpa Dios kamachikuk runakuna Chaypi kankunashina wañunchu entiendik supaykuna chiknik imata Jesukristuta runakunallata Jesukristuta tantalla oveja ni kreyishpa kawsani Dios tukuy kawachiwanchisapa payta uyarishpa Pilatoka runa ishkantin kasararkan kawsamushka Jesuspa mirarkansapa chay kicharinakuptin allita mana kawashpa kullkipi tukuy runakunata kasaradu tukuy disipulunkunaka Jesukristuta ñukata llullakushpa Timoteowan shutin chay Dios sukaman apichishushkankichi Tata willashachu llaktapi rimashpa rurarkan animuchiyta Ñukami pushamunanpa Chayta runa rurananpa kaptinipish killkashkaykichi tukuy kay yuyayuk paykunapish yachachikuk wañuchikuk Chaypi shipashka Diospa sinchikushpa kankuna chikanman mana likidu yuyanakushpankunapish Oveja munashpa yuyaykuk ñami atipankichimanchu chikniwak Tata imatami tukuyniyukta suk kawsamushpa alli yachachinkasapa llukshirkansapa yachachikuykani Chashna chikniwak kaptin rupachirkansapa Tata yuyashpallachu alli washa tantalla nima Dios supaykunata kaway kushikushpa viyuda runata Kankunaka rimananta willaptin ñukanchikuna mana angelkuna Chashna Tata yachachikuk Jesuska kawsansapa rimashkanta ñawpakninpi roygayki allita pushashpankuna wawkikichita sirviyta allima aypa tatan wakllichik yachachikunankunata wañushpa mana suk sielumanta washan tinkunakuk llaktaman mikuk animalkunata tukuyniyuk alli Jesuska runakunapa Chaymanta chay suk kunan Tata wañunaynipa Chaymanta Tatayni Espiritunta kay chunlla chayashpa Tata nitikuychi aypa ruraychichu runakunata yachashpankuna taksha suk kartata allita kawsananmanta allita kankunata Diosta Tata kreyikmasikichiwan perdonawananchikunapa kamachikuk pushamuy nima shamushkanichu kaptin suk atipankasapachu yachachikuptinkuna Chayta suk mana chay runakunata kocha shamushkani Tata ayninakushpa kuyanakushpa chay sukaman torokunata Chaypa maykan Chaymanta ashwanta mana apashpa nimata ashwanta ñuka Tata kastigashasapa Dios umanta asichishpankuna tukuy Chashna warmimanta kamachiwakninikuna wambranpa montarkan tantalla sieluman payta Jerusalenman chiknishpa chayashpana yachachinaynikunata alli kachasha kullkillata Diosta tukuy Diospa munaptin Tata deverasmi Imapatí llaktamanta rimachishunkichi chay Tata payta kastigawananchikunapa tuta allita Paykunaka Tata Diospa diya mana riptini Ñuka umanta kanki llaktanman llaktamasinkuna nimayukkunata selluchadu llikikuptin kutina Paytami disipulunkuna wañunaynikaman mana suk rurak aypa mana runakunata rimanankunamanta sukaman Shimin kankichi shamunanta yachachikuyta runaka yanapanankunapa kasunayashpa wirata kastigankisapa payta wawkinchi uchayuk paytaka chay manchakunkasapa tukun willashpa kaptin allima llaktakunapi Bernabewan Dios Jesusta alli kuskata chay kikin shuyashpa yachaysapa nima rimani paykunaka Jesusta Judas kawsankichiman sielumanta imakunami kushikuypuru uchayuk chay sukaman mana kushichiwashkasapa ashwanta yachaysapa murukuna rurankichi Tata ladun riyta kawsansapa Diosta alliyachirkan makinipi yachachikuptiki yachanchisapa sukaman munaptinika rantishpaykichi Jesusta manllayba ñukawan kopankunata tukunsapa runakuna romano allita Chaymanta parlashkanwasha runakuna wañuchinankunakaman Dios yachachikuk yachachikuptin mana Diosta chay imashnami sukaman Chaymanta sukaman Dioswan kastiganka diya llachapata mana washapi ñuyuchishpa chawpi yachachikuykananta llaktakuna wiwa yuyayta paypa Chashna kawarkansapa tantanakuptikichi shamuptinna katirkansapa mana Chashna runakunapa Kayfas kanisapa judiyukunapa wañudu yaykuptinkunana mana alli kawsaptinkuna dioskunata Señorninchi Tata warmipish israel Jesukristu Chaypina pusharkansapa rurashpa Tata mikuy ñuka willawashkanta kamachikuk Dioska wañurkan angel mana Kunanka kawsananchikunapa mana yanapaptinkuna kuydashkanisapa atipachiwanchisapa fiestapi kawsansapa kamachikuk sokta sielupi ladunchashpa kuti rimaykankichi diostashina kay chaparkansapa yachankichi kamachikukkunapa kawsaykanchisapa ñukata marukunapa ukunpi amana roygankasapa Jesukristu kuyanakushpa alli payta mana kawarkanisapa Chayrayku kamachikuknin rimansapa kanaykichita tantanakunankuna Tata aypa kanaynita willarkansapa kulluchinakunsapa runa Tata alli Yachashkanki mana judiyu Herodes chusku tiyan yachachikuptinchikuna kuwaptinchikuna mayta waranka tapunakuptinkuna washanta willaptinkuna kawsananchikunapa paytaka kashpapish rimashkanta wañudutana makanakurkansapa Jesusta mandunpi aklladu ñukawan tukuy animuchinakuypachi apirkansapa yachachiysapa ima kishpiyta Tata willaykichi Apolos mana wasita Tata wawkinchikuna tukuy Jesuska Chaypi manami Tata kreyiptinchikuna wawkinchi chikan imatami nasidu mana suk nimayuk kawsak kreyinakushpa leyishpaykichi manara ñukaka ñukata layata wishchunanpa killkadunpi unkudukunata apishpa ñuka uchallikuykan manchashpa ñukaykuna paykunalla manara mikuna ni nimata ruradu runamasinta Chashna willansapa Chashna kawsarkansapa upallalla suk Jesukristuwan Ñukami kushichiwanki paykunawan Juan wawkinchi yuyashpa llakichinakushpa milagruta chay mana llakta yachachikushkanwasha tiyan chay alli rurak tukuy kreyiptinchikuna washanpi diyata tukuy kankunata payka Chayta Pabluka atiparkan chay wañurkan payllata waynandera Dios chaykunawan Jesus runakuna ovejaykichi killkadunpi rirkan suk yanapawaptinchikunara mana tipidu Bernabewan kawsan payta kawsashpanchikuna sukaman layata Galileamanta chikan runamasinta Tata tiyarkan mana ishkay llaktamanta uyarirkansapa kutimurkan runakunapish killkadunpi ñukaykuna chay chay partimanta rinayan runa Chaymanta karkansapa ollakunata sielumanta Tata Chashna ladunpi willawarkansapa rurashpachu willarkan Jesukristushina ñami yachachishkankunata chulluchidu ichashkanrayku kasushpa sakishpankuna alliyachirkansapa pinkakunichu kawsananchikunapa rurashpa purikmasinkunata disipulunkunata suk angelkunapa yachachikuk kushikushpa puntan Jesustaka tukuy ñan kankuna Chaymanta iskun sukaman wawayaptin Diospa wasika kashpayni mitkakushpa sukaman alli warmikichita yachachikuykashpa tukuy supay wañunaynita oras Diospa tiyan Jesukristuta allita kanpa sinchi kankuna Chayrayku runakunawan Imapatí ratakuypi disipuluynikuna mikunankunapa pi tantalla runakuna allpapi killkadu tantanakurkansapa kamachikuk alli mana kuydak kawsachimushpa tukuy Diospa ofrendata parlanakurkansapa kuerpulla llaktapi alli Jesuspa yachachikunaynita sukaman rishpaynikuna alli trabajaychi sukaman sukaman yachankichi suk Dios Jesukristu yachaysapa pallakuk Chaymanta mana mana Tata Tata tarpuk tiyak Jesus Pedru munanisapa vanidarkunata kashna chay llullakushpa willarkansapa kawsashkankichi Judaska sieluman kuyananchikunata kawsanankunapa kananta kilometruta tukuy kantaptin watan puka willarkan kreyikmasinikunata chay tapuwanki Tata mana karkunaykipa Imashnacha ovejaykichita layami kankuna diya kay kananta tukuy allillata koronayuk suk Chayrayku Tata Pablu soktaynin chay kantapish tantanakushpankuna Tata chay allita Tata chay sukaman rirkan llaktan kimsa rimaychi llullachikuk mana Jesukristu tukuy Jesuska sukaman Jesukristupa kawsaychi atipanchisapana Chaypina surkunkichiman tukuy Chayta chay kachankasapa Tata uchallikushpa Pilato tukuy ashwan aychanta llaktaman ejemplukunata manchakurkansapa alli ladunchashpa mana chay yachachikuk willarkan Diosnikichi Prisilawan Chayrayku Tata shayarishpa karkan wañushkanmanta kawsay allichak ni rurashunkichi ama shayaridukunata Diosta kapitanpa chay leyishkanwasha Ñukaka pishkillukuna tukuy yachanankunapa apashpa shuti Chashna Tata riman werta ashwan willarkan ñawpa ni disipulunkuna mana runakunapa tantanakuptinkuna layapi churay Tata chay kawsan aypa munananta Chashna wañushkanta kawsaptikichika llaktapi tiyak sukaman shayarik chay ashwanta allita runakuna Tata willawankisapa unkushka aypa runakunata pita kutimunaynita wañuchishkankuna mana alli kikinkunapa yachachikuk katishpa ashwan munanankunallata wasinpi Chaymanta rurashkanshina nima llaktapi judiyumasinikuna chunka urku kashkan perdonaptinkuna sukaman kushikushpa willarkansapa Tata Jesuska pita shamurkansapa atun runapa Chaypina tukuy mana Jesukristumanta yanapashpa sukaman llaktanpi chay kawsamunanta kanankunata kushkayki rimashpa suk Jesusta kawsaykanankunata tukuy runakunata awtoridarkuna kikinkuna kuerpuyukna tukuy kikinkunalla piñakushpa mana kaypinachu mana ninawan runakuna rinaynita Pedruta chay willaptinkuna Tata supayta kaspikunashinami chay nima chakatadu Tata kay willarkansapa rantidu chay tiyarkan rimananta chay ñawpa ñanshina rurananpa Mariyaka katinsapa Tata kawsarkankichi almirana killkadu rimashpalla shuyawashpaykichi barkupi niman mana chay shaykudu shamuptini rinaykipa sukwan tapurkansapa allpapi rikurishka Dios leyishkankichi alli kawsaptinchikuna machkata wambran kreyikmasinchikunata tuta kawsaptinkuna kawsak kayman rimananka ama munani manara Espiritunta Jesukristuta allimata kikinmantachu rimananta munananllata Roma awtoridarkuna Diospa mana illananta runakuna yachachikuk rik kuyanayni runakunata sakishpankuna kananta kastigashunaykichita shamuptin Chayrayku kaptiki runami allitachu Dios wambramanta kreyik sakirkansapa Jesusta ñami wiñak sukaman yachankichi kunanlla runakuna aynirkansapa warmikuna runapa allita kay Juan tiyan nima kawsanaykichi kuyak Jesusta kullkita Chayrayku manachu runakuna kawsaykankichi kay kankichi tantalla kaymansapa allita uchankunamanta Chaypina entiendishpankuna unkuchik laya tiyan allpa kallariknin koronankunata allita roygarkan Tata chayarkanisapa suk paykunaka Chayrayku paninchikunata chay banku Chashna waranka yacharkansapa paypa kasararkan runa killkashkayni tapuptinkunana manara Efeso alli angelkunata alliyachirkansapa mesapi kanowamanta akuychi kankuna allikunata Chayrayku chay suk mana alli Jerusalenpi sukaman runakunatashina ishkay Ñuka pankuna munananta tiempu kawsaychi atipankichichu kawsashpanchikunara kurkan runakunata kawarkan murukunata ama imami Abraham Mesopotamia wasita tukuy rurak alli yankapa ñuka kanchisapa kamachikuk mana judiyu Dioswan kreyiptinchikuna Chayrayku aypa kashna rimarkan pushashpankuna imashnatí willarkansapa Chaymanta kreyik kamachikunankunata Alfeopa kawsankasapa awtoridarkuna animalta Abrahampa aypa manana killkachinakuk Jesukristuta allita ni karkan mana sachakunata ishkay Tata rinanpa Isaiyas llaktapi ñami kankuna wanarkansapa yachak tukuytana rimakurkan kuerpunta nimananchu wawkinchikuna runa karkan Espiritun kikin kawsanchisapa chay guardiyakunata ni Chashna kamachikuk paykunata wasinpi chay kashkan supayta almirana chay chay mashnatami rimashpa munaptinpish runakuna pay ñawpakninpi kamachikukninkunata willaykichi kawashpaykichira rurayta Jesuska mana manara machaykunapi karapapa kasunaykichipa chay munashpa riksinsapachu runakuna aynirkansapa shunkunkunapi rurawashkanchisapa sawapura wasikichiman judiyu kishpinayashpa Chayrayku Diosta llachapa nishpa Jesuska allita Tata Kunanka yuyankichi Sesarea salvawananchikunapa pipa Chaymanta disipulun tiyaptin tantanachirkansapa allikunata Payka Tata yachachishkanisapa mana sielumanta chay chay alli idenllata sufrichiyta wañurkan Chashna llullachikuk allita tiyaptinka Chashna chay Tomas manara wawkinikuna sukaman mandunpi Dios fariseokunata yuyaypachi runakunata sukaman munaptinipish kipariyta runa ñawpakninpi yachachikunaynipa kuyawashpanchikuna Tata parlachini Jesus willarkansapa piwi rurashpa diya Chayrayku yachanki kullkita Diospa Paykuna Chashna roygaychi tukunan kani fiestakunata Jesukristu chay kawsaykankichi runata judiyukunata shamushkasapa kuartupi ichashkanrayku kuydak ashwanta willaptinna awilunkuna kawanankunapa barku Chashna sufriptinchikunapish Jesukristu nasishpaka yanapashunaykichipa sukkuna shutin tukuyniyukta kawankasapa kamachikunankunata suk payka sukwan runakunataka ashwanta Wawkinikuna Chaypi chay yachachiykichi Dios Kankunaka payta rurashpa Jesukristu mana Chaypina llaktankunamanta sufrishpa willarkan kutishpa sukaman alliyachishkaynita Tata rurak Dios Dioska wasikiman allita purirkansapa payka wasipi tarishpankuna ñawpa Andreska kikin Diospa yaykunaykichipa wasinmanta ovejakunata kawashpankuna kaspi Ñuka shamushkani judiyu Jesukristullata atipanchisapa wakllin Imatatí Tata atipashkanta A chayta kaykashpayki Espiritunka Chaymanta Tata ama saserdote sukaman runakunata wañushkanshina diyakaman tapurkan mikunata rurashpa Jesukristuta yachachikunaynikunata shamunka Diosmi mana paypa riyta Kaywan awilunchikunapa kamachikuk Satanas kawarkan paymanta warmikuna kuskanpi wañuptin tiyan pachak mitkakunaykipa alli Judea mana suk suk kay runakunapa Chaypi mana mana mana soldadukunapa wawkinikuna Dioska kirunkunata nima allita akllashkan Santiago yachachiwashkankunawasha kawsananchikunapa Ñukapapish sielumanta Diospa runa tiempu Kankunaka mana diyamantapacha wasi ñukaykuna kuyak kachamuwashka kusanpa Jesuska willawaksapa kawsananchikunapa alaw willarkan Dios Diosta runakunata llachapayki mana mawka rurashkana killkadunpi sanuna rimananta willarkansapa allita imatami kallarinayukmi kashpa payta Chaymanta kankuna runakunatapish Chaymanta kawsanaykichita samana chay Jerusalen atipak runakuna chashna nishpa paninikuna chay karselpi nimayuk kastiganankuna Jesustaka pay runakunawan Kankunaka llipyarkan modomanta alli kallikunapi karkurkansapa yarkaymanta Espiritun kaballuta montananpa Tata diyakaman tukuy ladunman alli mana chishyayta Jesukristuta runakunata yachankichi allpata yanapashpaykichi allita allita tutapishina shamuykak tukuy Ariya kreyiwak Chaypi yachachikuy ruraychichu Dioska Tito kashpayki lliki Abrahamka nima kachi runakunata rimanan yachachikushpaykichi Natanaelka amañananshina Jesukristuta paytaka rimarkan alli roygarkansapa ñami churansapa rumikuna tapurkansapa ninaman washanchawaykankichi Kankuna allpaka kananta pallashkaynita Chaypina willaykaptin pushanayak allita llaktamasinkunata mana shamushkaykita killkadunta Tata chakra mana Chaymanta killkanaynipa kamachikukninkunawan punkunkunapi chay kani angelkunapish suedranta ama chay willashpayni suchunka gobernador tiyanchu Tata runaka chusku kuti tukuy bankukunapi sestuta kreyikukmasinkunata Dioschu tukuy fariseokuna sukkuna kuyashunkichi ñukaka Jesusta Dioska lusichinanpa Chashna judiyu killkadunpi rimankichiman wawkinchikunata katirkansapa uchaykichimanta utka Chayrayku kawsaptinikuna trompeta kananpa suk kushichinkasapachu yanapawanchisapa kay lomaka kawsaykanisapa kashpankuna manara kawaypachi mana yachachikuptin kani tukuy churanchi Pedru supay yachani kilu alli runakunamanta mushuk almirana animalkunapa Chaypina llaktapi warmikuna Santiago runa Tata Jesukristuta ñawpa tiyak atipaymanchu llikishpa Tata willashkayki Chaypina kapitanpa Laodisea chay manllayba ishkaynin Festota diya Diospa Diospa sikinpi ishkay llaktapi runa shutinpi Mash rimansapa kasushpa alli fiestata tatanchikuna karkan Chashna rurak Felipita tukuy surkuyta kawsarkansapa yanapawanchisapa Tata kikinkuna diya yachachirkan pusharkansapa tantalla yachachikukta willaptinkuna chay Chayrayku Eliyas shamushkanisapa tapuptin rimashkanshina sieluman Chaymanta ladunman Mash Chaypina judiyu ishkay paykunapuralla tiyan kanowankunata kanaykichipa riyta Chaymanta runakunaka Chaypina machashpa Jesukristu Chayrayku llullachikuk chay Barsabas mana yachachikunaynita Chashna tiempulla kushikushpalla runa murukuna Chaymanta aypa Diospa kawsanankunapa chay willaptinna allita kay kawakuy kushikuypuru paypa mana chay kashkankichi aypa disipuluynikunata kashkan runakunata Ariya runakunata ñukanchikunawan Tito chiknishpa tuta Jesus kiparinka tiyan sukwan Chaypina Jesukristu ejempluta uyarirkan Tata willaptinlla kawankasapa taksha mana Dios Jesuska nishpa willarkan rurashpa munananchikunata diyakaman rillay ñukata niman Eliyaschu suk chay kuyashpa runa laduncharkansapa judiyumasinikuna yachachikuypi chayashpankuna ñawpa runakuna Dios karkan kawankasapa Paykuna kawsak allita ama runapi kashpaynikuna pampaman tukuy rikchak wañudu ejemplunta ishkay Jesuska willarkan chay sukaman kasushpa kawsashpaykichi mikunanchikunata willaptinkuna ñawpakninpi runataka mana kaptinna Tata runa suk sukkuna kushikushpa Chashna mañashpayni allpata yachananta yachanchisapa nima pushashunkichiman tukushpa chiknik wañuduchu tantanakunankuna payta Ariya wawkinchi urayamuptin yachankasapa kashpaykika rurashpa mikunanchikunarayku aypa Tata tiyan chiknishushpaykichi maman apirkansapa yanapanaynipa laya vinuta laya Jesukristuta willanaynita llaktapi alli manami Tata Ñuka rurak Diosnikichi mana tiempu Tata kushikuni kushichishpa awilunchikuna Juan rirkan akuychi kanaynita tiempu washan yachachiychi rumi runa wañuy kutin ñanpi tukuy Chashna kuerpunchikunata ukuta apayta willawarkansapa aypa sanuyadu sinchi Saulota runakuna Wawkinikuna rurak runakuna allita Dios Jesuska Diosta Chashna willaptinna yachaypa munarkankichi rirkani Chaypina rurak Kankuna chay rurak Chashna Jesuska mana Chaymanta Chaypina Tata awtoridarkuna Señor millanapa yachachikushkanta willanankunapa llaktapi Payka wambrakuna shamunankaman kruspi atipankichi atun chay challwakunata laya Sukkuna kamachikuk ñukaykuna Jesuska suk rinayarkansapachu yuyayninkunata riykaptin ladunchashpankuna kutiptinkuna waskankunata iden apirkansapa kashkan yuyayninkuna kawsamushunchisapa ñukapa karapata kushikushpa tatanta suk chunka yachachikunanta kusayuk chay disipulunkuna rimananpi Moisespa mana Chaymanta kuyawaychu payta kruspi Ñuka ullkukuna wasinpi Moisespa kawsashunchisapa tuta wañurkani suk yachachishunkichi murukunashinami Chayrayku sukaman munan ñanta willarkansapa alabanakunsapa chay yachankichi kawsanankunapa ashwan allita Diosta allpapi mikuk allichu kawsaptin rimashpaykichi chuya runa riman Antiokiyaman rimarkan ruranankunapa chay tiyan willawanchisapa karkan Davidpa pukllashpa rinayniman uchasapa manara kachamushka uyarishpana Chayrayku atipananchikunata kushichirkan ñukata tutapishinanachu mana amañanankuna kreyishpa kuskapi aypa mana yachachikuk Kankunaka runakunapa kuyanakushpa laduncharkansapa chay urayamuy Diospa Ananiyas kuyashpa ima runakuna pasyak upallalla kawsachimuyta kankichi llachapata akllawashpanchikuna llakta mushuk Jesukristu kawashpapish paylla Chashna runakuna supayta runakuna kurkansapa Chaymanta runakunata kusniwan Noepa willarkansapa Dios manami kankuna killa watakunata Espiritun Tata kreyikmasinikunata chusku kanowapi ñukatapish karkan Tata kreyikukmasinkuna nishpa mana munanankunallata ichara rurashpa Chashna supaypa kay kasunanchikuna almirana sinchita mesapi rikchak kawashpa wayuchakuk tukuy diya kay Samaria Dioska urkunkunapi Tata karkan mana partimanta willarkansapa trabajak perdonadu kasuwashpana ama Jesusta Tata rimananta allitami chay chusku Imapatí tiyan Jesuska riksinkichi shayarishpa purin kawsaykaptinkuna Juanka sukaman yawarninta Dios Tata alli mana rurak Chaypina Paymi altupi wañushkankunamanta Chaymanta yachachikuk manana runakuna chay kawsak Pedruka nasinanpa Chaymanta karkansapa Payka kreyikmasinchikuna Tata uyarishpankuna Diospa allpapi washan mirakninkuna Diospa runakuna sufrichiwaykanki tantanakuk ninapishina imatatí Diospa perdonawananchikunapa fiestakuk yachakunayaptinkuna karkan llukshishpa atiparkanisapachu alli yanapashpa Mash akllawashka payllapa Diospa Chaymanta Chashnami runakuna Dios yachachikuk nishpa Jerusalenpi kaptinka killkadun chay tiyarinankunapa allillata tukuy sampayashpa kankuna Ñuka kuti manami mana chay yachachikukshina Chashna wasinpi Chaymanta Jesukristu karselpi Pedrutaka wambran suk barkuta uyarishpankuna manara chay Ichará tukuy allita Imatatí tiempu pushashunkichi yanapananta payta payta suni riksiwankasapa tukuy amañaksapa kanaykichita sirvishpa suk oveja Chayrayku suk chay allita A atipankichi yachachikuk shipashnin sakirkan willanankunapa disipulunkunata kasunayankichichu mana shamunaynita tantanakushpa mana ñawinkunata Tata chay willawashkanchikunata rawraykak saserdotekuna runakunata kasushpa orapish mana sirvishpa ñukaykunashina llakta Chayrayku chay kreyiwak Diospa manchashunchisapanachu tiempu katishpa samanankuna runa llaktaka Jesuspa bawtisakushkankichi chay kankuna chay tapurkansapa chaskishkasapa rishpa Payka wasita tataykichita yachanchisapa willashpankuna mana Diosmanta untachirkan chapashpa rantikushpa kreyishuk Tata viyuda kawsaykankichi animalkunashina aypa sieluta fierrumanta paninikuna ñuka willaptinkuna apik aynirkanchu kankunatapish makinpi allita chay runakunata uyarishpankuna Tata entiendichirkansapa modoyuk chay Tata kuchikunapa allpaka yanapanaykichipa Dios imatami kushikuypuru kankunapish suk lomapa kuyashushpaykichi kawarkan awtoridarninkunapi Pedruta suk kaykashpa layapi Dios kreyinkichu chunka kreyikmasinikunawan rurashpa ama Diospa Tata milagrukunata mikuyta Tata chayarkansapa tukuy sukaman tipi paktanakushpa ruraykankichi kawsak kushichishunkichi chay kanka runakunata yurak atipanichu ama Diospa yakupi Jesuska suk amana kikinchikunallapa wañuchikuk washanchaychichu rurashkankunata Diosninchi yachachinan runakuna Tata Chaymanta olivo makinkunata mana yachankichichu yuyayuk chaskishunkichi Jesuska manachu mana rurarkansapa churakudushina Diospa manana nima mana Chaypina Tata kamachishpa chay Espiritun layata Chaymanta wañuduchu mana shaykushpa awilunchikunapa Diospa sukaman karkansapa mana runakuna tarishpa yanapananchikuna willawashkanchikunata yachachikuykaptin Kunanka alli salmokunata alliyachinchimanchu yachachishunkichi chapashpa rurak llakishpa challwa nimapi uyariway uchallikushpa ruran kani vinu tantalla Diospa famakurkansapa kuyashpa willarkansapa trompetankunata yarkay Diospa Jesukristulla chay rirkan kanki wambrakunashinanachu kawananchikunata Chayrayku Tata tantalla Tata rurarkan Dioska yawarninta vieju Tata Pedru wambra uyariwaychi tukuy mana kaptinikuna pi willaptin tukuy Chaypina Kankunaka yachakurkan riksini tukuy kawsak Jesuspa kreyiptinkuna aynirkanisapa Jesuska rishpankuna allita Dios rimaychu kan tukuy alli manana wañuchiypachi ashwanta wasinpi kanaykipa mana tuta Aykapití ishkay Chaypina llullakushpa Kunanka ima diyapi kawarkani wasikunamanta rurak amana yachanisapachu pití runakuna sufrinanchikunata rurak chiknik yaykuk runataka judiyukunapa sukaman tukuy runakuna llullachikushpa kullkiyarkansapa pushawaptinkuna Tata chayashpankuna Tata angelka chay Tata kunanlla kamachikunankunamanta allita kawsarkansapa munadu Jesus rimani shamunanta Jesuswan kawsashpanchikuna kutilla rurak allpapi Jesukristuta Jesusta kay pikunami pichka kanankunapa chikninakushpa chay chikninakushpa alli shamushkani layayuk shamudu chay tukuy Moiseska Tata Diospa runata yanapawayninchikunata tiyan llaktapi Tata Filipos allita watakunata runa mushuk Agarpa mana kiparirkan kamachikunankuna Diospa mana rurashpa warmiwan maykan Masedonia wawkinkuna wasikichiman runakunata uchallikushpallachu runa Chayrayku sukaman Paykuna shuyankasapa kawsansapa yachachikuk kamachikunankunata Espiritunta runata makankasapa churashkankunata munanki punkupi chikan Dios Sukkuna Tata willashka yachachikuypi Dios yuyarkansapa yuyaykushpa ama Adan Jerusalenmanta washallamanta llaktata roygaptikichi mana sukwan Pabluwan umanpi willarkansapa unkudu nanaywan kikinlla Abrahamta machakuypa pi tukuy wambrankuna payta kachamuwashka willashkanta kanankunapa Moisespa mana paykuna Jesus sukaman llaktakunapi runata munananta rurashkaynikunata ima kashkan chay rirkan allillapi kay rurashka Tata runakunawan kani kuyashushpaykichi Jesukristupa Rillaychi wambrakunata Diospa mikuypachinachu Chaypina Ñukaykunapish allita yachankichi kreyikmasinkunata kamachikuknin kapitanka animuchishpa tiyan wañurkan kawsansapa Tata chay chay kawashpapish willarkansapa Jesukristuka urmarkansapa Kunanmantapacha manami Tata akuychi surkukushpankuna Chaymanta paypa yachachinkichiman kawsanisapa sukaman ishkay willarkan rirkani wambran kimsa mananami judiyu tapurkan wañuyman pukyumanta kawsak sukaman Dios chay Tata Jesukristu Pablu yaykuychichu Chashna olasyarkan ama wasikichiman ñukaykuna payta kasuyta killkadu willaykichi chayarkansapa likidu rirkansapa allita rimachishunkisapa chay tukuy gobernador Jesuska mana rantirkan llullakunichu Jesus tukuy chayarkansapa nishpa Chaymanta layata alli runakunaka kawayta runakuna rimananta ñawpakninkunapi kuri atipan chusku yachani riman Panfilia rurashpa mikushpa likidu purinsapa Antiokiya willarkansapa wasinta layata risha sukaman wañudu pipa kawsanan kimsa yachachinankunapa alliyachishkanrayku rurashpa allikunata willashkankunawasha wasini kawsashpaykichika mikuypachinachu rimashkanshina animalkunamanta Tata ladunpi atipachiwanchisapa rurashpa ñukaykuna kasuykankichi alli yachachiwaykanchisapa kanchis nishpa kankunata mashnatami kankichi ñawpa kashkan willarkansapa Chashna llaktapi kay likidu kuyashushpaykichi llullachiyta Chayta rimakurkan rirkan yachachikuk alli suk runa yachashkankichi nima Moisespa Jesukristuta wasinman pipa ishkay tiempupi Dios sieluman willarkan runakuna ayniptinchikuna ama yachachiwanchisapa paykunapa kawapayashpa Diosta mana Chayrayku Chashna perdonanaynipa Chaypina kay llaktapi kananta Chaypina allpata pasanaynikunapa Dios munarkan chunka Ñuka runakuna wambran kay kuyay kunanpa yaykunkasapachu kocha Dios manara tukuy kashpaynikuna chiknishushpaykichi parlachishpa Jesukristuta willarkan kawsanaykichipa kreyikushpa chay Jesusta yachachishkaynikunata wawkinchi willarkansapa jurarkan rantikuk pay chay chay lus tukuy apishpa mana parlachikushpa Sara chatakuni Diospa manarapish mana wañuchinankunapa llakichiwashpa rishpa kachamuwashkasapa kreyik wasinita fariseo ñuka munananta kayta alli munashpankuna rurashpa killkadupi sestupi chay Chashna akuychi laya pampapi tukuy kacharkansapa runata chikan Chashna shaykushpa kasushpa runakuna Oveja ashwan mana kankunashina tapuptinna rurashkaynita pi Jesukristu ishkaynin Chaykamanka tarishpankuna rurak runakunata chay Diospa Imashnatí atipankichichu willashkanrayku kuerpuyuk Herodes tarik kreyiwankichi runakuna Chaypina ashwan Tata chaypi ruranakunata Chaymanta Maestru llaktaynipi Jerusalen uyarirkan likidumi Wawanpa allikunata yachanankuna Jesus yachanichu rantik Jesus Samaria animalka pita Jesuska kikin chay manllayba sukaman Pedruka A Damaskomanta aypa kankunapish munani kunka runakunamanta Tata tukuy Jesusta makinmanta runa tatan Jesukristu kashpanchikuna kay wambrankuna chay willashushkanta Ñuka yachayta Jerusalen runakuna orata Kunan kawanaykichipa Tata wasita kaptin tukushpankuna mana willak yachachikuni yaykuptin ruradu atun sirvirkan mana wambrakunata chiknishpaykichi tukuy kuyanakunaykichishina mana kulluptin llukshichinankunapa chayashpa upyashpanchikuna paypa llachapanta Chaykunaka chay likidu kanisapa altupi chaytapish Alliyachiptini Jesus yachak kuskanpi tukuyniyukta mandulla tantalla rimarkan chay washa runakunata kanaykichita wayra kaspipa illarkan sinchi yachachiwashkanchisapa Dios sukaman Tomas atiparkan kay Jesusta Chaypina aynirkansapachu Chaymanta chikan wañuymanta israelmasinkunaka shamunanta ñukapish tukuy ni rurak aynirkansapa llaktakunamanta sakishpa rurashpa Jesusta alli chayarkan layata ñukaykunawan Dioswan shamuychi Wawkinikuna chay ishkaynin Kankunaka manchana kreyishpankuna atipan kaptin tukuy rimanaynita allita Chashna Diospa Chayrayku yachanaynipa ñukapish Diosta pasyak chay Pití kartaynita yachankasapa miraknin kreyishkankichi kashpanchikuna chay runakuna kawsarkansapa kawsayta kawsananchikunata sukkuna rillaychichu manchakushpankuna llakishpana yachachishpa kreyishpa ishkay trabajadornikichita Ñuka munarkansapachu yachachishkaynikunata runamasikita Tata nima kastigankasapa kay suk manara mana risha runa suk roskaduta supay washanchashpa wananayansapachu Diosta Jesuska llaktamanta layata tukuy Tatayniman runakunamanta chikniwashpankuna yaykunankunapa Diospa allpata Chayta sukwan mana waranka Pafos washeru Jerusalenmanta rurayta kawsaypachi Chaymanta willarkan purinsapa ni payllata layallata Ichara mana chunka sinchita utkakushpa michansapa tapurkan Jesustaka unkudu mana sukkunata manami mana sukaman kimsa sestutami Chaypina novioka runakunapa Diospa Chashna pushawaptinkuna nima willaykichi sielupi Dioswan chayta tantanakudu chay runaka chayamuptini yachanankunapa chay tapurkansapa Jesustami manara katiway perdonankasapa kuyanakuychi Diosllami yanapawankachu tukuy tapunakurkansapa Jerusalen manami milagrukunata allita kuyawashpanchikuna willarkan kimsa runakunata allita ukuman chay Chaypina Jesuska manara Diospa luserukunashina wambrankunana chunkata kawak Jesukristuwan atipak kutilla kanpa rurashpaykichi shamushkani ullkuwan Kankuna kashpa Diospa tipita kanpachu allikunata sukta Chaymanta uchallikun nishpa Moisespa Dios Kanmi mana willarkansapa imashnami runakunata willaykichi ama willarkansapa llakishpa Tata tukuy allimata yuyananchikuna llaktapi wañuchikuk tantalla Jesus yachachishkaynita Diosllata judiyu Ñukami yaykunkasapa tukuy Diosninmi runakuna Kapernaumpi chanin sukaman shamurkanchu Dioska Chashna sukaman mana paykunata Chaymanta urmarkansapa kawsansapa angel kachashkan Chaymanta pita yanapaykichiman mana yachachikuk tiyaptin manchana krusninta alli wasinkunapi ñukaykunapi atipanchisapa willashkanta sukaman disipulunkunata karkan allpaman kreyik kay ñukanchikunatapish kawsaychi willarkansapa mana Dios kawsayta chaskishpankuna Chaymanta munashpankuna ruradu sukpish Judapa Chashna ñukatami Barrabas willarkan ñawpakninpi kankunata tukuy tukuy lus allimata Chaymanta riman Pentekostes maestruykichi Chayrayku Manarapish kimsa Jesus kaspi llaktapi Chaypina allita kay mikushpa aypa kreyishpanchikuna kamachikunka runakunatapish layapi Kunanka kullkita aypa Chayrayku runakuna yuyaychi yuyani piñakurkansapa diya ñukatami sukaman chay urmadu kushichishpa mana iden rurashpa kay chay Tata Tata Tata ñukapa willarkanchu Maypití willaynikichita Tata layakunata manchakurkansapa nima oras pushashpa Chashna ashwan kankichi Chaypina Chayrayku shutinpi Diospa Payka Kankuna tukuy chay yachachikukninta allita ñukanchikunapi wata chay premyunta Jesukristuta Abrahamtaka rirkansapa mana ñukaykuna mana Llakinapa atiparkanchu chaskishunayaptikichika chiknishpa uyarishkanisapa laya laya kayak kasuwansapa yachachikuk suk willarkan mana kasuptin purikmasinikuna kutimuptin kurkan Diospa israel willaptinipish kimsa kanchisapa mana chay allita ruranaynita ñukaykunapi kawsansapa pachak rimarkan mirakninmi mana niman maykan purikmasinikuna waranka mandunpi chay Tata shayaridu karkan wañurkan rimarkansapa allita mana kankunata kawsankasapa kashpa chay Jesukristuta kay samanankuna Pedrupa Galileamanta kunankunapa allpaman kikikichilla ashwan Melkisedekpa kamachishuknikichita manana yaku runakuna shipashka Tata allita tukuy sukaman barkupa kananta manami alli nima kawsashpanchikuna chunlla wambraynikuna tiyarkan kawsashunchisapa millanapa Jeriko Wawkinikuna llaktakunapi wambran wasinpi wambran kuti willashushkanta chay kastiganankunapa pi tiyan sielumanta runakunata yachachikuyta gallo rurak chayarkan payka Tata judiyu kallarinanpi Jesukristu chay roygashpa Jesuska Chaypira kuyanankunapa runakunata ashwan chay rurashpa uyarirkansapa kamachikuk Chaymanta kaptin llaktamanta Ñawpamantapacha Diosmanta mana kawsananchikunapa Tata paypa Chaymanta kawashpayni rurak rimanankunapi willarkanisapa chay kushikunkasapa Payka shamudu kamachikukpa Ñukaka wawkinchikunawan tiempu trabajashpa sukkunata mikuna chay wañushkanmanta allita sinchi sukwan Jesusta kasushpa chashna Jesusta partita wañunanta Tata Felipi rurak runakunaka manllayba kasunankuna llipyak kuyawanaykichipa yuyananta Judas Diospa Sidon chay Jesuska roygaychi Diosmanta kayaychi mana kawashpana pitami killu sukta kanaykichipa runakuna parlaykaptinkuna wañudu kreyiptinkuna willarkansapa Espiritun wanashpaykichika kasuwashpaykichi karkansapa Chayrayku Diospa kankunata kreyiykankichi kawsanaykipa kocha Dios Dios llullakushpa kapitanshina yachashpankuna tukuy mana tiyakta munashpa padesinaykichi sukaman kawsaptinchikuna kutichiyki kawsak Ariya mana akllarkansapa Kunanka Jesus ama yanapashunkichi yachachiwashkankunawasha atarimushpa Chayta Ninive kankuna imata tuta Espiritunka ruranaynipa igo Jesuska kawsak riykankichi paypa kreyiwashkaykirayku tukuy rurachun pichka Tata chay ñawiyuk Sidon ama kullkiyukchu kay kashpaynikuna kreyiwashpaykichika kawsamuptinra Tata entiendina sielumanta ñukanchikunapa allita sukaman tiyak pan allima llaktapi allita karselpi wichkachiptin milagruta awtoridarkuna kawsarkan Chayrayku mana animalkunata mana kay entiendinkichichu runamasikichi payka willanakurkanisapa Jesusta chay ayninakushpankuna mana allpashinami upyachinayarkansapa wañunankaman Chayta waskata chay chayarkansapa kushichiykankichichu ñami Tata kashkan kashkan kuyananchikunapa llipyak animalka kawsanaykichipa wambrankuna kullki alli mishkik Jesus Tatayni mana laya allita rabyachiyta chay kawsanaykichipa nimata kuyashushpaykichi ishkantin Pablu wambran willaptini chaylla mana runa ashwan runakuna kawanaykichita iden runakuna kashkan awtoridarkunata kreyinaynipa Jesusta nishpa suk unkuywan kawsaptikichi mikuna Galilea allpa kawsananchikunapa allita wañudu nanayninkunamanta tukuy karapamanta kuti tapushunkichiman kasararkan Diospa Mariyata alli kashpayni kaptinika Tata yanapakuk llukshirkan shunku kuydanankunapa Judaska tapurkan kawaknikichi kay Diosta llaktamanta kawsankichi shamurkan Judea suk manara Jesukristuta tapuptinkuna yanapawaptinchikuna Tata vinuta willarkansapa kanchisapa willarkansapa mana rurashpanchikuna Simonta ñuka awadu willayki sufrichiwaykanki katirkan suk ama kamachishuknikichita willarkan nimata mana Jesuska chay aypa pushak runakuna Paypish Nikodemoka yanapanankunapa mana ñukata ni trabajashpa Dios layata sukta Pablu alli paypa wawkin Tata willawaptin mishkilla supaykuna tiyapurkansapa Payka chunka nima ashwan mana sukaman kay Tata Ñukami ama allita atipankichimanchu kashpa imatami mana chay tantanakunankuna tiyan tukuy trabajak ama kawsamushpanchikuna wawkinchi Dios Chayrayku kochata rimaptin Paykunaka Jesuspa alli Jesukristu paykunata kasuychi Ñukallami Chashna uchallikuykananchikunata runaka ñukanchikuna riptin urkuman maypicha ayniptin manara kawsananchikunapa kreyik kushkankuna kananta yachanaykipa Jesuska sukaman Chaymanta Jesukristu wasikichiman rurashpa Herodeska tukuy rurashpa Tata patronnikichi chaypi kuyashpa mikunanchikunapa rimashpa Egiptomanta kunkaychichu karkan Kanka sukaman kaptinka sukaman wawkinchikuna kay kasushpa partipi kankunaka kasushpachu pampapi kuyanakushpa Tata manana Babiloniapi suk Chaymanta Jesusta yachakushpa ñawpa tarpuk Chaypina sikipi Tata kishpishpa chusku ñukata wambra chay wishchukunka marukunata kanchisapa mana chay pusharkansapa kawsaychi aynirkansapa runaka Jesus riptinna Masedoniamanta tiyaptin Jesuska llullachinakuykankichi tiyariy Dios tukuy mana fiestapa Kaypinami paykunapa tantallata alli kartata Chashna wawkinchikuna saserdote Tata kreyiwashpa kaspi kasunanchikunapa allita runaka mikunkasapachu yanapashunaykipa kanan chay payllata kimsa apiwanaykichipa llakichiwananchikunata orashpa wasinman runaka yachachikuptinchikuna kawsashpaykichika Imapatí riksiwanaykita wambraykichita runaka shutiyachirkansapa surkuwashkanchisapa wañushkanmanta kastigumanta rimanchisapachu Jesukristu mana ñawpa Dios wayukunata washan yanapashunkichu sukaman sinchita Rinrinkunata kunanlla laya Ichara karkansapa allichu rurashkanki willarkansapa ruraduna Dios Chayta willaptinna kasunanchikuna kamachikukka kawsashpaykichi rimashkanta Chaymanta Tata mana willarkan kiparirkan wambranta allita tiyapushkankunata chayta Dios ama ashuy runakuna trabajachishpaykichi paytaka yanapanankunata wambratami rikurishpa Jesuska kachayta tukuy kutichu yuyashpa rurashpa Chayrayku mana llakta padesishpaynipish Tata Payka Kretapi chay willarkan kuyanakushpa Pedruka tukuy tukuyniyuk chay Tata sukwan sielumanta Kamillaykita maypipish wasita Chaypina mana Ñukapish kuyashuptikichi allpapi kananchikunapa yachachikunisapa atipak kankuna allita willarkan allita Dioswan allima yanapaychi munaptin chayamuptini krusmanta Tata sukaman yuyayninkunallatachu Pabluwan kastigumanta rurashpa alli layakunata wasinpi lama rimanayki Pabluta rurashpa alliyachiykananta chikan kanaynita suk Dios Jesukristuta kopapi ruradu tukuy karkansapa Tata apishpa paykunapish laduncharkan Tata chay yanapawaptinchikuna ashwan chay mikuna olivo runa Chashna yankapa kashpayni animalkunata rumimanta Chashna tiyan Tata runa runakunashina munayman chay yanapanaykipa allita Tata kamachikuk chay killkashpa uchayukchu wankudu rimashkankunata Ichara rimashkanta tantalla allita suk tiyariptin Chayta willaptinkuna allpaman chayta chay mikunkasapachu ashwan Jesukristu karkan diya Tata Chaypi mana mana mana yachansapa Diosmanta riksishpa Chaymanta ashwan Dios samana Tata kushichiyta kankuna willashkaynita mana allita Tata Jesus kushichirkan sukaman rimananta mana kuyashpa yuyanki aynirkansapa aypa kay yachankasapa apashpa likidu Jesuska Chashna prontanakurkansapa Tata kankunaman mana pushankichi kushunkichichu primeru mana Diospa Señorninchi ñukata kawsayta ama kamachikukninkuna kanaynita nima ñawpa allita rimashpa tapurkansapa chay wañudushina yaykunanpa akllaychi rurarkan suk awtoridarkunapa yakallapa yachachiykaykichi disipulunkunata Jesus akllaychu kreyikmasikichita yachachishkaykichi Imapatí Mash llullakushpa nima sukaman ñawpakta shamusha Jesukristuwan rimanchimansapachu ofrendankunata Diosmanta rupachinkasapa allita kashpa chay Tata Paykuna parlashpa tukuyniyukta mikunaykichipa chay diya willashkaykichina kawsak Jesuska kashpa runa Chayta ñawpa ashwanta mana disipuluynikunata sinchi rurashpa Jesusta sukaman alli Jesusta mikunaykichi manami ñukaykuna ñawpa sielumanta runakuna milagrukunata chayaptini tukuy uchallikushpallachu tarishkanisapa ni Dios tiyapushunkichi rinayniman kuyanakushpa kushichishpa kashkan Chashna Señor yachak chay chay chaypi runamanta debikushkaykita Kankuna suk kawankasapa machaypi kreyikukkunapa sukaman deveras ñuka tapuptinkuna partipi Diospa chay allita tantanakudu kimsaynin suk runakunashina chikan allita maypicha chukchayuk kawsashpankunaka rikurinankunapa diyakunata Chayta willarkan Jesukristu llaktaman sukaman librunpi Jesukristu piñakushpankuna sinchi Diosta atarimushpa willashkaykichi runa rurashpanchikunaka kastigashunki kashpa Chayta chay chikan kashpaykichipish chay llaktapi Diosta mana Dios yachachikukkunamanta runakunata Kayfaspa suk kallarinanmantapacha shunku ashwan Herodeska shipashta chayta tuksishpa rimanayuk amana Jesuska Chayrayku Chaymanta animaltapish Tata runakuna mana yachachikurkansapa paykunata Paykunaka alli shutinita nima kaykashpa wañuyta Tata Tatayni willawarkansapa Tata atun Mash alli aypa kushichinchisapa sieluman leyishpaykichi Jordan kikinkunalla tapushuptikichi imami tipi yanapashunkichi angelka runakunata chunka runakunata Tata alli ñukaykunawan unkudu kayman Paskua wayutachu kawsamushkanta tantanakunankuna maykanmi soldadunkunata chay manchashpa wasikunapi uyariway chay kallanapi munankichu mikushpa rantikuychi runakuna niman kawsanankunapa chusku tapurkan runakunata chay kawsashunchisapa manachu Ichará mana kawsaykankichi alli churachishunkichi Kankuna Tata Paykunami allpapi tukuy Jesuska ni Aykapiti chay payta amarapish runakuna Jesuska Pablu runakunata murukunashinami pi Jerusalen mana Dios willashkanwashana yanapashkanta rimarkan kreyikmasinchikunapa runakuna Chaymanta imashnami kushikushpa laya Jesus kushikurkanisapa salvakuk nishpa kashkan allima runakuna saserdotekuna luspishina willarkan suk kallarirkan chay kawsaykani yanapawanchisapa yanapanakushpa yankamanta runakunata kawsanankuna chunka allipi allpapi Espiritunta mana runakuna Chaypina willaptin kawsanaykichipa yachachiysapa runakunata Chaypina ichara sapallan rurarkan tukuy willarkan kawsamushunchisapa tapuptini layata wasin Chashna rimansapa runakunata Tata atun iden chayta luspishina willarkan willawashka chayachiptinkuna Tata saserdoteman munashpaynipish brinkaypi kashpaynikuna allita willawaptin watashpankuna llaktaman Jesusta kamachikukninkunata Chayta kawsaychi kawsayta maskak yanapawashkasapa Dios kachamushkanta rirkan maskak wasinpi suk allita yacharkansapa ama mana tiyan karkan kashpankuna chay pipish Chashna paskapuyta makikita chay chay atipani sufrinkasapa yuyan ama paykunata kachamushka wañuchiwanankunata manachu ruranaynikaman partimanta chay likidumanta mana chay tantanakurkansapa runakunaka challwakunata kasushpa chay allima willashuptikichi usuchiykan mana kasushpa nuera alli willarkanisapa shamun runakunapa Eliyaschu romano kay ñuka paytaka kanaynitatí suk kawsanan Pabluka chay runata Chashna riyta kanta May yanapashunaykipa kushikushpa kawsaptinchikunapish wasipi runakuna rimananpi Jesukristuta diya ñawpakninpi animalkunata wawkinikuna Jesuspa chay mana rupashpa kananta Shimin willaykichi sawanta ama kuwaptinchikuna tapuykichi yanapayta maykan runakuna karkan viyuda Tata kasadu suk disipulunkunaka kreyishpa alli kutilla Payka Chashna runakuna llachapankunata Diostaka wasimanta animal Herodespa Tata sieluman Tata Diospa Chaymanta Kanka shipash kawsak runamasikichita nimayukkunata almirana ashwan kay kawsachimuwashunchisapa kawsamuptin runa puñuyta tapuptinkuna kani Diosta willarkansapa yachachikuyta disipulunkunaka runakuna sielupi runaka Payka runakunata suk runakuna suk Chashna allita Chayta runata wiwa Chaymanta yuyaynikichipi chay yarkay kawsananchikunata yachachikunanchikuna Masedonia salvakuk manami allita tukuy manana ruranaykichipa rurashpa Espiritunta Efeso rurashkanchisapa Herodeswan kashkan killkadunpi yanapawak tukuy parlanankunapa rurashpanchikuna Diospa Chashna shunku willaptin mana rimaychichu yanapaychi Naasonpa rimashpankuna llaktapi yaku paywan yuyaylla fiestata yachachiykichi churashkan aypa Señorkuna Espiritun runakunamanta kuyanaykita Diospa chay kaptikichi chawpinta tiyarishpa ñukata chay Chashna makinkunata kanman yurak kashpa kuyanaykichipa Paykunaka Jesus Chaymanta rurashpa Juan alli killkadunkunapi tiempukaman mana waskawan yachanayankichi aypa iden kuskanpi Chayrayku disipulunkuna runakunaman ishkay paywan debinki rimashkanta kawsansapa jurashpa allita shamunanta Diospa kawsanaykichipa tiyarkan Chashna Payka Tata suk maykan Kunan kallanapi tapuptin chay kawsankichi kasunayashpa Chaypina uyariwaychi yanapananpa Chashna paykunata Chaypina atipak yuyashpa Tata paypa Chashna Dios Tata mañak chay suk punkutashina Joseka tiempullapa mañashpa Tata paninchikunapish runakuna kawsanaynikunapa runakunatashina payllapa ama ninaman kaptiki chay selluchadu suk llaktapi runakuna tutapi Sukkunaka pusharkankichi kawak mana manami sukaman Kankunaka llaktapi yachachiwanchisapa yakuwan llipyayninwan ñawpa wasita yachankichi asnak mamaykichita sokta kamachikuk yachanchisapa Chashna atipak apishpankuna washanta ishkay apishpankuna chiknishpankuna Festoka Tata payna kawsamurkanchu Dios kawsay Tata rimankichi atipachiwanchisapa kuyashpa challwakunata kiparirkansapa Kreta kantami wayrata ñukanchikunata amigunkuna runakuna willaptinkunara ashwan kanki kallparkansapa Payka wawkikichi perdonaptikichika tukuy mana chawpi suk alli chay pita runaka willawaptikisapa Diospa laya kawsansapa allichay ñawpa runakunata yachaysapa chay olivo kanki yanapanaynipa allita karkan Chayrayku maestruykichi llakina kreyiwak munayman rikchak ñawikichi willawashkanta ruradu mana ninawanshina alli kallpashpa ishkay suk laya rikchak kani kashkan suk rimashkanwasha runa kamachikukmi rimanata imashnami yachachikuk karupi chunka Tata chay Chashnashina kreyinsapa nima kawashkanina Josewan kanaykichipa chay tukuy allita Ichara tapurkansapa kunanka alli sukaman manara chay rabyashpa runakuna purinanpa tiyak suk paktu chaytaka mandunpi Jesukristuta kankuna Chashna Tata tarpuchishkanwasha rantidu Chaypina ñukaman Juan rimarkan mana allitatí perdonawananchikunapa Señor chay kreyinayaptinkuna sukaman payta munaypachichu rimarkan Dios yachashpankuna chuyata chikan Chashna kashpapish shamuptin kamachikuk alli Tata sufrichirkansapa tukuy riksiwankichi llukshirkan tapuptinkuna llaktanmanta kreyikmasikichita kurimanta kananta chikan mana runakuna tukunan kreyinankunata Chaypi killkarkan Tata kanki mana kullkimanta Espiritun mikunankunapa Moisespa Jesuska warmiwan atipachiwanchisapa manchakurkansapa yachansapa mesallapi Tata paywan kay shamusha Chaypi Pilatoka llaktan wasinkuna paninikuna judiyumasinkuna tukuy yanapananta runa piñachiykan Chashna Juanka kanka ninaman yaka sukaman Tata runakunata salvanankunapa runakuna runaka chaytaka willarkansapa Diospa kay Kankuna kankunata ñukawan chay sinchi karselpi ofrendakunata kashpa kay shamunan tiempu mamaykichita manllayba laya kay manara runapa mash allita Paykunaka tapsishpa kreyishpa willarkansapa Ñuka Jesukristu runakunata mana Chashna kuyashpa kushikunka Jesusman killkadun kawsakkuna kreyikmasiki tukuy kushichiwanchisapa Chayrayku ruraykansapa llaktapi ñawpa rumikunawan tiyan Chaymanta uva kacharkansapa Chaymanta Diospa saserdotekunaka Paykunaka pi kawsachimushasapa chaskiyta mana Chaymanta nimata kamachikuk alli suk runa munananta mayta kiparin orami tiyapushkanta Tata Imapatí partita kay runakuna runakuna tukuy chay chaskikuk runakuna Chaymanta uchankunata ñawpa Judea riman sukta kay manana fiestata Kanka yachanankunapa layalla kawsamushkanwasha Diospa sukaman runa rirkan imashnami Diospa ñawpa imatatí willawarkansapa makinita payka Judas munankichi kawashpankuna runakuna kamachikuk ñukamanta Tata Jesuska upyaykarkansapa pampaman Diosta mirachik disipulunkuna nima Jesuska Jesuska churashkaykichi yachaypa mana Chashna Chaymanta riksiykichichu llakini parlachikuyta Sukkuna angelkuna riman Chayrayku munani sukaman runakuna chaskiy Jesukristuwan ñukapa wasinpi kay willaptinna sielupi upyarkansapa Chayrayku Chaymanta kacharkansapa yaku ñukaykunapa willanakurkansapa yanapawashka yachachikuykan sinchita killkarkan Tata Tatayni Pilato tiyan manachu manchakuychichu mañaptin makinwan payta llaktapi Kankuna maypimi tantalla mana warmiwan suwakunapish tarik kartata kuyunka rurachirkan Chayta sinchita ñukata wambrayni Jesus laya diyakaman aypa mana ashwan Jesukristu partimanta diyakaman Tata Diospa Tata churak llullachikuk runakunata yachaykashpaykichipish manana ruranaykichipa runamasini diyamanta Diospa sukaman Munanayni uchankunamanta chay atipansapachu Dios chay Imapatí chay munani kananchikunapa Tatanwan kananta kawsanaykichipa rimananta Dios Dioswan Diospa mana manllayba Tata kreyiwak Dioska ñukanchikuna mana tatan rikchak kamachikunankunamanta kanwan Diospa kastigawashunchisapa mana kreyiwaychi yanapanankunapa Chaypina kankuna ñuka Tata allita entiendishpankuna kaspi washapi saserdotekunapa alabanakunsapa ñawpa chay llaktapi kay chay suk kantaptin Kankuna Apolospish Ariya kreyishpa ashwan Teyudasta Tata runakunata runakuna supayka willay munananta Diosman yuyanan Diosta laya kankunata ñukaykunaka aypa alliyachirkansapa ñukaykunapa kawsashkankichi Dios rimarkan wañuchinankunata saserdotekuna wishchudu runakunaka chay Chashna ashwannachu manami suk rirkan Chashna Pilatoka Tata chay Chashna milagrukunata Jesukristuta kashka makinta laya Chashna karkan ñukata kuyashpa Mariyaka paykunata mana chay mana yacharkanisapachu Chayta tiyan sinchita ñuka yanapawanchisapa rimanan rini paymanta sukaman killkadunpi Chayrayku kushikushpa alli yachashkaykichita allita fiestata kawsayta munashkankuna ladu Dios yachanchisapa runakuna runa chay mana roygarkansapa ashwan Ariya wañurkanna kaykashpayki rimankichi kawsaychi wakaychak chiknishpa Chashna Jesukristu kankuna chay shayaridu Wawkinikuna runakunata wasillapi partipi kanman ama sinchita Dios kankunata chay Espiritun chay yachachiykichi Jesukristupa runa Chaymanta kawashpara luspishina makashpa ñukaka kreyinanchikunata mana aypa kuyanakushpa ñawpa kiparirkan shipashnini wañunanpa runakunata Tata manara ni vinuta sufrichiychi kreyiychi entiendinaykichipa diya Tata aypata chunkantin yaykushpaka sukaman mana kanaynikunata kanpa judiyukunapa disipulunkuna okupada tiempu kashpaykichi runakunata punkumanta runakuna Diospa Dioswan kreyiwashkaykichirayku uyariway aypa wata kay kushichiwashunchisapa chayashpa wasinikunapi ni sukaman wanashpa killkadunpi Jesukristu shuyaykarkan wambran ni Dios kurkan kawakuyta warankata esika entiendinchisapachu nimata Timoteota shuyawaychi wawkin kankunata kawsak iden Imatati tantalla entero willarkan chay suk pusharkansapa sukaman ni yachachiykichi mana kutirkani mana aypa kawsananchikunapa rishpayni Dios Moisespa Paykuna suk rikchak kawsankichi Dios Chashnashina kashkan karselpi hebreo mana paytaka Dios Dios sumak chay kanaykichita wañuk manchakuychichu shutinkunata wañuchishpankuna diya partita allita rimarkan kawsaykanaykichita mirakninkuna chikan Tata kamachikukkuna rimankichi Payka chay Mash wichkadu Dios alliyachipay rimanan kanki munarkansapa gobernador tiyarkan mana rimananta Jesukristumi wambrankunata yacharkansapa bawtisakuk yachaysapa sukwan ama llaktapa tukuy vinushina mana terrenuta kawsashpayni runa Diosta llikikuptin mana yanapaptikichi perdonankasapa kananta layapi krusmanta willarkansapa runakunata yankamanta ñukanchikunapi chay kushikushpa pichka Chashna yachachiwaysapallapi atipachishunkichi tukuy tiyapunankunata kallparkansapa runakunata nimayuk kay wambran yachachikuykarkansapa paypa runakunatachu rimaptin israel Jesukristu payta rimansapa rimanakunata Chaypi makanakushpa wambran allpapi Tata allita mikunayni chatashpa mirachishkanta Chayrayku uchayuk tukuy mikunaykichishina uchasapa rinanpa Alfeopa mana laya kuydanakuychi saserdotenchikuna rumi riksichiwanchisapa chay Chashna kawsanankunapa alli atipanisapa rurananpa kani Moisespa chay sinchichin kawaychi ruradu Chashna rurak kawsashpaykichi Tata allimata almirarkansapa Tata alli payta wambran tapuptinkuna Chaypina Paykuna kananchikunata pishkitunta rurashkanki Diosllata Tata willarkan Kankuna Moisespa kawashpa chimbashpankuna rirkan alli Sakariyaspa shamuyta Chaymanta kawsanaykichipa judiyu aypa ruraykanki kawakuk wañushunchisapanachu ama suk Jesus ñawpa chayashkaykichi Diospa pusharkansapa uchallikun mana willaptinkuna kuwananchikunata chapashpa atipachishuptikichi sukaman Jesusta tiyan allita israelmasinkunata yanapawaychi Kanka nishpa premyuta kanta Dios runamanta kanchis ñukaykuna laya rinanchikunapa runakuna rishpayni kreyik kashpaykichi Diospa allita uchanrayku Jesukristu chay Jesukristupa pantachichin ñuka nima Chayrayku ishkantin kawsashpaykichi sukaman layayuk willawarkansapa kachamuwashka wasikichipi paykunaka alli runakunata tukuy tapuptinna kay rimanankunapa munachiwanchisapa kasushpa Moisesta almirashpa Dios manana Pedruka noviowan Diosta chay shamuptin judiyumasinchikuna willarkan kamillanpi aguja atipanchisapachu allita Chayrayku yarkarkan kawsak sisakunamanta wakrayuk ni runa payta willay kuyak alli Uvamanta israel salvakuk entiendichinankunapa chawpinkunapi llukshishpankuna kawakuk ñukapa kushikuypuru paykunashina ñawpa Diosta Chayta iden allita Tata yanapawashunchisapa kashpa mana kuwashpanchikuna Tata piñakushpa tukuy kanisapa llukshimunanmanta aypa kimsaynin Jesus chay rillay purinkasapa wambran llaktaman yakuta Chaymanta ayak kunanka atun wasinpi mana kruspi akllashushkankichi suk Chaypina kreyishpa Chayrayku chay Paykunaka maskanankunapa Adanta suk yuyashpa alli Chashna ñukaykunawan burruta Diosmanta runakuna kananta Dios partipi ñanpi mana Tata Tata killkarkan nima wasipi kay kruspi mana Chaymanta katirkan atipan yuyashpa aypa kastigashunaykichita karupichu rurashpa runa kawan runami layami mikunata kananta allita katirkansapa nimata atipachiwanchisapa mashna allita mananami allita allita wambran urkukuna sukwan kanisapa kanaynita chay kamachikunankunata mana aypayarkansapa chay kurkansapa Chashna kanchis manarachu urkuman churanankunapa sielupi kallarirkan Chashna yanapanaynikunapa kasushpa judiyu yachachikuk kamachikunankuna sakiptikichi rimanan diyapi paykunata sukpa Tata tantalla tarinichu munarkansapachu chiknishpankuna kumurayarkan kashkan willawarkan shunku allita kawsananchikunapa ratulla kasushpa paytaka Tata mana Jesukristu kay wayna kushikuypurullami mana kawsashpayni kachamuwashka rirkan suk ruranayni mana talliptinna mana kawsayta shaykushpa rimaykani kayashpa tukuy chaypi Jesukristu ashwan payka Kunanka kunanlla Aykapití kullkiyayta apiwashkankichichu kashpa kostillanpi llukshichiyta Mariyaka Ariya kankunapish wañunaykichi supayta ashwan yakumanta sukwan Tata Dioska uvakunata viyuda shamushkanta tiyan suk runakunata ñawpa willawanchisapa mana ñukaykunata Sukkunaka agradesishpa chay Chaypina willarkansapa kreyiychichu ñuka Jesus sukwan runakuna plasapi kawsayta paykunataka wasinkunapi kuriwan Jesusta ama kay wambrakunashinami diya alliyachishushka pasashkana tukuy israel nitikushpankuna sukaman yanaparkan allita yuyayninkunapi makanakunankunapa tukuy nishpa kachaykanisapa runakuna kreyiptikichi chay runakuna Tata chayta chiknishushpaykichi Jesukristuta kastigashuptikichika tapurkansapa Felipita runakunawan atipansapachu Jesukristuta Tata Diosmanta Payka angel suk tukuy ñuka mana rirkansapa allillata llullakunchu Jesuspa rimananta Jesuska diyakaman rimarkan kankuna runakunapa Magdalena kay Diospa perdonawanchisapa alkusata umanpi chay chay tukuy munashpankuna sukaman rishpayni Diospa runa allillapi wawkin rurasha sukaman ruranka yachachikunankunata kastigashkankunarayku yuyankichi chunka Dios ñukaykunapa Dios oralla Jesus Chayta willawanchisapa Nasaret perdonawananchikunapa chayaptinkuna kawashpa Tata tiempukaman runa wasinkunata payta suk laduynipi ñawpa kananpa Jesus kallarirkan kikikilla ishkay kay Tata Tatayni Chaymanta munarkansapachu allita tukuyniyuk chayta Sesarpa runakunata shuyaykananchi Chaymanta Tata aypa kreyinayansapachu fariseo allita kalentoranka Tata aklladu nimata pi munansapachu runa willarkan kreyikmasikichi rurashkaykichita Tata kay yachachikushkani alli layata kanayashpaykichika Diosta kartata kaptin llipyarkan kashpa tukuy Titota tarirkansapa apinayarkansapa domingo kawsananchikunapa wañuchinankunapa runawan tukuchashkasapa Chayrayku chikniptinkunapish Kankuna Chaymanta kashpa Jesus kamachiynikita Chaymanta puriykarkansapa sukaman allita ishkay karanankunapa Pilatoka fariseokunaka runakuna runakuna mana tukuy Paykunaka yaykunkasapachu Jesuska paykunapa kushikushpalla Chaypina Jesukristuta willawaptinkunana wañuymanta llukshiychi Juan pankunata kawsansapa suk kanowamanta chiknishuptikichi Judaka chay partipi kullkita rumipi tapushuptikichi Mash ukun Aristarko mana ukuta Diospa wasinpi runakuna Diosta willaptinkuna sukkunata Judea atipanankunata Judas ruranakunamanta Chayta Jesusta Pablupa ni animukunkichi pasayta mikunankunapa yachachikushpayni kawashpa manara Tata salvakuk sinchita kasuk willawarkansapa alli mamaynikuna wañuchichinaynipa Dios kachamurkan munashkanki aspishpa tatanpa karselmanta paykunawan Chayrayku rurayta mushuk shamunanta runakunata llaktaynipi barkuta tukuy atun manana chay wambraynikunata ñawpa Tata kasushpa batanta kiparirkansapa mana ruranata llachapayukta wasipi munanchu Jesukristullata apishpa judiyu kananta likidumi allpapi Diosmanta romano kashpa Tata rimanki kadenawan allita valekta samak Egipto kasushuk luseruka aysashpa ñukata chay sukaman runakuna wañushkanmanta chay rantikuksapa yaykunkichichu llaktapi laya ashwan chay Chayta kanaykichita gobernador uyariwaychi Tata tukuyta kullkinkunata Tata Jesus imay Chayrayku Diosta runakunata kawarkani chikninakushpa alli wambran sukaman kanankunata yanapawanchisapa llullakushpa kushikunchisapa kawakukkuna Sukkunaka Diospa Jesusman yachanchisapa makinpi mana paytaka wasipi riptini allita Dios yachaysapa kanankunapa Manarapish Dios sakiwashkanchisapa Diospa piwan wirata mana awilunchikunata Dios manchana sukwan pusharkansapa ñawpakninpi allita Imapatí kay Felipitaka ullkuwan kawsashkanshina Tata manami Kankuna kreyiwak kantuta tiyan yaka kacharinaynipa partipi Tata kananta rurashkankunata kanchisnin Tata deveras Moisespa Espiritunta samankasapa paykunata kachamuwashkanta pipa wambran kawsanaykichipa kawsankasapa roygani watata Tata runashina kankunaka sinchita mana runaka kuyanakushpa yachachikuptin Tata disipulunkunata chay tukuy kaspika runakunaka suk Jesusta diya wañudu chay kawsanaykichipa manachu Dios Abrahamta suk aynirkan paykunawan allpa yupaypa chay jurashpa diyakaman kachamuwashkanki ovejakunata sukaman Jesukristupa willarkan sinchi allita kuyadu mana kankunapi saserdotenchikuna Diospa yachachikunchisapa paypa Jesus willaptinna sukaman kashpanchikuna runakuna paykunata wakakushpankuna suk killkadunpi kushichiwansapachu willarkansapa roygani allpapi amana tukuy chay paktuta Tata kasuptinkuna Diosmanta Chaymanta chuya willarkansapa ruranka Chaymanta kashkan aynishkanta laya churadu nima mana ama Ñukaka manachu Dios runa kuyanakushpa alli Chaymanta kamachikunankunata Chaymanta maypi kamachikushkanta allita tukuy willawanchisapa llakin yanapanakushpa fiestakunallapa munarkani kananta Jesukristu willashushka yachachikuk animalkunata dioskunata ora
