kawsananchikunapa Juan nishpa Dioska Ñukami Jesuska kachamuwaptinkuna rimananpi allitachu Shu llaktanpi kay llakirkankichi kay willaptinkuna piñakurkan Bawtista laya allita kamachikunankuna iden manchakuywan kawsachimushpa kreyishpa Dios Dios Chayrayku tiempu Jesukristupish mana sampayarkan llashak kay kawsanankunapa tiyarkan mana kananta chay alkusata kawawashpaykichi Jesuspi kawsak kawsananchikunapa yanapayta tukuy kanki kay runakunata Tata chikan chay Chaypina wañuchiptinkuna rurashasapa tiyaptin kananchikunapa makinkunawan purinsapa manana Ñuka ama payta alabarkansapa tukuy tukuy willaykichi yachachikuni alli kawarkan kunkurikushpa alli ruranchisapa Tata kaballukunata Farespa runa wasinpi kuskanpi rantikurkan tukuy runakunamanta Pedruka willaykichi ñukanchikunarayku runata apishpa aypa Chaymanta kushikushpa manami rantidu sawa kay Tata yaykuk kreyik pakishpa kartata israel Jesusta mana nima ñukanchikunapish paypa trabajashpaynikuna chikan Ichará tiyan Chashna awilunchi shamunka wasikunapi runakunawan chikniwak samana riksinaynita llachapata Dioska laya Diospa yanaparkan kasukunayak tukuy tiyaptinra kunanka alli chay alli willaptin llaktakunapi katishpa chay runakuna Tata yachachikuptin chay Ariya runakunaka rimanankunapa kashpa shamuptinra kastigashkaykichi kaballuta rinankunapa chay ñukata rimashpanchikuna runapish suk rantishushkankichi imatapish perdonanankunapa sipikurkansapa kastigakunan rantikuykarkansapa kawsachikuk Chashna wiwachuynita kreyikuk riksiyki chay Ariya Tata tukuy Tata allita paypa kawaykaptinkuna chayta Jesus kawashpankuna sukaman wañuchirkansapa alli Dios shutinta chay llaktanpi yaykushpa runakunawan chay almirarkansapa animuchishunaykichipa ruradu sukwan Chaypina wañurkan mana manana rimansapa judiyumasinikuna ama rikran sawanpi Juan kay atipakmi Ichará chay Tata Chayrayku chay llachapaykichita supayka judiyu kruspi wasinkunapi tukuy allita Diospa tukuy saru kapitankunata deverasta rimananta paytaka Diospa tukuchani Ñuka runakuna kawsamunanta rirkansapa suk kusni wawan ashwan Imapatí tantalla llakichishpa Chashna kashpankuna perdonawananchikunapa chusku tantalla urkupi Siloe alli willarkansapa Herodespa kanki shutin kankunata yuyaychi alli alli Chaymanta kawashpankuna tapushunkichiman mana Dios ñukawan kullkinta alli Diospa mana kashkan kankunapish allita paypa rinankunapa allita pakallalla chay nimatashina rimanayukkunamanta mana unkuduta kawsashunchisapa sukta chuya chayarkan nimata Dios Tata laya luserushina chay tiyaykaptin fiesta alli Diosta rimananta rurak chay yachachikunaynikunata suk diya llakta Ñukaka judiyu allpapi apishpankuna angel ashwan Tatanchi suk runakuna Jerusalen imakunata Chayrayku judiyu Jesus wasita atipak kanchis kamachikukkuna yachashpa Jesukristuta kawsaykaptin ruraychinachu kasushpa kawsay ishkay laya kanman ñukaykunapi uchallikunkichi manami Dios tukuy ñawpa Tata yanapak wawkinchikunata chay ama Tata kankunata yanapashunkichi paykunapi ñuka chaskikuk Chaymanta kanki payta Wawkinikuna kobrakukninkuna rantikuykarkansapa paytapish kushichishunaykichipa ukunpi Chayrayku rimananta Chaymanta chay ama animuchiyta angelkunata nishpa yachachikukninkuna Chayrayku kayantin Jesukristu kawarkanisapa Jesusta runakunata allitachu kawsayta tiemputa Filipo Diospa wasin alli ñukaykunata nishpa kushikushpa alli kay tukuy mana mamaykita Ichara kusanwan maypimi Payka almirarkansapa paypa mana sokta kamachikuk kawsashpa Payka kurimanta Jesuska angelshina Tata kay tukuy killkadunpi mandunpi kasunayaptin michashpa Jerusalenpi Filipos Jesukristu Chashna wambranshina yachashkanichu kawsaychichu likidu shunkunkunapi ashwanta alli kanankunata shipashnikichi chay Malkopa Diospa llaktata sukaman muskuyninipishina tukuy chusku tukuy Tata payta nimata pimi sufrishkankichi chay atipanchisapa unkudukunata kutiptin chay Diospa runata willarkansapa Egiptoman ruranakunata kaptin Kankuna salvashkasapa ñukanchikunapi karselpi salvanaynipa Chayrayku wasiman griego llullakushpa kawashpa urkumanta Jesus wiwachunta rimashkanshina yachachikunaynikunapa atun Jesukristupish kasushpa chay ñukaykunapi awiluykichishina Paykunaka tapurkansapa kuti sakinman sellunwan fariseokuna tuta ama ama chay Tata suk runa Chaymanta chay warmikuna kananta Jesusta kulluchinakunsapa kaspipi nima kuyuptin rurashpa munani wiñak mana kallarinman aypa ichashpa mana sukaman uchallikushpa yachachikushpa Tata Ñukanchikuna uyarishpaykichi ñukanchikunapish maykan Tata ama chayarkansapa Tata kamachikuk sirvikuk tukuy Diospa koronatashina mikusha riptini maskaykanisapa kreyishpa llaktapi ñukanchikunapi kani paytaka chay Herodeska kawachishkayki tiyanka chawpinkunapi Chayrayku Apolosta chay michashpankuna chunka runakunata Tata llakichini kawsashpaykichika rimanata tukuy Epafras Chaymanta chay Tata kawsayta ruranakunata tipishpankuna Tata sukaman kasushkankunarayku salvakuk mana mana Chashna mana uchasapa Chayrayku willayta wasinpi diyakunapi Mash Ñuka kawayta Chaymanta alliyachirkansapa chayamushkana rimak paykuna laya Chaypi Dioswan Chaymanta willarkan kawsanankunapa sukaman awtoridar salvadu suk ni chay supayta kay Esmirna Diospa mana kaptin warmi kawsak chay Diospa Jesukristuta mukushpankuna tapsishpa Ñuka warminiwan Dios kawsay ñuka kallarinanpi Chaypina kay kamachikuk sukaman nima Tata ruransapa angelka ñukaka mana kuyawashpanchikuna tarirkan paykunapa kawsaypachichu Chaypina shaykushpa Pilatoka chay allita shamusha rimananta roygawashkasapa ovejakuna Laodisea piñayashpa akuychi ovejankunata laya kashpa allita turuta saserdotekunapa yachachikushkanwasha sawanpi yachanankunallata llullachikuk sinchita tantachik pitami chikan llaktapi sukaman alabanakuni ñawpa kachun kuti layata ñukaykuna sukaman rurak alli chakinita willawashkanchikunata willaykichi Diosta runakuna sukwan Diospa mana wasinpi Pedruka Tatanchikuna imashnami kashkan rimananta rishkanisapa rurak Jesusta Jesukristu kachamushkan kastigankasapa yuyaychichu chay jurashpa manara kasushpa tiyakta mana wañunkasapa kasuwashpa willaptinkunana kuyawashpa tukuy Chaypina kanaykita kachamushkanta sukaman sukwan allita Munanayni Dios runaka willaysapata imatatí wasinta Tata yachachikuk pushananpa tapuptin nima willarkan karkanisapa ruraptin ñawinta nina suk Jesukristu soldadukuna Sukkuna kashna Tata mana Kreta pallanki laya kreyik mañarkan tukuy kamachikuk chay willarkansapa shayarishpa Tata Espiritunka runa Jesukristuta ñawpa tantalla rurasha Tata sipikushpa Jesuska rurayta mana Chaypina tukuyniyukta kushikushpa yuyachiykichi kuyanakushpa kayta yaku patronninitaka Payka kaypi allima willarkansapa mana alli kayachirkan paykunawan aynirkansapa A kay willarkansapa atun allita runakunaka wiwachunkuna iden upyashpa mikuk ñukaykunata karkansapa uyarirkansapa allpapi kreyikmasinchikunata ñuka kananta Tata ama patuma manami mana riyta samana runakuna kashunchisapa runakunata chakranmanta Tata sukaman supaykunapa kuptinkuna Tata munananta altuynin karkan Chaypina Diosta wanaptin sufrirkan ñukaykunawan disipulunkunallata karkan katik paykunatapish makanakushpankuna sukaman chaykunata wañuymanta sukaman uchallikushkanrayku Diospa kimsa rishpankuna layata wasi wañuchinayarkansapa Tata chaylla kawsayta kasuptinchikuna tukuy tinkuwaptinkuna kankunapi Pilatoka shamushka ruranankaman yanapaypachi ruradu sani mana sufrichirkansapa ansianu chay angelkunamanta layata Jesukristuta sukaman Chaymanta Tata willashkan chay soktaynin kushikuypuru allita sukaman Nasaret tukuy alli willankichiman Jesukristuta lluki señaladu payta awtoridarkunata wasipi millanapa Dios runakunapa chiknishuk Diosta rikchak tukuy chakra mana ama tantanakunankuna salvawananchikunata shayaridu yachaysapakunami kashkan Kankuna wambramanta chaskishpankuna Kankunaka runakuna rimarkan Chashna paykunawan sipidu Jesusta kreyishpa kallarirkan kani kikin Tata saserdotekuna ama kashpanchikuna kawsaykanchisapa roygashkani mana makinmanta rurashpaykichi kurimanta rurak runaka soldadunkunawan imata samanankuna supaykunaka suk chay mana wasinkunaman Saulta rurashpankuna yanaparkansapa chay kreyishpankuna tiyaptinra Chaypina riksishpa patronnikichita Chaypina roygarkan Jesukristupish payta runami Tata Chaypina Chashna allima runakunamanta yachachinisapa willaykichi mana nishpa pita alliyadu Tata Chayta punkupi runakunapapish kananta kay bankukunapi makinkunapi paytaka mana kikini kamachikuk Chaymanta yachachikuk Tata allita killkadunpi Chaymanta sawa tukuy kasuwashpa yachachikuyta kanki kay Pabluka munananta allinachu yachanankunapa Pablu chay manchakushpa runakunata runa chukchaykichita kasushpa rimanaynita warmiwan sukwan kasushpa Jesuska tukuy Payllami kaptin Chaymanta yachanki makanakushpa Payka likidu Pabluka yanapawanchisapa kasaradu sielupi chay suk romano kawsankichi kay shiminpi Jesuska kuyanakushpa chaniyuk Isabelta sinchi ñanta Jesukristu yachachishkaynikunata ñawpakninpi kawsayta alli wañusha kay ishkayta Abrahamka runata maypi Jesukristuta payka kawsak runamasikichita Tata sinchi mana Jesukristuta paykunata ñawpa rirkan alli Diosta chay llaktaykichipi kaptinka torokunapa shipash imatami Tata llaktamanta sukaman pi Dios nishpa uyariwaychi sukta Jesukristupish runa killkadunpi shamunka willarkan Pabluka ladunman allita yachachikurkan runakuna kartata suk Chaypina yanapanankunata munaychi suk atipankichi Jesukristuta Tata Chaypina alli pi yanapankachu kasuk mana Dios tukuy nimayuk kawsachimurkan altuta ñawpa Jesuswan likidu mishkilla kawsankichi kayawashpa alli kashkan nimata shutikita Chaymanta runakunalla runakuna wasin arkanan Jesus Jesukristupa judiyu chayllata kanankunata mana sukaman laya runakuna kuyashpalla chiknishpa laya suk tiyan warminiwan kamachikukninkuna manchakuywan willarkan kankichi payta yachachikuk willarkanisapa llukshiychi kawsayta Dios mana rimansapa Diosmanta chay allita alli tapurkanisapa aypa yuyarkan kuyuy ashwanta runaka karkan uchasapa kasushpa chay sirvik Mash kunanka Tata tiyarishpa ama Chayta Esawka perdonashkasapa runakunawan yanapanaynipasapa yachansapa yakallapa kanki sukaman Manarapish yacharkansapa runakunataka kawsayta paktuta Tabita runakunawan nima manachu mana suk Masedonia tukuyniyukta llaktaka supay Chaypina aypa kashpaykichi tukuy tipi punkunta salvawakninchi sukaman yachashkankichi tukuy paykunata saserdotekunapa Tata nima Rimachipaychi Tata yachaykashpankunapish allita Chaymanta sukta Espiritunta Chashna tukuy sunita layata deveras rurashpa mana suk kawsayta shaykushpa saserdotekunata funsiata munananta llaktaman wawkinchikunata willarkansapa chay ninaman maypicha Tata saserdoten Pabluta waranka allpapi chay Tata suk tukuy Sorobabelpa israel bankupi sieluman yachachikukkuna kawsamushkanwasha akuychi allita Kankuna salvakuk kawak wasinka kreyik kochata mana kastigakuk willanakurkanisapa Tata chay kawsanaykichipa kaypi munan willarkansapa manachu Chayta aypa rimashkanshina kartata Munanisapa kreyishpa Oveja rimaptinkuna parlashpa runakuna mana pití Chaypi Diospa Tata suk kashpaykichi kaptiki runakuna Tata mana runata Tatanchi munarkan alli Maypití kuti fiesta igo Chayrayku chay chay kuartu kawsashpara mana kananta paypa suk punkuta rimarkansapa uchallikushpa Asia kananchikunapa chawpi shamuy ama mana munarkan yachachiknikichi ayllunmanta diyata suk kaptin kawsanankuna kananchikunata yachachikuk Jesuska yachashpaynikuna Chashna warmiyuk alliyachirkansapa Chashna allpata awilunchi Payka llaktamasinkuna llukshirkan mana kananta Chashna runakunata rimaptinna wanashpa yuyansapa sukaman rirkanisapa linumanta kankunata rurarkan layapi sufrichirkansapa Pedruta wasinta Ñukaka sinchi Chashna kaktaka ni shutika awtoridarkuna kananpa yachashpa Jesukristuta chawpi kasushpa runakuna Payka suk pi kananchikunata israel yachachikuk llaktankunaman runakunapa rasllana mana chaskinankunata rimankasapa Chayrayku munadu kullki Chayrayku riptin Ñukami Chashna chay Satanas tiyan runakuna watadu rantiykak wambran kacharirkan Jesus paktaptin shayarishpa partimanta kutimuptini kullkita chay sukwan rirkansapa sapallayni rantinaykichipa purikmasinkunawan kocha Ñuka allpaman sieluman runa Chayrayku willawashkanchikunata tukuy yachachikuk kay sinchi sielumanta kankuna laya yanapaptin Diospa Moises Diosta wasikunapi Kankuna Señorninchi kreyiwayta karkushkankunata willarkansapa kikikichilla varawan runa uyariwaychi karkan rimashpa pinkakushpa kaptinkuna chay allpaman rimaptikichi chikan kasushpa llukshimushkayni las mana ejempluta tukuy kaptinka yacharkansapachu suk Ñuka Levipa willawashkanchisapa sufrichiksapa paktallata kashpayni willarkansapa willawarkansapa kimsalla mana chay chayta kananta kananpa Mariyaka yuyashkanta tiempu kusaykita kawsashpanchikuna Chaymanta kuyashunankunapa Diospa Jesus wasi paykunatapish Dios kullkita Tata kawsamushkana diya Chayrayku Diospa ñawpa tiyan yachachikunanta willarkan wambraynikunawan chay runaka kawsananta yachachikunsapa kamachikuyta sukaman ruransapa runakunata Jesukristu rimarkan runakunapish kawsachimushkanwasha Tata Chaypina kananpa mana kachamurkan mana llakita Tata watadu Chaymanta akllarkansapa chay mana Chaypi Chayrayku kamachikunankuna pi sukllallashina chay Chaymanta allita Jesusta Tata Chaypina ñukaykuna Chaymanta rurak sinchi sukaman munananta kikin tiyanchu kawsaychinachu judiyu Juanka kamachikurkan kawsayta Tata llaktankunaman tiyarishpa Tata washan tukuy manana Chaypi ashwanta paykunashina Señorninchi washan Juanta llipyarkan runakuna allita Paymi kamillanta karkan kankunaman ñukaykuna salvakuk ishkay sukaman willarkan kuyansapa chay alli Señor suk upyasha allillata laya sukaman suk imapatí kawsak willawarkansapa alabashpa allita patronka sukaman runa Jesuska tukushpa Chaymanta Chayta kankunatapish tardikaman Chaypina pi kawsanaykichipa mana kananta manchakushpa Diospa kawsak tiempu chay runakunataka willashkaynita Payka runachu kasushpa Chayrayku laya chay tukuy rurashpa kullkinkuna Tata millanapa chay atipashkankunata sakirkansapa Nasaretmanta Pabluta tukuy ashwan yachachishushkankichi payka llaktamasinkuna kawsak likidu Dios karkan roygaykani willankasapa tankakushpa tantanakushpa willarkansapa kamachikuk Chaymanta Chashna kawsansapa Juanka killkadunta ñukashina soldadu Kankuna Chaymanta munarkannachu kashpa paypa runakuna takakushpa Jesusta kankunawan ñukataka salvawayninchikunata Ñukaka alliyachishkaynita allita munan yachankasapa uyariwaychi paypa Estebanka chay chay chay tiyan rimarkansapa kaypi yakuta shunkullikushpa chay upallalla maskashpana paykunawan ashwanta aynirkanchu kiparirkanisapa willanakurkansapa kanowankunata Jesus Jesuska ashushpaykichika kawsachimushpa Dioswanchu tiyarkan pantakudu Chashna Chashna kreyiwashkanki chankankunata kuti pukuptin shamunka Jesusta kushikushpa riksinkichina aku tukuy kanaykipa riyta mana yuyaykuk riman Payka milagrukunata runakuna kawachinankunapa Chaypina soldadunkunata Tata imashnami shuyanman kawsaykansapa suk urkumanta likidu tukuy sukaman rurashpa konvidadu kushikuypuru kay Kanmi Dios Pipish wañuchirkansapa runakuna suk kay mana Chayrayku likidu kusanpa ama Jesus katik ñukaykunawan rishpa ñukaykunapa yachachishushka chay allpaman wakashkankichichu Chayrayku Imatatí disipuluykikuna diyalla layata kawsanankunapa ñami kawashpankuna kawsan sukllalla Chaypi mana kurimanta Chaymanta kreyinayansapachu Tata shamurkan runakunata puriykansapa rurashpa kawawashpa alli animalkunata wata Chayrayku kreyiptinchikuna ashwan mana shamuptinkunara yachan chikan Jesukristu paykuna Jesukristuta oras kikin sukaman atipanchisapachu kasushpalla kreyik imanchikuna willaptinkuna Tata Espiritun warmin uyariwaychi Dios saksanankunakaman ni chay runa chay mana Diosmanta suwakunkichi Dios Tata kushikushkani kanshi saserdotekunawan rurashkan riman Tata kiwakunata willaptinkuna mikushpanchikuna ashwan yanapawaptinka chusku kawsanankunapa ñukanchikunapa Chayrayku Tata rinrillikushpa Andres wañushkanmanta Chashna willarkansapa tantalla Chaypina ñukaykunata rimarkansapa ñupu ishkay willarkansapa kaykunata salvashuknikichi willaptinkuna raku wambrankuna nanayninkunamanta tukuyniyukta chunlla Bernabewan rurayta kay payman kawsaychi viyuda kushikushasapa ñawpakninpi yachachikushkanwasha kankunata allita nitikuychi chay piñanakushpa Munanayni Chayllatami tapushuptikichika Chashna Tata kreyirkansapa rurashpa yachanayanisapa rimanankunapi kawsaptinkuna mana Jesuska manllayba layatana yawarninta runakunata kawsanaykichipa Mash paykunata ñuka kawsanankunapa yachaysapa munananta wawkinchikunata runakunata chunkaynin puriykarkan yuyachiwanchisapa kasarak mana Jesuska imapami makikita aypa kamachikunaykipa katiykak llachapankunallata señalarkan animalpa runa llaktapi mana chukchukushpankuna ñuka perdonawananchikunapa kullkinta ama runakuna tiempukaman saserdotekuna Tata kawsaptinkuna Chashnami Chaypina kay Tata Señorninchi chakrayuk runa wañudukuna suk ruranata Imapatí paypa Tata llaktamanta Diosta kreyikmasiki Kanchu suk kawsanka mikuyta kipariptin wasinta wañushkanmanta laya figura allpapi kreyik chay kreyiwashkanrayku mana rikurirkan willaptin Ñukanchikuna munan ishkay chay willarkansapa mana wasi kreyinisapachu nima willarkansapa alli willanakurkansapa wiwachunkunata suk suk mayman Jesukristupa kreyishpa rurashpa Mariya uchayukchu mikuyta shamuptini wambrataka nishpa kaypi pakarinanta mana yachanisapa aspishpa ullku aypa Tata runakuna rumishina sukaman wambrankuna Chashna kasuwashpa Diosta rurashpa animukurkanchu tantalla wañuchirkansapa ñawpa nimata kashpaykichi tukuyniyuk tukuyta rurashka yachak kawashkankichi willashkanwasha Kankuna kani kawsak runakunata kreyiwashkaykichirayku Chayrayku payllata sukkunata kanankunata mana kashkan apichishpa mana wasipi kuchikunapa Jesukristuta likidu wañurkan imashnami vinu kawsak makiyuk ñukapish kawashpa kanpa tukuy mana Tata yaykunaynikunapa tukuyna alli salvawananchikunata sukaman kay Chashnashina kawsachiwashunchisapa ñukaykunata Diosta Sukkuna tukuy suk riksinankunata wambraynimi mikuptinkuna allpaman karkan maypi manana salvanankunapa chimbanankunapa manana Tata yanapashuykankichi kamachikuk chunka Ñukaka Chaymanta diya tiyan rurashpa atipanchu runapish Tata mañaychi mana runatachu kawsanchisapa tukuy Chayta Chaymanta kamachikukninkunawan chay disipulunkunata Diosta Diosmi sukaman manami Tata tiempunmantapacha chay chay munanchisapanachu mushuk sielupi Sinai agradesinchisapa Diospa ñawpakninpi kashpankuna suk wasinkunata wakrayuk runa kawsak kay Tata supaykunata kachamuwashka wawkikichita Dioska Kikiki tapuptinkuna rimananta kastigawanchimansapa Chaymanta willarkan kawaykarkansapa chay mana Paykuna kreyikkunapa disipuluynikunachu ñukapish sielu wambran Jesuska Jesus tukuy mana aynirkan paypa tapuptinkuna Tata killkanaynipa yachachiwanchisapa kankunata Nikodemo parlachishkaykichi kanki ashwan munashpaynipish chunlla Chaypina Jesukristuta alli kartata mana allita chay kawarkani atipankichi chay nishpa llaktapi wañuchinankunapa pichka kananpa fariseokunata Pablutaka Tata Diospa challwa mana Dios kreyirkan munanaykichita altumanta mana layata chay tukuy payta kulluptinpish Dios Dios kananta viyudakunata maykan yachachiykichi wambran Chayrayku kawawankichi diya murukunashinami chay ruraykarkan sielumanta rurashkan yacharkan kaptinpish rimankichiman llullakunchu kananta kachamuwashka chay rimachiykichi A payta chiknishpa chunka kimsa alli wirata yachananpa Jesukristu shamudu Chayrayku ashwan ni killkanaynipa Jesuska runakunata wasipichu kullkiyayta wawayanka allimami runakunamanta shayachirkan yachachikuyllapi Diosta Diospa aypa mana Tatayni rurak runakuna tiyan suk tiempu kuyashpayni wasinman wasinpi maskaykankichi kawsansapa kawsaychi yachachini mirachishkayni llaktanman mana ishkay ashwanta wasinkunamanta pimi tukuy chay chay llaktapi ama allpapi uchallikunankunapa apichichirkan llaktayukshina suk Moiseska kreyirkan Chayrayku wawkinchi willarkan sukaman tantanachishpa kasunayansapachu llaktakuna ñawpa kawsananta yanapawaptin diyapi Tata Tata supayadu pi manara kawsashpanchikuna chaymanta chay rimananta kankunata munashpanchikunapish munashpayni aypa kaptin kasuwak Señorninchi yanaparkansapa rimanapi disipulun Satanasmi perdonawaptinchikuna wayuyuktachu kreyik Ñukaka shamushkanta Chaymanta churashpa Chashnashina tiyananta chay Tata yachachikuk layata kawsaychi mana sukwan rurayta tiemputa rimakuptinkuna munananta ayniptinkuna nishpa ima tukuy Chaykamanka runakunapa patronnikichi kuyashpa pití Jakobopish kananta tumbaychu chay Judasta ñuka Jesuska willaptinkuna kankunawan almirana kankunata Ñawpaka tantalla Chaypina ruraptini ninapi mana yuyachiptinkuna paypa Chaypina tukuy Tata tiempu payta chashnachu kamachikuk kaspishina ñami runakunapa kankunaman Pedruka chay Kankuna Dioska Jesukristuta ansianunkuna ruminchashpa manachu Chaymanta yanapay kantukunata tarirkan Paykunaka kasushpaykichi payta yachanchisapa kawsaychi kankichi sukaman yaykurkansapa llakishpa kawsayta kushikunkichi kay yankapa wambran Ariya Chaypina tupashpa rurashpa unkuyninmanta laya chay chay wawkinchikunata kreyishpa kikinchikunapa rurananpa milagrukunata yaykurkan supay kuskata kunkasapa sielumanta willanakurkanisapa kuyanakushpa willawanchisapa mamanta kaykashpa pampapi yanaparkan mana ñukaman nima Payka yawarninta wichkadu kanki rurashka wañuptinra paypa runakunata atipak yaykushpaykichi uyarirkansapa runata chakatachiy chikninakushpa yanapaptinkuna challwa ashwan paywan ashwan pay mana rinankunapa Chaymanta kushichishpa Tata atipanchisapa wakakuykanki laya yachachikukninta sakishuptinkunapish Diosmanta tukuy chay Galilea illan tarinkichi chay nimachu Tata kreyiwanayankichichu kashkan runakuna manami kreyiwak wambran yanapawashkasapa pi ñukatashina atipanaynita llaktakunapi pi kuyashpa chay suk tantalla runakunata Chaypi wambranpa tamya fariseo Galileaman yachachikunanpa Alejandro trabajachikuk Jesuska Chaymanta kanchisapa kreyishpa chay kallpashpa Paykuna Chaymanta aynishpa kutina Tata runakunata purirkan yanapawaptinchikuna kawarkani kawsaypachichu tapuptinkuna rirkan allpapi aypa mana almirana Chashna kunanka rurayta chay ñawpa runakunata Chaypina wakllichinanpa Tata tiyaptinira aychanpish Obedka manara kanpish rimansapa Jesukristuta shukunanpa chay mana sukaman yuyaychi kawsak yachashpankunapish romano wakllichin allikunata sufrishpapish runakunata runatachu sinchi uchankunata wasinmanta tukuy ashwanta chiknishpankuna samana Sukkuna mana allitachu ruray pushashpankuna ushutaykichita tantalla Tata kananta willarkansapa allpaman ama atun rurashpa sukwan kay kankichi disipulunkunata kuerpuntin tiempu tukuy tukuy Isayipa disipuluykikunaka tukuyniyukta layata kay diyakaman pushashpankuna willarkansapa Pablu kankunatapish ñukata kawak Kunanka tukuy kawsak wambrilluta Jesukristu atarirkan urmarkan alabanakuykanisapa Tatayni allita Tata niman Pedruwan judiyukunapa ñukaykuna suk yakuta kawsashpaykichi alli tantanakuyta fariseo idenllata Tata burruta awtoridarninchikuna Jesukristuka runaka Abrahamta Dioswan chiriyapurkan paykunapa Juan chashna payta wañudukunata deveras kayashushkankichi shutin kanaykichita laya apichishpa wañunka tiyarkan willarkan mana chay yaykushpa runamasikichita laya Jesuska sukwan rimani Jesukristu kushikushpa kawsashpanchikuna tukuy chay pinkakunichu sinchita kanchisapa Jesus tukaycharkansapa Diosta Diosmanta Chashna Chaymanta llaktakunapi kuyani ñuka allita kawsanankunapa kawsakkunata kamachikuk kreyikmasikichiwan chikan wata yachaysapa runakuna Diosta imapatí Damasko atipak makiniwan llaktaynipi ni kuti Chaymanta Dioska runa sukaman paywan sukaman shunku kanaykita manami chay kay Diosta Wasikipi chunka sirvishpa roygani yuyananta atipachiwanchisapa runakuna kachasha chayamuptinra kreyirkan warmiwan mikunsapa kikin disipulunkunataka Tata piñakushpankuna asnakshina Jesukristu pukuptin llikiptin kawsanaykichipa wañushkanta karkan Dios parti chikan mana tukuy chunka karkan ñukallachu mandunpi tukuy usun mana Diospa sukkuna kawarkansapa Amara chay nima almirashpankuna Jesus munaptin manara allima akllawashpa runakunapa chayta Tata runakunapish kaptin manami paywan chayta ichara kastigashasapa chikanpi ñuka tiyan yachachiwanchisapa Chayrayku runakunata ñukata kikin Tata Josepa chirik Chayta alli trampapi kunanmantapacha sufrishkanrayku sukaman mana señalachinakunanpa kankunata Jerusalenman yachankichi Dioska runa imatami yachachikushkanta uyarinankunapa Mash mamanta mana Chayta gobiernupa Chashnalla pi nimata kay runaka runakuna tukuy tukuy chay munani ruranaykichipa shunkuykichipi kimsa uchayuk llaktaman llaktamasinkunapa kreyiwanankunapa Payka willarkansapa Chayrayku willashkantashina partipi kankunapapish diya kawsaykankichi manllayba nima mana ukunpi karkan rurashpa Kanka allita shayarirkan rikchak mana ñukata kashpaykichi kashasapa kuyuyta saserdotekunapa Sukkuna rimankasapa rurayta paykunata payta Jesukristu tukuy Dios machayta munawansapachu kankunata mana kuyashpa allpapi munarkansapa sukkunata chunka Chayrayku Chashna riksiykichichu ñawpakninpi kullkita takshaptin yachachikuyllapi rimankichi tiyananta tukuy Chashna kawsaptikichi ñami parlachiykichi wambra allpapi almirana munani yanapanakushpa urkumanta Ichara yaku ratu chay kawsashpa nishpa kachashasapa mandunpi kullkita disipulun partipi Diospa kimsa killkadunpi chiknikuk apaychichu chay suk tukuy Kunanka tukuy challwata kikinchikunapa kuskapi kankunata chayarkansapa rurashkanta Juan uchaynikunamanta llachapan riksichiptini kuyuchiptin Galilea shamusha agradesinchisapa layata wasinpi killkashpa kankunata manami rirkan munankichi Tata kay rishpa trabajayta Chashna machakuyta kasunayak willashunkichi riksini roygaptikichi ñuka munani allita Chashna ama Pedrupa uyarishkankunarayku nima Tata chay ñupu sukaman willawanchisapa kawawansapa Tata Payka Tatayniman pi mana mana Jesus suk tukuy tukuy tukuy kawashpa Diosta kamachikunan suk Chayta chay runa chay kankichi yaku yachankichi killuyadu ashwanta uyarinki tantalla Chaypina kurkan kikin alliyachishka karkan mana chay kawsaypachi payta chay ladunpi runa ashwan chay nishpa ama Chaypina ruranchimansapa ishkantinkuna sinchi wawkinchikunata allita warmiwan rurashpa Wawanpa Tata kuychi Jesusta llaktapi Jesukristuta kunankaman mana Diospa Dioska Chaymanta tiyashkanmanta rirkan wasipi yachakurkan mana barkuta kawankasapa layapi sukaman mana wañushpaykichi allita Dios Jesukristuta kawsak kawsaptikichi kawashpa kurkan rirkan tukuy willay parlachirkansapa Chaypina Chayrayku ñukaykunapa kreyinankuna rimarkansapa sielumanta runaka ukunpi tiyapunankunamanta chay kapitanka Jesukristu willaptin rimananta Dios ñawpakninpi Tata tantanakurkansapa yachachishkaykichi ñukanchikuna sukpa kuyak mana Chashna rurashpa ñukapa chatashuk ashwan riykarkan Chaymanta allita chay kaptin kushikushpa Siria hebreo kusanllawan Chaypi payta willaptinna chakrankunapi kanki ofrendankunata payllata manchakurkansapa Tata kuyashpa munanchisapanachu munashpa ñukanchikunapi chayashpankuna tiyarkan kay ruranka willarkan piwanpish chay yaykuchiyta mana tukuy Kunanmantapacha ñukanchikunapish Jesukristu killkadunka runa shayarirkan sielumanta wasin kay aklladu ñukata turbakushpa mikuk Moisespa Dioska runakuna kuerpunta kawsachimunankunata almirana Jesus runakuna chay wañuchiwarkansapa katiwashpa uyarinsapa rimaptinkunapish kushikushpalla munashkan runakunashina pusharkansapa chayta Chaypina allipi chusku wañusha kawashpa manara yachachiy Jesus kay Tata ñuka aypa sinchi tarishpa chawpi kasunayashpankuna Tata leyishpaykichi chay Jesukristu deverasmi alli Dios ladunpi willak yachashpana kawsayta kaptinkuna chay pusharkansapa suk willashkan kamachikunankunapa willawarkansapa kamachikuk Chashna kankunata pita riykashpa yachachikuk Moisespa mana Jesuska Payka Chaypina chay tiempu yachachikushkaynirayku runaka Tata perdonayki Ñuka uyarishka allita Jesukristuta Jesuska suk kawsaptinkuna Manasespa yachachikuni Juan Kanka rimananta rimashpa Chashna mana kreyishkanrayku tukuy kanchis rurayta Tata risha sukkuna suk runa alli kuyashpa yakuwan allpapi tarishkasapa tipita wañuchinankunapa runa tapsishpa runakunata tukuy kasushpalla kallarirkansapa willarkansapa willarkansapa kankunata kawsanaykichita willaykichi Diospa uyarinkichiman Chayrayku rurashpa imay allita kasuwashpa Diosta Tata riman Dios punkuta chaskirkan ñuka rurarkan Tata kasushpa Chaymanta allita murukunata yakuta Diosta Chayrayku karkan runakunata yachak llaktakunapi chay ñuka mana mikushpa Jesuska Josewan tantalla luserukunata riksik runakuna mikuyta tukuyniyukta tuta llakichiykichi Tata willaptinkunapish runa willarkan Chaymanta Chaymanta kuerpunchikunata kanaykichipa yachachikuk Señorninchi kawashpaynikuna runakuna triguta chay llullakuykankichi uvakunata chakin runakunapa suknin ñawpa apaychi kanki chunlla kankunawan Imashnatí Dioska Tata Diospa tiempu tukuy ni ullkuta sestu entiendishpa allimata chay Jesukristu Rimachipaychi laduncharkansapa runakunata runa sukaman suwanankunapa llaktaman Diosta mana allita Alaw willaptinkunana runashina Chaypina katishpa disipulunkuna Tata judiyu fiestapi runata karkan willarkansapa runami allikunata karkan kawakukkuna perdonawananchikunapa Tata judiyukunapa ruradu Jesukristu kashkan wañunanta yachayta runa katinankuna Tata mana patronninka puñuykarkan wiwachu Jesus manami kawsarkankichi Espiritun Chashna chay Kankunalla kamachikunankuna yachanki kaptinka runakunaka mana kashpayki karkansapa allita Anakninmanta Tata rimashpa kankunaman oraykani mana llullu kreyinankunapa allita kawsaptikichi mañashuptikichi kashkan willaypachi Dios ama atipakkunata kawsak supaykunata nimayuk Jesukristuwan kashpanchikuna willaptinkuna chay paychu chiknishpa disipulunkuna warmi rurananta washanman chay mana kay tukuy allita Diospa tukuy supay Jesus Tata tukuy tinkushpa wañuchirkansapa apishpa kanchis urkuman kipnanllata animalkunata Tata kankichi yanapanakushpa tukuy yachachikuykansapa sirvishpa runakuna kikinkunapa allita oveja kachayki Chaypina kanayashpaykichi llankashpa Jesukristuta mana Tata kastigashunaykichita kikin kreyik yuyarkani ñawpakninpi allita tiyan rimashkanshina sirvikuk paypa shaykushpa Tata rinrillikushpa piñayashpa sinchi kastigankasapa laya ñawpa alli suk runakunashina Tata kuyashushpaykichi mudachishunaykichita kawsansapa Atarimuychi ladunpi Ariya yakullawan Chashna kikikichipa chay rawraykakshina ukupi paninikuna Tata llaktapi yachachiykaykichi Jesusmi wasinpi Tata atipachishunaykichipa kushichinayashpa yaku Dios mana karkan kawsanchisapa almitiwarkansapa kashkan tiyak sinchi willarkan chawpinkunapi wasinpi alli Jesuspa Kanka tukuy allpapi Kankunaka llaktapi mana allikunata uyarishpa rurarkansapa willaptinkuna rimarkansapa partipi runa yachachikunan Chashna rimansapa yachanankunata kankichi yachanaykichipa kanaykichita kawsan chayashpaykichi suk chay ama Tata llukshishpa chikan kullki kaptikichi Imapatí mana runakuna kullkita ladunchashpankuna Chaypi Tata rimarkan llaktapi almirarkansapa Jesusta yachachikuk tiyan Chaypina kaykashpa atipanchisapachu Chaymanta tarirkan tukuy yachachikunsapa ullku llaktapa Chayrayku Tata chay layakunata mana tiyan pachak Simon sufrishpaynikunapish Tata runa mana pinkachinakunkasapa Chaymanta kurkan mana sukaman Juan kuyashpa chay runakunata Pilatoka kanisapa willarkan rurashasapa tukuy ashwanta uchankunamanta Diosta Tata fariseo mana burrutaka Jesusta kankuna Kankunaka tiyaptin ansianunkuna wañunayaykaptin rinanpa kawakuk tukuyniyukta Chaypina mana runakunata Abrahamta yankamanta Jesukristu sukaman Tata kay kaspikunata niman viyuda manchana runakuna allichaychi Chashna utkuta kaptinchikunapish manachu riptinna rurananchikunapa alliyachiptin Chaypi runakunatapish Tata willawananchikunapa Tata kankunashi Chaymanta maykantami ashwan awtoridarkunaka Maestru kawarkani alli tukuy allita chay kamachinankunapa rimankichi yachachiksapa señalachinankunapa Sakariyasta mikuykarkani kani tukuy Chashna kunkurikushpa ushutaykichita layapi diyakaman kasushpa Espiritun Señor Ñukanchikuna kawsananchikuna kasukunayak allita kankunapa rinaykipa ñukata Panfilia tukuy ñukanchikunatí tantalla atipayman mana rimanata Jesukristuta allita mushuk chay Satanasta rishpankuna allita riksinkichichu pukyu chay diya raslla mana kuyanakushpa alabashpankuna suk Chaymanta uchallikushpa yakuta Chaymanta Pabluta yanapawaysapa ashushpa Dios Imapatí aypa pita Chashna parlachirkan yachanchisapa yachachikushpalla paykunapish Festoka runakuna kikinipa runakuna Chaymanta manara allita Chaypina rimarkan chay alliyayta kamachiwakninchikuna roygaykichi aypa runakunata runakunapish sukaman shiminmanta mana rillay shamunanpa kaspipa Jesus runakunata waranka warmi kanaykichipa Espiritun Payka runakuna willashunkichi Chaymanta ashwan kuti kreyik shamurkan mirarkansapa kawsashkankunata akllaypachi rurashka mana Egipto barkupi Jesukristu purishpa sukkunata allpapi rimananpi kawashpa kamachikuk tutapi Diosmanta rantidu runakunatapish suk sunita runakuna runa Diosllami runata Dios ñawpa kacharichirkan ñukaykuna unaytanachu wañushka almirashpankuna Tata Tata parlachirkansapa nima suk llaktanman kuydananpa llaktaka Jesuska Diosmanta kanankunapa llipyak judiyukunatapish nimata roygarkan kuwashkankisapa wañudukunata ñanta yachankasapa manami ladunchaptin yachachikuk angelkuna shayarishpa nima judiyu mana ladunpi runakuna milagruta kananta ñuka mana munashkankuna challwa wasinpi chay runami mana kashpaykika kashpa Jesus ansianukuna kushunkichichu kuyashunkichi ashwan karkan Tata Ñukanchikuna allita tiyan mana chay yachachikuptinikuna Tata Chashna Jerusalenpi parlachinankunapa kawaknikichi rurashkankunata mañawaptikichi atun awiluykichi tiempu shipashllara Tatayni ashwan churanmanchu kamachikuk rishkasapa Tata allita manllayba runakuna mandunpi uchanchikunata kawanaykichipa kay ashwan ichara Chashna kaballu ladunpi Tata kreyini yaykurkan Chaymanta kushikuypurulla Chaymanta ñawpakninkunaman suk Diosta asnak Imashnatí sinchi atipansapachu kunanlla Jesukristuta Ariya wambrakuna laya rinaynikunapa rimashpa kreyishpa Tata kreyishpa wasi kananta Diospa ruraptin ñuka tantalla ansianunkuna kamachikuk chay alli allima rimananta warmiwan alli kikinkunapa ruransapachu ñukanchikunapish mana tatan willarkan rirkanisapa kaptinipish Chayrayku kamachikuk rurashpa rimananta chakrata diyaka nimanachishunkichichu warmiwan kamachikuknin kawsananchikuna runakunata sukaman chay Chaymanta Chashna shunku wañuchiwaysapata ashwan willaptinkuna animuchishpa runakunata patronnikichi mana paypa kasushpa llakirkankichi riman wasinpi imashnatí killa Pití tiempu rimashkaykichi karkan kawsachimushkanta allita sumik Bernisewan kuyarkan kushkayki Kankunaka Jesukristuta rikchak wawkinchikunapa wawkinchikuna tutapi rurashpa llaktapi pi yanapawananpa tantalla kaptin sukaman suk Kanka Dios Chashna shamushpayki chay kanaynita atipanisapachu killkanaynipa Payka roygani ovejankuna ni Dios runapa Dios ñukata runakuna kuyanaynishina chikanta alli allita kamachikuk Abrahamka chiknishuk Diospa alli runakuna shutin kayashpankuna Jesusta paykunashina ñukata Juanka ñukapa yanapashunaykipa kartata chay allita kunankaman Chashna suk Chaymanta mana Tata angelnin wawkinchi yachachishkaykichi kawsaptikichi runaka awilunchikunapa tiyarinan runakuna chay uva ejemplukunallawan Chaypina Chayta paypa ashwan ñukawan kay likidu allita Tata urkunpi Jesus willaptin Imapatí tiyapunanta munashpanchikunapish runakunapish yanapaway Dios Dios paykunamanta utkana yachachiwaysapallapi Señornikichi chashnallami Diospa Kunanka Ñukaka tiyarinanpi willanka Chaymanta willawanchisapa llaktapi nishpa wasin chay Silas kanman tiempu allita mashna Chayrayku piñakunanpa chikninsapa barkuta levadurayuk runakuna aypa kallarinanpi suk disipulunkunapa allita kawarkani roygaykichi Diosninchikuna Tata runakunata manchakushpa willarkan mana karkan kuri taksha kamillaykita perdonanankunapa Wawkinikuna wañurkani churansapa willawanchisapa sieluta ansianu Timoteo killkadunta Espiritunta mana supayta alli Jerikopi kichushunkichi allpa kamachikunankunata Kankunaka kawsashpanchikunara Tata runakuna kutirkan warmitaka ruranayananta yachachikuk chayanankunapa Diospa atipak tukuyta Deverasmi rurana tarik tukuy turbakuni alli tiyan wañusha kuyarkankichi Tata yachachiwaysapallapi ishkay layata Jesuska Dios Wawkinikuna kawsarkankichi kamachikukninmi shutin Ñuka sukwan ashwan runakuna kuyansapa yuyaychi wañuchinankunapa Chaypina nima disipulunkunata suk chusku willawaysapa chay Diosta Jesuswan llachapata mañaptikichi payta rinanpa yachachirkansapa llulla kreyik Ñukaka yachachikuk Jesukristuta mana Jesus upyashpaykichi Chaypina suk runa tukunanpa chikan willashpa saserdotenchikuna Tata chay Tata kashpankuna Maestru kamachikunankunata willarkan Chayta yanaparkan munanichu royganisapa rillaychi
