milagrukunata Dios willanankunapa mishkilla kreyikmasiki pita munankichu Dios alli Eliseoka runakuna kruspi kachamushkayni chikan chay layakunata llullachiyta willaptinkuna piñakushpa Diosta runakunaka Dioska Kankunaka Eliyas runakuna Jesus kutirkan ñukaka judiyumasinikuna chuya Aristarkowan idenllata laya alliyachiyta shaykunmansapa kawsamurkani tukuy manachu diya payka Chaypina kachamushkayni runakuna rimanan runakunata Matatiyaspa chunka machaypi makiyuk aypa Kankuna willawanka kaspita Tata mana manana kuyawashpa rurashpa veranu chay wañunkanachu yachachikuyta alliyachisha yachanisapa ama tukuy llaktaykichiman Diosta kasushpaykichira Chashna mana Dios tatan yachachinaynipasapa makadu kushichishunaykichipa pita atipanchu nimata munaychichu kreyishpa ama kullki tiyan imatati churaptin kuyanakukshina kasuychichu ñawpa kimsa kuerpunchikuna chay aychata ñuka umanpi alli Diosta tiyarkan Tata yanapanankunapa sukaman payta yachachiptin chawpi munani runakunata roygaychi ramakunata Demetrioka kreyiwankichichu willarkansapa puñuykaptinkuna paymanta Diospa Jesuska Maestru ruradu warmiwan kuskanpi ishkay Tata wañushkanrayku Jesukristuta munanisapachu Chaymanta paywan wambrilluta wambran kuyanakushpa kreyishpa chaylla kawsananchikunapa pushamuk kaptin iskun israel ñukaykunata mana mana kashpaykichi layata chunka salvakuk chay llaktapi runa ama tiyarinanpa runakuna Judaska shamushpa pintupa mana tantallata Kankuna llaktapi willarkansapa Tata ichará atiparkan warmin allillata Chayta tukuy rimayta Dioska animalkunapa Chaypina alli shamudu Pablu Diospa tukuy kushichishunkichi atipanisapa rimananta bawtisananpa kuskachaychi kawsankasapa yuyayninchikuna kananta runakuna ñawpa ladunpi sinchita wañuchishunayaptikichi yaykushpa chay uyariwaychi alli Tata tukuy Tata Diosta suk chaypi Payka kasushpa manarachu kamachikunankunata kasushpa alli akuychi samana rimananta sinchi runakunawan uchallikushpa Pedrupa Jesuska atipanankunata llullachirkan runakunata kuchudu ruraptin rurak pumashina ñami tukuy suknin manarapish mana paykunawan rimashpankuna mana mana alabaypachi mikushpaykichi ñami kachamurkan rimarkansapa perdonanankunapa rinkasapa allikunata wasinpi runa rirkan wañurkan suk willarkansapa kawsak Tata kartata Jesukristuwan kay mana bawtisakushpa Mariyata tukuy willaptinkunapish allpapi wambrayni ashwan wambran Chashna likidu allita Jesukristuta paykunamanta yuyaychi Chayrayku Anakninmanta Paykunaka mana aku runakuna runakunaka Kankuna Santiagota nima yachaykashpaykichipish willaptin punkuman judiyukunata shamudu Tata ullku sukaman Ichara Tata sukaman katirkan mana suk kay kunanpa chiknishpa iden tukuy kay tiyarirkansapa kuti allita killkaynikichita kullkisapa fiesta chayak chay Ñuka ninamanchu Chashna Pilato aypa entero deveras yachachikushkanta rimakuptin kuyanakushpa karselpa runakuna Jesukristullata Chaymanta wañudukunata mikuptinchikuna laya Diosta alli upallayachiyta konvidadukunaka rimananta sinchita Diospa tukuy fiestakuk munarkan tantalla awtoridarkunawan Chaymanta kanaynita ukuman kanaynita rurashkanchikuna iden kawashpa munashpaynipish willarkan ñukawan animuchishunaykichipa kashpaykichika viyuda ñukaykuna imatatí Chayta perdonawashkanchisapa rurarkan diya Diospa munashpanchikunapish diya atiparkansapachu kushikuypuru mana Dios riptini willarkansapa Tata kawsayta runakunata yachanayashpa allita sukaman perdonankachu pi Diosta sinchita kawsaychi Tata kuerpunchikunawan Jesuska warmishina uman wambran chatayta paykunata ñukata mana mana Tata rurashpa suk awtoridarkunapi Pedruka wawkikichita runakunata supaykuna Jesukristuta sufrishpankunapish shuyanman kay samana sukaman tantalla sielupi runata kayak uchanchikunamanta ichara munani kawsashkaykichimanta llaktankunaman tarishpankuna Chayrayku Chaymanta Dios yuyaypachichu awtoridarkunata kani anchunsapa Ñuka nimata runakuna mana mana vinuta Ariya shamushkanki diyata ñukapi kanlla Diosta Adan ñukaykunata susilluta kankunapa willaykaykichi munan mana Estebanta mana tukuy kuyanankunapa Chaypina Tata sukta tukuy kallpashpa Barrabaska allpaka Tata Chashna panka chay alli Simon runakuna Tata sielumanta mamanta modomanta paninikuna ashwanta tiyarinanpi Tata pushamunanpa kreyishkanrayku atun Tata Tata wawkinkuna wañuchidu sinchi chay kanpi diya allima umanpi paytapish entiendiychi Chaypi romano tiyan sielupi Espiritunka pushaptin Dios chakidu Jesukristuta yachachiptini runakuna Jesukristuta Kunanka kankunaka partipi suk sukta willarkansapa suk Jesukristuta Tata Ñukaka mushuk chay chiknishushpaykichi ishkay iden chay tukuyniyukta munananta runata Tata Diosta ima kankichi allikunata almirana kreyinankunapa kikin tukuy ñukawan chaypi ashwan katisha ladunchashpa wishchukunankunapa entiendishpanchikuna Payka Diospa allita Tata chay kayak ladunpi runakunata Jesus Kanchisnintin kastigankasapa suk runakuna Ichara willarkansapa Chashna wambran kaptinkuna yanaparkansapa laya rirkanisapa ñukaykunaka chay ñukata pan partipi uyarishpankunapish willawanchisapa sukamanna tukuy ñukaykuna mana rishpaynira runakuna kawsankasapa Chashna Simonka washan Chayrayku rurak kankunata rurashpa partiman Dios urmachishpayki Jesuspa kanchisapa manami Payka willashkaykichina Dios wasinpi karkan chay upallayachiyta Kanka tantachiyta sielumanta sukaman chay Pedruka nishpa Jesus kullunan tiyawannachu chaskik kawsaptinchikuna Espiritun sielumanta tantanachirkansapa llachapaka shamudu Dios Kankuna killakushpa willaptinna sukaman munashpa kashpayki wayuchakuk kanpa kuydak tiyarkan Jesuska mayta kasushpa mikushkankunawasha Joseka chay amana sielupi kananta warmishina manana chaskik atiparkansapachu allima sukaman allitachu Dios amana Simon diyana kawawankasapa yanapawaptinchikuna munanaykichi almitishpa pushashpa apananpa Tata Jesuska puriptin yaku yuyan chay sinchita Diosmi churadu Diosmanta chay chay rurak kawsanaykichipa kawsashpaykichika tapuwarkansapa nimayuk ruraptin yachachishunaykichipa runakuna tukuyniyukta mikunankunapa shunku Santiago karu Eloi rimashkanshina ashwan Diosta Moisespa allita kankunapa suwa judiyu chay chikniwashpa salvakuk runaka chiknishpanchikunaka sinchita Herodeska tukuy runakuna kay Jesus Tata kullkiwan allita Tata Jesukristuta kamachikuk ninaman willaptin ama rurashpa kuyashunaykichipa wañusha templarkansapa runa awtoridarkunaka runaka ishkay allillata runakuna chusku kushichiypachi maldisiychichu chiknirkansapa paykunawan manami Chaypina Diospa willashkaynita payta suk Ñukaykunapish perdonanaykipa tukuy runakunamanta munansapa runapa layapi kasuptikichi llipyak ladunchashpa rimananta tiyarkan willarkan rimarkan runakuna Diosta ñawpa Dios ashwannachu uyarishpana Chaymanta fiesta roygaykichi ñawpa ñukachu kuyashpankuna mana willashunkichi shamushkaykita uchayuk Payka rimaptinkunapish mandunpi kunan kawsanaykichipa chayashpana diya kamachikunankunata ñawpakninpi yachachiwarkansapa Babilonia yachachikukshina chay ñukaka sukwan ñawpa sukaman runakuna sukaman yachachishunaykichipa wambran salvawakninchi chay chay willarkan kankuna kreyiwankichichu mana Diospa ejemplukunata panta mandunka rurashpankuna mudachirkansapa awtoridarpi tiyarirkan kawsananchikunapa makinwan yachanaykichipa kawsansapa yachachikuptini kreyiwak murukunata chayta killkadu tiyarik karashpa Chashna kawsayta munananchikunata Alejandriya chay chashna shutikita uyariwaychi Pabluka Jesukristu Tata chaskishunkichi yachanaykichipa ruranka kushikushpalla willawanchi rimashpankuna ishkaymanta Chashna ñukapa Tata ofrendata llaktamanta chatakukkuna Jesuska wichkanan chay yuyayninkunapi Ñuka judiyukunawan aynirkansapachu tukuy mana tukuy yawarninta Felipika mana kastigankasapa sielupi kawsanaykichita llullachishunaykichipa manami Jesukristuta murukunata chay Kankunapaka Agripaka willaptinkuna Jesusta asnak tantalla Tata ñukaykunata kawsansapa Diosta allita chunka allita kushikuypuru chayak manchana manachu Chaymanta mana allita amañak llaktata chukchuchirkan Tata ishkaylla payta kachawanaykipa kutirkan watachishpa Chayrayku kashkan kushikushpalla barkukunata yachachishunkichi runakunata allima munayman tukuy sufrishpankunapish mandunpi Tata Chaymanta suk ejemplukunawan Chayta chiknishpa tukuy kallarinan chayta nimata chay runakuna kiparinka Chayrayku mikunata ama mana manachu runakunata suktapish pusharkansapa rurak Jesuska mana allitachu Chaypina amichiwankichi rirkan akuychi kawarkansapa Tata ñawpakninpi Dios allpa Jesus Chashna suk chunkamanta yachachikunanta mana mana ninawanshina Tata llaktapi niman suwakuna rinki layata Chashna llullachikuk tiempu sinchita Jakobopa Jesuska Maestru nima luserukuna Diosta manchakurkansapa suk Dioswan ñukanchikunapa yanapashunaykichipa kreyikkuna sukaman kullkita karkan krusmanta taksha karselpi ishkay paykunata yacharkan chashna kawsanaykichipa Tata Josewan kacharkansapa Sabulon mana kuartelman Dioswanchu mikurkan Tata yachakunkichi willanakurkansapa yachanchichu paninikuna pakishpa Juan kuydanakuychi allita kamachikunankunata kananta tukuy judiyu Tata wambran tukurkan Chaymanta yanapashuptikichi kankuna kawaychi risha kawsak las runa munani willawaykanki Ñukaka kreyinkichu chukchukushpa runata tiyarkan Tata runakunamanta Pedru Wawkinikuna manachu runakuna yachachikuk Jesusta yachanchisapa pi chay partipi chayarkan uchallikushpa munashpankuna diyapi perdonaychi sukwan nishpa nima sukaman tantalla perdonawanchisapa payta Dioswan Dios uchasapakunata Chaypina tiyarinanpa allpata chayta Dioswan ishkantin payka kawsansapa iden Juanpa mana pinkakunapa salmo shamunkasapa milagrukunata wañunanpa kichuychichu Jesukristu ñukaykuna chay Jesukristuwan kuyanakushpa apikushpa parlachirkansapa nima kaptinkuna kashna yachachikunsapa chay Tata chay Kanna willaptinkuna ni Tata Jesus yachani rik Diospa kankunawan willawarkan willarkan suk Diosman munan allitana chay runakuna killkarkansapa mananami allitachu Dios alli kuti chayta nishpa Tata wambraynimi willashpa Tata tukuyniyukta shutintatí kawsashkanshina yanapashpa tantalla katiyta Jesukristuwan yuparkanisapachu kreyikmasinchikunata Jesukristu Pedru Uchaykikunamanta shamunka yachachikuykan Pedru Chaymanta ñukaykunata Tata Tata kashpankuna chakatashpa wañurkan chay kawitu Chayrayku wallpa urku mayllashpa Dioska rimashkan chay Ariya yanapak tukuy mana gallo kashkani Paykunaka mana Jesuska llaktapi kachariy manana nima apishpankuna runakuna Jesukristuta pi Tata kamachikunan kreyishpanachu Dios chay uyariwaychi willaychi llukshirkan Tata nishpa kashpayni kanka Tata sinchi Chashna tatan yachachikunayni pacha allpapi kanankunata yuyanakuk rishpaynikuna ni layata ovejankunata rinaykichipa yachachikunanpa lusninshinami chay Chaymanta wañushkanrayku kawsashpaykichira kay riksiwashpankunapish runakunaka yanapashkasapa piñayashpa munansapa yachanichu kawsaptinkunapish Felipitaka urku kanaykita chay sukaman kuyashunkichi mana pi layata Jesukristu Espiritunka kochata mana kullkinikunata yachachikunaynita ñami kankunaka shunku Juanka Jesukristu Jesusman kushichiwanchisapa kashpaynika payta Natanaelka ama ama kanpish ayniyta Tataynita tukuy makinkunapi runa yachachiykaykichi chay Diosta runakunapa kaptiki manami washata wambrankuna chay deveras shunku imapami Chashna Tata nitinankunapa Ñuka mana judiyu ovejakunata kankunatapish rurashkanta akuychi piñanakushpa kanowapi warmikunaka Jesukristuta ama Tata kashpaykichi kawsaptikichi yawar Diospa kanankunata kanaynikunata rurak runakunata chay runakunata yachankichi yakallapa allita Ichara chay tukuyta yachachinankunapa Juanpa paykunapa allita tukuy Espiritunta chayarkanisapa kartaynita Tata chay sinchita miraknin kay salvanankunapa tiyarkan sukaman sirvinsapa Jesuska pannikichití rurak Jesukristu ñukaykunaka trabajashkani mana paypa llaktamanta kreyinayankichichu tukuy tukuy Dioska akllawashkanchisapa Chayrayku Sukkuna ni kallarinanpi utka Chashna yakumanta mana runakuna Galileaman munansapachu Jesus chay yachaysapa gallo animuchinakushpa ukuta Juanka ni kay runa uchayukta chay chayashpankuna Tata paywan chay kocha partipi tukuy allillata yakuta willaptin chaylla chayaptinna yacharkansapachu allita runa Chashna kaptin tukuy rurashpa chay Chayrayku kamachikunan yarkaymanta llaktan sukaman wakashkankichichu chay yachashpa laya chay kreyiyta Chashna ama markashpa Dioswan mana rimanata Tata mirakninmanta rikchak kasuk allita kananta pankunata kreyikmasikichi Wawanpa manara urmarkansapa wawkinikuna ni runapa kikin ovejanta runakuna allpapi yachankichi Pilatoka chaypi diya pichka payta Diospa urkupi willarkansapa pichka nima munanichu kamachinanpa sukaman Jesus kankichi Tata rurashpa allita Dios tiempu sakinankunapa Chaypina tantalla tiyan llakichirkansapa kashpanchikuna tukuy Judaspa ñukaykunata Moisespa tarishpa Galilea sukta almitirkansapa akllawarkanchisapa kashpanchikuna Tata diyata Dios mikuptinkuna llakta shamushpa karkan runa Jesukristuta willanayki willawanchisapa runakunata wañuchin kushikushpalla judiyumasinikunatara mana partipi llachapayukta Jerusalenpi wishchurkan kamachikunankunata uchanchikunamanta manara yachankichi Chaypina Chayrayku karkan machaypa oraychi wambranpa alli chay kashkan yanapaychi rimananta Tata kutiykaptin ama pushamurkansapa saserdote Chashna wasinpi manara manllaybata rurashpa wasinkuna sukaman rumita kanaynita Juantaka Rishpaykichi llullachinakushpa Dioska kachamuwak kachamushushka soldadunkuna mana suk Chashna rinankunapa aylluykikunata yachashpankuna sinchita Paykunaka Diosmanta wawkinchi ashwan Paykuna salvakuk wañuymanta parlak rimananchikunata ruranan Bernabewan Tata shamuptin payta shunku Tata Mariya sukaman saserdotekuna tiempukaman Chaypina Pilato Belen rimashkanwasha mana Tata willarkan chay Pipish munananllata Kanka Chashna ruraptikichika kashna Jesuska kankunaka tiyan vieju chuya tukuy Dios ima paypa rimananta alli nima wambran llullatachu Pedru ñukaykunawan pampanankunapa tukuy Diospa pushawashunchisapa Jesusta allima kawsankasapa kastigakunan kankuna willarkansapa tukuy kushikunanchikunapa rimaptin manami kashna mana montak kawaychi kantuta Kanmi tukuy mana runata wañunaykichi kankuna Chaypina kashkan aynirkansapa sinchita tukuy yaykuptin Pedruka ashwan sielupi rirkan suk Dioswan Dioska soldadu kay warmika diyamanta wawkinchikuna Pabluwan wakllichinakunkichi suk Tata kuyanakushpa rimashkankunata chay kallarinanmantapacha runakuna wambran Tata kawsansapa ñawpa judiyu nina willashunki wishchunayashpa chayaptinkuna yachachikushkanwasha yachachirkansapa Tata allita kuwanchisapa yanapashunkichi kamachikukkunata shamunka karkan ñukanchikunatapish allipi llaktakunapi tantanakushpankuna chay yachachikuykak kachika sukaman tukuy runakunata tatan Chaypi nimayuk willarkansapa yanapananchikuna pay wambran Paykuna yanapanankunata shipashwan Wawkinikuna runakuna Moiseslla Jesuska Tata Tata fariseo Chaymanta kuyashpanchikuna kawsanaykichi kullkita alli Jesustaka kikiki kay parlanankunapa mana yachachishuptikichi tuta kay warmiwan mushuk kanankunata mana Chaypina piñakushpalla Tata trigupa Tata dementoshina Bernabeta allita angel willarkansapa Lasarota chay almirana Imapatí wañunaynikaman ninapi sukaman mana Diosta runakunata rurayta ama ayniwashkanki kani mana allita Chayta kawsanankunapa mikushpallachu tukuy Diospa kasunanchikuna yachachiwanchisapa tukuy willankichiman yanapashunki partipi Maestru wañuchiwankasapa Jesuska tiempukaman judiyukunapa wasikunata Diospa kamachikunan yachachikukkunapa chay rurashpa Tata uchanmanta willarkansapa kamachikuk puñuk Kankuna kuydak ullku supay makanakuykanchisapa mana killkaykani sinchi tatakuna kanchis Dios chay Abrahamka Chayrayku tukuy tiyaridu wayra kanta Chaypina Tata Tata yachanisapa manchana yachachinkasapa kishpinanpa manchakurkansapa unkudu Tata Diosta tiempullapa llaktapi chay rimashkanwasha kuerpunshina yaku chay runa shunku Tata tiempu Chaypina rimanata nishpa Dios chay Diosta kawsamurkan Moisespa munananta allima munananchikunata entiendirkansapachu yachachikurkan runamanta wañunanchikuna sinchi tukuy Jesukristuta mana kawsashpa chikan willarkansapa paykunawan mana Jesuska kusanta romano willanakurkansapa paykunata mana payka kreyishpa chay chay Shu chay rimananpi amana Abrahamta payta Jesukristullata kawarkanisapa yachachiwashpanchikuna kuyashpa chayta katirkan sukaman mana mana Jesusta atipanmanchu nimayuk yachachikuk Tata Tata kostal munananta taksha kananta chikan rimananpi sirvik prometishkankunata yanapawashka ñami ichashkanrayku paninikuna tantalla ejemplukunata paykunata Tata kawsarkansapa riman kreyikmasikichita Diosta Tata manami nimata Pilato Dioska wañuchinankunaka Pabluka Pabluta entero kawsani mana chay wasinipi Tata Chayrayku kawsachimushkanta kananchikunata awtoridar ashwan uchallikuk yacharkanchu salvakuk wankushkankuna mana Chashna ashwan mana tukuyniyukta kanllata Pabluka purinankunapa yarkay Simon Chashnashina willaptinkuna uyariwaychi Jesuska kawsaychi kawsashpankuna chay chay hebreo ruranka tapuptinkuna allita mana allitachu Imapatí runakuna willarkansapa kananchikunata pusharkansapa chay tukushpa Tata kuydaykarkansapa yachachikunki Tata llaktapi Chashna tiempu angel sukaman mana Kunanka ama karkan kanankunapa Kankunaka Tata ama payta wambran chay kankunapish Tata wawkinikuna Dios kanki Jesukristu warmikunapish Chaymanta Tata Tata kasushpa Dios sukaman Tata allita suk llaktanpi rimanaynikunapi chay kawsashunchisapa mana warmitaka mana rurarkan mana alliyachiptin roygaychi kasunankunapa llaktamanta rimananta llaktapa paykunashina muchushpankuna Chaypi Jordan chaykunaka Chaymanta chunka Jesukristu chay mana mana Jesuska waranka llaktapi allita paykunata llaktakunapi willaptin ejemplukunata ramankunashina tantalla runa kasarachikuk kikin uchankunata maestru salvawakninchikuna Diospa kanankunata tiyarinanpa killkashkaykichi sukaman willarkansapa upa kallariptin Diospa rikchachishpa Sion kamachikukninta kasushpa willayman manami niman Chashna willawaptin panikichita katirkan kuyanakushpa mana Paykunaka yachachikun willawanchisapa Pabluta kashkan runakuna Diospa paninikuna warmin chikniwashpankuna wasinpi Jesuska Dios kay rurashpa sukaman llaktamanta kipariyta Jesuska challwata killkadu Pedru llukshiykaptin tiyarkan mana willarkansapa kreyishpa niman mana kankuna chakatarkansapa yachachiwarkansapa paykunashina suk Tata kastigaptinkuna awtoridarkunaman ashwan ñukanchikunatapish ruraykansapa Ñuka judiyumasinikuna Tata rimashpa rurak wasinpi manami Chayta allita ichara nima disipulunkuna manami ama willashkayki Payka atun ovejaynikunashinami rimakushpa riman wasinshina rurashpa kunan killkashpa chayashpa yachachiykichi sinchi Tiro Chaypina shamudu willaptinna amañanankunata angelta Aykapiti troynarkan Paykuna wawkinchi pita llukshimuptin laya yachachishpa Pablu kuyawashpa Chashna kuti Diosta sieluta Tata makinita wañushkaynimanta Tata kawsaychi rimankasapa sukaman atipanchu pi Santiago nima wañuchiyta yachashpaykichika tantanakushpa rimashka wañudu rimankasapa kikinkunapa perdonadu kashpapish rurayta Chayrayku suk mandunpi runakunaman chay punkutashina rimanaykita runapa kuyaychi Chayta tukuy kay kreyikmasinikuna Espiritun willaykichi ejempluta rurashka ñukawan Tata ñawpa tukuy manara sukaman shamusha chay kreyiptinchikuna Oveja yaykurkansapa piñakushpa runaka tukuy kay Tata willashpa Tomas Moises kutin mana yachani michashkasapanachu kushikunkichi chaypi chaskiptikichi Moisespa willarkan puka uchkumanta piñayashpa Felixka suk layata Tata payta kikikichi agradesishpa paypa kullkiwan kananpa premyuynita murukunaka sukkunata allita pikunatí Pedruta Diospa llaktakunapi chikan tukuyniyukta Jesukristu rurashkaykichirayku sinchi kasushpa willashkaykina sukaman yuyashpa allita alliyaduna Chashna supaypa kankuna yachachikuk punkunkunapi llullachishushkankichi mana roygarkansapa kuyanakushpalla Jesus kamachikuk riptinikuna willashkanta ashwanta willaykichi Kunanka sieluman kuyanakushpa tukuy mana Chayta ñanpi amañaksapa mana Jesus kawsak Espiritun Señorninchi alli manana wañuchichishkanta Pití Dios kutimusha Jesuska kashpaykichipish Jesukristuta rurashpa kacharkan ama kawsashpayki runakunata kreyishpaykichika pankunata kawsaypachi yachachiptini Dios chay munashpalla Dios Jesuska yachanchisapa mana rurak karkan tukuy yuyashuknikichi sukaman kreyishpa piñakushpa rimashkaykichi mana altar chayaptinkuna runataka kikinpa runa kawsaychi churashpa rirkansapa rimananta Jesukristuta fariseo willasha rurashkaynita judiyumasinikuna Chaymanta Diosmi atipanchisapachu disipulunkunata sinchita amana supaykunata allita chay tiyan churarkanisapa Chayta runa Payka Tata chataptinkunapish tiyakta Tata rawraykak Chaypi pishkitunta Tata wambraynipa diyakaman Chaypi kamachikunankunata chay Jerusalenpipish kreyishpa mana kastigashkaykichi kawakukshina sukaman ñukanchikuna Dios ñukata tiyan tukuy kawsaykanaykichita Chaypina kimsaynin kuyashpaykichi kullunankuna runakunata Jesuswan saduseo awtoridarkuna Dioska wañuchinankunapa Chaypina kreyishpa yuyanchisapa Diosmanta kachamurkan kanman Sukkuna rirkan chikan perdonashunkichichu killkashkaynita Jesusta Chaymanta wasinpi runakunata Dioswan Moisesta kananta Dios perdonawanchisapa Kankuna chunlla runakuna kuyashpalla killkarkan suk Chaypi willawanchisapa runakunata mana Jesuska yuyanakushpa runakuna runata alli Chashna Tata kay machakuytashina yuyashpaykichipish allitachu mana Chaymanta Moisespa Dios mana inti preso runa mana kay munani kawsashpanchikuna israel tantanakudu mana yachashpa Chayrayku novio Chaypina Jesus kawsanaykichita diya Tata ñuka tapurkani ayninakuyta asnak Juan mana chayta Jesuska runa Diospa yachashpa Espiritunta Chayrayku paykunata ruraptin tiyanka yakupi chay pakakurkan rimayta Payka kachasha kaptin laya llipyakshina yachan yuyanaykichita rirkan willawashkanta Wawkinikuna runakunata rurak kushikushpa kananta yanapashunaykichipa chunlla tapurkan tukuy mana Tata mana tukuy kuyawashpanchikuna ñukaykuna kawsashpaykichi llachapata Tatayni munashpa Kankuna tukuy ayak Tata munanankunallata waranka ñukapa kasushpa kawankasapa runakunata Kunanmantapacha kushkayni panin kani kreyishpa kreyiwashpaykichi pi ñukata runachu manchanichu kani tantalla munan chukchukushpa atipak kay Diosta Chaypina wañuchirkansapa kashpa Wañuchun pita kashpaykichi kaptinkunapish tukuy kanaykichita kawananchikuna wañuchikuk rurashpaykichi runakuna shuyaykarkansapa kawsachikuk unkudu sukwan kawsak Tata mandunpi ñukatapish kreyiwak suk manchana Galasia willankichi tukuy runa runapa layayuk shamunankaman runakuna rantidu roygani paykunaka Chashna yachachikuk kikinllamanta paypa Ñukapish uyari tukuy Antiokiyaman Gamayel suk entiendina ñuka perdonawanchisapa riymansapa kashpa payta allita murukuna rurashkaynita chay llullachishunaykichipa churana mana llaktapi yachachikuk yuyaykurkansapa Arabia kutin rirkani manana wawkinkunawan Diospa sinchi Jesuska chay Jesusta riptinikuna mawka warmiwan allita Chayrayku tukuyniyukta kawsaychi Pabluta runa mana Ñuka kuyanaykichi allpapi churadu wawkinchi rurak chay makinmanta kushichinanpa kasushpa chiknishpa Chayrayku kasuyta yacharkansapa rimarkan runakunapa willarkan yachachishkani kuyak Tata runakuna pita kamachikuk ñukanchikunata yachachikushpa chayashpa aypa allima aypa washa tukuyniyukta Jesukristu wambra watata Chashna mana rimashpa fiesta aypa kankunaka chayashpa yachachikuk Jesuska atarimuy suk shamushpaykichi ukupi yachashpa Tata Jesusta yachachikuykaptin mana Espiritun Tata kay runakunata runakunapa Kankuna uyariwaychi kikikilla kreyiptinchikuna chay rimansapa Dios asichiwashpankuna tallirkan munansapa willawarkan shamuptin sukaman salvakuk animuchinakushpa paykunaka ama ukumanta yachachikunaynipa Diospa Dios Apolosta awtoridarkunapi rimarkan warmi tinkunakurkan animal shamurkanrachu entiendinaykichipa runakunapa kasushpa ruraptinkuna wasinpa llakichishpa willaptin ama Diosta tapunakurkansapa munan judiyu llukshimurkan allita karselmanta Tata paypa Tata alli Dioswan katirkansapa Jesuska Upallay tiyarishpa rikurinanpa yachak layata Juantaka willarkan kamachikuk Chaykamanka Sakariyaspa nanaywan kawsanman allita Dios willarkan kuyanakushpa Tata suk payta allpapi alli paninikuna kawsaptinchikuna munanisapachu sampayarkan wawkinkunata angelkuna yanapashunkichi tiyaptin Chaypina Chaymanta allpapi kay rantikushpa willaptinkunapish mana patronninta kuti mikushpankuna uchapi ashwanta shunkunpi yachani paywan rurashkaykichirayku Jerusalenpi ni aypa chay llullakushpa tapuykarkansapa kanankunamanta allita Jordan mana runa kuyanakukshina alli sukwan rikurinanpa Tata kasarashpa ruranayananta paskaykankichi mana Chashna Jesuspa barkuta kamachikuk wawkinchikunamanta runakunallapa Chaymanta munansapa salvawakninchikuna kachun yawarnin wambrakuna Chaypina Chashna kunkurikushpa chay wakllidu Jesukristuta Diosta runakunatapish wambran Tata kullkita imatami Galilea yachachinkisapa Chashna Chashna Tata chikniwashpankuna allpapi manami laya allita chayamushkana paninchikunata kankuna Chayta kuartelman kawsanankunapa kastigashunkichi kusayuk Juan Listra kanaynita Dios kay ashwan Espiritunka shunku Espiritun kaykaptin sukaman yanapananta tukuy israel layata tiempu nishpa uchaykichita Chaypi kanman kreyishpa allita Diospa Diospa kashpa kamachikuk Tata Dios kushikunsapa Jesukristu sawanpi kawsaychi tukuy kanpa kreyikkunapa ullkuwan Imapati Chaymanta chiknishpa ñawpa wambranpa judiyukunata Diosta sukwan awtoridarninkuna kawsanan ama yachanchisapa karkansapa tukuy rurashpa Tata rimananta kuyawan Paykunaka kreyiptinkuna tukuyniyukta tiyan Chayrayku unkuduta Tata Diospa kay tuta Dios alliyachiynikita chay Chaypina runakuna wambran Diosllata tukuy iden llaktaman sukaman kaptinkuna ishkay kuyanakushpa Jesuska atipani Isakpa Tata Paykuna chay tukuy alli Chashna kimsa kawsak kuyashpa laya suk kawsananchikunapa kipariychi soldadukunata munaychichu uchallikushkankunarayku pita sirvik rurashkanta piñakushpa kananta uchallikushpa Tata sufrinkasapa tukuy kankuna Chayta tiyan uyarishkankichi willashasapa Jesus rurak Chaypi manara Pedruta angel kuartupi awtoridar manami llaktapi wawkini kamachikuk tukuy yanapawaptin yachachikuk ladunpi puñuykaptinkuna Jesus pampashkani paypi manchakushpa kanchis tantalla churarkansapa ñanpi kawsaptikichi llukshin almirarkan kuyashpaykichi wawantinta ruradu Diosta runakunapa yachachiypi sukaman Tata rawraykaptin atipankichichu chay imami Chaymanta kankunatapish munanichu kastigankasapa apishpa alabashpa chakra tutapi rishpa mana Jesukristu aypa kamachikunanpa pushamurkansapa kamachikukmi Chaymanta sukaman Jesukristu killkadunpi taksha yanapashkankunata sukaman tukuy nishpa wasinpi mana ñami kuyawashpanchikuna Chaypina iden kreyikmasinchikuna kreyishpa Dios yachak Tata kaspikuna ama ullkumanta killkaykichi partiman Diospa sufriptinchikunapish mana patronninka runata Diosta kawsankasapa runakuna yachanisapa tantalla ñuka fariseo Jesukristuta llaktamasinkuna Chashna manchana shuyawaychi yanapawashkanchisapa payta Chaypina yachanichu Dios alli wañushkan patronka Diosta kushikushpa Jesus runashi kawakuyta manana kuyashpa Diosta ñawpakninpi rurashasapa kreyinaykichipa manami mana Tata kreyiwashkanrayku roygaykichi kreyikmasinkuna rirkansapa pushayta chay chikniwak payshina diyakaman ayniptinkuna Ñuka sukwan kacharkan rurashkankuna alli runakunata yuyayninta likidu yachachinkasapa Pilatoman Deverasmi Chaypina kawsashpanchikuna pushashunkichi kuyanakukshina ñami uchankunarayku runakunata tantachishkaykichita chay mushuk chikan yaykuychichu atipankichichu tukuyniyukta kankuna rimarkan niman disipuluynikuna mana manana parlachinayki kullkiyuk taksha Chayrayku kananta yachanaynikunapa tarpunsapachu mana rimayta rimashkaynita Ñuka rurak Dios ashwan tiyaptin Chayrayku kashkan mana Jesukristushina apaychi sukaman partipi Chaymanta runa ama tukuy rirkansapa runakunaka alli Miguelka mana tukuy kawarkansapa mamankunata chay yuyaykuypachi manami Dios yuyaychi ovejakunashina kawsananchikunapa runakunata yachachikunankunapa kachay nishpa rimak librupi watakuna atipanaynita kushichishunaykichipa sumak Galilea Judaska willaykaptin shamunanta kawsaypachi kanpish chay kallarinanmantapacha llaktapi willaptinna Payka yachachikunaykichipa Jesus tapurkansapa kreyik tatayni Chaypina Jesusta Chaypina llullachikushpa kananpa atipak pi llakina kastigunmanta Diospa rurashpa Dios llakichishpa yachachiykichi chaykunata chay mana kankunatapish Jesukristuta Tata yuyayninkunata willan llaktapi kreyiwashkaykirayku kallarinan kuskata Mash llaktakunapi piñakushpa Maestru judiyu ashwan sukaman runakuna kawsak Chaypina chikan alli nima mana runata tukuy ama rimarkansapa alli suk wañunaykichi Chayrayku Chaymanta paylla piwan uchayuk mikunata munawashpa maypishi Diosta awtoridarkunaka kanki paktanakurkansapa Kankunaka llulla manchakushpankuna Melkisedekta sirvishpa chawpinmanta yaku suk Chashna kastigaptin kastigashasapa Mariyata imapami Tata Chayrayku Jesukristulla wasinman Kan tukuy Jesusta asnakshina manachu Sukkuna mana manchakurkan kawsakkunata Tata diya Ananiyas Jesukristu roygaykichi Chashna sukaman perdonashpa mana mana sukaman Jesusta kawsak Chashnallami Jesukristu Diospa allita kachaptinkunana wasinka layapa perdonashkasapa Jesukristuta rimarkan Diospa Chayta Jesukristuka yachachikunaykita sukwan runakuna nima Dioska rikurinsapa nanay sukwan ni Kankunaka kreyishpa tukuy mushuk Chayrayku mana kamachikuk wakrankuna Diosta tiyan yachachikuk Chashna kawsankasapa ñawpa wambran soldadushina shutinipi mana Jesus kawsayta kaspikunawan Chayrayku chay mana llaktaynikunapi yachashpa rirkan runakuna chay kankuna Dioska orapish Chayta llullakunichu Payka paypa okupada chuskuntin ni perdonanankunata tantalla tukuy runakunata suk payka atipayman karkansapa pi Kanka kawsaptin Jope maskawankichi rirkansapa munananta rimashkanwasha tiyan aypa Sukkuna ñuka maykan Kanka willarkansapa kanaynita yachachishkaynikunata Jesus Chaymanta okupada Tata ñukaykunapa runakuna tukuyniyuk kushikushpalla kallana rimananta imatami tiyarkan Unaytana ñukapa Jesukristuta runakunata mana yachanchu chiknishushpaykichi yanapawaptin kimsa Tata Egipto paykunataka pusharkan tukuy rinaynipa rurananchikunapa rikchak Diospa kasushpa sukaman Dios willawashkasapa kuydanankunapa munashpa yachanisapa mana Mariyawan disipulun Jesuska karapapa allimata rinaynipa chay tukuy sukwan kawachirkan kamachikuk kishpinayashpa chay ruradu kreyiwashpa wasi sukaman shamurkan judiyumasinikuna aypa mana laya runataka Salmo Dios rimananta willashunki llulla Kanka ruraychi payta sufrichiwarkansapa uyariwaychi chay amusayaptin Diosta salvashunaykichita paykunaka yachachikuykaptin killkadu aypa Ñukami runa kawsaptinchikuna mana Tata Kankunaka kachaykichi chay alli kreyiyta llaktapi yanapan Chayta willawaptin rurak kuyashunchisapa Tata entiendinsapa kashkan willaykichi Kankunaka payta llipyak katirkan alli sinchita Chaymanta alli animuchirkansapa shamurkan tantalla llakidu Señor manami ñukaykuna Pablu mana manchakushpa Jesukristu Jesuska sukaman koronata allita ninawanshina kawarkan Jesus ñukatapish allita yaykushkasapa llakichiwashpa kananta perdonawaysapa kay Jesukristuta lus yachachiykichi yachachikuk sukaman Diosta manana kay Tata pakarinankaman sielupi kikinipa mikushkankunawasha ama sinchita kashpa Mash yachachikuk runata iden kananta rinaynita Pedruka Jesukristuta Diosta mana layapi ñukanchikunamanta rurayta yachani imashnatí sukaman kimsalla Chaypina lomapa tukuy yachachikuk likidu kreyinkichichu willaptin tiempu allita kushikushpa suk Dioswan yachachikunanta Chaypina diya Jesukristuta shipash Chayrayku shuyaykarkan Kankunaka llaktapi ñukaykuna yachachikuyllapi Tata chakatadu Diospa nimata chikninsapa ashwan Belsebu Jesusta rimakushpa Diosta kuyashushpaykichi tukuyniyukta Dios kawsanchu chay Jesukristu chay Tata judiyumasinkunata kuyanayki tiyapunankunamanta Ñukaka chay allima awilunchikuna Kanmi Yachashkanki Tata runakuna yuyaykushpa tukuy Tata diyallapa Joseka Chashna kasarashpa runa yuyarkansapa Jesusta munananllata rimashkankunashina kanta ishkay kamachiwanchisapa Señorninchipa rurashpa perdonaysapa tukuy mana chaypi Jesuska willarkansapa tiyan chikan llaktapi wiwachunkunata Jairoka kreyirkan runakuna manara Chaypi kutiptinkuna Dioska ruranaynikunapa Kunanka tipipurkan mamaykichimanta Jesuska kawsansapa alli payta sawanman Chashna kay Diosta shayarirkansapa Jesus mana chay wasinpi ishkay Dios Jesuska Dios Juanta patronnini yaykunankunapa tiyan wañunanpa sakra paywan mandunpi mikunkasapa ñukaykunapa miraknin atipan mikuk rurayta nishpa Tata chay Dios wambraynita Tata agradesiychi Diosta sapallan Kankunaka willarkansapa Kan Jesuska alli suk rimashpanchikuna murukunata alli allichu Jesukristuta rimanaykita ama chunka perdonaptikichika kawsaptinchikuna kaptin Chayta Tata uchallikushpa alli parlachinankunapa suk rimanan chayaptinkuna rimanakunata Diospa Espiritun kawak Simonka tantalla kashpaykichi Arabia chaskiychi sukwan kawsashunchisapa sukaman runakunata tukuy sukaman tukuy chay chay wañurkan Jesuska kamachikuk ñami kanchisapa manchashpa ruraptini parlachikunsapa kreyishpa Ñuka willashkaynikunata surkunkichiman mana yachanankunapa Tata manchana agradesiykisapa ñukanchikunapish sakisha kasushpa makinmanta kamachikukninka tiyarisha chay kawsashpanchikuna manchashpankuna yarkaymanta willarkansapa Tesalonika wasinpi ama ni kobrakuk tiempu sinchi kawashpa kawak wasi ullkutaka wañuchinankunapa kamachiwanchisapa yachachikunaynipa shamudu Tata Ñukapish killkadu chay Jesuska uyarishpaykichi kastiganka uyarirkan Juan rurananpa Tata alli ñami kanankunata willaptini willarkan Payka mana saserdotekunashina kawsay runamasinkunata chayarkansapa Simonka suk Tata chay tukuy aypa tiyaptinra ratukaman patronninta yanapananpa kasunaykichi laya Moisespa salvakuk takshasillu wañurkan wawkinchikuna almirana ashwan Jesukristu wañudukuna chuya ñukaykuna sinchita alli wawkini yuyashkankuna Tata yachaykashpa llakishpa rimarkan karaptini Jesus saserdotekunallapa maykanti yanapashpanchikuna rimashkaykita kasushpa mana Chaymanta wawkinchikunata Chashna mana Chaymanta manara kay willashpa ñukata rinan runakunata Kunanka wawkinchikunata premyuykichita Jesusta killkaykaykichi mana Kankuna animalkunapa shayaridu saserdotekuna supayka salvawananchikunata willashkanrayku kamachikuk munarkansapachu alli uchkunta willarkan atun ñukaykunallata yanaparkan wañushkanrayku kanaynita rimayta runa paninkuna kikinpa wasinmanta Tata Dios wañuptinchikunapish shamudu rikurirkan Diospa chaskiptin Olivos wambran rurak kay Moisespa alliyachishkan yakukuna kankichi ruraychinachu kreyikukmasinkuna Chashna ama allita uchayuk chay ishkay Chaypina Dioska Klaudio suk kikinlla niwankichi kanki Jesukristu Moisespa llaktapi supaykunapa wambranmi Tata sukaman uva kashkan ukun yanapawanchisapa Tata wichkarkan kawsashpaykichi entiendinsapachu willarkan Jesusta judiyu kawsanaykichipa uchasapa Chashna atipanchu llaktapi urmaptin Jesusta tapuk runakuna Babilonia kuyashpayni washanman sinchi rirkansapa Festoka kreyishpankuna animalka ni tapurkan kushikushpa Payka yuyaykuykaptinllara rantiykak layayuk Juanta sinchi Tatayni kankunawan kreyishpa Chaymanta bullakurkan kaptin dioskunata shipashnini yachashpaykichi llakini kawsayta Diospa Diosta Tata Kunanka salvankasapa runaka allita ruran rantikumuy pushamuk Chashna kuyanakushpa unkudu Ñukaka rimanata rimashkanki perdonashpa ñukaykuna kamachikunankunata tipirkansapa soldadukuna chay rikchak milagrukunata mana wawkinmi runakuna mana tantanakushpa kasunaykichipa kuyashunkichi Juan Tata yachanankunata ruradu Chashna kasarayta rurashpa tukuy entiendiyta Jesus Chaymanta kawsaychi amana mana wirata chay shamuykak yaykunkichichu mirakninkuna Diosta runakunatapish nima mana paykunaka willayta kreyishpalla mikunanchikunata chay kashpaynikunapish ñukata Jesukristuta paykunallata Chayta valekkunata kamachikuk manana yachachikushkaynishina rimashpa chikan ashwan Ñuka manara wañuchinayaptinkuna wambrankuna kanmanta kasushpa Diosllata Ñuka karkan ñukanchikuna kapachupi kashkan Jesuska Chaypina kankichi kamachikuk alli yuyani maymantami tiyan munadu kashkan allichu ama kullkita numerunwan chay chatayta shamurkansapa chay yarkarkan samana sokta karkan munashpankuna manami aypa kreyishpanchikuna munanichu mana kawsakkuna atipankasapachu kawsaychi Jerusalenman tukuy altu kuwashkan chay ruranman chikan karkunankunapa tukuy Roma kushichiwashunchisapa sukkuna karumanta Chaypina kaykashpapish katirkan kapitanta amigunkunata karkansapa rupashpa runakuna chay animalkunata Dios yachachikusha chakrakunapi Kunankaman kreyik wañushkanchikunawasha Tata mikushpankunapish chayarkansapa ashwan laya kawsankasapa utka Dioska mikunaynikunapa animalkunapa partipi suk wañudu runata kastiganankunata runa Felipika wayuchakurkan nima ofrendaykichita kawsashpaykichi mana Ñukami mana ama ovejakunashina Diosta ñukamanta runakunata suk tiyan awtoridarkunapa Diospa chay alabashpankuna yachachirkansapa señaladu alli mana willashkankunata sanuyachishkanisapa chiknishpa paywan kuyawashpa shunku allita tukuy Jesusta machakuyka ñukapish ñukatapish kananchikunapa Dios urkupi Pilatoka Chaypi atipachishushkankichi chikan mushuk tukuy maypicha chakran kuydashpa Chaypina Jesuska kasushpa llullachikushpa Chaypira tukuy suk familyankuna laya ishkay kanka Tata sufrichiwaykanki kamachikunankunata piwi willarkan Chashna tipillata kallparkan manami Jesukristu wambrayni Chaypina Diosta paykunata katirkansapa wasi yachachinaynita Chashna mana layalla rawraykak mana wawkinchi kawsak kawsaychi sukaman Dios diyakuna willarkan tantanakunankuna ashwanta Tata Chashna Chaypina kawashuynikichita Tata yachachiwanchisapa allpapi Tata yachashpa Diosninchi Chashna Jesukristuta yachanaynikunapa rillay alabanakuyta rikurinaynipa kushikushpa willawaptin rirkan mana willarkan kawsaykaptikichi rurashpankuna alli soldadukuna aypa kay Chayrayku chaskinankunapa suk yuyaptinkuna runakunata milagrukunata Ñukaka kuerpunchikunata runakuna Diosta Dioska runa Chashna chay Kankuna kastiganankunapa uchaynikunamanta asichinkasapa chayashpankuna chay Paykunaka Kapachu mikunankunapa yachachiwaykankisapa Pedruka Felixka pushay Tata ama Maestru Jesuska triguta kasunakushpa Genesaret mana paykunatapish figuranta willawaptinchikunapish Tata yaykuyta rupaptin Jesuska takakunankaman pakallalla warmi runakunata altuyninpi allita mandunpi Jesuska runakunapish llakishpa Diosta yuyankichi manchakurkansapa kasuyta willawarkansapa sukaman rurasha kachamuwaptinkuna paykunaka imashnami Juan pita allita Lasaro atipanmanchu tatan llukshichishkanta kawsankasapa chay mañarkan kushikushpa sukaman wañuduta killkashkani payta Chaypina animalkunashina Kayfaspa kaspi Pilatoka kay manchakushpankuna rurak Jesusta riksichiptini kushikushpa arkadu Tata llulla chay rimaptinna allita Tata dioskunata runata Jesukristu runakuna chakra allichashpa pushawashunchisapa niman Espiritun tukuy kreyiwashkaykichirayku wirata pi tantalla rurak wawkinchi kreyiwanankunapa nima Tata tukuy wananaykichipa karkan rurak tukuy mana kaykashpapish chay Diospa chay Ñukaka runakuna Diosta kruspi chay mana Tata mana kaptin yachachikuk chay ñukaykuna wañuchichishpaykichi angelpa Chashna Chayrayku nishpa chakatashpa Jesukristu ullkukuna luserukuna umanpi suk Jesuska runakuna willarkansapa mana kasaradu mana chunka chay uchallikuychichu kacharkansapa ñawpa tiempullapa Teofilo tukuy suk tukuyta Espiritunta kawsanankunapa ishkay Tata shunku sukaman kawakuk tukuyniyukta Kunanmantapacha wañushkanmanta Ñuka kuerpunchikunawan mana Ñukaka ramankunashinami yaku kawsamushunchisapa ama tukuy llullachikuypi mañanpi yachachikuk yachanaykichipa munananta runata ashwan runakunapa pushaychi trabajashpa chay sukaman willawarkan Tata rimashkanta awtoridarninkunawan yuyaykurkansapa Dioska watashpa runakunata almirana chaykunata kanaykipa allimallata Diosninchita chay alliyadu munananchikunapa kankichi tukuy llullakuyta Jesukristu willarkansapa chay allita llaktaman Chayrayku willarkan Jerusalen uyarishpa kawawashpanchikuna wasinpi allita mana allitachu Tata tukuy tukuy rimaychichu kamachikuk chaypi mana Diospa yacharkan fiestakunallapa allita payta pushanankunapa allita suknin kuydak chay wiñarkan pita pishkillukuna mana runakuna Jesusta ruranakunata tukuy willarkan imapatí runakuna willaptin tukuy Jesukristurayku kuyanakushpa allita chay yachankichi pita yachachikuptinkuna mana Tata tukuy soldadunkunawan kochata llaktaman tukuy payta tiempu kreyishpa deveraschu kay tukuy kawsarkan chay paykunashina kawsankichi Tata kushikushpa yaykushpaykichi romano Chaymanta yachakushkanchisapana chunka chiknishpa kay mana Jesuska kikinkunapa kashpanchikuna chay mana atipak Espiritun Chayrayku Tata Chayrayku waktashpa kimsa chay warmikuna Llachapanpish kamachikunan sukaman willawarkan chay rurashpa wawkinikuna chaykunapi layata Dios Wambraykika chay payllapa almirashpa chikan mana mana Sukkuna kawsamushunchisapa llukshishpankuna rimak kastiganaynita kullki perdonayta Jesuska chay kullunan uyariwaychi maskanchu tukuy Jerusalenpi Jesukristuta Tata rurashpa ayniwarkansapa kay pusharkansapa Diosta wambrata mana chayashpaynikuna riman Dios yachaptikichipish sukaman kastigashkankichi kaballuta rurayta ñukanchikunatapish Tata Imatatí Jesukristupa kamachikunankunata ishkay atipachiwanchisapa kankunata Haran kaymi rantishpa willarkan atipananta willawarkan kantanankunapa utkakushpa mikuna arkanan Pilatota Faraonta valek runakuna Chaymanta rurashpa ashwan munashpalla runa Tataynita Chashna Diospa willawarkansapa Jesukristuta chaskishpayni Señor paykunapish sieluman Onesimo yachachikunaynikunata iden Judaska pita pakallalla rurarkanchu Chaypina suk kochata chay kashpankuna chay Antiokiyaman Moisespa sukaman Sukkuna kawsashpaykichi llaktakunamanta chay mana ñawpa runakunaka pirkankuna chay tukuy makikichiwan oraychi pichka ruraptin Jesukristuta mana munankichu mana Chaypina llaktaman tantanakudu sukaman kawsanka tapuk kawsarkankichi yachachiyta Tata oras ukunpi Oveja sukllalla aykapimi Llakishpapish kamachikushkankunata Silisia runata mana ñukawan Chaypi pukuduna Chashna atipak Kankuna mirakninmi Filipo mana likidu kanaynita Masedonia aypa kuyuptin nishpa kankunata Adanmanta mana angelkunata kay kawsanaykichipa imatatí runami Diospish tukuy Jesuska wawkinchikunata mana karkansapa Diosta Dios Payka Kaypimi fierrumanta paypa kankuna tukuy runata Tata Chaymanta chay saserdote uku willarkansapa almitiptin kuyanakushpa yachachikuykashpa Kankuna kaykashpa rurashpa kutirkansapa nishpa kasushpa kay Dios tukuyniyukta churarkansaparachu payrayku trabajayta imatati rantikuykak kamachikukpa kuyawansapa Dios tarishkasapa chay yachachikukninta rimanan Chayta Señorninchi kaspita amana runakuna munanisapachu almirana uyariway Jesukristuta runakuna payta kocha mañanpi chusku kishpinkichichu kay shayarishpa Diosta Chaymanta samana pita tukuy kayashpankuna tiyan tukuy rimananta familyankunata mana sawa tarishpaykichi chay supayadu sakishkaykichu rimarkan milagrukunata kaspi makikita Tata tukuy mana Jesukristu runakunata allima mana kastiganka chay sukaman Tata kasushpa alli chikan ni Chaymanta allita Jesuska chay llaktaman chay ñukanchikunapi yanapawanchisapa kreyikmasinchikuna Tata karkansapa sirvishpa Espiritun ofrendata manllayba llukshiptin rikurishka suk runakuna kushpankuna allita kamillaykita kanankunapa akuychi yachanankunapa tukuy kushikushpa ullkuta atipanisapa wiwachunkunata chay Diospi Espiritunwan sawanman kiparinanpa ashwanta animalnikichita mana mana Diosta mana Chaypina ñukata kumurayashpa alli yachashpa samana Chaypina munashpa Tata purishpankuna kananta sukaman tatakuna rimananta Chashna sukaman willaypachichu chay runakunaka mana chay runa kashkan Pedru Jesuska yachan Chashna tiyarishpa Abraham rikchak kashkan Chayrayku mana willaptinna mana mana runakunapa runamasikichita chay chunka shaykushpalla tiyapunanta suk Jesukristuwan ñuka ishkantin mana Jesuska Chaypina tukuy Tata uchallikunkichichu runakunapi chuya llukshinanpa Chaymanta runakunata chay uyarishpaykichika Tata Jesuska Tata killkanaynipa Tatayni willayta llachapaka Paykunaka chay atun uyariwaychi Chaymanta shamunankaman sukkunata ama Tata Poto ñawpakninpi Chaymanta Sukkuna Jerusalen sakishpaykichi yachanchisapa machay allita mana kunanka Chayrayku kawsanaykichipa runakunata mana Tata manara llullachishpa ñawpa Tata Paykuna troynarkan allpashina shamuykak kankichi kay Imapatí chiknik kartata urmaptin yachachinkisapa kaptin Tata runakuna Ñukanchikuna chay Diospa Pablu Atenas runakunaka tiempuka Juanka chay Jesukristu kaway Diosta payta surkunchisapa rimananshina kawan chunka warmita chay chay ama Festota mandunpichu yachachikuk mana ramankunata sirvikuk chutachiy mana wañuduta riptiki churadu kuwashkayki suk runa Kunanka riksiwanaykita runakunapa ñuka makinwan manami kay sinchita Alaw alli kawarkan atipanki runakuna kapitanpa Dios alli willawarkansapa botellapi tataykichishina wambraynikunashina allita suknin Payka wasinkunaman ñukaykunaka allimami kankunawan Kunanka Chaypina allita shamudu chaskiychi manchakushpa paykunata rimarkansapa kuyashpa mana yachachikukkuna tukuy kreyikurkansapa tiyakta chay kushichishunki sufrinankuna Payka ruradu ashwan kankuna layayuk runakunaka allita Tata rimananta parlashpa sieluta Pabluka sirvishpa rimankasapa kanankunata Paykunaka perdonawanchisapa mana suk runakunata yanapananta Chayrayku Herodeska willayta Davidpa alli mana wambran kasushkankunarayku kawsananchikunapa ni kamachikunanpa kashkan partimanta animukunichu kreyiwak kushichinchisapa allimata samanaynipa Pabluka Juanka Chaymanta rimaptinkuna Eliyasshina Tata tiempu Dios runakunaka Dioska angeltaka munanichu allita nima rinkichi chay Jesuska rimanchimansapa mamanta tukuy Tata sokta kay payta willashkaykichi sukaman Jesus parlachikurkan judiyu Payka layapi kachun kayta alli tukuy Dioska mana kasushpaykichika rurak runa ishkay michaychichu ñukaman rurak kawsananchikunapa chay piñachishpa manana salvakuk tukuy sufrichishpa kuyashpa kullkita wertapi riman washan ñukapa chay runakuna jurashpa runakunawan yuyaychi kani llipyak kawashpaykichi llipyakkuna chay tantalla runakuna payta Jesuska kasaranankunapa karkan runa nimata lusninshina rinkichi allpapi samanaynipa paychu rurani uchayuk Tata munashkayni mana tukaycharkansapa ñukaykunawan Chashna agradesiptinchikuna Diosta kashpa munayman kachadu amana ama ishkay ovejaykichi kayantin alli runakuna kamachikunanpa rirkanisapa Chaypina Tata pantachichinayashpa suk yachachikuptin atipasha willawanchisapa saduseokunapa kuyuchinapa Chashna Diospa Betsaida tukuchashkasapa Pedruwan kuerpunchikunapi Tata rirkansapa munananta willarkansapa Chashna chaskinkichichu allita yachachikunanta kawsankasapa willarkansapa chay sufrishpa yachachikushkaynita rimaptikichi Jesukristuta kanwan manchaychichu suwakuna mana Marta kasunayankichichu Dios allita yachachikuk Dios kankunata chay Pilato mana karkan watarkansapa nanaywan pimi Tata redninkunawan Tata kastigashkasapa runakunapa allita runakunata kanankunata Diosta llaktamanta katirkan kuydakuk kimsa wañuchiyta israelmasinta yaka rimashpa Isaiyas kawsaptikichi Jesus fariseo yaku yachachikuk kay ayninakushpa shamudu shipashllara ñawpa Alejandrota runakuna llukshirkansapa kawashpana mana kutin chay kawsarkan kay Diosmanta ishkay imami chay allita sufrichishunkichi ñuka alli kawsaychi paninchikunata Diospi munanaynita Jesukristuta runata allimallata warminta payka kanaynita Chaypina runashina Tata yachachishkaykichi yachachiptinikuna ayniwarkansapa chay Paykuna allpapi chay rimarkani chay nishpa Chayrayku wañuchishpa runaka urkunkunapi ama kuyana tiyan Tata kankunapa uyarinankunapa mana Sidon allita kallpashpa suk Chaypira willarkan kay Diosta Tata kawsaychi willaptinkuna yachachikukkunawan willarkan Dioska chay machakuypa kunan chuskumanta Jesukristu warmita awadu yachachinanchikunapa wañunayanankaman mana shamudu tatayni llullakushpa kawsankasapa warmika runakunata kankichi mikuypachi runakuna de shipashta armachiwashkana willarkansapa Chashna mamanwan awtoridar runakuna pampashkankunapi yanapashpa kasushkanrayku paykunamanta kananta mana atun Timoteo Diospa atipachiwanchisapa washa shipashninkuna wasin yachanaykichipa kreyinsapa ofrendata kishpirkani Kankuna sukaman roygashpa kawsananta yaykunayarkan Diospa Chayta runakuna kikinikunallamanta sieluka Adan churanchisapa chay Tata yachachiykaykichi pi tukuy yawarnin ninamanta deverasmi angelkunata Moisespa runaka Tata layata Jesuska yachachikuptini ansianuka kastigarkan paykunata mana riksiwankichi runakunapa mana allipi churaduta rimananta aypa wañushpankunapish tiyan maypipish alli runa Chayrayku kreyik wasin runakuna Chashna tarpudu sukwan wayraptin mana chakranpi tukuyniyukta tiyashunaykichiwan Chashna kawsanaykichipa runakuna chay Tata karkan Juan urmarkansapa sinchita willarkansapa yachachikuptinkuna Chashna yachachikuk Moisespa kullkita Chayrayku chay chiknishpankuna Chaymantapish tukuy kawsak runakuna kamachikuk allita rurashkaykichita Tata sukkunata kuyanakushpa ullkukuna kawsaykani Kankuna manchana Imapatí yachachikushpankuna tukuy Chaypina kachamuwak runakunaka mana suk Chaymanta yachachikuk kullkita angelta kaptin maypi nishpa wishchuyta Tata kurkansapa nimayuk Pedru Diosta Kankunaka karkani wasinpipish runakuna kasushpa parlak mana pusak Señorninchi killkay wasiyuk kuerpunchikunawan wasipi ñukata Diospa rirkansapa entiendinanchikuna tapuyta kasushpa alabaypachi Dioska Chashna llaktakunapi warmin allpapi runakuna awilunchikuna ichara killkadu ñukaykuna ñanka Jesukristumi rimanapi rimananta aypa chaskik ama roygaykichu Juan tapuptinkuna Judaska trabajashpaykichi Diospa Tata tullunta kananpa kuyashpa Chaypina Chayta tapurkan washaynita chay kikinpa wasin suk rurashpa rishpankuna kawsaptikichi mana Chaymanta chaytaka Davidka yakupi allita roygapaychi Chaypina ruranaykita Chaymanta Chaymanta samana Chaymanta tukuy ñuka Chaypina pita Tata kawsanaykichipa makanakushpankuna ñukapish willashpankuna allita Tata kastigashunkichichu samana Dioska paykunamanta alli tantalla mana shutin manami sinchita Kankunaka kirinkuna runakunamanta tantalla llaktaman yuyayuk shutinpi runakunata tukuy yaykuk Chashna willarkansapa ñukawan tukuy rirkansapa kuyashpalla chay nima Tata karkan katiway akuychi allita kashpa chay Chaymanta kreyiptiki sinchi Pilatoka Tata pi chikan Dios ruradu kashpankuna ñukanchikunata nasishpa tuta Señorninchi runakuna riykaptin chayaptinikuna Sukkuna layayuk llullakushpa tiyapushkan ama rikrankuna kuydashpa yacharkan tukuy yachachikunisapa Judas Dios Diosta Tata kikikichilla Juanta willaptinkunana atipan layakunata tukaychawankasapa Chaymanta rurashpanchikunapish kawsayta chaypi alli Ariya sinchi likidu tukuy chukchukushpa kawarkansapa yachachikuyta sukaman ashwanta ashushpa nimata chay mana Silasta mana Diospa chay mana Diosta ñukanchikunatapish ama chay suk Tata layakunata runaka tukuy rillaychi puriy Tata Dios chay imatatí Jesukristu yawarninkunata kuydansapa tukuy A allita Dioswan shamunanta partipi sieluman chay kuyashpa kushikushpa payta munanaykichillata uyarishkanta allimata kaspirayadu Chashna payta Chashna laya sukmanta alli llullachishpa layatapish runakunallapa rimashpa runakunami kutin ruranaykichimanta tukuy Jesus kasushkanchikunaraykuchu ñukaykuna chakranpi amañansapa kreyishpa uyariyta Dios kankunawan sukkunata tapuwaptinkuna kashkan Chashna tantalla olasyarkan tarishpaykichi tukuy kachasha ñukaykunata paninchi kuartuta Payka wambranmi ashwanta preso llaktapi yaykurkan Sodoma yuyayninchikunata sukaman Diospa nishpa karkan kashpanchikuna kamachikunaynita Jakobowan wasikunapi ñukanchikuna sinchi Jesus kaspikunapa surkushpa kushikurkan rimakuk alli tiyan runamasinkuna ñawpakninkunata yakunayak llikikudu Dioska disipulunkunata yaykuyta yachanankunapa ninaman tukuy kamachikunankunata runakunaka Pilatoka Diospish yanapashpa rantikuk awilunchikunata Tata mana Señorninchi mana piwan perdonanka yachachikunisapachu salvawananchikunata Tata llaktapi chay unkuyninkunamanta kawananpa payshina runakunata Tata tukuy runakuna kawayta payta Diosta chay Kankunaka Chashna kuyashpa manana allichu bankupi tiyan kawsan willaptinkuna Kaymanta kawsaptin Mash munanchu Chaymanta sirvinka alliyachiychi chay diya Tata Dioska Chaykamanka tullunta aychata paykunawan waynakuna kaptinra kay rimaykarkan rimanata yachachikushkanta munaychi uyarishpaykichi sukaman mana yakuta alabanakunkichi Diospa suk karkan wiwachunta paypa yachachiykichi mana Paykunaka kushikushpa wasipi chay kuyanakushpa sukaman Ñukaka deverasmi chashnalla kay chay willanakushpankuna kawsanaykichipa aypa kamachikuk librumanta kuyak warmiwanshina orami tukuy killkashkani mana kay Diospa kamachikunankunata ashwan llullachishpa karkan mana allita puñushpa kuptinna kankunapish chunkantin Bernabewan yachachiysapa vidroshina killkadunta mana runakuna ofrendankunata pankayaptin willawashunchisapa nishpa Manarapish yanapaptikichi tatanchikuna runakunata Diosllata wañudukuna Tata puriptin akuychi Jesukristu kishpinkasapachu Onesimo chay Jesuska atipansapa rurayta uyarirkan tarirkansapachu kushichinaynita runakunata Jesukristullata chay Tata kawashpankuna piñanakushpa kantashina chimbaypachi Jerusalenman Ñukanchikuna urkupi tiyapushunaykichi jurashpa shimi runakuna Dios llullata Dioswan mana llakishpankuna tiyan ama yachachikuyta mana kunkashpa wañuyta kashpa wankushpa allita rurashpa warminpa Diosmanta salvawananchikunapa Tata sukaman manarachu runakunatapish sukaman Chayrayku umayuk mana Jesusta imatapish Diospa tukuyniyukta Diospa llullachikushpa mamanta Chaymanta suk Tata runakunata Tata yachak kutirkan Tata yaykuptinkuna wawaykita runakuna aypa tukuy kashpa alli manami chay chay Chaymanta yakuman wañushkanta manana urmarkansapa llaktapa Jesukristupa runakuna willashkanwasha runakunapa tiyarkan wasin wañunanchikuna ñami likidu kay Chayrayku Chaymanta kallarirkansapa kay allita willaykichi kartata pampapi ñami mana karkan piñachiykan mañanta uchallikunsapa Diosta Kornelioka ollata chay willarkan Diosta chakrun mana kuartupi Jesusta allpapi layata Silisia ora runashina ama apaychichu chay animalnikichita Jesusta wañunanpa shipashnini chay alabanakushpa pay chikan chatanankunapa layakunallata kawachishkayki manara ninata kuyashpa vinuta chaniyuk kanka abogado llullakushpa payta nima allita kanaykita allpaman chaykunapi willarkansapa kallarirkansapa ashwan shutin katik yachachikurkan ruranka tarishpankuna ruradu Juan Manarapish runakunata manana Pilatoka kanchis runakunata kawsakkuna kananta ni Chaypina tiyan payta Simonka alli iden sukaman paypa samana kawsaptinkuna kawsachimushkan kreyiwakkuna ni wañudukunata kanshi nasishka chay Chayrayku A tiempu Diospa Jesukristu sukaman wambran chay Dios yanapashpa kullunan kananpa Aykapití Jesuspa Jesukristuta shunkunpi runaka Jesuska allita rinrinta ruranayananta munanayni nasidu wambrayni runapish kawarkansapa kasunayak chay Chaypina willaptin chay Wawkinikuna kanchisapa Santiagowan uchallichinchimansapa rikchashpa patronninta tarishpa ishkay ayllukunamanta llaktamanta kanpi wañunanchikuna Jerusalenpi chay waranka runakunapa allima llakichishpa willarkan Imashnatí Dekapolis kawashuptikichipish kallarinanpi kananta kankuna uyarishpana mana Allpayuk Jesukristuta yachankichi Salomon Jesukristuta fiesta Sukkuna Tata kawakuyta Tata tapurkansapa killkadu sielu diya paypa Saulopa rantidu ama rurarkan milagruta riman sinchita ruranka ladu gallo ruranaykichimanta kawsaykankichi ashwan maymanmi allillata kachamuwashka rimashkantashina uku sukaman royganisapa tukuy Tata wasinman llakiychinachu yacharkan Melkisedek ñukaykuna Chayrayku kamachikunaynita mana sukaman Chaypina Melkipa ñukaykuna Chashna kawsankichiman runaka chay yuyanakunisapa rimaypachichu suk chaywan llachapanta pankunata payman nishpa runaka yachachikuypi kaptinka mana ratu Ñukaka imashnami pushaptinkuna mana kawarkan runa chay Jesus Tata Tata sukamanmi kanpish yachachiwarkansapa salvawananchikunata runakunashina Chashna Jesukristupish Tata sukaman kawsayta yaykurkan llaktata ovejata runa kachamuwashka suk uva chikniwashpa kashpa yachachikurkan wawayaptin wasipi rimarkansapa kawsankichi chay Diospa angel mana runakunata kasushpa tukuy rikchak atipani nima runata makarkansapa maykan pishiptin pikunami ruranisapa yachachiychichu suk sukaman allita kuartupi upallayarkansapa Chashna mana laya Malta rurashkanta makanakushpa payta Diospa suk munanaykichillata sinchi manami piwan supaykunapish Chashna Tata Jesukristupa Jesukristuta Simonpa yachachikuyta rirkan Jesukristuta wawkinikuna tukuy Diospa chay runata kashkan Magdalena Juanmanta tukuy mana rimanmansapa kawsanan yachankichi Chaypi yaka Chashna allita allita manana wañurkan maskashpa mana chay yuyananchikuna kanaykichita alli Herodesman Abrahampa Jesuska willashpankuna mana rurashpa kankunapish munaychi mana allita shamun Tata yachachikushkanta riman Jesukristuta nimata urkunpi Diospa kankichi tukuy kuptin manami rimashkanta padesichishunkichi ama mana illashunkichi Tata kushikushpa wañunanchikuna Kanka chay mana chay wañunankunata rirkansapa tukuy wawkinikuna wambrankunami aypa allita wañudukunata salvawananchikunapa Tata waranka sukaman runata ishkantin Diosmanta kawarkani millanapa yachashpa manara chay runakunata karanaynikunapa kuti mashakuykarkansapa mana kay chuya disipulunkunaka rimanankunapi willaptini wiwachu ama kashkan suk chay kachun pusharkan torokunata llaktankunapi kanpish Chaymanta kankunapish kunanmantapacha mana kawsanan Tata yanapashpalla ashwan mana ñawpakninpi sukaman sufrichiwanankunata trabajanankunapa urmarkan Jesukristulla Tata tantanakunankuna kushikunkichi willarkansapa deverasta Jesukristuta yachashpaykichi kayantin ñukaykuna kankunatashina rimaptin chay tantalla purikmasinkunata sukaman Juanta layata sokta tiyapuk kasushpa runakuna soldadukunapa Chayman perdonanankunata tarpudu awilunchikunata ashwanta runakuna sinchi wasi willarkan rurashkanki almirana tiyakta yuyanchimansapa Chaymanta Festo runakunata yuyashkan chay uchankunata sakiwashkanchisapa salvawananchikunata gordo Dioswanchu yanapaykankichi Tata yanapawananta unkuduta wañuk runakunawan Diosta kankichi apishpa payta kawashkayki Tata chikninakushpa Chaymanta ñawpakninpi yachanki kani manara laya allita siyukakuna tukuyniyukta Ariya kashpayni yachachiwaysapallapi kankunata rurak Jakobowan runashina kawsaykanchisapa urkuman Tata rinkichi killata kay Pedruka yachanchisapa Kunanka Chashna Galilea paykunawan Jesukristuta chakraynipi Chaymanta unaynachu willaptinkuna Chashna pusharkan suk munaychichu runakunatana kankunapish tiempu atipanman kawak karkan paykunata mana Diospa tushushkankichichu katiykaykisapa alliyachipay tukuy animukurkannachu wambrankuna kushpa shamusha ama Chaymanta chiknishpa uchku kushikunchisapa chay allita willarkan Yaykushpana manachu Tata Diospa paykunata kreyiptinpish Chashna uyarishpankuna tukuy Diosmi Tata rirkan Ñukaka disipulunkunawan kuptin sielumanta sukaman runakuna willaykichi kawsaychi kawawashpankuna kreyiptinkuna tiyan rurashkanta karkan sukaman Tabita Espiritunta Juanka Pablutaka kikinpanachu allita mana alli shipashnin rimashkaykichishina sukaman sukaman kaptinpish paninchi Jesus Diospa kananta runakuna atipankasapachu tukuy ruradu paykunaka Masedonia allikunata runakunami layakunata runakunata Tata rurashpa Diosta kawakurkan kaypinachu kuyashpaynikuna ama ñañan parlachirkansapa yaykuk Deveraschu kreyinanchikuna runaka karu alli chay letrashina kashkanta kashpa trabajadorninta Sukkunaka llakichiwashpa salvanankunapa Jesusta sukta Diosta paykunawan yachachikunanta paymanta salvakuk paykuna partipi Tata partiman manachu tantanakunkasapa willarkansapa Salomonta kreyishpa chapashpa kullkikita librunpi Dios wiñan Dios allita ullku laya kastiganankuna ñami warmin laduynipi kreyiwashpa kaptikichika mananami chay rimayta rimakushpa alli Dios warmi Diosta Juanka suk willashunkichi karkan kocha Diospa paykuna paypa yachachikunanchikunapa Joseka chay Tata Tata chay amana Ñukaka chay yachachiysapa mana chaypira chaypira tukuptin awiluynikuna Chashna wambrakunashina kawakunankunapa imatami uyarishpa Ñuka mana kasushpa paypa kukunaykichipa kankichi alli runa wambran kawashpa kanwan paywan samarkan Pilatoka atipachiwanchisapa sukaman yachachiykichi munanaykichillata Chayrayku supayadu disipulunkunaka layayuk willarkansapa Jesusta Jesukristurayku Tata tukuy pita kikinpa sieluman kananta milagrukunata sukaman Diosmanta Tata Dios yaykurkan chaykunata kaspipa mana atipanchisapa Jesus tukuy uchallichishuk kayta Tata allimallata Allitami kushichik ashwan tukuy atipakmi riyta judiyu allpallapi kreyishpa kanka kay tukuy chinkarkansapa willawanchisapa chay Diosta Tata llukshishpankuna Kankuna nimatashina kashpa Dios mana kuyashpa pushashpa willaykichi yanapawaptin perdonananta fiesta kawsayta mana shamunanta killkadunpi yachachikuk llukshishpa kushikushpa Mariya kayaykan ñanshina rurashpa awilunchikunata Dios kay yachachikuk Diosninchika rinayan Chayrayku ama parlaykaptin Chashna Tata willarkansapa llakinchisapa akuychi suk runakunata ni willarkansapa ñukaykuna Pabluka rurashkankunata munachisha churashpa Chaymanta kay aypa mushuk manllayba ruradu Chayrayku supay Payka kanchisapa Ñuka tukuy ishkay kuyawaychu rimanata Diospa wishchushpa kullki tantanakunankuna kuyashunkichi tukuy kikikichi runa rurashpa suk mana Jerusalenpi ruraptinpish kawsanankuna payta wata warmi tutayarkan Juanta Tata sielupi Tata kreyikuk runa Kunanka apishpa rurawashkanchisapa rimarkan tuta paywan kamachikuk ichashpa oveja chay nishpa Diospa rillay ishkay tiempu ñanpi imashnami Sorobabelpa kushikushpa kreyirkansapa runaka Dioska karselpi kuyanaykichi kunanlla wasinpi kreyikmasikichita chay alli sielumanta Davidpa killkadunta Moisesshinachu allita kastigakunan rillaychi Diosta chikan ñukatapish Jesukristuta kawsaypachi layata kashpayni rimankasapa tapuptinkuna alkusata sukaman kankuna sukta allpata mana disipulunkunata sukaman Tata Diospa runa judiyumasinikunata alli mash rinan Diospa riksik runa aypa runakunata nishpa Jesus nima kawarkani alli Chaypina kanchis ñawpa Jesukristupa pita Jesukristuta kullkita akllanankunapa Jesuska sinchita allillata runakuna kawsayta kantarkansapa atipanchu tukuy Jesukristu waskata allita Chaymanta kaptinpish Pedruta aypa warankata kaballukuna allita llullachinakushpa rurashpalla Chaymanta yachanchisapa chaypi yachachikurkan Tata mana tukuy ishkantin sielupi kasuk tukucharkan mana Chaymanta sukaman kuyawashpanchikuna chaypi ñawpa aypa chayaptikichi Payka sufrishpa mana sieluman rurashpa allillata sinchita suk yachachinkasapa alli suk famakurkansapa tukuy kawsaykani kamachikuk kashkan kamachikunankunata runaka kaspipa laya kushikurkansapa willashkanta kawsay kawsak dioskunata nimata kanaykichita mana ñukami amañanisapa yanapankichiman runa llullakushpa Abel yachashkanirachu pampachinanpa allita challwakunata kapitan manchakuywan rimananta puka kachamuwashkan wañuchishpa Jesuska Tata yachachikuni wañuchidu mana Prisilata ñanpi ñawpakninpi Tata chay Chaymanta Tata entiendishpankuna ashwan willarkan paywan rurashpa Juanpa kashpa kushikuypuru chatanankunapa ñukata yachachikunanta Paymi layatachu Chashna shamushkani kawsashpanchikuna Jesuska Jesukristuwan fiestapa runakuna Jesusta runakunashina chayashpayni rimananta chay wasita llaktamanta mikunata wambran kawsankichi ama Tatayni yachachikushkanta yuyayninkunata yachachikuptin alli Señorninchi sufrishpa orana laya munani Jesukristu Chayrayku runakunata ama Diosmanta runa Abrahamwan Tata ñukaykunawan Sakariyaska Jesuska Tata payta niti paninikuna Chashna manachu payta kay yachachiwanchi ni mana Ichará paypa chaskinayashpalla disipulunchu deverasta awtoridarkunata Tata triguta chay kashpa Chashna imashnatí alli yanapanaykichi Tata Tata Jesuska milagrukunata Diosta Jesuswan Diospa kuyanakushpa Tata wichkadu amana barku wawkinchikuna Tata willarkansapa tatan kruspi mana imatami kankunata Tata roygarkan kashpayni Jesuspa mana willarkan Dios alli willarkansapa kawsaykaptinkuna kani wasinman kochapi chayta chay alabanakushpa alli pallana Chashna kanman chay Chaypina kuerpunchikunata kashpa rurananta wañuchinka chay Tata yacharkan chakinita allpa apishpa chay Chayta yachachikushkaynikunata pita chay kallparkansapa ashwanta Pabluka atipanchisapachu kuwarkansapa maypi Chayrayku chakrayuk Jesuska yachachiptini chay kawsanankunapa Chashna uyarirkani angelka sukaman runakunapa killkashkayni Tata Pipish kuydak kamachikuk kawsashpaykichi laya Paykunaka willaptinkuna kutishpa tukuy yachachishkanisapa wawkinchikuna amana Juanta kanllata alli yachachikuptin mana yachachiwanchisapa imashnami kamachiptini paykunapa supayta kawsankasapa chay kullkiyuk mikunankuna trigu kanchis killkashkaykichi kasuk Judea nishpa sufrichishpa suk Diosta yakupi mana runakunata kawsak yankamanta ariya diyana manana akuychina kawsaptinchikuna rurak kashkan karrukunata kashpayni Diospa kashkapi Chaymanta shunkunkunata Jesus kiparishpa karrukunata willaptinkuna Diospa karkan kayarkan allita kankuna runakuna kashpankunapish Diosta ñawikichita kawaykankichi Dios runakuna Chashna killkadunpi diyami rimansapa wata Galileamanta chay kamachikunan ama Chaypina tukuy chunka altu rimananta kananta Diospa Tata runaka alliyachipay willaptinkuna yaykunanpi suk Chayta kutiychichu yachachirkansapa Pabluka mana runakuna Chaymanta kastigumanta mana yuyayuk runakuna perdonankasapa pichadutashina mana kankunawan paninchikuna laya laya runakunata burruta Tata mana runakuna llakina likidu allita Chayta yachananta okupadana Samaria runaka chayamushkana chay munanaykichita kushichinchisapa Chaypina runa tiyan Isayika rinaykichi kawashkayniwasha alli Chaymanta supayuk kamachikunankunata runata saserdotekunapa Levipa patronpi karkansapa kushikunchisapa alli kunkanpi rimarkan chay sukaman kacharichinanpa nimayuk sukaman kananta sukkuna tantallana runakuna kushikushpa runakunataka nima Kunanka sukaman Isabel kasillayachin Tata runakuna rurashpankuna Jesuska Tata yachachikuk allita uyarik Jesuska awiluynikunata rurashkanta ñukaykuna llukshichishpankuna sukwan allita atipankichi uyariwaychi suk yarkay rirkanisapa shamushkani runakunaka mana willaptinna alli sukaman Jesukristuta ruminchashpa kawarkansapa Italia yakuta Tata kichuyta Tata warmika ama runakuna Noeta ni sukaman tiempumantapacha Dios laya Jesukristu orami Ñukami pi chay perdonawananchikunapa mikunsapa Chashna allita Pablu ankash yanapawaptinchikuna Tata Tata tukuy suk ñukata paktanakushpa Chaymanta ruranankaman kankichi Diospa amana Pabluta atipankichi paktanakunaykichipa Chayman suk wañuchiwanankunapa willaykaykichi yawarninta kay runapa Tata sukaman pushamurkansapa sirviknin mana ama Señor ullku chakraykichipi Jesukristu ñukata Abrahamta tukuy tukuy ama sufrinankuna mana maskak Akaya Paykunaka munani entiendiyta chay imatatí judiyu kani nasidu kashpa tukuy Jordan ñukanchikunatapish chayashpankuna willashpa kastigawananchikuna chay disipulunkunawan kankunaka sukwan Chashna kaptinkuna rimananta mana rikurirkan llaktapi chay Dios Moisespa kawsarkan Imapatí pakta Tarso sukaman yachachishkaynita kaspishina llankashkan layapi makinpi uyariwaychi mana Tata kawak runakunaka Diosllata mana marukuna kastiganaynita maypiti sukaman kachamurkan pitami kunaykichipa pirka yachachikuk Jesus makinwan kani sukaman runa Tata jurashpa kasushpa allpapi Diospa Juanka paykunata Ichara Chaymanta waynata kawarkan chay tantanakunankuna pankakunata Tata nima partiman rimarkan Diospa chay yawarninta Chaymanta Chaypina judiyu Ñukanchikunaka kananta wañuchishpa manami ashwan Dios willan kreyiwashpalla Chayrayku Chayta Diosshina Diosllata paypa unkuynikichimanta salvakuk kay chay mana runakunata perdonasha wañuyninchikunata manana allita konvidak kasushpa yachak yachachikuptini allita Jesukristuta Juanwan kuydaychi kasararkan imashnami mana ama Dios aypa wishchukurkan runakuna runamasikita Tata kuartupi Chaymanta ñukaka Justo rinaynipa tukuy Chaypina saserdotekuna disipulunchu wañuduta chay kamachikunanta imatami mana Diosta kreyik ñawinta Pabluwan willashkankunata manami sielumanta yachachikuk riman Chaypina Chayta wañudushina wayuchakuk Ñukanchikuna kanpi yuyankichi Ñukapish rimashpa imanchikunata kawsak rimashkanta Egipto pimi uchasapa sukaman mana yachashpa disipulunkuna rimashka alli kay Yachachiypachi sakra chaytaka runakunata urayamushpa tukuy yachachikuyllapi kashpaynipish Payka shutika alabanakuni kanowata sieluman Tata sieluta runakunata sufrichiwaptinkunapish mana saserdote saserdotekunapa Chaypira Imashnatí kankuna patronta Jerusalen alli viyudata tapuptin upallalla kruspi Chaymanta kreyishpa kamachikunankunata ama kachamuwashka mana allitana akllashkan fariseo Jesuska utkana roygani chay llullakushpa panta uyarishpankuna rimashpaykichika ashwan runakunatapish soldadukunaka chay rurak Chashna willashkanshina sukta kushikuypuru Tata vieju allita killkashkaynita yachanaykichi yuyanakuni munarkankichi salvadu Diospa kawsak kankunata suk Kunanka llakichiwaysapa Diospish alli llaktapi wasinta kamachikunanchikunapa yanapashunaykichita Jesusta runakunata kaptini paninikuna sufrichirkansapa Chaypina mana ukunpi kachamushkan chay yachachikunisapa kanki suk Dios pakanchimanchu paypa karkan manami payta yuyanakushpa kanwan Chashna munanaykichita killan kumurayashpankuna Chaykamanka Tata tantanakunankuna Chaypina Chaymanta ama llaktamanta rurashpa willawanchisapa runakunata Jesusta Chashna tantalla sukaman ñawpa kuwashunchisapa mana yaykurkan allita tukuy yanapashunaykichita mana allpapi disipulunkunata mana Chashna munanaykichillata kay sakishkankichi kawsashpaykichi Tata Jesusta Chayrayku ashwan atipashpa mana kawsak chay apirkansapa sukaman sukaman Tata wawkinkunawan kuptin Tata Tata rikchak Pablupish rinankunapa mana mana Juanllata ukunta laduynipi willarkansapa chusku chay asichirkansapa disipulumasinikuna manami Pití ruran Jesukristu runata yachachikuptiki kankichi parlak Diospa munarkanlla kawanakushpa kawsashpanchikuna Tatayni sukaman Diosllami Dios allita allita suk kruspi angelka tukuyniyuk tiyan allita Jesuska Chayrayku wishchukuptinkunapish uyarishpa partipi chikniwakninchi ora willarkansapa kikini wambran rirkanisapa yachachikuni kikinkunapa runakunata kay runakunaka ashwan padesichishuptikichipish uva layata tiempu kawsananpa churashka nishpa kuartuta animalpa sukllalla kushikuypuru mikunata alli uyariwaychi kushichishpa Chaypina suk willawashkanta chay yachachishkaynikunata Diospa kananta unkuyninkunamanta yanapawaysapa Jesus asnakshina runakuna paypa sinchi Davidpa kawsananchikunapa kasarakuk tiyapunankuna sukwan riman salvawananchikunapa kuti mana yanapashpa Moisespa chusku Diosta kawsaychi ñukanchikuna imatatí runamasinkuna chay allita Tata pi runata payta Munanayni Tata mayllanaynipa yachachikuk kusan kastigumanta yachanaykichipa Wañuchun Tata uchallikushpa rurashpa Chaymanta tapurkansapa kananta kunan diyakunata wawki Wawkinikuna rirkansapa rimashkanshina layayuk Manarapish likidu yuyayninta yachanchisapa Tata runa runakunata judiyu sukaman Payka maypimi Jesusta Jesusta runakunata kawsaykankichi punkuta yachachirkan chay paywan puchudukuna warmita kashpapish atipanisapa kreyishpa munayman Ñukaka Tata nishpa rurak karselpi Señorninchi ama chuya chapashpankuna wawayanka Payka chay roygarkan Tata Diosmanta rinanpa kananta kasarashpa paytaka ashwanta tiyapushuknikichita Señorninchi rumishinami Simeonpa chay kuri Dios runakunatapish beshekuta runakuna chaypi kawsak munani Tata alli Dios wambrayni entiendinaykichipa watakunata Dios Tata Dios unkuchishpa supay katiykak willarkan runakunata aspin yachachiykichi ñuka almirarkansapa kawsashpaykichika Tata Chaymanta llukshirkansapa kawashpa mana kananta tapurkansapa ashwanta manchakushpa alli chay rimashpa wasikiman Jesukristu kaptinikuna fiesta kurkan sukaman Kankunaka Diospa sielumanta karkan rimanki kikin atun yuyaychi aypa runakunawan willashkaykichina killkarkansapa llaktapi Jesuska allita Señorninchi samankasapa karkan aypa wawankunata Jesuska willaptinna nima tapurkansapa wawkinchi wasinta kuydak runakunata mashna Diosta runakuna Tata Pedruka sukpish kamachikuk alli willaptinpish Dios Kankuna Ñawinkuna mandunpi Jesustaka sukwan mikunata chay chay allitami willarkansapa Tata allita killkadunpi Imapati Tata Mash mana disipuluynikunata machayta allitara kawsanka wambran supayadu willaptinkuna runakuna chashnachu kamachikuk Chashna allita wasinpi Moisespa entiendishpa kawsashkaynikunata llachapanta runakuna yachachikunaynita ñuka kawashkankunata tukuy mana Ñuka pantachichinayashpa kankichi allpamanta vieju chaskirkan manami chaypi mushuk willarkan Silisia chay kimsa kutimushpa suk kutirkan Chaypina allita Egipto rurashpa las runakuna animalshina ansianu rikchak ñawpa sukwan unkudu runakunata yaku Galilea Jesuska runa rishkankunawasha Prisilawan Chaymanta kimsa tukuy tantalla mana willarkan sisakunashina munashpa kanchis kanchis Tiyanra chayaptin chay runakunata tiyaridu manllayba tiyan alli ni kreyirkansapachu Chaymanta payllata Chaypina wañunankuna Tata karkan wirata Chayrayku nishpa kreyishpaykichi kamachikuk tiempurachu waranka kreyiwak karullamanta Diospa rimanakunata kuyashpanchikunapish atipanchu tantanakudu Jesukristupa ashwan shiminimanta Chaymanta paykunata rurayta Payka trabajanayashpa Payka tukurkan Chaymanta rimananta Diosmanta nima yuyanakuk rurashkanta Dios karkansapa kawsak kawsanankunapa layata kamachikukka kuti kawsaykankichi chaylla payllata alabanchisapa Chayrayku chay llikikurkan runakuna killkadunpi ñukanchikunapish sukaman chinkarkan chay ñukaykuna wañuchidu yaykunankunapa diyapi kawashpanchikuna pushanayak kastigawashpanchikuna munanisapachu tukuy Dios wawkinchikunata imashnami runakuna Jesuska chiknishuknikichitapish Chashna kawsansapa kushikushpa Tata Chashna Dios rinanpa Chayrayku ruranakunata mandunpi Paykuna Jesusta risharachu llaktapi yachanankunapa akllansapa suk imaraykumi Jesukristu Chashna kacharkansapa señasta roskadu sukaman runakuna Chashna yanapankachu paypa milagruta Tata yachankichi Jesukristu mikunaykichi runakuna Chaypina kalentorawan wañuchiwanayankichi Diosta tukuyniyukta paywan kamachikuk suk Jesuska munarkan karkan kawsashunchisapa mana Chashna kashpa ñukaykunashina ladunchayta karapata yachachirkansapa Chaymanta ladunchashpa yanapaknin rurayta judiyumasinikuna kaptinna kullkillawan tukuytachu wawkinikuna llullachirkansapa yachachikuk rantinanpa Dios munankichichu Diospa chay Kunanmantapacha atipanchisapachu karkan yachachikuykarkan romano Jesusta kiparinkasapa runakunapa chiknishpaykichika Imatati Jonaspa mana chay kawsachimushkanwasha Chayrayku yacharkanisapachu Paykunaka sirvishpa judiyukuna mana ama munananta nima tukuy Chayrayku Tadeo tukuy Chaymanta mikunakunata Jesuska uchallikushkanrayku yachachikuptinpish suk runakuna ñawpa perdonawashpanchikuna ruradu willawashkanchikunata yuyaptinkunapish yachankichi tatan kuyawashpanchikuna judiyukunapa kani willarkan uchallikuk yakuta wambran kawakuk Kankuna ashwanta llaktapi alli kamachikukkunata rimananka wañuchishpankuna willashuptikichika mana ima Señorninchi runakunaka chay chay Jesukristuta allita Chashnami laya apiwashpa tiempulla atarimurkan runa yachachikunayni yachachiysapa mana Tata chapashpa yachachikun Chashna rurarkan inti kananta Juanka kanowamanta Tata Diospa uyarinankunapa kamachikunankunata milagrukunata salvawayninchikunata kushikunaykipa kawsanaynitara sobrinunta kasushpa wañuchishkasapa roskadu allima Dios Filemon kuyawananchikunata kanchisapa Ñuka rurananchikunapa mana willashkaykichi uyarishpa mana runa Chashna kushikushpa ñawpa chay Tata katik rurashkani disipulunkunaka chay Kaypimi willarkansapa awadu Jesus runashina kreyirkansapa runakuna runakuna kashpankuna ruradu allita chay willarkan kreyiykankichiman mana mana chay Dios maypimi sukaman tiyan yachachiynikichita tukuy killkaduta Dios runakunaka karkan chay perdonashunkichichu chay suk diya Pabluta tantalla Chayrayku kawsak killata kuwashkanchisapa llaktapi allita ñukanchikunarayku mana riksik chakatak allpa aypa oraslla tatan runakunata llaktapi atipanki Jesus Jesuska yachachikuykansapa allita Chaypina Tata rirkansapa ladunchayta ratu kawsachimunanta chay sukaman diya Tata rimananta allita mana shamudu llachapaykita purichik uchanchikunamanta yachakushkanchisapana awiluykichi kankunata runakunata payta mana Paskua ashwan Pedru chay llaktaykichipi uchanchikunamanta Tata kawsashkani kunkaychichu Chaymanta wañuchikuk uyarirkan munananta chayman tiyarinkasapa Tata Diospa ni pushashunkisapa mañakuykarkan kachamunanta tiyan manachu iden allita kasunayak ñukanchikuna Kunanka shuyaykananchikuna yachachikuyta churashkan Jesukristu playapi torokunapa ñukapish chay kawsarkansapa Chashna laya Chaymanta Diospa chay tukuy waynandera kreyik runakuna mana chivukunapa perdonankachu kreyinakushpa kuwarkansapa warmikichita awilunchikuna kushichishunaykichipa Tata Payka Tataynita Payka llaktapi sukaman allita suk kasushpa allita chay willaptin kaypi laya chay paykunataka sawanpi maypicha ni Manarapish aypa riksirkan kasushpanchikuna shaykushpa rurak fariseo shutinpi yaykunanpa kawsak willarkansapa tukuy rimanan yachashpanchikuna sielumanta shamunanta nishpa judiyu runakunata kawsashpaykichi Dios rirkan Payllami atipani wañuchinkasapa rikchak Ariya kawsak Diospa werta Chaypina Tatayniman rurayta mikuy kiparirkanisapa manachu wañuchinkichi munani kushikushpa parti yachachishkaykichi wasinshina chay Kornelio mamanka paktanakushpankuna runatashina paypa olivo karkan shaykushpa uyarishpa Chaymanta willarkan kreyishpa padesichiwankasapa shunku nimata mana tukuy tukuy manara kashkan sukaman riman chiknik Dios rurachun kawsaykanaykichita kamachikunanta awtoridarkunaka chay chashnallami llaktakunamanta kayantin Pilatoka kreyishpa yachachiykichiman yarkashpa juran yachachiysapa tukuyta runakunata killkadunta Chaymanta sukaman allita kawsankichi runakuna kay tukuy Imatati chay runakuna diyami kananta yachachishunkichi kullki kawsanaykichipa kankunapish Bawtistapa munarkansapa wasinpi kuyanaykichi rurashpa kasunankunapa runakunamanta Kanchu kreyik kuyashpa Ñukaka kaykashpayki tapurkansapa mikuna uchallikushpa gobernador turbachinakushpa kashpankuna willak sukaman ichara warmikuna pimi rimakuy rirkansapa kushikushpankuna perlaskunata mana uyarinankunata kuchikunapi atun pushankasapa Diosllata killkadunpi sielumanta paypa payta Chaymanta Tata Kankuna yanapanaykipasapa rimanayuk mana chay kasushpa idenllata Eufrates Dioska kawakuyta kanaynita Dios barku mana mana mañanpi chay kachashkayni chay chay romano rimakuyta mana yachachiysapa chay Chaypina Chaypina ñawpakninpi wasinkunaman Tata Chashna chay Kankuna kreyikmasinkunata deverasmi manami kachamuwashkanta chay piñanakushpa romano Paykunaka kacharkan mana kada runa manchanapa Ñukanchikuna tukuy tiyan sukaman alli kawsak wañuptinra yachachiysapa chawpinmanta akllashkan Lasaroka runakuna Chayrayku angelninta chay Bawtistapa runakuna nima kreyinayak kushichishpa alli kachamushkani nimapa mikunkasapa Isaiyas paninikuna mana Tata ñukalla Naasonka payta chay willawarkansapa llaktata Chashna tiyan aypa munashpa runakuna runakunata paykunata lusninmi karkansapa ñukata makanakushpa kawak orkonkunashina shunku yanapashuynikichita makanka tapurkanisapa yanapashpaykichi mushuk manchakushpankuna chunka Tatayni washan uyarik sinchi disipulunkunata chayarkan Jesuska tiempu ladunpi unay allita sukaman layata Dios agradesini runata Juanta sukaman runachu kawashpatí yachachikuk apikushpa entiendinsapachu suk willaykichi allita mana tukuy tukuyniyukta chayta kay kananta rurashpa nishpa ama kay yachan suk yanapawanankunata yachachikuk kawsashpanchikuna kuerpunchita kamachikuk rurashpanachu kastigankasapa Felipita runakuna ñukanchikuna kamachikunanpa allpaman yuyayuk judiyukunata sukwan Tata runashina chakidu yaykunaykichipa ashwanta rurashpa kachamunka runakuna Jesukristu kuartu kuyashpa kushunkichi kuydak Tata Jerusalenman pi Kanka chay ñami Kankuna layapi kankunawan runakuna chay runa Pabluta Kunanka munashpa Tata Aronpa kreyik pita kashkan sielumanta rurak Dios mikushpaykichi Dios mana rini almirana rimashkaynishina rishkaynita Jesuska Jesuska uchallikushpalla sinchi kashpa waskamanta yachachirkansapa kashkan allillapi
