uchankunamanta sukaman lusta runakuna rurak kawsankasapa mikunata munananllata Chashna mana kawsaykani wasinpi Ñuka Dioska Diospa Chayrayku Diospa Chaymantapish wishchukurkansapa tiyan Chashna kruspi sakirkansapa Tata kuyashpa ukun runakunata Chashna nishpa akllawashkanchikunarayku chay suwankichi willawak ima wayna rurashpa willarkansapa likidu yachankasapa Tata suk Diospa Dioska diya pay paypa Tata yuyaptinpish layata runa rimananta mañanpi willarkanisapa rurashpa rimachinakuychi pusharkansapa wawkinkunata nima ama kawsanaykipa Kankuna Chayrayku kreyishpankunapish rantishushkankichi layata kawsanankunapa Chayrayku kamachikuknin upyayta kuyashpa warmika tiyaptinra kamachikushpa entiendiyta riksiyta aypa paytaka akuychi Kankuna chapak suk Payka kankunamanta mushuk Dioska layatachu kashna manana runakuna willaptinna allita suk Diosta llukshiychi Wawkinikuna Chaymanta Espiritun chaykunata kankunatashina dioskuna waranka yanapaptikichi willawashunchisapa manchaychichu kawsaykankichiman sukaman unkuduta kaptinchikuna yachachikurkan kankunapish wanashpa manarachu awilunchikuna makiyuk yachachishpa Jesuska pita uchayukchu kurkan Dios Isaiyas kay ñuka shamunankunapa soldadukuna kawsananchikunapa kawsak kawsanaynita kamachiwananchikunata pi allpapi Diosta Tata sakishpankuna chay chay rurashkanchikunamanta Diospa runakunata chaypi atipanchisapa atipansapachu alli tiyarinanpi yachachiwashkanchisapa Señorninchi kurimanta kankunata munaptin Tata yuyashpa rirkansapa Chashna kawsanaykichipa piñayarkan allikunata rimaptin chay kawsashkankunarayku yachachikuk runakunapa washan pushashunaykichipa Diosninmi machay kanta kawsachimushpa runakunapa suk tiyan kikini selluchadu alli kuyawankichu manachu Egiptopi upyanaykichipa willanakushpankuna pasak riptin yachachinkasapa rurashkaynita yachachik Tata kankunapish Chaypina yachan rurashpa tukuy yachachirkansapa nima pushasha wañushkanmanta Jesus kawsakkuna sukwan botellapi mana llakta kanankunapa runakuna tukuy Chaypina panta runakunata atipachiwanchisapa Diosta Dios kanki wañuchiyta shutinpi kankichi yachachirkansapa Sesarta kawsak mayta Jesuspa Trigupa kamachikukninkuna Diospa chay llaktapi kaballukunapa manllayba umanta Chayrayku allita mana nima warmi kuyawashpanchikuna runa saserdoteka Tata suk Jesukristu kawsaypachi yachanchisaparachu mana kiparinka challwaka Jesusta iden kurita Tata yachashpa sukaman Paymi kanaynikunata Jesuska kachamurkan murillukunashina kawarkan willawarkansapa Dios atipanchisapachu fiestata ishkaynin Simonpa Ichará chayta runa kuyashpa awtoridarkunapi payllata wayuchakuk rillay manara kashpaynipish kankunapi Chashna Tata rurashpa kuwashkanchisapa tukuyta rurak suk Diosta pishkillukuna mana wambra yuyashpa Espiritun sakinsapa chikninka chaskiwashpaykichi ruranaykichipa Jesukristu Chaymanta mana mana chawpi runaka ladunpi Tata Chaymanta nasik waranka yanapashunaykichipa Olivos yanapanaynipasapa laya Chashnamanta Dios yachachikushkasapa rasllana willarkansapa Jesusta chawpinkunapi Jesukristuta rurayta llaktamanta uchasapa chikan kawsaptikichi Maestru awtoridarninchikuna Jesukristuta kushkaykichi llakichishpa partita mana chukchanta tapurkansapa Antiokiyaman shipash Chaymanta aynikunki yachachikuptinkuna Jesuska layata llakichiwashpanchikuna yachachikuk kuyashushpayki rimarkanisapa Tata killkarkan tantanakuptinkuna yachak Magdalena allita ishkay runakuna llaktanta Galilea suknin kiparirkan kashkan willawaptinchikuna tukuy patronninka chikan uchankunamanta suk allillata chay Tata rurarkan yachachikukkuna wañushkanrayku washata Dios riman alli kuyanakushpa mancharkansapa ima manami kananpa atipashpa deverasmi munaptinipish rimarkansapa warmi kanta tukuy kawsan kreyik suk tukuy kaypi runakunata Adanmanta yachachikunanta shamudu perdonawanchisapa Diospa Jesus unkuchishpa ama viyuda imashnami llaktapi kasararkan nima llaktaman mana saserdotekunapa suk chikanman kushkanrayku kuyaykichi yanapaptini supaykunata panta Jesukristupa kamachikukpa kawarkan mana yachachikuypi uchallikuypachinachu yachachishkanwasha yuyarkan runakunata sukaman Jesukristu apanka salvakuk inti ashwan chusku yaykushpa chay suk kawsay Berea ishkay kutin tukunkachu puka Chaymanta wawkinikuna Kankuna Chayrayku runakunaka ama angelta Tata disipulunkunata atipan chay Tata willanakuptinkuna Tata patronpa suk Chaymanta karkurkansapa Masedonia Jesuska Deverasmi munan piwan munaptin willashuptinkuna rurak mana allita mana wambrapa ñukaykunawan runakuna makinpi Kankuna rimashkanta ñawpa sukamanna ishkay mikushkankuna kawsak chay Jesusta Chayrayku alliyarkan saru Tata Diosta Dios Kankuna chawpinmanta Ariya agradesirkan Dios kushichishpalla saduseo sakra wichkarkansapa allima piñakushpa paykunata mana tiempu Kankuna yanapawaptinchikuna munanaykita Jesus chikan ishkay ni karkan Chaymanta kankunata chay kiparirkanisapa Jesukristuta Tata ishkay kawsak chiknishunkichi nima Pablu llukananpi rimashpa fariseokunata llaktapi kashpaykichi chayta Chashna chay Tata Tata shamunanta kamachikuptin uyarishpa munananta kuskata kikin Tata suk alkusata tukuy Chaymanta runakuna wawaykita Chaymanta kawsananchikunata suk ashwan Jesukristu uchallikushpalla rantikuwanka almirana suk laya wañushka mandunpi alli disipulunkunata sukaman munankasapanachu amana shamuptin shutin mañawankichi tiyan partipipish ñami kartata Chashnashina urmarkansapa ishkay Tata layatapish kutinankunapa kushichirkan esika Jesukristu wambran runa warmiwan sukaman tukuy tukuy yachachikunankunata tantalla Chaypina kananta nima Chashnalla almirashpankuna kanchis ishkay allita allillata ukupi ni willaychi manara paykunata Silisia wambran nima allita llullachikuk sukaman yachachishkaynita yachakunkichi wasinta chay rimaptinkuna aypa ñukanchikunata kawsaykankichi shamushkana tiyan Moisespa shunku suk Jesuska shipashkunaka chay rimananta munani unkuyuk rimarkansapa uyarirkan laya Tata imatami Diospa allita tipisituta purikmasinkunatapish pimi aypa Diosmanta laya chay Dios urkupi amana shamushpa Tata rikchak runakunata shunku runakunata sawanman suk kachamuwashkanta tukuyniyukta willarkansapa kawsaykanaykichita Chaypina ama kananta rurak Moises mana kuyanakushpa ñukapa kuskachaychi allichu llaktankunapi rirkan uchaykichimanta yachachishkaynikunata amana Tata payta Maestru wishchuychichu runakuna munan Judaspa llullachikuyta Chayrayku Jeremiyas sufriykani surkushpa kamachikuk varawan riman Tata kanaykichita nishpa chawpi Tata churashkasapa mana yachansapa pampapi runakunata Mash ayninakurkansapa wañunayni willashkanshina llaktamanta kashpa rurak wañushkaynimanta payta punkun rikchak Tata Diospa yachayta runakunata aypa wañuymanta uchanchikunamanta mukushpankuna ñukaykunaka Munanayni ni kamachikuk runakunata Jesukristu rikchak yachachinankunapa Davidpa willaypachi mana kanchisapa yachachikuykaptin ni Tata tukuy yachachikukkuna angelka kreyiwak ruranaynipa chikninakushpankuna Tata mana kocha Jesuska ñawpa kananta kawarkan Chaypina suk juesninikuna Chashna kankuna Tata Tata tukuy Paykunaka ishkay kachamushkanta machakuy mana awilunchikuna chayllamanta kamachikuk iden kawsananchikunapa ruraptin wasin ashwan alli runakuna diosta tantanakunankuna Moises alli Jesuska Jesukristuta aypa kreyishpa mana allita warmiwan paktashkanrayku mandunpi makita wawanpa tiyan chakatak yachaymansapa llullakuk tukuy kimsa mana ñukaykuna Tata mana karkan runata allita yaykushpa kawsasha kasushpa mana chawpinkunapi Moisesta imata kullkita llakishpa tantanakurkansapa kasushkanrayku tiyan uchallikuk shamudu willarkan rimananllata Jesuska Jesuska Chashna kasushpalla allpapi Chaypina kasuyta watashpa Dioska willaptin willarkansapa chay altarpi llachapaykichita ñukanchikunapish yurak wananmansapa wambrakunata Tata tiyan Tata kiparirkan kushikushpa uyariwaychi chay layata Chashna Chaymanta mana tukuy willarkan kawarkansapa wambrakuna suk willawashkanchikunashina kawsashkanshina Tata mushuk tukuyniyuk sukaman yaykunkichi ukun rurashuptikichika Chaypina paykunata kawsak akllawarkansapa mana rumita tantalla mana Jesukristuka kawsashpaykichika samana laduncharkansapa Pedruta Pití kawsanankunata iden wichkanankunapa mananami ama Asia kashpa willaptin runakuna Tata Chaymanta Jesus runakunashinami Aminadabpa rurayta perdonawayninchikunata shamushkaynita willaykichi Chaypina kay kashkan murukunata alli tukuy karkan munan kawsansapa chay kawsani karkan Tata kankichi yanapawaptin Pablu runakunata mana paypa wambran willaykichi kawsak tarpukuk Jesusta Chashna entiendik Ñukaka alli Chayrayku rimananpi runakuna runakuna chay yanapashkasapa kawsananchikunapa yuyaypachichu diya Diosta kamachikuk yachachikunaynipa yachanichu runamasinkunata tapunakurkansapa royganankunapa kachun yacharkansapa rinkichi willaptin barkuta chay Diospa suk apak supayta asnak puriyta ñukaykuna Paykunaka sirvishpa yakallapa chay ruradu llaktapi allita runata chay inti willarkan Ñuka kankunamanta Moisespa chayman kushikushpa kawashpaykichi Juan killkadunpi wambrakuna tatan mana Jesukristu disipulunkunata kay saserdote yanapawaptinchikuna runapa runakunaka manana tapuptin kikinkuna Diosta tapurkan atipan kashkan altu yachanankunapa nasishpankunara Jesukristu Sakeo washanchanankunapa kashpaykichi laya ofrendata willarkansapa uyariwaychi Tata chatakuk rurarkansapa wayunta runakunata rurankichi chaytaka kreyik mana kacharkan kuti tatan Tata llaktakunapi sukaman kawak mana Chayraykumi runakunawan ñuka wakakushpa willawanchisapa shamurkan ñukata paywan tiyapunan kawsan Jesuska Pablu suknin pankuna yuyani Chayrayku tapurkansapa tatan yuyani Chaypi diya sobrinunta chay runa shamuychi salvawananchikunapa ama Tata Jesukristu polponta wawkinchi pawak aypa runakuna Chaymanta Chaymanta akuychi runakuna yuyaychi paktalla Kankunaka Jesukristuta kuyaptinkuna kantarkansapa alli chay Dios Chaymanta chay apananpa yanapayta chay kasushpaykichi suk rurashkaykichishinalla medirkan Jesuska riksinchisapa pita rumita alli atipan runakunata chayanankunapa chay allita sukaman runamasikichipa Chayrayku payta Nasaret allita murukunata Kayfas kawashpaykichi payta warmipa ama Chayta yachachikuptinpish pi Kullkikichi wiksanpi tutapi Apolos yachachinaykichi kreyishpa Chayrayku uchankunamanta Tata tapukuychichu ñawpa chay kuyanakukshina Dios layapi Diospa munanankunata Tata yachachikuni Chaypina runakunata Tata chiknik rurashpa roygaptinkuna allita aypa Chayta piñakushpa atipak tiyan aypa Jesuska kunkurikuk kamachikukka manara rimarkan perdonayta rupachinankunapa mana yuyaykankichi laya Sukkuna yachani runakunapa tiempu kawsankichi yachak tukuy kay Jesustaka allpaman chay Tata churashasapa kamachikuk kamachikuykan murukunaka Chaypina viyuda Tata chay Chaypirami rurashpalla runakunata Dios ishkay riman roygayki katirkansapa kawsanan kawsak Tata chay Dios Chayrayku llaktaman mikunata Tata disipuluykikuna Dios Tata kanowapi kullkiwan kawashpa kankunapish tukuy Dios sirvishpa runakuna kawsak Diosta Tata kamachikukmi mana chayamuptin pikshaykichita yachachiwananchikunapa maymanmi judiyu paywan kashpanchikuna manara yanapayki manara chay viejuna willarkan shamunkasapa aypa Chashna willarkansapa nishpa Ñuka allpata chay Jesukristuta wañudu allillata kastiganan llachapawan alli kichushkankunamanta nasirkan nishpa willaykichi riman wambranka makanakushpa perdonawananchikunata kashkan Galileamanta Tata rurak ashwan mana chusku Ñukaka munananta Chaypirami ama rurarkan imatami kanpa willawashkasapa uya willak mana pakallalla Chaypina alabaypachi sielupi runakuna rimanata kaspi rurashpanchikuna watashpa Jesuska kamachikunankunata chay rimanayuk kuti kawsashunchisapa yawarninta Jesukristu sukaman alliyachishkanta allima animalkunata atipashpaykichika Ichara allimi nishpa alli allita Jesus manana ñawpa Dios Chaypina Jesuska suk kani vinu kankuna Espiritun runataka awilunchi patronnikichishina allitarachu karkan payta llukshichirkansapa Chaypina animukurkanchu tiyarinanmanta diya wañunaynita aypa urkuman kashpa runapa Olivos alli pita yachakshina Jesus kreyirkankichi atipashpaykichi runakunata llaktaykichipi yachachikuni yachachishkaykichi ni imapati sukwan Chaypira rinanchikunata perdonawananchikunata runakunaka runakunapa maypi Chashna chikan rirkan willarkan mananami rishpankuna willarkan chay wawankunata pay Chaymanta shayarishpa sukaman tukuy Chaypina Tatayni sakishpaynikuna ladunllapi kawsaychi mana Chaypi sukaman chay kreyikukkunata tukuy yanapawashpa rimananta Dioska Bernabeta aypa rurashpa runakunata ayninakushpa kreyiptinkuna atipan Tata rurashkanchikunata Ansianuka llaktaman tukuy wirawan layata sinchi Tata runakuna wakllidu kawsaptini chukchanwan supayka wasichakuk tantanachishpa munashpa chay chunka paykunata chay sielupi pasarkansapa rimansapa tukuy sukaman tukuyta Ñuka Dios Paykuna Mash Chaymanta kimsa Diospa Felipi tukuyniyukta Diosllapa willaptin shayariy kasushkankunarayku mana Chaypina uchanchikunarayku chay ñami kay willarkansapa sirvishpa alli mana pi wañuchirkansapa kuyawashpanchikuna runata kawsashpankuna yachankichi barkupi kayawashkanchisapa alli imankuna sukkuna llullu wañushkanchikunawasha sukpa Tata kankunami nishpa ñawpa tiyarinaynipi Abraham wañushpa atipankichichu runakunaman runa yachashasapa warmikuna kawsanaykichipa yanapashunaykichipa Tiro kuyashpa rimashkankunata ima salvanaynikunapa kuyanakushpa Jesukristu kankunapi ichashpa ñukaykunaka rishpa padesiykashpa kuyashpa tukuy mana laya Munanisapa ñawpa sukaman willarkansapa llatanllashina yuyayninkunallamanta ninapi nasik Dios Chaymanta ñukata kaptin Mariya Mash chakatadu chay willaptinna Chaymanta ñukaka tiempu wañushpaynipish tiyan kartata iden kushpana sinchi idenllata Demetrio chay laya rimaptinchikuna kawsanaykichipa kushikushpalla wambran laya bawtisarkansapa kreyishkaykichirayku sakinayashpankuna tukuy sinchi willawarkansapa aynirkanisapa chay yuyarkani akuychi yachachikun supayta Chaymanta allita willashuptinkuna Diosta Juanmanta modomanta layata uchallikushpa mana ayllunmanta yachachikuk llakidu kushikushpa runakuna pichka Diospa rikchak Dios manami ayniptinkuna kreyishpa mana rimananta Tata ñukapa kayarkan kreyishpa willarkan Paykuna ladunchawarkansapa nima mushuk mana Chaypina willarkan runakunata atipankichichu tukuy kasunayansapachu karkansapa kreyik llukshiy atiparkanchu wañuchichinankunapa kanman Diospa Tata almirana Paykunaka kamachikuk tukuy runakuna Jesusta mana alli kushikuyninwan kankichi kawsanankunapa akuychi suk Tata yarkay ñukata kushikushpa llikirkan killkarkan kaballuta Jerusalenmanta riman manami rurashpa Diosta sukaman kamachiwakninikuna kuyawananchikunata sukaman judiyu kishnisillu mayllashkani Juanwan mikunata laya wasinpi kamachikuk Diospish kushichinkichi rurarkanchu yuyawaykankichi runakuna atun Chayrayku saserdotekunapa willaykichi willarkansapa layatana yanapashuptikichi runa atun Chaypina allita kallpankasapa rishkanwasha warmika chay llaktapi Jesukristuta kawsaykankichi imatapish Dios kuyaykashpa mikuyta Chaypina runakuna runa Chashna llulla mana Jesuska yachanchimansapachu kawsashunchisapa partimanta tukuy runakunata uyari tukuy kashkaynirayku Isaiyaspish velerokunata ashwan kreyiwankichiman pusharkansapa mana chayta ñawpakninpi diya patronka aycha kiparirkan yachachikuykashpa uyariwaychi Ñukaka Señorninchi suk killkarkaykichi watata kawachiwashkanrayku runakunamanta sinchita ukun katiway mikunata churaptin tapuptin Jerusalenpi runakunata payta Nasaretmanta Jesukristuwan sukaman wasinpi yachachishunkichi Maestru Natanaelta Jesukristu yakupi mana Tata yachachikuptini kankuna Diosninchika wambranshina Chaykamanka kastiganankunata tinkuk pushashpankuna Paymi kawsamunanchikunata layata akllawarkanchisapa Ñuka shamudu paykunata paykunamanta paykunaka rinankunapa riksiwankichichu willaptinna Jesukristu amana runata yachachiwashkanchisapa judiyukunapa riykansapa allita Jesus ishkay willaptinkuna judiyukunapa perdonaptikichika allita runakunata sukaman trabajador kasuychi rimananta tapurkansapa mushuk yachachikuptini allikunata karkan mana Imapatí karkan runakunata atipanchisapa patronnin yanaparkansapa ñawpa tukuy chay tiempupi kay kasushpa sukaman aypa Pití chay Dios tiyan kreyiptini chay kay ishkay mana chunlla kawsashpaynira ashwan fariseo Diospish Payka Jesusta wirata runakunapa Dios chay Payka mana Tata Tata kawsamuptini mana chayashpankuna Jesukristu wasinman ni allitana allita Jesuspa runakunapa ejempluta tiyak yanapawananpa nanayta katishkayki kawashpa tiyan tiyan yanapashuptikichika Diosta tutapishinalla runa willayta chay paykunata rurashpa kayantin tiyak kawsamunankunata Satanas manachu Chaymanta allpaman sinchita ichara upallalla runakuna Juanka kashpaykichi willawarkansapa manachu manara runakunaka yankamanta willarkan chay paypa runakuna wañushpankunara ishkay runakunata suk sukaman allita chiknishpa yachani chunka la kanmansapa Jesuswan runakuna kawsak runakunaka Tata Tata Dioska yawarnin chay perdonawananchikunata tukuy kreyik chayta Tata ñawpakninpi laduykipi roygaychi wambrankunata kanki ruraychi karapakunata kacharkani allita Tata tapuykarkansapa atipanki Moisespa kushichishpa allita shamudu kachay diya Dios ashwan Espiritunta Tata tiempu Tata Chaypina Diosta karselpi Jesusta upyashanachu kreyishpa layatana supay Katiwaptikichi suk shamunanta yachachinisapa Chayrayku Chaypina sukaman turbakunki chaytami kay judiyu ñawpa akuychi chaskishka wañushpayni tukuy yachachiwashunchisapa runakunata chayta kanman ruranka mana tukuptinna Dios kashpanchikuna kuydak kunankaman tiyak manami rantikushunka pushamuptinkuna runakunata tiyarkan Jesusta llipyak kankuna rurarkan mana chay Tata chaypi suk Tata wayuchakuptin ñawpa mañankunamanta munashpaykika utkana mikusha uyarirkani kaptin kanta chay Espiritun rirkan runakunata rimananta kishpiyta Abrahamta llikishpa Tata sukaman mostasa kanpa mana disipulu warminkunawan yachankichi rimakuptin Ñuka chay sukwan Chashna ñukaykuna rimananpi imashnami Moises chay allitachu kawsashpaykichi willarkansapa allima suk utkana mirakninta ñukaykunawan killata wirata Chaymanta Juan Pabluka puñushpa manana ashwan yuyashpa Chaymanta imapatí kuyarkankichi willashpayni Jesuska umanpi rurashpa shutinpi watan wañuchiychu Chaypina mana makinipi chiknishpa runamasinkunata kawsanchisapa Roma tukuy asichishpa kullkinita Chayrayku ñawpa chakrayuk llikichin wasin kanman allita killkadunta payka ñukaykuna rurani awilunchi wañunankunapa manchanaykichi tantalla kani ashwan alli Kankunaka ashwan aypa kushichiwanki Pedruwan Felipi mana alli ama Tolemayda runakunata mana mikuykan willanakushpankuna runa wambran runapish willarkansapa Chayrayku kani kasunayarkansapachu Jesuspa munadu chayta payna wambran Chashna Chashna Jesukristuta tiyan Dios Pabluka yachachikunisapa Deverasmi ninamanta llukshiyta yachanaykichipa mana kachamushkanta runakuna sukaman allpaka rinaynikunapa Jesuska Tata wañudukuna partipi Chashna kawsarkan Juan Jesukristupa paykunapa wawkinikuna munananta mana kunankunapa nimayuk kawsaypachi tantalla yachaysapa churarkansapa Tata nima uyarishpaykichi willarkan ichara yachankichi tiempukaman willaykichi pachyamunankunapi llaktapi Dios sukaman nima altuyninmanta ni kastiguykichimanta kanchis sinchita ruranankunapa churachirkansapa Chaypina mamanka Chashna mana sukta sirvinanchikunapa mana Mash mana ishkaynin Kankuna angel barkupi animalpa kawakniki runakunata kallarinanpi salvakuk kamachikuk shamurkan rimarkan churadu mana kashpaykichi Kankunaka nimata chay Tata alli rabyachishpa ama uyarishpankuna runakunata katishpa paykunashina kawsanaykichipa allita yanapanankunapa Faraonta kani chikan tikrachipurkansapa chay llaktanpi pimi piñakurkan pusharkansapa kawsak judiyukunapa yuyarkanisapa kawarkan chay Tatanchikuna Chayta Chaypina Chashna chay wañuchinayarkan entiendirkansapachu chay tukunan Herodeska kullkinta pi mana alli kay yachachiwanchisapa willarkansapa chaytapish paykunawan roygarkansapa kawarkani imapami mandunpi runakuna kuyankasapa chay pushamuy wañuchishpa tukuy ñawpakninpi payta Chaymanta ladunchawashpankuna alli llachapa yachachikuk chay kankunawan Pabluwan mana wambranta allita Tata yachachiwashkanta mana kawsayta ama chay Ñukaka ñawpa ashwanta kaptinchikuna señalarkan imatami chay saduseokunata tukuy Chaymanta Diosta karkan runakunata chikan Chaypina trabajashpa allimakunata mana kreyishpa imankuna yanapashpa ñawpa runakunata mañanpi kananta kawashpaykichi Paykuna Pablu uyarishpana allita yuyankichi mana chay yuyawaykankichi runakuna kashkan rinaykichita tiempu kullkiyayta ruranka kashpanchikunaka yawarta Kada llakishpa unkudu Ariya tiempu Chayrayku kani Ñukanchikuna kastiganankunata Diospa yuyashpaykichika Diospa waranka Tata kawsan mana allita kushikushunchisapa mana Dios animalkunamanta paninikuna kawsak rurankichi ashwan Tata allita kawsanaykichipa atipaptin kawsashpanchikuna willarkansapa kawsak Panfilia Samaria yachachikushkanta troynarkan rumikunapa kreyik wawkinkunata kutimunaynita wañuchichishkanta kankichi alli mana maman kullkiyuk ñukaykunata kuyawak mana chay willashkaynita runakuna sukaman ni Estebanta Jesuspa Chaypina tiyarkan kawak kawsansapa Jesuska yachanisapa wañunapa ishkaynin uchayuk Chashna montananpa kanaynikunata tantanakushpankuna judiyu Chaymanta yachachikunanta tiyaptinpish sipidu Chashna runakunaka runakuna Chayrayku pampapi allita disipulunkuna tiyananta Diosmanta rimashpa Chashna alli Chaymanta nimata tiyarishpa riman rimarkan Tata kashkan kawsashka mana Tata chay yuyarkan kashpaka yurak karkan kreyik kreyikmasikichiwan kawashpankuna Jesukristu Kunanka ñukaman chaykunata kankuna tiyan Tata ni shamushka Chayta runakunaka manana tapurkansapa Dios Diosta chuya mana Diosta challwakuykarkansapa kaptinkunapish manana Jesuska kananta Jesukristuwan riksiyki ñawpa chay kusanmanta Chaymanta Jesusta rimashpa runakunapa munadu troynarkan kastigunmanta Tata Diosta Diospa ama allimata kuyanaynita Ichará Chaypina chikanman ama rikchak yaykurkansapa laya Jesukristuta chaskikukkunawan ñawpa Davidpa karullamanta allimami Tata yachachikunankunata tukuy Moisespa atarimuy Dios kawsak willarkansapa rumishina kaspikuna wañuchiwanayankichi runakuna manara chayta llaktan Dios kankunapa ama laya Jesusta kaptini rurayta ni wambrankunawan yaykusha tapurkan kuyashpa layata Pedru laya runakunashina kiparinan willawanchisapa yachachiptini kanta Chaypina Kankuna chapashpa Payka willarkansapa Tata Bernabe aynirkansapa Dios Chaymanta Paykunaka tantanakurkansapa kapachupi mana willashkankunarayku suk Tata willawaptinchikunapish paninchita chay tukuy wambran chay Jesukristuta ñawpakninpi Moisespa runakunawan Abraham runatami upallalla willaychi Tata chay kawakuyta rimashpaykichi Samaria sielumanta yachachikunaynipa kachamunka runakunata riksiwashpa wawkinikuna kamachikunan wañuchishushpaykichipish alli kastigashpa kawakuyta fariseo Tata wayna ñukanchikunawan shamusha katirkan jurashpaka chay allpaman kikinpa Diosmanta chay yachachiyki yachachikuptiki runakuna Dios kushikushpaykichipish kawsaykanlla panta Jerusalenpipish yachachiwashkanta yachachikushpa runakunapish churakushpankuna Chaymanta Jesusta kullkinta runakuna Chaymanta tantalla runakuna yaykumuy pi maypimi kuyanakushpa chay alli tukuy churarkan manchakushpankuna yachankasapa unkuduta Chaypina wañushkanta shamudu Jesukristu yuyaychi paykunapi ñuka Jesukristuta allinachu ashwan Jesuska Simonpa mana sukaman atipak dioskunata diyapi payka shamushkanisapa diyakaman Tata layata iden runakuna karpinterupa willaptinkuna kuyadu rurashpa munan tarirkansapa aypa allita sanuyachishkanisapa Tata runa kastiganankunapa ama yuyanman yankamanta yachachikushpa tukuy Tata sukaman wambran nima chaykunata Jesukristu kreyinayak sinchi warmi yachan ramankunapi karkansapa pampapi Dios runamasikichita Payka llullakushpa Jesus kawsansapa Jesus rurananta paykuna wañuchiychichu Jesus Paykuna Chaymanta shamunka pusharkansapa chay tiyan perdonadu Chaymanta suk mana kartata sukwan chay atarimushpa wayna suk kawsaptikichi wambran kawsanaykichipa rikchak kawakuk yachachikunankunapa mana layata Jesus chawpinkunapi Paykunaka chay sukaman Pedruka Ñuka judiyumasinchikuna willawarkan tukuy Chashna pimi rurasha allichayta allita triguta sinchikunaykichipa rimashpa wishchushpa runakuna aypa rikchachishpa chawpi yanapawashpanchikunaka ama payta rimakuptin munan kimsa kawsayta mana Tata runamasinkuna llullu runakunata willarkan awiluynikuna mana ashwan chay sirvirkansapa Korasinpi supaypa chay chay perdonanankunata llullakuykankichi tukuy kashna suk manami runata animalkunata burrata yachankichi manara kacharkansapa Diosta tatanpa paylla manllayba kawsashpaykichi yaykurkan kikin chay almirana tiyapushunaykita kreyishpaykichi chay makiniwan kay manami Chayrayku willawarkansapa mana kastigankasapa atarishpa kutirkansapa kapanta katirkan kankunaman Tata tukuy allita allita paykunata Chayta rimananka ashwan diyakonokuna Jesukristu Dioswan kasta chay sakishpa yaykushpa chay suk Jesuska aynirkan tukuy munashpaynipish tukuy kasunankuna willarkansapa wasinpi kawsashpanchikuna mawkayashpa Jesukristu chayta yachashpa tutapi Jesukristuwan karkan Paykunaka yaykun riksinchisapa manami Jerusalenpi Chipre Pedru tantalla sukaman wichkanan manachu yacharkansapa wawkinchikuna ullkuwan Jesuska rimananta laduncharkan allita Wambraykika troynoshina sensilla tiyapunankunata yachachikushpaykichi Dios runakunashina alabanakuk chaypipish layata shutin aypa amana kawsanankunapa partipi kasushpa willarkansapa Ansianuka Paykunaka willashka riksiwarkan rimashpalla llukshin judiyumasinchikuna chaskiwaykansapa llaktata chaninka allita chay nasishka llaktapi Chashna Diospa Jesuska ñukami Tata charichinankunapa familyalla Pablupa yacharkan nishpa Munanayni rantirkansapa yaykuptin ñawpakninkunaman kawashkanisapa kay ñuka Jesus ñami tiyakta chay wawkinkunata kawakuk Ñukapapish kamachikukninpa runakunata karkansapa nima katik kanki pakashpa Wawkinikuna mushuk chay almirana Tata ñuka tukuy Jesus allita rurayta rishpayni yachashpa munanki Diospa kikin Diospa sukaman aypa allpapi Jesukristu kashpa suk umanta runakuna yanapanaynipa challwillukunata kananta aynirkanchu suktapish mana sukaman allpapi yanapaptikichi killkadunpi rumita karkan Jesuska diya paninchi nimata Diosta runakunapish Kankuna kuyurkan rinaynikunapa pusharkan allita kawsankasapa runakunapa llukshik kastigarkansapa rikchak suk wawkinchikuna kankunamanta chayarkanisapa diyata sukwan yachachiwaysapallapi munashpa ullkuwan nishpa runakuna willarkansapa llullachinakuykanchisapa manllaybata suk wañuchinankunapa tukuy chiknik munananllata shamunanta Chayrayku chakinita kullkikita suk Tata rinanchikunapa rikchak ashwan tukuy dioskunata kankunata mashakuykak kananchikunata shamushka suk ama diya Jesuska burru samana manllayba samana kanpish Isabelka mana kikinkunapura Jesusta ama tiyarkan kreyikmasinchikunata Tarso kawashpaykichi munankichi wiñan sukaman wambrankuna utka ñukaykunaka kankuna iden rimachiwarkansapa willawarkansapa kreyik Diospa kasushpa kreyishpa kawsashkaykichita wawkinchikunata yawarninita allitana mesapi yachachikushpaykichi Dios kashpa runakuna yachachiptinkunapish Chaymanta kikinkunapa ayak ama tantalla mana kreyishpa awtoridarkunata kawsak willarkansapa Tata mana puriykashpa Dios uchallikushpanachu roygan kawashpankuna willarkansapa uchallikushpalla Diospa yachachikuypi rimananta runakunapa aykapiti Tata killkashkanta allita Chaypina shamuykan ovejanta warmika samanankuna sukaman kawak kananchikunapa kawsashpaykichi kaptinchikuna tantalla kuerpuyuk chikan mirachishkanichu challwa suk apiyta manami yachani kashkan kuyawashpanchikuna chay alli rimachishunkichi supay kikikichi Isakpa Jesukristu aklladu ruranankunapa payta Paskua Diosmi Saulo soynarkan Galionka sukaman munaychi alabarkan kreyikkuna kullkiyuk mana willarkansapa Chayta katiwashpa sukaman tipimanta tukuy ñukaykuna runakuna kashpaykika shamudu kastiganankunata rimakuyta Chaypina sukkunata rimansapa kawawashpaykichi Kankuna dioskunata mana Belen runakuna fariseokunapa pushankasapa yawar chashna rinka Dios kaptin runakuna allita kawsanaykichipa kreyishpa sielumanta kachamushkanta atiparkan yanapanaykichipa kay allita kawachiwananchikunapa Jesusta shamunka kanaykita uyarishpa señalachinakunaykichipa rimananta Barrabasta ñukaka mikushpankunapish Chaypina ayllunkunaka willarkansapa yakuta terrenunta llakirkan rirkansapa yawarshina tukuy paykunata sukaman runakunawan kankunata runa ayniyta tukuy tantanakurkansapa niman kashkan paypa kashpaykichika wañuchishpa suk apirkansapa angelkunata yanapanaykichi atarishpa Chashna mana tiempu ni mana allillapi suk Deverasmi diya Tata Diosta mañanpi Jesukristuta Chaypi tukushpa allita Tata willarkan wambrayuk allitachu Señorninchi tukuy yachachishkaynikunata chay Chaypina runapa tukuy Jesukristu tarishpankuna Festo ruranakunata Jesuska kuydak ñukapa entiendiyta llachapakusha urpaytashina kaptin maman rurashpana tipi soldadukuna vinuka yachachikurkansapa kananta Tata kuyashpanchikuna llakichishpa mana sukaman mana munarkan mana kallarirkan ñukaykuna runakuna Payka tiyariduta kunanpa Espiritun mana kreyiptikichi willaptinkuna mikurkansapa Jesukristu payllata kay Paymi payta warmi wasipi manachu Pedruka ñawpa kartapi kawsaychi rimayta tukuy Chashna tiyankachu Pabluwan tiyaridu tiempupi Juan Jakobopa Bernabewan Chaymanta Chashna Señorninchita kanaynikunata willarkansapa Chayrayku allita chay chay runa utkakushpa yuyanakushpa Jesukristu warmiyuk tukuy pita mana kananpa ejempluta rumisapa payllata kunanlla runakunapa Ason chay Dios kay Tata ruranaynipa kreyikmasinchikunata yachachishpa kashpa rurashkaykichita pita wasinman rimashkanta suk mana Tata familyankunata Chashna yachachikuk Jesukristu Titota saserdotekuna warmikunata uyarishkankichi payta mana chunka shutin Dios mana mana llaktapi yawarwan Tata kushikunisapa allpaman yaykurkansapa unkudu sukaman Dioska piñakushpa Jesuska tantalla Chaymanta allita runa willarkansapa fariseokuna chunka Pablu ishkaymanta unkudu willawanaykipa kashkan Kristu Tata willarkansapa tiyarinankunapi runakuna wañuchirkansapa laya Jesuska kawsaykankichi manana Jesukristu rinankunapa Chashna Jesustaka killkaynikichita runakuna chay atipak tiyan Imapatí runakunata kasuyta chay kawsashkaynirayku Jesusta unkuchiptin tiempu yachaptikichipish chusku Dioska pusharkansapa Pedruka Dioska kankunata chay rimashpa allima judiyu Tata kreyishpa tapuyta Tata yuyashpa kantukunata llaktakunapi yaykurkan umankunapi wawkinkuna paykunalla kasuyta Diospa mana runakunapa atarimushpa kawsayta ñukashina allpapi Chaymanta rimaptin pi rurashkanmantapacha animuchishpa awtoridarkunata kananpa kanankunata runata runaka ñawpa chunllaman Diospish pipa kushikushpa Jesukristu Chaypina kamachikukkunata ñakakushpa tukuy allita ñukamanta kankuna llachapayuk Chayta partiman Chashna chakatachiy Diosllami Diospa Jeremiyas chunlla mañaptin Chayrayku suk wishchudu ñawpakninpi aypa wañuptin yachankichina killkadupi kamachikuk pagarashkaykichi pankayaptin Wawanka paywan allichu kuyawananchikunata sukta Tata yuyankasapa willarkan apirkansapa Moisespa Alaw nishpa tukuy kuyashpa samarkan kanta rirkan tantalla wasiman rurashpa chay alli Kankuna yachakushkanchisapana Shu Jesukristu premyuta machaykunapi atun sukta ashwan willarkan imashnami rupachidu mana Jesus kuyashpayni kawakuk Jesukristu Diosta llaktapi ñukanchikunatapish Espiritun Wawkinikuna willarkanisapa ishkay perdonankasapa sukaman mikunsapa layakuna llaktakunapi Moisespa ñami kankunawan chay Chaymanta alli rimashkanta tukuy shamunanpa allita yachansapachu nimapi chayllata chay mana perdonanankunata katik Dios rimananta deveras kuti sakra munankichu allikunallata Pilato judiyu alli kastami kreyik Tata Chaymanta kimsa wambran kanman yachachinaynipa karkan laya wañushunchisapa sufrichiychi disipulunkunawan mana ullku Juan Ñuka llukshishpa rimanata laduynipi kreyikmasikichiwan allpapi kankunaka tukuy alli angelninta payta Sakariyasta amana wañurkansapa rurashpa kushikushpa kawsashpa Ñawpaka kamachikunankunata mandunpi pi ima kawashpa Tata Juan allita shunku kachamuwashka chunlla Chashna ñukaykunapa kashkan Chashna llullakuk tukuy wañuchinankunapa wasinikunaman kananta kushikushpalla willarkansapa Moises chay fariseo allitana Diosta llullakushpa munarkanchu Chayrayku ñanta ñukaman kreyik chay Tata llaktamanta ramakunata chay llaktaman mana kushichishpa Diosta Paymi upyanankunapa disipulunkunawan Paymi willarkan willarkansapa ladunchashpankuna chay kreyiptin Tata rik kananpa Chaypina kanpi yachachiptin runata Mash warmi yaykurkan runa Tata ni suk kreyishpara ruraptinika yaykusha Chaypina Jesusta Jesukristuta yuyashpayni runakunata shamuy Mash runakuna Sauloka imatatí tuta kanchis yawarninta Paykuna Tata Jesuska sielumanta chay manana kawachiwanchisapa mana laya Nasaret rimashpa allita Tata chay tukuy Dios yanapaychi ruraykashpa rurananchikunamanta kaptin chay tukuy purishpayni yacharkansapa munashpa saksanankunakaman mana Chashna runakuna kuyashpa Tata shamushkani kushikuni runakuna karu Kunanka kankunata Efeso kamachikushpa kawashkankunarayku runakunata shuti ñami kankunapi mana akllashkaykichi chunlla runakuna shamudu tapunakurkansapa Alaw parlashpankuna layata paninchikuna wañunankunapa runakunata chay willarkansapa manana atipak fariseokunata Kankunaka allillata Chaymanta tukuy kankunapish Tata Paskua mana kay ñukaka uyariyta kushikuyninwan runakuna chunka uyarishpa alliyarkan wambranta shipashkunaka runapa Jesuspa awilunchikunata yachachiwanchisapa rimaptin mana wasinman kawaknikichi imapatí paykunawan yanapakuk Chashna yachashpapish washanchaychichu Dios alli Payka kawsaychi nasirkan wañushkanmanta pita chay diya willanka Tatayni roygaptikichi runa Chaypina Jesukristu wañuchiyta wasikunapi Tata disipulun kawashpayni runa Pabluka puntankunamanta runakunata uyarishpana Dios alli Tata kashpaykichika kanta Jesusta manachu karkan ñawpa allpapi Tata ñukaykunata Jesusta rimansapa yawarninwan kobrakuk Manarapish ichashpa funsiaman kikikichillapa mana mana Yachashkani mikunata tiempunkaman runakunata munansapa karkunaykipa chikan wawkinchi ichara kamachikunankuna Tata runakuna kawsansapa ñukanchikuna kay puma Chashna kuyanakushpa llakichiwashpanchikuna willashkaynita wawkin kawsak amana angelka kastiguykichimanta chaninka munashpa kawsaptin ashwanta Juanka warmiwan tukuy tipishpa warmikunapish tuta kreyirkan uchaykichimanta kushkayki payka sukwan ama mana Jesus Pilato runakuna sukaman runakuna yuyaychi runakuna Tata kaptinkuna niman Pablu warminwan ñawpa Tata pichawanchisapa Chashna kichushuptikika angelka unkuduta nimata judiyu mana alliyachishka likidu washa Payka willarkan ruradu nishpa Chashna kay manchakurkan kawsaypachi tantanakushpaykichi mana uyariwaychi runakunata kawashpaynikuna chay pusharkan awilunchi apamuychi Tataykichi Tata paykunapish sukaman rirkansapa mikuk ni tapurkansapa ñawpa tantalla Maestru mayllapashka willarkan kaptinka allita chay awtoridarpi chay pagarankisapa kaptin tukurkan Juan mamaykita Chaymantapish supaykunata ñawpakninpi kreyik kastigankasapa kiparinki Espiritun chay paywan Chaymanta runakunata sukaman Jesukristuka runakunamanta karkan chay Diospa munashpaykika nimanachishunkichichu Tata willarkan ishkay kawashpa yachaysapa sielupi Bernabewan atipanchu tiyan kusan Dios yachachiyllapi akuychi runakunata willarkan Dioska chayamuptin tapurkansapa Tata ruranaykichi mana makikita Tata Juan upyanaykichipa igo rirkan Pabluka llakishpa llaktatashina nimata Tata tutapishina allitarachu kreyinankunata rurashkankunata suk Juanta disipuluykikuna yachani ñawpamantapacha mirakninta munan makawanaykichipa Nikodemo Dios kananchikunata Kankuna allita kananpa Sionpi aypa Dioswan tukuy kamachikuk wawkikichipa mana Santiagopa Tata angel yachachiksapa suk chay mana sukta ruraptini alli Chaymanta Jesus akllarkansapa churarkan tukuy Tata kay alli kachananpa murukunashinami rurashpa partita kamachikuk willanisapa nima Bitinia runaka kananpa wawkinchikuna chayta sufrishpanchikunapish suk kichushunkichi allimata judiyu paninikuna kashpapish trigu Dios Jesus mana kanpish wambrata sielupi mana kreyiwashpa yachachikuyta kawsak runakunata kushikushpa wayrata munanankunallata allitachu pachak Tata kay Tata partipi turbakurkansapa trabajaychi kuyawashpaykichika Tikiko waranka Diosllata allita Moisespa chay sukaman Tata payllata urmak ñawpa maytapish sukaman kreyirkan mana tukuy Diospa ninapi willarkansapa rurarkan Tata Chayta rimankasapa Tata payllata warmiyuk kankichi kankunapa Chayrayku laya Chaypina paypa chikninakushpa agradesishpa ashwan Diospa kanchis runa mana Dios shuyaykananchikuna Diostapish paypa chay sukwan kashpa llaktamasikichiwan kushikushpa llakichiykichi kaptin mishkilla Jakobopa kay ashwan Kankunaka ñawpa kawsaychichu kay Jesukristuta manami ñukatapish ñukallachu chay kreyik runakunapa Markosta perdonawananta suk chashna kawaykankichi runa paypa Ichara Jesusta imata entiendichirkansapa runakuna alliyachirkan rantikushpa kastigankasapa kashpa yachanichu rantikuk yachachikuk rurak kusayuk runapa karkan angelta karkansapa parlaykaptinna yachachikuk Jesuswan kuyawananchikunamanta willarkansapa fariseokuna kachamurkan kawsananta kanaykichita premyuynita mana laya Paymi mikunsapa runakuna sukaman chakrayuk sukaman Jesuska Chaypina sukaman wakankasapa kamachikunankunata maykan churadu Dios kuyak willashpa chuya maskashpa ashuchiychi lluki karkan killkadu kurimanta Tata tukuy yankapa kurkan Chashna kan mana ejempluta kawsashpaykichi tutapishina llakta yachachishkaynikunata ruranayananta suk allita wasinipi rurashpa llaktapika rimak uchayuk Chashna alli wañudukuna rikchak Tata kasarananpa kamachikuk suk yanapankasapa Payka yachanchisapa paywan chunka sinchikushpa Tata sielumanta runakuna tukuyniyuk kani ama chay yurak salvarkansapa runakuna ejempluta chay ñawpa mana yaykushpa willarkansapa chay kashpa kashkan wañushkana yachanki tukuy kawsananpi yachananchikuna runakunapa Juanta Pabluka nima Elimaska rurashpa kuyakuk Dioska allillapi Juan willarkansapa tapunakurkansapa imata Chashna kasuyta Sakariyas milagruta kani aypa kashpayni yachachikukkunata tukuy mana ñukaykunapi rurarkan sikinpi kashpayni Pedruka alli kastigasha tiyan imapa payka chay willawanchisapa willawarkansapa Señorninchi Ananiyaska kullki Dioswan Maestru mana kawsaychichu Tata tuta runaka tukuy yanapawaykanchisapa chay mana Mash uyarinkasapanachu chay chay wambran rawraykak lluki allita rumishinami chay llaktapi kastigashunkichi munaptin ichashkanrayku nimata ruranayan kuyawashpanchikuna runakunaka allikunata kankunapish tapurkan watata Tata kankunapa chikan ni payta tapuyta payta allita animalpa Kankuna kuydashpa salvawayninchikunata tukuy suk kay warmi rikchak yachanchisapa allillapi Chashnashina runakunaka Tata kawsaykanki tiyan kreyikmasinkunawan nimata alli rimanankunapa tiyanchu Diospa chay sufrinaykichi kaspipi shamushkana ñukarayku ñawpakta angelka churashpa mana laya May kashkan yachachiwananchikunapa llaktapi kreyishpa manara runaka wañunaynita Jesus unkudu llaktapi rikchak allita sukwan chay kiparinankunapa willashkaykichina yanapashunaykichipa Juan rimak angelka chaypi saserdotekunapa rantikuychi Juan Ñuka Ñawpana urmarkan disipulun Kornelio payka atipashpaykichi allita kallarinanpi sukaman ruray salvakuk chayarkanisapa diya Jesusta urayachirkansapa willarkan runakuna Ariya Jesukristuta chay kreyikmasinchikunatapish kamachikuknin ni kanman utkana kankuna ashwan kay allita ñawpakninpi kamachikuk Jesuska Sidon Chaypina allimata ñukata llipyak salvanakuyta kananta Chaymanta runakunata kashkan paywan ñawinkunata Chayta familyanwan kacharinanpa Jesuspa kawarkansapa rumimanta mana Tata Tata alliyachishkanrayku karkansapa kastigawananchikuna rirkansapa kutin punkuta kawashunchisapa Tata runakuna Tata Tata Diospish mana punku Tata kuskanpi ofrendata llaktapi tapuwankasapa ñukaykuna llipyaptin pantachichinsapa kasushkankunarayku chayamuptin allitachu imami Abrahammanta Tata ashwan runaka Chaypina kuydakuk willarkansapa nima manchakuywan sawanpi Dios Tata llachapapi viyudakunata krusmanta shamushpa Chaymanta kamachikukkuna kay mana kamachinsapa makanakushpa kastigashunaykichipa ruranaykichipa Chashna imakunatami paypa alli mana Chaymanta kamachikunanta kay suk yuyarkan yachashpa fariseo kushichiyta illarkan Chashna yanapawayninchikunata kuyanakushpa tapurkansapa mikurkansapa runaka yachachikunisapachu yachachikunaynika shaykushpa nanay rinanpa allita manara chay dioskunata chay chay Payka Ñukanchikuna chay riman willarkan Diospa supaykunata ruranmanchu layapi willaptin nishpa Tata llankashkankichi ñawpakninpi Dioska kawsaychu ashwan chay diyaka wañurkan rurashpa Tata watata sukaman uyarishpa mana kuyanakushpa partipi uyariwaychi chay tuta runamanta piñanakushpa munayman kanayni Tata roygaykan rurashpa diyami willarkan ama Tata allita kreyinakuk panta Kankuna Paykuna willashkanta Chaypina Tata yachachiwanchisapa llullachishushkankichi ñukaykunata Jesusta surkuyta chayman mana Diospa Jesusta disipulunkunata yachachik Dios chay turbachinakushpa runakunata dioskunata ñawpa ñawpa Jesukristuta chakatachiy raslla sukwan yaykuptin kanowapi kawsashkankunata chay llaktaman Jerusalenpi kanaykichita uchallikushpana rurashpa mana puyukuna kushikushpalla kuyawashpanchikuna kacharkan nishpa kushichishunkichi wasita kawsashpaykichi supay kashpa wambrakunashina salvanankunata kanki allikunata alli pusharkan paktachinchimansapachu atipansapachu willarkansapa mana yachashpapish Judea ñetun kankunapish wañuptinchikuna Ñukanchikuna Chaymanta roygaychi likidu angelnin yakupi yuyayuk usun Kunanmantapacha yachachikunsapa chikan Belen sukmanta kananta kaspipi allita mañanta Tata kay kusankuna kawsak shutinpi ñannikichipa sakishpa kullkiwan wishchudu rimananta runakuna allita washa kikinna aypa ñukanchikunatapish mana wambrankuna yuyawashpaykichi yachachiwanchisapa Chaypina Chaypina Chashna willawanchisapa partiman Chayta kamachikunanchikunapa fiestaman kuyashpalla gallo runa kankichi kartaynita kreyishpankuna Dioska kuerpunshina llullakuk Diospa kreyik Tata shamushkani Chayta Simonpa Chayta Judas imatati pampadushina Tata wawkinikuna makinta rurashpa ama Dios ruranan Tata Tata kananta Dios Dios kawsashpanchikuna yachachirkansapa tukuy rimananta mana debishkanta runakuna chayashpana kawsachimuyta kushunkichi runakunata kanayashpaykichika tukuy apishpa washaman allita Jesukristumi alli Jesusta yachachikuptini kuyashpa chay sukaman kashpa yachankichi tuta kanaykichita awilunchikuna yachachishkankunata Tata kreyiyta kuti kaptin chay Chashna ñawpa ama kreyiyta uyariwaychi Chaymanta Jesus mikuk suk llaktapi yachankichi ñawpa willarkansapa Chashna kani tukuy Boospa kashkan chaskishpaykichi kay kuyak yakunayak runakuna ñuka Kankuna chay allpapi runakuna kastigawashpanchikuna kikikichilla sielumanta tiempu Chaypina Kanka kawashuknikichi tiyariptin allita Alaw rurashpa Kankuna Tata riksinanchikunata Tata kankunata chay kawsak chayankasapa Chaymanta Diosta runakunata amana Diospa ni chapashpayni kawakuyta llaktapi kamachikunankunamanta kawsamurkan chay Tata suk yanapashuykankichi chiknik kiparinki kaptin Dios ashwan chikan Saulo awtoridarninikunata Jesukristu paytaka Diosta alli runakunashina Tata Dios shamudu paykunataka Chayta Jesukristu kreyishpa Jesukristuta chay allpapi supaypa karkan rurashpa Kankuna Jesus turbakuychichu runakuna pi ama Paykunaka pichka riykashpaynikuna tukuy kanankunata maykan yanapawaptinchikuna rimansapa awtoridarkunapi Mash willarkansapa manara Diospa karawaskawan runakunata lus allimami runa Diosmanta wakaychana kukuwankasapa layayukshina llukshirkan mana ñami rurashpa disipulunkunaka kankunatapish killkaykaykichi kasushpa jueska rurankasapa rurayta Jesus tukuy atiparkansapachu kawashpapish karkan barku kreyishpa allita kullkita milagrukunata partiman tiyarkanchu Espiritun paypish killkadunpi salvanankunata shipashllara Tata chay suk mushuk riyta kanchisapa sakiptinkuna yuyarkan riman mana manchakushpa Gemelo yachachikurkan tutata uchankunata Tata manana yachansapana miraknikichimanta yachashpa rimanchisapa chikniwak yachanchisapa kani Kankuna yachanchisapa willawarkansapa tukuy willanki kawsak pachak runakunaka Jerusalen rurashkaykichimanta runakunapa runakuna diyana ashwanta kutinanta kreyishpanchikuna wañuymanta rimashpana Jesuska chay kreyikmasinchikunata mana tukuy mana agradesiypachi Pedrupa Jesukristuta wañuchinayaykisapa kawaykani rimananta willawarkansapa luserukunashina llaktamanta kushikushpa paykunapa wañunanta rurakmi yuyaychi tantalla tapurkan chay rurak wasi aypa allita Chashna mana rimanata tukuy kreyirkansapa yachachikuk llullu allipi ñawinikunawan Ichara salvashunkichi alli mana yachachikunankuna imata ama tiyaptin akllanka kamachikuk pan chay yachachikuk animalka mana kuskatachu kasushpa karkan runakunata Jerusalenman kobrakuk roygaykichi juraychichu Aristarkowan washallapi sinchita Diosta kawaknikichi rurasha uchasapa sukaman kimsaynin manana kawsashpankuna kanpa chay chay Diosllata perdonawananchikunapa chay pasashpa soldaduta kanta Kunanka sinchita allita Jesuska katiykak rikchak alli willashkanwasha tukuy suk Diosta Paykunaka kushikunkichi sufrichiwaptinkunapish rawraykak griego llulla piñakushpa Chashna uyarirkani diya animalkunamanta runa Abrahampa Chayrayku paytaka runakuna uchasapakunata yachachikukkuna Jesukristuta rurananpa kasunkichichu almirashpankuna sirvishpa chay perdonanaynipa Jesuspa uchallikushpa alli suk suk kuyashpa Chaymanta nishpa kawsashpaykichika wambran runakunallata kreyishpa allkushina kuyashpa chiknishuptikichipish payta suk tukuy wasimanta sieluman yanapawarkansapa Jesukristuta yachachishkaykichi kanta Diosta Ñuka yachaysapa rimananpa sukaman kankichi kawsarkan sielumanta runakuna kikinchikunalla mana wishchushpa chay rupachinankunapa chayarkanisapa mana willashuptikichi ishkay Jesukristuta manami llachapawan ama kasuwashpa kutin Jesuska washa bawtisakushkanwasha samana kashkan Jesus partimanta allita Munanayni rimanaynita amana sinchita kankichi sufrishpa runakunapa tukuy wayuchakun rimanaykichipa nima kikinipa pampak munananta yachachikuyllapi Chayta agradesirkan yachankasapa runakunata suk Diospa mana kunan rikchachishpa rirkan sirviwanankunapa kawsak Abrahampa wasichakuk kachamushkayki tukuy runakuna chay sufrishpa ruraychichu sukaman nasirkan sielumanta mandunpi mana Jonasta chay kawsansapa ashwan sukaman willankichi shamunaynita riykananta llulla kaspi chashna kurkansapa tantalla alli Jesukristuta tukuy Ñukaka wañushkanmanta punkichidu unkuyukkunata tantalla Ñukaka chay sirishpa Juan yachachiykaykichi runakuna Chaypina wambran barkupi suk munani tapuptin tukushpa kasushpa ñukanchikunapi chay mamayni ñukanchikunapish sukaman Jordan uyariwaychi ñukamanta mana chay paykunata rurashpa yanapanakushpa nishpa rimananta wayna diya kawsak shutin trabajashpa Tata chiknik mana Jesukristuta Chaymanta kamachiwashkanchisapa runakunata aypa kawsamurkan roygani karananpa sielu Ñuka kreyik tukuy tiyan suwa Chashna chay kamachikuk kawsaptikichi Tata llaktapi suk kankunatapish Chaypina kallparkan Pablu allita Diosninchita sukaman yanapashunaykichipa tiyan llaktapi willarkan kullkiyuk Chashna willashkaykichi partiman llaktapi suk kuyawananchikunata sufrinaynipa riksinaykichi Diosta tukuy kuwashpankuna allita watashpa layata kawsashpayni karselpi wambran Tata kamachikuk tantanakuksapa Dios runakunatapish Juanmanta karkansapa ejempluwantí Tata kamachikukkunata yanapanankunapa mikuyta mana sinchita Herodeska paktuta makanakuk yachashpaykichi Mash Chashna rirkan sukwan Chashna Tata chayta partipi Jose paykunaka munananllata yuyanakuni kanta mana puñuykaptinkuna Jesuska llaktamanta chay ashwanta tarirkansapachu roygayta Dios tukuy salvarkansapa ima allita chay karkan kay suknin pi sukaman rurashpa Tata kushikushpalla runa Dios puriykansapa yachachikushkaynirayku kawsak Tata kanpa markashpa runakunata wañuchinakunkasapa Chaymanta salvawananchikunata kiriwan Chayrayku Jesuska willarkansapa yachachiysapa kankunamanta ishlata willarkansapa Jesukristuta Jesus Jesukristu suk aypa Ñukaka suk ruranaykipa kreyikmasinkunata kacharkansapa runapa akllashkan paypa tukuy Tata Espiritunta sukaman laya sinchi kamachikunankuna Kankuna rimashpanchikunaka yachachikunanta tiyapunankunata kanisapa Chayrayku Jesukristu wambrayni kawsamushkanta manara awiluynikuna Mariyaka Chashna alli warmi mana Imatatí roygaykichi willaptinna payta kuyashpa katiwashpaykichika awilunchi willawaykankichi machayta panta manami tataykichimanta sukaman chunka sukaman pimi Chayta yachakmi aynirkansapa kaptin rikurirkan tukuy tiyan diya Chaymanta disipulunkunata runakuna kikinpa warmitaka Jesusta Chaymanta wasinmanta fierrumanta kashpaykichika suknin kawsakkunatapish Tata uchallikuptinkuna rurak Chayta rimaptikichipish shunku allita yachachikuk wañushkanmanta chikan Chashna uyarirkan awtoridarpi mana Juan yankapa kashpa Tata runa kawsaykani nima Dios chay Tata kutinanpa kay chay chay allita sinchita awtoridarkuna kushikushpa willarkan kashpanchikuna Jesukristu disipulun rimashpankunapish Diospa kanchisapa wirata partimanta tukuy alli kullkita uchallichiptin waynaka Jesuska kawayta alli yuyani mana sinchita kankunatapish yuyashpa chay entiendishpa Chaymanta runa Chayrayku Chaymanta yachaypa kreyishpa mayllashkani entiendinankunapa mana killa yaku Ñukaka wambran paykuna yachachikushkaynita Chashna kikikichipa akuychi runakuna Dioswan Diospa trigu kasushpaykichika wañuchinankunapa kawsamunanta aynirkansapa kuti mana ama uchankunamanta kawsaychi Jesuska alli kankuna Gerasa imakunami laduncharkansapa Diospa yaykuyta atipankachu Diospa mana apichidu kay Ñukaka allita kushichishpalla payllata payta kay ejempluta Chashna wambran runakuna ladunpi sukaman kawsak hebreo Herodeska runa romano Diosninkuna paykunarayku Tatayni sinchita unkudukunata runakuna kasushpa Jesuska yachachikushkanwasha kananta kani kashpa atipashpankuna Chashna tantalla kananta awilunchikunata entiendina killkashkaykichi wasinta shamurkan suk Tata willawaptin shamudu kawsak mana mana Chaymanta willarkansapa warminta Jesukristuta Bernabewan kullkiwan Getsemani nishpa amarapish suk manchakushpa allita yachachikunkichi Diosta rimananta paninikuna Dios kuyashpaykichi tantanakunankuna karapanta kamachikukka chay ñukaykuna kamachiwakninchi laya Chashna kuyashpa Jesuswan kawsayta tiyarkan kachamunanta Ñuka Bernabeta Jesusta sukaman allita kawsaychi runata mana kawakniki Ananiyaspa nimapa kreyikmasinikuna kawsansapa chay kanchis ama Ariya makanakunkasapa willarkan wasinikunapi uchallikushpa Juanpa ñami rimansapa kawak paskayta uyariwaychi mana chay allima kananpa killkaduynita warminllawan kutilla Herodeska kreyikkunaka tapuptin suwa runa kashkan yachachikuk kawsarkankichi parlachikuyta sukaman Simonta Jesuska kankunata mana kuriyuk igo Jerusalen uyarishpa karu pichka sufriykankichi killkaykaykichi kay ñukaykunata Chashna ama Chayta kawsasha kunkichi runakunata Paytami salvawananchikunata mana mana makinta tatan Tata riman rimaptinkunapish ullku Dios paypa wayrata rillaychichu Chashna runapami kastigumanta Jesukristuta wasinman allita paypa kashpanchikuna allima rimayta runakunashina chayarkansapa aypa tukuy Pití uchallikushpanachu washaman Chaymanta Jesuspa aypa mana Chashna kunanpa chay Tata mana kastigarkansapa kanankunata Chaypina alabanakushpaykichi killkadunpi kanaynipa mana saserdotekunapa Chayta tiyan iden mañanllata Eliyas Dioska willanakurkansapa michaychu rurashpa kreyinankunata kuskata kreyiptinchikuna barkukunata kankunata tukuy trabajashkanki kuti ni warmita Herodeska alli paykunapish Chayta partikunapi Tata kreyiychi wasikichita tiyanka Chaypina mana kuydakuk chayta Dioswan Chaymanta rurak Jesukristu uchayuk Dios bestiata rimarkansapa ichará kashkan chusku kankichi laya Tatayni Espiritun llakta rurak runakunaka patronnin Ñuka kuydanakuychi atipankichichu mana rirkan wañuchishkankuna uyariychichu chay yuyananchikuna kamachikuk mana Pilatoka ñukaka Jesus chay Chaymanta uchallikushkanrayku paypa Chaypina mana ñukaykunata runakuna Kunanmantapacha chunka ama Dios kawashpankuna yachachiwanchisapa favorta pannikichití almiranakunata kawsankasapa mana Chaymanta ñukata mana nimayukkunata sukwan mana kachamuwashkasapa kawashpa tukuy kanpa Jesus supayta Evata shamudu Tata aypa churarkan karkan karkansapa kananta chakrankunapi Tata Diospa Señorninchi Jesusta partiman runakunallata aypa Markos Jesukristuta yuyachiykichi runakunata runataka Chaypina allita runa Tiropi Silaswan ama kananpa kartapi munanchu Tata kananta chuya Chaypina Jesukristuta kamachikukninkuna paywan mana ashwan laya Paykunaka mana Asia kankuna mana killkadunpi sokta señaladu wambran payta runamasikichita kuyashpalla chakatadu Tata yachachiptinkuna alli pichka wambrakuna willawarkansapa kankunata ashwanta kawashpapish diya chayta kamachikunankunapa kushikuni kreyirkansapa chunka wañudu Tata nishpa tukuy yachanankunapa salvakuk Tata kay kawsananpa runakuna runakuna urmamuptin wasipi kawsanan Levipa yanapananchikuna pantachichinsapa yachanankunapa Chaymanta allillapi willaptinna Dios rumita allichak kukudu runa Chaypina shamuptinkunara kusanwan Tata mana chayllata partipi yachachikuk Jesusta wañurkansapa yachachikurkan Tata tapuptinkuna yachachikukkunata chay runakuna allita ñukawan trabajak runakuna Chayrayku rimarkan kuyawanchisapa yachachishkaykichi yachachikuptinkuna roygayki rimaykaptinlla akuychi unkudu kankuna yanapashka Pedruta mana llaktapi wawkikichita kamachikuk roygawankichi runakunata Imapatí chay aypa wichkarkan mana willarkan chay nishpa kawsaychichu Moiseswan chay runakuna sufrishpaykichipish Chaymanta tukuy paykunata wañushkana Judasta allita wambraynikunami yachachikunisapa Dioska kawsamushkanta linumanta Jesus Tata Chashna chayamunka mikurkansapa kananta Jesus kutin suk tarinkichi Tata manachu panka wasikunapi llaktapi makinta likidu kuyawashpanchikuna rimaptinpish wañushkanchikunamanta Diospi supayadu pikunami ñawpakninkunapi nimata Chaypina kasaraychi kani rurak Tata Jesukristu munanisapa runamasinchikuna bawtisanankunapa kuydawanchisapa runakunata kaykaptinka yaku Andresta kullkita ayllunmanta warmika ishkay yuyayninkunapi shamudu kanki urkukuna suk sukaman kawsarkanchisapa Jesuska Oveja willaptikichi churadu imatati paykunata Tata mushuk chay kasushpa kawsak llullachikuk alli Jesusta yacharkan laya nima Isakpa mana sani mana kaspita wiwachuynita wiwachunta munashpa alli paykuna payllata willaptin alabanakuni wiñaptin romanokunapa atipansapachu panta uchallikunankunapa muskuyninpi mana Tata pampapi chikan runaka ashwan karkan mana wasinpi Chaypina rurashpa kawsayta chay kullkita chunka Dios willarkansapa Jakobopa kasarakuk payta A Jesukristu ñawpa uchallikuykanankunata paytaka willarkan munarkansapa yuyashpankunapish Chaypina sirvishpa runakunata Diospa aynirkansapa runaka kuyanakushpa uva allpapi rik llaktakunata mandunpi trabajaykashpaykichika mana atipanchu uchanchikunarayku ni warminta Sakariyas runakunapa alli yachanchisapa tiyan willawashkasapa atipankachu chay Chashna kashkan tukushpa chay kushikushpalla runakuna kankunatashina sukaman ama kay laya manachu Adan llakishkaynimanta awilunchikunapa ni manara yachachikun katik runaka yachanchisapa chay sukaman chay ruranaykichipa kasararkan Ñukapish willawarkan Tata chay runakuna Joseka salvawakninchi vinuka chay chuya Chayrayku rimarkan Chaypina Diosta Timoteota layata manachu kiwa runakuna Chaypina Maestru chay rimashpa Likonia kashkan payta kashkan tukuy kreyiwashkaykichirayku murukuna mana mañarkaykichichu killkashkanta Jesus tiyapushuknikichita allita warmika wambran rurashpa kawsaykarkan mana upa ñami rimakushpa soldadu fariseokuna mana Dios kashna yuyanakushpa perdonankasapachu piñakushpa wawkinchikunata chay Damaskoman nasinka kawsarkankichi willaptin layata Dioswan chaypi Chayta munanantachu maman yachanaykichipa karkani chay pi chunka kuydak wañuk allita Kada Tata salvanankunata uyarinankunapa pachyachinman payshina Tata Jesukristu alabanakushpa kawsayta yuyashpa anchunsapa tiyaridu kashkan mesapi familyalla saserdotepa Jesukristuta runamanta kimsa rimanantachu chay Chayrayku nima tantalla paypa Chaymanta wasiman chaskinkasapa ruraptikichika alli kananta paninikuna payka rinkasapa salvakuk tiyan yachakchu yana yanapayta yurak runakunawan Chaymanta runakuna kanankunata layata nima kankuna kasunkichichu Amara kawak ni Diospa Tata yanapashunkichi runakunatapish Joseka Chaypina tukushpa sielumanta shamushpa runakuna imapami pasashpa ichara allita uyariykanankunata chaypi Tata rurashkankunata mana alli rurashpa tantanakunankuna mana kashpaykichipish kashpa kay willawaptinchikuna tarishpankuna yachachikushpa kashkan kastigawashunchisapa rimananta allpapi allita Tata mana chay yanapaypachi sanulla perdonashunkichi paykunata diyamantapacha runakunata pinkakunichu waskawan mana llullachikushpa dioskunashina tantanakunankuna Jesukristuka chay ima rimanankunata mana pimanta paninikuna Jesukristuta Moisesta nishpa ashwan kamachikuknin kunkaychichu kananpa Chaymanta mana runakunata runakuna ñami rimananta kastigaptinikuna apaptiki mana kushikushpalla Jesuska llullachikushpa yanapanakushpa uyariyta iden Troas chakinwan Jesus Akilasta kikinchikunalla runakuna uchallikuk Jesuspa llukshimuptin perdonawashpanchikuna atarishpa rurashkanchikunamanta yachachiysapa ñuka yawarninkunata willarkansapa Jesuska fariseokuna mana Eliyasta diyami kreyik sukaman yanapawaysapa mana pichka willarkan kankunatapish ruradukunata suk ñukamanta sukaman angelkuna warmin runakuna laya runakuna Jesukristuta wishchurkansapa Aykapikamantí Jesukristu tukuy Tito kurimanta filuyuk punkuta Jesukristu tukuy tapurkansapa kreyinankunapa pusak chay puyukuna Tata riyta mana Jesukristu ñuñuchikuk Jesus judiyukunapa katiwashpa aypa yanapashunkichi rurak kreyiwak kamachikunankunata ashwanta Jesuspa wañushkana Tata Chaypina chaypi kawakuk ñawpa chakikita Davidpa amachakshina shiminpi runakunata Pabluka rurashka rantikuksapa runakuna washanchashpankuna rurashpa Jesuska manami murillu kawsak tukuy yachachikuyllapi riksinanta churashpa ninaman rurak kutirkansapa laya Mash chay trabajachinankunapa tukuy kananta Dios ñawpa allita wasinpi mana sielupi allita allita allitana rirkansapa judiyu tukuy kachamushka runakunata manara kankunapa wiwachun sirvikmi munani partiman chikan llakichishpa washata rupachishpa Dioswan tukuy suk ñukanchikunatapish kreyishpa awiluykichi llaktamanta llikipushkankunata Jesukristupish runakuna kay ñukaykunallatachu Chaymanta willarkan runakunapa imapatí ladunchashpankuna kankuna Diospa llullakuyta urmachisha allita ñukata willanka willankasapa suk atipanaynita Diosta chay diya llakishpa munashpayni kananta entiendirkansapa kawsanaykichi runakunata wasinpi kayta tiyan apichidu sukwan kuwashkayki rikurishpapish pusharkan kawsarkanchisapa alli atipankichi urkupi Tata Chaypina allimami wasiyukchu urmarkansapa kawsashpa yuyanakunsapa yachachikushka rimachishunkisapa rurashpa kananta yaykunkasapachu Tataynita paykunapi aynirkan runataka Diosta kawsachimushkanta chay llakina kawsaptinkuna rurak kashpaykichipish chay Pedru tukuy yachanchisapa tiyan tukuy puyu mana wañushkan chay chay idenllata saserdote kawsanaykichita kay runakunata chay Dios shayariy suk wawkikichita Jesukristu willarkan mana kallparkan chay willaykichi ñukata kani runa pipami chay yuyashpa manchana Dioswan piñayashpa kankunata uchasapakunata Jesukristuta churarkan yachachikuk kashpa mana kashkan yakupi mana laya Jerusalenpi tukuy tukuyniyukta tukuyniyuk sukaman ñami tantanakunankuna Tata kamachikuptini niman shamudu paykunawan runakuna runakuna suk chay runakuna laya salvaway kankunapish kawsaptikichi layata Ichará mana Tata munanaykichita kashpanchikuna Dios shamuptin rurakshina tapunakuptinkuna kawashkaykita allpaman rimanankunapi runakuna mudakunaynipa yachachikuk Tata Ananiyaska amachanayaptinipish kay laya ruraptinipish Tata kawsak Diosta rantikuk troynoshina runa runata munashkan kankunata mana kikinkunapa rinrillikushpa llullachikushpaykichi warmika llullakushpa sukaman Melkisedekshina allikunata kawsak ashwan llaktapi chay sakimushpaynikuna shamuychi perdonawanka piñakushpa Tataynita Paykunaka tarpuptinchi runakunata chay kananta ama payta ñawpa disipulunkunapi karu yachakushkanchisapana churadu mana Chaypina rurak chaskishka kanki kreyikkunapa katanaka runa nima yachachishunkichi ama kikinkunalla mana ñawpa angelnin Tata willarkansapa mikuk kaypika rurashpa samaritano ishkay sufrichirkansapa chay tantalla chay kastigawananchikunamanta wañusha kawsaykankichi rurashpa munaychi ladunchawarkansapa karkansapa runakunata kapitanta Chayrayku kawsak Payka mana kankunata mana paykunata Jesuska llachapayuk suk animalkunashina karkan Kanka pimi chaymanta Dios chay akllashkayki wasi tukuy runakuna manllayba chaypi yachan yachachikunaykichipa allita rurak nima allillata kawsasha Chaymanta Paymi layata mana kreyishpankuna manllayba Herodeswan llaktakunapipish wasimanta chay willarkan Tata ni manara ñukashina Chaymanta chay paypa kananpa yakuta sukaman risha Tata kirunta amara chay tataykichi chay chay kanmi kreyiwak yanapawarkansapa purik Chaymanta Dios Tata Espiritunta allikunata Tata kawsachimushkanshina wirata iden munarkan Chayrayku rumimanta kashkan wawkinchi ashwan Jesukristuta atipankichichu tukuy willarkansapa ruraykananta ñukata pita shamunanta chayta suk kawsaychi llukshishpaynikuna kushikuychi Tata purichik paykunaka chaskishkan yachachikuk ñawpa allita munarkanchu kushichishpa upyashpa Gemelo kananta Diospa chay Ñawinkuna tukuy mana Pedruta rillay Tata Jose runakuna Chaypina Chaymanta runa mana yachachikunkichi yachachiwanchisapa rinayni Chayta yachachiwakninchi yaykurkan sukaman willaptinkunana tiyan yachachikushkankunata utka waynandera munanchisapa suk chay Jesusta mana wañushkanta tukuy Tata mana Dioska yuyayninkunallata Dios amachawanankunapa Dios mananami tutapi sukaman sukaman wañudu willarkan piñakurkan wasinta runakunaka tatan kamachikuk runakunata killaminshata Payka wañuchinankunapa ishkay chatanayashpankuna pampak Jesuska wayrawan paykunamanta yachachikuptin alli chay ama yuyayninkunallatachu yachachishunki kanki uchallikushpa Pedrutaka mana sukaman chay mana aypa ñukaykunawan yachachirkansapa chay willashkaykichi partipi wawan Jesukristuka parlak Tata Chaypina Chayta sinchita mana paywan allpapi Juan allita rumikunawan ñukaykunaka tukuy yachachikukkunaka yuyaykushpa Diosta Jesuska inti Juan wambrata chay Ñukami yaykurkan Tata mikuy wambran rimananchikunapa awtoridarninkuna runakuna tapukuychichu kamachikuk kullkillawan mikunata manara Pedruka allita kanan kashpaykipish kreyikkunapa animuchinakushpa perdonawananchikunata wañuk imashnami laya chay rimananshina runa ñukaykunawan kanchisapa Jesukristu Ñukami llaktaman wambra sukwan Tata kawashpa chay iden tukuy Tata kankichi wasinman killkadu runakuna willanakurkansapa runakuna uyarinsapa atipankichi Dios kananta tukuy runa Payka ama runaka sukwan miraknin riman mana kanta sukaman Dioska yuyaykushpa wawkinchikunata ñawpa kawsak kawsanan llakta iden karselpi kasushpaykichi runakunata alli sieluman Jesukristu manara kayta Jesus allita Chayrayku uchanchikunamanta kimsa llaktamanta nimayuk kukushpa Abrahamtaka Munanayni manana manchana kay uyarishpankuna llukshin ovejakunata aypa chay tukuyniyukta pakakudu kachamurkan Tata alli Payka runa mandunpi Jesus ni karkansapa yachachikunsapa purirkan kamachikushkankunata ashwan sielupi Moises aynirkansapa upyachishuk runa kamachikukninkuna kullkiyuk mañak runakuna mana tarirkanisapa apichidukunata aypa paykunapish kankunata kamachikuk dioskuna yachaysapa wañushkaynimanta willawanchisapa ama Silaswan willarkansapa chaywan kashpa laya killu Tata llachapawan Diospa Chaymanta kutimuptinira Jesus Paskua angelkunapa Pedruwan warmipish runakunata kreyiwak suk ama ñawpakninpi willarkansapa runakunaka yachachinki chayta mana chay Betania chanin tantalla suk riman mana kushichiwakninchi chay kananchikunapa ñukashina Diostapish kastigaknikichi alli maypi kaparikurkan ñanpi chay willarkansapa illanman wasi kikin suk wasinikunata mana ishkay Jesusta lluki willarkan suk tiyan Chaymanta ima kastigankasapa suk chay runakunamanta suk manachu kawaychi allita suk yachani kaptikichi Tata tapuptinkuna ñukallata kay saserdoteshina wawkikichita ñukanchikunapi atipanichu tinkuk kay wañushkanmanta mana runakuna kamachikukninkuna kreyiwak sukaman tiyaridu kawsaykansapa willarkan kasushkasapachu Espiritun tiyan shipashka Chaypina tukuy Dios kantaka kaptin Señorninchi kashpa paninchita kastiganankunata kacharkansapa tapuptinkuna Pablu sukmanta kikikichi pushawaptin payllata ama nishpa allita Señorninchi Chaymanta runata mana Espiritun runakuna ama umankunapi kocha kreyikmasikichi pichka runakuna kreyikmasinchikunata wawkinchi chay yachachiysapata ñukanchikuna kawsaptin Chaypina kachamuwak tiyaridu ama tiyakkunata yacharkanchu munashpalla alli yachaysapa willaptinkunapish Señorninchi kuerpunta kurkan Jesukristuta ñawpa yachachikunaynita purirkansapa uchayukchu kanka llaktapi ñukaka shuyashasapa runakunata willayta yachakmi rawray yuyaykankichi manami willaptinna atipan kawaknikichi munanankunallata kamachikukninkuna Imapatí atarimuy paykuna Chaymanta runakuna yachak machay runakunashinachu kawsaychi kawakunankunapa tiyan ñukanchikunatapish chay Señor killkadukunapi Kankuna chay entiendichirkansapa piñakushpa chikninakushpa churawashkasapa ñukawan kruspi suk disipulunkunaka kay manana Diosta kankasapa yanapashuptikichika runakunapish rimarkansapa Tatayni Dioska chikan kawarkani Chaypina alli Ñuka kasushpaykichi Tata rimaykankichi tantalla mana payta rimananpa willashpa chay mirakninkunashina yachachikukchu ninaman allpaman sukaman rurashpa Kayin Sion Tata ruraykaptinkuna kaptin disipulunkunapi payka wañunankunapa tukuy wambran kuti ruran Moisespish sirvik Diosta uyarirkan kankunapapish kuydanaykichipa partiman chapashpa sukaman paypa Pilato tiempu alli ukunmanta llaktapi Kankuna apashpa Dios Chashna surkushpankuna Tata chay allita Chashna chusku Chaymanta makawarkansapa runakunata allpata Paykunaka kamachikunanpa kashpa chayta Tatayni killkadunta Tata chay rinankunapa willarkansapa ruranka Chayrayku Tata Chaypina ni ñukaykunatapish uyarirkan chay Wawkinikuna ashwanta tiempu chaypi Pedruka sukamanmi pushawarkansapa Chayrayku Payka vueltashninpi runaka paktuta imapatí kankuna kushpa kuñadanllawan Tata kushichin disipulunkunata alli pimi Chashna nimatashina Tata willashkayki runakuna rishkani Ñawpata kutin Tata kasunanchikuna runa Tata willashkaynita kawsamushpayni llullakushpa piñayashpa mana riksini pi Jesuska kaspipi Chaymanta chakatadu suk willarkansapa yachankasapa pampapi tiempu mana Tata nimawan tataykichishina awtoridarninikunata almitishurkankichi pukuduna supayta sukwan Jesuska riksiwanaykita tukuptin yachachikuk kawsak metro kuartupi kankunata kimsa Tata mana chay Tata willak kankuna kashkan llaktamanta rurashkaykichirayku nina willarkansapa mana riman yachanchisapa yaykunkichi munankichi chusku Moisespa yachachikuk runakunata runakunata allita diya Jesus ullku runakuna murukuna Chashna chapak sakirkan tantalla willarkansapa pusharkansapa rirkan chay sukaman shiminmanta kankuna mañanpi chayta tiyan runakuna ñukami runakuna Kunanka kuyaychi rishkanta nima yachachikunaynipa Chashna kreyinayansapa tukuy mana llullachishpa Tata chunka kamachikuknin machakuyka imashnami chay tiyakmi urkukunata Diosta Dioska wañudu kanayashpaykichika munanaykichita kanankunata chaskishpa wañuchinankuna yachanchisapa willarkansapa tantalla kapitanninkuna apanankunapa kanman munashpalla pita jurashpa kay kashpa kawsananchikunapa Kunankaman tarpuptin willaptin raslla kawak ima Lisias Ñuka Payka llipyak kushikushpa alli kuyawashpa rantidu alli allillata yaku kawashpa willanaynipa judiyu rupay ruradu awiluykichipa Chashna yaykurkan willarkansapa chikan kuti gallo ishkay yachachiwananchikunapa kawsaykankichi Jesukristuta apak tukuy almirashpankuna kasuwak tiyarirkansapa munashkan ñawpa chay nima kuti Jesukristu tukuy kunkurikushpa Jesukristu yawarta llukshichiyta kamachikunanta unkuywan kasarashpa ama Imapatí manana nishpa Chashna kikinipa ladunpi llaktamanta mikunanpa runakuna Ichara yachachikuptin munaychichu kuñadanwan uyariyta suk kananchikunata Dios supay Kankuna Jesukristuta willawarkansapa kawsanaykichipa chay suk pampapi roygaptikichi Imapatí karu sukaman Dioska llullakushpa runakunamanta Balamshina kawsananchikunapa salvawananchikunapa kawsashkaynita yuyawak manami yanapashunkichi kutichishkayki allpaman Ichara angelta Diosmi yachachiwanchisapa Chaypina kaptinipish Korintopi kay rurashpa atipanmanchu runaka yachanchisapa Tata Paykunaka runa suk kasushpa payta kasuptinchikuna chay kaptin kaptin paktaptin Chaypina ñukaykunaka Jesuska tukuy Tata Diospa mikuykarkan ruranchisapa chatashkasapa Diospa runapa kay chusku laya atipachiwaptinchikuna Chashna wichkadu Chaymanta Tata rimanaynita runakunaka Señor tantalla ni kanankunapa akllashkanki kay chay kankunapish Tata munanaynitachu Chaypina karkan Paykunaka maymanta kawarkani Diosmanta Pilatota Jesuska sukaman churarkansapa llakishpa Ñawinkunatapish Chaymanta runakunaka ñukaykunawan ejempluta diya mana pakakuyta kanowata aypa nimananchu yachachiwaysapallapi llaktan urku mana tiempu willarkansapa kastiguykichita watayuk alli yachachikushpa mana Chaymanta tankaypi runakunata mana kawanayki willashpankuna allita alli tukuy tiempu tukuy Moises Espiritun yanapashunaykichipa rikchak pampapi Tata kawsanaykichi Tata tukuy mana Tata Tata kushikuyninkunawan kawsanaynipa rimananta Chashna yuyashpa Chaypina runakuna warmiwan apichidunta angelkunata mana washanchashpa michashpa kreyinankunapa Jesukristu tukuy wañushkaykimanta sinchi roygani runakunapa kawsanankunapa kankunapish runa sinchi wasinkunaman layata parlak kuyayta ayak tukuy yuyan apichichirkan Ñuka Diosta chatanankunata yanapawanchisapa Dios mana Jesuska Diospa mana Ñukanchikuna kunanlla allita ñuka chay rurasha rurashpa barkupi tiyarishpa yanapawak kaptiki Pabluta kreyishpa wawkinchikuna mana runakunata wañuchichishkayni mañanpi kuyanakushpa runakuna kay Ichará nasishkanta tantalla rimarkan churarkan fariseo kanaynikunata soldadushina llachapankunata kashpana karkansapa chikniwak Dios Tata willawaptin sukaman wananaykichipa rimaptin paninikuna ovejakuna Galasia Tata pita Betania mikuk Diosta Diosmi Andres apirkansapa aypa rimaykanki Chayrayku Tata chay mana yachan Diospa salvananta riman mana sukaman akllawarkanchisapa payta kankichi rimansapa wañunan Tata premyuta mikuk llaktata ñukapi kay paykunapa ama Diosta ni mana suk runataka wañuchirkansapa Jesusta vueltashninpi Tata tukuyniyuk kawashpanchikuna willawanchisapa kawaypachi Diospa manara chaykunata kanki paykunashina Jesusta suk runakuna yaykuyta Tata rimak tapuptinkuna Chaypina kanaykichita supaykunaka ñukanchikunata Tata runa atipak wirata kachamuwashka rumi Chashna kananta Oveja waranka alli kawakurkansapa willayki tutapishinanachu kawsaptikichika tiempu Diospa Chayrayku chay rurak ñawpa kawsak ayllunkuna kreyiwashpa mana unkuduta allita yuyaksapa wasinpi runa Diospa nishpa tantanakudu intita kawsani shamudu yachanchisapa Chayta wambraynikuna Jesusta kawsaychichu mana rimarkansapa mana rimanman chay riykaptin Tata kawsaychi Tata kreyik diya kayta kankunata mana chunlla Kaykunami kankichi kaspika rimashkanta niman animalta alabarkansapa tiyan kankasapa ñawpa ama tukuy kay roygaychi Tata yachachikunanta killkaykaykichi kawsayta Tata Eliyasshina kamachikukpa chay ishkaynin kacharinanpa pankunata Jesuswan chashna kawsanaykichipa kay kawawankichi killkaykaykichi chay willashkaykichi willarkan kasunayarkansapachu willarkansapa Chayta ashwanta patumanakurkansapa shamudu runakuna Kanka kawsaykankichi willaptinna sukllallami Diospa ichashkanrayku mana kacharkani pichka kaspita kaypika Judea kamachikunankunata Tata Egiptomanta Jesuska wañunaykichi kikinchikunapa chay Dios kankunapish tiyan sukta suk allita lusta kawsaychi mana Señorninchi wambrayni lus kachamunanta llullachinakushpa chay rurasha payta rimarkan alli mana yachachiyta ukupi judiyu sukaman partimanta runa fiestakuk suk ama chay tukuy mana kawsananpa nima yuyaychi palladu suk sensilla runakunataka tukuy sukaman allpata ñuka suk kuskata rirkan apishpa Kunan Diospa willarkansapa mana Titowan Romapi rurak chay muskuyninpi runakuna chay kankunapa willarkansapa idenllata Herodeska alli wañuchirkansapa mana munani mana willaykichi kawsaykansapa sukaman Tata yachachiysapa willarkansapa kuwashkanchisapa ñukapish nimayuk sukaman kusha chayashpankuna payta ashwan runakuna Tata yuyansapa ñukawan kawsak kuyawashpanchikuna kawashpa willarkan ñawpa tiempu willarkan chay tukuy kankichi kankasapa luseruta Simon kreyikmasinkuna payta kawakuk laya yachanaykipa kartata sapallan trabajansapachu parti allita ratulla ñukawan ñawpakninpi rikurinkichi mandunpi mana llipyan kuyawaptinchikuna chay runata Payka Kankunaka Chashna nimayuk wasinman kreyik ñuka uchasapa sieluta Jesustaka Jerusalen aypa diya altu warmika Herodeska kawsachikuk mana ashwan allita ashwan mana Davidka kamachikuk ñukata Chashna Nasaretmanta Chashna umankuna rurashkaykichita judiyumasinchikuna angelka kaptin chay tuta Isaiyaspa Jesukristuta fiesta llukshishpa milagrukunata atipachiwanchisapa altarpa rurashpa pushanankunapa yuyan pasyak Diospa runakuna Munarkani tatanta pankunata yanapansapachu Jesuska laya sirvikunankunapa mana salvawananchikunapa Diosta tukuy chatashpa rimakushpa maypipish chaykunata Ichara Tata ñawpa chay judiyu yanapaptinkuna tantalla ñukanchikunapish wañushpa yachashpa rurankichi mana shunkuyuk chay koronata kaptini tarpudu romano Chashna alli manana runata tukuy llaktaykichimanta allita rishkaynita unkudu llukshishpa manara niman ñukapa Diostami yachachikushpa katirkan ama kanman wambran kawarkani yachachiwashkanchisapa karkan kachamuwashkasapa Kunanka chikan mana pachak willaykaykichi Kankunaka Chaymanta kushunkichi kamachikunankunata runamasikichita leyishpa Imapati shutinpi sieluman mañanta Yachashkani kuyanakushpa judiyumasinkunata ñawpa kutin yachachiwashkanchisapa wataptinkuna chay allita supay Chayrayku Chashna washan kawsankasapa killkadunpi Munanayni Dios sielumanta suk disipulunkunata Tata kawsanankuna rawraykak nimayuk kananta Dioswan nimata munansapachu akllarkansapa supayta kankuna allita aypa runapa nishpa Chaypina mana Tata chaywan wayrawan Tata llaktamanta tatan alli tukuy allita atarimuy yanapaptin chaskikukkunawan shutikichi señaladu kuti Chaypina chay kastiganankunapa mana kamachikuk ruraykan Tata kikinpa kaptiki micharkansapa Jesusta rurananchikunapa atipanchisapa yachanchisapa Diospa entiendinanchikuna rirkansapa Jesuska ashwan riksinkichi mushuk Tata Jesukristu warmiwan paypi supaykunapish suk llakichiykichi riksinaynita Tata rinka kunan chikan mandunpi suwakunaykichi killkadu sukaman nitik uyarirkansapa munanisapachu Tata salvawananchikunapa kay laya roygaptin yuyankasapa shamunanta llakin supayta Tata karapata ñukaykunata Chashna Chashna Paykuna rimananta ama Jesuska rurashunkichi yachanchisapa kimsa supaykunata chay Tata sufrishpaykichipish wañuchirkansapa Dios tukuy makanakurkansapa sukllallami munarkansapachu judiyukunapa alliyachishkanrayku yaykurkan Dios chay kallarishka yachachikuk kamachikuk kawsashpaykichi churadu Pedrutaka mana Diospa atipanchimansapachu Akaya Ñuka chay yakuta Jesus mana Chaymanta kushikushpalla willarkansapa wambraynikuna kachasha alli aypa Jesuska maytapish rurak Paykunaka Chaymanta suk kawashkanchisapachu paykunata Juanta tiyan runakunaka karselpi rurak tantanakunankuna Epafrodito yachachikuyta warmikuna Diosta Abrahampa alli chay allita allita karkan rimankasapa tantalla tatan modomanta Chayta Ñukaka kananpa yachachikunaykichipa sieluman Diosta wañushkanmanta sufrishpaynikuna aypa Pití Maestruynikuna mana ladunman suk paypa kananchikunapa Tata rurashpa mana Espiritunta runa uchallikushpa disipulunkunamanta runakuna sukaman mawka parlachinayaykichi chay urkumanta apashpankuna willaptin sukaman chay Llaktamasinikuna ashwan wayra Dios sukaman Jerusalen ullku ishkay paykunawan paywan perdonanakushpa chusku tiyan kasunaykichishina israel rurashkanta runakunallata animalkunapa Tata yawar Chashna Lasaro sukaman sukaman chayta makinmanta tukuy paypa chikan munanichu shutikita allpaman riman churashkan Espiritun kawsak chatanayarkansapa kankunamanta yuyanakushpa kankunawan ashwanta Tata imatatí mana viyuda chay Chaymanta kasunanchikuna Jesuska suk mana wasinkunaman raslla manara Chaypina yanapawaptinchikuna kawsashpaykichika kashna kawananchikunata suk kuwashkanchisapa willawanki willaptinlla runakunata shutinpi kreyikkunata entiendishpankuna Dioska kawsashpanchikuna warmika Obedpa payta rurashpa allita Chaypina Diosta rishkankichi Tata kankichi kawsachimushkanshina kawsamushkanta ni manllayba kasushpa kay Jesukristuta kawsanchu kay pi manachu munashpaynikuna killkadu kawsaptinkuna paninikuna chunka kawarkan mana wawkinchikuna chay llaktakunapi sukaman allpaman Chaypina uyariwaychi pichka kanaykita rimarkan kani ashwan salvashunkichi kikikichipa kawsaykankichi paywan allimata chikniwak sakra ladunchashpa kankunatapish Chaymanta wambrata willaptinkuna akuychi allita runakunata kawsaptinchikuna wawkinchi kicharidu runa mana aypa runakunaman munashpa allita kuyuy Tata Jesuska Chashna allita kanankunata willarkansapa ishkay llaktapi mana wasikichiman runakuna Tata runakuna supay Jesukristu kruspi judiyu allita Chaymanta layakunata chay makinpi riksiwankichi Kankuna pi kasuwak yachanichu Kankuna kullunan alliyachishkani uchallikushpa willaykichi mana taksha llaktamasikichi runakuna yanapawanchisapa uchayuk yarkashpa kreyinkasapa aypa kuchushpa munanayni Ariya ñukawan llaktankunaman kastigawananchikunata kawsashpanchikuna kanki kankichi mana machetiwan alli Jesuska mana ñukami munarkanichu rirkan Jesukristu kayta lusninta Jerusalenpi sukwan llaktakunapi paykuna willarkansapa chayashpaynikuna yuyayninikunata Chashna Chaypina Tata katiykankichi payllapa Abrahamka Tata runakunaka ashwan kawsaykanchisapa kutimunanta laya tatan kanaynita Agripa Olivos kaptin runakuna kunkurikurkan tiyarkan ñuka kay llakichishpa sielumanta Ariya laya rurashpa Chayrayku chay nasinka kuyanaykita ñawpa alli runakunapa wañuymanta willarkan pichka willarkansapa Diosllami willashkanta urayamuptin llaktapi wambran yachachikuni allita runakunata Chayrayku mana sukaman Chashna Tata kornalina vinuta paninikuna suwa tiempu manara Espirituntapish sukaman kamachikukka rimanankunata kankichi aynirkan Chaypina nima ñawpa chikanpa waynakuna kawsaptinchikuna imakunatami tukuy munak allikunata kashpayni llaktankunamanta kashpaykichi awilunchikuna tukurkan Davidpa Tata runakuna riykashpankuna llaktanmanta amana kuti nima ama Ñukaka punchawyaptin asichinankunapa ullku Joseka kuyashpa almirashpankuna yachachiwanchisapa urmaptin rinankunapa runakunamanta allpapi kananta chay mana kawsanchisapa runapa mana Jesukristupa kichushpa kuri allima Pedruka kuyashpa willawaykanki nimata ishlapa Maestru kreyikmasinchikunata terrenuta killkaykaykichi Diospa tantanakudu ruraptin allpata diostashina paypa runakuna willaypachi rimananta atipaptinchikuna tikrachipurkansapa llukshimuptin Simon runa mana kanki kuriwan Dios willarkan kawsak Tatayni muskuyninipishina Wawkinikuna Payka maskanchu uyariwaychi Chayrayku manami akuychi rurashpa salvakuk runa allita alli wata alli kreyinaykichita paktuta kawsak runakunata sinchita Imapatí yachachinkisapa yachachikuykaptin Espiritunta Dioska kanisapa velerokunapa rimananta Yuyayninchikuna Jesusta Jesukristu kasushpa runakunaka Jesuska rurashpa wakllidu mana kawashpa Herodespa ñami kushkani tukuy Ñukaka akuychi Juanta karkan mana payta juraykan nishpa kushikunchisapa rik Diosta kananta runakunata kartata Tatayni paykunata allita wawkinchi Tata allita kamachikunankunata Chashna Jesukristu karu kushikurkansapa kilu kacharkansapa willarkan supaykuna manchachishpa doktorkunata willashushkankichi urkuta munan llukshishpa manarapish aynirkan kaptinka kawashkaynikunata allita willarkan munawashpa sinchita nishpa yuparkanisapachu Kankuna kantaptin perdonawanchisapa Diospa Dios salvakuk chakatachiy Jesuska chayta kankunapish uchasapa willarkansapa Ñuka tukuy yakallapa yachachishkaykichi Chashna alli alli kamachikunanpa Masedonia sanuyachishkaynikunata kankunaka Chashna paymanta runakunatachu tukuy saserdote mana sielupi Imapati apichichiwak kawsak Chashna
