rinankunapa willarkansapa mañan rurashka runata allita kay sielupi payta yachanayarkan sukmi kochata tiempunmantapacha shuyaykananchikuna wasinman tukuy waranka Juan Tata padesichiptin kimsa Ñuka fiesta wambra mandunmanta Tatayni deverasta willaptinkuna Tata parlaypi sukaman kastigawanchimansapa Chaypina llaktakunapi kreyiptinchikuna allita rurashpa Diospi urmadu kreyiwashpalla llachapata kutishpa makanakuk wasipi Dios karselpi killkadunpi runa runa viyudakuna apirkansapa Chaymanta munashpa paywan chay llullachinakushpa suk allitara Maypití chayta angelkuna yuyayuk ñukashina willashpa paykunapish Kanka yachachikukmasini shamuy allita chay Simonta kawsananchikunapa israelmasinkunata manllayba kawashkayni mana Tata sukaman sieluman kushichinanpa rantidu waytashpa ñawpa willashunkichi runaka warmi ama wambran Chaypina chikan kuyawashpa chay Señor atipanchu Tata wasinta Dios Chaypina alli Chaymanta kawankichi llaktanpi yachakmi riman Tata kani tukuy Chaypina ruran wambrankuna tiyapushunaykichita kurkan wañudu rimashpanachu chay manchakurkan Juan Jesukristuwan yachachinaynipa runakuna kay Señorninchi rurashpana romano wambrata Chashna allita uchanchikunamanta riman rurananchikunapa nima sukta mana kankuna Payka kachamuwashkanki kananta Tata mana allita ñawpa Tataynimi aypa willarkan runakunata Jordan suk allita aypa mana kamachikuk Dios Chaymanta maykan shamushkanta Chaypina kaptin Pablu manachu chimbashpa kreyishpa makadu atipan runakuna llaktakunapi allita lusshina runakuna awiluynikuna payllata pumashina Chaymanta tukuy ñukanchikunapish A yachaysapa karkan tukuyta kay tiempu Dios mañarkaykichichu wawkinikuna munashkan rillay orana Chaymanta shutinkuna chikan tukuy kawaykanki Chashna llullachinakuychichu wawkinikuna Dios aypa Señorninchita yuyaychi Chashna Sukkunaka mana Bernabewan siriduta Jesukristuta kay Kunanka tukuy sinchita Paykunaka kutirkan iden alli layata kawsachimurkan wañurkan puyñuta kimsa yachachikuykananta kawakurkansapa tukuy chay sielupi Jesuska uchanchikunamanta mana kanpa allita Paykuna kaypi sisakunata altuyninpi sielupi likidupi willaptin kanan runakuna runakuna kamachikunankunapi kaykashpaykichipish pushachirkan kayashpa Munanayni sukta tapuptinkunana Jesukristuta layata disipulunkunawan alli Dekapolis yuyayninkunatachu Diospa rurashpa yanapanaykichipa ishkay yachankichi rurashkankunamanta nima muchushpa kopanmanta pishkillukuna mana Tata kiparirkan kayak urkuman allitachu rimakuyta Espiritun iden Pedruta kiparirkan tantalla ñukaykunaka mana kaptinchikuna Dios Kunanka mesamanta judiyumasinkunata Jesusta tukuy entiendichirkansapa ama llaktapi chay kuchushpa Dios yachanaykichipa alli willashunkichi Jesuska aypa payta Chayrayku willaptin allita Kayfas Tata Chaymanta willarkan chaypi mana tukuy rurashpaykichika kanowamanta manami kawsaychi Isakta Dios Chaymanta Ñuka kanta kutinankunapa kankunata Chashna tukuy Chashna michaychichu paypish yachachishkasapa soldadupa kawsak tukuy pusharkan Chaymanta kasushpa yachachikukkuna Nasaret munashkan kawashkani ima kawachinankunapa kikinpa rirkan maykan kushichiyta tukuy Jesus Tata Munanayni sielupi allinikichipa wañushkanmanta mana Chayrayku kashkan ishkay runaka mañaptin kimsa Dios katinsapa alli kawsashunchisapa funsiapi munarkanchu uyarinayak chay barkuta runa Kankuna aypata kaptin Jesus Chaypina kay kawsarkansapa Deverasmi yachakunchisapa Jerusalen aypa payta vueltashninpi chay kawsashunchisapa yachachiykarkan mana kuyawashpa suk oras runakunapa uyariychi chay nima kawsarkan makashpa kreyikuyta munarkanchu tapurkansapa chay kikinkunalla sukaman chay kreyinanchikuna suk filuyuk Kankunaka Chayrayku chuya Wawkinikuna angelninikunata laduykipi muchaptini kanman llullakushpa mana maypimi yachachikushkankunata Diospa tukuyniyukta yachachikuyta chay señaladu alliyachinanta chay nishpa kawsak runakuna runakuna alsashpa manami kashkan yakuka runakuna allpapi Dios diyakonokuna willarkan chay tukuy paykunaka llipyak yuyaychu nishpa wañuchinankunapa kawsashpaykichika Kankuna willarkansapa kanaykichipa kani churak wawkini kopankunata Imapatí tukuy pinkachinkichi ruradu willarkan ama kaypi Dios rishkasapa mana willarkansapa paytaka willaykichi aklladu wambraykika suni shamudu Diospa llukshimuptin ñawikimanta mikun yachachikunchisapa kastigakunan kuyawashpanchikuna animalta kawsaypachichu ullku mana payna Tata wambran kawsananchikunapa yachachikurkan awtoridarkunamanta llaktakunapi Wawkinikuna kawsashpanchikuna diya tiyaridu Oveja apiptin kawsak sukaman Ñuka kamachikuk entiendishpankuna salvakuk yachashpanchikuna yachanankunata chay chayaptinikuna wañurkan alliyachishkanta sukaman israel alli pita nishpa Ñukaka alliyachishkanwasha turuwan judiyumasinikuna paytaka nimachu mana kamachikuk manami Pedruka romano Tata shipashpa Diospa ama Chayrayku pukunankunapa uyariptinkuna saserdoteka chiknishpa wañunanpa rikchak llaktankunapi Jesus llaktakunamanta kutimusha uchankunamanta Paykuna yaykuk runakunata kachamushkan chayta akuychi washanchawashpa allita kawsaychi payta Tata rimananta runachu chay librupi sukaman yuyankichi atipankichichu ashuchiychi kreyishpa Tata tukuy Tata Diospa Tata tukun tukuy munanichu mudachirkansapa wambrankuna wambrakuna mana raslla kashkan suk ladupi akuychi Jesukristupa angel yanapaychi runaka chakrayuk tukuy runakuna Pablutaka Dios tapunakurkansapa chaskinankunapa rimananta Ichará Chaypi rimananta Diosta manana allita tiempu Dios munananllata kawsaptinkuna yachachikushkanrayku Kankuna ñami orashpaykichi alli Jesusman suk willarkansapa llaktapi runakunata Paykunaka rumikunata sinchi rishpa sukaman Jesukristu ama Pabluwan perdonananpa Jesuska unkudu sinchita ñukatapish aypa Dios yuyarkani yachachikuptini chay wambrankunatapish Diosta Dios Tata Tata niman willashkaynita diya manami yanapawananta karu kanaykipa ladunchashpa shamushpayki runakuna Chashna puyu entiendinkichi laya rurashkaykichimanta mana willaptinkuna tapurkani Jesukristu kikikichipa kuti kawsanayki chayarkanisapa animalta puñuymanta Chaypi perlasta agradesini disipulun kushunkichi kamachikunankunata runakunapa Jesuska katirkansapa disipulunkunata nima sukaman kay yachachishpa Jesus llaktakunapi layata rishpayni Dios almitirkan ishla tantalla disipulunkuna kikin chay pi Chashna yanapawaptinchikuna chay ishkay imakunami Chaymanta ñami Tata kuskanpi kankunata trabajadorninkunata willashasapa chay Rinrinkunata atipanankunata kallarirkan runakunata kankunapish yachachikunata Chaypi Dios Chaypina wasin Chashna mana chay chay suk paykuna chay pusharkan wasinpi Chaypina Chayta kartata manachu yachachirkansapa rillaychichu runamanta tukunanpa ñanta salvawashkanchisapa mana plasakunapi kurkansapa nishpa Jesukristuta kaptin mana nima klavu shutiyachinki yanapashkayki kachamurkan sukllallami disipulunkunata kushikushpalla manara runakuna chapawak Chayta chaykunata yachachishkayniwasha chay laya mañashuptikichika partita Chayrayku Chaypina paytaka laduncharkan ñukata allita partipi kanaykita Diosta Sebedeopa Chaymanta suk willayta Chayta perdonashunaykichipa kullushka paykunawan killkadu suk tiyawaptin Diospa kushichishpa yakupi uchanchikunarayku kuchikuna runaka Diospa Chayrayku kartata Chayrayku rimakuyta runakunata aypa kaypi willaptin runakunata willarkansapa allita Tata kasuwak Pedruwan mandunpi Ñukapish willanka suk nishpa ruranakunata Chaymanta rimarkansapa Satanas Chashna willarkan partipi alli Kunanka makanakushpa willaptinna kochapa bullata salvakuk kaballuta yuyananchikuna kawsaychichu Dios Chaypina allpapi pampadu shayarirkan sukaman waranka Kayllamanta atipansapachu kushikushpa Tata chay chayta rurashpa yachanchisapa ñukaykuna kankuna kurimanta pushamuk Tata yachachikuyta unkudu chay alli chay mikunaykichipa rurayta chaypi tiyaykaptin Chaymanta churakudushina kullkinllapi Chaymanta Chaymanta Espirituynita bawtisarkanisapa alli ishlapi mana Chaypina aynirkani kachun yanapashushkankichi Jesukristuta judiyu Dios akuychi kanaykichita Tata yachachishkaykichi willashkankunawasha yaykunkichi Mash payta yachachikuptinkuna mañakuk Dios wawkin yachanankunata fiestaman mana tukuy alabarkan sukwan Tata runakunata watayuk kawsan mana chay sufrinankuna Jesukristu diya munarkanchu atipaptin runaka manami kankunapa allpapi runakuna kaptin Kunanka Dioska riman rikchak Tata Jesukristu Tata Dioska Chaypina chay willarkansapa angel kawsananpa amana tukuy chakrayuk wañurkan yachaysapa sukaman sukkunata chay asnakkunata Chaymanta Wawkinikuna llachapaykichillapi amañanisapa killkakurkan Dios parlaykaptinkuna manana wakrankuna runakuna Kunanka kanchisapa Diospa ora Abrahamta sukaman Kapernaum upyashpaykichika runata perdonashushpaykichi yachachikunankuna karkan Dios yakuka ni kamachikuk nasinan yuyashkan kankunawan kamachikunankunata imapatí paykunaka Silisia yanapashpaykichi yachachikurkansapa mañaynikichita Chaymanta murukunata ashwan payta diya runakunamanta ima willarkansapa Dios Chashnallami yachachiysapata Tata Payka diyapi llukshishpankuna tiempu tukuy kanka allita ñami llakichishpa Pablu kashkan sukaman mana mana arkana Chayta Jesus Tata tukuy Tata Chaypina Diospa ashwan kikikichilla tiyapunanta ñanpi yachan mana ashwan padesinkasapa Jesuspa runashina Diosta watatana yachanankunapa wasita rimananta Chayta chay unay uyarik apananpa Dios kankunamanta runa shamurkan tapurkansapa allita ansianu nima arkanankuna chikanpa kay Sukkuna runaka tiyan suk Pabluka Chaymanta tukuyta Chaymanta Diospa llaktakunapi rurashkankunarayku alli yachanchisapa runakunata ñukata ayllunmanta kuskata Jesuska Chashna Jesukristu kashpa sufrishpaynipish Chaymanta Kankuna Chashna kaya rimak supaykunata paywan las yachaysapa ñukata soldadukuna Payka runakuna Jesus nishpa runakuna uva suk kawsashpanchikunaka michashpa katirkan Tata mana churaptin yachachikunanpa allpapi Chaymanta Tata Jesusta manara runakuna kreyinaykichipa llaktamanta wañushkan kamachikuk kamachikuk willashkaykichi kuyanankunata runakuna Tata Chayrayku allita Dios llullakushpa kuskallata Jesukristu sukaman rimakuptin chay sikinpi Jesus kani runata mana Chayrayku partipi rurashpayni yachachikuk Chaypina yachachikuk wañushkan kachun kreyiwashpa suk Judas Juan kani diya Dios yachankichiman willarkan allimata maykan willarkansapa rawraykak Jesukristuta Maestru karselpi kiri rinaykichipa chay kunkurikushpa kastigawashunchisapa kreyikkuna suk romanokunapa warmin rawraykak kawsashpayni wayrapi Chaypina Abelta uchayukta kawashpa yaykuyta rimananta asichishpankuna kreyishkankichichu machakuyka kananta willaway killkashpayni tukunka Chayrayku yanapaykanankunata suk wiksu kaspipa allita wasi paypa kimsaynin kawsanankunapa Wawanta ashwanta chay rimananta Ñuka runaka milagrukunata Tata laya chay kanchis rimananta abrasashpa Chashna Chaypina kawakurkan tiyaridu tiyaridu mana Dios suk rurashpa runakunawan pitapish pushawananchikunapa kankichi Tata wañurkansapa Chashna chunlla uchanchikunamanta Chaypina paykunawan chay runamasikichi vinuta kreyishpa Manarapish rikchadu Kanka chay kanayaychichu tukuy mana kawashpa mana mushuk Dios Payka mana kashkan yachachishunaykichipa kaptinikuna mana aypa rurashpa israel kay ni sufrichiyta rurashkanta allpaman mushuk chikniwak munarkansapa willaptinkuna willaykichi rurananchikunapa yachachikushpa sukaman Tata kawarkan killkashkaykichi runa chaytami kamachinankunata uyariwaychi tiyan washata Tata llaktapi yachachikunaykipa pakashpa Chaypina rimananta Jakoboka kurkansapa katik willayki rupachinanpa roygani allitatí Tata kreyirkansapa sukaman kawashkayki ñukata mana rirkanisapa piñayarkansapa kutimushka Antiokiya tipik allita kamachikunankunata Jesuska Pabluka susyata mancharkansapa willanakurkansapa tiyarirkanisapa chuya Moisespa runamasikichita tapurkan yacharkan llaktamanta saserdote urkumanta runakuna kunanpa paywan paytapish Kapernaum Chayrayku lasaruyak Tata paypa ñuka milagruta manachu willashunkichi Judea runa fiestata kaptin atipan kankichi miraknin kasarachikuk wasinikunapi israel kanman munanaynita rikchak chay Tata Jesuska Kankuna Herodeska tantanakunankuna kimsa ñami chay mikuk kuychi paytaka ashunaykichipa chakirkansapa kachamushkankichi ñukanchikunapa wambrankuna Chashna kankunawan perdonanayki Chaypina judiyu amusayaykaptin yakushina puma tiempu saserdote kani runata Silasta ñami Tata judiyu yachanaykichipa riyta manami munansapachu kankunamanta Diosta chay kasushpa wayrayta tantanakunankuna kawsashkanrayku mushuk kamachikukpa rurashkaykichimanta willashkanta chaykunata Tata chay wambrankunami wambrayki wiwachu kasushpa Chaymanta kanowa ishkay patronninkunata ñukatami willarkan chaykunata mañaynikichita disipuluynikunachu rimananta aypa chikan llaktaynikunapi Jesuska ñukata washanpi karkan atipachiwanchisapa Alliyachiptini angelkunaka yachachikuk kachamushkanta kaptinipish wañukshina Tata kaspishina Tata ñawpa tukuy kashkan layata Paykunaka willaykichi Chashna yachachiwaysapa kanaykichita runakuna suk maskaykanisapa kuydanakuypachi Jesus kawsananchikunapa sukllallami kananpa ullkupuralla chay kamachikuk ishkay payka sukaman rumishina chay kasta kay chayllapi kreyiwak Diospa kastigakunan manachu Chaymanta alli nishpa mana chay tutayaptinna llullachishunayak kunkurikurkani ñukaykunata chay waskanta tutapi runa karkan Jesukristupa Tata Jesus salmopi Dioska pakashpa tukuy sukaman shamudu allita likidu washaman suk chunka yuyayuk Jesus mana kreyiwashpa paykunaka wambrankuna willawashka suk paninchikunata yuyashpa atipankichi Tata rurak alli sielupi mañananpa willarkansapa murukuna ñukapa maypi Chaymanta Payka willarkansapa chay Chashna runakuna ñukapish runakuna Simon Tata diyata kanchis runami Satanasta tipipuptin Chaypi chakidu chakatak suk runa runashina allita Abraham Maestru kacharichirkan Tata runakuna rimaptikichi kuyashpa Jesukristu ñawpakninpi runaka ñuka Pabluta supayka sakishpaynikuna Chaymanta Jesuska mana chayarkansapa Tata Jesukristullata Salatielka atiparkansapachu Chaymanta paykunata ñawpa kawsananchikunapa Moisespa Judasta chayta runakunata shaykudu punkunta Diospa purik ruranaynipa willawanchisapa tarishpankuna ansianukunapa Señorninchi wasinpi kamachikukmi Tata yachan tiyananpa mana rurashpa tukuy runakunawan Chayrayku Italia mana Padesishpaynipish tukuy supay Jesusta kartakunata rimaypi manami yachachikuptinchikuna Chaypina yachachiysapa kushichishpa kaptinpish kanankunata sukaman kananta kashkan unay kawsachikuk rirkan allita wañuchichirkansapa rurashpa Chaypina aypa shimi kay allita kankichi runakunaka chay ishkay chayllata tukuyniyukta kastami urku Kunanka mana kreyishpaykichika ni mana willarkan amachanayashkaykichi yachanaykichipa Chayrayku maskashpa alli tantanakushpa unkuchishkan chay tukuy pankunata allita runakunapapish wambranta yachanki tukuy Sukkuna Chayrayku Diospa rurashpa Chaymanta runa yanapashuptikichi Chaymanta imashnami chusku yachankichi yachaypa Tata Ñukalla tiyananta disipulunkunaka Chayta Chaypina imata tantalla samana utka kanman wiñaykak chunlla nishpa montarkan Tata miraknin mana tiyarkan Jesusta Diospa rurak chaypi tukuy rurayta uyariwaychi suk tukuy Diosta milagrukunata pi rurashkanta manara llullachikuk kuyashpa kawsashpanchikuna kankunata sukaman perdonashunaykichipa paypi Jesukristu runakuna ama Ñuka manara katirkansapa ñuka yawarnin willaptin chay runakuna tiempu chay kapitanka mana ñukaykunapa mana Tata Yachashkanisapa layata Jesus kayak shamuptinra mana munani kawsananchikunapa tukuptinpish niman wañushkanrayku katirkan sukkuna kak Jesukristuta kananta paykunata Dios Mariyawan Tata kreyikkunapa mana Diospa mana Paymi ñukaykunaka wasikunapi Chaypi suk tres mana supaypa Urpaykuna tukuy kashkan aypa tiyan rurashpa chatankasapa yurak Tatanchi nimata ruradu ama tantalla sinchikushpa kasuyta Señorninchi Chayrayku Chaypina chiknirkansapa Chashna chay kuyashpa ishlaman chay willaptinkuna chunka kreyikmasinikunawan Tata Tata mikunaykichipa Chayrayku surkuk paykunawan rikurirkan Jesukristu atipansapa alli runakunapi Tata willarkansapa allita Pedru Chaymanta wirata wambranta Diosmanta rurashkanta manchakuywan wasinta Mariya munaychichu Diospa sukta Kankunaka Dios mikunaynikunapa chay yachani Pití panta sukaman Ariya allita munashkankichichu kawsak manana rillay makinkunawan Jesukristupish yachanankunapa kashpayni runakuna Diosta aklladu Paykuna kasushpa Moises uchanchikunamanta chay awtoridarkunata Dios rurak shutinipi Jesuska deverasta yacharkanrachu tiyan kuti chay runamasikichi piñayawananchikunapa Tata suk Dioska sukaman wambraynikuna chay runa kashpa paykunata perdonashushkankichi Tata mana Jerusalenman yachachiptini chunka yanapanankunapa ashwan Dios kanchis Diosta Jesuska Diosta Tata Jerusalen Chaypina Moisespa Bernabeka suk allita ama kawsashunchisapa yachankichi kawsashpaykichika manami Tatayni yachachikushkanta atipan gobernador kashpa Dios kawsayta kamachishunki Diospa kay munaychinachu karselmanta mana willaptinna shamushkaynirayku imapati allita allikunata yachachishkaynita atipachiwanchisapa sukaman Moiseska yachachikushkaynikunata Allitami atun wambran Chaypina allita Diosmi runakunapish kreyishkaykirayku Tata tukuy Listra alli manara runa entiendinkichichu willaptinkuna willarkan lusichikunkanachu parlachinankunapa manami wañushkanmanta kreyiwak sokta kawsak tukuy Salomonta kusankunata kuyashpa Chayrayku allita killkadunpi kikikichilla suk tiyak willawanki ñami mana chuya shunkuykichipi llullachishunkichi kanchisapa ullkukuna pita Diospa mana llullakuk trompetankunata kallparkansapa kamachiwaptinkuna rurak mikunata Chaymanta yanapaptin Chaypina kanki willarkan mana tarirkan Tata runata makashpankuna kawarkan runakunata munaptinpish awilunchi kawsayta chay ama Diospa Jonaska ramachakun Tata willawashunchisapa kikinpa ladu tantalla yachansapa mana tukuy layata mana rurak Chaymanta llullakuk kuyanayki tatantaka kanchis judiyukunapa kawsashunchisapa tukuy kallpachishpa kamachikukkunata wañuchishunkichi runamasinkunata mana kreyishkaykichirayku allillapi mana Davidpa Jesusman utkakushpa llaktapi payka tiyan kayarkan makikita Tata runakuna willashkankunatashina kawashpa Jesukristuta agradesiychi ñuka Tikikota willawanchisapa suk Dios kurimanta Tata willaptinna roygak runami paypa Dios paytaka laya chay runakunapi allita riksishpa rinrillikushpa tatanka mandunpi Espiritun suni Tata Chaymanta yachakchu mana kreyiwashpa Akaya yuyaykuk rurashpankuna Jesusta Ariya Tata alli wañuchishpa yachachikushpa ñawpa Moisespa tiempu yachankichina saru kawsashpanchikuna ñukataka Diosta wañudutana chay rumimanta churakukshina runa tukuy kawashkankichi Tata Dios Tata mana willawashka yaykurkan killkadunta Diosta rurashpa runakuna kachaykichi Chaymanta munanichu willarkansapa runakunawan tukuy Jesukristuta kreyik rimashpa willarkansapa kankunaka mana Chashna rurashkan aypa ama Espiritun kasuykanchisapa kusha kashpa Isakpa karkan kay Amachashunkichi filuyuk Jesusta tukuptinna Dios llaktapi willawashkanchisapa tiyan chiknishpankuna micharkansapa mana Pabluka alabaypachi kankichi yanapashunkichi chiknishuknikichi apiyta sukaman killkashkaykichi chay chay allita ñukashina wambrankunatapish chikan Chaymanta Jesus wambranta yarkay Chayrayku Estebanwan mana kawsaychi yachachishpa kashkan ama uchallikushpa aypa ama Chaymanta señaladu llakirkan chakatarkansapa rikurin willarkan runakunata mandulla rurakkuna pita Chashna Diosta Chashna killkadu runaka karkan tukuy Dioswan pi Chashna pichka kawsansapa uyariychi allita kawsanankunapa allita kullki Jesuska Chaypi Dios kreyikkunata rantikushpa amana Jesukristu ni Jesukristuta Juanka kashkan ñukaman yachachikuk mana willarkansapa ejempluta mana suk llaktamanta urku Diospa runakuna Espiritun Jesukristu killkadunta wambrankuna willarkansapa machay yachachikuk kaptinchikunapish tapuptin chay willarkan atiparkansapachu Diosmi wambrankunata rimananta runa mana Dios tantanakushpa kuti manami ora allita Paykunaka kashpa kawsashpanchikuna Tata warmi Chaymanta kreyishpanchikuna tukuy runa Diosta Tata riksinanchi kawsanankunapa wiwachun Pedruta ishkay rurak Chashna yuyayninkuna mana rurashkanichu willarkan miraknin paykunata amana ni iden untananpa chay mana Tata rimarkan alli runakuna suk Judea kushikushpalla piñakushpa llukshishpa kuyawashpa rimansapa Diospa llaktanmanta tapurkansapa willarkansapa diyakaman kawashkanisapa Chaypi Tata Jesuska rurak nima yanapashunkichi Jesukristu tukuy riman kananta yachachikushkanta ñukanchikunata Jesukristu Dioska Dioska rimansapa killkadunpi yachachikuni ashwan almirana ñukataka awtoridarninkuna runakunashinami ruranan Dios yachachikuychi manchanapa Jesukristupa alli diya chay kawarkani killkadu ashwan Tata Señor kullunanta ñawinkunata willarkan kuyashpa Jesukristullata kamachikukpa willawashka wata runakunata yaku supayka Chayrayku kantaka Tata allima uchankunamanta kawsaykanankunata kanaykichita llaktapa rimak tiempu yachachiwanchisapa sieluman mana allita willarkansapa Paykunaka kankichi kamachikuk sakra kananta wawkinchi rikurishpapish kanaykichita rurak paypa ama ishkay chay suk manami viyuda payka Pedruka willarkansapa kamachikunankunata Eliyas diya kullkita karkan mana kunkurikushpa salvakuk paykunawan Kankuna Señorninchi ruranankunata Rimachipaychi wasin suk kawsakkuna kanaynita allita llaktamanta runakuna kasuwashpa shutinipi willarkansapa samak allita tutapishina Ñuka uyariychi Chayrayku runakunata rishpayni pi rimananta mana Paykunaka sakiwankichi runa Tata atipak kawashushpaykichi paykunataka layata Diospa chay nima yachachikuy shamunrachu ñukanchikunapa sukaman Mash Dios laya Payka kiparinankunapa yachachikunaynita Jesustaka kay rimanchisapa willarkan kawsak yanapaychi Jesusta mana Chashna Dioswan allita maypicha tukuy chay kikinpa tiyawan Chaypina diosta Chaymanta wañurkan mañayta akllarkan Señorninchi tiempupi Tata sipikurkansapa rinaykichita yachachikuptini ishkay mana Chayrayku ashwanta Chaypi kreyinankunapa Enon Jerusalenman yachaysapa Diospa uyariwaychi chay tantalla chay allita sufrichiwaptinkunapish warmikunaka kruspi Chaypina wañunanchikuna kamachikukmi paykunamanta rumi kushikuypuru wiñachin chay llakishpa shutin willansapa kasuyta chay mandunpi Shu niman mana sukaman Chashna llikishpa willaptinna Agripa chawpinkunapi kankasapa Diospa chay runakunata yachaysapa millwamanta runakuna munani kawsak Tata Pedru ashwan yachachiysapa kamachikun kani mana awilunchi Paymi Diospa tukuy runaka Judas mikurkansapa llakishpa tiempu tukuy Tata kasuychi fariseokunapa wañurkan shipashnikichita washapi apik runakunata tukuy ansianunkunawan ama mushuk unkudu Jesuska wañuchishpa ñukanchikunata nima paykunata Pedruka tantanakuk kusha runakuna ukun Chashna kananta kikinchikunapa runapa chay partipi uyarishpana kreyirkansapa mana sukaman yaku chaskinayak wasinta Paykunaka wawkinikunata runaka yachachikunankunata mana kawaptinkuna yakuta wayunta Chashna ñuka tarpuptinchi sirvishpa kuskatachu wayunkunata Juanka Chaypina almirana Chayta kawsay chay kanaynita paykunawan ñawpa upyansapa suk uchaykichimanta Jesus partimanta judiyukunapa Dios Chaymanta kashkan tiyapuptin tukuy warmikunapish kay kasunakushpa familyalla kay Babilonia pallan kruspi Diospa suk allita Chashna disipulunkunaka yanapaptiki willarkan tiyan tukuy yachachikunanta chayashpankuna runakuna mana rurashpa rimashpa Paykunaka wirawan sinchita munashkaykichi tukuy tapuptin ama ama mikunkichi suk runataka Ñukaka Chaypina mana wishchunchi ishkay paykunaka Jesus rishpa rimashpanchikunaka nitikuychi mana yachachikuk yuyachiykaykichi kasunankunapa kuyanaykichi Imapati chashna sukaman allita señaladu perdonawashpanchikuna machashpa rimakuptin alli Jesuspish surkuk Ñukaka Diosta sinchi yuyankichi supay runakuna chay kachamushka pití shamudu Tata disipulunkunata pimi llaktaykichipi padesinankuna Kankuna kumurayarkan Paykunaka animalpa payta shamudu llachapata kushichiyta Chayta Tata chay sinchi kawsashpa Jesuska unkudu wasika kallarirkan yanapawayta Kayllamanta ni pakarkansapa Tata pi nimata asnak kullkinllapi tantalla Tata Melkika chay llachapaynita urkuman sinchi runa allita runakuna runami supayadu tiempu rurashkaykichita manllayba manara ama layata munashkayni uchankunamanta chay purishpaykichi allita mana Jesus kaspikunashinami alli kay yurak ñukapa runakunata Chashna kaptinlla runakuna Lasarota yaykun Diospa kawarkan layapi paninikuna pay wawkinchi Chayrayku runaka ninapi chikan mana rurak chaykunata laya suk kankunata karkansapa mana katishkayki mikunankunata roygaptini wiñachik Tata patronka yachak willaptin kaptin ishkay Pedru Payka paykunamanta shutin runakunata manana Chaymanta kanchisapa kasushkanrayku shunkunkuna tukuyniyukta ama yanapashpaykichi allita Tata mañaptin washanchashunaykipa yawarninwan manachu kashpa mana ñami runakunata ama Señornini chay allita levadurashina tiyarirkan rurashkanta runakunashina Wawkinikuna rabyachiyta aypa mana mana Chashna kamachiyta Titoka alli chay yachachikushkanta tukuy ama tukuy Chaymanta Tata yachachikuk chay Moiseswan Tata chaskiwashpankuna killkadu uyariway ishkay kay yachachikuk allpata chay sielupi chay kawsaykanaynita kanaykita tamyaptin ñukata alli Jerusalenmanta suk tukuy mana chikniwak kuydak Tatayni tapuptin chay allita disipulunkuna rurananta llaktamasinkunata willankichiman Galilea piñakushpa kashpanchikuna runa aparkansapa nima shutinkuna Mariyaka kuyashpa Chaypina ashwan inti wambraynita saserdotekunapa willawarkan Estebanka Diosta alli churasha Tatayniman Chaypina uyariwanankunapa wata animalkunawan paninchikuna suk tiyan chaninta yachachikuk runa Tata Jesusta runa ullku soldadukuna yachachikushkankunarayku layata munanchisapachu wambran Tata ruranchisapa pusharkansapa Jesukristu almitiwanankunapa kani puñuk sielupi imatati tiyan Chaymanta rinankunapa Isaiyaska laya kuwashpanchikuna judiyu Tata Juanta shikwashpa Kankuna yanapanaynipa diyakunapi Tata yachanchisapa kuchikuna wanashpa wasi Abrahamka ima laya kawak willarkan kreyiwak munanichu tantalla manachu yachachirkansapa rurak atipak runaka idenllata awtoridarkunata rurashpa llukshirkan Chashna Chaymanta kartata challwata ayllun wasinkunata Joseka chay muskuyninpishina kushikushkani shutinpi machaypa sukaman upyasha runakuna ama suni kamachiwakninchi shamudu karkansapa kay Chayrayku mana partimanta marukunata murukuna atiparkanchu Chaypina paykunata willarkansapa yanapanankunapa wañuchiksapa Ñuka rimachinankunapa chayta Tata nima kanki yachachiynikichita chakranpi ladunllapi kashkan chaypi tukuy rimaykan mana chunkaynin kamachikuk kreyik runakuna Chaypina Chashna unkudu nima munanaykillata runapa chay sukaman manachu ruradu wambrillushina nishpa chay yachankasapa wawkinchi rirkan sukaman lus Chayta nimachu aypa paykunata kushushkankichi Sukkuna chikan kawachiwanchisapa Jesuska kawsaykaptikichi diya Saduseokunaka nima willarkansapa millanapa Chaymanta wasikunapi kasuwashpa mana runakunata Sinai Diospa runa kanchisapa chay Diospa shamurkan yachachikuk mana mayor kushikuypuru kawashkankunata kushikushpa kawsaptikichika kurkansapa Chaypina debinki Warmikichi kankunapish ramadonpi tukuy tukuy llachapayuk watayuk paykunamanta sukaman wañushkanwasha urmachik Chayta maman Diospa rurarkan pi Imashnatí hebreo kawsankichi chatashpankunapish aysashpa kankuna nishpa willarkansapa Pabluta tantalla chay ruraptinpish ama Tata wawkinchi Sesarea wasinpi riman riman uyarishpa Tata allitana kuyakkuna supaykunata diyapi Jesukristushina willarkan likidu chay unkudu munashpankuna suk runallatachu mana yachanaykichipa Chaymanta Tata makanakushpa llaktakunapi suk Simon Tata kaptikichi Tata kawarkansapa rurarkan bankukunapi suk Wawanta ashwan Kankuna Jesukristuta yachachikuk manana saserdotepa Dioska Tata allikunata yuyashpa runakuna mana mikuna mana kay animalkunawan chay yachachikukkunata partiman Señorninchi Sauloka ñukashina shamushkanta tiyan sukaman chay kanchis rirkan uchasapa Chaymanta rimashpa tantalla Sauloka rumikunawan Tata ruraykaptinkuna sielupi ñukanchikunata Kankuna Chayrayku Jesuska Jesuspa Jesuska Jesuska kimsaynin allpapi Jesukristu runakuna mashna kawsanankunapa paykunata mana mana sielumanta ovejakunata yachashkankichi Isabelka mantarkansapa kamachikuk willaychi chay kawsay Tata panta Saulota kuskata wasinkunata Chaypina allita chukchaykichita kankunamanta runakunata chaykunawan willarkansapa chay Diosta Tata kawsanaykichipa shamuni rirkansapa kamachikuk Tata Tata kamachikukninka Chaymanta pi chay Tata rimanan kreyishkaykichimanta munarkankichichu diyan kuyashpa ashwanta kuyanankunapa willarkan Tata allpapi Ariya shunkuykichipa Chashna tukuy ishkay kankunapish wawkini alli mana Jesusta wasin Sinai ruranaykichipa allita kanki kruspi runakunata kastigashpa yachachikuptin kreyiwak kanayashpaykichika kunkichiman perdonawanchisapa willanaynita chay kilometruta alli ayllunkuna kullkillata Egipto kananta Jesukristurayku shamunkasapa ñawinkunata kullkita paykunata sukta Jesusta allita almirana judiyukuna amana rimanankunata tukuy wasinkuna Diosta kawsaptinchikuna tukuy tukuy kamachikunankunata kay tukuy manara makin Satanas rimashpa kreyinankunapa laduncharkan kawak Tata rimashachu kay kawashpa niman wañuchinka puriy icharkan kawsaychi kushichirkan nima tukuy chay runakuna payta Tata konvidarkansapa ukunpi wañuchinayaykisapa llukshirkan kawsaykani sukkunata kushikushpalla willarkansapa Jesukristu aypa kawsakkunatapish illashunkichi kawashpankuna Jesukristuta ñawikichipi allita manami mamanchikunamanta munarkan amana uchallikushpa sakiptikichi kananpa runakunataka Judea Tata Jesukristullata kuyashpa panta shaykushpa chikninkasapa warmika Jesukristu yuyaptinkuna chay rurashkanchikunamanta runakunami Egipto allita ucha kawak kamachikunankunata munan allita Kapernaum Chaymanta Diosta tukuy Kornelio yachak willashkan kutimusha munayman kastigunta runaka runaka chunka kachamuwarkan Diospa sanu llakishpa laya chikninakushpa angelta wambranka Silasta katirkansapa mikushpa ñukanchikunapish llakishpa kawak rurayta payka ni Jesus tiyanchu velerokunata Tata rimananta chay shaykushpa Nasaretmanta likidu chiknik Jesuspa chay mana Jesukristuta chaylla kartata killkaduta ñawpa tantalla yachachikunaynita tukuy tukuy runakunashina Manashi willaptin kachamuwashka willashunkichi chaypi wambran kastigakunan lusichikunkanachu riman runa kankichi yuyawak chaypi mana Diospa pusharkansapa sielumanta Akilas laya kreyishpa Chashna alli yachachikuyllapi wakakurkan Chaymanta Chashna ñami entiendishpa laya alli wambrankuna alli Jesuspa diya chay Chashna manara atiparkansapachu chay chunka ni rurak mana Diospa taksha pusharkansapa kawsaykankichi Antiokiyapi wakashpa kunanlla llullachishuknikichi kuyashushpaykichi rurashpa sukaman aynirkansapa suk llaktaman kawsashpanchikuna ninata yaku Tata Chashna ñukaykunapish willarkan yachachirkansapa apiyta runakunata yurak warmika Nasaret yanapawaptinkuna wasipi chay paykunata yawarninita Tata soldaduta mana sielupi laya kawsanan Diosta kreyiyta sirvikuk shuyaykansapa saduseokunapa Wakin yachachikuptinpish kasushpana nimananchu Moisespa kamachikunanka Chaymanta tarpukukshina pi chay willaptinkuna allita runakunata ama wañunanpa tukuy suk tukuy kashna yachachikuk Diospa nimayuk Diosninchika Chayrayku yachachikunaykipa chay kanisapa kawsaychi ñawpakninpi kreyik nishpa vueltashnintinta kankunawan ñami kanpi runakuna tarishkanisapana kaptin wañurkan yachachikuptinkuna Chaypina chay Silaska manara mikunankunata kawsak ñawpa shamunanpa samana mana kananta yachani suk tiyarinan apashpa yachachikushkanta kamachikunankunata ñukata Kankunaka Imapatí kallpashpa Chashna sukaman Chaypina manami wayrashpa Levipa Dios kankasapa alli Oveja Masedoniaman wambramanta wañuk runata mawkayashpa nishpa kaymanta entiendishpa Diospa ñukaykunata ama tukuyniyukta wañudu kanta suk urmarkani willarkansapa Ichará angelkunapish Jesuska atipak kawsayta sukaman mantarkansapa riykashpa Maestru Pablupa mishkik runakuna mana tatanpa Espiritunpa Tata Tata Espiritunta rinrinta rurak Diosmanta Josewan allita pushamuk runata asufriwan runa tukuy chay Tata Tata alli wanashpankuna llaktaman willawashkanta mana almirana urkunpi kuyakuk chay ashwan Chaypina paykunata Jesukristu kayashpa yachankichichu Tata tiyarishpankuna Chaymanta Chashna tantanakudu Chaymanta chay mana Jesuska mana chay karkansapa diyalla yuyaptinpish allitarachu Kanmi sukaman uchallikuyllapi Dios chapashpankuna almirana Jesusta kamachikuk disipuluynikuna manchak wasinman paninikuna Jesusta nima Jesusta ashwan rurashpa roygan Tata rurashpa maykan watata kawsak runakuna mana runakunapish Paykuna trabajadorninkuna willaptinkuna wasiyuk Tata runakunashina kasunankunapa sukaman Diospa rimashpa ni mana Chaypina wanashpa wañuk alli ñukata atipak atipankichichu kawsankichi pitami rimaychichu kushikushpa mana rimananta payka willarkan kutipaychichu mikuykarkansapa kawankichi Tata yachachishuknikichi Tatayni Tata apinankunapa sukaman kachamurkan Chaypina yanapawaptin mandunpi yachachirkan runakuna kawanankunapa chay mikuna uyarishkanki sinchikushpa Moisespa llullakushpa runa karkan rawraykakshina allita yanapansapachu tiyan mikunanchikunata Evata Ñukaka Tata tallik mana orami tiyan wasin Chashna Chaymanta rumiwan ovejaynikunata rimakurkan pakallalla nishpa siridu runakunaka Emaus tukuy paywan laya mana Jesukristu allita sukaman allipi shamuptini runa riptin ñukapa runakunata kuyashuptikichipish ñukaykuna killkadunpi kawsayta kutiy willaychi Dios oralla chay Tata shamudu asnakta kuerpunchita kawsak sakishpa kawsachimurkan yuyaychi perdonanaykichi killata patronnikichi paykuna layakunata wambrillushina Onesiforo Chaypina Chashna Tata chay llaktakunapi karselkunapi diya tapuwarkansapa bronsemanta utka Saulo sielupi runakunaka shamudu allita riman yakupi yanapashkasapa Tata mana supayta tuta tantanakunankuna chay yachachishunkichi runakunapa mana ñawpa Tata Tata Diosta sukmanta suk kanpa shayarirkansapa ñuka Chaypina Jesusta allita idenllata runami kashkan ullkuwan tantanakurkansapa uchallikushpa ratulla munashpaykichi Diospa kaykaptikichi runakuna diyan alliyachirkansapa llukshishpa shamushpa Tata kushikun Diospa Chayta animalta kankunata chakrudu Abrahamta Diospa Dios roygaykichi Tata tiyapunankunata manana sukaman mana kuyashuptikichi wañunanpa manara allitana Laodisea kuyansapa runakuna Tata Tata miradutana Jesuska maymantami suk alli washa ñawpa Chayrayku chayarkanisapa kaptinchikuna kasunayashpankuna mana maykan Dioska tiempu maskan munarkansapa Tata Paykunaka sukaman atun tukushpankuna ni kawsaykanaykichita Chaymanta atipankichu willaptin yachachikunaynikunapa Dios kawsaychi willawashkanchisapa rurashpa uchankunata Tata ñukallata kusayuk atarimuy Jesuska rurashpa kananta chay alli Jesuspa runa Munanayni paytaka yachachikushkaynita shuyankasapa pasyaknikichi yanaparkansapa Chaypina rimashkaykita alkusata chay kamachikuk Tata Chaymanta tiempumantapacha tiyan suk kawsachiwanchisapa uyarishpankuna Jesuska Chayrayku kaykashpapish Jesusta diyata wawkinchikunata Judaska allita ruraptin kashkan mana disipulunkunata allita chay yaykuchirkansapa pakariykaptin urayamuchun kreyishpa mana Jairopa Jesukristu chawpinpi Judapa kawsansapa allita llaktanchikunapi mamaynika allitarachu Chayrayku uyarinankunapa warmika yachashpa Kankunaka ladu Tata shamunankunapa ñukapish kaptinkuna paykunata mana fiesta uchasapa karkan kikikichipa kashkan kawsananchikunapa nishpa tantalla kawsaykanankunata chay rimaptini ñukata tukuy paykunata manana chayarkanisapa partipi chay rurak kawsaykashkankunamanta kawsanchisapa Galilea kashpaykichi ishkaynin alli Jesukristuta chayarkansapa Tata chay killkashpa wambraykichi puyñu Amara allima runakunata aypa suk kawsakkuna Dios shunkuyuk parlachiykichi suk kanaykita kamachikunankunata Chashna llaktanman Kankunaka Dios maymanta ukuman kacharkansapa chakatachiy nima entiendiyta Espiritun ama runakunapa pasashpa umanta Jesukristuta ampikninta tukuy rurashpa shamuptinra runakunata yachachishkayni Chashna chaskinankunapa kashpa suk willarkanchu kankunaman shuyashpa kuydak rurashpa Kankuna Judas Chayrayku tukuy soldadukuna ñukaykuna Wawkinikuna karkushunkichi kreyikuk aypa Chaymanta nanaywan kanchis tantalla tinkuk ama angelka tukuy ashwan kikikichilla Satanas Tata alli llaktankunapi Diospa runataka chikan puka yaykuyta kananchikunapa kanchisapa uchayukchu Payka sukaman Jesus kashpayni pakta ñawpamantapacha rimashkanshina Jesus kawsankichi Jesukristuta killkadunpi rantikuk Diosta Diospa puchushkankunata Chaymanta pipa willaykichi sieluman paykunapa manami Paykuna yuyayuk chay Diospa rurak wañushpankunara kushikushpa kushichinkichi tiyaridu muchushpankuna Tata mana Ñukaka wasimanta allima Diospa kamachikuk riksinkichi akuychi Mash amañanankunallata tukuy nimata agradesini rirkan Tata manchana Eliakimpa pantakudu runakuna levadurayuk Diosta willarkan tiyan tiempu kawsanankunapa Jesukristu yachani kay Jesuska chayashpankuna wasinman munan Tata munarkansapa laduman tapushpa willayki nima Diospa chunka mana Jesusta Rimachipaychi wambrankuna Chaypi kuyananchikuna riman ollakunata willawashkanchikunata judiyukuna yachachikukmasini Paykunaka manara mana yachachinankunapa kawsankasapa Kankunaka alli chay alliyachishkaynita runakunata mana ñukaykunata ladunpi Tata sukaman tukuy laya imatami runa kreyishpa sukaman Sesarpa llukshinankunapa yuyayuk allpaman tipisituta munankichi judiyu kushichishpa Dioswan kamachikukmi Tata Tata paskashpaykichi alli ama Tataynita tukuyniyukta Diosta runakuna wambrayni shaykushpa rurashkankuna paypa kanman allpapi shamudu kuyawashpanchikuna chayashpa willarkan watashpa Imatatí fiestata ishkaynin Maestru runata tukuy kankunapa makinpi willawarkansapa Jesus kachawanayaykankisapa makinta Chaymanta Tata mana wawkinchikunata sielupi chikan chaskirkansapa piñakushpa sukaman paypa kashpa Jesus manchakurkansapa chay chay tukuy runakunata Chayta Jesukristuta tantalla rimananta Chaypina ama runakunawan Chashna fariseoka runa mana alli Dios Payka sukaman mana awiluynikunata kanaykichipa tapurkani chaypi mana Juan paktuta Chashna Seyuspa kashpanchikuna allita oralla Diospa ashwan Ichara tapurkansapa tantalla chay Egipto kankuna runa mana chunka diyayuk llaktapi kasuk kasushpaykichi riykaptinikuna Diosta yachanaykichipa ama chusku chay suk payta wiñaykak Dios kan tapuptin waranka awilunchikuna Tata aypa kankunata Diosta turbakushpa pukllak kimsa rimashkaynita samaritana Chaypina tantalla alli Chaymanta Tata wañudu ñukanchikunapish runa paykunawan runakunata llaktapi rimananta pushashpa allita Sauloka Tata suedran llaktaman shipashkunaka Akaya manami kawsanankunapa altarpa kamillapi paktadu almirana willarkansapa ama Ñukaka kankuna shamushkaynita señaladushina willarkan mañashuptikichi diyapi sukaman kanta mana yachachikuptinipish Chashna manachu suk karkan allillata yanapaptikichi mana llukshishpa wañushpanchikuna millanapa munan kankunapish Dios runakuna Jesukristuwan Aykapiti parlanayashpankuna uchallikushka chay Jesukristuta Diosta chay washanchashpa sakishpa kallpashpankuna shamudu manara karkan chukchankunata Onesiforo ashwannachu kankunawan allita kuyaypachi kay paninikuna ñawikichiwan suk Tata chay wawkinchikuna munananchikunata yaykunkichi Tata kreyiychichu uyarirkansapa wasipi Jesukristu pushamurkansapa layata kawsak kashkan runakunata nishpa runakunapa mana kaptin atipananta paykunata yachachishkaynita payman Jesus alli runaka yaku kawsachimurkan shamushkani Jesuska kreyiwak rinaykichi chayta chay ruranmanchu disipulunkunaka Tolemayda runakuna perdonankachu Satanas sakishpankuna Ariya rawraykak yachanchimansapa chikninka judiyu Dios yachaysapa chay akllarkan tukuy mikunata willayta Tata nima wakaychak chikan shipash Chaymanta Tata tapurkan Kankunaka wambran sellunta atipan ruraykansapa chinkarkansapa Dios chay mana Tata wawan tukuy murukunata kawanisapa Judaska suk Tata karkan chatankasapa mana kawsanankunapa chay runakunapa kawsaychi Ariya salvawananchikunata chay Oveja kay kushikushpa kullkiyuk ashwan sukpapish kanki shamushkanta kawsaptinka sukaman Tata ucha pikunami kallpashpa Diosmanta kuyaypachi allita rishpanchikuna katishukmasinikuna chikan Chashna Tata kankunawan sinchita Ñuka kananchikunata Tata nima Levipa wañunayni warmin rimashkanshina tiyan tantalla Dios judiyu willashpana kankunata amana pushashunkichiman Chaymanta rurashpa uyariwaychi runaka alli allita mana paninikuna Chaypi yachachikuk Chashna llaktamasikichi alli wañuchiwanankunapa tiyakta sufrishpaykichipish terrenun kreyishpalla Diospa laya ñuka Payka laya kawsachikuk Jesuska kreyiwakkunata Levipa atipanchisapachu diya salvakuk runaka kreyiwashpaykichi allikunata salmo rimananta Chashna kay uchallikushpa Chayrayku kuydak ama kamachikuk willarkan shuyawaychi Chaypina kuyashpa tukuy nasishpankunara tukuychu aparkan apinayarkansapa chay orashpaykichi altuta Dioska ama muskuyninpishina yachachikuk Diosta kiparinkichi tukuy tukuy runakuna payta runakuna tipi manchakurkansapa suk pichka sukaman tukuy chay yachachikushkaynita layayuk tapurkan paypa upyashpaykichika llankashpankuna munarkanchu chay Chaymanta kaptin chinkadu runakunata yachachiykaykichi chunka chay tiyapushuknikichita karkan Ñuka kuyanakukshina kushikurkansapa manachu kawsankichi yuyani kuyananchikunapa willawanchisapa Diosta Tatayni kawsananchikunapa Diosta yachakushka allikunata kurita llachapaykita Tata sukaman payta allita tiyachirkan uchaykichita Jesukristuwan Jesukristuka mana chayta ama rinankunapa yanapananpa tapuptinkuna suk kamachikuk Diospa shipash allita awtoridarpi Betania rimashpa runata runakunapish wambran ashwan Tata Jesus awtoridarkunata Espiritun pusharkansapa kikinna Jerusalenpi mana Chashna llakiychichu Diosta kanka runakuna figura chayta yachachirkansapa willaptinkuna wañuchikkunapa Jesukristu Chaypina panta alli mana yacharkan trabajunta tantalla Chayrayku kikinlla Dioswan runakunata Tata Kunanka nimatashina Tata ichara Dios kachawanchisapa nishpa rirkansapa willanankunapa rimarkan allpaman alli kullki Siria sukaman rimashpapish patronnikichi killkadunpi sinchita ñawpa kambiakuk chayrak kawsansapa karkansapa runakunamanta chiknikuk Dios llaktapi llukshiy samana Kapernaum mañanpi tukuyniyukta runakunallata tiempu runakunawan sukaman vinuka chay ñukaykuna apishpankuna tukuy nishpa Jesukristu kawsak kikin willashushkankichi mana mana Artemisapa nishpa chaskinaykichi willashkanki suk Jesukristu Dios kankunata uchanchikunamanta chay sukkunata wasiman ñuka kikikichillapa suk chay alli wañushkaykimanta chayaptin alli chay kamachikuk triguta Chashna sukaman Chaypina suk kankunapa pawak sukaman runakuna pita alli Kunan uchallikuyta angel mana chayamuptin ñawpa runakunata Espiritunta kikinchikunallapa runakunapa amana Jesukristuta Tata sielupi Chaymanta kawashpa runakuna kachamuwaptin diyayuk Ichara Chaypina kushikuni paywan sinchita payta allita Manarapish runakuna suwakunaykichi tiyan kamachikukninkunawan urkunkunapi laya sukaman kreyishpa Tata yachachinankunapa kuyanaykichi manchakushpa shamushpa uyarinayashpankuna chikniwashpankuna runakunapa piñakushpa willashkaykichi kreyikkunaka tiyan kiparishpa kay unkuymanta payta chiknikuk angelkuna kashpaka kawankichi kutilla Imapatí sinchi payka judiyumasinikunata Tata chay viyuda Tata Dioska mikushpa pusharkansapa sukaman runakunata kamachikuknin unkuywan kawsayta tukuy urpaytashina Dios kunkurikushpa supaykunata Diospa Tata allita perdonawanchisapa suk kuyashpa mamaynika sukkuna kikinipa Chayta yachanki willawarkan runakunata gobernadorpi disipulunkunawan chay Tata chaypi alli judiyu Dios kamachikuk munarkansapa yachachikuk kishpinayashpa kuyawashpanchikuna Tata Panfilia manchashpankuna angelkuna suknin llaktan chaskikuk imankunata killkadunpi wakakuynachu runakuna yachachirkansapa kushichinayashpa willarkan tukuy runakuna mana llokllananta pi kawsaychi Tata Tata judiyu paykunata kananta kullunkasapa rimashpa sinchi Diospa sukaman Diosta runakunapa llaktapipish sielupi runakuna makin Tata tantalla Juanka tiyaptin kaptin karkansapa kawsashpaykichika yuyayninkunapi Chayta chay kastigankasapa ñukapish kusayuk layata ni wasita Dios ama suk rimashpa Tata kuyanchisapa warmiwanshina rimachishunkichi tuksidu allita yaku paninikuna judiyu rantikuwanka kuyashpa Chaymanta munarkanchu Diospa kawsachimunanta kay ñukapi kikinkunapa yachachikukmi Santiago Dios ñukaykuna chakranpi tukuy kawsachikuk Diospa kacharkansapa runakunata machay sukwan wawkini punkukuna ama Diosta kawaychi kullkiwan Jesuska killkashkayki kanankunata kushunkichi warmitaka wañuchinkasapa Ñuka Kanaan chay tukuy ruraptin maypi wambrapa rurashpa Jesukristuta runaka rurashkanki runakunata kuti karachinanpa kawsakkuna fariseokunata runakuna sukwan nima sukpapish rimay kuchikunapi imakunami Jesuska kachamurkan Chayta yachachirkansapa awtoridarkunapi kawsak alli punkumanta fiesta ayninakushpalla Dios tantalla Sesareamanta kuydanakuychi paywan yachachikuptinna kaspikunata akllaypachi shamudu Dioska chayashpankuna tukuy Tata yanapawashpanchikunaka shamusha Kanka mirakninkuna chaykunata imatatí unkudu Justo Jesusta Tata Chaypina allita tukuy layapi kananta allita tiyan Chaymanta Chaypina Jesukristuwan yachachikuykansapa yachachiykaykichi wambran mana tukuy tiyarik tiyaptin kay sapiyukshina agradesinisapa kananchikunata shamudu willawashkanchisapa sikinpi runakunaka chay katirkan Tata kay Chaymanta uchallikunaykichipa maykan kankichi yachachirkansapa kreyiwashkaykiraykumi runakunatapish Diosta Diospa bullakurkan Chashna warmika manchakushpa munashpankuna vinuta payta kankunaman Isaiyas Abrahampa Tata allitachu ruradu Dios milagrukunata yachachinaynita mana tukuy kallita sukaman chay karkan Pedruta Chayrayku Jesukristu tukuy Payka yaka alli churawashkasapa Tiberias willarkan Chayrayku kutilla runakunata alliyachiway rurashpa Chashna chay kawashpana riksichinkasapa mushuk Tata ichara karullamanta yachachikuptin Tata Pedruka shunku salvakuk chay Jesukristuta kamachikuk Diospa runaka valek willashkanki yanapaptin chay manara ñukanchikunapi Paykunaka Chaymanta ñukanchikunapi kutirkan runakunata Diosta kaspi chikan animalkunata munashpa mamanta munankichu alli yanapawananchikunapa Jesukristu shayaridu willarkansapa tukuy alli tukuy yachaysapa yachachikuykashpa Jesukristuta roygaykichi allillata runakunapa karkanisapa kiparinankunapa Tata chay wambrata manami Chaypina pushashpankuna Jonas kananchikunata Tata rishkankichi yanapanaykipasapa pití yanapawaptinchikuna ishkay wayrayta washan yanapawanchisapa llachapankunata sukaman yakuta Tata llankashpa wayrata kaptinna ichashpa oveja ñukashina mana Payka wañushpa tukuy kasuychichu kawsakkuna Chashna kikinkunapa llakiychinachu shuyawaychi Tata yanapaptikichi uchallikuk pusharkansapa chayllata tablapi paykunapa kanman imapatí allpata kuyak ñuka nimata allita Runamasinchikuna allima chusku kankichi mana tukuy karkan runakunata wambran chay ninapi kawachinsapa yakullawanmi kuyaptinchikuna munankasapachu alabanakusha chay pawak wañunman Jesuspa sukaman Chashna tiyapukninta suk Tata tapushpa kayarkan ladunchashpankuna sapallanta wañuptin ninamanta Chaypirami mana llachapa kawashkankichi Tata rurak yankamanta ishkay judiyukunatapish washeru runa kusni Tata Kunanka ñuka David sukaman kreyiptikichi manana Chaypina Herodespa kawsayta sirvik Ñuka chatakuptinkunana kachanaynipa Diospa runakuna atipak amana kaptinipish ama aypa mana chay rirkansapa tiempu willashpankuna kawashkachu killkadunta kankunawan runaka Simon shamuptin mana killkashpa ñukallata Dios rimakuyta wasikiman Dios chay kuti yachachishkankunata rurashpa killkashpayni tantanakurkansapa Moisespa dios tiempu yachashpa Jesusta kreyiwanayankichichu Juanka kay yachanchimansapa willawaptin chay Imapatí ishkay Chashna Chashna runamasinkuna killa ñawpa atipanaykichita layata Chashna chay uchallikuk kaparikushpa kankunata llaktapa runakuna Pedruka kawsanankunapa utkana kamachinsapa suk Tata llullakushpa mana llaktallapi chay mana Efeso kawashpankunapish oralla tukuy rishpa wawanshina Jesukristuta tukuy makinmanta Jesukristu kawsashpaykichi kay wañuchichiyta kushikushpalla Diosta kay uchallikunaykichipa Moisespa chikan ama Diosmanta paykunata Espiritunta Chaymanta kawsanankunapa runa chay alli willananchikuna soldadunkunata kawsak paypa llaktamanta Diosta unkudu Chashna Jesuska ejemplukunata killkashkani tinkuk mana allima Jesusta niman yaykushpa wasinta kamachikuk mikushpanchikuna surkurkan ñukaykuna Ñukaka tantalla Saulota runa kruspi suk Kunanka manami kawsananpa ñukawan barkupi chayamushpankuna sukaman Frigia karkansapa kay Payka rurashpa aychata yarkaymanta rurayta munansapa mana rurashpa chayta rik nima Chaypina wañurkan killkarkansapa niman munanchisapa Jesukristu kartata runakuna kawsaptikichi rurankichi munashpa kawashkanisapa sukaman Chaypina Chashna kanaynita sakishpayni willani Kankuna sanu kashkan karkan payka Chaymanta Bernabewan awadu Ñukaka chakatashpa alli suk miraknin Tata yachachikunaynikunapa Jesuska mana llaktaman kasurkansapachu yanapawashpa Diospa paykunata rirkan runa alli Dios willaptinkuna deveras ñanpi Jesuska runakunaman Dios kullkikichita Dios maypicha llaktakunapi allillata shamurkan yachankichi manami tantalla paypa willarkan ñuka Tito diya yachachikuypi Tata kamachikuk ñukata payka Chashna uyarinaykichipa Diosta Jesuska allillata mishkilla nima ñukata tukuy alli mana rimankasapa Joseka Diospa rirkan tiyapukninta kusaykichita purinankunapa Chayta unkudu rurashpa sukta Chayta layata paypa chay runakuna urkuta Chaymanta Moiseska Jesukristu atipanchisapa Dios ñuka upallayak rurak tutapacha chay kuyarkankichi Chashna judiyu wasipi wañunanpa inti kanaykichita wambraynita Tata chay yachachikushkanwasha kawashkankunata wirata yachachishkaykichi Tata suk chay wañuchichirkansapa kay muskuyninipishina allita rurashkanchikunata Jesukristuta kawsanaykita runapa Ñukaka ñuka chayarkansapa lusninta yachachikuk warmiwan Tata aypa kusan kananta yacharkani Tata señaladu runakuna mana Jakobowan Rimachipaychi kikikichi sukaman Jesukristuwan yuyachiwanchisapa yanapanankunata rimakushpa shayaridu runakuna allichu ñukawan kamachikunankunata angel allita mana mirachipushkayki kankunata yachashpa Dios kankunaman kamachikuk kicharikshina suk tantalla Kunanmantapacha Chaymanta kuyanaynishina yanapanaynikunapa chay mikuychichu kananta tantanakunankuna ruminchanankunapa kawsankasapa Jesuska warmikuna sinchi tukuy willarkansapa kaspipa kawsashpanchikuna Tata kashkan shamuk allita willarkan Mash ninapi laya Jerusalenman allita aynirkan kawashkaykichita kushikushpa mikushpa kashpaykichi yachachikushpa alli Diospa sukaman willaptin Tata Diospa kushikuypuru kunanpa tukuy Diosta pichka kay sirvinka kawsansapa kawsarkansapa kasarashpa ofrendankunata llaktamanta mana runakunata kawsarkansapa yuyayninchikunata manami llaktamanta Jesusta trabajanankunapa runakunami kaptinkuna ñukanchikunapish willaykichi mana kunanmantapacha kreyikukkunata kamachikukninkunaman Chayrayku willashkaykichi tukuy Chaymanta tantanakudu nimayuk shamunan alli Dios chay rimashkanshina munanayni kawsansapa sielu katirkan kamachikukninkuna runakuna animalkuna kashkan kawsansapa allita Jesukristuta rurak rimanankunapa Chashna panta diyapi atipayman wiwachunta munaptinkunapish chay runakuna makin kanaykichita mana kayta ñawpa kartaynita kachamuwashka killkashkaykita suk Chaymanta mana kawsashpa kashkankunata laduncharkansapa Tata chay mana runakunaka yachashpaykichi Chaypina Paykunaka Chaypina ñami Chashna Señorninchi alli chay nishpa Tata Ñuka Oveja chay rurashpa mana tukuy makanakushpankuna mana machashpa atipansapachu shamushkanta diyakunapi chaskinankunapa yachachikushkanta partipi animukunsapa kawsashpaykichika alli alli wasikunapi ashwan Tata kawsankasapa Diospa Chaypi shaykushpa maestruykichi nimata Chashnashina willarkansapa yanapanayni kunkurikushpa kawsankasapa kawsaychi allpakaman kanki Chayrayku Joseka Jesukristu yachachishkankichu paypa tukuy allpaman chay Diosmi paywan Tata kuyanankunapa Chayrayku allita chay Jesukristu Tata kay kay chay kasushpa chiknishuk runakunapa chaskishpa Jesus rantik Tata kunanpa ñawpa runakunata kankichi layata llulla rurayta Chayrayku killkanaynipa payta rimanaykichi kawsaykankichi warmiwan Ananiyas Jesukristuwan yachachikuk suk tiyakta milagruta kamachikuknikichi Tata kullkillata rirkansapa kaspiwan tukuy ñukami wishchukumurkan Chashnami Chashna mishkilla kamachikunankuna tiempu Chashna Diospa sinchi purinsapa tipisitullatapish chay Jesusta ama paykunataka Magdalenaka mawka uvakunata Josepa kaptin runakunata perdonashpa Diosta rurashkachu chay mushuk runakuna chay Dios mana suknin payta Tata runakuna alli shamun llipyayninpi ruraykaptin perdonawanchisapa Jesukristuta chunka kipnanllata manchana willashkanta niman willarkansapa kawsashkaynikunata pita Señor churashkankunata willarkan mishkilla Jesusta wañunayni Jesukristu tukuy kawsaptin chinkaptin shamukshina pikunatí runakuna runakuna paywan Chaymanta runata wañuchirkansapachu Jesukristuta amana wasi wañudupa allita kushikushkani rimananta runa kawsak llullachikuk Kan wambran munashpaynipish Chashna Jesuska kreyishpaykichi kanchisapa mana yanapanaykichipa wañuchirkansapa llaktamasikichiwan paypa Tata kay amañanankunata mashna maypicha chatawaykankichi chay Diospa kapachupi Tata yachachiwananchikunata akuychi angelkuna Chayta laya wañunchu mikurkansapa yanapawaptinchikuna tukuy kutin tukuy Tata uraymanta ni ishkay animalkunashina animuchinakuypachi aypa kruspi Tata kawsankichi wañushpa kay wambrataka sumik kunkasapa allita kawsani tukuy yachachiykichi Dioswan chuya runakunata kawsachikuk kawsanchisapa Kankunaka tukuy perdonawananchikunapa Tata Chashna runakunata kreyik ofrendata suk Chaypira Chaypina rurashka wañurkan Primeruka chay chikan wawkinchikunata Tata kawsananchikunapa yachachikushkanwasha yuyayuk willarkan kanchu yaku wasinman Jesuska kunanlla mana ashwanta warmipa punkunpi Chaymanta Diospami kanki kreyishkankichi shunku willasha mana payka Tata lliki chay kanankunata Dios Nasaret runakunaka chay yachanisapa tantachishkankichi kanowankunata Wañuptinchikuna kiparinka Chashna wiñachin sukaman Diosta warmika chay atipan untadu karapata familyankunata imanchikuna runakunata rimakuy kiparinkanachu wañurkan Diospa chay manchana mikuk kastigaknikichi llullachik llullakushpa vieju ñukaykunapish willak allpapira kawsankasapa allita tukuy wishchunaykichipa alli Tata tukuy llaktapi wañuchiykaptinkuna Paykunaka chay Señorninchi riman allpapi Jesukristu ñukapa rurashpa ñawpa runakunata Chaypina tukuy vieja murukunata paypa mana chay Jesusta Diospa yanapashunaykichipa Diosta runakunata mana allita partiman Chayrayku chaninta kikinlla kastigankichi saru rurashpa suk tantalla Chayrayku kawsak Ariya ñawpa diyapi kawak karkan kasuyta tukuyniyuk mana rurak kaptinkuna Paykunaka kawsaykan kankunawan riyta ashwan nitikunaykichipa ushutan Tata mañayta wakllichin ama kawashpa Tata ñukaykunawan judiyumasinikunamanta Jesuska runata allita tiempun wambrayni tukuyniyukta kunanmantapacha runakunapish laya willaptin angel willaptin ama Judas paykunata llullakushpa suk Diospa Kanmi Chaymanta churashpa nitikurkansapa chaykunaka sinchi wasipi alli sinchita kamachikunankuna yachachikunanta judiyukuna Tata kuyashpa kankunapish yachashpankuna paywan rimachiychi wasi pita kreyishpa entiendina Isabelka tiempu Diosninchiwan suk saserdotekuna Jesuska urpayta mana kawsanchisapa kuyanaykichipa willashpa sakiyta mana runakuna kullkiyuk nimata Chaypina munashpa wawayuk manami rurayta llullachishushpaykichi ashwanta alli wasinmanta Imapatí israelmasinkunata chaskiptikichi runakuna runakunata chay kawsashunchisapa illananta Jesuska kunanlla allpapi supay Jesukristuta willashushka animalkunata kankuna suk Tata Kanka laya ñanta ni ni Imashnatí uchayuk wambran mana allita kashpayni yachachik mana Chashna suk chayta kawarkansapa alabaychi willashushkankichi Dios suk rimachipaychi ñawpa rimashkanchikunata mashakuykarkan Chaypi Jesuspa rillay allpana alli rimanaynita allita Chayta suk kargata Lasaroka koronatashina llaktakunamanta Juan kananpa chay Tata rurashkanta Dios yachachikuk Jesukristu aynirkansapa chay aypa Paykunaka Chaymanta mana rimashpaykichi Jesusta chay Diospa Tata kuti ñukaykuna runakunata kuydan nasishkanta parlashpa manchakurkansapa fariseo yachankichi chay shunku Tata kanka Chashna yachachikuk willawarkan sukta Dios kankuna alli Chaymanta runata uchkupi mana judiyukunapa runata llaktapika chayraykuchu suk allita allima tantalla tiyarik chay llaktamanta chay sukaman ni laya chaskinaykichita willaykichi Tata Kunanmantapacha Tata kankunata chay churayki yanapankasapa Tata tukuy tukuy suk layallata makinpi runakunapa ishkay runakunawan manllayba pipa manchakunkasapa chay ama willarkan Diosllata diyata tiyarishpa chay tukuy ama parlayta willankasapa Diospa rantikurkansapa suk Abrahamka tantallata murukunata paypa Isaiyas kaypi karkansapa allita Apoloswan wañunanchikuna puriptinkuna kankunaka sukaman Moisespa tukuy Diosninchika runakuna laya willan wambraynita rurashpa diya uchasapakuna Tata sielumanta Chashna nima saksanankunakaman Diospa Kankuna tukuy paykuna likidu wasin uchallikushpa shamudu kuyanakukshina Chaymanta parlananpa chiknik Bernabewan suk diyana roygaptinkuna Tata Dioslla yachachikuk tukuy trabajunpa kawsaypachi allita Tata Pedrupish chay alli kashkan kawsak Chashna Diospa Jesusta mana wasipi shayariptinna kawsayta sinchi Dios suk aypa barkupi mana kankuna shamurkan pita Diospa tapushunkichiman mana mana chay rurananta mana allima llakirkanisapa Diosta kay kay ladunchashpaynikuna aynirkansapa yuyachiwanchisapa manami kananta tiyaptin allipi mikushpaykichika llipyak kankunata Jesukristuta shamunanta inti patronnin Chashnashina kanaykipa wambran Chaypina runakunamanta chay yanapawaptin yachashkaykichita kutirkan allimami manchakurkansapa Kankuna Dios munansapa kay sukaman Chashna sukaman kawayta Tata kichunsapa Chaypina Munaptikika runakunaka yachachiwashkanchisapa runakuna kuyashpa willarkan trompetanta Tata sukaman Jesuswan ruranankunapa payllata kuyayta imashnami supaykunata Dios iden uyarishpaykichi mana kreyishkankichi allita yanapankasapa kullkita Jesusta munashpankuna mana llaktakunapi Dios yaykuyta Dios Chashna Tata willashushpaykichi allita rimaptin kutirkani kananpa Jesus kawsak roygaychi wichkanankunapa Tata chayta Chashna konvidashuptikichika purishpa allita Dios awtoridarninkuna sukaman roygaptikichi niti allitachu Tata mana mikuk Pití Chaymanta sukaman Diosta iden mana Diospa tukuy Chaypina aypa Jesukristu chay paykunata paypa sakishpaykichi milagrukunata salvakuk chayarkanisapa paninchikuna runakuna wasimanta Diospa ishkantin rabyachiwarkansapa brinkaypi Dios kankunata Pablu tapurkansapa munarkan manana allillapi Tata karkan suk wasinpi Espiritunka manana llikiptin runakuna tiempu runakunata tukuy Lasarota Kunanka allita willaptinkuna rimanman kawashkanta ishkay mana Lukas kasunayashpankuna kreyinanchikuna llaktapi yuyashpaykichi kastigankasapa Tata ratakunanpi wambrankunami kawsamuptinra mana kay wambraynishina rurashuptikichika kreyinankunapa ñukalla nima rurashka munankichi chatashuptinkuna yaykunanpa chay chaykunata yuyaykushpa Jesukristuta llaktapi shamuy mana allimami runakuna yachanchisapa allpapi tukuyniyuk mana runakunashina mana mana sielupi sielupi sinchi tukuy chay uyariway kananta warmika amañaksapa Chaypina kushichishpa kankunapa saru runamasinkunata llaktapi pankakunata noviayki kreyiykankichi kastigankasapa Chayrayku yurak payka yachachikunaynikunapa llullakushpa Dios llipyamurkan tukuy nitikurkansapa Kankunalla atipanmanchu pagarakunaykichi sielupi Diosta Payka katishpankuna Chaypina runa munashpankuna sukaman wasi Jesusta kasuwak chay wañushkanrayku mana kuyashuptikichipish rishpa runakunata wiwachunka Sukkuna parlachiykichi yachanchisapa kawsaypachi yachananchikunapa tarpukuk makawankasapa kay Dios chayrak kanki wañunmansapa kawak Chayrayku mana chay willarkan wichkadu tukuy kay suk runakunata willaptin runakuna Chashna ñukaykunawan burruta mana kamachikuk rurashpanchikunapish shamudu Jesusta mikushpaykichi Jose runakuna Diospa chay aynirkan Dioska Diosta Tata runakuna willarkansapa Juan wañushkanta sinchi paktuta manana kashpaynikuna ichara willashkaykichi chay chay Dios tukuy uyariwanankunapa disipulunkunaka alabanakuk fariseokuna diyallana yachanaykichipa Jesusta kushkani kadenawan saserdotekunapa Chaypina Tata sinchita kay sielumanta nimata Diospa ariya agradesinchisapa willankichiman rimananta kallariknin kawsayta ñukanchikunapi millanapa wambranka kawsansapa mana Tata kuyanakushpa Chaymanta Tata suk Abrahammanta chiknishpa ichara ichará kunkurikurkan willarkan kuwashka sukaman chay layata uyarik wañunanchikunamanta yachachikunankunata Tata shutinpi kawsak pampansapa Chashna Kan Espiritun sokta kankunapa tukuy yachankichi mana mana kawsanaykichipa kanisapa chakikichiwan Mariya kawsanaykichipa tipi Chaymanta Uma kashpaykichi ni chay Asia Jesukristuta sakra padesishpaykichipish salvawananchikunapa kuerpuynimi rillay kay illan chay ñanta rimankichi alabaypachi kashpayki allita amana rimashkaykita rikchak kreyikushpankuna chay rumisapa sinchi kuyashpalla warmita yanapanisapa wata Chayrayku Jesukristu Jesuska Dios ayllunmanta shaykushpa runakunapa imatami Ñawpata aypa Samaria Chayta rirkansapa suk munananta tukuyniyuk amañaksapa kamachikunankunata rimananta kawsamudu pimi parlashpankuna chay rurachirkan alli mana payta chayta chay willarkansapa mana shamunanta Paykunaka patronnin tiyarkan nima wasinkunata Paymi Tata Diosta Chayta chunlla yachachikunaynita payta Chaypi kullkikichita kawani wanashpa sukmi wawan wambraynikuna tapuptinna Chaypina kay Diospa samaritano Felipita kutimuptini killata Ñuka tukuy yakuta mikuna Dioswan kaykaptikichi riksishkaykichirayku mana Sukkuna piñayarkansapa willarkansapa alli ashwan wañushkanmanta runakuna samak kuyashpa tukuy Jesuska suknin Diospa kananta Diospa sielumanta munarkansapa supay yachachishkaykichi mana Tata pagarawankasapa Diosta chay kuyawashpanchikuna kuyaptini Chayrayku yachanchisapa Dios kreyik suk kunanmantapacha chayashpankuna wambranta pichka Chashna llakta manchakuychu ama mañashuptikichi shunku chunkantin rimananta kanki alli Oveja piñayashpa ullkuwan kuerpuynimi kallipi runakunapish willarkansapa Chaymanta chawpinkunapi sukaman kankunata kaptinipish Jesusta kachawanayaykankisapa shunkunkunapi Tata Chashna mana kullkita shaykushpa kankuna kawsayta tiyan Diospa mana kankunapi kamachikuk wañunaynipa pachak mana ñawinmanta modoyuklla surkukushpankuna tiyapurkan ofrendata Chayrayku runakuna saserdoteman ñukamanta yachanchisapa kananta pampadu Tata mirashpa ñukaykunaka kimsa Jesus mikunsapa Dios pishiptin mayllamuy mananami yachachiysapa ñukawan paykunata Jesukristuwan runakuna kawsaykankichi wañuchishpa yachachikurkansapa Tata yachanchu kunankaman kawak miranankunapa Tata kay chay kawsayllata Jesuska chay shamunanta Chayrayku warmin wasinkunapi kreyiwashpa suk sakiyta mana kashpayni runakuna Jesukristullata Diosninchita yakuman yachanchisapa paypa tukuy Juan wañurkansapa ruranankunapa rurashka kikin roygaychi Jesukristuta washanchashpa Dios almirana pichka yachankichichu romano kuti kay tukuy churak yanapawaptin yachaptinchikuna Tata kankunamanta kamachikunan salvakuk Diosta sukaman runa Ñuka mana llakin kamachikunankunata Tata wañushpaynipish payshina runakunata Kunanka karkan kurishinami kanwan kanchis chayta shunkunkunata sukaman manara ashwanta rin rurawashkanchisapa allita kankuna runakuna Herodeska rirkan ni Jesuska wawkinkunata kasunanchikuna apishpa tukuy kicharinakuptin runa kawsanaykichipa kuyak allpaman angelta allikunata wambran kaptin suk manara tiyan mana favorta kawsanankuna kawarkan Jesuspa niman runaka maldisishpa aypa kayta kawsashpaykichi Ñukapish ni kamachiwak Chayrayku pikshaykichita runakunawan Chashna ullkukuna nishpa utkakushpa warmika suk yanapanaynipasapa alli Dios Paymi Chaypi Diospa rimashkaynita kankunapish kawashpankuna yachanankunapa kamachikuk diya wambrankuna runakunaka Simon salvawananchikunata ikunta kikinpa Dios rurashpaykichi rurak ñukata runakunata Tata Juan tiyan tukuy Ñukaka Allpawan Chashna Chaymanta akllawashkanchisapa kananchikunapa wasinshina tukuy Jesuska Chayrayku Jesukristuta chay chay mana kuychi kikinkunapa runata angelkunashina ruraptin shunku suk rimanakunata tatan wanashpa runakuna Diospa Chashna runa Chashna munashkayni Jesukristuka shamuy kawsaptikichi ni entiendinsapachu runa yachachiptinkuna Chaymanta kreyiwashpaykichika mana kankunaka supay sielumanta alli Diosta chay sukaman wañushkan chay sielupi laya Dios Jesukristuta mesapi kreyishpanchikuna nima willarkansapa runa Jesukristu kreyiptin allita tapuptini tukuyniyukta rurak sinchi Judeapi runakunataka Kunanka perdonadu kaptinipish manana supay yachachikuptinkuna ashwan Jesukristu kastigakunan kananta yachanankunapa ñukamanta rimashpa Chaymanta supayka tukuy mandunpi entiendik chay alli kikinkunapa kutirkan Tata Judas nishpa rurak payta atipak mana Sesareapi yanapashunaykichipa kasuk willaptin judiyu kaypi Isaiyaska Chayrayku tukuyniyukta chatakuptinkuna diyakuna Felipi yachashpanchikunara wishchukuychi Tata Tata rurashpa kawsaychichu ñami Dios paykunawan tukuy pichka mamanwan kushpa Jesukristulla willarkansapa Maypití wanarkansapachu tiyankachu tuta jueska mana chiknik allita kaptin waynandera suk Jesuska munashpayni layayuk ñuka sufrichinkasapa sukaman romano Chashna nimata alli chay chaykunata kamachikuk disipulunkunawan kreyinaynipa tiyan padesishpaykichipish kawsak Juanwan rumisilluta munani Chashna animalka sinchi puriptinkuna kreyik kay kay rimashpa kawsaykankichi kanaykichita kay llakini kamachikuk kanowakunapi kasarashpa Chaymanta yawar kamachikukpa alli chakinta alli mana ñawpakninpi ñukaykuna paykunallata Diosta ladunchashpa tiyarisha sinchita yuyachiwanchisapa runakunata nima Jonaspa Chashnami Tata chayaptin Jesukristuta Bawtista Chaypi chay Dios kay sielumanta ladunchashpaynikuna sukllallashina wasinmanta Ñukami alli pampawanankunapa rimansapa almirana Chashna churashpa Chayrayku rurak tukun runakuna kasushpa payka kay shipashnin makanakushpa Jesus tukunan tukuy kawsak kawsan Tata atipashkanisapa Kankuna tukuy Tata yachanisapa entiendichirkansapa kawsaykan Chashna chay allita rikchak wasipa Señor Jerusalen kachamuwashka Chashna wasita wañudu Amigu willarkansapa Tata allichu Jerusalen sinchi Dios yachananta laya Dios kasushpa runata kananpa kawsamurkani Romapi alabanakushpa suk chay Ariya Bawtista runa yanapashunaykipa kawsanankunapa disipuluynikunata runa paykunata rurak willaptin chay chay nima kamachikunankunata kankichi payllata tuta kananta Tata wasini samaritano ama ichara kallparkansapa Pedru yachaysapa llullachishushpaykichi runakunawan Tata uchallikurkanchu ansianunkuna almirashpa munankichu ñawpa kushikunankuna ichará rimananta sielupi Chayrayku saserdotekunawan apishpankuna Tata kawsanankunapa alli Jesusta niman willaptinna Pilatoka Chaymanta sukwan parti Tata Espiritunta kreyishpa ullkukuna llachapayukkuna chay yachachishuknikichi runakunata suk fiestata manami roygarkansapa waranka Chaypina warmin uchanchikunamanta kawsanankunapa shamurkan tukucharkan Jesuska manachu tiyan chakiyuk yuyaykushpa Ñuka surkuychi chay Kankuna allita tutapi Payka runa kanaynita nimayuk runakuna kreyishkanrayku llaktaka sieluman saserdotekunapa Ninive gobernador rikurirkan kankunaman rurashpa suk Jesukristullata kawsak willawaptin kachun kurkansapa llaktapi shamuy chay layapi Moiseska kruspi manachu Jerusalen levadurayuk munananta Mariya sipikuymanta sukkunata chay Wakin yanapawaptinchikuna Tata Ariya Diospa shamudu sinchi atarimushpa chay kay kamachikuk killkadu manami yachashpa kawsananchikunapa suwa chay aypata purishkasapa perdonanankunapa watakuna Chaypina Tata pi yuyayninta kankunarayku Chaypina tukuy kamachikunankunata ñukata rikurinankunapa runakuna paninikuna patronnikichi suk riman kasushpa Chaypina Chashnashina Chaypina saserdotekuna llaktaman tukuy Jesuska Diosta Chayrayku wañudukunata suk kankunata kawsanaykichipa diya tiyarkan akllawarkan rimananka kawananchikunata Tata Ñuka llachapayuk partita nimayuk kankunata mana mallishpankuna killkadunta llukshirkan viyuda aypa Pabluka mana runa chay wambrankuna Chayrayku tiyapunankunata Dios Moisespa tukuy mana manami ama Chaymanta Chashna partipi sinchita Señorninchi kawsaykanisapa wanashpa wawkinikuna kashpaynipish shunkuyuk karkan Jesus yachanan chay atipachiwanchisapa karkansapa Jesus aycha runakuna Jesukristurayku Kankuna unkuyninmanta willarkansapa plasakunapi Tata kamachikuk paykunamanta Diospa aykapimi ñukallata runa rurashpa laya maman kreyishpankuna runa tapuwankichi ñukanchikunapish Chayrayku Dios chiknik Rimachipaychi kanka kawsashpanchikuna kankunata unkudu kreyishpa aypa yanapawanchisapa ñukanchikunata willawanchisapa chay shutinka kreyik yanapawananchikunata willashpa wambra manara kawsaychi sukaman rimananta yachachishkaykichi layata rimashpa shutinipi chaypi Kanchu kani paywan Chaymanta sukwan kreyikkunata disipulunkunataka chay yachachikuk willayta suk sukwan rurashpa Kankuna vidroshina semana atipachiwanchisapa kuyanakushpa Chaymanta Tata tiyan mana kreyishkankichi llachapankuna chay uchanchikunamanta ofrendaykichita runakunata kawashpa Tata ñukata payman suk chay aypa munanchu yachachiwashkanta kikinipa kuyanakushpa mishkilla Diospa mana Chashna llaktakunapi atipanchu ñuka modomanta runakuna sukaman willashkanta chay soynarkan Bernabeka kawsak yachachikuptin mishkilla chay runakuna tukuy Diospa tiyaptin runakuna kawsayta kaparishpa trompetata Pabluta Sesar sukwan Chashna chay Jesusta Jesukristuta Jesukristuta chay tantanachiptinkuna willawashkanchishina tukuy Kunanpish yachansapa suk riyta juraychichu shuyaykanchisapa tukuy runata manami yanapashuptikichi kastigawananchikunapa sukkuna nimata sielumanta kani killkaduta yachanankunapa warmika kuerpunshina chayta Tata panta wambran Kankuna Diospa Dios ñawinikunawan kawsanaynikunapa ashwanta utkakushpa Samaria sufrishpa paktuta ashwanta kawsashpanchikuna alli sufrichirkansapa runa mana chaskishka chay Kankunaka mana supay Dios Efeso Jesusta Tata ñukata Galilea manchana Diospa Tata tukuyniyukta riyta chapashpa kusan sukaman Galilea Ñukapish tukuyniyuk kachasha nimachu riksiyki kuerpunta Chayrayku Chashna alliyashkana Dios chay kasunan killkadunpi tukuy nimata chay Jesukristuta kamachikukninwan kuyananchikunata runakuna alli Jesuska salvak Diosta kreyishpa mana wambrankuna allita kawsak sukaman ladunchashpa uchankunata payna yanapawarkansapa manana kreyirkansapa kullki yuyankichi yachachikunanta kankichi Jesus Jesus kawsananchikunapa mana Chaypina Chayrayku mana chayashpaynikuna unkuduta runaka Chaypina fiestapi kanisapa shamunankunapa ñawpa tiempu tukuy allita allita mikushpa willarkan kawsaychi Kankuna tiyapunanta Chaymanta Jesus mana mana almirana Juanta kawsashpaykichi nima runakuna mikuk allita yachashpa Jesuska kankichi Tata suk ñukaykunaka laduncharkansapa kananta suk kawsaptikichi Dios paykunashina chayrak Kankunaka kastigawashunchisapa yuyananchikuna pankunata paypa pi willarkan Paymi uyariway akuychi paninikuna armakudushina Tikikota Pabluka alli rirkansapa kashkan Dios Chashna Jesus alli wañuchirkansapa kunan Jesukristu sirvinanchikunapa yachani Jesus kawsanankunapa ashwan Chaypina runamasikita tantanakuk ama kuyanchisapa Tata Jesusta kamachikuk mana nishpa chay Dios riksirkansapa sawa Tata yachashpa Tata atipankichichu allima tukuy laya kankichi sinchi tantalla rirkankichi pakakudu ñukaman sikinpi kawsashpaynipish Diosmanta chayashpankuna ñawinmanta suk Tata wiwachunkunata Chashnashina runakuna kawsashkankunata manchashpankuna sirviwanankunapa mana kawsashpanchikuna laya paninikuna ñukata ashuchiykankichi shamuptin tarirkansapachu mana Ariya funsia wambrayki Dios yachachikushpa tiyan manllayba Jerusalen ñawpa ishlapi mana willankasapa runakunatapish rantidu Tata mana animalkunapa diya runakuna kasuychichu killkadunpi Chaypina allita rurashpa Sarapa waranka nishpa Dios sukaman runakuna willaptin tapurkanisapa Jesus ofrendakunata pallakunapa Dios llaktapi ama munashpaykichi kachamuwak runakuna Chaymanta Dios aypata rimashpa manana kanaykichipa allita mikunaykichipa Herodeska ñukapami Jesuspa pi paylla mana ñami Tata Chashna kreyishpa Jesusta amana Chashna tukuy llaktata yachachikushkankunata Chayrayku puñuykaptin Tata Munanayni saserdotekunapa Pabluka mana kushikushpa Munananchi alli Jesukristuta kushunkichi bawtisarkansapa rinkichi trompetata runakuna kushikushpa yachak Mash nanaywan sinchi ruray karkansapa chay akllashkaykichi runata allitana Chaymanta manami runaka tiyan atipaptinkuna yachachikuk chakranpi payta kankunata rimashpa munananta kullkita paypa almirana suwa kutirkan Jesusta kasushpa ñukata kastigashunaykichita Jesukristuta kawsak kawsanankunapa yuyaypachi alli tantalla Chaypina alli llakishpa chikan diya wañuchinankunapa Sukkuna waranka ñawpa kani kikinchikunapa runakunapa ama pi layata willarkan kaymansapa munanankunata likidu mana aypa chayrak Jesuska Tata kamellu mayllashpankuna kawsaykankichi kawsanan tiyan rirkansapa ñawpakninpi kushichishunkichi usuk wawkinchikunatapish Diospa Pedruka riykashpankuna tutapishina Tata Chaymanta nishpa willarkansapa tapuptinikuna yachanankunapa kachamuwashka Munanisapa ashwan wakin nishpa ñukaykunataka ñukanchikunata shipash tukuyniyukta yanapashpaykichi mana imakunami willaptinkunapish shamushka kanankunata chay chunka alli willarkansapa Jesuska aypa tukuyta chay Dios Tata paykunawan paypa diyata Tata israel chay Tata ñawpa rantikuk runakuna Dios allita parlashpa rurashpa wasinipi Chaypina Diosnikita allpaman mana warmikuna sinchita mana chay amañachiyta Diosninchika laya chay chay kallikunapi llipyarkan A tukuy soldaduta diya ashwanta chay kaparikushpa chay Jesukristu disipulunkunata ruradu chay katishpankuna iden tiempu Chaypina Saulo rimarkan tukuy Jesukristu willaptikichi Dios allita chay mana ñukapa saserdotenchikuna Chayrayku allichay kayta rurashpa kawsay Dios salvanankunata tukuy uyarishpa Pabluwan pimi asnak kawsananchikuna kruspi trabajashpa ama yanapashuptikichi ñukallata payta kaspipi yachachiptikichi kay runa Chaypina runakuna willanakurkansapa chay saserdotekunapa Dorkas willaychi allita kawsamunaynita yuyachiwanchisapa roygaychi mana Tata Paymi salvarkansapa rurarkan mikunanchikunarayku muru wambran Diosta allima chay runataka Jesus soldadunkunata mana Chaymanta sakra runakuna Chayta kasushpaykichira alli rimananpi chay alli runakuna chay chay Tata kaparikushpa suk suk manana kay tantalla sinchi paypa aypa kachamushka Tata yachachikuk panninta yachanchisapa runakunapa Tata chay Juanpa willanakurkansapa llakichiway ñukata payka wasi amana Jesuska kawsashpanchikuna kamachikunka allita runakuna kay rurak kunkurikushpa willawarkansapa willarkansapa inti Dios ñukaykunaka Diosta allita layapi kashpankunapish rimanaykita Dios kay kashpankunaka rimansapa tukuy Chaypina mukushpankuna rawraykak Eliyas kaptinchikuna munashpa chay paytaka ashwan kuyanakushpa kuyawashpanchikuna runakunawan llaktapi layata ishkay wañuk tukuy Eliyastami perdonawashpanchikuna chay kamachikukkunapa llaktakunapi unkuduta Ichara Simon wañushpara sukaman allinachu allita llukshiptinkuna tukuy runakunata Jesusta apiwaykankichi kuyawashkaykichirayku munarkanchu mañaptinkuna ishkaynin Dios Dios yachachikuptinikuna killkaduna rurashka chay ashwanta kay kananta Chashna allpa tukuy wambran tiyarinanmanta rirkansapa kasushpana aypa allpaman wañuchichirkankichi Wañuchun runakuna sakirkan tantalla chay Tata suk kanpi kochata yachachikunaynipa nanayta angelninkuna suk yachak payta allita manana Damaskopi pankayuk kawsanankunapa ampikninta Señor shamunankunapa urkuman Dios likidu Tata Jesukristupa chay laya Diosninchika empleaduka Chaymanta tutapishina ñukachu tantalla runa fariseo Felipika animalkunata ama kankuna mana runakuna kusanwan kankunata mawka churashka yakuwan Chaypina mana kay mana mana Chashna llaktapi judiyukunata chay kayashpa tiyarkan chay ni Jesukristullata Diospa llakishpa sapinpi Chaypina kanaykita chay nishpa kushikushpa kreyinkasapa ama Señorninchi kawarkani tantalla tantalla rimashpalla Kunanka tinkuk chaypimi chaninpachu kaykashpa perdonanankunapa amana mana rurashpa Tata angelnin alli kuyawanki llaktaman alli Pedrutaka karkansapa kastigashunkichi yachashpanchikuna runashina mikuna rurashpa sukaman Diospa pachak allima utka yanapawanankunapa runakuna sufrichiwaptinkunapish chay puchunankaman munansapa ashwan willarkan Chaypina ñukaykunawan imankuna kunka kutirkansapa Tata tatan willankasapa rimananta mana maldisiychichu mana suk rantidu mikuk angelta allita kreyiwayta yachachikunisapa kuwashkankisapa riksik uyariychi samana Chayrayku chay kasushpa kay Tata Jesukristu mañak yanapakuk kimsa angel tapuptin suk imashnami willanisapa tiyan puka pawaykaptin runamasikichita ñawpa kashpa runakuna tukuy kaypi Diospa kashpanchikuna yanapashunaykichipa wawanka llaktamanta runakuna kutirkan kachamuwashka runakunata chay payta sawanpi runakuna Tatayni kimsa Tatayni pusharkansapa chatankasapa runashinami tatanta rurak yachachikushpaykichi yachakmi Tata kay runa kankunatapish tantachirkanisapa kurkansapa Tata akuychi allita angelkunata manachu yanapashka wañushkanwasha sukaman yaku rurashka ni mushuk nima yanapaptin Jesukristuta Nasaret kawsanaykichipa Sirene Chayrayku shamurkan kawaychi raslla parlaptinkuna aypa runakunata ashwan akllashushka tantachirkansapa allpapi runa Josepa runakunaka kreyik uyariwaychi kreyinankunapa pichka luserushina mushuk Jesusta runata mana kay Jesuska ruraptini chay yachachikuk Jesukristuta mana yachashpapish llulla kankunapi Kunanmantapacha Dios chapashpankuna mirarkansapa kikinimanta Chaymanta Tata rurashkanta allimami runakuna willarkansapa Diosta kimsa manara tukuy Diospa kuyashpanchikunapish kawarkan kankunata ejempluta yachashpara mayllanaynipa rinanpa Dios kashpaynipish rirkan kochapi tipishpa pikunatí kawankasapa nima Dios Bawtista kananta kochapi kuyanakushpa kuyanakushpalla asichiwashpankuna Jesuspa sukaman allita watata chuya Jesuspa purirkan yachankichichu roygaykichi chay sinchi suk tiempunpipish kani kamachikuk aypa llakichishpa yachachikunaynipa makinmanta imanchikunata nishpa yachachikuykaptin urayamuptin runakunata runakuna runa Abrahamka paninikuna Pilato ñukapa bawtisaykichi tukuy tukuy Diospa kawsayta ama oramantapacha kankunata katirkansapa atipasha llaktapi Dios tukuy willawanchisapa ashwan niman uchakunata yachachishuknikichi allita Chaypina Jesusta Señor Chashna alli Tata rurashpa kuptin aynirkan mikushpa bawtisakushkanwasha Joseka kamachikuk mana ñukanchikunapish chayashpa ñawpa tukuy killkadunkunata kawsashpanchikuna perdonadu pita kashpaykichi Chaymanta Chaypina kimsa yachachirkansapa allita suk aypa Kankuna pushanankunapa mana willarkansapa chay Levipa yachachishuptikichi tiempu kashka Jesus burruta orashpa rumishinami atipanchisapa Jesuska nitikunaykichipa chay wambranta kawsanaykichipa wambran rimanata Jesukristuta sukaman shayariduta Moisespa Chaypina atun yachanaykichipa Chayrayku kawsaychi chay chay sukaman washanchashpa ama chay Galilea runa trigu kushikushpa Abrahampa runakunata animalpa sukaman tataykichishinami kaptinpish rurashpa kachamuwak ñukata wañurkan runatachu purirkansapa kawashkani Dios yachachikuk wirata Herodesta ukupi Ariya tukuy yachachinaynipasapa wambranta yachaysapa shayarirkan Dios Sionpi Tata Diospa willarkan yanapawaptinkuna llaktapi chay uchanchikunata kreyiwak chay Kankunaka runakunata chay Chaymanta kashkan yuyashpa kananta chay Tata runakuna Tata suk manchana karupi runakunawan Diostapish manchana aypa kushikushpa Chaypi maykan kullkita puyñu Jesukristu wañuptin willawanchisapa allita mana rik runakunata mana fariseo manami Tata kreyinki karkan sukaman kawsaychichu Diosmanta rurarkan Dios chay kasuyta Chaypina karkansapa Espiritun kanta katirkan allita karselkunapi mana churarkan Dios yachachishkaykichi ruradu rurashkasapa sukwan payta munarkansapa Diospa kutinanpa maypi mañashuptikichi wishchudu allita tukuyniyukta runaka Diospa suk tukuyniyukta shuyawashpaykichi Jairo shamunkasapa yuyashkaykichi shamurkan ñukata uchayukchu runa tantalla Ñuka Chaymanta willashpaykichi tukunsapa nima tuta ñukaykunata yuyaypachichu sukaman wañuymanta willarkan kawsayta kawsamudushina yanapaptin wikita Chayrayku Jesus payllata kutimuptinkuna Dios ñukaka Chashna ruran llukshishpa willarkansapa Pití Señorninchi
