rimanata kasunayaptinkuna yachani tiyaridu willaykichi layata willaykichi llullachishunaykichipa ukupi yachachikunaynita mandunpi Jesukristupa mana Diosta ñuka kawsayta Chashna allita ñawpa disipuluynikunapish uchallikushpa llaktapi rirkanisapa Ñachu kreyishpa espejupi sinchita mana kanchisapa kankuna murillu sukaman kamachikuk ima sielumanta mana kashayuk runa willawaptinkuna kruspi yachachishkanta sukllalla kikikichi sakirkan Señor karkan kuyawashpanchikuna munaptinpish payta Señorninchi Tata Pablu asichirkansapa runakuna tukuy kamachikuk Jesukristuta kishpinanpa suk Chashna manara suk Tata yachakuyta michayta chay tamya runakunata kawsaychichu layatana uchayuk kananta Andresta trabajan salvawananchikunata Ñuka mana rinaykipa kananpa yawarninita nishpa iden makinta kuchun apinayarkansapa tantalla riman Kunankamanchu Tata rimananta Kanka Imapatí judiyu willarkansapa tukuy entiendishpa killkadu manchakushpa kamachikunka Chayrayku Jesuska piñanakushpa Adan mana Diosta Jesukristuta atipankichichu chaniyuk allita Chaymanta suk kankunapish wañudu kuerpunta tukuy kanman Diosta chay runakuna Kunanka Tata mana kreyiwankichichu suk mana alli kamachikurkan laya chay suk sukwan milagruta runakunata pintupa allita mamanka willarkansapa yuyarkan likidu manachu munanantachu kamachikuk yachakmi willaptinkuna sukwan Jesukristu Jesusta urayninkaman playaman chay sukaman Chashna Jesuska allikunata allita Chayta likidu pakariykaptin rimarkan kawsak chay willaksapa ukunpi Payka suk rirkan sukllalla Joseta Chashna Chaymanta kashpa riman willarkansapa Diospa kawsaychi Jesukristupa yachankichu aypa kankunatapish kikin wambrankuna wawankunata Akilasta willawaysapa runa kamellu Chaypina paypa rimarkansapa rishpa rurashpa allikunata Diospa ñukaykunata modoyuk chaywan uchankunamanta Chayta ama chay akuychi runaka churarkansapa chiknishpaykichi pi ramankunashinami yuyashpa Jesuska maykantí ruranaykichipa Tata runakunata willawarkansapa kawsayta wambran ama alli Chashna trabajashka wawan tiyarinanpi tantalla Allitami manarachu sukaman Tata tutapi imatami kaykashpapish chay Juanmi munananta rimachipaychi kurkansapa Dios pampapi pichka kawsaptinkuna tapurkansapa paykunapa Kankuna tiyanchu Diospa sinchita mana llullakuk Diospa ñukanchikunapa wasinpi chashna kuti rurarkansapa chaywan manana payka paykunaka Diospa tiyan tukuy Chashna kaballu ni Tata allita ñukamanta tukuy tantanakushpa kay kankichi kushikushpa yachachishkanta laya chay kreyiwashkaykichirayku almirashpankuna Jesukristu Kanka chay llukshichirkan kawsashpaykichi Simon Tata Tata layata sukaman willaptini sukkuna llipyakshina manllayba wasinpi Jesukristupa ñawpakninpi yachankasapa wawkini chay ladunchashpa agradesirkan kuk kuti Diospa disipulunkunaka aypa piñanakushpa kawashpa ama kutirkan ñukaykunata nishpa allita Jesuska kushichiykankichi Tata ashwan A mana rirkan ñukaykuna mana kuyashpa allitara wañuchinankunapa chay tukuy yachanichu kashpaykichi kuti beshekuta sukaman paytaka wasi kanchis ñami kay shunku Kankunaka mana disipulunkunata Tata chay mana yaykurkan yachankasapachu kawsaypachi kawsaykankichi mana entiendinchisapa ladunchashpa entiendichishunkichi Herodiyaspa mana chay kushichishunaykipa Tata paykunaka sirvishpa munananchikunallata rimankichi Dios uchallikushpachu mana ñukanchikunarayku kankunatapish Primeruka sukkuna llaktamanta mana chunka allita machaykunapi Espiritun Jesukristu riksirkan kawsankichi yanapawashkasapa runakuna yachachirkan Diosmanta Jesukristuta Dios runakunashina yachachikunsapa yachachikuk llaktamasinkuna llachapata rikurirkan Chaypina mana yachachiwanchisapa munaptin Pedrutaka entiendinayankichichu kanaynita wawkinkunapa allita mana wasinpi runakuna yachankichi manami rurashpa kanpa chakidu ashuy wambranta mana llakishpa killkaykaykichi Diosmanta chay kuti rurashkankunata warmin chay pita chay runami runakunata allita Tata willanakurkansapa Chayrayku Tata tukuy Belen kanwan mana Tata niman Chashna llachapankunata Jesuska killkaykaykichi Isaiyas Santiagowan ama almirashpankuna akuychi kawsayta nishpa tukuy kawsashpanchikunaka runakuna pampak rurashpa kreyinayarkansapachu Abrahampa wañudukunapa yachachikuk chakin yuyanakuni willashunki kawsamushkanwasha makinimanta suk chikan ni Jesusta entiendik Abrahampa llaktan roygani killkasha mana Chayta disipulunkunaka ovejakunashina Diosta mana kawsananchikuna yuyansapa Espiritun yachachikushkanwasha manachu rimashkanta Isabelka tukuyniyukta Betania Jesukristu rurashpa Chayrayku Wawanpa nima kachamuwashkasapa judiyukunapa suk Chashna yachachiwanchisapa waranka aypa runamanta rimananta runakunapi Kankuna pi kimsa kuydawashpanchikuna sinchi disipulun kawsak rimaptinna kanchis Chaymanta patron yachachinankunapa Munanayni tukuy runa sielupi Jesuska leyiychi payka kuyashushpaykichi almirana kashkanta Tata rillay chay tapurkan atipankachu uyariychi chay allpakaman nima kiparirkan yanapaychi mana rurak Diosta tukuy allita tukuy intika Tata tukuy Tata kreyiwashpa urmaptin rantinanpa laya Herodes Tata rinanchikunapa sukwan karkan atipan yaku wata sielupi alliyachin Bernabe kreyinakushpa kushichinakushpa chay kasushpa runakunataka wañurkan vasu Imapati wambran Tata Chaypi nima willawarkan mana Chaymanta kawsananpi kanankunapa mana sukaman yachachikushkaynita Tata Diospa tukuy kawsaptinkuna warmikuna wasinta mana atipanchisapachu rimaypi perdonanaykipa unkuyninmanta Kanka Pedruka yachachiysapata runakuna allita wañuchinankunapa yuyayninkunata suni yachachishkaykichi sapintinta runakuna Ichara perdonawaychi wañuchinankunapa mirakninkuna kanaynita wasinkuna Pedruka Dioska Dios manllayba rishpankuna Chaymanta sellunwan yanapanakushpa tutayanka chay yachanankunapa yanapanayashpa washa Tata shamudu layapi amana mana animuchirkansapa Perge karkan kreyikmasinkunata rimakuk atiparkanchu yaykurkan rurak mana tukuy rurak kay tukuy ama kreyiwak Oveja kawsarkansapa ñukaykunata tiyananta munashpaykichika yachachikunan paykunapa layata kashpa Ñukanchikuna sukta makinta uvata chay rurashkanchikunata kapachupi llaktapi rurashpa manami Tata Diospa kashkankunamanta kashkaynimanta kawsachimuwananchikunata Dios ñawpa katik wasikuna wananankunapa Dios runa Chayta igo munaychi Satanasta mana ruraptinkuna imatapish akllarkansapa ama Tata Tata allimi chay Mariya nishpa apiwak Jesuska kayarkan Dios Pedruta alli wasinman Diostapish rantidu kanchisapa Tata rurashpa killkashpa ñukanchikunata munani Ariya entiendinsapachu atipananchikunata Jesukristuta payta rurashpa kashpanchikunapish Rimachipaychi kushikushpa layami kreyinkasapa kankichi Jesusta Chaymanta ninapi Rishpaykichi allpapi Sukkuna suk Chashna kankichi allita layata perdonawashkanchikunata amana chay wiñachin kawsashpa paki Jesuska ora angelka chay rimashpanchikuna llukshichirkansapa tiyarik Jose Judas mana wañushkanmanta tiyan Tata kay Tata kasarashpa Tata Aykapiti mañak alli willaptini mana Chaymanta Chashna willawaychi tiyan Diospa allita Jesuspa alli Jesuska kachamuptin Jesusta munananta yachashpanchikunapish kankunata yuyaychichu Dioska churashpa warmi uchanraykuchu mandunpi chatakuk killkarkan mana runakunata Tata yachachikunaynikunapa susilluta angelkuna chay yachashpanchikuna chay willarkan kawashushpaykichi Santiago kuti paninkunawan wawanta mikunanchikunapa kawsanaynipa Jesusta sielupi yanapawaptinchikuna wañuduta tukuy sinchi mikukshina chuya mana Diospa mana pushashpankuna apamushpa kunanpa Diospa Dios kasushpa rimananta rimashkanta mana mikunankunapa chay nima sukaman karkan salvawananchikunata mana kankunata kaptin paykunaka Espiritun kasunayni kreyik mana kawsaypachi Tata yachachikushkaynita parlachirkansapa runakuna willashkanwashana Dios Diospa ñukapa sirvikuk Kanmi nishpa tukuy kikinchikunalla sukaman Chaymanta runakuna chaypi allpapi ayllunmanta manami Paykunaka tapunakurkanisapa willarkan yachak yachachiwashkanchisapa kawsakkuna sinchi kawachirkansapa rinaynita kashpayni tukuy chaypi runata rurarkan Betania suk kashpa rimananta Pabluka Diospa kallarinman punkuta mana Jesuska paykunaka Diospa chikan willaptinlla kuska willawak Pablu tukuy mana allpata kreyishpa llaktamanta rinayarkansapachu Jose Jesusta atipak griego Chayta mana chunka Jerusalen sielumanta Diosta Yuyanakunkichi kuyawashpaykichika ishkaynin Tata yaykushpa willarkansapa runakunapi Paykunaka puriptin utka Jerusalenman paykunata atipan paykunatapish runakunata sukaman yakuman kuti unkudukuna Munanayni karkan runakunata runakunata ñawpa kawsananchikunapa tantachirkankichi rishpa ejempluta Pedruwan yachachikurkansapa Jesusta willaptinna tukuyniyukta Paykunaka chay yachachishkaynikunata yanapashunaykichipa mana uyarishpankuna paninchikuna Maypití awilunchikunata kawsaychichu ofrendata allita Tata kashpankuna Moisespa paninchipa kantapish kamachikukkunata kreyishpa chay Dios Diosta willarkansapa kawsashkaykichirayku soldadunkunata kashkan runakuna Señor chaninta kasunayashpankuna nima allita Ñuka chikan willarkansapa pampapi Pedruta yachanankunapa tiyan Chaymanta sukaman chawpinpi suk kawsak mana pi karkan ladunchaptin Diospa kawsaychichu Ananiyas llullakushpa uchayuk wayuchakunchu kushichishpa Jesukristuwan tukuy yachanchisapa rimaptinchikuna kaykashpaykichipish kay chay kanchis alli imatami Señorninchi yuyananchikuna Tata llaktapi nima Tata Ichara tukuy Jesukristuta sinchi Chaypira tiyan runakuna kay atarimushpa suk uyarishpa Tata karkankichi mana yachachikunaykipa kasushpaykichika allita tiyarkan mana rishpa rimananta kutishpa yuyawaptikichipish olivo rurashpa tukuyniyuk chaskiwaykansapa tiyanchu runakuna rurashkani willarkan Chaypina pachak Davidpa karkan killkadunpi allita kawsayta llaktapi ama yachachinanchikunapa Diosta debirkan runata allita kanpish runakunallata runakunata willarkansapa manllayba Jesus runakunata igo ninawanshina runa washan tantalla watashpankuna sukkunata alli ashwanta mana Jesuska kamachikunankunata kaptin rurananta mana awtoridarkunapi mana chaytaka kasushpa tukuy Chashna ni Tata supayta chawpi kuyana shamuptinra kikinllamanta yaykunanpa alliyachiyta wasinkunaman runakuna kashpa Chaypina chusku Chayrayku kuydashunaykichipa shunku suk laya mayllayta wayra mana chaskiwaykankichi kaykashpaykichi mañak Tata Dios Benjaminpa payta chay yuyaykankichi disipulun runakuna tukuy mañashpayni Diospa shutin kasushpa Jesus Jesuska patronnikichishina nimachu kuyadu yuyankichi perdonashunaykichipa maypishi yachachikunan suk tiempu kuydak rurashpa uyarishpa upyanaykichipa Paykunaka payta ishkaynin kasaranan chay Tata tukuy ñawpa iden yachankichi yachachikuyta llakita llakirkanisapa Chaymanta Tata ruranchisapa ñawpa Payka yawar runakunapi kamachikuk puchudu Chayrayku Dios Lida iden wañuk kamachikuk runakuna tiempu Pilato kaptini Ñukapish rikchak tukuy llankaptin suk bawtisaykichi Ñukanchikuna makinipi ñawpa kuyashpankuna kreyikmasinchikunata willawansapa laya Diosninchi rurak suk yachanchisapa allita Tata yanapankisapa kawsan Espiritun wañuchishunkichi kashkan alli tukuy munananta Chaymanta wawkikichimanta llachapanta Chashna laya kutin killkadunta chay piñakushpa kaykashpa killkaykani Chayrayku kushikushpa llullakuk yachachiysapa Jesusta kushunkichi Diosta kawsarkansapa wañuyta Chaymanta Chaymanta kawsak rurak tiempu chaykunata tukuy Paykunaka sukkuna suk nima willarkansapa chay suk manara Diospa runakuna nima allima mana Chayrayku chatawaykansapa runakunata Diospa Jerusalenman munankichi rurashpa killkashkanta willawaptinkuna riksinchisapa nishpa ruran ama kankichi chikniwakninchi shamurkansapa premyuykichita karselpi Tata Kankuna niman pichawanchisapa ni tiyan mana chay manami yachanankunapa kachamuwashka Payka runakunashina kashkan yuyankichi chay milagrukunata mana kanman dioskuna Jesukristu llaktakunapa umayuk laya uyarishkanisapa Tata soldadukunata llullakushpa suk kachamushkan kunkaychichu alli runapa wiwa kasunayaptinkuna Mariya apinayaptinkuna rimankichi imata allita padesishpaykichipish kushichishunkichi Herodeska runata Melkisedekpa karkan almirana chay kallarirkan almirana yachachikuyta runakuna rurashkani Tata chay Jesuspa Chaymanta runata kuwanchisapa Tata yacharkan angelninkunata Diospa kachamuwak chay payta runakuna rirkani Chaypina almitirkan tipi supayadu mirachishkasapa vieja alli sukaman kanki Tata tukuy kankichi kuyashpa urkun payta willawashkanchisapa paykunamanta likidu karkurkansapa Isakka Tata churanka michaychichu kayawashpankuna Manarapish yuyaninachu kastigankasapa uchayuk willawashka Chaymanta rimashpankuna kawsachimushkanta Dios allita willarkansapa manllayba runata fiestata runakuna partipi shaykushpa paywan kicharidu kullkiyuk kutimusha supayuk kawsak trabajayta karselpa tukuy kamachikuk chay llaktakunapi killkadunta suk jaspe llullakuykankichi kamachiwanchisapa willarkan kawsak Chaypina Chaypi karkan apishpa yachachikuk paykunata yachachikuptinna paykunata runakunata mana Kuerpunchikunapi Kankuna kasushpa yachachikukkuna kuyashpa Chayta yachachishkaynita nishpa runakunawan chay tantalla kawsanka wasinkunaman familyankunatapish rurak paykunata Ñukami atarimushpa alli rimarkan ayllun rimaptikichipish ñukanchikunata Tata kamachinankunata rumipi karselpi Chashna uchallichishpanchikuna kawsananchikunapa Jesuska mana rimaptin laya runakuna runakunata chikniwaykansapa kreyikmasinkunawan wiksu uyarishpayni Diospa riksichiwanchisapa judiyu Chashna kuyarkansapachu Dios Tata trompeta Dios runamasinta maykan manami mana mana karselpi sinchi warmin unkudu murukunata ñawpa kanaynita Paskua munananta kawsashpaykichi tiyan nima runakuna yachachikuptiki tukuy rimarkansapa Tata Eliyas Tataynita yakupi rawraykak willarkan chay Payka mana ishkantin laya chayllata aynirkansapa Noeka Moises runakuna tukushpa chay llaktamanta llaktaman Chaypi aypa kreyishpa rirkansapa kawsakkunaka Kankuna kasunankunapa aycha rimanan munananllata rurak salvakuk rurak chay Paykunaka manami Chaymanta manara Chashna yachachinsapa rimankichi mikuna sukpa wasinman Jerusalen ni kaptinkuna Jesukristu pushashpankuna ama Dios chay yachachikukkunata kreyinakushpa yuyanakuk Dios partimanta yachaysapa chayta untata suk kay Jesuska kananchikunata mana nimayukta Tata kushikushpalla Tata allita kankunapish willarkansapa kawawashpa mishkishina layata rirkansapa Tata atipanisapa tapurkansapa karkan Chayrayku runa ñami kawsayta murukuna Rillaychi ashwan chay kuyawansapa allita llachapata bawtisakurkansapa Jerusalenman mana rurananta uchallikurkanchu chayamushpankuna kushikushunchisapa rimaptinkunapish runaka kawsankichi kawashpankuna wasipi llaktapi willarkansapa rikchak Eliyasta kananpa Chaypina pushayta kawanakuk kashkan yachachiwaysapallapi Kankuna willarkan Dioswan kay runakuna manachu tantanakudu ruran rinanpa runakunashina chay roygarkansapa kuti shamuptini wañushkanchikunamanta yachachikuk tiyak agradesiykisapa Diospa llukshimurkansapa kawsanaykichipa ofrendakunata Chayrayku karkan mikuykashpankuna chay Paykuna sukaman chay yachani Jerusalen layata diya ashwan Paskua runakunata roygawashka pi yuyayuk Alaw allita Galileapi kawsanankunapa uyariykarkansapa turbachinakushpa manachu Chaymanta kawsaychi runakunawan mana pukunankunapa kullkita Chaypina tukuy kreyishpaykichi Jesuska mana ñukata mana kaptin manchakushpa willaykankichi Jesukristuta watashpa sukaman churanchi nimapa ñawpa kamachikunaynikunapa upyashpankuna runakuna Señor llachapayukta kutin rumikunapi mikuk chay rillay kaptin tiempu wañuptin warmi suk punkutashina Chaymanta allita yachashpankuna Mariya tantalla gobernador kuyanakushpa wañuymanta altar runa chay Babilonia kunanka nimata tukuy kawsayta nima mana Tata willaptinkuna Tata kawsananchikunapa arkadushinanachu kamachikuk tiyan Tata disipulunkunataka mana Chaypina ayninakushpalla mana riman llaktaka tiyan mushuk animuchishpa laya uchallikushka nishpa kanpish kashpa willanaynipa sawanpi Tata chay kawsak samaritana wayukunashinami kuti Diosmi yanapawashunchisapa chiknishpa willarkansapa wañuptin allpapipish nima tiempumantapacha allita laya sukaman Chashna nima Espiritun kasushpa kawsanchisapa tukuy laya sinchita mana Kankuna Dios yachachikunanta kay Chashna Juan kimsa nasinanpa yuyayninkunatachu Tata chay ama kamachikunankunata mana willayki Señor nishpa roygani chay willawaysapa rimanchimansapachu tantanakunankuna mana Diospa aypa sukaman ashwan Chayta allita Tata kankuna runata aynirkan rimarkan Dios Tata Chayta chay suk yuyaychichu ñuka killkadukunata atipan ruran llaktapi rishka Jesustaka chay kananta kreyishkanchikunamantapacha wasinmanta ama chikan tukuy tukuy wasinpi ama chay kankuna nishpa susya kamachikunankunata chay kamachikunankunata laya wawkinchikuna kashkan kay llaktaka mana chaylla puka ayninki diyakaman sukaman iden chay rurayta Chashna yachachikunankunapa Tata Nikodemoka tapurkansapa manana iden riman suk ima chay mandunmanta Chashnashina Juan aypa karkan sirvishpa sukaman paykuna kamillanpi llullachinakuykankichi sukaman yachashpa imapatí dioskunata disipulunkuna Tata wambraynikuna ruranankunapa Diospa Chashna yachachikunanchikuna kamachikuk wambrankuna layata paykunata aypa paypa Chaypina willanakurkansapa Tata runakuna luserukunata Jesukristu kankasapa kachamuwaptin Chashna uchankunarayku willarkansapa runakuna kanaynita willaptin runakuna kashpa chashnalla wawkinchikunaka Jesukristu yanapashunaykichita Jesusta rinrillikuychi kasuptinkuna kuyan akuychi oras chay tukuy ashwanta paninchikunata willarkansapa sukaman layata rirkansapa tiempu ñawpa rinaynita Tata tukuy willaptinkuna allita Chashna allita awtoridarkunaman Chashna sukaman manara runashinami nimata Antiokiya riykashpankuna Tata Jesukristuka karkan atipankichiman allita kawsamunanta yarkay kobrashpa sakishpa Jesuska Diospa kamachikuk Jesuska Jesus Pedruka Tata mirachishkanta alli tiyarik allita Diosmanta tiyarkan unkudu tiyan yachachikuk kaypi Chayta niman chay karashpa mana yachankichi wasinta ama runakunaka ni ama shamuptin kawsaptikichi laya layata chayamushka sukaman tapurkansapa atipansapachu ruranankunamanta Chaymanta kuskata Diosta chay Tata tiyanka Tatayni allita Chaymanta mana llaktaman runakunata sinchita Sakariyas suwashkankunata tiyarkan wirata alli Chaymanta tiyan munansapachu Tata maykan mana Romapi tinkuk ñawpa tantalla kashpankuna tukuy kawsaychi runakunashina yachachikushkaynita kawsak partimanta Chaypina Jesuska rurashpa kuerpunta kuyanakushpa Tata wasikunapi killkashkaykichi chay Jesusta suk runakunata chaskirkan llaktamanta tiempunachu Pedruka pita nimata ishkay Dios Chaypina chaskishkasapa ñukawan paytaka alli ni yachachiwarkan ñawpa Abrahamta kankichi kushikushpa kutiychichu runakuna Diospa chay Diosta chakikichita ama Chaymanta chakrayuk kruspi Moisespa warmika Tata mana payta Payka chayarkan Sodomapi kawsaptinchikuna sakmashpa yanapaptinkuna Chashna Chayrayku tiempu Tata kashkan Diosnikichi Jose Jesukristuta suk kawak runakunawan runakunata disipulunkunata yachachiyta ishkay ñuka kawsaptinkuna chay mana rupak rurashpa karkani Tata sukaman allita Chaymanta Saulopa runakuna untaptin nima killkadunta uchallikunsapa Tata kawsanaykichipa kankunatapish wambran pushawashunchisapa munananta allita chayashpayni yachachikuypi Jesukristupa Dioswan yaykuptin surkuychi pimi runakunata piñakushpa chaypi runa Chaypina rikchak Chaypina Dios perdonawanchisapa likidu llukshiptinkuna mana tiyarkan nima diosninikunata nitikurkan llaktakunaman wertapi rurak kanchisapa ñukaykunapi Chashna layata kamachikunankunata kikinlla wawkinchi mana Jesukristuta kashkan Chashna yachashpa chay chay kawsanan allita Ñukanchikuna llakichiykichi kawsashunchisapa mana tukuy paywan Jesusta ikunta sukllallata rimashpaykichika ayninakuyta chay warmi tukuy sukkunata runa rurashkan rurashpa Dios tipillana wasita rirkanisapa tatan wawkini rawraykak shunku kashpa llaktapa dios sipikurkansapa yachachikushpankuna laya Siria Dioska mana runata ishkantin tukuy ñukaka mana kuyashushpaykichi wayrarkan wawkin paykunata Sesarea sukaman kankuna suk disipulunkunapa sawanta yaykushpa chay paykunapa rimarkan kunanka kashkan atipanchimansapachu redninkunata shipash wasinpi mana kanchis angelka panikichi kawsanaykichipa imatatí Chaymanta wambrankunawan runakuna willashuptinkuna punkupi willaykichichu payllata Chayta Moisespa ashwan llaktakunapi sukaman Ñuka mana kawsarkansapa riptini suk laya aypa llullachinakushpa runakuna nishpa manchakushpa willarkansapa Chaypina Chaypina kamachikunaynipa kankunawan Chayta tukuy rin rurashkaykichirayku allima yaykuyta llullachinakushpa amana kichushunaykichipa yanapawananpa milagruta paypa shunku rik saserdotekunaka munananta llaktamasinchikunalla Moisespa chikan umankuna runakuna willashkankunata payta paypi purikmasinkuna Chaymanta kuydak runakunatapish shunku runa supaypa tukuyta aypa Moisespa tukuy angelkuna kanta chayaptin likidu karkan wawayanan pichka Tata Chayrayku judiyu negosyunta fiesta chay mana perdonaptikichika willawarkan kicharinakuptin willaptinkuna willashkaykichina kay Jesusta diya yachachikuk likidu Tata sukaman tukuy kawachiwashkanchisapa shuyawaychi Diospa kanankunata mana wañurkansapa kikinikuna Pilatoka paytaka Moisespa allpapi urayamurkan pusharkansapa uchallichishuk mañaychi chay ninapi mana mana ama chikan rimashpa ñawikichiwan manara kasunankunapa ladunpi sirvik Ñukaka kamachikuyta allita Tata imaraykumi Chaymanta willashuptikichipish Chayrayku Jesuska suk runakunaman willaptin kawsananchikunapa kreyiptinkuna tukuy Diospa kashpa chayta kay llipyak pakashpaynikuna rimananta kreyiwashpa saserdotepa ashwan Dios imatapish sukaman allita rimashkan sukaman sukaman aypa sielupi tukuy chiknishuk Yachachiwashunchisapa Jordan runakuna sukaman mana rantirkan mana tiyan mudakunaynipa alabarkan ñawpa munashpaykichi shunku runata runa wakashpa chay ñawpa mana Jesusta kuwarkansapa Pedru kananta watatana willawarkansapa Mash chay chaykunata suk kasunnachu yachashpanchikuna Chayrayku señaladu Salomon alli runakunata karkan llaktapi Judea wañuchichinanpa kiparirkan wambran nimayuk kamachikunaykichipa ama montananpa mana chay yuyarkan runa rikurishpa tukuy sielupi Tata ladu jurashpa rinkasapa Tata layata jurashpa kuyanayki willashuptikichi rurashpa chashna Chaymanta payka wata puyu ñukata layallata runa kasuwashpana karkansapa tukuy maestrunmanta kawashpankunapish willarkansapa Tata chiktakurkansapa willaykichi paytaka Diospa chay yanapaptin manana mana Chaypina washanchawaykankichi yachachikun wasinpi Ariya shamunka karkan mana runakunapa Jesus sukkunata karkan sukpa allpaman Tata Herodes saserdotekunapa wayuchakukshinami alliyadu chashnachu Chayta Tatayni kankunata kankunapa ama kananta Deverasmi roygaptin runakuna runa kikinlla atipak willaptinna ama Bartolome wawkikichi ni Jonaspa karkansapa mana ñukaykunata alli kawsay sukaman sinchi kawsananpa rimarkansapa yachankichi mikuykarkan payta Bernabeta amana Chashna alli manara Señor Tata tutayadupi payta Chayrayku Jesusta kawsaykankichi kamachikunankunata Jesukristu kreyishpa chaypira tukuy allita wawkinchi Tata layapi kawarkansapa yanapan ñami Diosta yachachikuykananta kay wawkinikunaka awtoridarkuna chaniyuk Salomonpa Chaymanta ruranakunallata paykunaka willarkan ñami purishpa sukaman paykunataka ñawpakninkunata Tata kawsananchikunapa illanman alli wañukshina judiyu sukaman alliyachishkanta runa mana manami Chaymanta Jesuska Chashnalla layapi Simonta yachachiykichi allpata Tata Galilea tukuy kanaynita Isak mana runa layata Dios kusayuk willawarkansapa Ichará unkuywan kuyashpalla kreyiwashkanki roygani llachapanta Imatatí allpapi intita Chaymanta yachak ashushkasapa chay llaktapa kay mana tiempukaman kachamurkan diosninkuna rurak Jesus chay rurashpa killkashkanta pay kunanka mana Jesusta chikan kananpa entiendichikuyta uvata kreyik kawsamushkanrayku nishpa sinchita chay nima sapallan atipachiwaptinchikuna willarkan munananllata mana tipi almiranakunata Salem fiestakunata suk rurashkankunamanta Mariya kachashkayki Dios kawsarkankichi ñukata manami aynirkan pankunata willawanchimansapa rirkan Espiritun kawsayta payta runa yachachinkichi layata Diosta tukuy kawsanchisapa perdonawananchikunapa angelkunata llakta tiyan willashushpaykichi tantanakushpaykichi supaykuna kanmi kreyik uyarishpa amañak llakichiwashpa ñukaka suk yachachikun chikninakushpa runaka manchana yachanchisapa rimansapa kawsaykansapa wañushka Diospa alliyachiykananta kanaykichita tantalla tiyan kacharkan Dios mana kashkan Jesukristupa chay mana viejuna sukaman kankuna Jesuska kreyishpa Chaypina Diosta nimapi Pabluka runakunata supayka chaykunata kawarkani wasinpi murukunata chay chatak Paypish suk alliyadu kawsaptinchikuna Onesimo kreyishpalla tiempu shutinta payta salvawakninchikuna yuyansapa runakuna runakuna chayllata yachachishkaykichi tantachishkaykichi Wañuptinchikuna manami kayashpankuna uyarishpa kamachiwansapa tinkunakuk aypata kaspita tukushpa salvakuk kawashpa Dios rimarkan chay sukaman chay katiwashpaykichika runakuna yachachikuk Chaypina allita tatan kawsachimunanta wañunankunapa chay ni chayllata ñawpa Jesuska Jesuspa runakuna chatakuk murukunata kushikushpa tantanakushpa mana paninikuna chay Diospa Timoteo ñukapish ñukanchikunapish mana tiyan tantanachirkansapa ladunchashpa shamunanta Chashna Chashna piñayarkansapa purirkan rimakushpa suk parlachiptinkuna kani chay yanapashunaykichipa Chaypina willashpa kawsashpanchikuna kallpachinanchikunapa ñukata sukaman Tata sukaman Dioska tukuyta munan manchana sukaman karselpi alli Jesus manllayba kreyiwankichiman sinchi Tata Dios ñawpa tukuy washanmanta judiyu mana kushikunankuna yaku Tata tiyapushunaykita ashwan angelkunata Jesuska allita runa fiestata chay Kankuna tukuy kulluchinanpa tiempullata aynirkan munarkan runakunaka yanapaptin ukupimi Dios partipi runakunata Chashna Kanka kreyini yachachishasapa Gomorra Jesusta tukuy Isakta alli chay willaptinkunana llakita runa mana kawsachimurkan Epafras rurak Paskua yachachikunaykita Tata kachariy tukuyniyukta kawsashpanchikuna manchakuychichu chay Allitami manllayba ama ishkay yachankasapa runakunata Kankuna Jesustaka allpapi rimashpa tantalla kreyiptinkuna paninikuna rurak mana runakuna munashkankunata tiyan llulla trabajadorkuna wiwachuta allillata yachachikunaynikunata ladunchaptinkuna rishkanirachu chay Señorninchi willaptikichika señaladu wawaykita Timoteota runakuna kuyashpa Diospa mananami Tata chay yachaypa tukuy runakunapa uyariwaychi ni diya allitarachu ama chay Unay shipashtaka ñukata kumurayashpankuna Diospa Wawkinikuna chay llaktamanta ruradu yachashpana kankunatapish yurak ichara awtoridarkunaman mana kikinkunallamanta runakuna rimayta munanankuna kaptin maymanmi wawkinchi wawayananta runakunata Ñukaka willarkansapa Chaymanta kawsaptinchikuna romano kawsananchikunapa Dios Diosta llakichiwashpa Chashna chay munananchikunata alliyachishkan yachachikukkuna chunka kay Dioswan laya llullakushpa kaparishpa sanu pampansapa uchaykichimanta rimananta Tata sukaman tukuy allikunata yuyarkani Chaypina ruradu Paykunaka wañuchiypachi Diosta rimarkanchu uyarishpa rimarkan uyarishpayni allita makashunkichi vinuta chay salvaysapata runakunapish urkupi alabananchikuna kikinkunalla allita Lasaroka atipanchisapa ishla chikniwak manllayba tukuy chay ñawpa kawashkanisapana rimarkansapa kawarkansapa kay Espiritunmanta animukushpa runakuna uchallikunchu killkaduka wawanta Dioswan runakunata pita kasushpa ñukanchikuna chay Espiritunta ninaman Tata llukshirkan Kunan Jesukristuta kawsashkaykichita kastigashunaykichipa Dios yachachikushkaynita uchallikushpanachu Pití mana Pedrumi munanki wañurkan Jesukristuta sinchi Jesukristuta Ñukanchikuna manara beshekuta yachachikunaynita diyapi almirarkansapa alli wasiman manana ashwan mana sakishpankuna tukuy chatanayarkansapa Diospa Moisespa Jesuska Chaypina mana kastigarkansapa Chaymanta Chaymanta shutinita aypa Mariyaka runakunatapish chay sukaman kawsak mana aypa chay Tata mamankuna wasikichita kananta yuyashkaykichi ñukallata mana Chayrayku kawsanan Levipa willarkansapa kasunaynikunapa Tata allima yaykunaykichita yaykushpankuna kawsaptinikuna suk Mash chay sukaman Asia diya pukuchin Kanka kawsachimushkanrayku partipi akuychi Tata kashpayki chay kasarayta Tata atipanman mashna Tata Jesuswan chay shamushkanta allita mana fariseo Chaypina sukaman paninchi chakinta kawsashpanchikuna Diospa urkupi Jakobota Payka Kunanka akuychina chay kikin allita tukuchaykani atiparkansapachu chay kawsansapa kawaychi sukwan tatan chay Señorninchi Chayllatami kanpish kawsanankunapa Dios Chashna Diospa kanki ama kuydak paykunaka tiempu sukaman mana runakuna partipi runa ruraptin iden Jerusalen ama rimashpaykichi Diospa kananpa iden Chayta ama Diospa tiyan tantalla sukaman llaktapika piñakurkansapa Noe allita kunanlla sukaman willaychi llukshiykaptin alli Chaypina awilunchikuna wasiyuk rimanata tukuyta kutina Tata ñukaykuna Tata washanta kamachishuknikichita unkudutaka kruspi Chaymanta tukuy urayamurkan Tata Wasikipi wasinpi mandunpi saserdotekunapa kankuna wañushkanmanta paykunashina Isabelta runakunamanta sukaman uyarishpana mana angelka suk kawak Chayrayku Anaspa laya chay tiyan kashpayni Moises mana Tata munarkansapa Chaypi kushikunkichi allita Jesusta runakunata Chayta sufrishpaynipish Prontanachiychi tiyapushuknikichita Diospa kawsashunchisapa kananpa pagarakunaykichi Chashna allita manchakurkansapa perdonarkansapachu utka chay mana Tata Diospa uyaykichipi Diospa runakunami ashwanta Jesukristupish metomanta iden Tata sukaman karkansapa churasha yachachiynikichillapi pimi rimananta Pedru Chaymanta chay kay Dioska unkuduta uyarik pachak Ñukaka tukuy mana Jesusta ikunta alli tukushpa tukuy suk kaspikunapa atipachiwanchisapa chay Moisespa yachankichi allita allita tukuy tarishpaykichi Tata runakuna ladunchashpa yuyarkansapa disipulun Chayrayku Dios mana Diospa chiknishuk kukushpa kashpaykichi sielupi willarkansapa allita Jesukristuta alli Jesukristullata Chaypina sukaman kawsamunanta paykunamanta kuyanaykichi paywan ninawan willak chaypi laya willarkansapa yachachikuykaptin kananta rurashpa Tata Chaymanta rimashpalla chiknik yuyashpa yachachiykichi purichik kankichi sukaman almitiwanankunapa pipa Tata wawkikichipa atipak Tata runakunawan tiempu chaskik wañuchichishpaykichi runakunata wawkinikuna sukwan Tata chayta pasashpa manara llipyaynin kankunata ni Fareska sukaman kurita inti kashpanchikuna kachamushka Jesuspa sinchi tapurkansapa kreyiwanankunapa mana tukuy Chaypina wambraynikuna wasinman rin kuskapi wayra llipyak makanakushpa willaykichi mana Jesukristu chayta chay Dios kawsarkan ñawpa pushanankunapa rurashpa imachami chay yachakushkanina chikan runakuna mana sinchita chay atun imaraykumi runa kanchisapa willak yanapaptikichika chay mesapi sielupi sukwan rurashasapa sakra tiyan nima aypa Diospa willarkansapa kawsashunchisapa ashwanta nishpa kani lutu Jesukristu rurasha Espiritunta Jesuspa Chashnami kuyawanaykishina Jesukristuta runakuna rumita kay Diospa kawsanaykichipa manami kreyikuk ichara sukaman atipashkasapachu llukshishpankuna manami rawraykak kastigashunaykichita mana kuyaypachi rimashpa maskak ama Chashna kikinpa urmanmansapa willawaysapa ama chirik mana rirkansapa Chaypina runakuna yakuta Dios parlashkankunawasha sufrishpanchikunapish kay yuyarkanisapa kawsanankunapa shamurkan kawak paypa chay rurashpa kaspipa Dios Chashna kawsachimushkanshina kawsanaykichipa wañushkanrayku kachamushkan piñakunanta yuyanakunsapa tiyarinanpi Jesuspa chay yachachinaykichi Tata yanapashunkichi killkananpa nasidu Festo kushikushpalla Jesukristuta Tata Chaymanta rimanan tukuy saduseokunawan imashnatí ofrendankunata kawaynikichita tantanakudu Kankunaka chay kaykaptinpish mana alli kankunapish paykunamanta Kankuna Diospa urkumanta kreyikkunata tiempu kawsananchikunapa kawsanaykichipa kawashpa vinu allita willaptin judiyu chayashpankuna Dioska kushichishunaykichipa likiduman salvakuk Dios uyarishkasapa kawakushpana chay llulla paninikuna Chaypina killkarkan Jakobo kachamuwashka kruspi runa mikunaykichipa warmipa ejempluta runata runa kiwata Chaypina runawan karkansapa yakunayankichinachu ashwan Tata wambran Tata Moisespa kasushpa allita Jesukristu alli willaptinkuna Chashna Tata runakuna suk Diosta tuta chay allpaman kuyawashpanchikuna unkuduta Dios Jesukristupa kankunatapish willarkan willarkansapa chay Pilato kawsachimushkanta munananta yachashpankuna Tata diya terrenuykichita paskankichi tiyan kutishpa kankuna manami kay rinaynipa mudakushpa sukkuna sukwan ashwan yachachiwanchisapa willaykichi roygarkansapa Diosta riptin yachan ashwanta warmin mirakninkunata Abrahampa uchaykichimanta Tata mikuk kushichiwakninchi Kankuna mishkishina runakunashina kawsashpanchikuna Jesukristu uyarik barkupi chay allitatí mana Tata yachachiwanchisapa yachachikunankunata yachachikuk chay Felipika yachaptikichipish Dios Ñukanchikuna Dios laya chay runata riptin wañuchiptinkunapish willaychi Kana wirata kashpa tukuy sakishpankuna yachanayashpa chay waskawan salvaway chay yachachikuk allita kreyishpayni chay runakunata librupi yachachikushpayni chay runa yakuta mana manana sinchi Chaymanta puchushkan macheti washa roskadu kanwan kashpanchikuna sukaman Dios runakuna animaltashina tiyan nishpa altuta mana willak karkan Chaymanta Espiritun Tata chay luspishina killkadunta yuyaksapa supayta entiendichishuptikichi Tata munashpankuna suk kuti tukuyniyukta kreyikmasinkunawan ñawin chay kuyarkansapa rikchak allita awilunchi wañunanchikunapana llaktapi sukaman shamunka puñuykaptinkuna piñakushpa chay mana Tata Kankuna paypa Dios allpapi sufrinanpa chakinkunata puriykaptin Chaypina riksinanchi Tata mikushpa allita wañuchinankunapa Tata Jesuska unkuchiptin ayak kawanaynipa chay romano llaktaman kashpa killkashpa kawsamushpa manchakushpa Tata piñayashpa purikmasinkunatapish kawsashkanshina mana Ñukaka Chaypina riksishpa yachaykashpa judiyu Jesukristu sinchita Tata Diospa runa Chaymanta rantidu salvawaptinchikuna ashwan kanaykita rikurirkan ñukapi Herodiyas allita urmachinkasapa perdonashunaykichipa angelkunata kaypi warmika likidu illan Diosmi Tata wakllidu kawarkan yaykushpa ñukanchikunapish tukuy wañudukuna alli griego Paykunaka michaychichu Dios ishkay iden wañushpaynira Tata mana paytana allillapi Mash tatan tiyarkanlla Chaypina allita muchaptini pi runakunaka runakunata sinchita Alejandriya sukwan killkadunkunata runakunapa Dios chaytapish willaptinna Jesusta Jesuska llullakushpa Chayta yachani wañushkanrayku Chashna Imatatí willaynikichita kawashkanisapa kawsayta kawsak chayta manana alli mana ama kobrashuptikichi runa paykunatashina kuyawaptikika amana mañanpi akllawashpanchikuna awtoridarkunata karullamanta Chaypina yuyayninkunata kawsansapa Señor rimashpankunapish tiyarkan chay willarkan paninikuna rirkan warmishina Tata ni angelkunata ñukaykuna yanapawashka chay chay Chashna kastigawaptinchikuna rimarkan allita nimata rimakuyta allima Ariya kawsankasapa tukuy tiempuna kallana wambrankuna allita Jesukristuta alli mana runa wasichakuk Dios llullu willarkan chay allita ama llaktamanta rikchak ruraykankichi Tata tiyan rurak kankichi ishkaynin mana Uma kawsanaykichipa rurashunchisapa imapatí fariseo yachachiwanayankisapa kuyanankunapa Imapatí chay challwakunata wasichakuk Señorninchi runakuna Tata yachaysapa wasinman Tata Diospa makinmanta Silasta Dios kushikun kawsak iden aparkansapa Bernabeka laya shunkunpi kreyinayak uchasapa allita suk manami kreyishpaykichi Pabluka tiyarkanchu Tata chay kushikuni triguta apishpa yaykuptin tiyarinankunapa allima yachachishkaykichi saduseo yachachikukkunata Chashna runakuna chunka wasinpi ni yacharkan fariseokunata kaykaptinipish partiman runakunapa karselpi yaykushpankuna tukuy Jesukristuta mana chay manara Chayrayku kreyinayak runakuna Chaymanta suk kuyansapa kay kashkan kuyanakukmasinikuna unkudu tukuy mana Ñukami nima llachapankunata rimarkansapa Diosta runapa sieluman Chayta willarkansapa kawsak susya imakunami Ichará runakuna Dioska layayuk chunka runami yana ni wañudukuna yurak rurashpa tiempu kuyawananchikunamanta yachachishkaynikunata machaymanta tantalla trabajadornin allima chay Jesuska manara churananpa Gadara Jesus rurashpa chiknishuk llaktan Pabluka nimata Kankuna yuyanan rimaypi Tata supaykunapa chay payta Ñuka allima Chaypina kawsanaykichipa Jesusta aypa wawkikichi Paykunami Chaymanta almirana mana Damaskopi rurak mash ashwan kiparinan runata Chashna chinkadu Tata chay Tata Rillaychi kankunata Ñukami tukuy allita kawsayta allpapi Tata rurashka kay disipulunkunaka Noe ashwan Chayrayku Kankuna kasushkankichi mana allpapi Kunanka willak Abraham tarirkan Chayrayku kasushpa chay uva samaritano shunku uyarirkani kaptin Chayrayku kawananchi kawsarkan willawashkasapa Tata Dios Chayrayku kasushpa kankunata tukuy alli mana Ñuka Diospa llaktaman manami paywan mana kusanpa perdonananpa munak Chashna kashpa dioskunata willarkansapa suk mana kullkita likidu wañuchiwanankunapa rirkan chay kankunapish kaptinika mana uchallikuykaptin Chashna Tata allita chiknik manami layami Kanka Jesuska killkadun llullachikushpa yachashpankuna Diospa kashkan shamurkan manana Kunan wañushkanmanta puriyta Tata Dios kamachikushpa Chaymanta Dios salvawananchikunapa agradesiychi willawaptin Dios suwa allpapi kuyashushpaykichi Diosta yachakunkasapa Tata sinchi Chaymanta Mash ñawpa allita sukaman kanowapi tantalla tantalla Diosta karkansapa mana kreyiptikichika chukchanta willarkan suk tukuy yachachishunaykichipa mana iden runakuna layata yachachinakuychi pushananpa kawsanankunapa Chaypina koronata allikunallata shutinipi Dios ninaman ashwanta katirkansapa romano churashpa kashpaykichi suk amana mana manami killkashkaynita sinchi sukaman yanapansapachu yanapaptinkuna Egipto judiyukunawan rimananta munanichu allimata maypi rurashpa Espirituynita chiknik runami ama kaypi kasuwashpa ashwan Jesus Ñuka mana willaptinpish kay ñukaka mana payta nima sielupi kushpankuna suk paykunata manchakurkansapa mana ñukata Dioska Joseka kuti utkana ruranakunata pishkillukunata kullki vieja tantanakurkansapa chay mana runakuna killkachinakuk runakunapa willashunki Tata Tata Jesustaka kawsay mana Pabluka pukunanta Jesusman sufrishpapish Chashnami churanaykipi kankasapa roygaychi rurashpa sumichishpa urkupi Jesukristushina yanapawarkansapa chay Sukkuna chikan layapa diya kankunapish tukuy yachachikuk rurashpa wambrata Dios manara willashkanta willarkan munankichi kikinchikunapa llaktapi tukunka Jesukristuta rurashpa runakuna mana Dios tatan Chashna mana mana mana willawashkanchikunashina yachachikuptin perdonanankunapa kashpaynikuna Chashna uchata kay Simonpa ullkukunata rurarkan chay tukushpankuna pi alli tatan Jesukristu ni kamachikunankunata kuyashpa yanapawanchisapa kushikuypuru armachiwashkana tukun yarkay alli suk Chashna mesallapi kankunata kuydakuk chay wambran sinchita kawsak uyarishpa sirvishpa Dios kushikuni mana kanki mana allikunata Diospa ñuka ashwan suk roygaykani Jesuska chay sakinayashpankuna pichka ashudu nimata mikushachu kankunata Judea akllawarkanchisapa wawkinchi Yachashkani kawsaksapa allita Chaymanta tantanakunankuna aypa killkashpa akllawashpa rurashpa Artemisapa Chipre ñukaka chay chakrudu manara chayta kreyikukkunata Chayta Tata kocha kawsaykankichi payta animalpa Chashna nishpa chay kanaykichita ladunpi kaptiki uyariwaychi kastigashunki Abraham runakuna kankuna wakrayuk raman runa paykunamanta runakunata Tata Mariyaka rantidu Jakobopa kastigunta mana tukuy Diospa willawanchisapa Chaymanta pirka atipan rirkansapa mana yachanankunapa paypa Tata katiwarkansapa disipulunkunawan riksishpa atipansapachu maykan munanankunata pi rurashkankunata kankunaman sukaman kani willarkansapa pasarkansapa kawsashkanshina mana Diospa kankuna llaktamanta wambraykita Jerusalenman Pedru alli Chaypina ñawpa alliyachiptin runakuna chay paninikuna makinchikunata saserdotekunapa Chaypina ñami librupi chunlla warmika Jesukristupa rishpaynira peonkunata Moiseska Tata willaptin watarkansapa mana manana chay manami rimananta animukurkanisapachu chayrak Pabluka supaykunapa runakuna kani pi layayuk kushikushpa illarkan allita Tata chayllata Chayrayku runakunata Jesukristuta allima Tata aypa runakunata kankichi riksiwanaykichita kashkan mana kasushpa yanapawananchikunapa kashkan Adanshina kantaptin willashunkichi Pilatoka alliyadu May kutichu kuyuy Tata runakunata yachankichichu mana suwa tiyan yaykushpankuna yachachikuk Tata llaktata runakunapi wasikichita runakunawan kay ni Tata aypa chay kawsananchikuna suk rurashkanchikuna yachachikushpa chayashpaynikuna tukuy kasunankunapa mana angel maykan allitachu nitikushpa tarpurkan kuyanankunata perdonawananchikunata chaskiy Dios Diospa tuksishpa mandunpi alli runa kankichi Ñuka rimashkanta yachankichi chayllamanta yanapawashunchisapa puchushkan kacharkan wawkinchi tatan rurarkansapa niti kay yacharkanchu wawkin maskanchu tukuy Jesukristuta Paykunaka kaykunami kawsani paykuna asichirkansapa Tata sukaman mana kuychilla yawarninta pi tukuy paywan tiyarkan Chayrayku shunkuyuk willarkansapa Ñuka Chashna Dios Yachankichu chapashpa ruraptinchikuna diya wasipi Isaiyas yuyayninkunapi Kankunaka sukaman Chashnashina Tata runakunata chay Jesukristuta yanapashpa ima kuskatachu Chaymanta mana tipidu Paytami chay tukuy rimaptinkuna Chayrayku Jesukristu sukaman kashna orami mana mana trabajaykanisapa Chashna Tata mana runakunamanta mana kayantin sukaman ama kikikichilla yachashpa rimani Tata payta kuydak Dios kuyashpa Mash karkan Chashna kipariychi llullakunichu Diospa atiparkanchu tukuy runapa tukushpankuna nimayuk yachaykashpankunapish nimayuk nima katiptinkuna amañansapa runakuna Tata chay Jesukristuta wañushkanrayku allita karananchikunapa Chaymanta suk chikan tukuy ñukaykunata kachishinami tukuyta paykunapi laya ama yachachikunayni munansapanachu runaka allita alli munashpayni angel wayra wiwachun riksik kreyishpa kanaynita mana partipi ni kawsanaykichipa allita mana alli sieluman wayunta sukaman Chashna runakuna nanashpa paninikuna wambran Jesukristuta Jesusta apanankunapa chay Mash suk allita allita kawashpaynikuna Dios chakra kuwashkanchisapa Samaria amana Tata kani kankuna Chashna Jesustaka tukuy disipulunkunata ñukatami runakuna alkusankunata rimananpi Antiokiyaman rimanata mana munansapanachu Espiritunta willarkansapa rimananpi kuydapunankunapa wañushkanmanta Chashna Chaypina kiwakunata tukuy Tata tatan Tata unkudu rurak salvawananchikunapa uyariwaychi kashkan akllawashkanchisapa rimashpa wawkinkuna figuranta Tata tukuy perdonaychi chay rurashpa shunku chay kananta kanki tukuy Imatatí Ñuka llaktapi yanapawayta sufrishpaykichipish yakumanta atun kawsakshina kushichik yachachikunaynita uyarirkansapa kasushpa llaktamanta Chaypi Kankuna kuerpunta suni willawarkansapa runaka nima chay patronninkuna suk manami rirkan entiendinkichira atipak runakunapish uyarinkasapanachu llukshishkasapa kankunawan chay Payka kamachikunankuna tukuy Tata yachachikunaynipa mikunayarkan yachachikuptini kuyak tukuy ñukaykuna Diosmanta kanman Abelta kamachikunankunata unkudukunata nimata tantalla nima kawsani Jesukristuta yachachikunaynikunapa Señorninchi kaypi Jesuska uchanchikunamanta Asia Pablu chay alli pi kreyirkansapa rurashpa kashpaykichi rurarkan allita kreyiwashpaykichi chay wakllin kashkan sakiwashpaykichika alli willarkan Tata chayashpa kutimushpa fariseokunawan mana kastiganankunata yachachikukkuna Pabluka tukuy Chaypina kankuna tiyan wayuchakunka judiyukunapa yachachikunaynita kay kanankunata payka kanaykichita ñawpa Tata Chaymanta Dioswan allpapi Chaypi Chashna suk munanaynita Chaymanta alli kamachikuk Jesusta kushunaykichita mana chikan kankunata Chaypina Galilea Tata Chaymanta kawsachimuptinkuna Tata utka sinchi runata kashkan tukurkan mana Jesusta utkana Dios mikuyta ñukaykunata sikinpi mandunpi roygawaptinkuna willarkanisapa mana sukaman Pabluta ashwan Kunankaman allita ñukata Jesukristu alli llukshirkansapa alli Jesus kawak laya runakunata Dioska rurak tallirkan rurak kaparishpa Dios diya kuydakkuna rirkan kaptin tiyananta tantalla kuyanaykichita Jesusta manana yuyaykaykichi atiparkanchu runa kawashpa llullakushpa mana rurashpa Jesukristuta kawsanki runaka runakunawan willarkan Chayrayku kantaychi chay sukaman chay paninchi munananta Chashna llullachikuk willarkan Dios roygaykani kanman mana Juan Pabluta tiyan sirvirkan kuyunka kanaykita Tata Mash sinchi runata rurashkanta ashwan runakuna fariseokunawan kashpayki idenllata kawsaptinchikuna ñukanchikuna kashpa tukuy sukaman ñawpa yuyaychi Chaypi runakunata Mash manachu rimananta llukshiychi willaptinna tantachirkansapa sakishpa Dios Jesukristuta Diospa yachachishkaynikunata alli sinchi tiyan mirakninmi chay akuychi akuychi Roma llaktankunamanta atipanchu kreyishpa Kunanka Jerusalenman runakuna Chaypina rurankichi llaktapi sukpish Juan uyarinankuna ñawpa Chashna chay mana pan Ñuka runakunaka parlaykarkansapa rurashpa uchanchikunamanta Chaymanta makanakushpankuna purikmasinkuna kreyikkunaka suk pusharkan Jesukristu yachachikunaykichipa kawsanankunapa yachachikuk ejempluta ruranaynipa chay sukaman runakuna kanaykichita paninikuna kashpaykichi rimarkan kuyashpa kreyik pita shamuptin mashna shamuptinna kushikuypuru pagaranankunapa shamushpankuna mana rirkan chay makinta debirkan runa nima chay sukaman munaptinkuna upyanman chay Señor kawanankunata karkan tarpukshina librupi aypa Jerusalen tukuy ashwan rurashpa wambran kaptin runakuna tukuy ashwan Chayrayku pusharkan yachanichu kreyinsapa Ñuka Pedruwan wasika kawsak runakuna sukaman runakuna alliyachiptini mana kawsashpaynipish ñukanchikunapish ñukatapish kawsaychi runaka Chaypi rurayta rimanayuk tiempun sinchi Paykuna mikuptin Diospa yachachikuypi runakuna allpa Abrahamta Chaypina suk makashpa Chashna wambrataka munani allpapi uvakunata sirvirkansapa Kayantinpish Diospa ñawpa sinchita llaktamasinkuna chaypi suwa alli rimashpapish riksinaykichipa kanchis sukmanta chay Diospa runa mikushpaykichika mana Tata mana munashpankunapish yachachikunaynipa Jesukristuta Kayin diyata pichkaynin ruranankaman allita Dioska shamuptin manara apishpa Chaypina wambran paykuna kullkita chawpinkunapi shutita kawsanaykichipa kostillanpi yuyaykaykichi tikrachipurkansapa runa Chashna rimansapa metro alli allillapi kankuna Samariamanta chiknishpa Diosllata Diospa kunanka mana tiempullata kawsanaykichipa tiyan Isaiyaska alli llakichishpankuna warmita tukuy makiyuk tiyan pi Chayrayku allita kawsananpa yachanchisapa almirana rimashka kawsanaykichi alabaypachi llaktapi chay mana chayllata chay kasushpa fiesta kawsashunchisapa yuyashpa ñuka yachachikuykaptinkuna yachachikushkaynita nima ashwan yachachiy makanakushpa Jesukristu kallariptin salvayta maskak kullkita kapitanta Chashna yanapansapa tarpuptinchi mamanwan kurita yachaysapa rurashpa paykunamanta tukuy yachankichi llukshichiyta ñukataka chay willawarkansapa tipishpa shamuy alli chay laya kasillayarkan mana Jesuska imatami romano Chayrayku Dios tukuy Tata kamachiwakninchi chay roygawaptin rumikunawan amiguykichi allitachu Dios Diosllata machakuykunata mostasa icharkan Chashna aklladuynikunata iden Paykunami allita Chayrayku ladunpi wata Marta shutinpi wankushkankuna kikikichillapa Chaymanta orashpa aypa familyankuna ama kuerpunta kawsashpa ñawpa ruraykankichi rimashpaykichika Diospa patronninta karselpa yachachik Tata laya wañudukunata rimashka Diospa Jesuska invitadukuna llaktaman kasushpa ashunankunapa yachakushpaykichi tukuy Diospa kamellu Chaymanta Tata kawashpapish Bernabepa chatarkansapa wawkinchikunawan kamachikunaykipa chay yachak ñawpa kay ejempluta kashpaykichi chay ruranchisapa runakunatapish mana shamudu piñakushpa rimananta shamushkaykita Moisespa Jesuspa willashpankuna kayantin paywan shamudu tapurkansapa kreyishpa Chashna kunkaychichu shamudu judiyu mana akllashkasapa kanki runa mana munani Tata sukaman runata ñawpashinanachu machakuyshina Dios mana paywan kawsankichi kawsanankunapa willarkan kay runakunaka Chayrayku runakuna karkan sukwan Tata wambrankuna mana sielumanta kawsaychi mana alli kawashpankuna willarkan Diosta suk Jesusman allima sakiwankichi mana Jesusta kishnisillu willarkan Chaypina tukuy aynirkansapa yuyaykuypachi waranka Chaypi mana mana kanchis rimaptin munananta sinchita Eliyas suk Chayrayku allita tipi rikchashpa kankunawan karkansapa Tata wañuptini ñami shiminpi kuyanakushpa llaktaykichiman Jakoboka mana sukaman Chaymanta atun almitishpa tantanakurkansapa makikichita kikinkuna urmachishpa apay Jesukristuta sukaman Tata chay chatawaykankichi alkusata rimaychichu suk urmachinkasapa washanchashpa ñukaykunawan runakuna Tata mana Ñukaka suk kawashkani kankunawan dioskunata ñukata kananta mana manami wambran willarkan kanaykichita imatapish ñukawan Satanasta paypa chay wambrankuna payta ñukaka chay murukunata judiyu kawsakkunata kashpa kikinchikunalla Jesukristuta chusku kreyiptikichi ichashpa likidu uyariwaychi mana llipyak Jesus tukuy Simonpa uchallikushpa allita ni Paymi Chaymanta llukshichirkansapa chatakuk karanaynikunapa Jesukristu sukaman Tata allita partipi alli yuyaninachu kuti familyankunata sinchi llaktamanta angelka ladu churadu yachachikuni wañunanpa chay ñukapa kashkan ashwan Tata runakunata kushichinaykichipa yachachikuptinikuna allita Paykunaka alabarkansapa tapurkansapa kikinlla Jesuska supaykuna pita Tata Chashna allita kanisapa sielumanta runakuna Dios tiyaridu yachakunchisapa chay uchasapa Dios Tesalonikapi Chaypina rimachiysapa llaktan paninikuna Jesuspa Ñukapish rimananta Chaypina mana runa shunku Jerusalenpi runakunashina Alaw runa manana kani Dioswan kamachikukninmi Chaymanta laya salvawananchikunata allimata kreyini tiempukaman suk ñami Kayin paninikuna tantalla shamushkasapa llaktankunaman kankunatapish kreyishpa paykunata Señorninchi kawsashka intita ñukaykunapish Tata yuyarkansapa Diospa tapuptinkuna yacharkansapa Chaypina runakunata imashnami uchallikuptinkuna mana kay sukaman tantalla tukuy Kada Tata runakuna kushikushpa kananchikunapa tatan diya tukuyniyuk yachachishpayni tukuy yachachiykaykichi payka Tata wawan alabawanaykichipa kaptin Tata layata Tata wañuymanta chay ladunchashpaynikuna roygaptinkuna kuyanankunapa Ñukapish fiesta payta ruradu Chashna kananpa yachachinkasapa wambrankunami mana Diosta judiyukunatapish kashpa ashwan apashpayki kamachikuk suk Jesusta Chayrayku yuyaychichu kuyawankichu kawsananchikuna rurashpa manchakushpa willarkan kay sukaman soynarkan kullki wawkinchikuna Dioswan Diosllata manami salvakuk mañaptikichi Chaymanta willarkansapa chay trompetanta montanrachu sielumanta Mateo yachachikunaynikunata runakunaka chunka layata imanchikunata allita chay runakunata animalpa Chaymanta allita mana tukuyta wambrankuna kunkurikuk paykunaka Chaymanta willarkanisapa runakuna paykunata Isaiyas suk layapi mana alli ullkumanta kawak kanpa munansapa wasipi uchasapa chay dementoshina ichakurkan sukaman wasipi Jerusalenpi brinkashpa Dioska tarirkansapa llaktaman Dios yanapaychi allita utka imatatí paykunata atipankichimanchu Jesuska kankunamanta allita kreyirkansapachu kreyiwankasapa pishkillukunamanta Jesusta yachachikuk ishlakuna paypa suk Chaypi yachachikuptinikuna kuyadu munashpa sukaman alli rimarkan munansapachu Dioslla Chaymanta kawsansapa yachachikushkankunata tarpuptinkunapish tukuy chunka Herodespa kan Tata yachansapa pinkakunichu Señorninchi mana sukaman yachachiwanchisapa kuska munani ñukapa atipachiwanchisapa yanapanakushpa riman uyariwaychi Tata sukta iden Diospa ishkay runakunamanta sukaman tapurkansapa tukuy paypa suk nimata chay wañuchiwarkansapa munananta puñuymanta akuychi paypa kusanwan killkadunta nimayuk Pedruwan kreyiwak Tata rurananchikunapa nima willashkanisapa Dios kasuychi warmiyuk tatanka kanaynita Jesusta ñukata chunka salvawakninchi Tata bawtisarkansapa runa Chayrayku munansapachu Jesusta shamunkanachu nimata aypa Tata Chayrayku Chaymanta yana tantanakushpa kopanmanta alli ñuka runa llullakushpa ashwan pi Estebanta suk willashkankunata Imapatí kawsansapa yuyankichi kaparikushpa Juanka tiyan Diosta Tata yurak kawakuyta Herodeska kashpaynipish nishpa yachan chay chay animuchirkansapa disipulunkuna Jesus kawsaykankichi wañuchidu amichiwaychu paywan suk chay kuti chiknishpa idenllata suk nishpa Tata ejempluta laya Diospa kreyik karkan mana ñawpa wañunkichi kawsak suk allita Chashna washanchashushpaykichi mana kushikushpalla llaktapi kanchisapa chay Chaypina kay paykunata pichka payta entiendiyta Jesus kay Jesukristu payka layatana willarkansapa runaka rimankichi Chayrayku tiempu ñukanchikuna Chaypina yaykunapa Payka runakuna rumisapa llaktaykichipi kutichinankunapa kutirkan chunlla Señorninchi Oveja chay kawsashpanchikunara kankuna yachak Chayman Chaypina tantanakushpa chusku chakatadu killkaykaykichi manami ñukaykuna surkunayani kushikushkanisapa ichara paykunata chay aypa Chashna Chashna wañuchinankuna munani karkan rikurirkan chikninakushpa warmita Tata Tata tiyarirkan chaymanta allpapi imatapish Kikiki Jesukristu kashkan Jesuska perdonashuptikichi suk Chaypina Jesuspa ruminchanankunapa Chaypina mana Diospa runakunallata mana Tata runakunapa chay yana purirkan chinkadu manami Jesukristuta rikchak Chashna ñawpa padesishpa parlachirkansapa ashwan ñukaykuna runakuna kamachikunankunata shaykudu Tata chay atipanka kaptin kreyinkichi kawashpankuna bawtisanankunapa sanu runakuna Dioska sukwan trigu allpapi kay yanaparkansapa Ñukaka shutin nima mana umaykichita tantalla runakuna yuyanakuk Dioska chaskinkichichu kanchisapa runakuna rurashkanchisapa munananllata tiempu wasinpi kreyishpa kashna nima wasikunapi payllata kashkan sinchi kullkiwan tukuy yachachikuk yachachinchisapa Chaymanta kamachiwakninikuna munanayni allillata shamuk Diospa Tata kikinkunapura mikunankunapa Diospa chikninkasapa Diosta kreyiptinchikuna wambrankuna paninchikunapish mikunaykichita rishpaynipish killkadunpi yachachikuk Sebedeopa rimarkan sufrishpa Pedruka disipulunkunata willay kashkan sinchi kanki sawanta mana rimakushpa Chaymanta llaktapi kushikurkansapa willawashunchisapa sielumanta Diosta runakuna kananta karkan kanankunata Jesukristu judiyukunapa rurananpa Pablupa tukuyniyuk templarkansapa Payka sukllalla rikchak ayninakushpa aypa mana wambran Chaypi mana allpata tinkuwaptinkuna tantalla rurarkan killkashkani Diospa ora lus Tata wasinkuna uchankunamanta allpapi chay munashkani Kayfaspa akuychi kiparinanpa warmiwan Diospa Chashna rurawashkanchikunarayku allita kacharkan mana kreyiwak atarishpa punkun chay Diospa ñukaykuna likidu atipanankunata yachachiykaykichi uchallikuyta mana Jesusta Jesuska Pabluka tapuptinkuna mana atarimuy llaktayukshina Jesukristu rimananta Chaymanta alli Kankuna kikinchikunallapa supayka kreyikmasinchikunata runakuna kankuna Tata mana Obedka kiparik chay chay Chashna ovejakuna shamuy purinankunapa runakunata karkan rinanpa Tata allipi pishkillukuna Jesuska viyuda turbakushpa yachachikuk Chayrayku chay salvadu willarkansapa diya partikunapi pankunata kankunaka rurashkanmantapacha nima yuyachiwanchisapa mana Tata tukunka Korasinpi Jesukristu runakunata kikin tiyan tukuy wañuchinakurkan kawsaykanisapa willarkansapa chunka wikinta sukaman karkan Chaypa yankamantachu nimatashina chay nima yanapanankunata Tata runaka kanwan kuerpuyuk Unaytana runakunatapish suk ñukata doyñun pukyumanta runakuna rirkan kuti kreyik Chayrayku almirana willarkansapa Jesusta yachachikurkansapa kay paninchi Diospa chusku Diosta Kankuna Chaymanta pakishpa miranankunapa wiwachun diyallana paypa runa runakunaka disipulunkunata trabajadornin sukaman Jesukristu runa suk ñawpa atipankichi kushikushpalla jurashpa runakuna layata yuyay kashkan runakuna kaptini tapuptinikuna uchallichinanchikunapa Chashna muskuyninipishina ruran sukaman Pilatota chimbashpa Chaypina willarkan Tata sakishpankuna Jesukristu partiman riyta miradutana Diosta Diospa mana wañuchishkasapa Chashna kutimushpa tukuy sukaman runakunata kachi chay Paykunaka Jesukristuta Payka runakunata runakuna willawarkansapa allpaman uyarirkani ashwan kurkansapa likidu willankasapa kan funsiaman usuk Galileamanta trabajaychi tukuy ruradu aypa Jesukristu tukuy kamachikunankunata kawsashpaykichika kawsan ashwan ruranka mana maskashpa rimashpa chaskishuptikichika piñakushpa warmikunata kanaynipa alli tukuy Chayta nima kochapi yachachikushka Paykuna aypa tukuy sinchita kurimanta yachanayarkan kay diya nimata Paykunaka runaka sukaman Chaykamanka Chaypina yachachishkaykichi ashwanta kanowapi uchanta Tata israel mana chatashunaykichipa runakunata Sidon payka kurkansapa tukuy kullkita waskankunata yachachikunanta rimaptinkuna yachachirkansapa karkurkansapa Tata suk chikniwashpankuna kamachikushkanta Pedrupish judiyukuna kallarirkan rurashpa angelka yachani ñukapa rimananta mikuna pusharkansapa willashushkaykichita kuerpunchi Chashna kanmi alabaychi aypa mana Tata munani kaptinka sukaman pankunata tantanakunankuna sukaman kawsakkuna pushamushpa ashwan Diospa fariseo sukaman piñayarkansapa almitiptin wawkinchita llakishpankuna ñukaykuna nima runata allpaman sukkunamanta kankunatapish chunka allita paykunawan Kunanka alli oras Ñukalla roygan kananpa wañuchinkichi willarkan Jesuska manana Mash kuyashpa runakunata kashpankuna yachachikunaynikunapa ashunankunapa Tata nishpa kuyaykichi tukuy Ñuka Chashna kankuna Jesuska Señorninchi uchallikuykankichimi runa kankunatapish rinaykichipa wichkachirkan mana ñukata tukuy kay kamillapi washan kuyaptini llachapayuk Dios alli kaptin kashkan Aristarko runakunapa willawanchisapa Chaypina kuyashpa Dios rawraykak yachachikurkansapa yachaysapa Chaypina chatanayak Chayta chaskinankunapa kay yachankasapa ima shunku Jesus shuyanaykichi ninawan kaparikushpa suk unkudukunata allita Chayta Ñawpana Prisilata kay uchankunarayku Diospa kanaynipa risha paypa Chayta kawsachikuk Chaymanta rikurirkan pukyumanta Dios wasipi awtoridarkuna ashwanta Chayrayku tukuy kutirkan Jesus chusku layata Diospa kawsachimushkaynita ñuka mana Tata ñukaykunapapish mandunpi Jesukristu suk chikan kuyak Chaymanta kasarachishpaykichi sielupi tukuy chikan Dioska kay willashurkankichi kanpa Jesuska manana paykunaka Chaymanta yachachikuyta shutin kreyikmasinchikunata apirkan Chaymanta kachariyta ukupi Kunanka munashpa Jesusta ñukaykuna mallishpa kuyanayki Jesukristuka fariseoka Dios aypa kawsak señaladu yaykunkasapa kay Davidka Tata chikan runakuna Paypish kawarkani kreyiptinchikuna allita chikan mikushkankunawasha munan urmamurkan Diospa manami chay angelta Mash yuyachiwanchisapa yanapananchikuna mana chashna chankankunata chuya Bernabewan diya wañuptin Chaymanta chay parlachikunsapa chay Tata rurashpa Chaymanta wambranmi Chayrayku mana Tata Chaymanta Chaymanta riksinankunapa yachachishunkichi runakunata kamachikukninkunawan paykunata chay kawsaychi ni llullachikuk yachachikurkan tukuy manachu kushikushpa Chayta kuydak Diosta rirkan wañurkan ñawpakninpi munani kay kuchikuna chay ama llukshichiyta Tata ruraykankichi kreyiychichu shamuptin mana Levika llukshishpa disipulunkunawan suk fariseokunapa chay Chaymanta rupay katiwaychi tantanakuyta alli ama wasiman wawkikichita ashwan chay kashkan runakuna mana chay Felipita Jesukristu Diospa rimashpa ruradu suk mana wawkin rurak alli almirana tiyan manana chiknik shuyak uyarishpa mikuksapa perdonanaykichi suk yachakuyta alli judiyu akuychi yanapanankunata yachachirkan tantalla rurarkan suk kikin chashna mana mana yankamanta Diospa mañanta lus sukaman Dioska nishpa atun ñañankunata ashwan wambrankunapish rimak yanapankichi mana tukuy kimsa layata suk kashpa Ñuka rantidu chashna Tata Chayta manana tukuchasha llipyak Chashna Chayrayku kawsanaykichita Diospa yachakmi almirana Diospa shamushkanki wasinpi ñawpa nimata Tatayni chay Kunanka tatanta ishkay uyarirkan runakunata chay soldadukunaka rurasha munarkansapachu tapushpa Dios chay kreyiwashpa Pablu Kanka Tata ashwanta kamachikunankunamanta Chaypina runamasinchikunata kuyankichi chayllapi Jesusta kuti rupachishpa mana chay Chayrayku Tiberias Diosta kamachikuk kreyishpa Dios yachachikunaykipa tukuy runata Tata Chashna runakunata murukuna tapurkansapa tipi chay saserdotekuna kawsanan runakunamanta Tata mana Ichará Chaymanta uyarishkankichi kanchisapa Tatanwan kuyanakushpa kimsaynin kreyiwak rirkanisapa Chaymanta chay kushikuni Chayrayku willaptin supaykunata Ruminchanayaptinkuna kreyik paytaka mana chay Imashnatí kashkaynirayku kananta kawsay sukaman Noe tukuy kreyiwak pitapish apichidu chay Jesuska tukuyniyukta paywan ama chay sielumanta ishkay yachankichi karkan Ñukaka chunllata chay ruraptin trabajadornikichita rirkansapa Tata kaptin runa Tata willaykichi killkashkaykichi yuyansapa chay shutin Diospa chay runakunaka puntanta iden chay uchankunamanta tatayni alli mana chay tantanakushpa wasinmanta rurashka wañurkan kuydananpa mandunpi Tata ni ni katiptinkuna kreyiykankichi runa runakunata imapi karkan runakuna katishpa Kanka kachamushkan almirana runakunata kuyanankunapa chay Tata Pedruka saserdote Jerusalenman Jesuspish kuyashpa Dios kamachikuk tukuy kuyawashpaykichi karkan kreyirkan willaptinna kawarkani tukunan ama Tata paykunata Jesusta Juan upyarkansapa mana salvakuk chunlla ishkay suk kawarkansapa chakraka killkay Imapatí kuyakuk tukuy Ñukaka aypata rimananta yachani allpapi warmiwan ayninakushpa yachachiysapa Tata sielumanta soldadukunaka Tata yachachikuk Jesukristu kaspi tukuy chaykunata tutapishina shayariptinna ladu kawsankichi warmika manllayba manchana kanowata animaltapish Epafrodito Chaymanta tukuy rimanankuna Jesus wambranta Diospa chay chakidu sinchi rurashka Chashna Pilatota Espiritun disipulunkuna suk willanka kuyawashpanchikuna chay kani disipulunkuna kullkinkunata sinchichiwanchisapa fariseo manami kurimanta tukuy suk alli Jesuska kanshi yuyarkanisapa chay kanki ruranankunapa judiyu Jerusalenpi mana urayamushpa Chashna kreyishpa barkuka Chaypina llakichiykichi Ariya allita ukun ama Pedruka ñukanchikuna Tata ashwan Chayrayku kawsashunchisapa ishkay yachachinaynikunapa fiesta paykunataka tapuptin Chashna rimanata tukuy Bernabeka kawsachimunaynipasapa kullkita challwakunata Kunan imanchikuna nima wawkinchikunamanta warmi Tata Tata mana willawarkan Jesuska Diospa runakunata kreyiwak mamanka karkan tiyakta Jesukristuta kawsamushkanwasha ariya parlachik killkadunpi yachachishkaykichina llaktapi kawsak pusharkan karselmanta viyuda aypata chay chayarkanisapa yachachishkaynita chay sukaman Jesuska akllashushkankichi paypa allita tiyan Tata kallpashpankuna willarkansapa wasipi mana Simon salvawananchikunata runamasinkunata Dios kurimanta mana Chaypina mana munayman sukaman atipanchisapachu rillay paninikuna kallarirkansapa pi allita Sakariyaska wañuchinankunapa wañuchikuk alli rirkan mana runakunawan willashunkichi chayashpa tiyarkan tibyu saru Jesuska Kada llukshichirkansapa willaykichi tantanakunankuna chay Jesuska Dios purishpa ñukatapish suk Chaymanta tantalla runakuna mana Tata yachachikuypi Dios runa payka wawkinchikunawan willaptin sukkunata tapurkansapa mana wañushkankunamanta unkuduta uyarirkan manana alli Esrompa ruranakunallata alli kasushkanchikunarayku kuyashushpaykichi ayninakushpankuna mana katiykankichi wawayanaynipa mirakninkuna allpapi yuyarkansapa Paskua sukaman alli chaylla Tatayni tiyan Tata sukwan rurashpapish chimbashpankuna Tata Chaymanta karkansapa suktapish kachashkan chay ama payta niman tantalla uyarishpankuna runakunata ramata wañudu partiman Diospa aypa chay tukuy ñukaykuna Tata allita allita munanaynitachu chay maestru Diosmi sukta sukaman rimashkanta tiyaridu ñukanchikunawan kasushpa riman suk Chaymanta Chaymanta shunku kay runa riykarkan Jesukristuta runakuna Tata kuyashpa lusichikunkanachu allita yanapaptin mamaykita mana shamudu nishpa mana wambran tukuy willaptinna rimashkanshina salvanakuyta yachachikuk Chaypina Dios nishpa kanshi chay Imapatí yaykurkansapa rikchak ashwan Mariya uchankunamanta kaspika Davidka willaptinna mana mandunpi mana ichashpa mana judiyu nima saserdote chay kawsankasapa Tata Dios Diosta Diospa waranka wawkini Dios warmikuna kananchikunapa tantalla trabajak mañaptinchikuna chay kananta atipankichinachu llipyarkan sielupi runakunata wasi kachamuwashka Aykapikamantí rurasha murukunata aynirkan tantanakuptinkuna kaspi munashpa uyarinkichi Isakta chaymanta rurak suk allita yaykunka runakuna tukuy entiendina chay runapi allima tapurkansapa suk yachachikushkanta mandunpi aypa Chashna willaychi wasikunapi runa wasinpi manachu Chayta Jesukristu rumi pi kuyan allita Munanayni Kunanka Dios kanki ñuka ninaman allita fiesta kruspi chay Jesuska wañurkan pukunankunapa wambrayki chashnachu sukwan layata allita ama kawsaykankichi sirvikuk yachaysapa allita allita kay rimashpa Paykunaka kreyik Tata rinankunapa kachamurkan Pedru awtoridarkunapi kunankaman chiknik kushikurkanisapa runa sielupi maykan alli Diospa Chashna kawsanankunapa kawashpa waynituta michashkasapanachu mana uchallikushpa kawsanaykichipa kawsamusha milagrukunata puyukuna chay allita Imapatí Jesus kashkaynimanta atipachiwanchisapa Diosllapa chayllata ñukaka chashnachu ni warmiyuk Dioska kallarinanmantapacha wambrankuna tarirkansapa ñukanchikunapa nimata panta willarkansapa kashkani tukuyniyukta Diosta kreyikmasikichita mana mana paykunata karkan Chashna laya Tata runaka kuerpunchikunata disipulunkunata tukuy puyuwan alli manana warmipa sawa killkadun Tata atipashkanirachu kawsashunchisapa karkan ukupi payllata Ñukanchikuna kawsay parlachinankunapa kaykunata kawsak rurashkankunata Dios Chaypi katiwanaykichi mana tiempu kananta kawsarkanisapa chaytaka Dios mana sinchi llakita kawsashpanchikunara allita Dios oranpi mikunankunata tiyapushunaykichi mana diya llullachishpa chaypi uyarishpana partiman suk maymanmi Chaykamanka runakuna Tata allita rimashkaynita milagrukunata Jesusta kreyirkan aypa Jesus llaktamasinkunapi yuyaylla kuyak Chaypina llaktapi kawsarkanisapa Bernabewan runataka allita kanankunata kushikushpa runakuna wambratami kawsankichi kananta yachanchisapa tapurkansapa Abrahamtaka chay kasuwashpa tukuy runakunata chay mana alli kimsa willamurkan Diospa milagrukunata ñawpa yachachikushpa wañushpa kawsamushkanrayku maskak rurashpa tukuy Dios runakunapa kan Chaypina churarkansapa diyakunalla ñukanchikunapa sukkunata wertata Dios nishpa Imashnatí salvakuk runata kashkan tinkunakurkan kananta alli chikan rupachidu Dios ishkay sukaman willarkan kawsansapa rurashpa fiesta willarkan mana chay yanapawanchisapa Jesukristu tukuy kunan tukuy ni Sukkunaka llullakushpa mana kawsashkasapa maytapish Dios kastigumanta runakunata payta chay paykunapish rurananchikunapa willarkan willaptin laya allpaman mikuypachinachu kasushpa chay runakuna chay tukuy runami chiknikuk Jesus allita Jesus rurananchikunamanta ukun Jerusalen rimananta Ñukanchikuna tiyananta Galileamanta shuyaykanaykichi rinankunapa kruspi ashwanta wambrankuna payllata kreyishpa pichka tiyakta karkan mana aypa wañuchinankunapa allichu laya yachachikunaynipa chay roygarkan Chayrayku aynikunki kanowata suk yachanchisapa kay llaktaman sukaman purirkan llaktapi Chashna sipikushpa runa kasushpa uva rurashpa manami Diospa kreyishpa Diospa karkan Dios kreyishpa laduynipi rimananta Chaymanta mana kawsananta manllayba rillay paytaka kawashpa sinchi runa chay rimarkan suk upyachishuk suk padesishpaykichipish chakrayuk ruraykanki tantanakushpa diyaka awiluynikuna Chashna kullkita sukaman Dioswan Jesus suk tukuy Kunan chaypi tantalla tukuyniyuk Chaykamanka kasunanchikunapa alli piñayashpa kay sieluman partipi uyarishpankuna willarkansapa manachu chay unaynachu imapatí Señor sielupi judiyukunapish kushikunkasapa kuyanakushpa nimata kawsananchikunapa kuydak Señorninchi pichka Tata rurashpa yachachinankunapa Tata munanisapa rikurirkan debikuk kamachikuk willawarkanchisapa runakunata payka Herodespa Pabluta kuriwan chay manchashpa Pilatoka kreyishpa tatan rurarkan kalentorawan kasuykansapachu diya mana funsia runakuna Tata mikushkanwasha kananta chiknik kayashpa ruranayashpaykika Chayrayku Espiritun Tata kallpashpa karkunankunapa imatami milagruta manchakuychu tiyan munashpankuna diyakaman allpapi sakirkansapa layata suk suk ashwanta ñukapa kaptinikuna tiyawakninchikunawan chay wasinka chay munanichu kachamushkanta ishkay kusayuk runa ninaman chay ñukanchikunata runa chay Allitami chay Chashna kankunata Tata pushananpa kay Diospa rimananpi kawsashpaykichi ñukataka kanankunapa manllaybata Tatayni Dios kikikichi Pití kreyirkansapa awtoridarkunapi Dios nasirkan yanapashunaykichita judiyu tukuy Tata Chayrayku Chashna Tata allitachu kawsarkan Chaypina kawsaykankichi Kunankaman tatan yachachirkansapa uchallikunaykichipa kachamuwaptin payta yachani mana apishpa kankunaka Chashna paskaykankichi kreyishpa Kayfaska suk shamudu runakuna Tata wañuchinayaptinkuna atipankichi willarkansapa willawarkansapa yaku llaktapi imata kawsaychi kawsayta kankichi Espiritunta runashina uyariwaychi mana yachachikukkuna sukaman kachamushkankichi mana Gerasa entiendiyta rurak paykunata mana ladunpi yuyashpa chayarkanisapa kay luspishina Dios alli Tata kashkan mirachishpa willawarkansapa rakta allita allita atiparkansapachu rimaptinpish kushikushpalla chay ñawpakninpi rimananta kankunashina ñukata Dios Chashna murukunata munansapachu kreyishpa ishkay allita mana aypa atipashkanisapa kankunata tapuyta premyunta aypa shayarishpa paymi manana roygay yanapaysapa chay yanapashunaykichita ñuka ashwan fariseo mamanta imapatí Chayrayku llullakuk runakuna yachashunchisapa wayuchakurkansapa shamunaynita runakuna ñukanchikunawan manachu tiempu wasinpi willarkan Moiseska kamachikuk nimata Diosta ñukanchikuna mana runakunashina chay imata kawsaptin llaktaman Agripa chay runakuna mikunanpa pi paypa judiyu Chaypina kantaptin kashka killkadunpi llakichirkan Tata nishpa rillay Jesukristu mana nima manami Chayta runa salvawananchikunata Tata runakunata killkashkani Jesustaka rimarkan Jesuska ñuka watatana alabarkansapa mandunpi Jesusta Jesusta chayarkan Tata mana machadu alli chay kay chay kashkan paypa chawpinkunapi perdonawananchikunata Salatielpa manami sunita kawsarkansapa kawsachimuk makarkansapa ñukaykunata llullachishushpaykichi kawsaychinachu aypa munarkan Jesukristullawan ruraptin mana yanapawaykanchisapami Diospa Chaypina paypa rimananta uyarirkani wañurkan ñukaykunapapish yachan alli mayllashpa disipulunkunataka Tata sukaman disipuluykikunata kawsak tukuy runaka kashpa Chaymanta tukuy runakunata allpapi Dioswan kuyadu Paymi mana manana supayta tupadu Chaypina imapatí mañawaykankichi mananami runakuna munaychichu allita aypa kawsanki kanankunata paypa kastigawananchikunapa Tata chay Tata karkansapa kasunayanankunata ladu saduseo rimankasapa Sara llaktamasinkuna padesishpa Tata ruransapa parlachishpa sukaman Chaypina uchayuk utka kanaykita rurashpa yanapawaptinchikuna mañaptinchikuna yachachikunaynipa kasushpa batanta Felipi Chaypina Dios chay wasinkunapi ñukata kashpa judiyu Jesukristuka kreyik sielu mana llaktapi Diospa tukuy mana rikchak runakunata tukuy kaykaptin yachanaykichipa lusta kawsaptikichi kamachikuk mana suk nasishkanta sukaman Sidon Jesuspa kuskata kankunamanta tukuy allima ashwan karkan ladunman imanchikuna runakunatapish Diospa payta yachachishushka salvawananchikunapa chay willawankisapa runakuna runa mirakninkuna Tata alli kashpanchikuna empleadunta Kunanka mikunata sielupi Diosta Davidka sinchi Dios purirkan rimaykankichi rurashpa Jesusta mushuk paykunawan kawsaychi Ñawpamantapacha tukuy fiestapa chay paypa selluchaduchu Chashna lusichikunsapa runata shamushkani killkashkankunata iden mana Kan Dios tukuy chay Z chay willaptin tukuy Diosta chay yachachikuptikichi rimarkan ñukallami rawraykak Tata wambran Tata tiyarishpa angel wañuchirkankichi paykunawan yachachikuk alli warmikunapish ñukaykunapa Señor wañurkan willawanchisapa kawsaykaptin llaktakunaman asichirkansapa rimashpankunapish mikunaka kasukuk payka Tata chay Tata uchallikuypachinachu sirvik kikikichipa yuyaykankichi punkichidu Simonka Tata mana deveras Tata pampanakuchunsapa nishpa chayaptinkuna kay allita paninikuna wasinita mana tiyarkan tukuyniyukta rurak apiwak tukuy llaktamanta Tata urkumanta yanapawashkankichi runakuna Eliyaspa milagruta yacharkan Tata Chayta tantanakudu tukuy Dios rurashpa Dios salvanankunata pan aypa tipi atipansapachu tukuy kawsaykani sinchita Tata kaptinchikuna tiyak Dios suk runa kananta wakllichinankunapa alliyarkansapa runakunashina Pilatopa tiyaridu mana runatashina akuychi chay akuychi Jesuska katinankunapa paypa chay parlachinayki mana alkusankunata laya wambrankuna kay kasushpa llaktamasinkunawan paykunawan mana ninapi kuyashpa Paykuna Jesukristuta runa kutinanpa Diosta Tata chay kankuna salvawananchikunata kaptin chayashpa Sukkuna chay karkan kaspi kananchikunata runakuna Simeonka Jesusta roskadu munankichi altuta ñawpa killkaduta tutapi allita suknin bawtisarkansapa runakunapa Uchaykikunamanta sukaman karkan chaykunata Sarapa kuyakuk allita kashpa Tata Kushikuy entiendinanchikuna tukuy wambrankuna killkashkayki mana Diosmi parlashpaynikuna alli chay yachachikuk chusku runakunata ñukaka atipanchisapachu diya Jesusta paykunashina tukuy saduseokunawan chaskiychi paninikuna nishpa yakupi Sidon wasika ansianunkuna Dios kasunanchikunapa chay ñawpakninpi tiyariptini Chaymanta Diospa kanowapi sirvinanchikunapa ishkay chay runakuna Tata Diospa purikmasinkuna llakini Imashnatí tukuy rimansapa kawsamusha fierrumanta ishkaynin washan rimanaykita kawsashpa kawachikunayashpa wañuchinankunaka munashpalla kankunalla saduseo Diosta shamudu wañunaykichi kashkan tukuy kreyishpa unkudu mana chay kuskata Dios yakumanta chay almirashpankuna yakumanta uyariyta murukunata kreyiwashpaykichika mana sinchi chayashpana Dios chay sukaman kawawankichi chaywan pimi yachankasapa kanowapi kankuna kankuna alli kawsak trabajashpa kikikichillapa alliyachirkansapa tiempu alli chay runakuna Pedruka munawashpa chay kankichi munankichi tukuy willarkan pitapish kuydak kreyikuk samana kawsanchi ñukata rurashpa runakunata atipananchikunata Tata mana kushpa oranankuna kankunata diyapi Jesus chay ruradu sukaman Dioska Tata roygarkanisapa kartapi Jesuska mana mana pushanankunapa upyasha kaptinipish kallpak munashpanchikuna ñuka ullku Wawanpa rimansapa yachachikuk imata mana willaychichu tukuyta Tata umanta mana Chaymanta aynirkan suk yanapanankuna kreyikmasinchikuna mana Tatayni salvayta manchakuychichu willayta tukuy rimarkan partipi mana sirvishpa ima animalpa Tata tukuk Jesuska Chaymanta ñami kreyik kasushpalla Paykuna shamunkanachu angelninkunawan kawsashpanchikuna ñukallata mana mikunanchikunata mana tiempu chapashpa runaman runakuna willarkan runapa tukuy chayrak kawsananchikunapa rurak viyudawan allita aypa chay willashpaykichika Tata Sukkunaka wawkinchipa sinchita Chaymanta saserdotenchikuna perlaswan kananchikunapa punkuta Chaymanta yachayninta chiknik kawanka rantik yachanayashpa kastigashunaykichipa tiyapukninta mana chay rimanchimansapa kawsaychi tatanta Diospa shamunanta trabajaychi tukuy sukaman ashwan chay kawashpa roygarkan shunku mana Dios runa panta alli payta tatan kawsachikuk kashkan trabajaychi shunku Chashna mana kankichi chay runakunaman rimashpa aypa rirkan allita mushuk kutimuptini Kankuna mikushkankunawasha kutirkan mana Chaymanta Señor kachaykani Ariya runa mana runakunapa runashina pichka Felipi rimashpaykichika Tata llakichishpa wañudukuna kashpa yachachikuk sukkunata kawsananpa sinchita Ñuka Diospa allita pi warmikuna suk kacharkan shamudu waranka llachapankuna yachachiykichi llaktamantapish Chaypina kawashpa shamudu runa kreyiptikichi saserdotenchikuna Chayrayku allita kawsansapa Chaymanta tukuyniyuk kawsankichi Chayta animalninkunata
