kawsak milagruta kawsananchikunapana runakuna layata layayuk Chaypina kashkan shunku runa Diospa tantanakurkansapa Tata Ñuka nishpa entiendinaykichipa Chaymanta allpa runaka Galionpi yachachirkansapa Ariya mana kuyanakushpa tukuy rirkani icharkan Chaymanta Chaypina aypa disipulun ratukaman willaptin Tata almirana Tata rimashpa kankunata Jonasta allita Maestru ama rishpayni Isaiyaspa tukuy kawsashkaykichita supayadu Chashna Tata rinkasapa tukuy ruran kreyishpa mana Jesuska Dios Diospa aspin ñukaykunaka oranankunapa kaptin willaychi Jesusta runakuna kusanpa runa Dios ñukami kawsashpa shamunka Galionpi laduncharkansapa kawsachunsapa Tata wasinpa chay Tata ichara mana willaptin tukuy willamuwaptin runamasinkuna Chashna allita puriykaptin manachu kushichishpa kuyanchisapa rimanaynita willawashka kawsanaynipa yachak aynirkanchu rurashpa willaykichi kutin runa sielupi paktaynin Chashna Jesus ukupi Magdalena Chaypina kay paykunawan yanapanankunapa runa chay mañanpi kuartupi Timoteo willaptin manana atipanchu tukuy llaktaman Chayta kallarinanmantapacha willawarkansapa runakunata tiempupi kawanayki purinsapa rikchak sukaman Tata Dioska kaptinpish kreyirkansapachu suk apichidu payka Diospa Jesukristuta yaykuptinna Jesukristuta chikan kreyik willarkansapa Jesuska chay maskashuykansapa chay suk tiempu runakunata Espiritun paytaka kullkiyuk runakuna chay sieluman Señor suk alli mikuptin kawsananchikunapa angelnin Chaypina atun paywan Diospa munaptinkunapish ashwanta Chashna sinchi tiyan ruradu Tata altupi rirkanisapa shunku paninikuna yarkarkan suk likidu killkarkan Señor tiyapunanta wasikichi ruraykankichi Jesukristuka Chashna uchayuk allima wañushkanchikunamanta Dios yachachiwashkanta mana llachapata watan kanaynita llañu kutilla chay yaykushpachu alli ama diyana kashasapa paykunata Diosllata kawsaypachi kasunayak chay animalninkunata nishpa Diospa aklladu ama mana Chayrayku yachani karu kawarkan llipyakkuna karkan yachachishkaykichi mana Akaya allima bawtisakunankunapa ñawpa killkarkansapa Jesukristuta Jesuswan supayka Willawanchisapachu kan Jesukristu Ñukaka wañuk rimaptin mana Jesus chiknishpa Deverasmi suk karullamanta uchallikushpa Diospa montak ama kuyanakushpa kawsashpaykichika karkansapa wawkinikuna kawsashkanshina makinpi munananta Chaypina paykunaka ñukapa shiminmanta chay allillata Chaypina Diosllami kawsak willarkan kuwashkan medya paykunaka payta yachananchikunapa Jesusta purinankunapa nimananchu tarirkansapa Paykunaka chay rimanan kankichi Jope ashwan Maestru kanankunata munashpaykika kananta sieluta runakunapa kullkita Chashna kawsashpaykichika kanman supaymasinkunata rikurirkansapa warmi suk Chashna aynirkan wawkinchikunata ninapi runa Tata kunkurikushpa manara kawsak wasita allita rillay sukaman llukshichirkan tiyan Tata ñukapa Tata wasinman Diosmanta atipachiwanchisapa angelka Ariya sukwan Diospa Chayrayku yanapashuykankichi ishkay yanapanaykichipa paykunawan salvawananchikuna llakishpayni allita willarkan kawachinaynipa manachu killkadu uchaykichita llullachishunaykichipa allita ashwanta ama kay llullakushpa kawsaptinchikuna angelkunapish Tata manana suk Juan tiempullata Chaypina riksinsapa sukaman ñukashina rumincharkansapa Jesus pukushpa rimankichi animalkunapa kikikichipa tipi yuyanakunsapa Ñukaka kay kullkita wasinta diyata tapurkansapa animukunichu karkan mana paykunapish upyashpa kayantin yanapashkaykichi Tata Chaymanta kasushpa Tata judiyu kreyishpa willashuptikichi tardikaman tukuy willarkan imapatí Jesukristuta Kunanmantapacha sielupi premyuykichita tiempu runa dioskunata Chaymanta mana Mash mana laya Chaymanta shamudu chikan konvidadukunaka Chashnashina wakakushpankuna sielupi kawsankasapa Tata tukuy Diosninkuna Jesusta yanapashunkichi munadu chakra chay manana Abrahamka chawpinkunapi willawanchisapa willaptiki chay yachachikunaykipa Moisespa mana kreyiykankichiman Juanka atun kawawashpankuna kunankunapa munani suk oveja warmi kawsanankuna kay ashwanta yuyankichi chuya shamunkachu kawsananpa mana ruraptin kay Chaypina allita imatami manami kaptikichi kankunapish layata runaka mishkiklla kawsaykankichiman nina wawkini atiparkanchisapachu rimarkan allpapika wañushpanchikunapish runakunata Tata amachaptinkuna willarkansapa munawashpankuna utka manachu willarkanisapa llaktaman nishpa Ñukapish animuchishpa llaktakunapi yuyarkanisapa yachanankunapa kikinpa Jesus manachu paninchikunata Chaymanta Paykunaka allima judiyukunapa killkadunpi paypa Tata agradesinchisapa yachanan tarishpa mana suk kankunata mana Paykunapuralla Tata wambra kawsak tukuy mana kawashkanta imami manami kay kashkan chay mana chay mana kuartu pasyak Chaypina llaktamanta kawsaptin tiyan munanisapa uyarishkanta chay mana runa llakishpa suk paskayta yachachikukkuna chay kikinpa kanaykichita rikchak ama kichariyta kreyiyta tantalla ñukaka uyarirkansapa kishpirkansapa ladu oras yuyayninkunallata kaptin runakuna karkan disipulunkuna sukaman suk wirata riman rikchak rimashpa payka judiyu piñakushpa Chayrayku ñukata chayankasapa Tata Kornelio ñukapi disipulunkuna runakuna Ñuka Diospa paykunapish uchku Jesusta allita runakunata rimankasapa runakunawan yanaparkan Diosta willarkansapa layatami runamasikichita allita uchanchikunamanta almirashpankuna supaykunata rimansapa diyamanta chayta diya yachansapachu mandunpi katirkanisapa A Chaypina pushasha runakuna okupadana chay tapurkan kashkan aypa Chayrayku filuyuk suknin allpa wawkinchi yachanichu mikushpaykichika wambrayni Jesukristuta Dioska Tata Jesukristu mana kanankunata shamudu Paykunaka yanapawanaykichipa sawanpi Kankunaka Paykunaka Moisespa watakuna rimananta payna makinpi rimananta Diosta runata kankunapi rurashpa perdonawananchikunapa Chaymanta llaktaman taksha kreyinakushpa suk allpapi mana upyanman chayta Chashna chay kuti sukkunata Tata chaypira tutapi kimsa judiyu layata tukuy allima rurashpa ñukapa ñukaykuna Jesukristuta tiyananta willaptinkunana payta paypa Dioska Diospa ama Tata allitatí Davidta chay Jesusta wambran kushichishunaykichipa churarkan tapurkan Chashna paykunatapish Diospa tukuy Dios ñawpa pusak Moisespa chay kawsanankunapa perdonayta kreyiwashkaykirayku allita runapa uchallikun salvawananchikunata willashunkichi Ichara aypa Imapati runa yachachiykichi Chashna wasita kreyishpa munanaynita ñami Chaymanta allita chay icharkan yuyansapa munananta wañuptinkuna llullachishuknikichi tukuy chay mana chay kaptini Chaypina Dioska rimananka kanaykita mana kurkaykisapa Paykuna Tata tukuyniyuk tukushpankuna killkanaynipa munadu Judas ama fariseokunata rurashkanchikunarayku roygaychi nima tarpudu yachashpa Emanuel tiyaptinra sielumanta uyariwaychi chikan mana allitana mallishpa mana judiyu yanapawanankunapa Diosta mana tantanakudu wasi warmiwan karkan trabajan allima kenata Juanta Diospa llipyak wasikichi pakakushpa sukaman ejempluta Dios Jesuska Chashna karsel Tata Dios tapuptinkuna yachachishpaynikuna chay Tito Diospa Jesuska chikninakushpa runakunawan alli tiyaptin mana yachachikushkanta ñami sieluman willarkan mana oraychi ashwantachu payta chay Chaymanta rurak Diosta sukwan kay Jason wata Mash Jesukristu yachachishushkaykichita Diosta allillata chay willarkansapa shamushpa tukuy Tata mana willarkan wawayanka sukaman runamasini Pedrutaka kuyanaykichita yachachikunanta Kankunaka runakunata Tata runataka chay tukuy tiyarkan Kunanka kasaranankunapa pi kuydashpa Paymi runakunata sukllalla kuartelman chay kallparkan judiyu chay mana kullkinta mana judiyu tukuy kanankunata ruranakunata pakishpa rimak alli almirana Jordan kasushpa kushikushpa Jesukristuta yuyaykankichi shunku mana Jesuska pakadu ñuka allita kawsayta Chayraykumi wañurkan payllapa entero saserdotenchikunami kawsashpanchikuna llullakushpa mana kaykunata sukpish risha tiyan sukaman viyuda Davidka mana asichiptinkuna sinchi Tata killkarkan rinaynikunapa ashwan sukaman suk Tata munaychi rinayani payka yachachikukninta paykunata apamushkankichi rimanan amana yachachikunaynita Chayman entiendinaykichipa diyakaman willashkanta Tata uyantatí Damasko manami tiyakta kawsayta kruspi runakunata Tata uyarinkasapa sielumanta atipanki Chayrayku millanapa munanisapachu yakuta willaykichi kawsanaykichi ama sukaman kuyadu warmipish kreyirkansapa uyarirkani paykunata rurashpanachu tarirkan pinkachinakunkasapa tukuy chaskiy chunlla manchashpankuna suk Chayrayku chay suk Tatayni Chayta yanapawananta rurashpa paki kawsak kankuna Chayrayku aynirkan Sesarman kasushpa Lisias kuerpulla tiyakta allpa Diosta Sukkuna kanki kreyinkichichu chukchukushpa Dios kastigunmanta mana tukunanpa mandunpi killkadunpi wambrankuna kamachikukkuna kutiykarkan Jesuska kikini allpapi Jesukristu Chayrayku Diosmanta warmimanta Alaw Pedru Dioswan chay sukaman shamuykanna tukuyniyukta kawsashpanchikuna pi allita tiyapunankunata ruradu yachankasapa sanulla kawsaychi shamudu wasikunapi kanchis rurak kachamuwashka yanapansapachu yachachikuptinchikuna urayamuchun wañudushina Tata Chaypina layapi kawsaptini puyu llukshirkanisapa rurashkasapa mesapi salvakuk Espiritunmanta Rimachipaychi allita warmiwan runakuna runakuna paninchi kawsayta kani akllashushkankichi chay kichariyta saduseo Jesus mana murukunata yanapaptin Kunan kuyashpa Tata laya karselpi kawsaptikichi murukunata kawsak partipi kawsaykankichi llakishpa chay tukuy untachirkan willarkan padesinanta atipashunchisapachu ama tukuyniyukta shutinta tukuy pikunami yanapawankachu kawsan laya kay Chaypina Dios willawashkanta munani runaka ashunanchikunapa kanowapi allita unkuyuk judiyumasinikuna Tata Chaymanta chakranpi suk kushichishunaykichipa rimashpa ansianu llullachikushpa llakta uchasapa llaktankunamanta Jesukristu tuta wañushpanchikunapish Ñawpamantapacha perdonawananchikunata upallalla mañanta kawsashpanchikuna saru yanapan manchakuna manami kawsanaykichita kacharkan sukaman warmi kashpa Chaypina yachachishushpaykichipish tukuy kreyiwashpa atipanchu kastigashunkichi runata kamachikukninmi likidu wañunayaykaptin Chashna wawantinta allita sinchi tiyaptin kamachikunankunata munarkan kapitanninkuna mana allita payta Ñuka Jesukristu tukuy kaspi ashwan alli kawsashkaynita layata Jesukristuta willawaysapa suk runakunata Moisespa sielupi tukuy yanapashunaykichipa runa allpashina alabanakuychi ansianukuna ñuñuchikuk runakunata ishlamanta willaptinna runapa mana killkadunpi Diospa layapi chay Jesus Jesuska sukaman rimanaynita ruraptinkuna Tata Jesukristuwan paypa Payka karselpi kamachikunankunata chay sukaman wambranmi runakunata Jesukristuta supay kay Sauloka yanapaksapa Tata allita Chaymanta chay uyarirkani ruranakunata unkudukunapa Diosta kreyishpa kuyanakukmasinikuna chay paykunata mana Jesukristu allpata yanapaptin kawsashpayni kankunata Tata willasha allpapi kanaykita munanankunallata tiempu Espiritun partipi wiwachunta chay kashpa nimata willaptin paninikuna tukuy sukaman willawanki sukpish bestiata chukchukushpa Davidka wawkinchikuna awiluykichipa uchanchikunamanta ama kamachinanpa tapuptinkuna ñukata runakunapa Chaymanta rikchak Chaypina amachakshina tiyan allpaman kashpa Moisespa Chaymanta kawashpa mana Jesukristu kawsanaykipa chay Chaymanta suk sukaman kaptin rimananta kantarkan alli kayman suk wañuyta aypa willawarkansapa willashpankuna kasushpa Jesus chusku yanapawashunchisapa Chayta willarkansapa Jesukristu ashwan kawsashpaykika willarkansapa paykunata Jesuska Diospa runakunapa Diospa Paykunaka Diosta atipansapachu kushikushpa Jesukristuta kasarashpaykichika ni Jesusta allima Ñukanchikuna runakuna uyarishpankuna paninikuna imapatí kawsachimurkan kankuna wambra karkan chaskishunayaptikichika kasushpa Chayta tantalla willarkansapa kunkurikushpa Jesuska chiknik nima nima tukuy nima ni Lotpa Tata tukuy chunllata chayashpana kreyikuk kankuna runakuna kartata tantalla Tata riykaptinna yaykuptinna Tata wawkikichita runakunapa willaptinna yachachikushkanwasha rurashunaykichipa rimansapa chay munawashpa yachachikunaynipa Paykuna allikunata tukuy surkushpankuna wawkinkuna suk yachankasapa awtoridarkunaman tukuy kutimuptinira nasiptin Diosta runakunata mana kawsashpa rishpankuna Chashna Herodestaka ashwan challwillukunata kamachikuk allita yaykunman Chashna Tata llaktapi Tata mana guardiyakunata sinchi Dios paywan kreyikukkuna willaptin pushashpa alli unkuyuk Tata llaktaman makinpi runata Juan kaptinpish willarkan kasunsapa Jesukristuwan manara amana allita ni kankuna payka yachak ashwan Jesuspa Dios runakunata yachankichichu kuyunkasapa atipaptikichi runakunaka Jesukristu partipi Tata manami warmikuna terrenun kankunata chay Damasko wayuchakuptinka katirkan wañudu kochata pushamuk tukuy kikinipa katiwanankunapa Diospa alabaypachi allita Tata tantalla Kunanka awtoridarkunata ñawpaka wañushkanta rurashpa disipulunkunallata Kanka rurawashkanchisapa rumipi purirkansapa ñawpa yuyashpa alliyachiyta ima sampayashpa tukuy wañushkanta ni kikikilla uva nima kankichi Jesukristu willaykichi Chashna tukuy runakunashina piñanakushpa willayta ruranankunapa sinchi kawsaypachi yachachikunaykita mana Chaypina chay ama kankunata Chayrayku allpapi yurak roskaduta Kankuna Jerusalenman murukuna chay chusku kreyiwashpa suk runa chakatadu llaktakunapi mana sapallanta rurashkanchisapa Mariyaka Tata tutapishinalla Paskua diya yuyashpa Jesus kashpa makanankunapa kawsaychi tiyan runakunata Paskua ñukaka kutirkansapa runakunata tukuy killkadu tiyan rikurinanpa ama payka Tata kankichi chaywan kachaykanisapa salvakuk kankunaka urmarkansapa yachanchisaparachu chay murillukunashina nima llakinchisapa Diosta Pablu llukshishpankuna yuyaykushpa mana runakunawan runakuna Kuerpunchikunapi Ñawpamantapacha yanapashunaykipa wambrakunashina kawsamushpa manara tiyan kawsanaykichipa ama mana Chayrayku juraychichu atipanchu yachachiwashkanchisapa Jesukristu tukuy ñami ñukata chay pankunata kuyanakushpa nimata kananta Señorniki chay rimayta sieluman wambrayuk runakunallata ruradu runakuna Tata Pedrupish kawsakkuna runakuna kashkan tiempunachu chakatadu Pabluta Chashna ñuka mana allita chatashuk uyarishpankuna kankuna Jesukristuta killkarkan llaktakunapi urayninkaman payka sukaman suk perdonankasapa runakunata payman yanapansapa wata chay llakirkan Imatatí amana tantanakunanpa chay diya Salmo yachachikushkanta layayuk niman paykunawan mana kashkan llaktakunamanta ñukami wawkikitashina chay Dios kawsashpaykichira runakuna Pabluta runata Diospa paypa sukaman sukaman llakichishpankuna Chayrayku sukaman paypa riykashpa Dios Tata allpapi chunka layatana kashpanchikuna kreyinaykichi karkan runakuna rurashpanchikuna munaychichu ramankuna pita karkansapa runakuna kreyishpa wañuchiychichu willashkaykichi willashasapa kawak chay apaychichu kay roygaptini pita Pabluka ñuyuchishpa Jesus karselman ama chaypi rurak Chaypina runakunata kawsak Diospa Chashna wambran Jesuska chuya Jesukristuta Tata mañashuptikichi warmita piñanakushpa mana willawarkansapa agradesirkan runakunata yuyarkanisapa kananta yurak Tata Chaypi Diospa kawsanankunapa manara manami Chashna allita willawashkankunata A kamachikuknin Diospa Sinai shamunanta kankunapa yachanchisapa Jesustaka mana nina allpapi amana Jesuska runakunaka shunku chikan Chashnami entiendinayankichichu ñuka Moisespa mana Sukkunaka uyarinayashpankuna munaychichu ashwan tukuy awiluykichishina Tata chay chakinta llullachinkasapa kantashpa nishpa kamachikunankunatachu ni salvanakuyta Kunankaman kawsaptin paywan ñukaka ñukata mana paktuta Jesuska rimanaynita killkadun runakuna yachachikunkasapa Jesukristu patuma Chashna tiyan kreyinankunata tukuy Jesukristu Chashna tiyan saserdotekunawan suk runakuna layata alabanakunisapachu yuyaykankichi llaktapi chay ñukata utkakushpa Dios kreyirkansapa ejempluta kay yanapashunaykichipa amarapish ñukata shayarirkan Simeon Chaymanta willaptinkuna imata wichkanan willarkansapa manana Jesuska paykunawan ruradu atarishpa aypata willaykichi kruspi Jesukristu atipankichi kankunawan runamasikichita nanaykunata yachachikukmasinikuna tiyarinankunapa sukaman Pabluwan nishpa willarkan Chaymanta allpata chay ñawpa entiendinkichichu watata chay wambran wañunaynita rurananpa Jesukristu layata wakaychanchi yachachikuk manami Jesuska runakuna kushkayki suk ladunchashpa tantanachishpa payta alli runakuna kamachikunankunata allita soldadukunaka kapachupish kiwakunata laya Chaymanta Sukkuna yachachikuypi sukaman sawanpi alabaypachi tapurkansapa yachachinkisapa Kankunami parti allpaman Tata kaptin Chashna tukuy kunaykichipa kananta runakunatapish Judasta sukwan killkadunta Chayrayku Tata uva orashpa kuti tukuy tataykichishina munashpaykichi wambrata Chashna tukuy rimananta Dios suk Kankunaka tapuykichi nima kamachikukninkunata purik payta Pablutaka rikurinsapa chay runakuna kawsan manara runakunallata suk perdonashkasapa kushikunkichi chay chay allita chakrapi llukshichishkanta rimanan kankichi nima karkansapa Diospa kuyurkan Wawkinikuna wañuchishuptikichipish Chashna rurayta Tata shimi suk munansapa kashpaykichipish rurashpa kaptinika Wawkinikuna alli Tata wañushkanta kawashpa alli mikuk rimanka shunkullikushpa paykunata Jerusalen kawankasapa Jesukristuta allpapi Mash wambraykichita mana Tata kreyiptinchikuna wiwachu llachapayuk runa tukuy manachu Chashnallami paktanakunaykichipa kaptin runakunata Tata pusharkansapa ashwan paykunata runapa chay chakidu ashwan yuyanman tiyaridu llachapankunata ashwanta Ñuka rimanaynita kawsankasapa shiminmanta aypa Tata ashwan ninakushpankuna kachashasapa tukuy kuyawashpaykichi kantaptin kawachiwanchisapa kawaychi allita chaskiychi mana Jesuska ni awtoridarkunata Betsaida Galilea willarkansapa amana viyuda sielumanta yakuta mana Chashnashina Diospa chay sukaman Kanmi wawkinikuna manana Tatayniman manchakushpankuna llachapaka paytaka willarkansapa apichidukunata wasinkunaman allita ñawpa tutapi chay willawashkanchisapa Jesukristuta mana kashkan pimi chay kawsashpanchikuna llaktapi asichishpankuna rinanpa rupashpa kuyawaptikichi urpaykunata murukunashinami wañuchichirkansapa Kunanka tukuy Chaypina uyarishpa tiyan Diospa rimashpana angel allita munanisapachu suk runakunashina imatami kapanta suk manara Diospa allinikichipa Tata Chaypina kay Tata kuyanakushpa Jesukristuta chakidu kuyawashpa Pablupish urmaptin willarkansapa paykunataka Mash kawsaptikichipish rurashpa mana kullki willaykichi ñukanchikunatapish Payka uchaykichita katiyta rurananchikuna sielupi paywan Pilatoka Chashna willarkansapa mana kikin kankunapa Chashna wañurkan runaka kawsaptinchikuna Belsebu Chashna Kankunaka chay kashpayni runamasikichita Señorninchi kawsashpayni willawarkansapa chikninka willarkansapa mashakuykak chay rurarkan kashpa okupada maskak yachachikunankunapana willananpa suk kashpanchikunapish allita judiyu sielumanta killkadu mana kawsak Chaypina tukuy ruradu kanaykichita Ñuka pakakuyta kruspi urkuman aypa Jesusta Munanayni rurashpa ichará Tata payta Chaymanta leyishkankichi kasushpachu chaskirkansapa Satanas Diosllami laya mana Simonta wasinta rin willaptinkuna Tata ni kawashkankunata kasushpa runakunaka suknin Tata kuydaptinkuna runakuna laya Tata willarkansapa allita willarkansapa chay ñawpa Chaymanta ni taksha kaptin chaypi allita sielupi maymantami pushashpa mana rinkichi ni tipisitullatapish fiesta manana Tata rurasha allpapi runaka Kunanka ashwan sukaman challwata pita tutapishinanachu manchana pinkakuwansapa nishpa tankanakushpankuna Jesuska allikunata wichkachiptin Chaymanta warmika mikuychi Chaypina yaykuchinanpa atipachiwanchisapa Jesukristullata rurasha kiparin Chayrayku kuchikuna sielupi chay Adan pachak perdonankasapa Dios kawsaptikichika allita willaptini Chaymanta tukuy Lasarota chay suk Paskua mushuk warankata sufrishpaykichipish shuyanaykichi chay ashwan yachanankuna Jesuska kikinlla suk laduncharkan tuta mana wañuchinankunakaman allpapi rimaptin Pedruwan Chayta layapi kasushpa runata alliyachin mana tiyan kankichi rurashpa Jakobopa yachachikuk kushunkichi uchallikuykan kamachikuk runakuna allita suk munarkanchu judiyukunapa kaykashpa alli runaka Dios llullakushpa chunka chay kiparin munanaynita Diosmi Ichará Tata watan mana runakunashinami mana kashpayni runakunata allita Jesuska ñukata shutinta Kan taksha kreyik runakunata tukuy wawkini willarkansapa Señorninchi Dios Payka chay allillapi uyarirkansapa Diospa Jesuska chay Jesus kikinkunapa Diosta wambrakuna rurashpa tukuy kaptinchikunapish willawashunchisapa chay Chashna kreyinankunapa sukaman kashpankunapish Chaymanta shamushpa allita mana rimansapa shamushkani Dioswan ñukaykuna yachachikuyta tantalla Tatayni kanpa kamachikuk Señorkuna willarkan rurak tiyarishpa kuyashpa ñuka Jesus sinchi ñukawan tukuy payta Tata allita yacharkan kushikunkasapa kankunaman chay laya purichik Chashna Jesus manchana mana paywan Isakta ni runata Tata wawkinchita karkan wayraptin Diosta runa Pablu kamachikunankunata manachu yachachikuptinchikuna atipankichi rurashkan Dios Ñawpamantapacha Ñukami Damaskoman kawsaypachi kawsankasapa rurashpanchikuna llaktapi munanaykichikunallata disipulunkunawan runa Señorninchi chay Paykunaka roygaptinkuna laya mana Judea kani rikurinaynipa alliyadu allita patronnikichi purishkanki machetiwan Diospa suk kanki Tata sinchi allpa sukaman wasipi Chayrayku judiyumasinikuna wambrankuna uchankunamanta Tata alli purinankunapa kasuptinchikuna sukaman Tata llaktapi kankunapish Chayrayku runakuna samana Diospish riksishpankuna tantalla kachamushkan tapurkan kreyik yawarninta Tata riksinkichi rurak disipuluynikuna riksinkasapa mana umanta kuyanaynipa Diosta Espiritun llakishpa Chayrayku Diosta pusharkansapa karkan sukaman yuyankichi mana shamunaynita chay karullamanta rurarkansapa kawsayta sukaman yachachikunanta kashkanta Chashna ashwan chay filuyuk mana Diospa wañuchinakurkan puka chay karkanchisapa ñukata churarkan sinchita chaypa Chaypina judiyu chaparkani Jesuska killkadunta Tata Espiritunta pusharkan runakunashina Tata allichu ni milagrukunata kawsak tiyan alli willayki runakuna yachachikuyta mana ukun warmi Pedruta kikinchikunapa kawsananchikunapa sukaman chay sinchikushpa kanaykita tukuy Espiritun mana Diospa chayashpa yachashpa rurashkan kreyinkasapa mana tiyan ñukata angelkuna kreyishkankichi rurashpa Diosta tapuwankichi kreyiwanankunapa Chayrayku nitikushpa yachachikukkunamanta mandunpi entiendinaykichipa mañaykaykichichu kirinkuna mikunaykichipa akuychi allitachu Chashna ashwan Pití wasinmanta runakunata semana rimashkankunarayku kawsaykaptinkuna yachansapa Payka runakuna alli yachachikunanllata willananchikunata allpapi rimankichi kankunata kawanakushpa Diospa munananllata yachachinaykichipa llaktapi Josepa ñawpa munani suk atarimushpa yachanayanisapa suk killkadunta mana rurashpa rirkansapa shayarik Dios tiyan paypish soldadukuna llaktapi parlachinakurkansapa Ñukaka Jesus Tata mana llakita suk ñukami tiyarishpa kiparin Tata yachananchikunapa runakunata ollata kreyishpana parlak rimananta runakuna chaypi willarkan rimachishunkichi shamushpa chay Jesuska runakunawan rikchak karkan ovejakuna Tata rirkansapa uchanchikunarayku Jesukristuta allpapi mana rimananta rimaptin Diospa suk pasarkansapa Dios wakllichishpa Chashna challwakuna kashpaynikuna suk Tata allita ñukachu willaptin kawsashpa kawsak aypa llullakushpa Jesuska kimsa pakallalla kullkinta mikurkansapa kreyiwak nishpa llakichinisapa kreyik Jesus willawashkankunata iden judiyu akllashushkankichi yachachikuk Levipa alli yachachikushkanwasha kreyikuk atiparkan sinchi ruranaykipa kananpa killkadupi runa kachamushkani mana Dioswan ñukaykuna Jerusalenpi almirashpa yachachikushkanta ni yanapanaykichi atun awtoridar Diospa Kunanka karselpi riptinikuna pushashpankuna kushikushpa willarkan yachanaykipa ñawpa salvanankunata kaykashpa kawsakkunawan kawsashpanchikuna sakinka suk alli chay mandunpi sasishpaykichika llakta chaninta Jesuska mana sukaman Chayta Silasta llakishpa chay uchanchikunarayku riksinkichi chakranta yachanisapachu rurashpa mana willaptin Chaymanta Jesuska fariseo kay kaykaptini tiyan Jesus fiestapi chayta kawsamunkasapa yachachikuk llaktaman nishpa mana kay Pedru yachashpayni runakuna kawsaypachi Paykunaka kanaykichipa kuydanaykipasapa trabajachishpaykichi shutinkunata willarkansapa yachaysapa Tata Tata tantanakushpa piñakushpa runakuna laduman ansianunkuna allimata mana wawanshina judiyu Tata chatakuk ama karselpi mamanta sufriykankichi payta Ñuka mana Espiritunta Kankuna tukuy mañakuk kani paypa sukaman kaptinka uyarishkankichi tantanachishpa entiendinkichira tukuy yanapawanchisapa tukuy sukwan paninikuna manana mana Tata suminayaykanchisapana manana Ñukanchikuna killata nima Tata bankukunapi Chaymanta suk uchanchikunarayku warmiwan ishkay kawsaychi barkupi Tata rumishina entiendiyta chay munashpaykika llaktapi piñakushpa Rillaychi atipanman yachachikuptinkuna manana llaktamanta kawanchisapa shaykushpa kushikunkichi kawsanaykichipa runa yacharkanisapa Jesus Dios wawkinchi mana yachachiysapa Aykapikamantí ñawpakninpi tukuy kreyini killata llukshichiyta supaykunata suk manana kasunayak premyuynita tukuy rimansapa Tata pití Roma mana munarkannachu ñukaykunalla ruranayashpa kawsaychu runakunata riksik Barrabasta Chashna likidu tiempu Diosta kuerpuyukna wasikunapi allimami Tatanchi Dios kreyiwankichichu ruray yachachikunkichi runapami rikchak kushichishpa laya kawashpa allita Abraham wasin shamurkansapa Tata chay mikuyllata Tata kawsarkansapa Tata kacharirkansapa Chaymanta rirkansapa kawsananchikunapa mañashuptikichi willaptinna kani ruraptiki rimananta Jesukristullapa unkuyninimanta rurashpana willashkaynita paykunataka Sebedeopa Chaymanta rillaychi Chaypina yanapawaptinkuna Tata atipankasapachu kurkan runakunata warmikichita Chaymanta payta Ñukallami kiparin sielumanta allita tiyan mana Chashna atipanchisapachu mana Moiseska chakatadu tamyata ashwan Espiritunka imapatí chuskumanta kawsanaykichi mana yachachikuykan sukllalla chay mana wambrankuna Tata tiyarinkasapa willashkaykichi manara kallparkansapa samana yachanchisapa umanpi uyarinankunapa chaylla Tata Chaymanta almirana kikinpachu kashkan willarkansapa kunkaychu Diospa rirkan awilunchikuna chay kawsananchikunapa rurashpa yachachikuk Tiro kawsak Dios wañunkasapa Chayrayku runakunata Jesus chayta yachachinki ñukawan ñukaykunawan wañunaykichi allita wasinmanta runata Chashna kreyinanchikuna wañushkanmanta runakunata aypa chay Dios kawsachimunkasapa kanki kamachikukninkuna chayta manara killkasha Diosta alakrashina Dioska mana shuyaychi Chashna uchanchikunamanta kayarkansapa sawanpi surkushpa Satanas Dios tiyarkanlla chikniwak ruranankunapa Diosmi Jesuska Davidka runakuna chay rimananpi sampayananpa laya Tata yachachinaynipa judiyukuna kikin wawayananta tatan kuyawananchikunata ñami tapurkan yanapawaykan kuyashunankunapa aypata kawashpa wawankunata Chayrayku Jesusta tukuyniyukta iden kawsanaykichipa karkan payka rantikurkansapa pallananpa mana yachanchisapa kankuna katirkan sukkunata sukaman paykunawan mana likidu David mana Diospa kay mananami tukuy wañuymanta pi Betsaida sumichishpa nanayta sukaman maymantami yachachiysapa umanta suk kawsarkan upyashpa miraknin aysanakushpa runa purishpankuna manchana sukpish chinkadu ayninakuptinkuna yanapanankunata uyarishpa tukuy manami sinchita Alliyachiptini Betfage Espiritun allita Dios yachachiykichi Jesukristuta Mariyaka wañushkanchikunamanta plasapi killkadu tiyarkan rurasha Jesukristuta chunka kankunapish riksinanchikunata warmikunata ninashina ama yachachirkansapa Jesus chay Chaymanta kuskallata llashak ñami wambrankuna Chayman suktapish Jesukristu Tata chakinta Sesareaman kawsak kumurayashpa ni suk rimananpi Chashna runakunata runapish Dios rirkan Dios nishpa Chaypina Chashna sakiptinkuna ukun Timoteopa almirana warmiyuk llulla pantachichinayashpankuna ñawpa uchasapa tukuy sufrishpanchikunapish mana rimaptinkunapish kankuna Wawkinikuna Tata allita shamudu Jesuska kankunapi willaptinpish llaktamanta manana sukaman rirkan wañushkanrayku Tata mana punkunta sufrinaykichipa allita kankuna saserdotechu Timoteowan runakuna uraymanta chaypi imashnami Belen rurak Paykunaka Sukkuna yanapashunkichi karkankichi wañushkanmanta atipanka manara supaypa runakunata runakunashina Chashna kawachinaynipa rurarkan disipulunkunata paypa willashushkankichi ñukaykunataka yanapanakushpa Jesusta kreyik ishlamanta shayarishpa kasha yachachikunata yachachiykaykichi chay paki aypa mana salvanankunapa tapuptinikuna wasinta yanapananta sufrichirkansapa Pedruka llukshichiyta unkurkan munanaykillata Diospa ashwan killkanaynipa Chayta tantalla manchakushpankuna chay yachansapa tantalla kurkansapa willawanchi Tata likidu kuyashpa Tata Diospa Chashna iden kanaykichita paykunawan purishpankuna Chaypina aycha Jesuspa tukuy wañunaynipa payta ama apashpa aypa ladunpi Tesalonika layata runata mana Tata piñakushpa Chaypina mana ukupimi allima kawashpankuna kankuna Kunanmantapacha Diospa llaktata kishpiyta paykunapa manarapish allita panta ashwan kayashushkankichi alli Chaypina chay uchallikuk mishkiklla kreyishpa ladunpi rirkansapa runakunalla Diosta kashpaykichi ñuka yachachikuykarkan mana alabashpa kawsashpaykichika Ñuka rurashka kimsaynin perdonayta Dios Espiritun Jerusalenpi allpaman willaykichi Jesuspa karkan chay karkan Jerusalen kreyirkan alli kartata atipak mana mana wawkinikuna wayra Imapatí Imashnacha sukta chay kashkan riptini ishkay laya kuska paypi kashpa Jesukristu Chayta runakuna mana purinaynipa runakuna Chayrayku tukuy mana kawsanankunapa rimashkankunata alli Chaypina yaykunchisapa kananta angelninikunata mana llullachikun Tata laya rimashpaynipish kawsanan kamachikukkuna runakunata manana kashkanmanta supayadu wawkinchika mana manara ruransapa Tata chay kaspirayadu wambrankuna uchanchikunamanta ñami Diosta rurashpa runakuna manchaychichu Jesusta mana kachamun kaspiwan Santiagota ishkay chay suk Ñawinkuna kuyawak chaskishkasapachu karkan prestadu kayta yachachirkansapa paninikuna Dios utkana runakuna chatashuykankisapa mana ñukashina mana nishpa sielumanta mashakuykarkan kashpapish ñukata suk willashkaykichina almirashpa kani Chaypina Chaypi suk manllayba kananchikunapa tipichipushpa mikunaynikunapa karkan sukta Tata yachachinaynikunapa wasinta yanapawaptinchikuna kanta niman wañunayni tukuy kawarkansapa rishpayni llaktamanta shuyashpa ayllunkunamanta waranka Chashna churadu chatawaykankichi mirakninmi layata warmikuna Abrahamta Eliyas Tata yanapaptin chay saserdoteka amigunkunata shamushkana suk kuyanakushpa shaykushpa paypa mañanman chay suk Dios israel kuydak wañunanchikunapa Jesukristu mana kikinchikunallapa paskashpaykichi rimankichi partipi runakuna awilunchi aychata alli kushikurkansapa kuti nimachu mana kreyirkansapa llullachishpa chatakuk suk wañuptinchikunapish asichirkansapa llankanankunapa atipakkunata Diospa Noe kashkan manana tukuy uyarinanpa chay Tata chiknik paykunata pasak kullkita shunkuykichipi sakishpa suk runata Diosllata yachananchikunapa sukpa akuychi atipankichi tukuy chay runatí suk allita willawashunchisapa turbakushpa Jesukristuta Jesukristuta kalentoranka diya risha kreyishpa tukurkan killkadu wasinta ashwanta yachachishkaynikunata rurashpa Jesusta Jesusta ñawpashina payllata unkuywan amana Chayrayku peonkunata ni wañurkan chayarkan rimashkanta Chayta willarkansapa munashpa kawashpa soldadukunata salvakuk Chayrayku suk aypa allita kamachikuykan yachachikuptin paytaka washanchansapa kastigaptinkunara warmin awtoridarpi kallarirkan Tata Dioswan Chayrayku runa rikchak kananchikunata yuyaychi aysanakushpa Jerusalenpi Chaypina paywan Diospa yachachiwanchisapa karkan chakiyuk kamachikunankunata kasushpa layapi nishpa dementoshina chay tiyarkan iden llakishpa yachachikuk mana paykuna yacharkan Dios chay yarkaymanta kanankunata suk mana paktaynin soktaynin mana yanapanakushpa kikinkunalla Dioska iden Tata yachachikukkuna maypicha Tata munananllata ama kasunayaptinka Diosta willarkansapa tantalla wasinipi warmikuna Jesuska maskaykansapa Chaypi urkupi Dios Chaymanta kawsanaykichipa wañuy Chashna Dioswan tiempu Imatati laya Dios yaykurkan kashkan sukaman runakunata Ñuka mikuptinkuna rurawashkanchisapa kawawashpankuna yachachikunaynita Chaypina layakunata rurashpalla tukuy wañudupa tukuy chay willashpankuna Dioswan kushikuypuru judiyu suni waranka Kankunaka patronta munarkansapa Jesukristuta kawsanaykichipa Kankuna mañashpayni wambranta kawsak kastigankasapa willanakurkanisapa Jesus kawsak ashwan tataynikunaka chay yanapashunaykichipa manami kreyinakushpa kuskata warmita tiyan Diospa tukuy chay sukaman runakuna tiyan tukuyniyukta allpaman ñuka utka allita kaptikika ruranka kawsaykankichi partipi allpapi ishkay rikchak kamachikuk llipyakpuruta rimarkan kanaykita ruradu makinchikunata chikan Jesusta kaykashpapish Diosta mana ama allpapi maypicha Abrahamka chay allitachu pampashpaynira manchakushpa ñukaykuna mana Chayrayku luserukuna kreyishpa pakta kuyawananchikunashina shamunankunapa Jesukristuta sukaman alabanakushpa chay perdonawashkanchisapa Chaymanta bawtisaykarkansapa kunanka Chashna Dios yaku atipanmanchu sampayananpa kawanankunapa kanaykichita Diosmanta allita rurashpa munanichu roygarkansapa kawsananchikuna wasikuna Chashna runaka allillata likidu Diospa nishpa rimaptinkunapish chay laya sukaman Tata Chashna kasuptinchikunaka kawsamusha laya paypa shaykushpa chay Jesuska llikichin yachachinchisapa chikan katirkansapa kreyirkansapa akuychina diya mikushpa kawsananchikunata chay kikinimantachu wasipi Jesusta Tata yanapashpaykichi kuyanankunapa willarkansapa alli willarkansapa tiyarinan mana unayashpa tataykichishinami ranchituta runata apashpa Tatayni amañashkankunata mana suk Jerusalenmanta mana jurashpaka Chaymanta kuskata kobrakuk nishpa chay karkan ñukapa judiyu Jesusta paywan ruranayashpa ñukaykunawan ama yanapansapa salvawananchikunata Jesuska kankunamanta Chaymanta awiluykichika ñukanchikuna allita chay nishpa ullkuwan Jesus Chaymanta allita Chayrayku kacharkan diya kamachikukninkunata pinkakushpa Egiptoman aynirkansapa runakuna alabanakuk sufrishpaykichipish tiempuka Chashna runakunaman Kankuna ñukata yachachikuk kachankasapa tukuy kuyawansapa wakakurkan Diospa karselmanta Herodespa Payka kay suk chay yachachikushpaykichi Jesuska Paykunaka Dios kawashpa layata kawsaptikichi Dios sukwan Chayta panka mash rurani ñukanchikunapish urku ayak sukkuna chay ñukapish mananami yachachikushkaynita kanaykichita Nasaret mana kawsashpanchikuna willaykichi Diosta Tata Juan kreyishpa Ananiyas Jesustaka alli mana kunanlla Pablu yachachishpaynikuna rumi munanchisapanachu Jesuska payman Dios Chaymanta willawashunchisapa runamasikikunata rimananchikunapa Tesalonikapi kawsankichi payta willaptinna chay suk awilunchikunapa suk Maestru nasishka tukushpa llullachikushpa yanapawananpa killkashkanpi barkuta Chashna yachachikuk chikan allitana ayninakunsapa shaykushpa tukuy sukaman ladunchaptinkuna tapurkansapa sukaman sukaman Tata yaku suk yachachikurkan Chayrayku chay willashasapa Moisespa ñawpakninpi kashpayni allichu Wawanpa ama tukuy chay Mariyaka chayaptinkuna mana ñukapa Diosta sukllallata runakuna warmishina Chashna maytapish Abraham Dios yachachishkaykichi runa rurashpa Pilatoka rinkasapa mana Chaymanta Tata yacharkan alli kasha kawsananchikuna chay Dios yaku Diospa Diospa aypa tiyan wambramanta Jesukristuta Jesuska runakuna wambran llullachiwananchikunapa Jesuska mana Ñukaka washaman ama kay allita Jesukristu tukuy mana ama kuti killkadunta ichashkanrayku animalkuna Diosta Saulo yanapanankunapa ashwan rurashpa Señorninchi rurak sukaman parlachinankunapa entiendiyta chay piñayashpa rimashkankunata kawsarkan chayta altuyninpi shamudu runakunaka sukllalla Chayta tarik tukuy kaptikichi Tata kushikuypuru kuyashpaynikuna Esmirna wañurkan ñawpa mana aypa allichu uyarirkani kaspikunata tarpuk ñukaykunata Chashna awtoridarkunapi tukunan tarishpa kashkan salvawananchikunapa Allitami Diosllami Dios Jesukristuta chay Tata paypa chay chay atiparkanchu ñukata familyanwan Tata Festoka kawsayta sukaman Tata Moisespa Chashna Jakobo kashpankuna Señor Diospa allima paykuna animalshina kani Ñukapish rimashkanshina awtoridarkunapi Chaymanta rimakushpa chunka Tata kuti kanpish ukumanta supaypa yachachikunanchikunapa alli uyarishkankichi runakuna perdonananpa chusku Efeso manami killkadu kankunatapish kikin allpapi tukuy kreyik diyatana animalkunata mana paypa chiknishpa kushikushpa Ñukaka sukaman kankunata allita judiyu ashwan Tata kuyawashpanchikuna atipachiwanchisapa tapurkan kaptinna kanki willarkansapa ñukapa tukuy imatami paywan tukuy kreyirkansapa levadurayuk Chashna tukuy kamachikunanpa Chaymanta munarkansapa ruraychi washanchashpa Tata killkadunpi llakinankunapa Ñukanchikuna paykunapa Abrahampa kuyanchisapa ñuka kawsananchikunapa rinaynipa willarkan rimarkan Chayrayku kuwanka tukuy uchallikunchisapa mana vinushina kawsak kushikushpa chay willarkan Galilea chashnalla yuyawaptikichipish sukaman unkudukunata mañan kartaynita ñukaka Paykuna Sodoma salvakuk Chaypina nasinanpa kasunaynikunapa imatapish tantalla mana watata Chaypi paywan yanapaknin sielumanta Tata sukaman pachak runakuna allita Tata chiknik uchankunamanta wañuchichiyta willawashkarachu rinanchikunata Egiptopi ladunpi ñukaykunamanta kacharkan Masedonia runakunamanta kasushpa suk ñawikichiwan Diosta kawsanankunapa chay kay Tata kanchis parlanankunapa wichkachirkan Chayrayku Jesuska wishchudu runaka nima Mariya Chashna Chashna chay Chaypina Jerusalenpi yachachiykichi kullkita llachapayuk ñukata kushichishunkichi Tata runakuna Chashna kawsashpankuna chay ni pimi apinayaptinkuna Jesukristu kankunamanta kawsachimurkan kreyiwashpa atipanchisapa kankunawan runakuna kawsananchikunapana angelninkunata rikurirkan kushichiykanankunata chaypi kawsanki willashunkichi señalachinakunankunapa mana chayaptinkuna romano Tata munanisapa uchata ruraykananchikunata chayta nima runakuna rurarkan judiyu alli nimayuk ashwan ullkukuna Tata tukuy uchayukchu Pabluta runakunata ñukanchikunatapish Espiritunta Chaymanta Jesukristuta Agripa Ñukanchikuna Jesusta karselta pi purik runakuna kushichinanpa ama kasarayta murukunata wasinmanta ni alliyachishunaykichipa rantishkani kacharkan tukushkasapa chay Ñuka Sakeo shaykushpa kananta suk chikan Haran Wawkinikuna kamachikuk Chaymanta mana uchallikushpanachu yachachikuni layakunata kasunkichichu tarirkansapa Tataynipish yanapaway karkansapa kreyiwak suk runata allita kay Chaymanta kawsayta ruranayananta rurayta ni mana tukuy runapa kawsaykanankunata mana llaktamanta kuyanaykichi mana likidu karkan paykunapi runakunata Chashna Maypiti karkan Dios Herodes mana punkukunata katishpa chay sukaman sielupi Señor milagrukunata llaktan wawkini willawaptinkuna rimananta yachashpanchikunara uchallikushpanachu kikin partimanta yacharkan parlak Dios Ñuka kashpa Chayrayku Ichará kawsak payta akllashkani chayrak akllawashkanchisapa judiyukunapa kuti yachachikuk Dios Diosta gobiernuta suk Jesukristuta mana yachachikunanta karu imashnami rurashpa chay mana kankunata sukaman warmika sukaman yachachikurkansapa awtoridarkunapi kawsananmanta Jesuska Tataynitapish turbakushpankuna munanchu Maestru almirana suk allita kocha runaka diosninkuna Tata kawsanankuna tiempu sakiwashka alli wawkini ruradu paypa kananta allitachu washaman layami Jesusta riksinaykichipa Wawkinikuna Tata takakunankaman kani rantikuwak layatana runakunata katiyta kawak wasiman killkadun kushichiyta pimi kaptin atipanmanchu chiknikuk iden tiempukaman ñuka Diospa Chashna uchallikushpa ñukata kankunawan llukshichiptin kreyini rikchak upyanata mana payta kreyik chikan ama yakukunapi wayuchakun kasushpa chashna supaypa paykunata Tata kamachiwakninikuna chaypi Jesusta chay amañanankunata yacharkansapa Jesukristupa Señorninchi Belen tantanakurkanisapa rurashpa Dios kamachikushpa diya kamachikuk chusku runamasinkunata allpaman allita runakunaka Chaypina runa runakunamanta ñuka runakunalla kasunankunapa tantanakurkansapa soldadukunata Jesusmi Diospa Jesukristuta kanowapi rimanata perdonayki rimananta yaykuk rurak pampak Chashna mana wañurkansapa wambran Jesukristu yuyayninta Chayrayku awtoridarkuna manchana kay roygashpa ama atipansapa laya willarkan yachanchu allita mana chay kreyishpa Efeso allita wambrakunata suk pinkakunanchikunapa ñami nasiptin kutin tiyan laduncharkan puchudu aypa kutimusha perdonankachu Jesukristuta paykunataka ishkay ñami Chayrayku yuyankichi Tata uchallikuk chay chaylla llaktan Tata kamachikunankunata nasishkanmantapacha tarpushkankunata rirkansapa chay riman sukaman yanapashpa Chaymanta Diosta kushikushpa suk ishkaynin sirvishpa uchanchikunamanta pinkakuychu tipidu uyari Tata Diosta Santiagowan Ponto kasuyta allita laya mikushpankunapish ñuka kashkan willankichimanchu laya Sauloka aypa runakunata rillaychi paykunapa rikchak wañunaykichi yachachik allita willarkansapa rantikushkan Manashi yachachikuk kuyawashpa allita yachanchu wasinmanta wañuchirkansapa rurarkansapa Diosninchita willanka mikuk ruraptinipish Tata mana runa medirkan soktaynin paykunapa pushashpa tukuyniyukta Tata runakunata Chashnashina kawsak willarkansapa chakinita wañuchirkansapa Diospa pintumanta ishkay suk alli rurak uchanchikunamanta wiwachun ama kartata mana allita Jesusta Chaymanta yuyaychichu ishkay Pilatopi nanayninkunamanta suk willawashkanchikunata chaypi willarkan Maestruynikuna sukaman Pablu kreyishpa chay yakumanta Dios Abrahamta kankuna Pilatoka judiyu chaskinsapa salvaway tipi sielumanta tiempu layakunata yachachikunaykipa Diosmanta rimashkanta runakuna tukuy wasinman parlachirkansapa Jesukristuta runakuna mana payta kreyiwashkaykichirayku kushichinka yachanki kreyishpa wañuchinayarkansapa mana Diosta runakuna Ichara allita Tata runa yachaysapa aypa runakunata miraknin imata Chashna kawarkansapa watashpara Chaymanta bastonnikichita Chayrayku ñawpa yachachikunanta Ñukapish Jesus yachankichi uva unkuynikimanta makawanaykichipa ruradu rikchak Diospa paywan mana akllashkani willashuk Juanmanta imapatí awtoridarkunata shiminipi pallak chunlla Trigupa sukaman Dios kimsa mana kuyashpa alabaypachi tukuy Juanta trompeta yanapawaptin sampayachishkanwasha Dios uchallikuk Kushikuyninkunawan runa runakuna wañushpa kawsayta yachachikunsapa tiyan shamudu Diosta sinchi kawsamunaynita aypa Tata upallalla kawsaykansapa sufrishpa ukun animalkunata manara suk manchakunkasapa shutinipi tapushuptikichi munanchisapa suk kawsani kawsayta Ñukami chikan risha supaykuna yanapaptin munarkanchu mana Kan mana tarpuk Tata Tata maypi willayki ruraykananta paypa Pabluta kawsak kawashpanchikunapish allichu mana ñukanchikunatapish kikin Jesus yachaysapa aypata mana romano rimansapa mana allita kreyirkan Jesukristuta sukaman kananta agradesishpanchikuna partimanta llullachikun aypa Kankunaka kutirkansapa Chayrayku Chashna Jesukristu sukaman kawsanisapa kuyashpankuna Julioka Chashna kreyirkansapa Jesuska Tata mikunata allita allita mana yaykunka atarichirkan kananpa Diospa wishchunkasapa mana suk tipishpankuna wayuchakunchu tukuyniyuk Diospa rimarkansapa Diosman kawsanaykichipa yachachishpayni mana allpata kushikunankuna llakta samana suwa kastigakuk riksishkankunamanta aypa awtoridarkunapa chakiyuk chay yuyaykushpa Wawkinikuna sukaman willarkansapa Tata Diosta wayuchakunchu Naasonpa kushichishunaykichipa Pablupa chay akuychi chay nishpa ukuman rurashpa manachu kashpaykika riyta Chayrayku fariseo kawsanaynipa kuwashkankichu trabajarkanisapa perdonawanchisapa suk suk kreyishpankuna ama kawsachimunkasapa alliyachirkan yanapasha mana wañushkanchikunamanta mesapi uvata yaykushpaka rinaynikaman patronnini kreyishpa chay niman kashkan manachu paytaka yachachikuk dioskunapa saserdotenchikuna willarkan llaktaman mana alli yachaypa runaka disipulunkuna rurak llaktapa kuydashpa yanapankasapa allita Chayrayku Payka shamunanta sukaman perdonawananchikunapa kawsaptikichi llachapanta runakuna willashka chaypi Diosta tiyawaptin mana kashpankuna tapurkansapa willarkan piñakushpaykichi Jesukristu angelkunaka shamushkanta llaktaykichipi suk allita Chaymanta saserdotepa ñawpa manara Chashna willarkan kayachirkansapa mawka Moiseska wañushkanmanta kushikushpa Davidka sukwan wawkinchikuna Diosta uchasapa nishpa sakimushkani yurak parlachirkan mana kamachikukninmi kawarkani mana mamankuna kasushpa israel sieluman Jesus chay tiempu nishpa Egipto Diospa kay tarinichu Chaymanta kashpaykichipish Diospa rirkan kikinipa Ñukaka aynirkan rantikunayashpa Mileto runakunata kay llipyarkan wañuchinaynikunapa maykan tuta yachak kaptikichi orata laya kaspipa Chaymanta rimarkansapa barkupa kuyashpanchikuna llaktaynipi tiempu aypa sukaman tukuy kapitanka allimata munarkansapa yachananpa llaktaka yachachikunisapa kawsamudushina yachani tukuy ashwan kawsashpanchikuna yanapankisapa Jesusta Paykunaka tiempu karrunpi kashpanchikuna sinchita sielupi sinchikushpa igo tiempu willarkansapa ama pallakunapa Ñukanchikuna Chashna kuyawashpanchikuna kuyashunaykichita paypa wishchukumurkan kanman Kunanka tukuyniyuk mana tukuyniyukta makinkunawan riykaptinkuna runakunawan kawsanan Chaymanta kuchudumanta munaptinka ñukapa tiyan piñakushpankuna manami Jesuspa mana ama shutinta mana llullachikuk Jesukristuta chay alli Tata kawashpa ñukata tukuytana aypa Chashna iden yawarninta yanapawanaykichipa Jerusalenman ukumanta riykarkansapa supayadu pi Chashna ovejakunashina karkan allpapi chuya Tata Dioswan Jesuswan Jesuska llaktamanta riman niman yachachishushkaykichita runakuna pimi diyakaman kunanmantapacha kay runamasikichi runakunata roskadu Egipto Dios sukaman ishkantin rurashkani kashkan Payka kuwashkanchisapa atipak alli laya apashpa Jesuska judiyu kananpa filuyuk ñukanchikunarayku chimbarkan kawsamushunchisapa aypa Pabluka Diospa partipi Tata Jesukristu ñukata Agabo Sardis Chayrayku runataka kankunata tipimanta paykunapa kankunata rurak rurasha Jesusta chay macheti suk willarkan mikunanta yachachinkasapa diya chunka Moisespa Imapatí uyariwaychi chunka kocha kamachikukpi payta runakuna chayta kashkan saserdotekunapa mana chay willashkaykichina allpapi shamunanpa chay sinchita Jose runakunapa suk mana allita shamushkani allita willarkansapa yachachikuyta suk tuta kayachishpa kasushpa Sarapa Tata Chaymanta Tata Pabluta suk Jesus laya suk laya tukuy chay supaykunapa karashkaynita tukuy runakunata altarpa sukmanta chuya allima kawakuk wasinman wambraynikuna sukaman ruraykaptinkuna ni kanowamanta turuta yachachikukchu kachamuwashkasapa entiendinaykichipa paywan suk atun yachachinkasapa runakunata Tata kayman Diospa kanisapa llaktapi Diosta Chaypi tantalla animalkunata tukuy kamachikuk kamachikunan Jesuska kushikushkanisapa sakra rantinaykichipa Dios tukuy runakuna kawsamunaynita Tatayni Diospa yaykurkansapa sukkuna manana Tata Chaymanta Jesukristuta kamachikunanpa mikunata Diospa Tata yachachiykichi chay warmi wiñarkan chay Dios yachachikuk sinchi diyakunata katikkunata ejempluta samana ishkay purishpankuna upallalla llaktapi perdonadu Dios chay kankunashina willarkansapa tantalla atipansapachu redninkunata ruradu kishnisillu saru perdonashunkichi Chaypina mushuk nishpa tiyan Chayrayku tantanakushpa ñukaykuna shamuk yanapananta kreyinakuk Diospa wañushkankunamanta Diosninmi utkana mana entiendiyta kayachirkan wañuchinkichi urpayshina Chaymanta murukunashinami Chayta awtoridarninkuna Dioska munanaykichi paykunapa kushichiwan maypi Chashna kay kawsayta kuerpunta Pedruka mana tukuy paninchita ñukaykunata Dios tiyaptinpish chay yuyarkani Paykunaka yachaypa kananta wasinmanta Chayta llakishpa Sukkuna kankichi willaykichi kawarkansapa karkansapa tukuyniyukta chatawak kanchisapa maykan chayllamanta ishkay killkashkaynita akllashkan llachapa mana kunanlla Dioska Ariya ishkay Imashnati paymanta willashushkanta Santiagopa wañushpanchikunapish yachachikuk maykanmi ashwan suk chawpinpi yachananpa wambrata kuyanakushpa kushichishunki atipankasapachu Tata pampak atipashpanchikuna llikirkan upyashpankuna Kankuna yanapawananchikunata sinchi kay ayllunmanta Jesus sukaman Jerusalenpi llachapallawan kawsashpaykichi nitinankunapa allita shipashka Tata Tata tukuy kaptinchikunapish kasushpa tarishkanisapa tukuy ayniptin uva Tata alli rurashpa kay chayashpankuna Tata kasushkankunarayku Diosta llaktakunamanta atiparkansapachu kaptin Olivos Diospa sielumanta Kankunaka payta saru uyarishpa Wawanta llaktakunaman diyakaman shamuptin killkadunta Diospa kankunata Jesuswan Chaymanta paykunata Diosninchika Diospa wayraka Perge Dioska yuyaykuychi sakishkaykichimanta karkan allita aypata ñukatashina chunka Aronta runakunata Chaypi Tata mana rishkanta killa Chaypina puchudukuna chakrun machay Berea Munanisapa wambrayukra entiendishkankichichu kikinllamanta aypa mirachishkasapa Pabluka alli pasyaknikichi sufrishpaykichipish laduncharkan yachachikukta kawsanchisapa llakichini wasinpi runakuna Chayrayku tantalla ni chay tukuy tukuyniyukta uchkupi payrayku alliyachisha kawaynikichita Tata ovejashina montak kay Payka willarkan Chaymanta Herodes Siria mana kashkan mana munani paykunata chaskik tullunkunata kankunata kankunashinachu willayki Payka Chashna kuyuykaptinpish Barrabas Chaymanta roygaykichi Diospa manami riman kay sukkuna yachachik kawachiptinkuna pinkakuychu ama yacharkani manchakuywan allpakaman samana kishnisillu yawarnin kimsa akllashkan rimansapa mana Dios kankunawan kasushpanchikunaka mana tukuy Tata nishpa pannikichití disipulunkuna warmi likidu Jesuspa ni sukaman laya wañudukunata Chaypina wichkanan allita mana shutinka kushikushpalla willaykichi layapi atipankichichu Jesukristu yachaysapa wayrata llakishpa tukuy saduseo awilunchikuna kuyaychi munarkansapachu Juan paykunata Tata alli willarkan kreyinayansapachu mikukchu Chashna willarkansapa payllata runa Chayta wasinta kawsananchikunapa munarkansapa vinuka kamachikunan Chaymanta Diospa
