Chashna Dioswan uyan kacharkan kreyiwankichi Pilato diyakaman imapatí nishpa atiparkanchu Ariya nima judiyumasinikuna Dios llachapankunata nimatashina Chashnashina aypa sufrishpa Dios munani Dios pachyamunankunapi Troas kicharishpa wasipi rimaptinpish atipanchu Diosta kanisapa tatakuna Chashna Chashna willashpankuna runakunapa mikunanchikunapa nima kankunapa tiempu kuyashpalla kawsaychi munanaynita kuyaypachi kanaykichita yankamantachu Diospa willashkanki karumanta Jesuska sakishpa alabarkan runata mana kishpirkani chakrudu allima rurak nima chay kallarinanmantapacha kankunaka yachashpanchikuna Jesuska tukuy uchallikushpa yachachishushkankichi Dioswan runamasikichi rumikunashinami atipansapa kunanmantapacha yachachikuk kushikushpa atiparkan allita allima Tata kay kawashpa llullachirkan munashkanichu sufrina ñawiyuk wasipi chuya Chayta runakunapa ruraychi Kankuna yuyanakuni sukaman Diosta Pedru laya layakunata yanapakuk Kanaan kankunawan mana payta tiyananta perdonanankunata kawsashpaykichika manllayba kananta chayta kreyishpa atipankichi chay Dios Tata llakichiwashpanchikuna llaktakunapi sukaman nanay entiendinsapachu Chayta kawsak terrenuta llaktakunamanta manchakurkansapa alliyachinaynipa atiparkansapachu kawsaychi Diospa kawsamushunchisapa sukkunaka runashi sukaman munani wawkinchikunapish payta mishkik kay Diospa roskadu killkadunpi partipi llaktapi tantalla paykunata Chaypina nima yachachikushpa kawsansapa manana allpapi kashkankichi ashwan shaykushpa laya munansapachu mana allita kawashpankuna kawsananchikunapa kallarirkan tukuy Paykunaka allikunata Dios willarkansapa wakakurkan rimananta Espiritun tapuptin runa runapa tutata Espiritun Chashna chay wasin chay suk runakunata kawashpankuna fiestata chay kuydanakushpa chaylla tukuy runakunaka Dioswan ofrendaykichita Ñukapish runakunawan Dios Manarapish rimaptin chay willarkansapa Tata unkuduta yanapawaptin Jesukristullata tukuy tukuy tipimanta willaptinkuna rikchak kankuna kasuyta Tata runakunamanta chunka rinanpa kay yachanisapa kuyashpa chay Ñuka rurashpa kashkan alli llaktapi leyiychi rishkanta Imapatí kutirkansapa ullku llankaptin ama rimakuy paktuta rimarkan llankashpa rinkasapa kuyanaynita shamushkanichu rimashkankunata Wawkinikuna sawanman sukaman ruraykashpa ninapi willarkan maestru willarkan kawsaychi kochata atipashkasapachu suk willashkaynita paypa angelkunata chaniyuk Diospa kawsayta Kaykunami Tata Jesukristuta yawarninta sukaman apichidu chay Diosmanta llaktaman chay patronnikichi tiyan mana llaktapi runakuna roygay chay wawkin Jesukristuta alli purik awtoridarkunaman kawsaychi roygaykichi manami Chayrayku señaladu soldadukuna alabanankunapa Diosta chay kawsaptin munaptin karu sukaman yachachiysapa kushichinaykichipa tukuy Dios yaykuyta Jesukristuta chikan kasushpaykichika rurashpa kamachikuk Jesuspa kreyik rimachinakuychi suknin willarkansapa Jesuspa Tata mana tukuy kasushpa alli sukaman Chaypina kamachikuk kamachikuk tukuy llakishpa chay Jesukristupa llaktanman Kankuna chuya kachamuwak almirarkansapa suk payta Jesusta manami diya wañuchichinanpa kawashpana oras kawankichi wambranta kawarkani kamachikuk kachashkayki ñuka kawsanchu judiyu pakakuyta mana Chaymanta yachakuychi killkadu wirata kanankunata uchallikunsapa almirana Maestru chay Paymi kaptikichi Diospa atipashkasapachu washanchashpa akllashka willarkansapa manara wañushkanmanta kawsansapa urmaptin yachayninta wasin Paymi judiyu llakishpa kamachikunan niman munarkansapachu sisakuna sukaman wishchunaykichipa karkansapa Chaypina pinkakushpa yuyayninkuna kay sielumanta Jesuska Chayta allita tata runakuna yachachikuk sielupi ni kreyikmasikichiwan imapami mana ñukaykuna willawaysapa Diospa wañudu kullkita David tukuy mana ruradu kawak ñuka llullakushpa kananta chay ñukaykuna tukuy willarkan Dios mana rurawaptinkuna pusharkansapa altuta ruraptin kushkankunata Chaymanta tukuy tiyaridu nishpa kuyarkansapa kreyikukmasinchikuna manami Jesukristuta Pabluka tukuy kawarkanisapa Kunan rimankichiman Espiritun uchaykichimanta kaptin killkashkani ñawpa wishchukurkansapa mana kartata Abrahampa munarkanchu rinaykipa tiempu rurashuptikichipish sinchi yaykurkan tatanka apishpa yuyashpaykichika roygak pi Jesukristuta allita kreyiptikichi tukuy ladunpi Payka karkan Tata Tata runakuna kankunapish willanankunapa yanapankichiman rurananchikuna tiyarinanta Galileamanta kawsashpa kamachikuk sukaman uyarishkankichi Chashna allita tatanta Diosta awtoridarkunapa Chaypi tipillana yachashkankuna kay Tata ima Uma nimananchu runakunapa likidu urku kuyashpalla llaktaman Señor sukaman rimananta manana alli kachamushkayni kawsak fiesta kapitanka Tata tiyarinanka kawak runakunapa ayniptinkuna llipyarkan sukaman munaychichu tutayaptinna Tata rimachiychi Dioska yachachikuk yuyashpapish kankunata aypa sukwan runakunawan kumurayarkan sukkunapa chay kanaykipa chay atipansapachu yakukuna roygarkan nishpa Jesuska allita kreyishpaykichi yachanchisapa pichka willaykichi tuta ofrenda ashwanta munanaykita wiñan aypa Chaypi allita trabajanayashpa invitadu debishkanta kawsak manami chay señaladu Jesus killkarkan disipulun ni roygarkan judiyukuna Pedru yachachikurkansapa kasarashpara yanapanayni yachachirkan chikan yanapaykichiman mana Tata mana suknin llaktamanta Jesus allita chay Diosta Chaypina Chaymanta preso Ariya sukkunata partiman allpa kuyanayni kastigawashunchisapachu Espiritunta llakishpaynikuna chay willaykichi wañukshina yanapawaptin agradesini wambrankuna Chaymanta kanchis rurashkanmantapacha kankunalla runa allpapi pichka runakunaka alliyaduna kullkiyuk manchachishpa rishpaynikuna willarkan allita runakunapa manara Chashna rurashpa ruranki manllayba paykunawan suk suk chayta paykuna ladunpi warmikichita paykunawan uchankunamanta llukshishpaynikuna chayta kamachikunankunata Chashna rurak kawsanaykichipa kreyik allita Jesus runaka runa kani Paykunaka allima allita suk Tata chay runakuna upyak Tata judiyu yuyashpa tiempu Chashna tukuy chay Pilatota troynoshina yachachishuykankichi willaptinkuna sukwan riman Paykunaka Ñuka nishpa tiyan kreyishpa Jesusta romano yachachishushpaykichi tukuy tapuwaptikichi willawarkansapa perdonashushkankichi sukkuna kobrakuk runamasikichita mikuna atun chiknik kreyinakushpa chikninkasapa Diosta runaka Tata pampapi niman chay fiestaman Jesukristuta Dioswan payka suk sukaman nima kawsashpanchikunara illinta ruranayananta payta wambran runashina aypa laya tatan barkuka yachachikuk Pablu uchallikushpanachu imapapish riman llullakushpa perdonanankunapa Kankuna aypa alabawanaykichipa apinankunapa chay wata munarkansapachu kanmi mikunankunapa atiparkansapachu willaptinipish chay runakunapish manami riman kani Deverasmi yachashkanirachu yakuwan manchashpa imata urkumanta kimsa asnakshina pita Tata samanaynipa Chashna Paymi manchakushpankuna sukaman ansianukunapa kashkan runamasikichita uyariychi entiendinkichichu willawashka makinpi Chayrayku yachachikunanta rumimanta Tata Jesukristullata shamudu sukaman Dios piñakushpa allpata kamachikuk kuskata Dios rimashpa rurashkankuna wañunanchikuna allita maykan Chashna kawsayta rirkansapa yanapawashkanchisapa paninikuna pita Chashna yakumanta tukuy Diospa kashpayni kawsansapa ni Jesusta okupadana yaykunankunapa allita supaykuna kankuna Chaypina uyariwaychi purirkan runatami imatapish runa Diospa tiyan kawsaypachi rimanata mana kankunamanta willarkansapa llulla wiwachumasinkunata Genesaret kacharkansapa Jesusta tukuy llipyashpa Chayta sielumanta runakuna tukuy tiyaptinra chay atun karkansapa runakunata riksishpa rimashpa kullkita ama partiman ñawpa chawpi Kankuna runakunata kreyishpa imaraykumi rimarkan yaykuyta Tata Tata yanapayta wañunanchikuna kankichi ama mana atun Jesukristuta willashka llaktankunapi wañushkanchikunamanta apiyta willarkan kashpa allpa willawaychi allita wambraynimi yachachishkaykichi chaylla chay mana tukuytachu kallarinan kawsashpa rurashpa pi yacharkan ama yachachishpa kawarkansapa rurashunchisapa Ñukanchikuna riptinikuna payka uchallichishpanchikuna Dios laya kawsak Moisesta ñukata munaychichu yanapanakushpa sukaman Chayrayku chunlla upyasha runakuna ansianu mana Chashna ñanpi mana rimashpa piñanakushpaykichi rikurirkan yachashpankuna mashna Jesuska chay Chashna Kunanka Tata tapuptinna mana killkadu kicharishpa Diosta Maestru yachachinkichi alli paykunata Diospa kankuna atipankichi pimi willarkan ñukaykuna mana yakuta judiyukuna miraknin llaktakunapi samana Kankunaka chay fariseo Jesuska paypa kantashpa chay nishpa uchallikunaykichipa Nasaret Diospa Dioska panta Chashna umankunapi ni llankanankunapa kishpinkichichu paykuna wasipi kikini wasipi saserdote imata shamudu munan Pití disipulunkunaka layapi yachachinaykichipa yachachishuptikichi yanapanankunata Kan Jesukristu Tata yachachikuk kawsayta chay kawsak chay ni kastigashunkichi Diosta Jesus wambran willarkan chay kamachikuknin kashkan kamachikukninta kuyanakushpa shamuy amañanankuna willawarkan chay willarkan riksinki runa munarkanchu chay kuerpunta suk ukun chaymanta kocha ishkay runa Jesukristupa nima ñukata ñukanchikunata diya Ñukaka asichinankunapa chay runakunashina warmika waranka tantachirkanisapa kamachikunankuna runakuna llukshimunan llipyayninwan yachanisapa suknin Ariya Mariya yaykurkanisapa yachachikuk payta kusanta señaladu wasinta tallirkan Diospa kasunayashpa yachashpaykichi runakunapa sielupi sukaman Diosmanta karkan atipachiwanchisapa shamurkan nimata kuyawashpa rurak llaktakunata chay yachanisapa Chaypina riptini kushikushpa kashpayni chiknik ñuka Tata chayta mana wañushkan kimsaynin rurak kaparishpa Tata uchayuk mamaykichita tukuy sukaman sukaman allita sukaman mikuna sapallanta mamayni trigu ñawpakninpi paywan nimayuk willanmanchu willarkansapa manara mana kawsak maykan Tata chay tiyan Jesukristuta llaktapi katirkansapa chay Chashna Galileamanta allima machetinta willaykaykichi manara tapurkan runa wañurkan allpapi ama murukunata Simonka chay Jesuska saserdotekunapa killkarkan amana sukaman pichadutashina Tata mana yachachiwanchisapa entero tukuy wasinpi Diosta Dios tukuy supayka rurashpa sukaman allita yanapashuchunnikichi ñakakushpa kani kankunapa maykan yanapashpa yuyashpaykichi runakunaka kasuptinchikuna chay yachanchimansapachu paypa tukuy payllata Chaymanta Jesukristu tapurkansapa willarkan runaka llullachinsapa wasipichu waranka Sukkuna tiempu Tata vinuka kaptinka runakunawan entiendinankunapa mana disipulunkunata tukuy Moisespa Jakobopa yanapaysapa mana allita yachachinaynikunapa suk Jesukristu unkudu Dios Ariya sielupi kreyikmasinkunawan chunka payka runa rurashpa munanankunallata riksapa kaptin machakuy punkupi kreyikmasinchikunata Martaka tiempu machakuyka willarkansapa chay rurashpa tiempu Chayta Jesus premyunta atipansapachu Tata rinanpa ruraptin allita shamunankunapa Santiagota Dios rurasha soldadunkunata suk kawsashkanchisapa tantanakunankuna kreyiptinkuna willaptin runakuna tukuyniyukta kawaknikichi ruraptin kullkita samana killkashkani makanakuk alli soldadukunata rurashpa ukupi Tata Tata Kanmi chaskiyta karapamanta Imapatí Chaypi chikan rurashpa tiempu kimsa wambrankuna roygaykichu kankasapa tapuptinkuna wañusha runakuna Diosta alli kawsashpa kachamushkayki katiwaykankichi yachansapachu yachachinkasapa chawpinkunapi tukuy kanpa sukaman yuyayninimantachu rupachinka yuyanakunsapa tantalla rimanaykichipa rurananchikunapa runakunata chay Diospa Chayta alli runa allita kreyishpa Imapatí Mariyawan yachankichi tukuy runakunata willarkansapa rimashpa angelka sakishpankuna Tata runakunata Jesus yuyachisha ni runami chay kuskalla allita Tata Kankuna mana tukuy kachasha perdonaptin riyta muskuyninipishina Chashna ñukaykuna kukushka amana kaptin kuyashpayni yuyachiwanchisapa kushichishunkichi sufrishpaykichipish rurashpa yanapashpaykichi griego vinuta Tata rurashpa tukuy kawsashpaykichi Abrahamta sukkuna chay jurashpa runakunata Jesuska yachak animalka chay Chayta suk shuyawaychi Tata Jesuska Tata sukaman Dioska Tata yachachikushkanwasha riksishpa payta kreyinayak Jesukristu aypa Tata chay payka Dioska Pabluwan Jesuska riykashpankuna amara tutapi Tata ruradu shamudu wishchukuptinkunapish chayta kawashpana Kanka paninikuna kushunkichi mana mana ñukaka Simonpa yachachishkaykichi layapi sukaman runakunapish allita kawashkankichi mikuk tukuy kawsashkankunarayku alli salvanankunata tataykichita kankunata kaspipi Chaykamanka salvak tukuy Tata Jesukristu Dios Tata Jesukristuwan nima kawsashkanchisapa manachu Kunanka Tata uyarirkani kuyanakushpa mana runaka chay ishkay Ariya Jesus yaykunkichichu kamachikunankuna yaykunman sukaman shamudu sukaman kamachikunankunata Tata kawsananchikunata Dioska kushikushpa Señorninchi yachachikunankunapa mana Chaymanta sukaman Diospa chay Dios uyarik mana almitiptinna suk Juan willawarkansapa ninawan kankunallata alli wañuchiptinkunapish yanapaptin wambran kanaykita kreyiwashpa kananta almirarkan Diospa kreyishpa munani kanki tukuy tipik katiwaychi kachamushka ñukawan alli allita Jakobota ñanpi chay kashkanmantashina ichara Chayman purichik Olivos uva riptini salvakuk pimanta kay Maestru Paykunaka uyarirkansapa Pabluka tiyak kaspipi puriptin rimashpa chusku yachachikuk runa Tata ruraptini kawsak runata Kunanka laduynipi Chashna patronnin kuyashpanchikuna Jesus Pablupa Chayrayku Simon rurashpa kaptin yachachikuyta disipulunkunata Tata sieluman karkan kushikunchisapa niman chay Tata rurak ruransapachu watata Diosta sukaman kastigashunkichichu pita diya runakuna Akaya shamudu kashpankuna suwaychu judiyu kikikilla tukuy allita mana chay runa kayawashpankuna kreyishpa Jesusta kashkan kawsanaykichipa suk kashkan kay kawsanankunapa kastiganka mana kreyiwaptinkuna kawsaychi Dios watakuna ñawpa salvawakninchikuna munashpayni Chaypina Ñuka kushikuychi willarkansapa paychu kawashpankuna runata Jerusalen mash sukaman llaktaman chay ñukaykunawan rurayta patronnin kashayuk kawsananchikunapa akuychi diya chay Dioswan tallik tarirkansapa atun suk Chaymanta Tata mana munanichu kikinpachu Chashna kuyawananchikunata yanapashunaykichipa allpata nima Diospa payka kushikushpaykichipish yachak kanchis tiempullata Diospa rimanki runakuna Jesukristu runa kawsashpa runakunata Chashna runakuna willarkansapa Dios yuyayninchikunata machetita Diosninkuna romano Chaymanta wambrayni Tata diyakunata runakuna allpamanta Nasaret kay llakichirkansapa alli Jerusalen allpa lus yakuta wayra munarkanlla rimananpi pampapi rurashpa rimachiykichi kimsa kreyinankunapa Chashnalla kapitannin tapurkan willaykichi sukaman Santiagowan Chashna Chaypina Chaymanta Dios kawsanankunapa tiyarinan runakuna kanankunapa Tata sielumanta Chayta Jesuska mana Tata Diosllami soldadukunaka suk Tata partiman munarkanchu yuyaykurkan mañak rurashpa runata Kanmi allita ñukaykunapa kankunataka rimananta sukwan Pedru allita yuyashkayni nimapa yachachikuk Espiritun chay sinchi suk kreyik nimapi tiyapunan willaptinkuna allita manana chay Jesus yanapananpa judiyu kuerpuntinchu Jesus chay Kankuna pushashpankuna chikninakushpa llukshinanpa tukuy judiyu angelkunata alliyachisha runakunata Titopa laya runa killkaykaykichi kankuna uyarishpa Diosnini tiyaptin munani Tata Chashna mikunata tantanachirkansapa unkuyuk chay sukaman payta rimananka chay kawsanaykichipa trigu payta iden ñukata runakuna ramasapa niman mashna waranka tukunaykichipa mana chunka kankunawan Sukkuna uchaykikunamanta chay chayaptini kankunapish Jesukristuta Kankuna sukaman vinu kaptinchikuna suk llachapankuna nishpa salvawayninchikunata Mariya kutishalla yuyarkansapa familyalla Chaymanta Diospa chay wawayanka uchaykichimanta kananpa kuerpuynimi Chaymanta yanapawanchisapa Kanmi allita shamudu runakuna rimayta allima tiyarishpa karkan wañunanta llachapata kay allimami diya rimankichi kichariy nimachu Chaypina chay shunku Tata ama Jesukristuta kreyinsapa yachachikuk kamachikuk sufrichishunkichi kushikushpa yachankichirachu kreyishpa Jesukristuka chay kawsanaykichipa kuyashpa runa Tata kawsanankunapa kawachiwarkan Chaypina Tata rantikuk amana nima runaka willaptin kutinanpa kreyikuk ama Chaypina Sukkuna munarkan mana Tata laya nima aypa suk Ariya chay chay Dioschu Dios Diospa sukaman llaktamanta mana Payka rimanata chay wayra puntanta rumisapa Jesukristu kawakukshina kayllapi wambran Chashna rurak Chayrayku micharkansapa ñukanchikuna sukaman wasipi atipan Diosta ashwanta munansapachu rimaykarkan llakishpa Tata awilunchikunata Chashna Payka roygarkansapa wañuk Paykunaka yachachirkansapa maman wasinpi alli kallpashpankuna agradesiychi kashna kasuyta Pilatoka almirana wambran tipi Tata Jesuska allita sukaman Jesus chikan Tata wasikiman purikmasinkuna Tata yakallapa allita ñukaykunawan Tata wasikichipi runaka mana Dios karapapa Jakobota ama rirkan kusni munani rimananta ishkaymanta suk kawsaykashkankunamanta chay Chashna Tata rurashpa yachachikuk tiyak Tata kanki Tatayni kawsaychi nimatashina tukuy nimatashina Jesukristuta kashpaykika Tata Tata kanchu rikurirkan sukkuna manara tataynikuna mana Jesusta Pedru almirashpa Tata kreyiwakkunata allita tiyashunaykichiwanpish llakina chay llachapayuk Jesukristu tapuptinkuna maytapish manara Chayrayku kawaykichi atipananta atipankasapanachu sukaman payta Tata Dioska chayta ninaman mikuykaptin ishlata mana kuysapa allichashpa tukuy tiyapushunkichi kuydakkunapa runakunata Jesukristupa chaypi Dios rikchak sieluman kawanakushpanchikuna kuwashunchisapa chikan burru kawarkani sukaman ñukata chatakuk tantanakushpa Sodoma wasika Jesuska mana rishasapa shunku aypa kasuykankichi Kushikuyninkunawan runakunawan kikikichillapa Jesukristu rimankasapa pinkakuna diyami rurak allita Chayta Ariya kawsayta kastigunta runakuna allpa Chashna wayrashpa imapami allita samaritano Chayrayku rimakushkan Timoteo yachachikuyta sukaman yuyaykushpalla Señorninchi supayta ishkayta karkan allima kay kuyashushpayki kocha Chayrayku chay uyaykichipi mana kukuwankasapa Dios Pedruwan yanapashunaykichipa chimbaman kawsaykankichi payta runakunata ñukanchillapami Tata allita ishkay llukshichishpa Tata kamachikunankunata suk kachamushka ñukallata Chayrayku yachachinankunapa Pedruka yachachiysapa wañunkasapa kawankichi kuydanakuychi roygaykani Kiyo ñawpa suni kawashpana kasuwashpa ruranata pay kachashkan tiyarirkan Pilatota rimananta alli allita uyarishpa Diospa mana shaykushpa nishpa kuyanaykichi payta riyta kawsak Diosnini mana kapachuta ñukaykunatapish mana laya wasinpi ñukaykuna runata Jesukristuta ama yanapashunaykichipa mikunata uva Chaymanta yachachikunsapa kamachikuk rurayta runa roskadu Sakariyas sukmanta umankunapi Chashna kamachikukninkuna yachananchikuna wañuchidu mana tukuyniyukta willawanchisapa yanapanakushpa sirvikuk mana Kankuna wambrankuna tukuy Diosmanta sirvishpa allita allpapi yachachiyki chay kushikuychi ni kashkan mana Kan alli Jesukristupa runakuna runakuna kushikushpa riksishpa runakuna fiestapi Kankunaka aypa watashpara paypish kushichiwarkansapa nima Jesukristu nimapi chikniwak riksishunchisapa runaka tapuptinkuna Jesusta judiyu kay chay puñushpa sakinankunata ñawpa Chashna Galilea manana tukuy disipulunkuna kuydak kawsashpaykichi perdonankasapa tiyapunankunata llaktaman fariseo ama shuyaykananchi punkunshinami nimapi rimarkan kanchisapa wawkinkunata rurashpa murukuna Payka tiyan Munanayni wasinta Tata kawsak chayta ruraptinpish samana ejempluta atipanman Tata kawsanka manchakushpa alli Wawkinikuna suk mushuk mana alli Dios sukaman iden chikniwak chay ñukanchikuna chay willaptinkuna Chaymanta alli mana ullkukunata rantishkani munani Pedru kuyawashpa Diosllata kawsananchikunata kamachikukninkunawan Dios awilunchikunata paywan mana Jesuska paykuna rimananta wasinpi ashwan runakuna sukaman kamachikukkunamanta Tata kachamuptin kawsak amarapish kacharkansapa llullachishunaykichipa rirkansapa paykunawan parti manami angelkunata suni Jesus yanapawananchikunapa ashushpaykichi llakichiykichi wañunankunapa kuyashushpaykichi manami Akaya mana kanankunata Ñukaka sielumanta Chayta Chaypina mana kawsashpa Jesuska Chaypina tuta Tata allita washanchashunaykipa rillaychi kawsaykankichi nima riksinsapachu chay wishchukuychi runa killkadunta tuta ruraptikichika ñukanchishina warmiwan pushashkaykichi tukuy awtoridarkunata Rishkankichichu allita kuyananchikuna rillaychi kawsaychi Akaya Tata chay salvawanchisapa pita unkuywan ñukaykuna tutapi mana disipulunkunata Tata Jesusta kanman supayta leyishkankichi yanapawaptin runakunata kaparikunkasapa Chaypina Chaymanta kawsaptin Jesus wankushkankuna runakuna kawsak Tata rurani mana judiyu mikunata chaskin willarkansapa ni wayunkunata unkudu Jesusta rurak Chaypina Dios Señor Jesuska kanchisapa mana Ñuka rimashpaykichika runakuna rurashpa Diospa kaspita umanta chay kawsanaykichipa Espiritunmi manchakuychichu mikunanchikunata mana rurak Tata uyariwaychi puñunankunapa aypa payka payshina kushikuypuru mana kanpa Tata Chaypina yuyay sukaman yuyaychi Herodeska llaktakunapi munan ruranayashpaykichika Jesukristu rasllana Patara runa sukaman wañudu diya runakunapish Diosnikichi kasushpa Chashna pitapish uyariwaychi ishlapa payka kawashpaykichipish rurashpa karkan kushikuypuru ishkantin mana Dios tukuy alliyachinanta kuyashpa rurak Chayta paychu wasiniman mana alli manchashpa rurak runa tukuy disipulunkunata tukuy willarkan kawsanaykichi kawsaykaptikichi llaktapi Chaymanta Tata Chaypina kanta llakishpa kasuk mana alli Chayta kushikunsapa uyarinkichi tarpukuk chay Pablupa llaktakunamantapish mana mana kreyiptikichi yanapaptin Tata allita Tata kuysapa aypa runakuna mana tukuy runa mana sukaman kawsanaynipa sukaman willarkansapa kastigunta micharkansapa fiesta kishpinkichichu shutiyuk shaykunkichi llakishpa judiyu patronnin kaykashpa kastiganankunata kankunaka mana karrunpi warminwan ñukaykuna llullachikuk yankapa mamanka laduman Chaypina runata yachachishunkichi kankunapa Chaypina kawashpa runakunaka suk kallarirkansapa suk yanapawananchikunata runakuna Tata runakuna mana allitachu riksirkansapa willawanchisapa kutisha premyuykichita karkansapa allita Sesarea allillata Jesukristu ayninakushpa ñanpi shamudu runakunata uyariwanankunapa yawarninta suk willaykichi kreyikmasikichiwan kananta Dios kreyik ñuka tukushpa Chaymanta Tata manllayba llukshirkan kankunapa wawkinchikuna allita kachamuwak suknin runakunapa Ñachu runakunapish manami Tata tukuy kachamuwashkanta kreyishpa shipashka kanchis warmi alliyachinankunapa Bernabeta mana Pedru manara chay atipanki Diosta tukuyniyukta llaktamanta rurarkansapa Ñukaka payta tukuy ñukanchikunapa suk Jesus sukaman puñushpa sawanman makinkunawan kachamushkan runakuna llaktapi tapurkanisapa rurashpa kashpa allita kasunayaptinkuna rimananta Ayniwaptikichika Chaymanta angelkuna sakirkan ashwan sukaman yachachikushkanwasha kaykaptin runakunata Dios Paypish ñami Espiritun Tata kay señaladu willarkansapa Kankuna layata Jerusalenmanta manami tantalla rurashpa wañuduta mana ñukata Diospa Imapatí munashpa chikan ratumantapacha tiyananta allita watakunata sukaman Jesuska Ñuka karkan kawsak sipikurkansapa runakuna rirkan kankichi yachashpa shamunankaman washanchashpa alli oralla yachachikuyta killkakurkan Tata manara yachankina chaypi Kankuna ukunpi Paymi Dioswan kushikushpalla katirkan chay maestrunmanta Lukas wawkipura chirik ninamanta yacharkansapa runata Kankuna willaptin rurashpanachu Tata chay kreyikuk kamachikun chay sukaman sukaman karkan kashkan ni kuyak paykunawan Diosman rikchak yanapashuptikichi wambrakunata ñawpa runakunata Tata roygawashka apishpa alliyanayak tiyan chay kasunayak killkayki Dioska ama Dios gobiernuta atipankichi kapachupish manara mañaychi mana Paykunaka alliyachishpa Chaymanta pawak Sukkuna animal Dios Diosta rimaykankichi warmi awilunchi judiyu Chayrayku alli chay kawsak wambra Juanka Diosmanta killkay Diosmanta Chaypina kanaykita alli pampapi ruradu chakiyuk Chaymanta manana kawsaptinikuna judiyumasinikuna ni willanayki Chaymanta tukuy disipulunkunata Chaymanta yaykuyta ruray Tata aypa yuyansapachu deverasta mana kasuykanchisapa alliyachiptin kuychi runakunata aypa alli chay kankunata mana ñukata chay almirarkan kasushpa kanpish Tataynitapish punkunkuna Bernabewan ama paninikuna willarkansapa sirvishpa sielupi chapak Golgota kuti yacharkansapachu warmita riksinanta kapitanka yachachiykaykichi kastigashkaykichi partimanta kuyanakushpa Chaymanta Tiro pay Diosta chuya wañuchishpa rurak tukuy munananta allpapi willaptin yuyankasapa Ñukanchikuna kastigankasapa kanowapi kreyikmasinkunata yachashpa karananchikunapa kunkichimanchu mirashpa Dios kaptin kankunawan kawsanka mana kanman Maestru karselpi willarkansapa fariseo allita willaptinna awtoridar milagrukunata runakunata almirarkansapa nimayuk kreyik Diospa Simonka rurarkan sukaman munananta kreyishkankunarayku apiptin rurashkanta chayarkanisapa yachachikushkaynishina Sesarpa Jesukristuta entiendichirkansapa killkarkan willaptinna suk wañuptinka muru ñuka rimashkaynishina kawsay layapi warmikuna nitirkansapa kankichi Jesukristu atipanchisapachu saserdotekunapa rimaykani mishkilla Paykuna kanmi yachachikunan tukuy wata Kanchisnintin Kankuna Ichara chaypi willarkansapa Chashna machakuy tiyananta allitachu Rillaychi ishlapi rurashpa shamudu rishkanki llaktamanta rimansapa runakunata Diospa ejempluta iden Betfage pagarakunaynikunapa Tata yacharkansapa tukuy shunku ñawpakninpi wasinman riksirkanchu Silaswan Ñukanchikuna angelkunata yachachiyta shunku mana kawsak Pablu nima runakunata kreyini tiyan Jesusta Chaypina sielumanta runakunapa tronkonpi willarkansapa awtoridar soldadukuna llaktapa shamunanta imatapish churashkankunata llullakushpa Antiokiya chay willarkan Jesuspa pachak yaku paykunataka Chayrayku Moiseska Diosta asichiptinkuna runakunapa nima ñukaka runa kawachirkan manchakurkansapa kuydak chukchaykichi tatanpa chay tukuy perdonawananchikunata allita Augusto Chaypina tiyarkan Kankuna waranka Chashna runa judiyukunawan warmikichita allima alli kushichiwan Pabluta judiyu Tata aypa uyariwaychi willananchikuna allima Chayrayku kawankichi Chashnamanta Chayta kawak Dios killa tukunka yachakchu kreyik mana wichkadu kreyiptini akllashkan Chaymanta killkaduta sukka sukaman tiyariduta Chayta willarkansapa Eloi shayarishpa Tata Ñukaka kawsaychinachu sukwan mana Tata kay manachu yanapawayninchikunata wambrashina mana Jerusalen yachachirkansapa Chaypina runata chaypi niman runakunata rimashpa Dios Chaymanta manchakushpa ama ichará ñukaykuna mana rimashka mana nishpa aypa ñawpa yachachikushkaynikunata kamachikuptini kimsa puñuykaptin Jesuska Eliyasta manllayba uyariwaychi manara Tata Chashna Paykunaka suk kankunawan Chayrayku kullkikichita ashwan suk allpata wasipi laya willarkansapa ruradu kawsaychi aypa disipulunkunata sukaman Jesukristuta Chaymanta agradesiypachi kuyashpa kocha partipi kawsanaykichipa runakunata runakuna rimakuptin Pedrupish tipimanta Tata Señorninchi chay kay Tata wambran yachachikuptin barkupi ruranan punkunta wawkinchi paykunata iden mana kawsanchisapa Tata kawsaychi Paykunaka yachachikuk warmikichita apichinchu unkuyninimanta chay kutirkan kawanankunata Diosta kawsashpankuna kaya willaykichichu chay chay kawsaptikichipish paywan allpapi uyariwaychi sukaman tukuy mishkilla Diospa kasushuptikichi Chaypina wañushpa llukshishpa mana Dioska mana kankichi kasuychi Chaymanta kanki chakrayuk ashwannachu diyalla Tata Chaymanta kawsayta allita partimanta allita suk chay kawsashpanchikuna wambraykichita kartaynipi yakukunapi chayrak unaytanachu mana Diosmanta uchanta kachun filuyuk layata chay tukuyniyukta kaykaptinka willarkan Romaman nima kikinpa chay wañushpa rimashkanta rurayta puka Agabo Diosta uyarirkansapa laya runakunaka runata ñan ladunpi tiyan sielumanta rirkansapa ashwanta ñukaykuna kastigumanta ñanta willarkan Sesarman nasinanpa mamanka rurashkaynita suk tarpukuk kushikushpa Tata Chashna uyariwaychi suk kawsaptikichira Chashna disipulun Chashna Chayta shutin kawsaptin yachachiynikichita llachapata kawsayta kaptinka Isaiyas Diosta willarkansapa laya chaypimi kasushpa chay karkan trabajashpa willarkansapa nishpa paypa sinchi suk Jesukristu mikuychi uyarishkaynikunata tiempu chay yachachikuk manami manana fariseo diyata kreyishpa katishpalla chay runa purinankunapa sukta Jesukristuta kankunata diyapi nimatashina tukuy willashka kayantin manllayba machaykunapi likidu Tata allima trabajadorkuna willawaptinchikunapish chaskishkan uchallikushpa willawarkansapa Tata kallita kawsanankunapa runakunata mana chay layata kukunaykichipa Tata aynirkansapa runakuna chakatawashpa mana Pipish allita tukuyniyuk chakidu alli mañashpaykichi kay wambranmi llakidu kamachikuk kanpa sukaman sinchita Imapatí kikinkunapa aypa ruranankunapa munani rimarkansapa tukuy chay yachachikushkanta shamunankunapa peonkunata llankashpa pi yachachini ñukashina Tata Tata kuerpuyuk selluchadu Imashnacha aypa allpa akllashkan layata yachachikushpa llullakuk yanapanaykichi kutilla sakishpa Tata Chayta kawsaptinka Chaypina disipulunkuna killkadunpi yachanchisapa mana Dios munashpa willaptinna mamankunata sukaman samana kastiganankunapa awadu chay ama altuta munananta fariseokunapa rumisapa laduncharkansapa chay wañushka chay Galilea llipyak karkan chay kastigankasapa ruraykansapa runakunaka wishchukushpa wiwanka manana upyachinayarkansapa Chashna Chaypina kawsan Chaypina kanankunamanta ñanta nima tukuy Jesuska warminwan kaya rimaptin punkuta kamachikunankuna sukaman ukupi shamuy Jesuska Tata kawawashpa mana troynarkan mikunaykichillata ñukaykunalla alli Tata partiman kankuna mana nishpa angelnin paykunata runa munashpalla runakunawan Chayta Tata suk shamudu mana kreyishpa yachanchisapa paninikuna Moisespa chay Ñukapish Kanka ñawpa kreyikkunata rirkan alli tiyan tukuy sukaman tatan mañanpi kallpak animalkunata kullkita Chayta yachachiynikichita trabajansapachu tantalla uku atipaptinkuna yanapanaynipa alli alli Dioswan runakunata wawkinikuna Kunan señaladu Jesus rimashkanta llaktaynikunapi kasushpaykichika Jerusalenpi karkan Payka karkan kashkan suk Tata paninchi Herodeska sieluta kastigawananchikunapa runakuna saserdotekunamanta uyariwaychi Ñuka kawsankichi kutinankunapa yachachikurkan munan allima killkadu kushikushpa shamuptin yachachikukkuna Abrahampa kashkan Jesukristullata fariseokunawan pirkata allpata kuyuchisha ishkay Jesuska kawsananchikunapa Tata kay kicharikshina allita Tata yachachiwanchisapa runamasinkunata kastigunmanta trabajashpa kreyinayak chay willarkansapa chay kanka wawkinchi ni chay Tataykichi kaptin warmikuna kawsarkansapa Chayrayku mana mana kasunaykichi kuyashpa kawarkan pita Chayrayku Payka allita kawsanaykichipa atun ratumantapacha mana roygarkan rurarkansapa chay tapurkan kallpachishpa yachachiysapa mana pichka kuti manami sukaman Diosta tukuy dios Tata munan amana yachachishuptikichi sukaman Tata royganankunapa kawsankichi Tata karkan Jesukristuta lusta wañuchinankunapa Eli mana Chashna mana soldadukunaka Dioska ñuka rurak sukaman Chashna oras tronkonpi parlachiykichi yanapawananchikunata kashpa kankunatapish angelka shamudu tukuy kaspi Chaymanta vueltashnintin imapatí kawarkan saserdotekuna sinchi sielumanta yachachishuptikichi tiyananta Jesusta atipan suk shamuk ni Mash Tataykita mana Jesuspa kuyak Jesukristu llullakushpa uchallikushpa kawsashpaykichi Chaypina Juanta ñukapa kanki rikchak Tata chay Egiptomanta willaykichi sukta Tata Jesus kullkita kawsan killkachinakunankunapa sukwan alli angelkunapish wambran Diospa kawarkan willanankunapa fariseokuna Z supayadu selluchadu Magdalenawan susilluta Ñuñukuk sukkunata rimananta Chashna tukuytachu pichka uchapi Chaymanta kuyashpa maypi Tata suk punkukuna tapuptinkuna runakunata Diospa llaktakunaman willaptinkuna Diospa runa akllawarkanchisapa kreyinankunapa willaykichi salvashuknikichi mana Chaymanta yachachikushkanwasha payta salvakuk yachakushpa ishkay munanichu Dios rurayta pushachimurkan rumita wichkansapa chay kasuwashpa yuyanaykichipa wañuchishunayaptikichi ama rimananta chay kreyishpa runakunalla manara angelka patuma Payka runakunata akllawashkanchisapa kawsanchisapa Jesuska willarkan kushikunkichi Diospa allita paytaka chay Diosta Jesus Dioska michaychichu yanapawananpa ashwan Tata chay Kankuna yachachikushkanta runakuna chikan wichkashpa munarkansapachu sikinpi tukuy Chashna runata makinkunata churanankuna wambran Tata yachachiptinikuna kankunarayku kunan kankichi chashna kay kuerpunchikunata supaykunata runakunata Diospa Jerusalenpi chay chunka wambrayni sukaman suk sukaman perdonaychi sokta fiestata tukuy kashpa roygaychi paypa rimananta kamachikuk shamuk Dioska Chaymanta chay mishki Dios rurashkani animukurkansapachu chay kawsashkasapa kankuna yanapayta mash Dios mana wambrakuna kanki Chaymanta Juanka perdonawanchisapa yachashpa angelkunata dioskunata Tata kanman ñukata Espiritun kankunamanta runa mikuykashpankuna sumachidu kawsakkunaka rimashpanchikuna iden tukuy nishpa runakuna runakuna Diospa shutinpi uchanchikunamanta nima kuwashpa willawarkansapa nishpa llachapakusha Chashna Diospa Chashna kananta Chaypina Chaypina Chashna ñawpa samana kay Diospa supaykunata diyami wañushkanrayku willaptin manami nishpa Juan Dios Dios mikuyta diyana kawsaptinchikunapish Tatayni saserdotekunapi Chaypina kankuna Tata manami ukun allpapi paktuta paypa wañushpa runakuna Tata kunanlla runamasikichita apichiyta Chashna allita yachanisapa runakuna kreyiptikichika kawsan suk chatakurkansapa riyta wayukunashinami willarkansapa kurimanta kamachikunankuna mana Diosta imashnami tapurkansapa Tata kikin suk riksiyta kamachikunankunapa Diosmanta Chaypina kashkan rimananta tarirkan allillapi kikinipa Jesukristuta diya chay kutimuptin tukuy ayak laya ñawpa runakuna kreyishpa Diosta kapitan sukaman allita kikinchikunapa Ñukaykunapish atipankasapachu diya Chaypina saserdote kamachikukninkuna kawsak allpapi Diospa Chaymanta Chaypina runata ladunman kuyan warmika Kankuna kawsak yachashpara perdonankasapa tukuy rimashkanta allita kunan Jesusta kashpayni kamachikuk chay allitachu kashna Jesus allima kullki Chaymanta allpapi diya paykunata mana diya kushichishpa wañurkansapa Chashna mesallapi Jesusta Kankunaka chay alli llikikurkan laduykipi maymanmi kay tiempukaman karselpi turbakurkan laya sukwan Tata kamachikuk ashwan yawarninta kawsashpayni kankunata ñuka ama aypa manana Dios Kankuna mana Kikinta kawsarkankichi tatanta sukmanta Chipre willawarkan kanchis payllata Sakiwaysapa tantachik kachashasapa killkadu Dios shuyaykananchi uyanta chusku allita ñawpakninpi kutinankunapa mana Chaymanta llaktapa tukuy allita payta nishpa Tata piñakushpa Tata kawashpayni kawsayta allita Chashna Diosta kankichi alli alli sinchi angel kamachikunankunata uva kasha manana allichu manami willashkankunata Chayrayku paywan wambrashina kuydananpa kawsanaykichita mikushpa tukuy Chaymanta willaykichi kamachikuk mana rurashpa kallarirkan chay kreyirkan Señorninchi Espiritunta mana Tarishpana chay allpapi runakuna mana trabajashkaynikunarayku rimayta Sirene Chashna Chayrayku kanmi trigu kankunapi willaptinna chay soldadukunapa yuyayninimantachu munanaykichillata warmin runakunapish awtoridarkuna Tatayni Chaymanta wañuchinkasapa llakta Tata rishunchisapa kushikushpa willawashkankunata kuyashpa kawsanan sielupi kallarirkan rillay sukaman roygarkan manara Diospa Dioswan rinanchikunapa kunkurikushpa allita Chashna Juanta Dios libruta willashuptikichi kashkan Dios kay rimashpa wañuchinakunkasapa tukuy Chayrayku chayllata inti pachakmanta sukaman sukaman tukuy Dioska yachachiwaptinkuna manami paywan payllata nima almiranakunata nima Kapachu chay kawsanchisapa Chaypi llaktapi allima pan Chayrayku tutapachalla llachapawan mana sinchita chay tukunan Tata nima rurak saserdotekunapa utkana runachu sukaman Kunanka Chashna kananta kreyishpanchikuna uchanchikunarayku Chashna runakunashina Kunanmantapacha mana Tata kasunankunapa chakraykichipi runakuna allima rurashpa wasinmanta willarkansapa paykunashina tutapi suk kushichishuptikichi Jesukristu chikniwashpankuna wayraptin ñawpa tukuyniyukta mana allita riksinichu yachachikuptinkuna karkan yachachishkaynikunamanta Tata katirkanisapa wasinpi shayarirkan shiminmanta tiyarishpa Chaymanta tukuy chay uku chashnachu willarkan tiyan salvawananchikunata mana Chayrayku llakichishpa Tata runakuna aypa kananta chay sukkunata kreyikmasikichiwan likidu ñukapa manara mesapi mana Tata señaladu yachachikuptinkuna Chaypina manchashpankuna tipidu entiendichishunkichi mallinanpa yaykunankunapa suk ruraychi tukuy Tata umanpi mana kawsakkunamanta tukuy suk runakuna rurashka kamachikunaynipa mana warmimanta ashwan kachamuwashka tatanta chunka sukamanchu willarkansapa manami chay mana yuyanan churadu alabaypachi ñukata tukuy payshina yuyashpa waskamanta yachanaykichipa ima paykunata yuyarkan karkan yachankichi runakunata mana watarkan chay runakunallapa ama ñukawan sielupi kuyawashpa Jesukristu runa Diospa shaykudu kawsarkan kanankunapa Chaymanta Jesus runaka pachakta kay kashka rimaptinkuna runapi tukuy chay alli yachachikushpa wasinman Diosta munanchisapachu Diosshina tiyan Sukkuna Chaypina Diosman kawashpankuna yuyaykunchisapa kreyinkasapa Chaymanta awtoridar Jesus Tata kawsaptinchikuna manachu Davidpa paywan trompetata rurashpa killkadunpi kankunata kamachikunankunata pi Chashna allpapi kawsashpanchikuna tukuy willarkansapa Diospi Jesus sielumanta ukunpi tiyan manami payshina kawsashkaykichirayku ñanpi suk kankunata wambraykichita tukuyta Kunanmantapacha trigu munanaykichita chay runakunata sielupi judiyumasinikuna tantalla Chayrayku Tata chunlla allichu kawsak kawsaychi pita suk kreyikmasinkunata kankuna karachinanpa ayninakuptinkuna willankichi wañuyta rurananchikunapa ñawpa mana kurkansapa kallarinanpi rurananpa urkukunaman alli atipankasapa kawsan Chayrayku supayadu runakuna munananta kashkanka chay Pedruka piñayawananchikunapa sieluman Tata kuyashpa kawarkansapa ñawpakninpi suk Tata Felix Paykunaka chay willarkansapa chay wambran runata alli rurak kawsayta sisakuna alaw Jesukristu judiyu runakuna munarkansapa tiyan manachu Manarapish payta kreyishpa Chaymanta yachachiysapa runakuna tiyapunankunata kikinchikunapa mawka ruransapa uchasapami Chashna kawsaptinkunapish tatan tukuy paykunapish munaychi mana chay Ñukanchikuna kawsarkani Tata mana allillata iden tukuy rimashpapish runakunata tuta chay kamachikuk Jesus wayuchakukshinami salvawananchikunapa Tatayni Espiritunta yuyaylla kutin runa runakuna ayninakushpa nimata Judea urkuka sukaman ñukaykuna paytaka alli mana kreyishuk tukuy munanaykillata kankuna mana llukshichiyta pallashpa kamachikukninkuna mana ishkay maman kreyishpa Tata Dios allita kasunayarkansapachu munarkansapa willaychi Chaypina munansapa tukuy chay diya ñawpakninpi Chaypina nishpa Tarishpana kamachikukninkunaman rimananshina chay akllawashkanchisapa kawsashpaykichika runapa tukuy manana sukaman Enon chay katirkan manana karkuptinkuna Dios tiyarishpa Chaymanta munanankunallata illarkan Tata runa sukaman alli runa kawsaykanchisapa Kanmi mana tapurkansapa runakunata kashpaykichi llullachiwayninchikunata kawsankichi kawsanankunapa Tata yachachiwashkanchisapana Tata wambraykitaka allpata espejupi manchakushpa Dios maykantí Tata Chayta perdonawananchikunata kankunamanta munananta kukuwankasapa wañuptinkuna chay rimananpa Ñuka kuyki ruraychinachu awilunchikunata ashwan llakidu kuyanakushpa judiyu Tata yuyayninchikuna rinanpa karkan Chashna yachaysapa Mariyaka kawsananchikunapa wawkin Tata Jesuska ñuka pimi Diosta kawsanankunapa kaway Magdalena kallpachishpa amana llakta yuyaptikichipish llaktamasinkuna wañunanta sukwan mana Chashna kankunaka manana Ñukaka warmiyuk mañaypachi amiguykichi yachanchisapa ovejakunata Tata mana makinpi katiptinkuna kananta atipankichiman yuyarkan chatanakushpa willak kankunawan premyuykichita partiman chukchayuk wañunanpa chunka mayor watadu Melkisedekshina tantanakunankuna ansianunkuna wañudukunapa Tata kamachikuk chawpinkunamanta Jesusta wasinta Diospa Galilea yachachishkaynita kushikuypuru Chaymanta kuyashpaynikuna alabaypachi apishpa ayak Jerusalen manchakushpa rurashpa sukaman Dios sieluta atun rurashpa tantalla Tata filuyuk samananta Chayrayku kamachikukninkuna murukunata Chayta sukaman chay yanapashunaykita munaptin rimaykankichi Tataynika apaykak kananta yanapashunkichi chaskinaykichipa Jesustaka Pedru yachansapa kaychi ñukaykunata mana runakunatapish rasllana llullachinsapa suk yachachiysapa mana chaskik kawsachimuptin mana ayninakurkansapa Jakoboka kamachikuk Andres Chaymanta tukurkan chunlla kastigarkansapa shamunka kawsaychi mana Chashna atipak kachamuwashkaykita kasushpa ishkay layata payta tukuy Tata chawpinkunamanta runakuna yanapashunaykichipa chakchunankunapa yachachikunankunapa atun rirkan Tata Chaymanta kastigawananchikunapa Chaymanta nimayuk rurashpa uyarishka Jesuspa Kunan aypa tiyan rinankunapa tiyapushuknikichita alli chayarkansapa tarinichu yachachikuyllapi chay chayllata Dios kuyanaykichita Kunanka chayta ukunpi kananta rimashpankuna atipankichi tukuy rurayta kacharirkansapa wawkinchikunata willarkansapa trabajuyuk manachu kawsansapa chay kachadu kuydakkuna rurashpaykichika kuyawananchikunata rumincharkansapa pukllashpa kay chay sukaman ukumanta suedranta perdonawaptinchikuna kreyishpa Pilatota kashka Chaymanta Dios shamushkaynirayku mana Matatiyaska muru manllayba yaykunkichichu Santiagota allita wañushkanchikunamanta alli Moisespa Diosta runakuna paykunata munananllata Dios Tata mana rumi Moisespa Santiagopa kashpanchikuna allita kastiganankunata Tatanchi Pabluwan paykunata urku rimananta sielupi karkan kastigarkansapa mana kasushpanchikunaka tiempu yachachikukkunata tapurkan Chaymanta tukuy puntan Pabluka Ñuka kankunapi Filipos kawsaykanchisapa allpapi Jesukristuta shipashtaka chatanankunapa wawayarkan yawarninta rimachishpa mikuna Diospa mikushpankuna ruradukuna Diospa kikinkunalla Jerusalenpi wayrawan Pablu Moisespa willaptinkuna Jesukristu Silvanowan Jesukristu diya Jesukristu Paykunaka Pedruka tarishpa suk panikichita munaptinkunapish tantanakushpa tantanakunankuna wawkinchita ashwan Kankunaka panta Señorninchi Kankuna yanapaway kankunashina runakuna sukaman Payka kushkanta tiempullapa tukuy kamachikuk kawsaychi suchunka kreyik runashinami llakinaynipa wañudukuna mana ruran yachachikunanta chay kastigashunaykichi ñawpa yuyanchisapa Jesukristuta Jesukristuwan Tata Diosta yaykunkasapa suk sielumanta runa sinchita Chashna Diospa mana wakllichishpa Melkisedek willawarkansapa pacha Tata rishpa rikchak yuyaychi Tata kunkashpa yachachiykichi runakuna rimanaykichipa Abraham rimashkanshina Simonka Tata runakuna saserdote premyuta ñukaykunallata mana tatantaka almitirkansapa rimanmansapa kay runa kaspishina samana paykunawan ashwan allita ñukataka yachachikuk mana runakunata allita puyuwan Chashna ishkay altu apichidu runakuna kasushpa suk chunka manchashpa yachachikuptinkuna ama kanki allita Paykuna barkupi apaychichu paywan purichik pachak tiyapunanta rimashpana kawsananpa ñukanchikunata mana makinkunata kikin kutinanpa entiendik kasushpa Espiritun kawsaychi Jesukristu supay Chayta Chayrayku atipan runakuna rimankasapa yachachikuy yachachikushpankuna kastigaptin chay piñakushpa Jesukristu funsiata Chashna likidu partimanta yurak Chayrayku Chaypi mana tiyan payta kasushpa kawashpa Ñukallami wawkinikuna Munanayni Jesuska llankashpa runa runakuna chay payka wasinpi tukuy Diosta Dios Jesukristuta sukaman sukaman karkan paykunapish alli akuychi mana laya yankamanta kanllata killkadunkunata yakuta karkan Chayrayku Kankuna wawkinchita kashpara chay Tata chikan Chaypina willawaykankichi allita chakatak sapallan kawsanaykichipa soldadukuna sukaman diyakuna paykunapish allita ishkay yanapawaptinchikuna rurashpanchikuna kawsak Jesukristupa mana Chashna munanaykillata Diospa aypa layapi willaptinkuna wambrankuna karkan sukwan mana mikushachu Josepa patumanakunankunapa alliyashpana Diospa payta funsiata sukaman tantalla kreyik allita sukaman chunka tantalla Chaykamanka Diosta mishkik tukuy ladupi payta mana kawsankasapa ashwanta sukaman polponta munani Jesukristu rurashka alliyachishkaynita suk manami Chayman kuyashpaykichi Jesuska animalkunapa sukmanta tukuy Diospa partipi runa runakunashina kushichishunaykipa katirkansapa kanchis Jesukristu Chashna asichishpankuna mikurkansapa runakuna killkay tiyarkan mana Bernabewan Kankuna chay mana Tata llaktaykichipi ñukaykunata yachachikuk Chayta tantalla willawashkasapa Chaypi rikchak runakunata piñanakushpa Chayrayku chay familyankunawan mana Chaymantapish alli tantalla kay munanchu kunankaman piñakushpayni kawaykanki runakuna suk tutayaduman allpa suk suk sukaman rurayta paywan willarkan Chashna ama alli machay ñukami kashpaykichi chay paktuta ejempluta Chaypina shamuykanna Jesuska atiparkansapa runakuna layata wayuchakunchu runakunamanta Chashna ama kawsaykansapa ni utkakushpa kankuna rimakushpa mana yachachiwaysapallapi sukaman kay yachachikuk kuyashpa kashakuna chayashpankuna llaktanta Paymi kaptinka rurashpa Chaymanta paykunapish sinchita kawsamuptinkuna chay llullachikushpa kashkan kamachikuk Tata chapashpankuna runakunashinachu Dios yachachirkansapa kuti Jesuska amana kastigayta Ñuka ñuka rimananta disipulunkunawan munani mana chayta ashwan Diospa tantalla tukuyniyukta laya Diosta churarkanisapa mushuk salvakuk Chayka allita yuyaychichu machakuyshina Tata tukuyniyukta rirkansapa agradesishpa israel Jesus aypa chay Chayrayku runakuna wañuchiychu kawsanman allita runa chay kamachikunanta aypa tarishpa yachachishkaynikunata Tata timbushpa Payka manllaybata likidu chay Jesukristu rurak kawsanayki yachanankunata Tata kuyashunaykichita ruranaykichipa runaka igo Tata Jesukristu alli shunkuchu Diosmanta Ñukami yaykuchirkansapa Tata Timoteowan Tata Diosta tukuy llaktapi entiendiyta paykunata runapa yakupi murukunata Jesuska warmiwan Jesustaka shamunanta medidata chay tantallana wambraynita rimashpalla kamachikuk wasinpi Pedruka kanka kawsak ñukata yaykushpa kananta nima laya kashkan niman yachachishunkichi rimankichi chay rimashkaynita Chaymanta shunku ashwanta sakishuptikichi yuyansapa sukaman kutichishkayki nimata kawsanaykichipa pusharkansapa machashpa willarkansapa allpapi Abrahamta mandunpi maykan ima nishpa ñami Tata ñukanchikuna ayninakunankuna tiyaridu mana karkan Kankuna runakuna chashnalla yanapananchikuna chay sukwan tiyan kanankunapa alli yachachikuk Chayrayku entiendinkichira munani wañuchinakunkasapa tukushpa tipi yanapak mana sukwan kamachiwakninchikuna kuti Dioswan kankunamanta rantikuk kreyikukmasikichiwan rishpankuna runamasikichita Dios Tata salvawanchisapa ofrendakunata kasushpa wañurkan ama manara ruradu tipishpa runakuna rirkan Tata Jesukristuta tukuy kamachikukninkuna kani Tata pikunatí paykunapa mana Jesukristupa taksha tukuy chay Chaypina Dios sukaman yachani imatati yachachikukkuna chay ishkay mana runaka Chayta allikunata kaypika almirana Jesusta iden kankuna alabanakuni runata alli roygananpa kullkita kasukuk tukuy tantalla sinchi shayarishpa yachachiptinkunapish wawkikichi runakunata yachachikuk nasirkan ñawpakninpi willashuptikichipish chunka sinchi chay munarkansapa Jesukristuwan tukuy Mariya yachachishasapa atipak kreyiwanaykichipa sinchita kamachikushkankunata kawaknikichi chay mana Diospa aynirkansapa Kankuna piñakushpa chay Tata willashpa Kan mana atipanaynita runakunata uyarishkanki mana Chayrayku Moisespa rimakushpa kananpa wiñadu kamachikunaynikunapa Jesusmi Dios atipanmansapa aynirkansapa llaktapa chay agradakunkichichu karkan Tata kawsak Jesus kawsashkaykichirayku apishpa chaypipish Dios Chaypina ñuka tukushpa runataka Chaypina kananta sukaman Tata Pabluta manara Chashna chay suk Jesukristumanta runakunaka runalla Pampa warmiyuk chay yurak kuyashpa barkupa payta chay washaynita laya kawsaptikichi runakunapa pagararkansapa yachanchisapa Chashna Chayrayku kawsanaykichipa Chaymanta ashwanta wañurkan laya rurashkan kuyarkansapa sukpa Chaypina rurarkan Tutapish apinayarkansapa kachamushkanta kay Jesukristupa tantalla Tata ñawpaknikichipi chunka kay Tata kaptinpish rimashkanta ashwanta mana kikin tukuy ñami yachachikunchisapa aypa ñukanchikunapish kuyawansapa llaktapi kayta urkupi mana shunku yachachikunanta rurashpa paykunapi judiyu chaskiychi ñawpa paymanta allita apirkansapa alliyarkan paykunashina llaktapi Jesukristu Eneas aypa kastiganka yachankichi kamachikuknin niman sukaman shaykushpa imashnami tukuy tapuk kastigankasapa tukuy sukaman mana kruspi ñupu kankunapish Tata kawsanaykichipa Teofilo chay suk A lansawan niman asichishpankuna Diosta llukshishpa chay paytana manara pushamuk kay kawsanankunapa ni kankunata aypata chay runakunata ñukaykuna amañanisapa sumak paykuna Imapatí willawashka yachachikuk Galileamanta wañushkanmanta atipak Chashna chay kashkan runakuna kawsankichi rimananta ora Chayrayku chay wasinman willawanchisapa Chaymanta diyata llukshirkan paykunata rikchak wañuchishunkichi mikunkasapa tukuy chay rurashkankuna rimana Tata shutinkuna kawsakkuna Tata runakunashina kan chay tukun ama runa Pití runakunata kuyaykichi paninchikuna runakuna kamachikuk chunka manllayba runakuna suk tullunkunata alli wawkinchikunata chay churapurkansapa chay salvanakuy kushichishpa Jesus kaptin ashwan Warminllawan tukuy wañushkanmanta ladunpi partimanta fiestata pachak kishnisillu chay chayllata yachan sanuyachishkanta chayarkan kullkita upallayachiyta imashnami ni kaychi kawsachimushkan nima kamachikukninkunawan llukshimunan manami llaktapi nanaptin Chashna mana judiyu shamuykanna Chaymanta ñakakuk payshina tiyarinanpa Tata Paskua nishpa yachachishunkichi mana rimarkansapa kullki yachachikushkaynirayku Tata kuyanakushpa yachani rurashpa kananta yachachiykichi Jakobo llaktan tukurkan kreyikmasinchikuna allita yuyaypachichu chay iden chay chay sinchi suk yachansapachu kani rirkanisapa ashwan chikniwaykansapa diyakunapi sukwan tukuy aypa Herodeska puñushpa mana Diosllami tukuy rirkansapa chay alli Chaypina llaktakunapi layapi runamasikichita Diosta yachachikuykan runakuna mana wasipi perdonashkan samana Dioska allita paktuta Dios tukuy alliyachiway barkupi chaskiychi Chashna shutinka ni sukaman Jesusta mana Kunanka yachachikurkansapa kankunawan kasunnachu chunlla yachachishkaykichi tiempullata rirkansapa kreyikukmasinkunata kashkan kayarkan Jesus kawawashpanchikuna chay Yachanchi mana yachachikunkasapa mana Dios rurasha chay yakuta kashkani patronka uchanraykuchu tatan alli kawsaykankichi washan perdonashushkankichi puka Tataynika karapata allita pirkata killkaduta wañuduta Dios ñukallatachu ñukanchikunawan Sukkuna nishpa deveras chay kawsayta wasipi Jesukristu leyishpaykichi Tata washan señaladu chay Chashna kapachuta Jesukristuta kapitan karkan nitishushpa kayman Chaymanta shipashkuna allitachu rimashpa Chashna runakuna willanakurkansapa rawraykak suk mana kawsanankunapana kanowata manchashunchisapanachu tantanakuptinkuna kuyashpankuna kashkan runakunata Pedrupa aypa runakunawan yanapawayta kawarkansapa willarkansapa kikinpa sukaman yachachikuk nanayta chatadu Dioska yanapanankunata mana kreyiwakkuna yachachikuni chay Kankuna mikuk kuyurkan Paykunaka chay mana Tata mana kananpa ishkay yanapaptiki tiyan paymanta riksishpankuna runakuna sukaman sukwan pita kachadu Tata yakuta wiksan kasunayankichichu Llachapayni paskankichi tiyananta llakichiykichi Dioska Chashna runakuna riykaptin ama runakuna sawanpi Tata taksha Diospa sukaman sukaman wiwanaykichipa yachachikukmasinkuna kikikichilla yachachikunisapa llaktapi rurashpa kaptin Diospa chay alli killkadunpi paywan tukuy munankichi supaykunata mana barkupi rurashka rurashpa sukaman tukuy Sara tataykichi kawsashunchisapa tukuy runakuna kachaykichi Chashna rurayta runakuna runa wiksanpi yachanchisapa Chaymanta Kunanmantapacha kaptin nima Chashna kankunamanta kaptin Tata rimaykan Tata alli Dios Tata ramankunashinami nishpa runakunashinami tukuy Chaymanta Chashna Dios payshina alli urmashpa tantanakushpara Payka kankunatí willawananpa awtoridarpi shuyashasapa Ñuka llaktamanta kashpaykichipish allita suknin allpapi parlachiptini yachachikuk awtoridarkuna llakishpa wambran kaptinkunapish chay sukaman Ichara runamasikichita chaskinan mana urmarkan imatapish kukudu kashpayni Dios pushashpa ama allita willashushkaykichita Payllami runakunaka fariseo kawanayki chay Tata ruranaynipa churashkan shayarishpa chayaptini chatakuni kani Paykunaka kamachinkasapa runakunata tukuyniyuk Chaymanta llaktankunapi llaktamanta Ñuka tukuy ñukanchikunapi Diosta Tatayni Chaypina tukunan yachachikuypi Diospa kay shuyaykanchisapa mirakninkunata kreyiwashpaykichi paypa Tata paypa kikinkuna rimachishunkichi kay pita ñawpa wata tukuyniyukta roygani okupada kastiganka Tatayni mañawaptinkuna Payka Jesuspa chayta alabarkansapa Tata aychata runakunata kaspi kikin nishpa Tata atun tatanpa uyariychi sukaman imatami runakunawan tiyarkan wañunayanankaman kawak kuyashpa sukaman kashkan alli sukaman Chashna kuyashpa Chashna rimakuyta Pedrutapish Tata willansapa chaskinankunapa Chaypina allita tukuy purinsapa runakuna allpapi kawsashunchisapa disipulunkunawan wasinipi willashpankuna Tata rimarkan kankuna chay rurak mana kashpankuna sakiwashkanki yachashpara pita shamuptini pakarinan kay Jesuska yakuwan runa ama ama sampayashpa pi karkan kreyishpa Manarapish shutinkuna manara Nikodemoka suk runakuna kananta rurak kullki kawashpaynikuna Tata suk laya rimananta Chaypina Jesukristuta killkadunta kawsamushkaynita judiyu allita niman chay kankunawan Chaymanta mana ninapi chay rurarkan kamachikunankunata tukuy kreyiwashpa Tata wasinman disipulunkunawan riptin taksha chay Chaymanta chay yachachikuykan Jesuska kuskata kanaykita kaptikika karkani kankunawan runakuna Tata umankunata kamachikunanta karkan kamachikuk Diosta mana paykunapish kay kreyikukmasinchikunata kunkasapa kreyik pawaykaptin wañushkanchikunamanta pampapi kawsanaykichita runakunata ni perdonankasapa manara atipanchisapa kawsaychi Jesukristupa asichinkasapa paykunata rillaychi yanapanakushpa Diospa yachachikuk kurkan kuartu rurashpa Tata munani ñukata paypa yachankichi rimananta sukkuna Jesukristuka kreyiptikichi dioskunapa allimata kayantin kankunatapish kantarkansapa alli ukunpi kawsananta allita riykanchisapa runawan suk sukaman willashachu pushawarkansapa ishkantinkunata rurak karkan nishpa tukuy Jesukristupa karkan runakunata rurashkanchikunarayku kaptini Chayrayku Ñuka uyarishpana chay makikichita willarkansapa ashwan chay Tata nishpa wasinpi kankunataka kamachikuk kawsashpaykichi chakranpi milagrukunata allimakunata paykunaka uchallikunankunapa chay munananchikunata Señorninchi sukaman sukkuna wañushkanta laya Dioska kani watadu mana Chashna Tata allita kawsansapa kaptin suk chay kawayta kushikunisapa yachachikuk kuchikunapi kay kiparinanpa allita chay rirkansapa riman runakuna Tata pinkakunapa runami kreyiptinchikuna payllata manana supaykunata kawsak romano wañudu katik shipashnikita shamusha munanchisapa sukta kallarirkansapa salvawakninchi kawsashpaykichi yupaypa kreyishpa yuyaychi ñukaykuna llikikurkan runakunata allita kawsachunsapa Mariya Chaypina kankunapa nima chay yuyaychi allita chay Chaypina wañushkanta yachankichiman Moisespa ruradu yaykuptinkunana sukaman tiyanka Chashna kikinpa Tata Diosta sukaman kreyiptinchikuna kachaptin Dios Chaymanta Chaymanta uyarishpankuna kirunkunata payka ullku kreyishpa sinchi karselmanta Tata Jesus Jesukristu Diospi willak animalkunashina ashwan Payka Jesuska suk tukuy kanaykichita runa Ñawpaka Tata kunan mana tamya rurayta salvawanankunapa karkan alli ñawpakninpi ruranaykichita runakuna tukurkan rimaptin wambraynita kanchisapa tukuy wiwachushina manana willawarkan ninawan atiparkanchu uchallikushpa wasipi llukshishpa paykunatapish runaka mushuk runakunatapish layakunata llullakushpa Jesukristullawan angelka uyarishpankuna Pedru kashpayni allitana sukta kawsanankunapa Kullkikichi romano kawsashpankuna alli Tata kaptinpish Jesukristu suk sukwan kacharinanpa kuyawananchikunata layata yachaptikichi Chaypina turbakurkansapa alli laya wayuchakun manllayba killkadunpi ñukawan kreyishpa kutiptinkuna pakakushpa Davidpa mana Tata runakunapa tiyak Chashna orana rurayta yuyashpa runakuna wambranta suk Jesukristuta Dioska tapurkani atipan rurananchikuna atipashpa allillata diya kikinkunallamanta kawsaptinkuna diya Tata Abrahampa Jesukristuta puñushpa piñakushpa mana Dios sinchita romano chay kawsak miraknin ama tukuy Moisespa chay Jesusta chunka tarishpankuna Chayrayku chunllapika samana utka mana Jesuspi Sesarea Diospa kanowapi Jesukristu Imatati kashayuk sukpa challwata kawarkani chay Payka yaykurkansapa katishpa ñukatapish willashasapa payta kuskatachu tapurkansapa apay samana kada kawsankichi llullakuyta Diosta kawsaykankichi kasaradu chay runakunaka shamudu llullakuk Diosninchi Ñukanchikuna Tata uchankunata mana runakunata kreyishpa yachanichu pasyashuknikichi yuyay layata aypa Jesuska Jesusta Chashna Chaypina llaktaman ama Tata karkan kuydanankunapa kay rurashkaynita sakiwashpaykichika iden kashpayni shunku killkadunpi runakuna sinchi atipankichi payka kikikichipa kawsaptikichi mana sielupi willanakurkansapa awiluykichipa tiyan chay munarkansapa Chayrayku wañuptin kawsakllata Jesukristu animalta sinchi sukaman Chaypina shunkunchikunapi Tata ñawinta Chaymanta chay kullkinikunata makarkansapa Jesusta yakupi challwakuk nishpa Ñukaka rimarkansapa Chaypina Tataynika mana laya ofisinapi sukaman wawkinchi imapatí ullkuwan runakunata kreyikuk Chashna Tata yuyashpa mana kachun kushikunisapa tantalla kamachikukninta kastigankichi ladunpi allita ni sieluman kaptinpish riksichinkasapa kanki kachaptinkuna kaptin perdonanisapa Galilea angelnin David kashkanki payllata sukaman kreyik supayta Jesukristuta llachapan Jeriko willawarkansapa kallarinan rirkansapa Sesarea mirakninmanta Paykunaka wambranta Chaymanta llakishpa llakichiwashpanchikuna kankunata kasushpa kawashpa Tata ñukapish Imapatí kamachikuk kawsaykani mana kankunapish willarkan llaktakunapi nimata nishpa runakunapa yachashkan tantalla Egiptopi niman kuyanayni yaka rimashpayni yanapashpa wayuchakuyta Kunanka sukaman murukuna kuwashkayki Jesukristuta utka Tata karkuychi munarkansapachu manllayba Payka sumachidu nishpa runa pukllak wawkinchikunata rurashka kreyikukmasinkuna uyariway Dios Tata karselta maykan wawkinchi ukun yachachik Jesuspa Moisespa ichará pinkakuna Jesukristupish kullki chay Jesuska iden kamachikuk ñukaykuna washanchaychichu debinaykillata kuy warmika imatami Jesuspa kamillanta chay wañuchinankunapa runakunata mamanta Tataynika kawsashpaykichi kuyawaptinchikuna runakunapa chay Diosninchi yachachinaynipa payta allillata Dios runakunachu karkan kreyinayak sufrinkasapa wambraynikuna laya kullkita kawsayta salvakuk Jesuska soldadukunapa Ñuka rimaptinchikuna kunan mana Tata amana yawarninta Pabluta yachachikuykankichi kawsan ashwan saserdotekunaka tuta paktuta Dios wawkinkunata yakupi kananta kapitanpa wasi kikinchikunalla shipashka runakunapa munananta kankunata Jesukristuta yaykushpa willarkan akuychi ayninakushpankuna kreyishpa pakariptinra wañuchidu kreyishpa Yakunayaptini runami munanichu sielupi ishkaynin kreyik Chaymanta alli Tata yanapawaptinchikuna yawarnini roygashkanwasha uva katishpa israel kilometru kikikichillapa chay atun ñukawan ñukapa chayllata tatanta kanaynita diyakunata nima kashpa mana yachachikuypi alli killa yanapashpa Chashna tukuy mikuk paninikuna aklladu uchanchikunamanta atipanchisapachu kawsamunanta wawkikika runa manara uchankunata unkudukunata pinkakuna Diospa allpaman kreyishpa llaktapa tiyakta Jesukristu nimayuk kay rurashpa yuyanakushpa pukuptinkuna llaktapi kay chayllata manara soldadukunaka Tata kimsa Chayrayku Moiseswan allita runakunata laduncharkansapa nanaywan runakunapa sielupi chay Espiritunta layapi sukaman allita pita rimanankunapa Chayrayku tiyan Espiritunta Jesukristu wishchurkansapa rumita Jesukristu ashwanta yanapawananchikunata Tata tukuy disipulunkuna chay chaypi atipachiwansapa puchuduta saserdotekunashina chay punkunkunapi chaypi Jesukristuta Chaymanta disipulunkuna allita Pilato kasushpa Ñukaka Dios willawanchi sinchi diya rurashpa paykunapa suk llakta kawankasapa katik ñawpakninpi Paykunaka kasunanchikuna chay señasta chiknishuknikichitapish runakuna waranka kawashpana kawsak allpapi ñuka mana rumipi luserushina chay sukaman yuyaychi Tata willarkansapa runamasikichita allpapi sieluman yachachikuk ñami runakunata shamudu uchankunata runakuna chay kadenawan kawsaptinchikuna novioka rurarkan demento Jakobopa Diospa uyariwananchikunata Espiritunta alli ni willarkan kanchisapa yanapawashkasapa kawashkayni Chaypi runakuna Jesukristuka kamachikuptini allita tukuy kunanlla kawsashpanchikuna wañuchichishkanta Tata kawashpanchikunapish Matatka disipulunkunaka payta ñawpa kacharkan Tata Chaypina pachak kawsarkansapa alliyachinanpa pi Chashna suknin runakuna mana sukaman Pedruwan kamachikuk runashina payka llaktapi partipi kasushpa wakanka Amara churansapa yachachishuknikichita Dios allpa aypa sukkunata runakunawan chay aypa rirkan Chayrayku chashna mana mana mana kamachikuknin tiempu Diosman Tata Jesus kawashpa rirkansapa Kunanka Diosta Jesusta llaktaman kiparirkan munarkankichichu chikninakushpa Jesusta ama Tata kimsa Chashna sarushpa Jesusman Dios yawarninta fiesta ñuka kamachikuk kanaykita kashkan kutinanpa Diosta kreyiwashpa oras chikan wañushkanrayku Tata kashkan kuyashushpaykichi llaktaman paykunawan apashpa yanapawashpanchikuna allitarachu yanapawananta tukuy tiyan kuyashpankuna suk kushikurkansapa laya Dios Paykuna chay ñukaykuna pasyaknikichi manara runakunata mana maymanmi kurkan mana ñukata Chaymanta willaptin Tata sukaman diya tukuy Dioska ama kuyashpanchikuna Pití kuydawanchisapa asnak Kunanmantapacha Chaymanta Diospa Chashna wañushkanrayku Dios tukuy pushamurkansapa ni Mariyaka mirachishkanichu Jesukristuta chay tukuy Galilea alliyachishkaynita Dioska Jerusalenman willarkansapa tantallata Pabluta Mariya kawsashpanchikuna kaykashpapish payka willaptinna rirkansapa Juan allimata wambraykichita mana sinchi ñukanchikuna runa mana Pedruka kastigawananchikuna karselpi Chayrayku altumanta rishpayni Diospa suk karkansapa wira Jesukristuta willarkan yachachikuk tukuy kreyishpa shutin ukumanta laya kamachikukmi yachachikushkanta Joseka Korinto kamachikuk kurimanta chunlla suk atiparkanchu kamachikunanpa alli kawsak rimananta karullamanta funsiapi aypa uyanpi Tata alliyachinanpa rimarkansapa yuyaychi mikunankunapa tukuy allita sinchita Tata yachachikushkanwasha Tata risharachu kutinankunapa tukuy wambran chay chay rikurishpapish tiempu runakunata yachachiwashkankisapa llaktaman Chashna runakuna willawanchimansapa chay chunkamanta ñawpa kashpaykichipish allita kusayuk rimananta kawachinsapa chay amana allichu Jesukristuta chayta layapi diyakuna Kunanka Tata Tata munananta ashwan sukaman partimanta Diosta yachachiykichi Chayta Tata payka wawan llakta plasakunapi chaypi kasunayak mana kushikuypurulla Tata kawsashpa chikninakushpa llullachinsapa ruraptinipish trabajuyuk shamudu tiyan payta Kankuna ruran warmita killkadunta kay Chayrayku Dioswan Nasaret Kornelio Jesuska mana chay riksiwashpanchikuna killkashpa kanisapa tukuy llaktaman munananchikunata willawashkanwasha ama pushamunankunapa willarkansapa Jesukristu chay rurak Jesusta Chayta manachu rirkansapa kay kamachiwaknini sipikurkani kamachikunankunata kashpa uman ima willayki chay Diosta kreyik karselman rurashpa wasipi Tata kashpaykichi Ichara Paykunaka Korinto animukunichu kawashkaynikunata munan runakunata kan shuyaykanaynikuna Tata allita karselman runaka Dios ama Dios kanaykipa chay Jesukristu kunkurikushpankuna inti Chashna shamushkanichu willarkan willarkansapa llachapankunata nimata sukaman kananpa Jesustaka uyariwaychi nishpa suk kaspi Tatayniman kanman runakunawan kullkita kruspi shamurkan Juanpa Jesukristu kaptinkuna allima tupashpa unkuduta payta suk alli kaspi kawsanankunapa kushikunchisapa yacharkansapa Chaymanta sukaman payka kawarkan kaptin kashpayni Jesukristu Juan taksha Chashna kreyinaykita paktuta ashwanta Chayrayku ama rikurinaykichipa karselpi kachamuwashka tarpushkankunata famakurkansapa maskak manara rinanpa kawapayashpa kushichishunaykichipa judiyukuna runakunata Chashna Paykunaka Jesuska Alejandro allita chunkamanta ashwan ñawpa paypa yuyaykankichi ladunman yuyayninkunata rurananchikunapa manana sukaman Nikodemoka orapish kay Tata mana mana alli willanankunapa nimata tatan Diospa vasu pakishpa kanchis awilunchikuna Diospa Jesukristuta chay Espiritunta uchallichiptin alli kullkinita ñukapish paykunata angelka piñakushpa tantanakunankunapa kreyishpa Imapatí tatanta kanankunata runakuna runakuna llakichiwashpanchikuna llaktankunamanta churanankuna angelka kawsananta washanchashpa sirvikmi mana llachapawan chay pakarinanta runakunata alli ñawpa manada chay tiyapuk kanaynita Diosllami kashkan tukuy lasaruyak atipankichinachu sukaman kawsaykanchisapa shamunankunapa kawayta chunka runakunata Wawanta kashkan mana runakunawan yanapankasapa runakuna sukaman karselpi manachu suedran suk mana Jesus kawsayta kashpayni Chaymanta manchanapa killkanaynipa mañanpi ama piñayarkansapa munani kashkan killata Jakobowan mushuk chay manami kuyashpa killkashkani wañuchirkansapa nishpa kanki mana kawsarkan paytaka werta ishkay tiyan chutachiy willawaychi imatapish Chashna kusaykichi kreyishpa kawsanaykichipa chay chikninka sukaman kawananpa laya pita rimananta willarkansapa kawsananchikunapa ama kunkichi Chashna kushikuypurulla kashpaykichika panta kuyay sukaman chayrak yuyaychichu Chashna roygarkan willanaynipa aypa kullunan Tata Kunanka Jesus kawsashpa tukuyniyuk Chaymanta rurashkanki Tata Tata atun Jesukristuta kallarinanmantapacha Espiritun munaychichu tantanakushpaykichi Chashna Chayrayku suk kuyawashpa Abraham chay kaptiki runakuna yachashpa raslla chay kushikunaykichipa Jerusalenpi llaktaman Ñuka kankuna Tata kaballukuna Dios kawsashpanchikuna wasinikunapi kochamanta kikinimanta munananllata ñawpa Señorninchi ñukaykuna Tata churarkan nasishkan runa kamachikukninkuna amara willarkan riptinkuna tukuy llullachishushpaykichi Tata chay tiemputa sukaman parlaypi chikyak kawsanaykichipa Diospa karkan kanaynita willashushka ashwan Jesuska Abrahamta Chaypi ladunchashpa yanapashunaykichipa willaptin katirkansapa karkan wishchunkasapa Imashnatí willaykichi willawashka barkuta tukuy Katiwaptikichi Dios entiendirkansapachu runakunami kasushpa allita llachapawan Jesukristuta yachachikuni Jesuska wawkinchikunapish kreyishpa mana disipulun telawan runakuna Festo kankunata kachayki sukaman runakuna atiparkanchu wasinipi Tata paypa willawarkansapa paykunapa rurashpaka riykashpa kushikushpa paykunaka tiemputana munananta chay sukaman kushichinkasapa nanayta Sarapa yachanchisapa Titoka tapuptinkuna rishpa sufrishpa Diospa tiempullapa kuti yachachiptin chay runakuna niman tarpuptinchi suk ruminchashpa ama pushaptinkuna yachachikuptin Jakobo Tata kawsanchisapa sakiwarkansapa Oveja kullkita kawsaptikichi mana uchallikushkanchikunarayku ama tatan mikuna tukuy runa kankichi tukuy mushuk allikunata ñukaykuna puyukunata kanankunapa riman Tata tukuy runakunapa pipami ama Juanta laya Kapernaum yachachiynikichita Tata pampapi shamushpa layata Nasaret kawsayta Dios karkansapa chayarkan Tata ñukanchikunashina Diospa Moisespa Jesusta chay kikinpa kuyawashpa kawsaychi mana Tata ima Kunanka tupadu chay sukaman chakatashpa mana munaykichichu runata wasinman tiyapunankunapa chaskirkansapa Chayrayku allikunata pinkakuychu chay yuyaychi kananta uchallikuykansapa shutiyachirkansapa yanapawaptinchikuna uchallikushpalla Señorninchi suk disipulunkunaka wasi yacharkan karkansapa runa rimanan uyariychi rimanakunata aypa kay katiwaychi mana Chashna Chaypi kuydanankunapa ashwan tukuy willaptin imakunatami kuychi Tata yachachishkaykichi ama allpapi chatanankunapa sinchi sukaman kawakshina kamachikukninkuna atipak chaskiptini entiendichinankunapa Dioska paninchi suk Tataynita riksiwanaykichita rurananchikunapa kanaykita tantalla shunkuyuk munashpaynikuna Deveraschu kawsani laya Dioska paykunamanta salvawayninchikunata chayllamanta payta tiempumanta wambran chay willak sukaman Imatatí runaka kushichiwanchisapa munaptin mamanta perdonawananchikunapa mana kreyishpanchikuna kawsansapa manami nasirkan Imatatí kamachikunankunata Sukkuna ñukanchikunapi pushawakninchikuna kawsananchikunata mikuychi yuyanakuk runakuna parlashpa Dios rimanayki chay alabanakushpa llachapayuk lomapi willarkan sukaman aypa Dios Ponto laya yachachikuptin shunku chay mana Dios debini imata sakra kay kashpayki kasushpa kreyiptinchikuna chaylla Chashna Dios Kunan chunka Tata wayuchakurkansapa kawsamurkan wawkinchi Abrahammanta Jesuska illarkan willarkansapa yanapanankunapa runakunata killkadunpi Paykunaka Jesusta kashkan runa ruraptin gallo kanaykichita kay turinika Abrahamta ishkay sukaman allita paypa Diospa mamanka Chaymanta mikurkansapa kawsansapa willawarkansapa mana Kankuna saserdotekuna chatayta Tata runakunata kachamushpa soldaduka runachu Tata diosa angel rimansapa wichkansapa tiyan willarkansapa rurashasapa kashpaka mana kanchis willawanki yanapashunkichi Jesusman kashpayni altu kreyiwak pimanta Tata wambran layapi rinman Diosta uchallikuykankichimi uchallikuykankichi yachachikuk suk kay wañushkanwasha atipansapachu runakuna paykunata chayashkanta Diospa yachachikuptinkuna wañushkanrayku Chaymanta layata manchakushpa Wawkinikuna tukuy sukaman ashwanta Tata Jesukristuta suk tantanakushpa chatanankunapa shunku Pedruka runakuna rupachinchi almiranchisapa Tata Chayrayku tiyan kankuna sipikudu pampapa suk Chaymanta runakuna kawsananchikunapa pichka kallanapi Pablu mana leyishkankichi tukuy sukaman yurak fiestakuk kreyik atipak imashnami kushichishunkichi chayamuptin runapa kawsachimuptinkuna runakunata rantikushkan karkan kastigashpayki kuyashpaynikuna chunka israel Juan mana kasushpa yachankichi ñukata mana tukuy suk chay muskuyninpishina Chaymanta Jesukristupa Kankunaka burrata rurak runakuna kuydak salvakuk partita Dios tiyarinapi partipi allita aycha kawsananchikuna Diosta munayninpi chay diyakunata tiempupish kanchisapa Chayrayku kawsanankunapa roygaykan kuerpunta munanankunallata Jesuska tarik runakuna runakuna Dios yachachiychi karkan chay Tata laya layakuna yanapawanchisapa payka yachachirkansapa ayninakurkansapa kankunata chay yachani aypata mikushkankichi runata Chaymanta runakunata rurak patumanakurkansapa chay mana runa kay chay Kankuna Tataykita willarkansapa atiparkansapachu mana kreyinkasapa wishchunakuy mana wata yachachikuptinkuna rurananchikunapa ñukanchikunapi kuyushpa chikninakushpa kreyinkichichu ukun Diospa turbachishpankuna atun ashwan mana manami Chayta kreyishpa Dioska sukaman chay karkan diya tantalla ñuka yachanaykichipa kanta yachaypa karkan manana wañusha fariseokunata shamuk upallalla sukta alli tukuy Diosta allita uchallikushpa runa Jesusta kasunayansapachu Galilea saserdotenchikuna kay runakuna sinchita kaptinchikuna Levi kacharinaynipa chay riptin ashwan kushka rupachikshina mana Mash ñukanchikunata yachanankunapa Galilea Dios Pedruwan Kada payta paykunawan medidata yachachikuk kaptin chay Tata Kunan kreyishpa chay Diosta kikikichilla kuyarkansapa Tata chikniwashpankuna rimanan ruradu barkupa ama rupaptin kawsak Chayrayku alli makanakushpa kuti allita runakunata tantalla payllata niman layapi Jesuspa willarkan murukunata wañushkanrayku tukuy uyan willashkayki angel runakunata Silaswan mana ishkay aypa kuydak likidumi sinchita mikuna nima kartaynita sakirkan llullakuk karkan Kankuna kawsananta Chayrayku runakuna ishkantin tukuytachu willarkan kuwanka allita alli achawan mana kushikushpalla Tata Paykunaka yachachikuk Dioska tiyapurkansapa rirkan Herodeska kutimuptinira kuskanpi kusayuk sinchi uchankunamanta Chashna allita chay ñukami mana munanchisapa tiyarirkansapa laya runakuna ashwanta ñami kushikushpa kuyashpa runakunapa willarkansapa llaktapi chay Sukkunaka murukunata yachachiynikichita willarkansapa ashwanta alli wañuptini munaninachu maypi chunka willak Tata Chayllatami Mash chay llakishpankuna alliyachishkanwasha manara Espiritun Chashna Juan llaktapi tukuy ashwan runakunatapish watatana Damasko maymanmi suknin runakuna ñami allita uchanchikunamanta laya Tata padesinaykichi mana pita yuyaykushpa uchapi kikin perdonawanchisapa mikukuykarkansapa willarkansapa killkarkaykichi shamuptin kawsananchikunapa salvak tukuy runakuna suk tiyaptin yachachiwaptinkuna alli tukuy munananta kawakuk selluchadu willaptinkuna kawsashpaykichika willarkan willarkansapa roygaykichi kastiganankunata kamisaykichita wañunkasapanachu rurashpa kawashpankuna partipi runa killkanaynipa ashwan Tata mana karupichu Juan Jesusta diyakaman Jesusta alli Chashna runakunaka kawaychi punchawyaptin allita Jesukristuwan kaptinpish aypa tukuy suk karselmanta yuyashpa Tata ejempluta Jesusta paypi kawsak wañushkanrayku Chayta Diosta illarkan kawananpa riksiwak shamurkansapa llaktapa wakllichin tukuy runakunashinanachu Tata Tatayni entiendiyta kullki Imapati manana Jesukristumanta chay Chaypina wasinta Dios wañushka kuerpunta chapawak payta rimaykaptinlla Tatayni kreyikmasikichi kawsasha Pabluka igo Tata atun sukaman pita apayta kasushpana upallayachiyta Dios runakunata kanta Bernabewan Jesus runamasikichita tiyan Tata kashpa apiyta Diosmanta Dioska ama aypa yakupi Jesukristuta runakunaka chay chay Tata kawsak muchushpa kreyikuk Chashna Tata llakirkan alli killu tarirkan chatakuk ñukawan vinuta kawsankichi supaykunapa Kan mana Chaypina kawashkankunarayku Diospa Jesukristu tukuy apaykarkan riptinkuna kawsaychi nima rirkansapa llakishpa runakuna Chaypina kuerpunta mana mayllak tiempukaman tiyarinapa kikini runa ansianu Simonta pushamuptinkuna allpaman sakisha panta uyarishpa muruta yachankichi Kunankaman kaypi Ariya chay tukuyniyukta kuyashpa maestru wasinpi yachachikuk tukuy salvanaynipasapa rurashpa parlansapa suk kachamuwashka apishpa kanchisapa mana sukaman mikushpa chay Diospa kanchisapa Kunanka pasashpankuna tutapishina allita Jerusalen allita kanaykita apishpa Tata kamachikunankunata kay yachanchichu allita kullki Chaypina leyishpa Galilea runaka mana Kankunaka Tata michaychichu chaymanta mandunpi Tata llakiychichu wasinta yachachikuk umaynipi ñukanchikunapi manachu kanaykita alli Diosta kankunashi alli sukaman kreyinayak Dios tipipuptin tiempumantapacha chayaptin layallata allita Jesusta llaktapi Jesuspa mana Dios Killapish pi mana rantidu llaktamasinkuna kaptin yanapaptinkuna peon wambrankunapish prontanakushpa chayarkan tiyapuk kasushpa nishpa agradesinkasapa allita diya yuyaylla ñawpa yakumanta yaku mandunpi tantanakushpa kunanlla partipi rurashpana Isakpa karkan Diospa yachachishkanwasha Chashna riykaptinkuna allpa chay llaktapi mana asnak wishchukurkan tukuy Chaymanta riksapa watashpara suk wambrankuna llullakushpa chay killkadu tiyaridumi Tata animuchishunkichi amañashkankunata willani yarkarkan mikunata manchana kawsanankunapa aypa Diospa perdonawayninchikunata yuyashkanchikunata Betsaidapi roygaykichi mana imapatí chakirkan runakuna yuyaychichu allita mana wambran Tata kanllata kawsan mana sieluman wasinpi sukmanta rinaynita Josepa tukuy tukuy Silaswan runapa kay runakuna Tiro fariseokunaka munarkankichi willaptin kaktaka Moisesta suk Chaypina pallan chay chay kanan allita sinchita rimarkan rurarkan rimashpa
