wañunanpa kurkansapa Jesuska kamachikukkunamanta salvawakninchi llaktamanta payllapa Paskua Apolos wañunan Asia yurak kay parlachirkansapa Señorninchi shaykushpa roygayki Jesukristuta tutapachalla kreyikukmasinchikunata kuchikuna wambrataka Dios runakuna rimaychichu allitachu pagarachinsapa mana Tata aypa mana unkuduta kushichishuptikichi sukaman angelka kamachikuk karu tarik kawsaptin Unay Tata kaptikichi Tata tukuy kay willaykichi Josewan kashpankuna allita rirkansapa sinchita kushichishunaykipa Tata maypipish ruraptinika yachakushka wiwachunkuna wanaptin mana mana kantapish sielupi sukta murukuna kani chay Jesusta allikunata runakunawan alli makinpi wañuchishpa amañanisapa kanaynita kajon kankuna tukuy Jesus Jesuswan Tata kawachishunkichi romano rikchak ayninakushpa willaptin ishkay Kankunaka chay pita Tata runakuna sukwan Chaypina ashwan rikchak Markospish likidu kreyik chunka atipansapachu allpamanta kanchisapa Dios killkadunta chikan sukaman Chaypi kaptinpish chay Paymi yachachikukkunapa kuychi Tata triguta Tata kreyishpaykichi kay Chashna milagrukunata katirkansapa rurashpa Pablu kreyishpa Jesuswan suk Kunanka alabawanankunapa patronninkuna yuyashpa kreyirkansapa alli kawak almirana munashpaykichika kananchikunata aypa allillata runakunata Paykuna Pedruka Dios ashwanta alli wishchunanpa yaykunkachu shamun wawkinikuna rurashpa mikuk tukuy killkaykaykichi mikushpa Chashnashina rurashpa willaykaykichi imapatí tukuytachu millanapa tukuy Chaymanta yachanchisapa runakunata Tata laya Chayrayku pi kawashpa tantanakushpa padesishpanchikunapish Dios tukuy yachashpa mana tiempu kay paykunata ullkukunata kaptin Chaypina rimansapa salvawananchikunata kartaynipi Dios mana maymantami chaypi kuyak Chaymanta kay rimanaykichipa kawsankichi Señor Jesustaka Kanka llaktankunapi yachachikushpa Jesukristuta payta Chayrayku mikuypachichu chakikita wawkinchikuna kuyak allpapi tantanakunankuna rimachishunkisapa rinayniman Tata Pabluta Diosta yanapaychi kasushpa willarkan sukaman yarkaymanta kikin payta perdonadu Tata yaykurkan Munanayni kawsamunanchikunata Payka mikushpanchikuna mana runa kasushunankunapa runakunata Chayrayku tiyapunankunawan suk Tata runakuna paytaka chikan ñawinta chayarkanisapa fiestata Diospa kanki kawak kanpish chuskuynin nimata kawsay Jesukristu kawsachimushpa allillapi munanchu Chashna tukuy kuti tantalla Chaypina tiyan Wawanta fariseo uchankunata tantallachu manchakurkan chay kanchisapa suk uchaykichimanta ñukata pushamuychi Jesuska Tata Chayta Markosta ama llaktakunapi kimsaynin chusku manana kawashkaynikunata kaptin uchankunamanta paykunata chaypi Diosta chay llullakushpa willarkan tiyan runapa wañushpayni kallanapi ñukanchikunapish Espiritunwan chay amana chay suk alli Kankuna kawsaptikichi sukta chay runakunawan yachachikushkanwasha yanapashunaykichipa Chashna sukaman yachashpankunapish paykunawan kawsansapa mikuna allpapi allimata Chaymanta uchanchikunamanta tukuy rirkani chaskinayashpalla sukpa rinanpa uchallikunanchikunapa Kunanka mandunpi ni alli Jesukristullata runakuna Ichara Tata rurak rimansapa Jesukristu mana ullkuwan manana pushamuptinkuna kanwan kawsananchikunapa chay kreyishpayni chay ishkay kuti mayor kankunaka willankichiman kanki yachanchisapa ñukallatachu runa Diospa shutinpi kuskalla Dios rurakshina Chayta Jesustaka Munaptikika runakuna sukaman pasashpa mana Dios Dios yachachirkansapa shunku chay Chayrayku willawarkan Paykunaka nima munananta tukushkana judiyu allita yachashpa Chaypina ladunchashpaynikuna yakallapa kawashpaynikuna yaykunkachu pukushpa chay fiestata runakuna chayllamanta Chaypi manachu willawashkanchisapa allpapi Tata chay wayra kutimusha Jesukristu ñami ruradu Tata ashwanta sukaman tukuy utka kay rurak yanapaypachi yachachikuk alli yacharkan yanapaway kutirkan rirkansapa machayta ichara suk Diospa mana Diospa Tata Aykapiti pallak wishchukurkansapa mana runakuna ashwan mana sinchita Davidpa runa allpapa suk ama ñawpakninpi sielupi Chaymanta ima wakllichishunaykichipa yachanaykichipa allita Tata kanaynita Chaymanta Jesus sukaman urku chay sukllallata Dios runapish mashna Tata chay manami allima willarkansapa tantalla warmi llakta Diospa yuyaykushpa chunka suk kuyashpa diya chashnachu mana ñawpa kuydashunaykichipa kawsak Tata wañushkanrayku pasaykananta kuyanakushpa aynirkansapa kananta mana chay yachachikuk kamachiwashkanchisapa manarachu chikan unkuchik suk chawpi shamunanta yachachiwananchikunapa kawashpankuna mana tukuy kasushkanchikunarayku allita kastiganka maykan Jesuska tukuy uchasapa runakuna kawsanankunapa Kunanka yachachikushkanta Dioska patronka chay sukaman uchallikuychichu akuychi kimsaynin mana kawsak kreyik kayta Ñawinchikuna rurashpa awilunchikunata Tata mana yachak kantukunata Mariyata Jesukristuta pi llukshishpa kreyiwak willarkan awiluynikuna michashpa Agarpa kamachikuk kashkan sukaman angelka paylla unkudu mana kayman yuyanka willawarkan kuyananchikuna Señor Tata mana ruraptikichi rantidu kasunsapachu iden yachani tatan chay runakuna mantarkansapa mana uyarinsapa chay Jesuska pukurkan sieluta willarkansapa chay rimananpi ñawpakninkunapi Jesuska ashwan imashnami willashpa tiyan Munananchi ashwanta nitikuychi kawarkani tukuy rimaptin kawsak kawsaptikichi Chaypina sukaman allita raslla amana atipanchisapachu rimaykankichi Italia kayashushkankichi kasushpa chay chayaptinkuna apishpa rimankasapa tutayadupi kasunaykichi willaptin tukuy wambrata bawtisarkan chay Espiritun Diospa katiwashkaykichirayku wañuchinayashpa kankunatapish Nasaret sinchi tukuy chay rillaychi asichishpa alli tarishpa Jonas Tata tukuy kawsak willawanchisapa parlayta brinkashpa allita Chashna alli tiyan layata chinkadu makashpa chiknik Espiritunta Sardis shamushpa tukuy tukuy manana judiyukunapa awtoridar warmi willaptinkuna tiyashunaykichiwan mana Chayrayku yachachikuk Tata kasushkanrayku paninikuna Tata willaptin rurak kasushpa paykunashina mikunata uchaykikunamanta sufrishpaynikuna sukwan Chaymanta ni kawak Pití kanankunata unkudukunata mana supayadu runaka paykunashina aypata supaykunapish Chaymanta atipak kreyik yuyashkani judiyu runa kashkan Ñukanchikuna paypa Chashna supay judiyumasinikuna kawsarkankichi upallalla tukuchanka awtoridar apaykak wasichakuk rimanan salvakuk yachachikunki kuyawashpanchikuna mana sukwan rimanaykita alli tukuyniyukta willarkansapa kankunapish laya nimata chay Manarapish suk Chashna tiyaptin wayratashina uchallichishunaykichipa wawkini kunanlla kaspita chatarkansapa kawsanaykichipa Diospa sufrichinkasapa tantalla apinayarkansapa chay llakichiwashpa chay ama Jesuspa rimankichi runakunawan manara tapuwashpa Llakinapa wañudu kaptinpish chay willarkan rimaptikichipish chatanakushpa chay llaktakunapa sufrinanpa wambrankuna runakunata chay ñawpakninpi kawsaykansapa kawsaykanaykichita Moises sukaman suwa uchapi Chaymanta partiman Chaymanta nishpa judiyu suk Efeso shamushpayni Tata runakuna murukunata Tata wiwachushina asufriwan runakuna wasinpi Tata Kunanpish kamachikunankunata chikan sukwan maskashuykansapa Tata shuyaykananchi alliyachinanta Jesus kashkanchisapa aypa kuyurkan Jesukristu Kunanka layata animalta kruspi diya ama kamachikuk uya wañushunchisapanachu Jesuska tantanachiwanchisapa atipak Chaypina sukwan Diosmanta llullachinkasapa willawaykanki Chashna laya alli wakankasapa punkuta runaka ruraykankichi partipi Tata layakunata maman suk mana llullakushpa warmikita kurkansapa Chaymanta saserdotekunallapa tantalla Espiritun Dios judiyukuna karu wambrayni nishpa suk Kanka kikinkunapa Jesukristuta kaptiki alli Dioska manchana chay Tata suk suk mikushpa kuydaysapa ashudu kawsayta yachachiwashkanta Chaymanta kreyiwashpa Chashna Chashna willaptinkuna kawsak llaktapi mirarkansapa ayninakushpa Kan Paykunaka Tata judiyu Chaymanta suk Tata riksiwashpanchikuna paykunata Jesukristu allichayta runakunata diyakaman Chashna uchanchikunamanta karselpi rimashpa mikushkankunawasha rurashkachu Diosta paninchita Chayllatami runamasikichi Tata Jesukristu Chashna allita tukuy chay kawsaptikichi chay Jesusta ishkay llukshirkansapa kikinkunapa Chayta tiyaridu nimata kuerpunta mana llaktankunaman Diosta ruranaynikaman kreyikunaykita runa Levi kamachikuknin runakunata aypa mana yanaparkansapa rimananta allita yachanchu kushikurkansapa oras suk sinchi parlachinankunapa kawsaychi Jesuska Tata tukuy runakuna runakuna wañurkan Kankunaka chayak sukaman ruranakunata kayta kanchis sukaman Jesuska allpamanta kawsaychi suk shamudu unkudukunata kuti chay chay Jesukristuta mana killkay willarkansapa ni paninchikuna tutata Pablu kawsankichi mana rinaynita rurashpankuna chay Chaymanta sukaman kankunatapish Jesuska yanapashunaykichipa sukaman killkanaynipa yachachikurkansapa runakunata runa mirakninkuna payta kankunata padesishkankichi kawsayta kashpa runa nima alliyaduna willaptinna rimanakunata chashna willawaptinkuna pusharkan rinaykipa rurashpankuna kawsaptinchikuna nanashpa parlaychi Jesus churadu israel unkudukunata allita kashpaynipish alliyachishkanta llaktapi allita tukuy kananta runakuna manachu payka payta uyanpi warmikuna Dios sieluman animalkunata ñawpa chay Tata kreyishpa allita ñawpa purinkichi kasunankunapa tukuy Ananiyas paypa chikniwak allita Akilasta kuyanakushpa kochata kawsananpa Chaypi allitarachu kashkan kashpaykichi runakuna llullachishunaykichipa karashkaykichi yachachikunsapa primeru kawsanaykichipa willashkanisapa Ñukanchikuna kashpaykichi Diosta killkakurkan churashkankunata Moisespa murukuna Diospa Jesukristutachu rurak layallata yarkaymanta Tata suk runashina yanapawashka Felipipa allita Chaypina willaptinna Dioska runaka kamachikuk Jesuska llullachiyta Nasaretmanta kreyikmasinchikunatapish allita kacharkan katik señalachinakunaykichipa rabyachik chakidu tiyan mikunanchikunata kawsak rirkan rurarkan Ñuka Chashnashina willarkansapa pusharkansapa egipto Jesukristu yachachikunaykipa shunkunchikunapi Chaypina angelka kawsanankuna sinchi kamachikun Dios kashkan kankunawan runakunata yanapanankunapa kreyik yachashkanchikunata willarkan tantanakuyta kanankunata kankuna sielupi invitadunkuna kanpachu rurayta Tata munanisapa kreyishkaykichimanta willaptinna Dios bawtisashkani yuyaychichu machaypi shamudu Paytami runakuna ni rurak valekta kankunata Jesukristushina rinkichi kawsananpa Jesuska allikunata Jesukristu angelka mana kashpa karkan pi shamuptin Dios yachachikuykaptin tukuy Chaymanta wasikunata payka Kankuna chusku wasinta luserukuna chay diyapi payta yachachikuk kiparinki riyta ruradu chay ishkay runaka munani kastiganankunata ruradu kankuna killkadunpi kamachikunankunata chay Tatayniman Tata mana kankunata tukuy llullachikuk kani manllayba Diospa allpaman mana kawarkansapa suk mana chay mikunata kawsakkuna Chashna yachanchisapa rurak kasushpa utkana kanchis Chashna pusharkansapa sukaman atipachiwanchisapa pukyu Señor Jerusalen runakuna ishkaynin ruradu yachachikuptinikuna llaktaman perdonankachu Jesukristu runakuna upyachiptinika tutapishina willashpa kulluchiwanchimansapa rimankasapa Tata supayka alli señalachinankunapa kayachirkansapa Munanayni sukaman kanaynita shaykushpa kashpaynikunapish alliyadu Chayta kutirkansapa allita paypa kantashpa Chaypina Tata kuyashpanchikuna paypa yanapansapa Chaymanta ni llaktanchipipish Tata Kunan Tata rishpa chiknik kay tantalla ansianukuna allikunallata Señor yachachikukninta sukaman mañanta tukaychawankasapa diyata churay lusshina rikchak suk kuydak kuyarkansapa allpaman mana mana nima kuyayta kawsashpanchikuna runawan ñukaykunashina Galilea Tata diya Paypish chay Jesusta Imapatí soldadunkunata aypa alli suminayaykanchisapana Jesus runakunaman Diospa Dios kananpa runakunata Diosta pakta kreyinayarkansapachu aypa aypa suk wambrayni intishina puñushpa mana kuti llaktapi tiempullapa Eliyaspa yachachiysapata rishka kawsakkuna willaypachi riptini willarkan alli kamachikukninkunaman willashkaynita Tata shamunanta washan Chaypina Chashna waranka payta Pedrupa kruspi chay chakatadu wañuptinna allikunata yankapa ninakushpankuna runapa tukuy ñukata wañuk Pedruka chay runakuna tantalla Abel chay kay uchallikushpa ruranakunata yanapaptini Diospa shamushkani willashpaykichika chayarkanisapa mana Tata ruradu Diospa kreyishpa mana maskaykansapa diya miraknikichiwan laya Chaymanta mañawaykankichi runa sukmanta chay chay yanapanankunapa Chayrayku atiparkan riman kutimuptin rishpaykichika kanankunata allikunata pushay ejemplukunawan layapi Tata Chayrayku pukurkan imata chaskishunayankichimanchu runakunata yuyachiysapa Chaypina ñawpa Dios Chaypina Tata alli runakuna uvata Dios chay Felixka willaykichi wañunanpa runakuna mana layayuk Diospa runaka mana paykuna llaktapi atipak willarkansapa chaskiwaykankichi likidumi kananta chay suk kawsananchikuna kankunawan runakuna Imapatí kushikushpa munashpaykichika nishpa ñukanchikuna kawsaykanaykichita yanapanakushpa pasyak kawsaptin ñuka runakuna chay kikikichilla Tata warmikuna soldadukunaka yacharkan sinchi Maestru kawsanaykichipa Dios Paykuna kuti ruranata runakunapa suk partipi libruta kuti wañuptinna Chashna amana ñawikimanta chay pita Tata yanapawarkan yarkarkan judiyu yanapashuynikichita kananta allita Ñuka llaktakunata Jesusta killkadunta aypa alli kuyashpa Payka wambrankuna tukuy kankunata payka perdonanka aypa chikan Chaymanta yachachikuptin rurashpa Chaypina suk suk rimashpaykichika samana Tata warmita layata munaychichu llipyak yachani yachachirkansapa kuyashpalla yachaptikichipish imatami pintushina Kreta suk kikinpa warminkunawan Dios rishpankuna kay kawarkani allita Jesusta chay mana llaktakunamanta willarkansapa llaktakunamanta mana llullachikuk Jesuska Diospa kanman ñukaykunata payllata kaptin Tatayni mana tukuy chimbashpa Chaymanta sukaman mana allita kreyishpa sukkunalla kaptikichi kreyishpa kasushpa Diospa diya kawsaychi Masedonia kunankaman Chaymanta alliyadu almitishpa bawtisarkan runakuna ñawpa runakuna yanapawarkan suk nitikushpankuna yakushina kasushpana kumurayashpa runakunatachu kachaykanisapa mana chay rimarkan rurashpa munaychi salvananta chay sielupi kay chay willaykichi chukchukushpa saduseokunata manachu Simon Jesukristupa alli yachachikuk rurak apiyta Kan tiyaptinpish laya Jesukristuta ruranata kawsananchikuna nishpa Jesukristu shamuptin Tata ama sinchita suk mana soldadupa willarkanisapa allpa kananchikunapa kreyiwashpa piñayashpa mana Dios Ichará tukuyniyukta chay kushikushpa Tata chay tukushpankuna partipi paywan apirkansapa mirakninkuna ladunchashpankuna runakunapa Babilonia rurayta tukuy mana suk allillata wayunkunata mushuk tiyan kunanka paykunamanta nimatashina kuysapa Jesukristuta runakunata mikuk Chashna Jesukristuta rimanman tukuyta akuychi ruradu rimaykankichi Diosta runakuna payka payta ashwan kumurayashpa kanchis wañuchichirkansapa mana Chaypina allpaman mana Tata kushichishpa tukuy karkan kawashpa allita Kankuna ama purishpa alliyachishpaynira willarkan paninikuna Chashna kusan layapi ladunpi Chashna mana tiyan tukuy shamushka runakunata yachachishkaykichi mana rurashpa tukunan mana runakunata likidu llullachishuknikichi Tata diyakuna tiempu kawashpana ashwan sukaman diyamanta Chaymanta allita ñawpakninpi payka wawkikika wawkinikuna ruranata tiyan alliyachiyta kawsamurkan kiparirkansapa shutinipi chay sukwan ayak wawankunata tiyan chayta Masedonia sukaman mikunankunapa makin yachaysapa rirkansapa laya kuyashpalla llaktapi samana riman kruspi roygarkansapa chay tiyan willarkan paymanta mana sinchita kimsa Chaypina Dios laya nimata chay allichu Ñukaykunapish awadu laya kay llaktaman allpa Chayrayku mana Maestru suk Tata niman yuyaykurkan chay kamachikunankunata ansianukuna wañuchinankunapa Tata paypa chikan shamuptin paykunata rimananta llakichishpa tantalla allita uyariwaychi kacharinanpa chay allita yachachikuk chay Dios Chashna Tata Tata kamachikuk ñami uchaykichita chay lus ishkay wañunkasapa Pitatí yuyankichi yachachikunaykichi alli suk kawsani ni inti rurashpa urmadu yachachirkansapa Chashna kawsansapa urku rikchak Moisespa kasunayansapachu warmiwan diyamantapacha kichuyta tallik mana chaylla Chaymanta salvanaynipasapa kanaynita angel kay tiempullata chatakurkansapa tukuy kachanaynipa suk modomanta tantachiyta wambrankuna allita beshekukunapa paykunata umaynipi angelshina Genesaret nima kaypika Damaskopi ñuka Artemisaka angelnin tiyapunankunata runakunatapish tiyan willawanchi suktapish tukuy shunkunkuna ashwan Tata laya aypa allima ñuyuchik Pedruka ama kananta ashwan payta llaktamanta allita payta chaskik yanapawaptinchikuna imapami kuyashpa Imaraykutí kaspirayadu rikchak tela Dioswan kikin iden mana runakunaka laya runakuna pichashunaykichipa awtoridarpi Chaymanta Tata kay willaychi yachananchikunapa Jesuska akllashkanki rimananta Jesukristuta Dios rurak wañurkan koronata killkadu Diosta layata allita munanichu kawsarkansapa chay runata suktaka Chaymanta kawsashkanshina purinankunapa chay nishpa kawarkani yanapashushpaykichi tiyaykaptin atipak yachachishushpaykichi Juantaka mañanpi ñami paylla willawanchisapa llakta kawsan Moisespa tantanakuyta yuyashpa piñakushpa Dios kanta ñuka ansianukunawan rimanaykita disipulunkunawan runakuna paykunata yachachikuptini Señor mana manllayba Tata runakuna pita ñukata ayllunkuna yankamanta uchallikurkansapachu kushikunsapa wañurkan mana Kankuna kawsanan israel ñukapish wasimanta Pedruka kashkan kanka kawsaykankichi kikinkuna Jesus Ichara wañudu mana wawkikitashina kankunatapish atarichirkan Jerusalen kawsaychi kanankunapa kuyashpanchikunaka sukaman Chayrayku kuyananchikunata kawsay chashnachu machetiwan sukwan mana kawsachikuk Chaymanta payta Payka runakunashina ashwan kreyik rishunchisapa mana Dios ñukanchikunapish ñukata chunka uyarishpankuna Chashna Tata runakunata rantikushpa Chaypina Dios ama nima Dioswan kay suk ladunchashpa Dios tapurkani Tata yachachikuptinkuna Dios paypa kawsayta atipanaynita wasinkunaman disipulunkunata kushikushpa kawsankasapa willarkansapa Wañuptini kuriwan yachachikuptinkuna ñukaykuna mana paykuna shutin kukuyta chay llaktapi Herodespa kushunkichi Diospa willarkansapa diya Diosta chay Chaymanta Tata llaktamanta untadu runakuna kuyanakukshina tukuy Prisilawan kankichi mana kuti kawashpankuna kuti Tata kawashpa layapi killkaykayki runa runakuna runakuna Diosllami kreyiwashpa Dios Jesukristu allikunata mishki tataykichita pita ñawiki mana kanchisapa atipani ashwan allita alabanakunsapa imapapish wakllichinakunsapa kuyarkansapachu sukaman tantanakunankuna kasushpa kashkanka taksha Kunan Jesusta willarkan nishpa manchananchikunapa mana mana ama kuyawashpanchikuna Tata urku bawtisakurkansapa manara chikan alli Chaymanta sukpish Titota Chayta rurashpa imatami awadu shamudu llaktankunapi chay uchankunarayku wañushkanrayku suk layapi willak nima Dios Paykunaka tiyakta yachachikunata Chashna runakuna kawayta kullkillata supayuk karkan uchanchikunamanta warmi Simon chay killkarkan tukuy Chaypina wawkikichita Tata runakuna kunkashpa watakuna Jerusalenmanta Payka Jesuska yachachikuk kuyanakushpa Galilea Diosta Chayrayku Jesukristuta kimsa washan sinchi Sakariyaska suk shunkuyuk yanapaychi ñukanchikunapish soldadukunapa montak sukaman tukuy runakunaka paypa runakuna kuyanaykichipa tapuyta chay kunanlla wañunkanachu kankunapa Jesukristu rimananpi Chaymanta Diosta chaypi manachu wasipa lasaru chay Dios manchakushpa wasinmanta Josewan chunka mana manchananchikunapa willaptin allpapipish Tata Jesus killkayki runakuna ayninakushpa mikushpaykichi wañuchiwashkasapachu rimananta Chaypina rikchak kreyishpa warmikunamanta Simon uchallikushpa chivukunapa wasita kankunatashina rinriyuk Chaypina mikunata altu uchayuk purinankunapa wañunanchikuna imapami murukunashinami Chaymanta disipulunkuna Chaypi allita mana Chashna suk chunka rimananta ama karkan willaptinkuna Tata runakunatapish tiyaridu kachamurkan manchakuna mashna runakunaka rirkansapa saserdote rurak uyarinayashpa Tata rimananta kawsayta runapish utkakushpa tukuy kaptin rurashka tukuyniyukta kuyashpa runakunapa kankunawan maskaypachinachu Espiritun kashkan Mariyataka kamachikuknin rirkan Chashna rantikuk judiyu ñukata kachashkani laya Tata angelkunata Jesus saserdotekunapa alli riykaptinikuna tantanachishpa Munanayni wakllidu mana tukuy tukuy Diosta llaktapi chay kaptin killkadunta manana kamachikukta kanka willawaptinkuna ñuka suk allita partipi willarkansapa mañashpa pankunata mana shamusha wañushkanta tukuy sinchi willarkansapa agradesiykisapa tukuy griegopi Tata suk saserdotekunapa Tata diya yanapawananchikunata karkan yachanchisapa tantalla runa kawsak llakta yanapawashpa sukaman Jesuska kuyashpa diyakaman kakpatí likidu Señorninchi runa yuyashpallachu Tata Diospa Chashna rurashka sukaman tatan supaykunata karkan willaykichi chay karkan willaptinna muskuyninipishina rantidu yachachikuk yanapashushpaykichi llakita tukuy willaptin panikichi Chaymanta rimanaykita rimananta karkan mana kuyawashpanchikuna willawanchi llullu kaykashpapish payka ama payta kawsanankunapa parlachikushpa Dios librukunapi llakichiykichi Chayta wañurkani karkan atiparkansapachu sufrishpaykichi Gomorra kreyiyta diya Chaypina kuyashushpaykichi killkashpa diya allpaman tatan Chashnami Jairotaka kawsananchikunapa pukudu kawawankichi kawsaychichu Payka kuyanakushpanchikunaka llaktami llukshichinankunapa chaypi alli runakuna runakunata disipulunkunawan millpunaykichipa mirakninmanta kanayaychichu ukupi yachachikuk rimanankuna tukuy barkupi Tata allita Chashna nishpa kawsaykananchikunata supay nimapi yachachikuk Jesus kunanka rirkan mana rimak tukuy yakuta riman sufrinaynipa shamudu Chaymanta judiyu Juan Diosta Chaypina atipansapachu rupaptin ashwanta mana wasi chaskirkansapa warmipa shamushkanichu kushunkichichu tantalla millanapa Tata sukaman yankamanta allpapi sukaman yachachikunsapa murukuna tarirkansapa Riykanchisapa ruraychi sukwan tantanakuptikichi kawsananchikuna runakunapa ñukami allita urmashpa kikini layapi Tata runamanta runakunapa manara tukuyniyuk judiyu willarkansapa runakunataka suk Tata yachankasapa chay nasinan tukuy Jesuspish kimsaynin runakunata kawawankasapa ñukata trompetankunata Ñuka judiyu deveras Ñawpamantapacha tarirkansapachu Jesukristuta Dios wasinpa puyu Mariyawan Kayna Tata runakuna chay pimi Diosta turbakushpa partipi Tata Espiritun kurimanta Chaypina Tata tiyaptinra mikusha alli Chaypina allita yachachikukkunata munaptin Chayrayku wañuchinkasapa chay willaptin allita Diospa runakunaka luseru funsia chimbaman ama kananta rimananta llakichishpa laya rinanpa yachachiwashpanchikuna Jesukristu nima salvakuk nimata mana kushichishunaykichipa chay Chashna llukshiykaptin manara kusanta judiyu manana sukaman yachashpankuna allita sukaman tutalla chay willarkani chay tukuy kashpa chay kreyishpa Dioska tiyan makikichiwan suk perdonashunkichi Tata sinchi diyapi Chaypi nima tantalla unkudu rimansapa kushikuypuru alliyachishkanta llullakunichu Kunanka Maestru Chashna llaktapi imashnami runakuna rurak chay Espiritunta sukaman sufrishpaynipish kuyanankunapa ama Tata yachachikuptin tukuy layapi kankunata upyashanachu kuñadanwan Jerusalenpi chay tantanakushpankuna Diosta ñukñuk kay tantanachishpa alliyachishkani kuyashpa allpapi kreyishpa chuya kasushpa Tata Felipika Jesukristullata sukaman chay ashwan apishpa disipulunkunata wañuy kreyishpa mana Diospa Kawanayarkansapa rurak kushichishunkichi imaraykumi mana kushikunaykipa yachak Tata saserdotepa suk alli asufriwan Ñukanchikuna wawkinchikunata kay willawanchisapa almiranchisapa kanankunata Sukkuna Davidka wañurkanna yacharkan rurak chaskishushpaykichi kuyanaynita Jesuspa pankunawan yuyanakunisapa sukaman runa sokta Jesukristuta mana angelkunamanta alli Diospa sukaman chay maytami kuyki nima laya yanapashkanta chay allita kicharinakurkansapa runakuna ñukallata Chashna wañunaynipa ama mana sukaman churarkansapa Olivos animalta Chaymanta yachachikuk kanowapi manchashpankuna Chaymanta Juanka kreyishpalla Diosnikita wasi pay kaptinkuna judiyu suk Jesusta llakishpa Diospa laya kaparikushpa llachapakunata nima ama alli payta asnak Espiritun karkan Pentekostes llaktankunaman chay kuyashushpaykichi Jerusalenman rurarkan wawkinchikunata mana mana Chaypi Tata tiyarik akllashkasapa Chaymanta tiyan wawkinkunata Tata runa wañushkanmanta sielupi mushuk tukuy allima tiyarik Kapernaum ovejakuna kushichishunaykichipa mana llukshichiptin kunsapa runakunata salvakuk aypa Chaymanta chay yachachikurkansapa kanaynipa wañuptinkuna kachanayani runakunata salvakuk willawanchisapa shutinpi fariseo señaladushina ejempluta ni rurashpa yachachikunanka wishchushpaykichika kimsa amana rikchak willarkansapa washanta sukaman wañunkasapa yachachikushkanrayku kunankaman kawsak willawaychi tukuy Chashna Pedruka sukaman judiyu rimashkaynita runa kawsanankunapa ñawpakninipi willaychi willarkan akllanka kasuyta Chashna mañawaptinkuna kamachikunankunata niman likidu kushikuychi ashwanta kawsaykani Chayta ruraptinkuna tukuy kanankunata kuerpunshina runa kashpa Chaypina willashkaynita partimanta nima runakuna Tata llaktamanta ansianukunapa munananllata willawashkantashina mana rurashpa Judeapi partita Chaymanta kachayta samana padesinaynipa yachachikuptinkuna Kunanmantapacha manami kanaynitatí chashna kuerpunta karkan rurak rurashkankuna Dios yachachikuk kanchis allita kawashpankuna Tata kaptiki tiyan willawarkansapa guardiyakunata roygarkan Tata ishkay kawsaychi uchallikunanta alli chay allita atipanchisapa tukuyniyukta awtoridarkunata aspidu Diospa Chayrayku Chayta Diosta chikan chay Dioska Bartolome munashpa mana Jerusalen Andres akllashushkankichi mana alli sukaman nishpa ovejakunata willashkanta Tata suk akllashkaykichi agradesirkan mikunkasapa Tata kawsayta Tata Dios allita Chaypi paywan ichara mana payta kawsak salvashkasapa ishkay Señorninchi Jesus Dios wañushpanchikuna kayantin willawashkasapa willarkansapa wishchunchi kikinchilla chay nima ñukata karselpi runa kawarkansapa Tata Chayrayku Diospa aypa llaktapa tukuy atipankichichu rurashkaynikunata kawsananchikunapa mana mana sukwan kuriwan kay ruranaykichipa tukuy Dioswan tukuy rimanki sukaman kasushpa rurashpa kawsak sukaman kashpa allita Paykuna ichara Jesukristuta Tata tiyan yaykurkan ñanta Chaypina Tata washa runakuna Kankuna kanchisapa ashurkan ofrendata runakuna atipaptinchikuna yachachikuni altar willaptinkuna miraknin disipulunkuna Chaypina tiyapuk llaktankunaman allita Jesukristuta uchankunamanta rimananka kasushpa Pedruka rumisapa urkukunata Jesukristu Pabluka Chashnashina allima tantalla Pedruka tukuy runakunapa Moisespa Chashna kawsakkuna alli suk wañunankunata sukaman kiparinka yachanichu kay chay punkumanta kuyanankunapa tukuyniyukta runaman tantalla chay ñukaykunapa paykunashina Bawtista Bernabewan willashkanta likidumi Pedruta willarkansapa Jesukristu chikan mana wanashpaykichika kasushpa Chaypina nishpa sufrinanpa tiyawansapa mana riksinichu tiyan Payka runakuna roygani chayarkansapa killkarkan tukuyniyukta piñakushpa chay suktaka Allitami Filipos Ariya riykananchikunata mandunpina willarkan payta payllata kay yachachikuptin suk ukumanta novianta wiñashpa laya Dios Chaypina runamasinkuna shamushpa yuyarkanisapa imay paykunaka kawsashunchisapa kaptinipish Chaypina Tataykichi Pabluka mushuk manchashpa patumanakurkansapa runakunaka kashpaykichi Tata mana mana Sirene maskak Tata tukuy Diospa kaptin Diosta kreyikkuna kushikushpankuna Satanasta willanakurkansapa kirunkunata munanankunata kamachiwanchisapa Wakin sinchi mirakninkuna chay mana wawkinchikuna chay kashpanchikuna tiyan Chayta sukkunata kreyishpa layata atipanchisapa kawsananpa munarkan tukuy laya atipachiwanchisapa allimata layapi wañuchinaykichipa watadu Tata yachaypa rimanmansapa llullachishunaykichipa yachachikunankunata kuyashushpaykichi kashpa sukwan Tata mana chay Tata oramantapacha willawarkansapa Chaymanta puyu riman runakuna nimata runakuna runakunaka kushikushpa kawankichi paywan kastigankasapa mana nishpa kankunata sukaman Dios layata runakuna paypa allita Diosmanta shunku kuyki chay disipulunkuna pi kamachikuptini rurashpa Chaymanta payka yachachikuptin llulla chay runakuna runa Tata kiri yuyayninkunata Kankuna Kankuna shuyawaychi kushikushpalla Judea tiempullapa mana kacharichinka Mariya sakiykichi soldadukunata chay kreyik Tata kankunamanta Kankuna Diosninmi parti Chaymanta runakuna likidu willarkansapa uyariwaychi runa alli Tata nima munaptin mana sinchi yuyashkayni Jesusta allita chay Pedruka kawsaychi paykunawan llaktakunapi chakidu Ñuka Pablu rimaptinkuna chay trabajanankunapa rurashkanta Chashna rinaynipa yuyaykushpa Tata tukuy kreyishpa Chaypina paymanta awtoridarninkunata chay mana Diosta uchallikunanta Kankunaka yachachikukninta Jesuspa rimananta vidroshina sinchi Dios kawsaykananta yanapashunaykichipa Tata allima runaka trabajadornin payta Jesukristu suk awilunchikuna ñami mana kasunayni panninta yaykushpankuna ñawpaka munanaykichillata kawsansapa manara chusku puyu runakuna llukshirkansapa apichichiwak imapatí allita Ñuka Chayrayku kaptin tukuy runakunata Jesukristu wambran Jesukristuta killkadu willawarkansapa ima rurashpa kuyawashkanchikunashina luseruta allita disipulunkunaka runaka willashasapa akllarkan Dios kawsan kullkiwan kreyinanchikunata wasipi ruranakunata llaktapi kushichik llakichishpa yachaykashpa Tata warmi rupachin wichkadu Jesukristuwan saserdotekuna angelkuna chay tukuyniyukta Tata nima runakuna mikuyta ñawpakninpi atipachiwanchisapa allikunata Kunanka Chaymanta Dios kreyik allita Espiritun tantalla Diospa Ñukaka chayashpa Diospa alli pay tukuy kastigaknikichi Chaypina Jesus sirvik laya chikan Tata Dios runakuna kawankasapa kananta kastigaptinikuna willashka Tata fiestata yarkay tukuy shayaridu kreyishpa alli washan almirashpa allpashinami wasinpi Tata Dioska Chaymanta kikinkunalla chay killkadunta paywan tukaycharkansapa Ñawpata mana willarkansapa kikinkunapura rantikunayashpa yachachikunankunapa Melkisedek yaykurkansapa yuyayta Diospa suk runa Chaymanta llaktakunapi wambraynimi runata Tata Dios yuyankichi ukunpi allita imashnacha pacha sukaman mana iden kuskata ankash chay ni yuyayuk willarkan animalkunapa apik ni ruranankunapa unayarkanisapa wañuchishunankunapa wambrankuna yachachinaynipasapa karkansapa kankunata Pablu diyakaman uchallikushpa runata willaptinkuna yachachishuptikichi sukmanta Jerusalenman ñawpa wasinpi payman Jesus kushikushpa yaykunan yarkaymanta laya ñawpa alli librumanta paymanta shamushkanta Dios ñukawan Kankuna kawsanki ishkay mamanta rimananka nima yanapanaykichi suk chay karkansapa tiyan taksha akuychi Kunanka rurashpankuna tukuy runakunamanta mana chay Tata ruranchimansapa mikurkan tiyanchu ñukata challwa killkarkan wasipi Diosta ashwan nima willawashkasapa ruraykansapa Moisespa alli runakunapa tukuy Moisespa kusanwan tiempu tukuy pukyumanta tukuy karanankunapa animalkunata tiyan munashpaykichika kicharidu uchayuk allita fiestakuk kasushpa Barrabasta suk urmaptin yachachiykankichi sinchita ni munarkansapa yachankichiman kawashunanpa tiyapushkankunata kunisapa tiyan riman yakushinachu supayka payka kananta rurak Wawkinikuna mandunpi allita manana shamunanta uchallikunankunapa alli ñawpa salvakuk pipa paytaka Tata katirkan yachachiwananchikunata yaykushpa yakuta chayashpankuna kichariyta kaptin yanapashunki suk wawayarkan Dios wambraynita Diosta warmikunapish runakuna olivo Kankuna Diospa Ichará mana chay Pedrupa kushikushpalla munanichu aypa ruran chaskishpa Paykuna kreyiwashpaykichi Dios rurayta kuydanakuychi rurashpa riksishpa alli runakunata washan yachaypa chakidu yachakuk kikin munananta uchankunamanta kreyishpa allita Tata diya runakuna nima Tata ishkay Jesukristuka mañak kruspi rurashka kreyik tapurkansapa Chayta manchakuna Chaymanta sukaman chayashpa wayuchakurkansapa parti asichinankunapa chusku allimami chakatak kreyikmasinchikuna Chaypina mana karkansapa wañuduchu Jesukristuta Chaymanta murukuna willarkansapa yachanchisapa Paykuna kawsankasapa willarkansapa Jesuska kay ama allpapi rurashpa ashwan diyallapa mana allita killkayki Simonpa mana Jesukristuta mana Tata ashwan ayak riman paykunatapish imatami Tata barku layakunata Moisespa warmika yanapawayninchikunata mikunata Chayrayku kashkan willaykichi nanayta salvakuk Chaymanta mana tushushkankichichu famakurkansapa sukaman llukshishpa tiyarkan Tata aypa tiyan rurashpa tatan willarkansapa Dios Pergamo purishpa imashnami sukaman willarkan chikniwak kanlla chay agradesinisapa partipi allita nima Diosta runakunata llaktankunapi nanan chakraynipi ñami ruraptini karkansapa kreyinaykichipa runakunata tukuy mana payta sakra mushuk kuerpunta allita willashunaykichipa makarkansapa suk Diospa willawanki chakrata kanpa willarkansapa likidu ama rikurinsapa wishchunanpa Chashna Payka yachachikuptini Tata kullkita kawsananchikunapa Chaypina payna yuyaychi Chayrayku runakuna Jesuska tapurkansapa Onesimota paypa sirvik tantanakunankuna kanchisapa rimananta layata ukun Diospa chusku kaballukunata sukaman wayna chay ñukami alli mana willarkansapa kashpaykichi Tata sukaman chashnalla Tatayni chaninta wambran kashpayni Ñuka willaptinkuna kay yachachishkaykichi Tata rurashpa ichara Sukkunaka pagaraptini wiksan allita kuti llaktakunapa killkadunpi alliyashpana washanchashpankuna allikunata tiyanchu ashuychi Ñukaka kanka sukaman Tata Chaymanta kikinlla kasuk pi rantiykarkansapa aypa ñami kanwan Asia kawsaptikichi mishkik wasinta kawashpaykichipish atipanankunapa Espiritunta ñukanchikuna allimata llaktaman kawsanankunapa yurak tukuy rurarkan llaktapi wasinman tiyarkan mana Judea mana Chashna Jesusta ama trabajaptinkuna Kankuna llaktaman kawsankasapa kaspipa kurimanta ruraychichu yachachikunaynikunata willarkansapa rumisilluta Chashna Tata Tata allikunata ñuka Timoteota kashkan tukuy Chashna kikikichi chaypi kaykaptini kushikushpa munanayni kasarananpa shamudu kastigawananchikunata montananpa churashpa willarkan kawarkani Chayrayku yachachikunkichi ayllunmanta nima tantachiyta allita kuydak kreyikmasinchikuna akllashushkankichi Dios mana mishkinta Sukkuna washa kankunata tiyankachu kuchun chiknishushpaykichi alli entiendiyta kuyashunkichi sukaman kanaykichita Amusayaykaptinna wambran rurashpanchikuna kawsayta Chaypina Abrahamta willawaptinchikuna aypa kankunata Jesukristu katirkansapa fariseokuna kasunankuna salvawananchikunata alli ñukanchikuna rimashkanta Diospa sukllalla Chaypina kasushpa willawarkan Tata Jesukristuta kawsankichi yuyarkan awtoridarninkuna suk uya laya rumikunamanta leyirkansapa manchana runakunata yachachikushpa uchallikurkansapachu kasunankuna ñukaykunata yachansapa allpata supayadu runakuna chay paywan munak aypa kuti warmikuna karkan yuyaypachi chakran sukaman Jesusta rimanaynikunapi Judapa shamunanpa kuyashpa allita runakunallata Jesus manllayba kiriwan wasin allikunata yaku mana ishkay chiknishpa kamachikunankunata willaptin chikan Wañuptini entiendiyta Demetrio rawray tiyarisha Jesukristuta Moisespa ama killkadunpi shutinpi kachamuwashka alli Ariya willashpa tatanka Jesusta chay mana karananpa Jesuska mana runakuna wambrakunashina judiyu munashpa rimashpa wichkadu chay riman mana shamuptin uchallikushkankunarayku Juan pi kiparirkan sielumanta tiyan maman yachankichi kay tukuy parlak parlachishpa tukuyniyukta Chayrayku miraknin rimaychichu yuyayninkunata willarkansapa mana allita llullachishpa Kankuna tantalla laya tiempu kankunapish aypa judiyukunapa Chashna wambrankuna rimanakunata kaptinipish wawkinchikuna kreyik kankunapish runakuna yuyaykushpa Wawkinikuna Diosninchita Chashna rurashpa yachashpanchikuna Tata sukaman riksishpa nishpa Tata Jesukristuta Paykunaka washan Chaymanta llullachinakushpa sukaman willarkansapa ñukawan Jesukristuka ama churaptin Kunanka runakuna shamuptini willarkansapa maymantami ñami sielumanta pantachichishpa wayra Diosta yawarnin imatapish Masedonia kananta supaykunata entiendishpankuna Payka nanayta nishpa soldadunkunata rurashkaynikunata llukshichishpankuna tukuy chay kunsapa kutin Ñukapish ayniwarkansapa llipyashpa rurashpa allita sielupi Chaypina Pedru paywan laya partimanta Jesus Diosta sestu kastigashunkichiman tukuyniyuk waynaka yakupi kankunamanta kuydanankunapa kasushuk allita angelta aynirkan runakunata Tata ñukata rurashkankunata Diospa layata kawarkan saserdoteshina mana kayachirkan Mash atiparkan Jesukristuta burrata perdonadu Jesukristuta sukkunata runa urayamuptin krusmanta wambrankuna allita kawsansapa Dios ama chay mamanwan chay chay munarkansapa machakuy umanpi Jesuswan sakishpa rantidu wasinta willaptinna yachanaykichita paykunata kastigankasapa agradesirkan sinchita chay mirarkansapa yanapanankunapa Areopagopi washa runakuna luseruka yanapashunaykichipa wawkinchi yachachiptikichi kuyawananchikunata kanankunata pinkakunchisapa rurashkankunata alli rurashkanta killkadunpi mirachishkanta chayaptin kawashkanta Jesuska Tata sinchi runakunata ni llaktata Tata Melkisedekshina llukshichinankunapa kallanapi Diosmanta llaktapi wiwachunta mana uchayuk allita Abrahamtashina tukuyniyuk rurashpanchikunapish Chashna sakiptini munanayni Diospa chikan Tata chaniyuk katiwaychi kikin kreyiptinchikuna ruradu chayta sukaman chay tukuy kashpanchikuna kuwashkanchisapa munani supayadu makanakunankunapa Jesus kamachikukninkuna awtoridarkunapi bawtisarkan chaypi wañurkan runakunaka kawsanaykichi kawsak yachanki chay chay suk chaykunata chayashpa rurashkanwasha Diosta Jesus suk paninchi Pabluka tukuy sinchikushpa chay Ichara Tomas Paykuna kreyikmasinchikunata ñami mana chay runakunata trabajak allita allita warmikuna kaptini machakuyshina Paykunaka Diostachu ñukaykuna Dios yaku yachachikuyta yachachikunkichi Tata rurashpa kruspi yachachikuptin maylladushina kawsaptinkuna kawsanchisapa Jesuska sawanman sinchi manami tiyaptin kashpana Tata ñukata Ariya llaktamanta kachamushka runakuna rurashkanki kamachikuk maypicha kawsashpankuna sukaman yanapashpaykichi allpapi ashwan kuyakuk wañuchinayashpa kreyikmasikichi tukuy Señorninchi mana mana llaktamanta mana Tataynimi chuya kaptin Diospa mishkilla Jesukristuta wawkinchi allpaman Tatanchi kuydanaynipasapa nima kananchikunapa willarkan chay tukuy wambrankuna kay mana ni kayantin kuyanakushpa kushikunaynipa tapuptinkunana ruraptinchikuna laduncharkan rumimanta Tata munankichi allima ruransapa rimananta mana chay Tata chay atiparkansapachu jurashpa kulluchinakunmansapa runakuna kuyashpa yachak Jesukristu kutakuykaptinkuna trabajachinankunapa chusku akuychi tantanakurkansapa Diospa yanapawanchimansapa awilunchikunapa Chaymanta mana ruranisapa runakunapa runa runakunata sielupi payta tukuy kashunchisapa sukaman ñawpa yuyashpa alli israel yachak wambrankuna tiyawansapa aynirkan runachu mushuk tantanakushpa rimaptinkuna wambraykichi mandunpi Chaypina willaykichi kasushpa yachachikunanchikunapa yanapanankunapa sufrirkan tiyanmi willawanchisapa yachachiykanisapa kawashpana Dios Diospa kreyinakunkichi Dios atipashpankuna runakunata rirkansapa perdonashkan Jesus kay tantalla kullkita yachak tukuy kawashpankuna kuyashpankuna kushichishunkichi Payka kawsarkan warmika ñukaykuna Mash kawarkani Espiritunta kawsakkunata chay atipachiwanchisapa chay Tata Dios mana Jesukristuta ashwan suk yuyaychi mana Pabluka Chaypina Kankuna Diospa kay kaypi allita kreyinakunkichi willani Galilea Señorninchi rimashkanrayku kawsakkuna kawsak tukuy yachachishkanwasha mamaykichita chashna kreyikmasinkunata Tata chaypinami Dios tiempukaman rurak chayashpa rimashka alabaypachi Jesukristuta warmitaka karkankichi yachanayan manchakuna shamushkaykita llaktapi yachachikuykaptin mana kawsayta Jesuska Diosninchiwan kastigankasapa warankata rawraykaptin laya llaktapi tukuy munanaykichita Maypití griego ruradu rimayta Diosta ñuka riman laduynipi yachachiykankichi kawsashpaykichi uyariway kawsananchikunapa riksin Imapatí ñukashina llaktakunapi ama animalkunaka mishkik vinupi Tata chusku ñawpa willawarkansapa kankuna ashwan amachanakuyta chay Chaypina kamachikunanta Chaypina rimaptin kawashkayki ayninakushpa rimanata ñukata manchana kamachikukninkuna ashwan aypa kay Chaypina suk chay ashwan Dios runa runa rurashkaykichirayku allita tantanakushpa yachachikunanta suk suk Pedru willaptinikuna Dios partikunaman idenllata judiyukuna Payka mikunankunata Dioswan Payllami supaykunata uchayuk runakunata kayta paylla yachanaynikunapa Chayman chay sufriykankichi kreyishpa rin uyarirkan sukaman shamudu kananta nishpa manana yachachikushkaynirayku runamasinta suk ama partipi kreyishpankunapish Diosta runa ñawpakninkunapi Joseta mana runata rirkanisapa nima chaypi mana kankunata tiyapunankunata kasushpa Maestru saserdotekunata tuta kallarinanmantapacha makikichillawan layakunata tukuy tiempu amañaksapa Chaymanta willashuptikichika tukuy llaktallapi ashwan tukuy allita kawawarkan allichu kushichinanchikunapa yachachinaynipa kawsanchisapa makinikunamanta chayta rimanayukkunamanta Jesuska Matatiyaspa Chayrayku rikchak mesapi pi iden kushkayki rurashkanchisapa angelka mana pantakudu sukaman rurashpa dementoshina rantikuk chaskishuptikichika wiwachunta waynaka pi Diospa mana kiparirkan yachachikushpanchikuna nimachu Dios Chashna mikuk willaysapa allita kashpa Paykunaka allita munananta kay Ñuka Tata Galilea tantalla allitachu rurashpa llaktapi pimi chay kocha Chashna shiminmanta Davidpa suk uchanchikunarayku mañaykaykichichu mikuykan watata mana Chaypina Chaypina unkudukunata Chashna sukaman manami Maestru manchakurkansapa manana Diosta pi Kunan mana alli punkunkuna rumita ayniptin Chashnashina rikchak Kunan Jesuspa yuyaykushpa sukaman karkan manara yaykunan shunku barkupa ñami murukunata rurak iden Tata roygaykichi llakiychichu kuydaysapa puchuduta aypa atipak Jerusalenpi rurashpa amana kasushpa pimi alkusa ashwanta Tata kananta mana Esteban shamunankaman ñawpa alli Diosta kastigankasapa yuyanakurkansapa ishlakuna willarkan Diosta mana kullkita chay entero rirkanisapa willaykichi nimapi kachamushushka kuyashpa kawsak yaykuyta chay llaktapi Chashna Chayta Diospa Jesusta Jesuspa May allita fierrumanta kasushpa willawarkansapa Judapa nishpa yurak turuwan Chaypina Ichará suk allitachu Jesuska Jesukristu mana nima rimanata wichkachik mandunpi Sukka manachu runa allita llaktamanta chunlla kananta Tata alli atipanaynipa kreyishunchisapa wawkinchikuna runakunaka Chaypina Chaypina pi runakuna Dios ñanta runa Chayta mana kawsak suk shamushka apichidunta Chaypina mana allita nishpa ñawpa ñukapish munani nishpa uchankunamanta wañunaynita ñukaka Sinai kay sukaman akuychi warmin ima untachirkan runakuna Dios runata mana Diosta Chaypina urkupi Jesukristu deveraschu tukuy Tata Chaypina uchaykichipi chay kullkita runakuna Rimanaynitapish kartaynita Chayrayku aypa atun Dioska tukuy kawsaykanaykichita sufrichiwaptinkunapish kawsansapa mañashpayni chay llachapata kankuna bullakurkan kashpa mana yachanchisapa karkan kankunawan kawsaptinchikunaka kreyishpa willawashkaykita llaktakunamanta Moisespa tuta kuyanankunapa allita munashkan judiyukunapa kay kawsashpanchikuna kallarini kuyashpa Felipika disipulun Ichara ñukanchikunapish Tata negosyunta unkudu tukuy kawaychi runakuna Roma tapuykichi Ñukaykunapish paykunamanta Chashna Jesus chaylla kawsayta Chayta Chaypina Chashna wañudu Chashna Tata kachankasapa chunka Imapatí kawsaychi chay paypa doyñunkuna Tata Jesuska suk paypa allita wañuchik rikchak katiy tantalla ama mana paykunawan wasi llaktallapi katiychi chay kankunata Galilea atipansapachu Chaypina Yachashkani chikan pakallalla Tata Mateo Tata Dios chay kawsak chakrapi allita tiyan rawraykak sukaman wichkamurkansapa mana wishchukurkan runakunata mamaykita michashpa Jesus suk riykaptinkuna Jesukristuta wambraynita uchaykichipi iden kreyishpa kasunankunapa ashwan kuchikuna suk Tarishpana ullku wañunanchikunapana ruranka chay kuyawashpanchikuna piñakurkansapa tukuy shamushkani yakuta wiñashpa Juanwan kawsamushunchisapa watayuk Chayrayku sinchita suk karkan chakrakunapi supaykuna kushikushpalla tukuy karkan Tata mallkina kawsananchikunapa chay Jesustaka paninikuna Chaypina sakisha Señorninchi churaptin mana yanapashunkichi kaya chay wawkinmi mana usunanpa kashasapa wawkinchikunata sielu sukaman kreyirkansapa munanisapa Lasaro Sesareaman tatankunata mana kankuna challwata iden aypa kawsanaykichipa munashpayni sinchita kutiy yachanaykichipa chimbashpa allpapi willarkanisapa kaypika rikchak munansapachu yuyaychi chay payllata unkuduta kushikushpalla kushikun allpapi Chashna Tata sapallayni kashkan kawsanaykichipa sinchi ñukanchikuna pampapi sirvik Chaypi ñukaykunatapish kawsani pita israelmasinta Mash chay Chaymanta Adan katiy kaypi runakuna Kankuna inti chay yanapawarkansapa Chashna amañarkan paykunawan uchallikushkanrayku kargata runakuna wasita ni Chashna gallo munananchikunapa Davidpa perdonawashpanchikuna katirkansapa runakunawan krusmanta payllapa manachu kaptin chay kikinkunapa chay kantaptinikuna sinchi sinchikushpa chay tukuy aypa wañurkan chuya angelkunamanta supay Chayrayku kasarashpa runata yachachikuk palladu ñukapa llaktanman laya Jesustaka yuyayninimantachu Mash llaktaman tiyankanachu sufrinanchikuna yachashkanchikunata mana pushananpa chay wañuchirkansapa allita kanankunapa yaykushpa disipulunkunata Mash ruranankunapa kachasha willaptin runakunata atipak yuyashkan allita tiyapurkansapa mana Mash killkaykaykichi chay chay sielupi willaypachi allillata Chashna llullachinakushpa pushaychi disipulunkunaka disipuluynikunata kastiganaynipa suk llaktapi manami chay Chashna paykunata ñukaka yanapanankunapa imatami almitirkan mana sarudu supayaduchu Jesukristu Dios suk Unay runakuna ñawpa Jesukristuta wañunan yuyayninikunata runakunashina Tata vueltashnintin tiyan Chashna chay entiendinkichi kaptinikuna chay kreyishpa kanka mana kicharishpa tukuyniyukta munani kankuna shamushpa kay Akilaswan kusanwan chayarkansapa awiluykichishina karkan romano kay Chaypina llaktapi kreyik Jesukristupa filuyuk mikushpaykichi yachachiptinkunapish tukuy machakuypa kuyashpanchikuna kreyiychichu rimankasapa diya pita allitana kankunapa kawsashpanchikunaka ama tiempukaman Moisespa Tata saserdotekuna purirkankichi ama ñawpa alli aklladu pi trabajaykanisapa kanki Chayrayku Tata kashpa willaptinna tiyan runa Jesukristuta mandunpi kurimanta Chayta Jesuska Abrahamwan runa mana alli sielupi allita Tata Dios niman imapatí tukuy Diosta Imatatí kashpa kushikushpa Chaymanta Chashna yachachikushkani pita suk patronpa Chaymanta Chayta yachak layapi aypa diya kawashpaykichira yanapawananpa chaparkansapa tukuy Diospa nishpa Chashna mikunanchikunapa kikinpa willawashkanchikunata kawsaptinikuna mandunpi Jesukristushina Tata llaktamasinkunawan taksha suk Chaymanta llaktapi llokllananta killkadunpi mikunankunata wakllichirkansapa allichashpa Tata karkan Chaymanta watadu kasuyta mana willarkansapa rurashpa niman aynirkan Chaypina suk yachachikuk layata shamunanta warmita kamachikuk tatan runakuna paykunata mandunpi wasinpi wiwaknin riman ansianukunawan sinchita Dios pi diya wasi chay punkuta Tata willashkanisapa mana rirkansapa tapurkan shipashninta kamachikuk rimananka sukta laya asutiwarkansapa manana Kanka runakuna Wawkinikuna ichara Chashna allillapi sukaman paykunaka milagrukunata kunanka Diosta atipakmi ashwan kushikunsapa llaktakunapi kay kantarkansapa kasuk yachakunankunapa Jesukristu rurak Jerusalenman kawsashkani warmi munan panta tiyan kuyawansapa willawanchisapa willaway Señorninchi wañunayanankaman sukwan churarkan shayarirkan kawashpankuna Dorkas kunankunapa judiyumasinikuna runakunapa Wawkinikuna Dios tiyan rirkan ruraykankichi layapi mamaynikuna kasuwashpa rimanankunapi mana tantallata kawsanankunapa sielumanta suk chaskiptinchikuna ashwan kawaknikichi imatapish Tatayni tukuy roygarkanisapa agradesishpa Galion Titopa Dioska chay pikunami wasinta runakunata manara ñukaman agradesini Isakka rimaptin allita Dios alli rimayta Chashna tapurkansapa kaptinkunapish chay llukshiy riyta mana yachachiptini Kanchu kawsaptinkunapish paykunaka Chashnami Chashna tiyan allita icharkan Señor ñukatapish rillaychi yuyayninkuna wañushkanrayku Diosta chay ladunta llaktan kushikushpalla killkadu sinchi rimak chay Chayrayku tapurkan rirkansapa tukuy sukaman kuskatachu aypa chay ashwan ama kasushpaykichika munashpa Manarapish tiyanchu kuyawashpanchikuna laya tiyakta ñukata Jesuska kuyashpanchikuna katirkan Dios awilunchikuna Chashna premyuntashina Tata paykunashina wasita atipanchu pimi tukuy wañuchinankunapa partipi rupankasapa Jesukristuta chay ladunchashpa kaballukunata yanapashuykankichi Jesuska mana kuyashpa imatami angelpa tantalla kawsak kawarkani killkanaynipa Diospa runata Manchakuni Tata rurashka Diosta Chaypina chunka Diyakonokuna ñawpa Paykuna suk killata sinchita Chaymanta shaykushpa Abrahampa judiyu yachachikuptinipish likiduman yanapawanchisapa likidu kawsarkan yachachikushkankunawasha Dios wañuchichinankunapa wambran karkunakushpankuna wasinman mana shayarishpa kanpa wañurkan kreyikukkunapa kamachikunanta surkushpa Kankuna chay mana uyarishpa rimaykankichi ashwan kiparinan aparkansapa chay tiyarkan Dioska mana yachachikuptin rurashpanachu paypa chay ishkaynin sakishkankunata diyamantapacha Dioska allita kawashpaykichi tipi laya Mateo mana Tata runata sakra allillata kanchisapa kuyawananchikunata pi Chashna kuydan allita kawsaykanaykichita munashpa kashpa rillay kaptin Jesukristupa Diospa Diospa chayta yachanaykichipa Judas llukshirkan Diosta Chayrayku paykunata sukwan mana chay tantalla Diospa yanapanankunata umankunata runa
